ʕumjun fahum laaː jard͡ʒiʕuwna waaːltaffati aːlssaaːqu biaːlssaaːqi θumma ʔaadbara waaːstakbara walaaː maaːniʕin min ʕibaaːdaain ʔiinnamaaː tunðiru mani aːttabaʕa aːlððikra waχaʃija aːlrraħmana biaːlʁajbi fabaʃʃirhu bimaʁfiraain waʔaad͡ʒrin karijmin aʶːlfrsˤaʶ aːlʔaχjra wʔawħjnaː ʔilaː mwsaː ʔan ʔalq ʕsˤaʶːk fʔiðaː hj tlqf maː jʔafkwn tsttˤjʕ ʔan tdʕw kl mn trjd wajawma junaaːdijhim fajaquwlu ʔaajna ʃurakaaːʔiija aːllaðijna kuntum tazʕumuwna rzqaː llʕbaːd wʔaħjjnaː bh blda mjtaː kðlk aːlχrwd͡ʒ hj tlʕb aːlʁwlf kl nhaːja ʔasbwʕ wslaːm ʕljh jwm wld wjwm jmwt wjwm jbʕθ ħjaː ħl aːlljl ʔaafalam jaʶnðˤuʶruʶwaʶː ʔiilaaː aːlssamaaːʔi fawqahum kajfa banajnaaːhaaː wazajjanaaːhaaː wamaaː lahaaː min furuwd͡ʒin mʕðˤm aːlnaːs jʕtqdwn ʔan ʔad͡ʒhza aːlkmbjwtr ln tkwn qaːdra ʕlaː aːltfkjr wʔiχwaːnhm jmdwnhm fj aːlʁj θm laː jqsˤrwn walaqad χalaqnaaː aːlʔiinsaaːna min sulaaːlaain min tˤiʶjniʶn wajuʕlimanaaː biʁinaaːhu ʔaannahu raaːziqun fatawallaaː firʕawnu fad͡ʒamaʕa kajdahu θumma ʔaataaː waʔaan lawi aːstaqaaːmuwaː ʕalaaː aʶːltˤtˤaʶriʶjqaʶaʶiʶ laʔaasqajnaaːhum maaːʔan ʁadaqanaː waqad rawaaː ʔaanasu bnu maaːlikin ʕan aːlnnabiji sˤaʶllaʶaʶː aːlllahu ʕalajhi wasallama ʔaannahu qaaːla waqaaːla aːlχalijlu bnu ʔaaħmada jartaʕu aːld͡ʒahlu bajna aːlħajaaːʔi waaːlkibari fij aːlʕilmi fqd kðbwaː baːlħq lmaː d͡ʒaːʔhm fswf jʔatjhm ʔanbaːʔ maː kaːnwaː bh jsthzʔiwn θm ʔin mrd͡ʒʕhm bmfrdj aːlʕd͡ʒla mn aʶːlʃjtˤaʶːn waaːlrrahbaaa ʔaaqwaaː waʶaʶːlnnaʶaʶːʃiʶtˤaʶaʶːtiʶ naʶʃtˤaʶnaʶː jwmʔið jwd aːlðjn kfrwaː wʕsˤwaʶː aːlrswl lw tswaː bhm aʶːlʔaʶrdˤ wlaː jktmwn aːllh ħdjθaː hw jsttˤjʕ ʔaaj ʔaakθaru ʔaawlaaːdanaː mtaː ʔanʃʔit hðh aːld͡ʒaːmʕa aːld͡ʒml sfjna aʶːlsˤħraʶːʔ waaːʕlamuwaː ʔaannamaaː ʔaamwaaːlukum waʔaawlaaːdukum fitnaaun waʔaanna aːlllaha ʕindahu ʔaad͡ʒrun ʕaʶðˤiʶjmuʶn biaːlmusaaːmaħaai fijhi hw aːlʔawl waːlʔaːχr waʶːlðˤaʶːhr waʶːlbaʶːtˤn whw bkl ʃjʔ ʕljm maː kaːn jd͡ʒb ʕlj ʔan ʔaχbrk bkl ʃjʔ tanzijlun mmin rrabi aːlʕaaːlamijna hl nħn bʔamaːn hnaː jwd͡ʒd bstaːn χlf mnzlnaː falammaaː raʔaawaː baʔasanaaː qaaːluwaː ʔaːmannaaː biaːlllahi waħdahu wakafarnaaː bimaaː kunnaaː bihi muʃrikijna maː huwa siruu aːlraqm sabʕaa ʔiinnaaː mursiluwaː aːlnnaaːqaai fitnaaan llahum faaːrtaqibhum waʶaʶːsˤtˤaʶbiʶr taʕrifu fij wud͡ʒuwhihim naʶdˤraʶaʶaʶ aːlnnaʕijmi laː ʔatklm aːlʕrbja bʃkl d͡ʒjd d͡ʒdaː qrʔat ʔijmjlj ktaːbaːan jqwl aːlʔinsaːn jwmʔið ʔajn aːlmfr lahu maaː fij ʔajdjhm wmaː χlfhm wʔilaː aːllh trd͡ʒʕ aːlʔamwr mn aːχtrʕh jaː traː aːllaðijna jaʶsˤuʶdduʶwnaʶ ʕan sabijli aːlllahi wajabʁuwnahaaː ʕiwad͡ʒanaː wahum biaːlʔaːχiraai kaaːfiruwna waʔiinnahu laqasamun law taʕlamuwna ʕaʶðˤiʶjmuʶn aʶːħfðˤ aʶːlqsˤjdaʶ llʔasbwʕ aːlqaːdm qm bzjaːrtj rʔajtu tˤaʶːʔiʶraʶːaʶn juħllqu fwqa ʃd͡ʒrain sˤfʕth kfaːan ʕlaː wd͡ʒhh jaʕlamu maaː bajna ʔaajdijhim wamaaː χalfahum walaaː juʶħiʶjtˤuʶwnaʶ bihi ʕilmanaː bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm laː ʔaqsm bhðaː aːlbld ʔawlʔik aːlðjn kfrwaː bʔaːjaːt rbhm wlqaːʔih fħbtˤt ʔaʕmaːlhm flaː nqjm lhm jwm aːlqjaːma wznaː samiʕtu rasuwla aːllhi wkfr qd ʔaflħ mn tzkaː wakataba ʕumaru bnu aʶːlχaʶtˤtˤaʶaʶːbiʶ raʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːlllahu ʕanhu ʔilaaː ʔaabij muwsaaː aːlʔaaʃʕarijji kallaaː ʔiinna aːlʔiinsaaːna laʶjaʶtˤʁaʶaʶː bdʔawaː aːlʕml ʕlaː aːlfwr kaððabat qawmu luʶwtˤiʶn biaːlnnuðuri mmarfuwʕaain mmuʶtˤaʶhaʶraʶaʶiʶn ʔin aːlðjn jχʃwn rbhm baːlʁjb lhm mʁfra wʔad͡ʒr kbjr waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi kullu ʕaqlin laaː judaaːraaː bihi aːlkullu falajsa biʕaqlin taaːmmin ʔajmknnj sʔuaːlk ʕn aːlsbb ðlk aːllħm lħm dd͡ʒaːd͡ʒ aːðhabuwaː biʶqaʶmiʶjsˤiʶj haðaaː faʔaalquwhu ʕalaaː wad͡ʒhi ʔaabij jaʔati baʶsˤiʶjraʶnaʶː waʔatuwnij biʔaahlikum ʔaad͡ʒmaʕijna hl ʔant aʶːlʃχsˤ aːlmsʔuwl mtaː juʁlq aʶːlmtˤʕm jaː rbaanaː aʶːħfðˤ lnaː ʔamaː aːlðjn ʔaːmnwaː wʕmlwaː aʶːlsˤaʶːlħaʶːt flhm d͡ʒnaːt aːlmʔawaː nzlaː bmaː kaːnwaː jʕmlwn wlqd naːdaːnaː nwħ flnʕm aːlmd͡ʒjbwn ʕammaaː kaaːnuwaː jaʕmaluwna wmaː mnaː ʔilaː lh mqaːm mʕlwm ħqaː ʔant lst ʁbjaː tbdw mrjdˤaʶ wbaːlljl ʔaflaː tʕqlwn waʔaannaaː lamasnaaː aːlssamaaːʔa fawad͡ʒadnaaːhaaː muliʔiat ħarasanaː ʃadijdanaː waʃuhubanaː kamaaː jaʶqtaʶdˤiʶjhiʶ dalijlu aːlħaaːli taʕlijlanaː wakaʃfanaː ʃkranaː ʕlaː qdwmk faʕamijat ʕalajhimu aːlʔaanbaaːʔu jawmaʔiiðin fahum laaː jatasaaːʔaluwna wkðlk laʕanahumu aːlllahu bikufrihim faqalijlanaː maaː juʔuminuwna hðh mdrsa lmaːðaː ʔant mtʔaχr lkl mqaːm mqaːl wlkl zmaːn rd͡ʒaːl tsttˤjʕ qjaːda sjaːra sˤħjħ wamaaː jaʶntˤiʶquʶ ʕani aːlhawaaː hl ttðkr maː aːlmawtaaː walaaː tusmiʕu aʶːlsˤsˤuʶmaʶ aːldduʕaaːʔa ʔiiðaaː wallawaː mudbirijna mn laː jʕrf hðh aːlmʃkla faʶsˤaʶaʶːraʶ min aːlʔaaχsarijna ʔaaʕmaaːlanaː aːllaðijna dˤaʶllaʶ saʕjuhum fij aːlħajaaːai bslaːma ʕmaːlhaː ʔinh rd͡ʒl jwfj bwʕdh fbʔimkaːnk aːlaːʕtmaːd ʕljh juχrid͡ʒu aːlħajja mina aːlmajjiti wajuχrid͡ʒu aːlmajjita mina aːlħajji wajuħjij aʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤaʶ baʕda mawtihaaː wakaðalika tuχrad͡ʒuwna swf ʔaʃaːhd aːlʔaχbaːr ʕlaː aːltljfzjwn jaaː ʔaajjuhaaː aːlʔiinsaaːnu ʔiinnaka kaaːdiħun ʔiilaaː rabbika kadħanaː famulaaːqijhi qaːlwaː ħrqwh waʶːnsˤrwaʶː ʔaːlhtkm ʔin kntm faːʕljn qaːl aːlrħmn aːlrħjm waːlʕaːdjaːt dˤbħaʶː wʔanaː mnaː aʶːlsˤaʶːlħwn wmnaː dwn ðlk knaː tˤraʶːʔiʶq qddaː ʔiðaaː kaaːna aʶːlʁaʶraʶdˤuʶ qad jaʶħsˤuʶluʶ lahu biaːlnnakijri waʔiin aʶːntaʶsˤaʶraʶ ʔaaw qutila waqaaːla ʔaabuw ħaaːzimin aːlʔaaʕrad͡ʒu qaːlwaː laː dˤjr ʔinaː ʔilaː rbnaː mnqlbwn wqaːlwaː aːtχð aːlrħmn wldaː sbħaːnh bl ʕbaːd mkrmwn ʔad͡ʒrjt lj mqaːbla ʕml wataʔakuluwna aːltturaaːθa ʔaaklanaː waaːlwatri waaːlʕarabu tusammij walada aːlwaladi aʶːlsˤsˤaʶfwaʶaʶaʶ km tˤaʶːlbaʶnaʶː fj fsˤlk watad͡ʒtamiʕu lihajbatihi aːlquluwbu aːlmutafarriqaau ʔaħb lʕb aːltns ʔiið ʔaawħajnaaː ʔiilaaː ʔaummika sʕwaː fj ʔaːjaːtnaː mʕaːd͡ʒzjn ʔawlʔik lhm ʕðaːb mn rd͡ʒz ʔaljm wamaaː kaaːna linafsin ʔaan tuʔumina ʔiillaaː biʔiiðni aːlllahi wajad͡ʒʕalu aːlrrid͡ʒsa ʕalaaː aːllaðijna laaː jaʕqiluwna aːlʔind͡ʒljzja ʔin fkrth ttd͡ʒaːwz qdrtj ʕlaː aːlfhm ʕmlt ʁltˤaʶ kbjra baʶːlfħsˤ waʔiin kaaːna laaː jaraaː fijhi ħaqqanaː lajaruddanahu waaːlʔaːχiraai faħaqijqun biaːlʕaqli ʔaan jakuwna bihi mutamassikanaː waʕalajhi muʶħaʶaʶːfiʶðˤaʶnaʶː lmn aːʃtrjt aʶːlʕðˤm fhl ʕsjtm ʔin twljtm ʔan tfsdwaː fj aʶːlʔaʶrdˤ wtqtˤʕwaʶː ʔarħaːmkm χjr ʔaʶsˤdqaʶːʔ aːlftaːa aːlʔalmaːs nðˤrtuʶhuʶ laː tsurr hw mthwr kaːnt ldjhm mʕaːrf mħdwda fj aːld͡ʒʁraːfjaː ln jsˤbk ʔaħd baːlʔaðaː ʔanaː ħqaːan ʔaθq bqdrth waʔaannahum ðˤaʶnnuʶwaʶː kamaaː ðˤaʶnaʶntuʶm ʔaan lan jabʕaθa aːlllahu ʔaaħadanaː ħaʶːfðˤwaʶː ʕlaː aʶːlsˤlwaʶːt waʶːlsˤlaʶːaʶ ʔilhkm aːllh aːlðj laː ʔilh ʔilaː hw wsʕ kl ʃjʔ ʕlmaː faʶaʶːsˤbiʶr liħukmi rabbika walaː takun kaʶsˤaʶaʶːħiʶbiʶ aːlħuwti ʔiið naaːdaaː wahuwa maʶkðˤuʶwmuʶn wwd͡ʒwh jwmʔið baːsra fqlnaː aːðhbaː ʔilaː aːlqwm aːlðjn kðbwaː bʔaːjaːtnaː fdmrnaːhm tdmjraː jbdw raːʔiʕaː nħn dˤd aːlʔaslħa aːlnwwja faʔaaʁwajnaaːkum ʔiinnaaː kunnaaː ʁaaːwijna ʔanta fqtˤ thrb mn mʃaːkl aːlħjaːa waʔiin jakun lahumu aːlħaqqu jaʔatuwaː ʔiilajhi muðʕinijna wataraknaaː baʶʕdˤaʶhuʶm jawmaʔiiðin jamuwd͡ʒu fij baʶʕdˤiʶn wanufiχa fij aʶːlsˤsˤuʶwriʶ fad͡ʒamaʕnaaːhum d͡ʒamʕanaː ʔiðaaː ʕalimt falaaː tufakkir fij kaθraai man duwnak min aːld͡ʒuhhaaːli wmaː jʔatjhm mn nbj ʔilaː kaːnwaː bh jsthzʔiwn wlhm mqaːmʕ mn ħdjd nwr aːlhdaː sʔaʶħdˤdˤr bʕdˤaʶːaʶn mn aːlqhwa ʔaldjk mftaːħ hðaː aːlbaːb waːlslaːm ʕlj jwm wldt wjwm ʔamwt wjwm ʔabʕθ ħjaː walaʔaan jakuwna bihaaː muʶqaʶsˤsˤiʶraʶnaʶː fajuðʕinu biaːliaːnqijaaːdi ʁrjb hðaː lkn aːlbaːb ftħ lwħdh aːnt tħfr qbrk faʔiiðaaː aːlnnud͡ʒuwmu tˤuʶmiʶsaʶt fʔamaː mn ʔawtj ktaːbh bjmjnh fjqwl haːʔum aːqrʔwaː ktaːbjh maaː tasbiqu min ʔaummaain ʔaad͡ʒalahaaː wamaaː jastaʔaχiruwna hl ttħdθ aːlʔisbaːnja ʔamlk bjtaːan fj aːld͡ʒbaːl nħn laː ntwaːʕd wfj rwaːjai ʁjri aːlttirmðji ʔinh kaːn fj ʔahlh msrwraː wlaː tkwnwaː kaːlðjn tfrqwaː waːχtlfwaː mn bʕd maː d͡ʒaːʔhm aːlbjnaːt wʔawlʔik lhm ʕðaːb ʕðˤjm hw trknaː nðhb maː ʔin tbdʔa aːltdχjn fʔinh jsˤʕb ʕljk trk tlk aːlʕaːda aːlsjʔia ʔinh jħb aʶːlsˤjd jawma laaː tamliku nafsun linafsin ʃajʔianaː waaːlʔaamru jawmaʔiiðin lillahi ʔanaː mn ʔaustraːljaː maː qlth sˤħjħ walaʔiin ʔaaðaqnaaːhu naʕmaaːʔa baʕda dˤaʶrraʶaʶːʔaʶ massathu lajaquwlanna ðahaba aːlssajiʔiaaːtu ʕannij ʔiinnahu lafariħun faχuwrun ql jaː ʔajhaː aːlnaːs ʔinmaː ʔanaː lkm nðjr mbjn qaːl laː tχtsˤmwaʶː ldj wqd qdmt ʔiljkm baːlwʕjd waʶaʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤaʶ madadnaaːhaaː waʔaalqajnaaː fijhaaː rawaaːsija waʔaanbatnaaː fijhaaː min kulli zawd͡ʒin bahijd͡ʒin laː faːʔida mn ʕðr khðaː aʶːlsˤjn bld ʕðˤjm hl jwd͡ʒd mtd͡ʒr hnaː ʔawlm jtfkrwaː maː bsˤaʶːħbhm mn d͡ʒna ʔin hw ʔilaː nðjr mbjn kn mtsaːmħaː kraːm brra waːlðjn ʔaːmnwaː wʕmlwaː aʶːlsˤaʶːlħaʶːt lndχlnhm fj aʶːlsˤaʶːlħjn laː ʔauqsimu bijawmi aːlqijaaːmaai bismi aːlllahi aːlrraħmani aːlrraħijmi tanzijlu aːlkitaaːbi mina aːlllahi aːlʕazijzi aːlħakijmi kllnaː ʔasraː sˤbaʶːbaʶːt aːlhwaː waaːlʔaanafaau fij aːlʔaabnaaːʔi fij muqaaːbalaai aːlʔiiʃfaaːqi fij aːlʔaːbaaːʔi wahadajnaaːhumaaː aʶːlsˤsˤiʶraʶaʶːtˤaʶ aːlmustaqijma lm tbn rwmaː fj jwm waːħd ʔiinnaaː naχaaːfu min rabbinaaː jawmanaː ʕabuwsanaː qaʶmtˤaʶriʶjraʶnaʶː sʔaːχð hðh aʶːlmðˤlaʶ ldj nsˤf maː ldjh mn ktb fqtˤ walaw naʃaaːʔu laʶtˤaʶmaʶsnaʶaʶː ʕalaaː ʔaaʕjunihim faaːstabaquwaː aʶːlsˤsˤiʶraʶaʶːtˤaʶ faʔaannaaː juʶbsˤiʶruʶwnaʶ ʕlaː sˤraʶːtˤ mstqjm qaaːla rabbi ʔiinnij ðˤaʶlaʶmtuʶ nafsij faaːʁfir lij faʁafara lahu ʔiinnahu huwa aːlʁafuwru aːlrraħijmu waʔiið qaaːla muwsaaː lifataaːhu laaː ʔaabraħu ħattaaː ʔaabluʁa mad͡ʒmaʕa aːlbaħrajni ʔaaw ʔaʶaʶmdˤiʶjaʶ ħuqubanaː mdjna aːlqaːhra ʔalʔaːn ʔad͡ʒml mmmaː kaːnt fj aʶːlmaʶːdˤaʶː bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm ħm wðlkm ðˤnkm aːlðj ðˤnntm brbkm ʔardaːkm fʔaʶsˤbħtm mn aːlχaːsrjn ʃkraːan ʕlaː aːltafahhum waqad qaaːla aːlllahu taʕaaːlaaː linabijjihi sˤaʶllaʶaʶː aːlllahu ʕalajhi wasallama lmaːðaː jħdθ hðaː daːʔimaːan lj ʔin dʕwtah rbmaː sjʔatj flaː ʔaqsm bmwaːqʕ aːlnd͡ʒwm ʔiinnaaː ʔaanʃaʔanaaːhunna ʔiinʃaaːʔan kjfa sʔasdd djwnaː aːlʔaːn wʔiðaː qrʔi aːlqrʔaːn faːstmʕwaː lh wʔaʶnsˤtwaʶː lʕlkm trħmwn jwm laː tmlk nfs lnfs ʃjʔiaː waːlʔamr jwmʔið llh wlaː tħzn ʕljhm wlaː tkn fj dˤjq mmaː jmkrwn lawlaaː d͡ʒaaːʔuwaː ʕalajhi biʔaarbaʕaai ʃuhadaaːʔa faʔiið lam jaʔatuwaː biaːlʃʃuhadaaːʔi faʔauwlaʔiika ʕinda aːlllahi humu aːlkaaːðibuwna ʔiðaaː kaaːna aːllaðij janbaʁij ʔaan jaʕmalahu fij ħajaaːtihi maʕmuwlanaː jaː mwsaː ʔinh ʔanaː aːllh aːlʕzjz aːlħkjm waʔiin kaaːnuwaː min qabli ʔaan junazzala ʕalajhim min qablihi lamublisijna mn kaːn jrd͡ʒw lqaːʔ aːllh fʔin ʔad͡ʒl aːllh lʔaːt whw aːlsmjʕ aːlʕljm ʔanti ln tbtʕdj hða aːlmra hðaː maː nrjd ʔan nʕrfh maaː mnnj aːlkðb waqaaːla ʔibrwjs ʔaʶaʶtˤiʶʕ man fawqak juʶtˤiʶʕk man duwnak wʔiðaː ʔanʕmnaː ʕlaː aːlʔinsaːn ʔaʶʕrdˤ wnʔaaː bd͡ʒaːnbh wʔiðaː msh aːlʃr kaːn jʔiwsaː wmaː ʔarslnaː fj qrja mn nbj ʔilaː ʔaχðnaː ʔahlhaː baːlbʔasaːʔ waʶːldˤraʶːʔ lʕlhm jdˤrʕwn qaːlwaː ʔinkm kntm tʔatwnnaː ʕn aːljmjn qljlaː klaː bl laː tkrmwn aːljtjm rabbanaaː ʔiinnaka man tudχili aːlnnaaːra faqad ʔaaχzajtahu wamaaː bimaaː sˤaʶbaʶruʶwaʶː d͡ʒannaaan waħarijranaː fʔamaː aːlðjn kfrwaː fʔaʕðbhm ʕðaːbaː ʃdjdaː fj aːldnjaː waːlʔaːχra wmaː lhm mn naʶːsˤrjn tʕlm fj mdrsa ʕmwmja qarijbun min aːlnnaaːsi jwm jdʕwn ʔilaː aːχtlaːf aːlljl waːlnhaːr ʔaflaː tʕqlwn swf nuqlʕ fj ʁdˤwn dqaːʔiq taʶðˤuʶnnuʶ ʔaan jufʕala bihaaː faaːqiraaun faʁulibuwaː hunaaːlika waaːnqalabuwaː sˤaʶaʶːʁiʶriʶjnaʶ fsnjsrh lljsraː waʔaanna aːlʔaaħmaqa maʶħðˤuʶwðˤuʶn aːnaː mtʕb d͡ʒdaː lkj aːmʃj aːkθr mn ðlk bqj aːlqljl mn aːlħljb fj aːlzd͡ʒaːd͡ʒa knt ttħdθ fj nwmk aːlbaːrħa jħtaːd͡ʒ twm lbʕdˤ aːlmaːʔ kaːn ʁbj kfaːjh lrʔujthaː mra aːχraː waaːlʁinaaː ʕan aːlnnaaːsi lqd qlt lk ʔanh ljs hnaː ħaːwl ʔan jdfʕnj lʔaʶsqtˤ fj aːlmaːʔ ʔiillaaː aːllaðijna taaːbuwaː min qabli ʔaan taqdiruwaː ʕalajhim faaːʕlamuwaː ʔaanna aːlllaha ʁafuwrun raħijmun wmmaːtj llh rb aːlʕaːlmjn fabaʃʃarnaaːhu biʁulaaːmin ħalijmin waʶbiʶaʶːlsˤsˤaʶbriʶ ʔaaħraaː ʔaan janaaːla waʶjaʶðˤfaʶraʶ lm ʔakn ʔatwqʕ bʔan twmsjqʕ fj ħb maːrj ʔanaː lw knt ʁnja knt ʔawd ʔan ʔaʶʕtˤjk aːlmaːl fj aːlħrb aːlʕaːlmja aːlθaːnja qtl aːlkθjr mn aːlnaːs maː aːlðj tχfjh wraːʔ ðˤhrk laː ʃjʔ hl hðaː lka flmaː d͡ʒaːʔ aːlsħra qaːlwaː lfrʕwn ʔaʔin lnaː lʔad͡ʒraː ʔin knaː nħn aːlʁaːlbjn lqd fʕl ðlk mraːraːan wtkraːraːan kjf td͡ʒrʔ ʕlaː qwl ʃjʔin khðaː θumma baʕaθnaaːhum linaʕlama ʔaajju aːlħizbajni ʔaʶaʶħsˤaʶaʶː limaaː labiθuwaː ʔaamadanaː maaːðaaː ʕalajka ʔiðaaː ʔakramta ʔamsijatijbi kajfa ʔanti masaaːʔu aːlχajri muʃtaaːqu waaːʕlam ʔaanna sˤaʶlaʶaʶːħaʶ aːlddunjaaː muʕtabarun min wad͡ʒhajni hl ʔant mn kwkb laː tʕjʃ fjh ʔilaː aːlnsaːʔ ltrtaːħ fj tswqk aːlʔasbwʕj jd͡ʒb ʔan tmlk sjaːraan rabbukum min ʔaazwaaːd͡ʒikum bal ʔaantum qawmun ʕaaːduwna waʔiin kaaːduwaː lajastafizzuwnaka mina aʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤiʶ lijuχrid͡ʒuwka minhaaː waʔiiðanaː laaː jalbaθuwna χilaaːfaka ʔiillaaː qalijlanaː waqaaːla ʔaabuw aːlʔaaswadi aːldduʔualiju nðˤrt ħwlj wuʶdˤiʶʕaʶ saːmj tħt rʕaːja ʔasra ħaʶːdˤnaʶ judχilu man jaʃaaːʔu fij raħmatihi waʶaʶːlðˤðˤaʶaʶːliʶmiʶjnaʶ ʔaaʕadda lahum ʕaðaaːbanaː ʔaalijmanaː ʔinhu ʔiqtbaːs mn ktaːb lnraː wasahula ʕalajhi kullu ʕasijrin fj hðh aːlljla qmt bhðaː bdwn ʔan tfkr qaaːla haðaaː firaaːqu bajnij wabajnika saʔaunabbiʔiuka bitaʔawijli maaː lam taʶstaʶtˤiʶʕ ʕalajhi sˤaʶbraʶnaʶː waːtqwaː aːlðj χlqkm waːld͡ʒbla aːlʔawljn waʔaammaaː ʔiin kaaːna min ʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶaʶːbiʶ aːljamijni wqaːl aːlmlk aːʔitwnj bh ʔaʶstχlsˤh lnfsj flmaː klmh qaːl ʔink aːljwm ldjnaː mkjn ʔamjn ʔajn jnthj hl kaːn kjn fj aːlbjt baːlʔams sjkwn ħfl mjlaːdh ʁdaː ʕnd aːlθaːlθa ʔaʶðˤhrt aːlntaːʔid͡ʒu χtˤʔaʶ aːltnbʔuaːt jrsl ʕljkmaː ʃwaʶːðˤ mn naːr wnħaːs flaː tntsˤraʶːn waʔiin kullun lammaaː d͡ʒamijʕun ladajnaaː muʶħdˤaʶruʶwnaʶ ldjh ndbh ʕlj ðqnh wd͡ʒʕlnaː aːbn mrjm wʔamh ʔaːja wʔaːwjnaːhmaː ʔilaː rbwa ðaːt qraːr wmʕjn lqd aːnhaːr mn ʃda ħbh lhaː qaaːla famaaː χaʶtˤbuʶkaʶ jaaː saaːmirijju θumma qaraʔaa ʔinnamaaː jaχʃaaː aːlllaha min ʕibaaːdihi aːlʕulamaaːʔu waʔaammaaː aːlqaaːʕidaau aːlrraaːbiʕaau jkmn fj aʶːlqsˤaʶ ʃjʔ mn ʕnsˤr aːltraːd͡ʒjdjaː jħb twm aːlħjaːka hw trka twm jðhb aːʃtrjt bʕdˤ aʶːlbjdˤ aʶːltˤaʶːzd͡ʒ aːlðj ʔataː mn aːlmzrʕa lltw lqd aːtuuhima baːχtlaːs aːlʔamwaːl aːlʕaːmma wafadajnaaːhu biðibħin ʕaʶðˤiʶjmiʶn ðlk ʕjsaː aːbn mrjm qwl aːlħq aːlðj fjh jmtrwn wajastaqillu ʕinda aːstiqlaaːlihi wajudχiluhumu aːld͡ʒannaaa ʕarrafahaaː lahum aːlðj jraːk ħjn tqwm ljs ʕndj aːlwqt lʔasaːʕdk fj ħl waːd͡ʒbk fjqwlwaː hl nħn mnðˤrwn wql rb ʔaʕwð bk mn hmzaːt aʶːlʃjaʶːtˤjn wanufiχa fij aʶːlsˤsˤuʶwriʶ ðalika jawmu aːlwaʕijdi aːllaðijna d͡ʒaʕaluwaː aːlqurʔaːna ʕiʶdˤiʶjnaʶ ʔaskn fj mdjna kbjra waqijla man raaːqin bismi aːlllahi aːlrraħmani aːlrraħijmi wajlun liʶlmuʶtˤaʶffiʶfiʶjnaʶ wahum ʕalaaː maaː jafʕaluwna biaːlmuʔuminijna ʃuhuwdun kaʔaannahu d͡ʒimaaːlatun sˤuʶfruʶn twm jrqd fj aːlfraːʃ mħmwmaːan hl tnwj aːlqdwm ʁdanaː ʔanaː bħaːd͡ʒa ʔilaː qaʶsˤiʶaʶ ʃaʕr hl hj sˤʕbaʶ llʁaːja lkj tuktb aːlmqaːrna bjn aːlʔiθnajni lm tkn lsˤaʶːlħiʶhiʶ faʔiiðaaː d͡ʒaaːʔati aʶːlsˤsˤaʶaʶːχaʶaʶuʶ aʶːsttˤaʶːʕ ʔan jbnj bjtaːan sˤʁjraʶːaʶn ʔinaː d͡ʒʕlnaːhaː ftna llðˤaʶːlmjn faʔaammaaː aːllaðijna ʔaːmanuwaː waʕamiluwaː aʶːlsˤsˤaʶaʶːliʶħaʶaʶːtiʶ fajudχiluhum rabbuhum fij raħmatihi ðalika huwa aːlfawzu aːlmubijnu kaːn saːmj jqdˤj wqtaː ʔakθr mʕ ljlaː hl ttħdθ aːlfrnsja ʔam lhm ʃrkaːʔ fljʔatwaː bʃrkaːʔihm ʔin kaːnwaː sˤaʶːdqjn nzlaː mn ʁfwr rħjm wkðbwaː bʔaːjaːtnaː kðaːbaː flnqsˤn ʕljhm bʕlm wmaː knaː ʁaːʔibjn frd͡ʒʕwaː ʔilaː ʔanfshm fqaːlwaː ʔinkm ʔantm aʶːlðˤaʶːlmwn ʔanaː ʔaʕd ln ʔafʕlhaː aːlʁdaːʔ ʕnd aʶːlðˤhjraʶ mʕ ʔaʶsˤdqaʶːʔiʶj ʔaʶsˤiʶrraʶ ʕlaː aʶːlʔaʶfdˤl hl hðh hj ħqaː aːlħqjqa waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi biaːlʕadli waʶaʶːlʔiʶiʶnsˤaʶaʶːfiʶ takuwnu muddaau aːliaːʔitilaaːfi ʔiinna aːlʔaabraaːra lafij naʕijmin wanasuwqu aːlmud͡ʒrimijna ʔiilaaː d͡ʒahannama wirdanaː θumma ʔaʶaʶfiʶjdˤuʶwaʶː min ħajθu ʔaʶaʶfaʶaʶːdˤaʶ aːlnnaaːsu waaːstaʁfiruwaː aːlllaha ʔiinna aːlllaha ʁafuwrun raħijmun sʔaltuh ʕn aːlħaːdθ ʔanaː lstu χaːʔifaan waaːlʔiidlaaːla ʕalajhi waʔiin taqaddamat sˤuʶħbaʶtuʶhuʶ walakin aʶːuʶnðˤuʶr ʔilaaː man fawqak min aːlʕulamaaːʔi ðaːk aʶːlʃχsˤ sˤdjqj χaːlj wʔamwaːlhm wʔaʶrdˤaʶː lm ttˤʔiʶwhaʶː wkaːn aːllh ʕlaː kl ʃjʔ qdjraː hðaː ʔabj hw jrtbik ʕndmaː jraːhaː ðlk aːlmħl jʁlq fj aːlsaːʕa aːltaːsʕa kl ljla sʔaʶnðˤf aʶːlmtˤbχ bʕd qljl ʔaam χalaquwaː nðhb lnraː ʔiðaː kaːn twm jsttˤjʕ ʔan jsaːʕdnaː hnaːk ðbaːba fj aːlqhwa taʶbsˤiʶraʶaʶaʶn waðikraaː likulli ʕabdin munijbin hðaː srjr kjf bʔimkaːnnaː ʔan nħkm ʁjrnaː ʕndmaː laː nsttˤjʕ ʔan nħkm ʔanfsnaː jasʔaaluhu man fij aːlssamaaːwaaːti waʶaʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤiʶ kulla jawmin huwa fij ʃaʔanin jaʔatuwnanaaː fij ħaaːli aːlquwwaai binaaː ʕalajhim wʔiðaː naːdjtm ʔilaː aʶːlsˤlaʶːaʶ aːtχðwhaː hzwaː sajjiʔiaaun miθluhaaː faman ʕafaaː waʶʔaʶaʶsˤlaʶħaʶ faʔaad͡ʒruhu ʕalaaː aːlllahi ʔiinnahu laaː juħibbu aʶːlðˤðˤaʶaʶːliʶmiʶjnaʶ fij maqʕadi sˤiʶdqiʶn ʕinda malijkin muqtadirin aːlrraħmanu ʔaʕndk qlm fʔawlʔik tħrwaː rʃdaː ʔaaw liħamijjaain daaːχalatk ʕinda taʕaððuri fahmihi ʔaan talida aːlʔaamaau rabbatahaaː waʔaan taraaː aːlħufaaːaa aːlʕuraaːaa aːlʕaaːlaaa riʕaaːʔa aːlʃʃaaːʔi aːlmwqʕ laːħqaː laː tql lj hðh hj aːlsaːʕa aːltj aːʃtrjthaː aːms flnðjqn aːlðjn kfrwaː ʕðaːbaː ʃdjdaː wlnd͡ʒzjnhm ʔaswʔa aːlðj kaːnwaː jʕmlwn sʔaʕwd fj aːlsaːdsa w aʶːlnsˤf wabaðla aʶːlnnuʶsˤraʶaʶiʶ ʔaadfaʕu lilwahani mn tlk aːlftaːa aːld͡ʒmjla fd͡ʒmʕ aːlsħra lmjqaːt jwm mʕlwm laː ʔamlk ʔaʶsˤdqaʶːʔ aʶːnðˤr aːmaːmk mbaːʃrh aːlʕajʃu fij θalaaːθin ldjj ʔaχwaun wajazhadu fijhaaː aːlqurabaaːʔu dʕwnaː ʔaannij mulaːqin ħisaaːbijah wwd͡ʒwh jwmʔið ʕljhaː ʁbra bħθt ʕnh fj kl mkaːn lknj lm ʔad͡ʒdh lqd trdd qbl aːlʔid͡ʒaːba raʔasu aːlʕaqli baʕda aːlʔiijmaaːni biaːalllahi taʕaaːlaaː aːlttawadudu ʔilaaː aːlnnaaːsi lm jtwqʕ ʔaħd ðlk falaaː tahinuwaː watadʕuwaː ʔiilaaː aːlssalmi waʔaantumu aːlʔaaʕlawna waaːlllahu maʕakum walan jatirakum ʔaaʕmaaːlakum ldj χwf mn aʶːlðˤlaʶːm qaaːla fabiʕizzatika laʔauʁwijannahum ʔaad͡ʒmaʕijna lm ʔaraː ʃjʔiaː wud͡ʒuwhun jawmaʔiiðin naʶaʶːdˤiʶraʶaʶuʶn wamin ʃarri ħaaːsidin ʔiiðaaː ħasada aːlðjn jqjmwn aʶːlsˤlaʶːaʶ wjʔutwn aːlzkaːa whm baːlʔaːχra hm jwqnwn laː walaaː min χalfihi tanzijlun min ħakijmin ħamijdin mʔia hw rqmj aʶːlmfdˤl ʔiin jasʔaalkumuwhaaː fajuħfikum tabχaluwaː wajuχrid͡ʒ ʔaʶaʶdˤʁaʶaʶːnaʶkuʶm mataaːʕun fij aːlddunjaaː θumma ʔiilajnaaː mard͡ʒiʕuhum θumma nuðijquhumu aːlʕaðaaːba aːlʃʃadijda bimaaː kaaːnuwaː jakfuruwna ʔam ħsb aːlðjn fj qlwbhm mrdˤ ʔan ln jχrd͡ʒ aːllh ʔaʶdˤʁaʶːnhm hl bʔimkaːnk ʔan tʕtˤjnj dqjqa ʔarjd ʔan ʔaqwl lk ʃjʔiaː sʔal aʶːlsˤaʶːʔiʶb ʔiðn mn kaːn aːlχmsa waːlʕʃrwn ʔakaːnwaː ʔaʶsˤdqaʶːʔk waʔaadχalnaaːhu fij raħmatinaaː ʔiinnahu mina aʶːlsˤsˤaʶaʶːliʶħiʶjnaʶ ʕljj ʔan ʔaːχð saːʕtj liʶtuʶsˤlħ ʔatklm aːlʕrbja ʔauwluw aːlqurbaaː waaːljataaːmaaː waaːlmasaaːkijnu faaːrzuquwhum minhu waquwluwaː lahum qawlanaː maʕruwfanaː ststʔanf aːldrws qrjbaː ʔant laː tsaːʕd saːmj jħrs aʶːlʔaʶtˤfaʶːl aʶːrqsˤ mʕj aːlʕilmu ħaaːkimun waaːlmaaːlu maħkuwmun ʕalajhi tawfijqanaː muniħtahu waruʃdanaː ʔauwtijtahu drd͡ʒaːt mnh wmʁfra wrħma wkaːn aːllh ʁfwraː rħjmaː ħaːwli fʕl ʃjʔ ʔaːχr kun ðkwraː ʔiðaː kunt kðwbaː mn jʔatjh ʕðaːb jχzjh wjħl ʕljh ʕðaːb mqjm waʔiið qaaːlati aːlmalaaːʔiikaau jaaː marjamu ʔiinna aːlllaha aʶːsˤtˤaʶfaʶaʶːkiʶ waʶtˤaʶhhaʶraʶkiʶ waʶaʶːsˤtˤaʶfaʶaʶːkiʶ ʕalaaː nisaaːʔi aːlʕaaːlamijna wkʔajn mn qrja ʔamljt lhaː whj ðˤaʶːlmaʶ θm ʔaχðthaː wʔilj aʶːlmsˤjr taχajjaruwaː laʶnuʶtˤaʶfiʶkuʶm walaaː taʶdˤaʶʕuʶwhaʶaʶː ʔillaaː fij aːlʔaakfaaːʔi wlaː tqwln lʃjʔ ʔinj faːʕl ðlk ʁdaː fsr aːlʔaħdaːθ bʔaʶwdˤħ tˤrjqaʶ mmkn bdaːχl aːlktaːb qsˤaʶ tntðˤr ʔan thmshaː aʶːlrrjaʶːdˤjaʶːt maːdda tħtaːd͡ʒ ʔilaː ðkaːʔ stʔaχðk hðh aːlħaːfla ʔilaː aʶːlmtˤaʶːr tbdwaː ʔanjqaː bhðh aːlθjaːb faʔaammaaː aːld͡ʒalijju fahuwa jasbiqu ʔilaaː fahmi muʶtaʶsˤaʶwwiʶriʶhiʶ min ʔaawwali wahlaain ldj aːlkθjr lʔafʕlh kra aːlqdm hj rjaʶːdˤaʶ aːlʕaːlm aːlʔakθr ʃʕbjja wmn kaːn fj hðh ʔaʕmaː fhw fj aːlʔaːχra ʔaʕmaː wʔaʶdˤl sbjlaː swf tkwn mhmtk tdrjb aʶːlmwðˤfjn ʕlaː nðˤaʶːm aːlkmbjwtr aːld͡ʒdjd mwaːʕjd aʶːlwsˤwl waːlmʁaːdra mdwna fj aːld͡ʒdwl aːlzmnj mn aːlmmkn ʔan tkwn mħqaː jnbʁj ʔan jʔuχð aːldwaːʔ mwdˤʕjaʶː waqad jaχtalifu biaːχtilaaːfi ʔaasbaaːbihi waʶjaʶtaʶfaʶaʶːdˤaʶluʶ bitabaaːjuni d͡ʒihaaːtihi ʔaʶðˤnn ʔannh jrtkb χtˤʔaʶ kbjraː fj rfdˤh lhðaː aʶːlmnsˤb ln jʕd͡ʒbk maː sʔaqwl wlaː ʔaqsm baːlnfs aːllwaːma falaaː juʶnsˤiʶfuʶwnaʶ muħsinanaː walaaː juħaaːbuwna musijʔianaː laaː sijjamaaː man kaaːna biaːlʕilmi mawsuwmanaː waʔiilajhi mansuwbanaː ljs ldj sjaːra wlkn ʔaχtj tmlk sjaːra mn baʶːsttˤaʶːʕth aːqtnaːʔ mθl hðh aːlsjaːra aʶːlbaʶːhðˤaʶ aːlθmn waʶːlsˤbħ ʔiðaː tnfs hl tstmʕ jðˤhr ʔan kllanaː mn twm wmaːrj fj mzaːd͡ʒ sʕjd ʔaraː ktaːbaːan jnmw aʶːlʔaʶtˤfaʶːl srjʕaː hðaː aːlʃrħ jtχtˤaʶː tˤaʶːqtj aːlaːstʕaːbja km ʕmr aːbnk ljs mn d͡ʒdjd kiraaːmanaː kaaːtibijna faʔiin tawallawaː faʔiinna aːlllaha ʕalijmun biaːlmufsidijna hl trjd ʃjʔiaː ʔaːχr mn tħsb nfsk walaqad waʶsˤsˤaʶlnaʶaʶː lahumu aːlqawla laʕallahum jataðakkaruwna ʔaʕtqd ʔank ʔaʶχtˤʔaʶtnj bʃχsˤ ʔaːχr ʕljnaː ʔiʶtˤʕaʶːm aʶːltˤjwr fj fsˤl aːlʃtaːʔ twm ljs mdjnaː lj bʔaj ʃjʔ aːlħb ʃjʔ w aːlzwaːd͡ʒ ʃjʔ ʔaːχr ʔatwtr daːʔimaː qbl ʔan ʔaχrd͡ʒ ʔilaː aːlmsrħ lm jkn ldjj wqt llʔakl waaːstaʁfiri aːlllaha ʔiinna aːlllaha kaaːna ʁafuwranaː raħijmanaː wad͡ʒaaːʔa rabbuka waaːlmalaku sˤaʶffaʶnaʶː sˤaʶffaʶnaʶː hl hðaː ħlm lnlqi nðˤraʶ waʔaumlij lahum ʔiinna kajdij matijnun fʔin twlwaː fʔinmaː ʕljk aːlblaːʁ aːlmbjn rfdˤ twm aːlaːstmaːʕ laː jwd͡ʒd maː jdʕw llʔiʕtðaːr maː hw mhm ljs aːlhdf wlkn aːlrħla aːltdχjn mmkn ʔan jkwn mmjtaːan θumma ʃaqaqnaaː aʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤaʶ ʃaqqanaː bdaː ðlk aːlʕml shlaː d͡ʒdaː lknj aːstʁrqt fjh ʔasbwʕaː ʔanaː mn kwlwmbjaː man kaaːna juʔuminu biaːllhi waaːljawmi aːlʔaːχiri faljaqul χajranaː ʔaaw liʶjaʶsˤmuʶt aːlʕaqlu ħajθu kaaːna ʔaaluwfun wamaʔaluwfun ʔiin ʔaanaaː ʔiillaaː naðijrun mubijnun wahaðaaː ʔinnamaaː jaʶsˤiʶħħuʶ aːstiħlaaːʔuuhu fijmaaː qalla wahuwa biʶaʶːlllaʶfðˤiʶ aʶːlsˤsˤaʶriʶjħiʶ mustaqallun wlqd χlqnaː aːlʔinsaːn mn slaːla mn tˤjn watataʁajjaru maʕa taʁajjuri aːlħaaːlaaːti ðalika biʔaanna aːlllaha huwa aːlħaqqu waʔaannahu juħjij aːlmawtaaː waʔaannahu ʕalaaː kulli ʃajʔin qadijrun watilka aːlʔaamθaaːlu naʶdˤriʶbuʶhaʶaʶː lilnnaaːsi wamaaː jaʕqiluhaaː ʔiillaaː aːlʕaaːlimuwna kn mtˤmʔiʶnaʶː w aːʕlm ʔannaː snqwm bkl maː bwsʕnaː lkn mn ʔajn nħsˤl ʕlaː tlk aːld͡ʒml wkjf ntrd͡ʒmhaː ʔanaː mtʔakd ʔannh sjd͡ʒtaːz aːlaːmtħaːn kallaaː ʔiinnahum ʕan rabbihim jawmaʔiiðin lamaħd͡ʒuwbuwna waqad qaaːla ʕumaru bnu aʶːlχaʶtˤtˤaʶaʶːbiʶ raʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːlllahu ʕanhu liʶbaʶʕdˤiʶ χulafaaːʔiihi laː dχaːn bdwn naːr faʔiin ʔaʶuʶʕtˤiʶjaʶ minhaaː lam jaʃbaʕ aʶːntˤlqt sjaːra aːlsbaːq bsrʕa aːlbrq ʔilaː mn rħm aːllh ʔinh hw aːlʕzjz aːlrħjm faʶaʶːnðˤuʶr fij sababi aːlzzijaaːdaai waʶaʶːlttaʶqsˤiʶjriʶ wmn ʔaːjaːth ʔan χlqkm mn traːb θm ʔiðaː ʔantm bʃr tntʃrwn waʔiin tarakahumaaː ħurima aːlðjn hm ʕlaː sˤlaʶːthm daːʔimwn waqihimu aːlssajiʔiaaːti waman taqi aːlssajiʔiaaːti jawmaʔiiðin faqad raħimtahu waðlika huwa aːlfawzu aʶːlʕaʶðˤjmuʶ tʕmd ʔan jdws ʕlaː qdmj hl tlʕb kra aːlqdm θumma laː jamwtu fjhaː walaː jaħjaː laː ʔarjd aːlbqaːʔ wħjdaː sr aːlθlaːθa sr lld͡ʒmjʕ sʔaːχðk ʔilaː mkaːn stkwn fjh fj ʔamaːn walaː taʶħaʶːdˤdˤwnaʶ ʕalaː tˤaʶʕaʶːmiʶ aːlmiskjni wajuʃijʕuhaaː kalaaːmun saaːbiqun faqaaːla ʔinnij aːʃtarajth lirad͡ʒulin laaː juqaaːsimu ʔaaχaaːhu dirhamanaː hl bʔimkaːnk ʔiʕaːda maː qlt tlqqaː saːmj ʕlaːd͡ʒaː wamin raħmatihi d͡ʒaʕala lakumu aːlllajla waaːlnnahaːra litaskunwaː fjhi walitabtaʁwaː min faʶdˤliʶhiʶ walaʕallakum taʃkurwna kaːn saːmj jntðˤr ʔaħdaː aːʕlam ʔaanna min ħusni aːlttawfijqi waʔiimaaːraaːti aːlssaʕaaːdaai aʶːlsˤsˤaʶbruʶ ʕalaaː aːlmulimmaaːti waaːlrrifqi ʕinda aːlnnawaaːzili ðˤnn saːmj ʔann hðaː kaːn mfjdaː lh haaːdin jahdijnij aːlssabijla faʶjaʶðˤuʶnnuʶwnaʶ ʔaannahu jaʕnij hidaaːjaaa aʶːltˤtˤaʶriʶjqiʶ waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlʕulamaaːʔi laaː samijra kaaːlʕilmi walaaː ðˤaʶhiʶjraʶ kaaːlħilmi ʔant tfʕlh btˤrjqaʶ χaʶːtˤʔiʶaʶ waʔiin ʕarija ʕan ʔaaħadi haðihi aːlʔaasbaaːbi kaaːna ðullanaː walam jakun ħilmanaː jaaː ʔaabaaː ʕabdi aːlllahi ʔinh aːχtlaːf klb d͡ʒawaaaːlun χjr mn ʔasd raʶːbdˤ tħtl aːld͡ʒzaːʔiraːlmrtba aːlθaːmna ʕaːlmjaː fj ʔintaːd͡ʒ aːlzjtwn bnwʕjh aːlmwd͡ʒh llzjt ʔaw aːlmaːʔida hðh aːlsaːʕa ʔaʶfdˤl mn tlk tmkkn saːmj ʔan jbqaː jqðˤaʶː ʔiinnahu ðˤaʶnnaʶ ʔaan lan jaħwra md͡ʒddaːan ljs mra ʔaχraː ʕʃ ʕzjzaː ʔaw mt wʔant krjm hum d͡ʒaːʔiʕwn hðaː aʶːlsˤbaʶːħ waʔaahdijaka ʔiilaː rabbika fataχʃaː balaaːaː man kasaba sajjiʔiaaan waʶʔaʶaʶħaʶaʶːtˤaʶt bihi χaʶtˤiʶjʔiʶaʶtuʶhuʶ faʔauwlaaːʔiika ʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶaʶːbuʶ aːlnnaaːri hum fijhaaː χaaːliduwna wasanaðkuru min ʔaaħwaaːli ʔaadabi aʶːlrriʶjaʶaʶːdˤaʶaʶiʶ waʶaʶːliʶaʶːstiʶsˤlaʶaʶːħiʶ fuʶsˤuʶwlaʶnaʶː taħtawij ʕalaaː maaː jalzamu muraaːʕaaːtuhu min aːlʔaaχlaaːqi kl ʔinaːʔ baːlðj fjh jndˤħ faaːstaχaffa qawmahu faʶʔaʶaʶtˤaʶːʕwhuʶ ʔiinnahum kaːnwaː qawmanaː faːsiqjna ħaʶːfðˤ ʕlaː wd͡ʒba ʔiʶftˤaʶːrmtwaʶːznaʶ wsˤl aːlssjd baːkr ʔiin kuntum fij rajbin mimmaaː nazzalnaaː ʕalaaːaː ʕabdinaaː faʔatuwaː bisuwraain min miθlihi waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlʔaudabaaːʔi aːlnnaaːsu ʔaaʃtaaːtun walikulli d͡ʒamʕin ʃataaːtun saːmj ʃdjd aːlχd͡ʒl ʔaθmma maː trjd ʔiχbaːrj ʕnh snstmr fj hðaː ħtaː jmnʕnaː ʔaħdhm waðakara ʔaannahu liʕalijji bni ʔaabij tˤaʶaʶːliʶbiʶn karrama aːlllahu wad͡ʒhihi qðf aːlʃrq mn blaːd aʶːlħjaʶːdˤ ʔin knt tʁdw fj aːlðnwb d͡ʒljdaːan wudda flm tubqi ʕlaː wuddih kʔan qrqra aːlʔibrjq bjnhm ħaːl bjnj wbjn ʃkrj aːltraːb ʔin llbjn sˤwlaʶ whd͡ʒwmaː lst ʔadrj mn wlaː kjf ʔanaː hj dnjaː bqaːʔuhaː mstħjl ʔaʃkw ʔilaː aːlrħmn lʔulʔuaː aːlðj nħn mstʕdwn bʃkl d͡ʒjd ʔismh faʶːdˤl aːlmʃaːʁb tðˤnn aʶːlʃrtˤaʶ bʔan twm qtl ʕda ʔaʶʃχaʶːsˤ ʃʕrt baʶːlsˤsˤdmaʶ θm ʔiðaː maː qdm aʶːltˤʕaʶːm fkn ʁlaːmaː ʕndh aːħtʃaːm mn baːltfaːti ʕjwni aːlmlk jarʕaːk ljs ldjh ʕml hw mtqaːʕd qaʶːdˤ mn mtfrdaː fj ħsnh nħmd aːllh ʕlaː aːlχjr aːlkθjr qsˤaʶːʔiʶd aːlʔimaːm aːlʃaːfʕj jʔumn faʶːdˤl brbb aːlʔislaːm ʔaʶsˤʁ ʔawʕjdaː jaː bnj d͡ʒʃm knt ʔaχʃaː ʔan ʔaʁfw ʕlaː ʕd͡ʒla aːlqjaːda qbl ʔan jbsˤr aʶːlðˤlaʶːm aʶːldˤjaʶːʔ jaː mtˤjʕ aːlʕðwl fj ʕsˤjaʶːnj lm jnlhaː swaːk mn ʔahl msˤr bʕdˤ hðaː aːld͡ʒfaːʔ waːlʕdwaːn tbdw kʔijbaː waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlʕulamaaːʔi ʔaajju ʕajʃin jaʶtˤiʶjbuʶ walajsa lilmawti tˤaʶbiʶjbuʶn ʔad͡ʒml ʔaqwaːl aːlʔimaːm ʕlj ʃhjd aʶːlqdˤjaʶ aʶːlwtˤnjaʶ aʶːndˤm ʔilaː ħzb aːlʃʕb aːld͡ʒzaːʔirj ʔaʶdˤrbhm wlaː ʔaraː mʕaːwja faːmnħh aːlmzjd mn aːlwqt waːlaːhtmaːm nħn ʃjʔ lw td͡ʒrj aːlmħaːsn mn qrwn rʔuwshaː ʔalaː jwd͡ʒd qtˤʕaʶ ʔaʶrdˤiʶn hnaː llbjʕ ʔiðaː ħrm aːlmrʔ aːlħjaːʔ fʔinh ʔajhaː aːlfaːtk aːlʔaθjm rwjdaː nħn aːlmlwk aːlfqraː wʔaqbħ mn kl aːbtdaːʕ smʕth sˤf sjaːrtk ħjθ trʁb ʔanaː mn ʔaslft χjraː wtwaːnaː qblah waːlmwtu fj aːlʔaaθari fʔin rʔaaː laː ʔaraːh aːllh naːʔiba ʔiðaː ʔaʶsˤbħt ʕndj qwt jwmj aʶːlsˤdq mnd͡ʒaːa lʔarbaːbh tˤʕaʶːm aːlʕʃaːʔ sʔaʃtrjh ʔanaː tˤlbt mnnj sˤdjqaʶ lj ʔan ʔarsl lhaː btˤaʶːqaʶ brjdja zʕmwaː aːllʔulʔu mn tˤwl aːlnwaː kaːn mkjjf aːlhwaːʔ jʃtʁl laː jntˤq aːlmʁtaːb ʔilaː ʔiðaː laː bdaa ʔan ʔanthzhaː lrfʕ qdrj aːlllʁwja laː ʔaħd jʕlm ʕn mkaːnh ħmaːa aːlwʁaː ʔajn aːlslaːm aʶːlmwtˤd kaːnt ljlaː aːmrʔaa ðaːt d͡ʒmaːl saːħr kjf nχʃaː faːqa aːld͡ʒhaːl mn lsaːnk ʔaħlaː mn d͡ʒnj aːlnħl mwʕdaː kaːn faʶːdˤl w ljlaː jqtˤnaʶːn fj nfs aːlħj wqaʶːdˤjaʶː maʶːdˤjaʶː fj aːlʃr md͡ʒtnjaː mn jʔakl lwħdh kmn jmwt lwħdh χaːlj aːlʕzjz χaːfj ʔilhk fj nfs qd aʶːħtdˤrt ʔiðaː ʃʔit ʔan tlqaː mn aːlnaːs sˤaʶːdqaʶː hðaː hw ʔawwl χtˤtˤ tħqjq aːttbʕth aʶːlʃʃrtˤaʶ mnð ʔan aːχtfaː faʶːdˤl sjdj ʔin aːlðj ʔaʶwsˤl lj lst mtʔakdaː ʕlaː maːðaː ʔaʶnðˤr aːlʔijmaːn mʕrfa baːlqlb wʔiqraːr baːlllsaːn wʕml baːlʔarkaːn ʕd͡ʒbt llnjl jdrj ʔan blblh mʕ qdwm baːlʔamr ʕʃt llmd͡ʒd ʔaʶtˤwl aːlʔaʕmaːr jaː qljl aːlwfaːʔ dˤaʶːʕ wdaːd jaː qwmnaː ʔin aːlfsaːd qd ʁlb lm tadʕ fj aːlʕjʃ mn waʶtˤaʶriʶ wwld aːlħbjb fmrħbaː bwfaːʔih lm jrʁb twm baːlzwaːd͡ʒ md͡ʒddaː χaːma zrʕ klja ʕlwm aʶːlʔaʶrdˤ waːlhndsa aːlmʕmaːrja maːðaː ʔaklt stmtˤr hðaː aːlmsaːʔ rsaːla ʔilaː frʕwn msˤr d͡ʒaːlswaː aːltwaːbjn fʔinhm ʔarq ʃʔi ʔafʔida ʔanaː aːlwd͡ʒwd kmaː ʔanj ʔanaː aːlʕdm ʔaajjuhaaː aːlnnaaːsu ʔinna aːlʔaajjaaːma tuʶtˤwaʶaʶː aːrtdj maː twd ʔan trtdjh saːmj qaːdr ʕlaː aːlaːʕtnaːʔ bnfsh jaː mlzmj baːlðnb maː lm ʔafʕl km aːlwqt hnaːk sʔaqlk bʕd aːlʕml jrjd tˤbjbhaʶː ʔan hðaː aːldhr whw lnaː ħrb rkdˤnaʶː ħwl aːlħdjqa jaː ʕðwlj ʔiðaː bdaː wtθnaː ʔanaː ʔaʕrfk d͡ʒjdaː w ʔant laː tsaːwj ʃjʔiaː tˤlbt aːlʁnaː ħrsˤaʶː ʕlaː bðlj aːlʁnaː jaː ħbjbaː mn lʕjnj ʔan traːh ʔaʃtaːq fʔin aːlmwt hl lk jaː qnaʶːsˤ fj ʃaːhjn qjl lj naːʔim fqlt kðbtm jʕjʃ sˤdjqj fj ðlk aːlmnzl ln jd͡ʒjb d͡ʒwn ʕlaː aːlsʔuaːl ʕndmaː ʕaːd ʔabj ʔilaː aːlmnzl knt ʔaʃaːhd aːltlfaːz dʕnj ʔaʶnðˤr rbmaː tltqj btwm ʔin jkn fj aːlbdwr fn mn aːlħsn ʕaːdt ljlaː ʔilaː aːlqaːhra jaː aːbn ʕbd aːlʕzjz ʔin fʔuaːdj ʔanaː laː ʔabaːlj ʔiʶtˤlaʶːqaʶː bmaː tqwlwnh ʁaːdrwaː d͡ʒmjʕaː maːt faʶːdˤl fj wqt laːħq mn ðlk aːljwm aːqrʔa kaːn faʶːdˤl jtsˤrrf ktˤfl qd qdˤjnaʶː fj aːlʕjd jwmaː sʕjdaː laː ʔaʶðˤnk qaːdraː ʕlaː fʕl ðlk ʃkraː jaː rfaːq kn ʃd͡ʒaːʕaːan ʔiqaːma aːlʔaħdaːθ mθl aːltd͡ʒmʕaːt aːlʕaːʔilja wmbaːrjaːt kra aːlqdm llʔaʶtˤfaʶːl waːlmnaːsbaːt aːlʔasrja frħ faʶːdˤl kθjraː ʔaʶmtˤrj jaː smaːʔ fj kl jwm ʔaʶðˤnn ʔann mʃaːkl faʶːdˤl tmtdd d͡ʒðwrhaː ʔilaː ʔajjaːm ʃbaːbh hl tlk aːlsjaːra ld͡ʒmaːl lmaː blʁt mn aːlħjaːa ʔilaː mdaː ʔatðkr ʔið knaː ʕlaː aːlqbr sta fmaː baqaːʔu aʶːlðˤliʶ mn baʕdih jd͡ʒb ʕljk ʔan ttkklm mʕhm ql llðjn mdħthm fkʔanmaː saːfr faʶːdˤl ʔilaː aːlqaːhra lzjaːra ljlaː aːlmurtaħili faʔiinna ħaaːdija aːlmawti jaħduwk lijawmin lajsa jaʕduwk kaːn faʶːdˤl jqtˤn bʃaːrʕ sˤaʶːdq jaː tˤjf tmθaːl aːlzʕjm aːlʃhjd ʔajhaː aːlwaːld ʔinj bʕdkm lʕbt mʕ bʕdˤ aʶːlʔaʶsˤdqaʶːʔ ʔinj rʔajt wmaː rʔajt wd͡ʒwdj waːld sˤdjqj hw aʶːjdˤaʶːaʶn sˤdjq waːldj dʕnaː ntʔakd mn χbjr klja aːlʕlwm aʶːlʔiʶqtsˤaʶːdjaʶ waːltd͡ʒaːrja wʕlwm aːltsjjr ʔaχtj hnaː fj aːlqaːhra tqʕ ʔalmaːnjaː fj wstˤ ʔawrwbaː aːlqraːr lk aːlʔaːn hl traːh daːʔimanaː kaːn faʶːdˤl χaːʔifaː baːltʔakjd ʔajhaː aːllaːʔim aːlðj laː jml aːllwm bʔabj aʶːlʁsˤwn aːlmaːʔilaːt ʕwaʶːtˤfaʶː walaaː junsijk mawtanaː walaaː nuʃuwranaː aːrtdi stra faːld͡ʒw baːrd wħdtj fjlswfa tmsħ aːldmʕ ql lhm sʔafʕlhaː hud͡ʒr aːlmnzl aʶːtˤlb aːlʕlm bd͡ʒd waːd͡ʒthd hðaː bjtj aːld͡ʒwaːb aːlðj ʔaraːh sˤwaʶːbaʶː lm ʔahrb rb jwmin ʔið ħkjnaː maː ldjnaː haː ʔanaː ʕdt ʔilaː ħjθ aːltqjnaː d͡ʒaːrj ʔiʶjtˤaʶːlj lm ʔaqm btnzjl aːlmlf fr ʔibljs ʕn hdaː aːlʕrfaːn laː jmknk aʶːlħsˤwl ʕlj aːlmlkja mn zwd͡ʒth aːlraːħla ðhbt aːjaːm aːlʃbaːb sraːʕaː knt ʔadʕwk fj wkaːn ʔabj χbjraː dˤm aːlktaːb ʔilaː aːlwʕaːʔ fħaːzh ʔin aːlʔamjn wʔin tʕff d͡ʒhdh mn jrjd aːlqjaːm bhðaː twm hw aʶːlʔaʶfdˤl wðˤlmaʶːʔ mn ljl aːltmaːm tˤwjthaʶː rʔas aːld͡ʒhl muʕaːdaːa aːlnnaːs aːmj faʶːdˤl aːlʔislaːm kd͡ʒzʔ mn ħjaːth ʔajhaː aːlsaːʔil ʕnj ʔinnj lʕlh mn aʶːlʔaʶfdˤl ʔan ʔaʕwd lʕmlj ʔaraː aːldhr ʔafnaː mʕʃrj wbnj ʔabj kl jwm hw ʕtˤlaʶ fj mkaːn maː mn aːlʕaːlm sjtm aːlaːmr kaːnt wqaːlwaː ftħ aːlbwwaːb aːlbaːba nʃrt aʶːlmnðˤmaʶ ʔasʔila wʔad͡ʒwba ʕn aːlthwja wtkjjf aːlhwaːʔ hðaː ħqaː ħdjθ d͡ʒjd aːbtsmt wqblt hdjtj aʶːlsˤʁjraʶ maː rʔatnj ʕjnaːk jwm aːlfraːq kjf qd ħaːwlwaː aːlssjaːqa mn maːt jʕlm ʔank aːlħq aːlmbjn ʔajaː ʕjn d͡ʒwdj wlaː tsʔamj kaːn bʔimkaːnk ʔan traː aːlddm fj kll mkaːn lqd rʔajtk bmkaːn maː mn qbl qlq saːmj kθjraː lhðaː aːlʃʃʔan aːʕtnq faʶːdˤl aːlʔislaːm w ʕmrh θlaːθa w ʕʃrwn sna mħmd maː ʔaχlftnaː maː wʕdtnaː ljlaː qlqa bʃʔank aːlnhr jd͡ʒf laː tql hðaː waːlʔaːlaːm waːlʔawd͡ʒaːʕ waʶːlsˤdaʶːʕ ʔin d͡ʒmaːl jswq sjaːrth ʕbr aːld͡ʒsr waruwija ʕan aːlnnabiji sˤaʶllaʶaʶː aːlllahu ʕalajhi wasallama ʔaannahu qaaːla fij baʶʕdˤiʶ χuʶtˤaʶbiʶhiʶ kjf tʕlm bmlkja twm lhðaː kaːn faʶːdˤl mstʕddaː ʔan jstqrr mʕ ljlaː kll ʃjʔ jtʁjjr ʔablʁ aːlħaːrθ ʕnj ʔannj maː zaːl jtwd͡ʒb ʕljnaː fʕl ðlk ʔatraː aːlnsjm ʔiðaː sraː mn nd͡ʒdh ʃʕraːʔ msˤr wlaː ʔaqwl d͡ʒmjʕkm ʔahlaː bwd͡ʒhk mn sˤbaʶːħ mqbl aʶːlsˤdq ʔaʶfdˤl maː ħdˤrt bh mabaaːsima aːlθaʁri maː ʔaħlaː ħumjaːki hðaː aʶːltwaʶːdˤʕ ʔin ʔardt mwaːhbaː laː tʔaχðnk fj sˤdjq ʃbha laː tχf maː sˤnʕt bk aːlʔaʃwaːq χsˤwsˤjtk mhma lnaː mθwba aːlfaːqd ʕn fqdh wmaː fj aːlnaːs ʔad͡ʒwd mn ʃd͡ʒaːʕ ʔanaː raːʕ lmaː sˤfaʶː mnk qdmaː tħddθ faʶːdˤl w daːnja ʕn aʶːltˤqs maː ʔazmtj aːʃtdt lwqr χtˤjtj fj ðj aːld͡ʒfwn sˤwaʶːrm aːlʔaqdaːr blaːʁa aːbn fraːs d͡ʒbrjl hll fj aːlsmaːʔ wkbr lʕmrj lqd ʔankrt ʁjr nkjr mn sˤwr aːlsħr aːlmbjn ʕjwnaː sjaːra maːrkw ʔismhaː θaːndr d͡ʒaːjnt klaː bl tkðbwn baːldjn ʕmlj aːld͡ʒdjd jtrk lj aːlqljl mn aːlwqt llaʶːχtlaʶːtˤ hl bʔimkaːnk aːltʕrf ʕlaː ðlk aːlrd͡ʒl bwaʶːstˤaʶ hðh aʶːlsˤwraʶ sʔakwn ħðraː d͡ʒdaː walakin kaððaba watawallaaː nħnu swfa nusaːʕdki mwaːfqa tʔaχrtu ʕlaː aːlmwʕd nħn bħaːd͡ʒa lbʕdˤ aːlʁðaːʔ waːtqwaː aːlðj ʔamdkm bmaː tʕlmwn wabaʃʃiri aːlmuʔuminijna biʔaanna lahum mina aːlllahi faʶdˤlaʶnaʶː kabijranaː wlw qaːtlkm aːlðjn kfrwaː lwlwaː aːlʔadbaːr θm laː jd͡ʒdwn wljaː wlaː nsˤjraʶː laː jħtaːd͡ʒ laːmrʔaa kj tʕtnj bh td͡ʒjd jwmj aːlħdjθ baːlʔind͡ʒljzja sbħaːn aːlðj χlq aːlʔazwaːd͡ʒ klhaː mmaː tnbt aʶːlʔaʶrdˤ wmn ʔanfshm wmmaː laː jʕlmwn ʔanta tħtaːd͡ʒ ʔan tnðˤr ʔilaː aːlʔaumwr mn zaːwja mχtlfa ʔinhaː ljst kaːrθja kmaː tðˤn lqd tχlljt ʕn ʔaʶtˤfaʶːlk wajaχuwnuk nafʕuhaaː nʕjʃ fj aʶːlʕsˤr aːlnwwj wad͡ʒaaːfin ʕan aːlnnawmi d͡ʒanbak wad͡ʒaʕaluwaː lillahi ʔaandaaːdanaː liʶjuʶdˤiʶlluʶwaʶː ʕan sabijlihi qul tamattaʕuwaː faʔiinna maʶsˤiʶjraʶkuʶm ʔiilaaː aːlnnaaːri lahum ʕaðaaːbun fij aːlħajaaːai aːlddunjaaː walaʕaðaaːbu aːlʔaːχiraai ʔaaʃaqqu wamaaː lahum mina aːlllahi min waaːqin wlqd ftnaː aːlðjn mn qblhm fljʕlmn aːllh aːlðjn sˤdqwaʶː wljʕlmn aːlkaːðbjn ʔaʶnsˤħk bʕdm msˤaʶːħbaʶ twm laː jkwn waːħdaː mnnaː ʔaðn llðjn jqaːtlwn bʔanhm ðˤlmwaʶː wʔin aːllh ʕlaː nsˤrhm lqdjr jaʶχtaʶsˤsˤuʶ biraħmatihi man jaʃaaːʔu waaːlllahu ðuw aʶːlfaʶdˤliʶ aʶːlʕaʶðˤiʶjmiʶ wataskijnanaː liʶsˤaʶwlaʶtiʶhiʶm fʔin aːld͡ʒna hj aːlmʔawaː sumjjtu ʕlaː χaːlj qd tkwn aʶːldˤħjaʶ msˤaʶːbaʶ fj aːlrʔas aːlklaːb waʶːlqtˤtˤ waːlχjwl ħjwaːnaːt faʔaanbatnaaː fijhaaː ħabbanaː laː ʔaʶsttˤjʕ ʔan ʔaθq bh qbblnj aːjhaː aːlʔaħmq lqd hjʔat nfshaː llʕba aːltns baːltdrjb lsaːʕaːt kl jwm ʔin rbk hw jfsˤl bjnhm jwm aːlqjaːma fjmaː kaːnwaː fjh jχtlfwn bal jurijdu aːlʔiinsaaːnu lijafd͡ʒura ʔaamaaːmahu hl fqadt ruʃdak ʔanaː kbjr bmaː fjh aːlkfaːja lʔaʶsˤwt waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi aːlmutaqaddimijna aːstiʁnaaːʔuuk ʕan aːlʃʃajʔi χajrun min aːstiʁnaaːʔiik bihi aːldjaːnaːt aːlsmaːwja aːlθlaːθ hj aːlʔislaːm waːljhwdja waːlmsjħja ħaːla lθtk sjʔia jwd͡ʒd χdʃa hnaː fhl tsttˤjʕ aʶːʕtˤaʶːʔiʶj ħsm ʔaj maħal mθld͡ʒaːt ʔanta ðaːhb ʔiljh rubbijtu ʕlaː mʃaːhda bwkjmwn ðkr rħmt rbk ʕbdh zkrjaː tbdw fj aːlstjnaːt mn ʕmrhaː ʕlaː aːlʔaql warubbamaaː tatbaʕu nafsu aːlʔiinsaaːni man baʕuda ʕanhu aːstihaaːnaaan biman qaruba minhu lm jktb ʃjʔ ʕlaː aːlmrwħja ʔin fj ðlk lʔaːjaːt wʔin knaː lmbtljn km jwmanaː fj aːlʔasbwʕ rb nd͡ʒnj wʔahlj mmaː jʕmlwn kʔanhn bjdˤ mknwn ʔaatadʕuwna baʕlanaː wataðaruwna ʔaaħsana aːlχaaːliqijna aʶːtsˤl bj lw smħt bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm ʕbs wtwlaː aːlʕadlu ʔaaw aːlʃʃud͡ʒaaːʕaau qaaːluwaː aʶːħtfðˤ bhðh aːlmʕlwma lnfsk ql ʔinmaː ʔanðrkm baːlwħj wlaː jsmʕ aʶːlsˤm aːldʕaːʔ ʔiðaː maː jnðrwn qaːlwaː bl lm tkwnwaː mʔumnjn wanamaaːriqu maʶsˤfuʶwfaʶaʶuʶn lilssaaːʔiili waaːlmaħruwmi tˤbʕaʶːaʶn qdm lj bʕdˤ aʶːlnsˤaʶːʔiʶħ warubbamaaː taqaddama biʶaʶːlχaʶtˤtˤiʶ man kaaːna aʶːlχaʶtˤtˤuʶ min d͡ʒulli faʶdˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶliʶhiʶ aʶːlsˤħaʶ knz laː jʕrf qjmth ʔilaː aʶːlmrdˤaʶː faaːntaqamnaaː minhum faʶaʶːnðˤuʶr kajfa kaaːna ʕaaːqibaau aːlmukaððibijna ʔiðaaː aːʃtadda aːlkalafu faʶdˤlaʶnaʶː mina aːlllahi waniʕmaaan waaːlllahu ʕalijmun ħakijmun ʔin hðaː swf jd͡ʒʕl mn aːlmstħjl ʕljh ʔan jħfðˤ maːʔ aːlwd͡ʒh ʔaj qtˤaʶːr jʔaχðnj ʔilaː wstˤ aːlmdjna lm jtmkn mn aːħtwaːʔ ʁdˤbh w lw lθaːnja ʔajn stkwn jwm aːlʔiθnjn wamaaː ʔaarsalnaaː fij qarjaain min nabijjin ʔiillaaː ʔaaχaðnaaː ʔaahlahaaː biaːlbaʔasaaːʔi waʶaʶːldˤdˤaʶraʶaʶːʔiʶ laʕallahum jaʶdˤdˤaʶraʶʕuʶwnaʶ ʔatsmħ lj baːlʕzf ʕlaː aːlbjaːnw liʔaannahaaː ʔiðaaː manaħat kaddat waʔaatʕabat ʔanaː tħdθt mʕ twm laaː jufattaru ʕanhum wahum fijhi mublisuwna maː hw aːld͡ʒjnz hðaː laː tdˤf d͡ʒmlaː mn msˤaʶːdr mħfwðˤaʶ aːlħqwq kjf jsjr aːlʕml laː ʔamlk aːlmaːl lʃraːʔ aːlqaːmws fajakuwnu kaman taqaddama fijhi aːlmaθalu aːlssaaːʔiiru liʔaabij aʶːlbaʶtˤħaʶaʶːʔiʶ maaː ʔaaʃadda wad͡ʒaʕa aʶːldˤdˤiʶrsiʶ ʔaʁlq aːlbwaːba waman ʁaaːlaba aːlħaqqa laaːna ħdθth ʕn mʃaːklhaː wadaaːru nad͡ʒaaːain liman fahima ʕanhaaː hlaː ʃʁlt aːltlfaːz mn fdˤlk kaːn aːljwnaːnjwn ʔawl mn aːʕtbr aːlʔaħdaːθ aːlsmaːwja ðˤwaʶːhr tstħq aːlaːktʃaːf lajsa ħaqaaːanaːlʔamr lajsa lahu ʕilaːqaun bik ʔaʶsˤbħ ʕmrhaː waːħdaːan w θmaːnjn sna lkn hðh aːlʕmlja tmt bʃkl tdrjd͡ʒj lmlaːjjn aːlsnjn lm jsbq lsaːmj w ʔan ʔataː ʔilaː mnzlj dˤaʶːʕ jrbwʕj tʔaqlmwaː mʕ aːltʁjjr bsrʕa ʔanaː baːlfʕl mtʔaχr wlaː ʔaʃk ʔan mʕk fdˤlaʶː hl mn ʔaħd lmsaːʕdtj ʔaalaaː jaʕlamu man χalaqa wahuwa aʶːlllaʶtˤiʶjfuʶ aːlχabijru sʔaʃtrj haːtfaː χlwjaː ʁdaː hjhaːt ʃʕbj jstkjn wamaaː wad͡ʒadnaaː liʔaakθarihim min ʕahdin waʔiin wad͡ʒadnaaː ʔaakθarahum lafaaːsiqijna jmknka ʔan tqwlhaː ʕlaː hðaː aːlnħw wlknhaː mubtðla d͡ʒdaːa waaːlwad͡ʒhu aːlχaaːmisu quli aːlħamdu lillahi wasalaaːmun ʕalaaː ʕibaaːdihi aːllaðijna aʶːsˤtˤaʶfaʶaʶː ʔaːlllahu χajrun ʔaammaaː juʃrikuwna takaaːdu tamajjazu mina aʶːlʁaʶjðˤiʶ kullamaaː ʔaulqija fijhaaː fawd͡ʒun saʔaalahum χazanatuhaaː ʔaalam jaʔatikum naðijrun aːnqʃʕt ʁjwm aːlʃtaːʔ aʶːlmaʶːtˤraʶ wðˤhrt ʃms aːlrbjʕ aːldaːfʔia ltnjr dˤwaʶːħj bldtj aʶːlsˤʁjraʶ wmaː ʔadraːk maː jwm aʶːlfsˤl hw aːlðj χlqkm mn tˤjn θm qdˤaʶː ʔad͡ʒlaː wʔad͡ʒl msmaː ʕndh θm ʔantm tmtrwn hl bʔimkaːnj aːstʕaːra hðaː aʶːlqrsˤ ʔawd aːlaːstmaːʕ ʔilaː rʔajk qad jaʕlamu aːlllahu aːlmuʕawwiqijna minkum waaːlqaaːʔiilijna liʔiiχwaaːnihim halumma ʔiilajnaaː walaaː jaʔatuwna aːlbaʔasa ʔiillaaː qalijlanaː lqd ʔistχdmt rʔashaː jnbʁj ʔan tkwn lwsj fj aʶːlmtˤbχ aːlʔaːn laː tdˤʁtˤ aːlaːrz jbdwn ʔamrjkjjn waʔiimmaaː ʔilaaː aːld͡ʒafaaːʔi waaːlʕuquwqi fʔimaː nðhbn bk fʔinaː mnhm mntqmwn hj thtm baːlmwsjqaː jaː ʔajhaː aːlðjn ʔaːmnwaː laː tχwnwaː aːllh waːlrswl wtχwnwaː ʔamaːnaːtkm wʔantm tʕlmwn wd͡ʒaːʔ ʔiχwa jwsf fdχlwaː ʕljh fʕrfhm whm lh mnkrwn zrʕt wrdaːan lam jakun liʶlssuʶltˤaʶaʶːniʶ lubθun walaaː liʔaajjaaːmihi sˤaʶfwuʶn waaːlssaaːdisu aːlfaraaːʁu aːllaðij jakuwnu maʕahu aːlttawafuru waʶjaʶħsˤuʶluʶ bihi aːliaːstikθaaːru laː ʔaħb aːlmʁrwrjn wazuχrufanaː waʔiin kullu ðalika lammaaː mataaːʕu aːlħajaaːai aːlddunjaaː waaːlʔaːχiraau ʕinda rabbika lilmuttaqijna maːðaː jʕnj ðlk wχlq aːllh aːlsmaːwaːt waʶːlʔaʶrdˤ baːlħq wltd͡ʒzaː kl nfs bmaː ksbt whm laː jðˤlmwn warawaaː aːbnu ʕumara raʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːlllahu ʕanhumaaː ʔaanna aːlnnabija sˤaʶllaʶaʶː aːlllahu ʕalajhi wasallama qaaːla liʔaannahu jamnaʕuhum min aʶːlðˤðˤuʶlmiʶ qrrt ʔalaː nðhb tnzjl aːlktaːb mn aːllh aːlʕzjz aːlħkjm ʔaan kaaːna ðaaː maaːlin wabanijna wqjl aːdʕwaː ʃrkaːʔkm fdʕwhm flm jstd͡ʒjbwaː lhm wrʔawaː aːlʕðaːb lw ʔanhm kaːnwaː jhtdwn nħn trtdj aːlzj aːlrsmj fj mdrstnaː hl trʁb fj aʶːlrqsˤ mʕj wahaðaaː ʔaajsaru ʔaamranaː ʔiin hija ʔiillaaː mawtatunaaː aːlʔauwlaaː wamaaː naħnu bimunʃarijna kaːn saːmj bħaːd͡ʒa lnsˤaʶːʔiʶħ ljlaː jaaː banij ʔiisraaːʔiijla aːðkuruwaː niʕmatija aːllatij ʔaanʕamtu ʕalajkum waʔaawfuwaː biʕahdij ʔauwfi biʕahdikum waʔiijjaaːja faaːrhabuwni mnjbjn ʔiljh waːtqwh wʔaqjmwaː aʶːlsˤlaʶːaʶ wlaː tkwnwaː mn aːlmʃrkjn maː ʃaːʔ aːllh sʕjd d͡ʒdaː bhðh aːlntjd͡ʒa aːlqjaːsja waʔiin jukaððibuwka faqad kuððibat rusulun min qablika waʔiilaaː aːlllahi turd͡ʒaʕu aːlʔaumuwru faðuwquwaː falan nazijdakum ʔiillaaː ʕaðaaːbanaː ʔaaχbaθu aːlnnaaːsi aːlmusaaːwij bajna aːlmaħaaːsini waaːlmasaaːwiʔii ʔaammaaː aːlʃʃahbaraau faaːlzzarqaaːʔu aːlbaðijjaau ʔaħtaːd͡ʒ ʔilaː lwħa mfaːtjħ lkj ʔakwn mdˤħkaʶːaʶn maːrj ðhbt ʔilaː θaːnwja kaːθwljkja bal ʔaatajnaaːhum biaːlħaqqi waʔiinnahum lakaaːðibuwna hl sˤaʶːħbk jħb aːlʃaːj kaːn sˤbwraʶːaʶn d͡ʒdaːan hl tðkrjn ʕndmaː ʕlqnaː baːlsjaːra fj aːlθld͡ʒ aːlʃtaːʔ aʶːlmaʶːdˤj ʔaʕrf mlħdjn ldjhm mn aːlʔinsaːnja ʔakθr mn kl hʔulaːʔ aːlmtdjnjn waːlaːʃtraːkjjn liʔaannahu qad jad͡ʒhalu qadrahu liʔaannahu jaħtaaːd͡ʒu fij fahmi aːlmaʕaaːnij ʔilaaː aːlfikraai waaːlrrawijaai fijmaaː qad aːstaχrad͡ʒahu biaːlkitaaːbaai ʔink tqwl klaːmaː faːrʁaː jaː sˤdjqj rufiʕati aːlʔaaqlaːamu wad͡ʒaffati aʶːlsˤsˤuʶħuʶfuʶ aʶːltˤlbaʶ fj aːstraːħa aːlʔaːn bwb jʕrf kjf jtˤbχ ʕljh ʔan jntðˤr ħtaː ʔaʶħdˤr lh bʕdˤ aːlħljb aːlsaːχn ʔaraː rd͡ʒlaː bjn aːlʔaʃd͡ʒaːr ʕndj sʔuaːl kaːn saːmj jdwr mʃjaː ħwl aːlmnzl wajaquwluwna subħaaːna rabbinaaː ʔiin kaaːna waʕdu rabbinaaː lamafʕuwlanaː swfa ʔaʶuʶħdˤruʶ ħqjbtj faʔaanta lahu taʶsˤaʶddaʶaʶː wad͡ʒaaːʔa ʔaahlu aːlmadijnaai jastabʃiruwna tm aʶːlqbdˤ ʕlaː twm waʔaammaaː aʶːlχaʶaʶːsˤsˤaʶaʶuʶ faʶmuʶwaʶaʶːdˤaʶʕaʶaʶuʶ aːlwaaːħidi jaʶqsˤiʶduʶ biʶbaʶaʶːtˤiʶniʶ kalaaːmihi ʁajra ðˤaʶaʶːhiʶriʶhiʶ wajaχaaːfuwna suwʔa aːlħisaaːbi fij aːlmuʕaaːqabaai ʕalajhaaː ʔinh lqwl rswl krjm fajaʁfulu ʕan qadri aːlnniʕmaai biaːlʔaamni fijmaaː siwaaːhu ʔajd͡ʒb ʕlj ʔan ʔaqwm bðlk mra ʔaχraː hðaː aːlbjt ljs lj tatbaʕuhaaː aːlrraaːdifaau hw jsttˤjʕ ʔan jfʕlhaː ʔaħsn mnj hl lk ʔan tχbrnj kjf ʔaʶsˤl ʔilaː mrkz lnkn waman ʔaʶaʶðˤlaʶmuʶ mimmani aːftaraaː ʕalaaː aːlllahi kaðibanaː ʔaaw kaððaba biʔaːjaaːtihi ʔiinnahu laaː jufliħu aʶːlðˤðˤaʶaʶːliʶmuʶwnaʶ ʔaqlaqnj aːlʔamru kaθjraːan ʔanaː ʔaʶtqaʶːdˤaʶː ʔad͡ʒra jwmja jqtrħ ʔajnʃtaːjn mn χlaːl nðˤrjth aːlnsbja ʔan aːlmd͡ʒraːt ttbaːʕd lʔan aːlkwn nfsh jtmdd wqaːl frʕwn aːʔitwnj bkl saːħr ʕljm faʔiinna likulli waqtin ʃuʁlanaː walikulli zamaaːnin ʕuðranaː ʔanaː laː ʔafhm hðaː qsmaː baːlsjf waːlqwl aːlʔabj aːlʃjwʕja hj aʶːlnðˤaʶːm aːlmumaːrs fj aːlʔitħaːd aːlswfjtj nsjt ʕnwaːn twm waʔiiðaaː qijla lahumu aːrkaʕuwaː laaː jarkaʕuwna waaːlʕarabu taquwlu wʔiðaː rʔawhm qaːlwaː ʔin hʔulaːʔ ldˤaʶːlwn jaaː ʔaajjuhaaː aːllaðijna ʔaːmanuwaː laaː taχuwnuwaː aːlllaha waaːlrrasuwla wataχuwnuwaː ʔaamaaːnaaːtikum waʔaantum taʕlamuwna jaquwlu jaaː lajtanij qaddamtu liħajaaːtij maːðaː trjd haː aːttaχaðuwaː ʔaajmaaːnahum d͡ʒunnaaan faʶsˤaʶdduʶwaʶː ʕan sabijli aːlllahi falahum ʕaðaaːbun muhijnun ʔiinna aːlllaha aʶːsˤtˤaʶfaʶaʶː ʔaːdama wanuwħanaː waʔaːla ʔiibraaːhijma waʔaːla ʕimraaːna ʕalaaː aːlʕaaːlamijna dʕnj ʔaχrud͡ʒ hl ʔabwk tˤbjb falammaaː d͡ʒaaːʔahum biʔaːjaaːtinaaː ʔiiðaaː hum minhaaː jaʶdˤħaʶkuʶwnaʶ ʔaaw jaʔaχuðahum ʕalaaː taχawwufin faʔiinna rabbakum laraʔuwfun raħijmun sndʕ aːlzbaːnja ʔiðaː lm tkn tʔujdnaː fʔant ʕdwnaː kaːn kθjraː maː jttbʕ aʶːlnsˤaʶːʔiʶħ aʶːlχaʶːtˤʔiʶaʶ hðaː ʕml naːfʕ ʔamaːmk fajastabdilu biaːlʃʃakwaaː ʃukranaː nħn fj ħrb ʔaʶðˤn ʔanhaː mrjdˤaʶ wʔaqjmwaː aʶːlsˤlaʶːaʶ wʔaːtwaː aːlzkaːa wʔaʶtˤjʕwaʶː aːlrswl lʕlkm trħmwn ʕllmtnj kjf ʔaʶsˤnʕ mwqʕa ʔintrnt jbdw ʕljk aːlmll θm wafasaaːduhaaː mufsidun lisaaːʔiiri ʔaahlihaaː liqillaai ʔaamaaːnaaːtihim waʶdˤaʶʕfiʶ dijaaːnaaːtihim fatawallawaː ʕanhu mudbirijna maːðaː tfʕlaːn aːlllaha rabbakum warabba ʔaːbaaːʔiikumu aːlʔaawwalijna waʔiin kaaːna χajruhu mamnuwʕanaː aːslamij jaː miʶsˤruʶ ʔiniinaaː aːlfdaː ðiaː jadiaː ʔin madaati aːlddnjaː jdaː aːlħaaːqqaau kaːnt btj ʔawl aʶːlħaʶːdˤraʶːt ʔilaː aːlħfla ʔant tnaːm fj stmtˤr ʁdaːan ʔanaː laː ʔaʕrf maː jd͡ʒrj hnaː kjf tʁjjrt ħjaːtk waqihimu aːlssajiʔiaaːti waman taqi aːlssajiʔiaaːti jawmaʔiiðin faqad raħimtahu waðalika huwa aːlfawzu aʶːlʕaʶðˤiʶjmuʶ whw aːlðj jnzl aʶːlʔaʶrdˤ ʔinj ħfjðˤ ʕljm jaː rħaːb aːlmd͡ʒd ʕdnaː mn d͡ʒdjd ʔajn jmknnaː tbaːdl aːlnqwd laː jntmj ʔiljnaː watazawwad min jawmik liʁadika waʔaanzalnaaː mina aːlssamaaːʔi maaːʔan biqadarin faʔaaskannaaːhu fij aʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤiʶ waʔiinnaaː ʕalaaː ðahaaːbin bihi laqaaːdiruwna lmaːðaː tdrs kl jwm aːlllahu laaː ʔiilaha ʔiillaaː huwa lahu aːlʔaasmaaːʔu aːlħusnaaː lm jʕr ʔaj aːhtmaːm lnsˤjħtj aːqtħm aːlmnzl surqt mnhaː ħqjbthaː tqrjbaː baːlmnzl kaːn saːmj jʕjʃ fj aʶːltˤaʶːbq aːlssflj ljs md͡ʒnwnaː walam jakun lahu kufuwanaː ʔaaħadun fχrd͡ʒ ʕlaː qwmh mn aːlmħraːb fʔawħaː ʔiljhm ʔan sbħwaː bkra wʕʃjaː wd͡ʒʕlnaː aːlsmaːʔ sqfaː mħfwðˤaʶː whm ʕn ʔaːjaːthaː mʕrdˤwn wahuwa ʔaan jakuwna aːlssababu aːlmaaːniʕu liʕillaain fij aːlmustamiʕi faðalika dˤaʶrbaʶaʶːniʶ waʶaʶːlmaʶnaʶaʶːðˤiʶruʶ ʔin lam jasʔaal saaːʔiilun juʕrafu fawaqaaːhu aːlllahu sajjiʔiaaːti maaː makaruwaː waħaaːqa biʔaːli firʕawna suwʔu aːlʕaðaaːbi ldjh braːʕa aːstθnaːʔija fj aːlmwsjqaː laː trkdˤ bl aːmʃ ʕlaː mhlk laaː jasbiquwnahu biaːlqawli wahum biʔaamrihi jaʕmaluwna ʔiʶntðˤr dqjqa twm waaːld͡ʒibaaːla ʔaarsaaːhaaː qaːl rd͡ʒl mn aːlbχlaːʔ lʔawlaːdh haðihi aːlnnaaːru aːllatij kuntum bihaaː tukaððibuwna hl tħtaːd͡ʒjn ʔilaː sjaːra ʔisʕaːf maaː lakum kajfa taħkumuwna laː ʔamlk ʔilaː nsˤf maː ʕndh mn ktb klaː bl raːn ʕlaː qlwbhm maː kaːnwaː jksbwn faʔaamaaːtuwaː minhaaː maaː χaʃuwaː ʔaan jumijta quluwbahum ʔinna aːlqalba jamuwtu wajaħjaaː walaw baʕda ħijnin nrjd lħmaː wamaaː ʔaanta bihaaːdij aːlʕumji ʕan dˤaʶlaʶaʶːlaʶtiʶhiʶm ʔiin tusmiʕu ʔiillaaː man juʔuminu biʔaːjaaːtinaaː fahum muslimuwna aʶːlsˤbr ʔaummu aːlʕlwm aːħml hðaː zaːr mnnaːd aːlqaːhra ldj ʁrftj aʶːlχaʶːsˤaʶ fj aːlbjt ʃaːrk kθjr mn aʶːltˤlaʶːb fj aːlmsaːbqa walaaː jaʁtarru biʶaʶːltˤtˤaʶmaʶʕiʶ bl qaːlwaː ʔaʶdˤʁaʶːθ ʔaħlaːm bl aːftraːh bl hw ʃaːʕr fljʔatnaː bʔaːja kmaː ʔarsl aːlʔawlwn waʔaaχðihimu aːlrribaaː waqad nuhuwaː ʕanhu waʔaaklihim ʔaamwaaːla aːlnnaaːsi biʶaʶːlbaʶaʶːtˤiʶliʶ waʔaaʕtadnaaː lilkaaːfirijna minhum ʕaðaaːbanaː ʔaalijmanaː wamaaː ʔaarsalnaaː fij qarjaain min naðijrin ʔiillaaː qaaːla mutrafuwhaaː ʔiinnaaː bimaaː ʔaursiltum bihi kaaːfiruwna jʕd͡ʒbh aːlaːstmaːʕ ʔilaː aːlmðjaːʕ maaː ʔaanaaː bifaaːʕilin waman kaaːna sˤaʶmtuʶhuʶ fij ʁajri fikrin faqad lahaaː lk ʃjʔ waqaaːla aːlʃʃaʕbiju fadaʕaaː rabbahu ʔaanna haʔuulaaːʔi qawmun mud͡ʒrimuwna ʔaχbrhaː maː ʔaχbrka bh maː aːlsr hðaː aːlktaːb mʔulf blʁa ʔind͡ʒljzja mbsstˤaʶ w hw shl llqraːʔa flaː jsˤdnk ʕnhaː mn laː jʔumn bhaː waːtbʕ hwaːh ftrdaː wkm qsˤmnaʶː mn qrja kaːnt ðˤaʶːlmaʶ wʔanʃʔanaː bʕdhaː qwmaː ʔaːχrjn ħmdt aːllh frʃ ʃqa d͡ʒdjda jfrdˤ nfqaːt kbjra ʔin fj ðlk lʔaːja wmaː kaːn ʔakθrhm mʔumnjn θumma jaʔatij min baʕdi ðalika ʕaaːmun fijhi juʁaaːθu aːlnnaaːsu wafijhi jaʶʕsˤiʶruʶwnaʶ qaaːluwaː ʔaataʕd͡ʒabijna min ʔaamri aːlllahi raħmatu aːlllahi wabarakaaːtuhu ʕalajkum ʔaahla aːlbajti ʔiinnahu ħamijdun mad͡ʒijdun ʔiħdaaːhumaaː tuksibu aːlwizra waaːlʔauχraaː tuwhinu aːlʔaad͡ʒra ʔiin haðaaː ʔiilaːaːa qawlu aːlbaʃari laː ʔaʶsttˤjʕ fhm maː tqwl waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi min ʕalaaːmaai aːlʔiiqbaaːli aʶːsˤtˤiʶnaʶaʶːʕuʶ aːlrrid͡ʒaaːli waːldj aːʕtaːd ʔan jkwn rd͡ʒlaːan qwjaːan waaːlʕiffaau waʶaʶːsiʶtˤaʶaʶuʶn bajna aːlʃʃarahi waʶdˤaʶʕfiʶ aːlʃʃahwaai km sʕr hðh aːlsraːwjl aːlswdaːʔ w hðh aʶːlʔaʶqmsˤaʶ aːlħmraːʔ ʔalm jrwaː km ʔahlknaː qblhm mn aːlqrwn ʔanhm ʔiljhm laː jrd͡ʒʕwn ʔiinnamaaː ʔaamwaaːlukum waʔaawlaaːdukum fitnaaun waaːlllahu ʕindahu ʔaad͡ʒrun ʕaʶðˤiʶjmuʶn mn fdˤlk tklm bbtˤʔiʶiʶn ʔakθr waʔiiðaaː ʔaaradnaaː ʔaan nuhlika qarjaaan ʔaamarnaaː mutrafijhaaː fafasaquwaː fijhaaː faħaqqa ʕalajhaaː aːlqawlu fadammarnaaːhaaː tadmijranaː maaː qaʶtˤaʶʕtuʶm min lijnaain ʔaaw taraktumuwhaaː qaaːʔiimaaan ʕalaaː ʔaʶuʶsˤuʶwliʶhaʶaʶː fabiʔiiðni aːlllahi walijuχzija aːlfaaːsiqijna ʔajn stkwn jwm aːlʔiθnjn qaaːla aːχrud͡ʒ minhaaː maðʔuwmanaː madħuwranaː laman tabiʕaka minhum laʔaamlaʔaanna d͡ʒahannama minkum ʔaad͡ʒmaʕijna wln jtmnwh ʔabdaː bmaː qdmt ʔajdjhm waːllh ʕljm baʶːlðˤaʶːlmjn wmaːðaː jχtbʔi wraːʔ ħqwl aːlnd͡ʒwm ʔaːkl aːlχbz wadaχala qawmun manzila ʕaaːbidin falam jad͡ʒiduwaː ʃajʔianaː jaqʕuduwna ʕalajhi faqaaːla aːllħwm aʶːlmsˤnʕaʶ saːma walawlaaː ʔiið samiʕtumuwhu qultum maaː jakuwnu lanaaː ʔaan natakallama bihaðaaː subħaaːnaka haðaaː buhtaaːnun ʕaʶðˤiʶjmuʶn ʔiillaaː taðkiraaan liman jaχʃaaː aːlmjaːh aːlhaːdʔia ttdfq bʕmq hl ʔanta ħzjn tlk aːld͡ʒna aːltj nwrθ mn ʕbaːdnaː mn kaːn tqjaː fhl traː lhm mn baːqja wʔaʕtzlkm wmaː tdʕwn mn dwn aːllh wʔadʕw rbj ʕsaː ʔalaː ʔakwn bdʕaːʔ rbj ʃqjaː lam ʔaʕlam ʔanaaka lam tamluk ruʶχsˤaʶaʶ qijaːdain ʔaχrd͡ʒ aʶːltˤlaʶːbaʶ mn aːlʁrfa qbl klaːj aʶːlʕrdˤ ʔam tsʔalhm χrd͡ʒaː fχraːd͡ʒ rbk χjr whw χjr aːlraːzqjn aːnhaː srqh rbmaː nsjt aʶːlmðˤlaʶ fj aːlħaːfla kaːnt trtdj fstaːnaːan ʔaʶbjdˤaʶːaʶn ln jsˤdqnj ʔaħd wlqd ʔarslnaː nwħaː ʔilaː qwmh ʔinj lkm nðjr fid͡ʒaaːd͡ʒanaː subulanaː laʕallahum jahtaduwna wʔamaː mn χaːf mqaːm rbh wnhaː aːlnfs ʕn aːlhwaː kaaːna aːld͡ʒadbu jaħduθu min ʔaasbaaːbi aːlfasaaːdi maaː dˤaʶaʶːddaʶhaʶaʶː hl tʃaːrk fj hðaː aːlħdθ ʔanaː kbjr bmaː jkfj ʔaaħaduhumaaː laaːzimun biʶaʶːltˤtˤaʶbʕiʶ faʔiinnahum jawmaʔiiðin fij aːlʕaðaaːbi muʃtarikuwna twm jntðˤr sˤlaʶːħ ʔamrk baːlʔaχlaːq mrd͡ʒʕh faqawwim aːlnfs baːlʔaχlaːq tstqm falammaaː ʔaaħassuwaː baʔasanaaː ʔiiðaaː hum minhaaː jaʶrkuʶdˤuʶwnaʶ waʶʔaʶaʶbsˤiʶr fasawfa juʶbsˤiʶruʶwnaʶ badijʕu aːlssamaaːwaaːti waʶaʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤiʶ waʔiiðaaː qaʶdˤaʶaʶː ʔaamranaː faʔiinnamaaː jaquwlu lahu kun fajakuwnu fjhaː faːkha waːlnχl ðaːt aːlʔakmaːm wʔilaː aʶːlʔaʶrdˤ kjf stˤħt waʔiin kaaːna taʶqsˤiʶjruʶ aʶːlllaʶfðˤiʶ ʕan aːlmaʕnaaː lisuwʔi fahmi aːlmutakallimi fahuwa ʔaʶaʶsˤʕaʶbuʶ aːlʔaumuwri ħaaːlanaː hðaː sˤdjqj twm walahum ʕalajja ðanbun faʔaaχaaːfu ʔaan jaqtuluwni rbmaː jwd aːlðjn kfrwaː lw kaːnwaː mslmjn ʔin aːllh laː jðˤlm aːlnaːs ʃjʔiaː wlkn aːlnaːs ʔanfshm jðˤlmwn bʕzmj wnaːrj wbrkaːn θʔarj wʔaʃwaːq dmj lʔaʶrdˤj wdaːrj hl wsˤltnj ʔaj rsaːʔil liʔaanna min ʕilali aʶːlmaʶsˤaʶaʶːliʶħiʶ maaː huwa ðˤaʶaʶːhiʶruʶn faʔiinnahuna ʔaaquwmu bihaðaaː aːlħaaːli ʁaːjaun tuʃariifu wraːjaun trafrifu jaː hanaaːk fj ʕulaːk kl ʔinsaːn ldjhi aːlħq fj mmtlkaːthi aʶːlχaʶːsˤaʶ faqaaːla aʶːrdˤaʶ biaːlqawti waχaf min aːlfawti waaːd͡ʒʕal sˤaʶwmaʶk aːlddunjaaː waʶfiʶtˤraʶk aːlmawta faaːljawma nunad͡ʒd͡ʒijka bibadanika litakuwna liman χalfaka ʔaːjaaan waʔiinna kaθijranaː mina aːlnnaaːsi ʕan ʔaːjaaːtinaaː laʁaaːfiluwna hj mtˤrbaʶ twm laː jmknhu ʔiχfaːʔ sr ʕn maːrjaː wllh aːlmʃrq waːlmʁrb fʔajnmaː twlwaː fθm wd͡ʒh aːllh ʔin aːllh waːsʕ ʕljm wjwm jħʃr ʔaʕdaːʔ aːllh ʔilaː aːlnaːr fhm jwzʕwn jawma tubaddalu aʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤuʶ ʁajra aʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤiʶ waaːlssamaaːwaaːtu wabarazuwaː χaːldjn fjhaː wðlk d͡ʒzaːʔ mn tzkaː waaːlχaaːmisu aːliaːktifaaːʔu bimaaːddaain tuʁnijhi ʕan kalafi aʶːltˤtˤaʶlaʶbiʶ maː ʔant ʔilaː bʃr mθlnaː fʔat bʔaːja ʔin knt mn aʶːlsˤaʶːdqjn waddat tˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶfaʶaʶuʶn min ʔaahli aːlkitaaːbi law juʶdˤiʶlluʶwnaʶkuʶm wamaaː juʶdˤiʶlluʶwnaʶ ʔiillaaː ʔaanfusahum wamaaː jaʃʕuruwna wahaðaaː qawlu aːbni ʕabbaaːsin raʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːlllahu ʕanhumaaː maːðaː kunti stqwljna lw knti fj mkaːnj faʔaawd͡ʒasa fij nafsihi χijfaaan muwsaaː aːbn ʕmj mn msˤr hw msˤrj waʔaammaaː man ʔauwtija kitaaːbahu biʃimaaːlihi fajaquwlu jaaː lajtanij lam ʔauwta kitaaːbijah ʔiðaː rʔathm mn mkaːn bʕjd smʕwaː lhaː tʁjðˤaʶː wzfjraː ʔiinnij d͡ʒazajtuhumu aːljawma bimaaː sˤaʶbaʶruʶwaʶː ʔaannahum humu aːlfaaːʔiizuwna ʔirm ðaːt aːlʕmaːd mnnaːd laː jzaːl fj mnzl sˤdjqth wamin kulli ʃajʔin χalaqnaaː zawd͡ʒajni laʕallakum taðakkaruwna lqd twqf aʶːlmtˤr lðaː jmknnaː aːlbdʔ walam jabqa maʕahumaaː wad͡ʒdun ʔaʕtðr laː ʔaʕtqd ʔannj sʔakwn qaːdraːan ʕlaː ðlk waʔiin zaaːla aːlssababu bizawaaːli aːlrraʁbaai waaːlrrahbaai muχtalifijna fij aːlrrizqi fahaðaaː ʁanijjun wahaðaaː faqijrun hm jħbwnnaː ʕinda sidraai aːlmuntahaaː ʔin dˤjʕt mftaːħj fln ʔaqdr ʕlaː ftħ aːlbaːb qalijlu aːlʕilmi χajrun min kaθijri aːlʕibaaːdaai flmaː rʔawh zlfa sjʔit wd͡ʒwh aːlðjn kfrwaː wqjl hðaː aːlðj kntm bh tdʕwn jaaː ʔaajjuhaaː aːllaðijna ʔaːmanuwaː ʔiin tuʶtˤiʶjʕuʶwaʶː aːllaðijna kafaruwaː jarudduwkum ʕalaaː ʔaaʕqaaːbikum fatanqalibuwaː χaaːsirijna ʔanaː mtʔakd qaːl ʔinkm qwm mnkrwn hl tudrku χtˤwraʶ maː ttfwwhu bh falaaː taħsabanna aːlllaha muχlifa waʕdihi rusulahu ʔiinna aːlllaha ʕazijzun ðuw aːntiqaaːmin aːld͡ʒw aːljwm ʃdjd aːlħraːra aːðhb ʔilaː aːldkaːn hl trjd qlbj bjn ʔasnaːnk χaaːlidijna fijhaaː laaː juχaffafu ʕanhumu aːlʕaðaaːbu walaaː hum juʶnðˤaʶruʶwnaʶ hðaː aʶːlsˤaʶːlwn θmra tʕaːwn mʕ md͡ʒmwʕa raːʔiʕa mn aːlnwaːdj aʶːltˤlaʶːbjaʶ mn kaːml aːltraːb aʶːlwtˤnj liʔaannahu lam jakun minhu taʶqsˤiʶjruʶn fajuðammu ʔaaʔaamintum man fij aːlssamaaːʔi ʔaan jaχsifa bikumu aʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤaʶ faʔiiðaaː hija tamuwru ʔiinnaaː naʶtˤmaʶʕuʶ ʔaan jaʁfira lanaaː rabbunaaː χaʶtˤaʶaʶːjaʶaʶːnaʶaʶː ʔaan kunnaaː ʔaawwala aːlmuʔuminijna qutln fj aːlmʕrka qaaːla kallaaː faaːðhabaaː biʔaːjaaːtinaaː ʔiinnaaː maʕakum mustamiʕuwna laː ʔaʶðˤnn ʔann bwsʕj fʕl ðlk lknnj sʔaħaːwl ʔaħtaːd͡ʒ ʔilaː mtrd͡ʒm lst mtzwd͡ʒaː wmnhm mn jʔumn bh wmnhm mn laː jʔumn bh wrbk ʔaʕlm baːlmfsdjn ldjh mqʕd fj aːlbrlmaːn aːllhm aʶːqdˤj ʕlaː ʃʕb hmh aːlwħjd aːlʔakl w aːlnwm w aːltkaːθr ħtaː ʔiðaː ʔaχðnaː mtrfjhm baːlʕðaːb ʔiðaː hm jd͡ʒʔarwn jbdw twm ʃaːħb aːlwd͡ʒh faljaʕbuduwaː rabba haaːðaaː aːlbajti aːlʔaamalu raħmaaun min aːlllahi liʔaummatij tlk aːlħfla kaːnt mmjza jaː sˤaʶːħiʶ sʔaʶtˤlb mnk ʔan tqrʔa lj aːlrsaːla jaː twm ʔanaː whw ʔawlaːd ʕam wajaħd͡ʒizuhum ʕan taʶsˤaʶrruʶfiʶhiʶm waaːqtaraħa waʶsˤfaʶnaʶː muʕd͡ʒizanaː fljkn aːlʔamr kðlk ʔaafaraʔaajtumu aːlmaaːʔa aːllaðij taʃrabuwna swf ʔaqdm nfsj fj aːlaːd͡ʒtmaːʕ d͡ʒmjʕnaː jrjd ʔan tnχfdˤ aːlʔasʕaːr haðaaː jawmu laaː jaʶntˤiʶquʶwnaʶ waqaaːla maaːliku bnu dijnaaːrin taʶðˤuʶnnuʶ ʔaan jufʕala bihaaː faaːqiraaun waqaaːla rabbukumu aːdʕuwnij ʔaastad͡ʒib lakum ʔiinna aːllaðijna jastakbiruwna ʕan ʕibaaːdatij sajadχuluwna d͡ʒahannama daaːχirijna walabiθuwaː fij kahfihim θalaaːθa miaːʔiaain sinijna waaːzdaaːduwaː tisʕanaː ʔinh mn ʕbaːdnaː aːlmʔumnjn ʔinhaː haːdʔia wjðhb ʁjðˤ qlwbhm wjtwb aːllh ʕlaː mn jʃaːʔ waːllh ʕljm ħkjm ʔafrʔajt aːlðj kfr bʔaːjaːtnaː wqaːl lʔawtjn maːlaː wwldaː tˤuʶrd hnrj bsbb tqdmh fj aːlʕmr ʔilaː mn ðˤlm θm bdl ħsnaː bʕd swʔ fʔinj ʁfwr rħjm lqd qblt dʕwthaː sʔalt ʔijmjlj sʔuaːlaːan ʔaħtaːd͡ʒ ʔilaː qaːmws jaːbaːnjʔind͡ʒljzj ʔajhaː aːlsaːda aːsmħwaː lj ʔan ʔaħjjkm ʔinh jχaːfu mn χjaːlhi mn aːlðaː trd͡ʒm aːlqrʔaːn ʔilaː aːlʕbrja lqd ʔand͡ʒztu msbqaːan aːlqism aʶːlsˤʕb waʔiin fahima aːlʕilmu jaħrusuk waʔaanta taħrusu aːlmaaːli wamaaː ʔaʶaʶsˤaʶaʶːbaʶkuʶm jawma aːltaqaaː aːld͡ʒamʕaaːni fabiʔiiðni aːlllahi walijaʕlama aːlmuʔuminijna hl mn ʔaħd lmsaːʕdtj ʔanaː maː ʃrbt aːlħljb ʔiʶfħsˤ mud͡ʒddaːan wrbk jʕlm maː tkn sˤdwrhm wmaː jʕlnwn ʔiinna ʔiilajnaaː ʔiijaaːbahum χrd͡ʒ rd͡ʒl tˤwjl mn hnaːk bsrʕa ʔaːn aːlʔawaːn ltswja maː bjnnaː mn ħsaːb waqaaːtiluwaː fij sabijli aːlllahi waaːʕlamuwaː ʔaanna aːlllaha samijʕun ʕalijmun hðaː aːlmnzl ħðˤjraʶ llχnaːzjr ʕaaːlimi aːlʁajbi waaːlʃʃahaaːdaai fataʕaaːlaaː ʕammaaː juʃrikuwna tʕaːrk twm mʕ ʔaχj maːrj faːnksr ʔanfh td͡ʒrj aːlrjaːħ bmaː laː tʃthj aːlsfn ʔaflaː tðkrwn ʔiilaːaːa qijlaː salaːmanaː salaːmanaː liʔaanna aːlʔaaħmaqa rubbamaaː dˤaʶrraʶ wahuwa jaqdiru ʔaan janfaʕa twm laː jqwm daːʔimaː bmaː jntðˤrh mnh aːlʔaːχrwn laː tftħ hðaː aːlbaːb mn fdˤlk walakinnahu qad juʕarraaː min baʶʕdˤiʶ aːlkalaaːmi jd͡ʒb ʔan tsaːʕdhaː w lkn bsrʕa aʶːttsˤl saːmj baʶːlʃʃrtˤaʶ maː hw rqm aʶːltˤwaʶːrʔiʶ raħmaau aːlllahi ʕalajhi wajakuffu waʔiiðaaː massahu aːlʃʃaru faðuw duʕaaːʔin ʕaʶriʶjdˤiʶn waʔiin kaaːna aːlʕaqdu raʁbaaan fij aːlttaʕafufi fahuwa aːlwad͡ʒhu aːlħaqijqijju aːlmubtaʁaaː biʕaqdi aːlnnikaaːħi aːlftaː aːlðj ʔaħbh laː jħbnj ðahaba ʔiilaaː ʔaahlihi jaʶtaʶmaʶtˤtˤaʶaʶː waʔaaʕadda ðalika min niʕamihi aʶːlʕiʶðˤaʶaʶːmiʶ θumma radadnaaː lakumu aːlkarraaa ʕalajhim waʔaamdadnaaːkum biʔaamwaaːlin wabanijna wad͡ʒaʕalnaaːkum ʔaakθara nafijranaː fahija χiʶsˤbuʶ daaːrin tattasiʕu aːlnnufuwsu bihi fij aːlʔaaħwaaːli wataʃtariku fijhi ðuw aːlʔiikθaaːri waaːlʔiiqlaaːli falajsa kullu aːlzzamaaːni zamaaːna aːktisaaːbin ðˤrf w d͡ʒaːk jd͡ʒmʕ aʶːltˤwaʶːbʕ ʔin ʔawl bjt wdˤʕ llnaːs llðj bbka mbaːrkaː whdaː llʕaːlmjn faʔiinna mawaddaaa aːlʃʃirijri tuksibu aːlʔaaʕdaaːʔa watufsidu aːlʔaaχlaaːqa ʃχsˤ maː jʔakl stdfʕ θmn hðaː laaː ʔiilaha ʔiillaaː huwa juħjij wajumijtu rabbukum warabbu ʔaːbaaːʔiikumu aːlʔaawwalijna ʔalaː tkrh hðaː aːlnwʕ mn aːlʔaflaːm ʔin aːllh jdaːfʕ ʕn aːlðjn ʔaːmnwaː ʔin aːllh laː jħb kl χwaːn kfwr ʔinhaː wad͡ʒaʕalanij mina aːlmursalijna ʔaːml ʔan hðh aːlrsaːla ʔaθaːrt aːhtmaːmk w ʔanaː fj aʶːntðˤaʶːr ʔid͡ʒaːbtk ʔanaː mtʔakda ʔanki mχtˤʔiʶaʶ aːʕlam ʔaanna maaː bihi taʶsˤluʶħuʶ aːlddunjaaː ħattaaː taʶsˤiʶjraʶ ʔaaħwaaːluhaaː muʶntaʶðˤiʶmaʶaʶaʶn ʔaʶwsˤlnj ħtaː aʶːlqsˤr ʔanaː ʔaʶnðˤf ʁrftj faʶtaʶqaʶtˤtˤaʶʕuʶwaʶː ʔaamrahum bajnahum zuburanaː kullu ħizbin bimaaː ladajhim fariħuwna watattaχiðuwna maʶsˤaʶaʶːniʶʕaʶ laʕallakum taχluduwna waʔiin wallajtum ʕalijjanaː tad͡ʒiduwhu haaːdijanaː mahdijjanaː jastabʃiruwna biniʕmaain mina aːlllahi waʶfaʶdˤliʶn waʔaanna aːlllaha laaː juʶdˤiʶjʕuʶ ʔaad͡ʒra aːlmuʔuminijna ʔaafasiħrun haðaaː ʔaam ʔaantum laː tuʶbsˤiʶruʶwnaʶ ʔabj aːʕtaːd ʔan jkwn rd͡ʒlaːan qwjaːan mn kaːn jrjd θwaːb aːldnjaː fʕnd aːllh θwaːb aːldnjaː waːlʔaːχra wkaːn aːllh smjʕaː bsˤjraʶː whðaː maː jʕrf aːlʔaːn bqaːnwn haːbl liʔaanna aːlqabijħa ʔaanammu min aːld͡ʒamijli waaːlrraðijlaau ʔaaʃharu min aʶːlfaʶdˤiʶjlaʶaʶiʶ waaːlttaaːriki lidijnihi aːlmufaaːriqi lild͡ʒamaaːʕaai aːlʕuluwmu wsljmaːn ʔið jħkmaːn fj aːlħrθ ʔið nfʃt fjh ʁnm aːlqwm wknaː lħkmhm ʃaːhdjn walammaaː kaaːna aːlʔiinsaaːnu ʔaakθara ħaaːd͡ʒaaan min d͡ʒamijʕi aːlħajawaaːni kaaːna ʔaʶaʶðˤhaʶraʶ ʕad͡ʒzanaː aːʃthrt nðˤaʶːraʶːtj wsˤl aʶːlqtˤaʶːr sjkwn ʔaʶrχsˤ lk baːltʔakjd ʔan tnaːm fj mnzlnaː ʔaʶnðˤr ʔilaː wd͡ʒh twm ʔinj wd͡ʒht wd͡ʒhj llðj ftˤr aːlsmaːwaːt waʶːlʔaʶrdˤ ħnjfaː wmaː ʔanaː mn aːlmʃrkjn waaːllaðijna kafaruwaː wakaððabuwaː biʔaːjaaːtinaaː ʔauwlaʔiika ʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶaʶːbuʶ aːld͡ʒaħijmi waman lam jaχaf aːlllaha taʕaaːlaaː haaːnat ʕalajhi ʔaawaaːmiruhu lkl ʃχsˤ aːlħq fj ʔan jnʃʔi wjndˤm ʔilaː nqaːbaːt ħmaːja lmsˤaʶːlħh qaaːluwaː laʔiin ʔaakalahu aːlððiʔibu wanaħnu ʕuʶsˤbaʶaʶuʶn ʔiinnaaː ʔiiðanaː laχaaːsiruwna d͡ʒuwdu aːlrrad͡ʒuli juħabbibuhu ʔilaaː ʔaʶaʶdˤdaʶaʶːdiʶhiʶ wajustafaaːdu bihi ʔiʶndˤaʶaʶːd͡ʒuʶhaʶaʶː wajaaː qawmi man jaʶnsˤuʶruʶniʶj mina aːlllahi ʔiin tˤaʶraʶdtuʶhuʶm ʔaafalaaː taðakkaruwna liʔaannahu taʶwaʶrraʶtˤaʶ biʁalabaai aːlʃʃahwaai ʕalaaː aːlʔiiqdaaːmi ʕalaaː aʶːlmaʶʕsˤiʶjaʶaʶiʶ ʔaraː zhra ʕlaː aːlmktb ʔiiðaaː rud͡ʒd͡ʒati aʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤuʶ rad͡ʒd͡ʒanaː wsˤlt ʃrka mnnaːd ʔilaː aʶːlħdˤjdˤ θumma ʔiinna ʕalajnaaː ħisaaːbahum ʔaχbr saːmj aʶːlʃʃrtˤaʶ ʔannh lm jkn jaʔatijahum baʔasunaaː dˤuʶħaʶnaʶː wahum jalʕabuwna lst mtʔakdaː mnnaːd jhm tsˤmd aːlzraːfa lʔasaːbjʕ dwn ʃrb aːlmaːʔ ʔawd aːlaːχtlaːʔ btwm lbdˤʕ dqaːʔiq ʔin fj ðlk lʔaːja llmʔumnjn ʔaʶnsˤħk ʔan td͡ʒrbh wbrzt aːld͡ʒħjm llʁaːwjn aːlmarʔu maʕa man ʔaaħabba mtˤaʶːʕ θm ʔamjn mn ktb hðaː aːlktaːb kjf nimta aːlljla aʶːlmaʶːdˤjaʶ walaw taraaː ʔiið jatawaffaaː aːllaðijna kafaruwaː aːlmalaaːʔiikaau jaʶdˤriʶbuʶwnaʶ wud͡ʒuwhahum waʔaadbaaːrahum waðuwquwaː ʕaðaaːba aːlħarijqi ħaʶsˤaʶaʶntuʶkaʶ biaːsmi aːllh jaaː waʶtˤaʶnuʶ laː hðaː jkfj ʔanaː mmtlʔi waːlsmaːʔ ðaːt aːlrd͡ʒʕ ðikru raħmati rabbika ʕabdahu zakarijjaaː ʔinhaː qwja wamaaː janbaʁij lahum wamaaː jaʶstaʶtˤiʶjʕuʶwnaʶ tqaːm aːlʔalʕaːb aːlʔawlmbja kl ʔarbʕ snwaːt ql ltwm ʔan jrfʕ smaːʕa aːlhaːtf lnlʕb kra aːlqaːʕda ħjn jtwqf aʶːlmtˤr ʔanaː ʔaʕrf hðaː aːlwld aːlðj laː tʕrf ʕnh ʃjʔiaː ðalikum waʔaanna aːlllaha muwhinu kajdi aːlkaaːfirijna kallaaː laʔiin lam jantahi lanasfaʕanaː biʶaʶːlnnaʶaʶːsˤiʶjaʶaʶiʶ ħsnanaː ʕumila ʔiðaaː twm ʕaːml aːlnaːs kmaː tħb ʔan jʕaːmlwk wlw nʃaːʔ ltˤmsnaʶː ʕlaː ʔaʕjnhm faːstbqwaː aʶːlsˤraʶːtˤ fʔanaː jbsˤrwn wwdˤʕnaʶː ʕnk wzrk ʔaʶħdˤr lj qljlaː mn aːlmaːʔ d͡ʒwrd͡ʒ kθjr aːlklaːm rʔaːjt tlk χaʶːsˤsˤaʶ aʶːlqtˤtˤ sʔuaːl d͡ʒjd ʔanaː ðhbt ʔilaː aːlnrwjd͡ʒ waʃarra aːlʔaːbaaːʔi man daʕaaːhu aːlbirru ʔilaaː aʶːlʔiʶiʶfraʶaʶːtˤiʶ dχlnaː ʔilaː aːlmktb fwd͡ʒdnaː ʔimjt w ʔirkjn jmsħaːn aːlnwaːfð wamina aːlnnaaːsi man jud͡ʒaaːdilu fij aːlllahi biʁajri ʕilmin walaaː hudanaː walaaː kitaaːbin munijrin θumma ʔaarsalnaaː muwsaaː waʔaaχaaːhu haaːruwna biʔaːjaaːtinaaː waʶsuʶltˤaʶaʶːniʶn mubijnin wajaʔamanu bihi aʶːlssuʶltˤaʶaʶːnuʶ ljs ldja maːl ttwjbaː wsˤltk rsaːla χaʶːsˤaʶ jðˤhr ʔank fj wrtˤaʶ ntrd͡ʒm aːld͡ʒml ʔilaː aːllʁaːt aːlʔaχraː ʔaaθmarat mawaddatuhu nadamanaː qul huwa aːllaðij ʔaanʃaʔaakum wad͡ʒaʕala lakumu aːlssamʕa waʶaʶːlʔaʶaʶbsˤaʶaʶːraʶ waaːlʔaafʔiidaaa qalijlanaː maaː taʃkuruwna qaaːla nakkiruwaː lahaaː ʕarʃahaaː naʶnðˤuʶr ʔaatahtadij ʔaam takuwnu mina aːllaðijna laaː jahtaduwna qaːblth fj ʔaħd aːlʔajaːm knt mtʕbaː w maː hw ʔaswʔa mn ðlk ʔanaː nʕsaːn laː tqlq ħtaː lw ʃaribt ln jʔuθrʕlaː qjaːdtj laː jmkn llnʕaːm ʔan jtˤjr ðalikum faðuwquwhu waʔaanna lilkaaːfirijna ʕaðaaːba aːlnnaaːri wʔink lʕlaː χlq ʕðˤjm ʔaʶsˤbħt aːlʔamwr ʔaʶsˤʕb mn fdˤlk sˤħiʶħ lj ʕndmaː ʔaʶuʶχtˤjʔ nħn fj ʔamaːn aːlʔaːn hðaː aʶːlnsˤ ljs mtrd͡ʒmaː balaaː jaaː rasuwla aːlllahi qaaːla aːmtlʔat ħqjbth baːlmaːʔ hnaːlk haːtf ʕmwmj ʕnd aːlzaːwja jaʶtˤuʶwfuʶwnaʶ bajnahaaː wabajna ħamijmin ʔaːnin aːrħlwaː mn aːlbjt d͡ʒzaːʔ bmaː kaːnwaː jʕmlwn fbðˤlm mn aːlðjn haːdwaː ħrmnaː ʕljhm tˤjbaʶːt ʔaħlt aːlmʃrkwn sʔaħbk daːʔimanaː ʔanaː ħaːml tħaːwl daːʔimaː lwm ʃχsˤ ʔaːχr ʔanaː laː ʔaʕrf maːðaː trjd mnj daχalt ʕalaaː aːlmaʔamuwni wakunt jawmaʔiiðin wazijrahu faraʔaajth qaaːʔiimanaː wabijadihi ruqʕaaun faqaaːla ʔiiðaaː rud͡ʒd͡ʒati aʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤuʶ rad͡ʒd͡ʒanaː ktbat rsaːla waːħda sʔabqaː bʕjdaːan ʕn tˤrjqk ln ʔaðhb maː lm tχbrnj ʔajn ʔad͡ʒd twm waaːlssaʕijdu laaː jarkanu ʔilaaː aːlχudaʕi wzrwʕ wnχl tˤlʕhaʶː hdˤjm hl ʕlj ʔan ʔad͡ʒjb ʔasʔiltk klhaː takaaːdu aːlssamaaːwaaːtu jaʶtaʶfaʶtˤtˤaʶrnaʶ minhu watanʃaqqu aʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤuʶ wataχirru aːld͡ʒibaaːlu haddanaː ʔin aːlklb ʔaʶbjdˤ jʔatj aːlaːθnjn bʕd aːlʔaħd lqd ʔiħtaːl ʕljh aːlʔamaːzjʁ mslmwn ʕaːm sʕjd ld͡ʒmjʕ aːld͡ʒzaːʔirjjn walaqad fatannaaː sulajmaaːna waʔaalqajnaaː ʕalaaː kursijjihi d͡ʒasadanaː θumma ʔaanaaːba waʔiinnahu fij ʔaummi aːlkitaaːbi ladajnaaː laʕalijjun ħakijmun fij sidrin mmaʶχdˤuʶwdiʶn ʔiið tastaʁijθuwna rabbakum faaːstad͡ʒaaːba lakum ʔaannij mumiddukum biʔaalfin mina aːlmalaaːʔiikaai murdifijna rabbukum ʔaaʕlamu bikum ʔiin jaʃaʔa jarħamkum ʔaaw ʔiin jaʃaʔa juʕaððibkum wamaaː ʔaarsalnaaːka ʕalajhim wakijlanaː ʔauwlaʔiika aːllaðijna χasiruwaː ʔaanfusahum waʶdˤaʶllaʶ ʕanhum maaː kaaːnuwaː jaftaruwna sˤiʶlaʶaʶuʶn wamaʕruwfun qaːhiraːan ʕidaːk qaːhiraːan ʕidaːk maʶwtˤiʶniʶj maʶwtˤiʶniʶj lmaːðaː trjd ʔan tʕrf ðlk taːbʕt ʕmlhaː ldj ʔalm fj sˤdrj χaːldjn fjhaː wʕd aːllh ħqaː whw aːlʕzjz aːlħkjm maːðaː ʕlmatk trkt saːʕtj ljtm tsˤljħhaʶː ʔant hw ʔad͡ʒml rd͡ʒl rʔajth fj ħjaːtj waʔiiqaːmi aʶːlsˤsˤaʶlaʶːaʶaʶiʶ wʔiijtaaːʔi aːlzzakaaːai waħad͡ʒd͡ʒi aːlbajti waʶsˤaʶwmiʶ raʶmaʶdˤaʶaʶːnaʶ χaaːlidijna fijhaaː waʕda aːlllahi ħaqqanaː wahuwa aːlʕazijzu aːlħakijmu kaːn saːmj jqhqh man juʶtˤiʶʕiʶ aːlrrasuwla faqad ʔaʶaʶtˤaʶaʶːʕaʶ aːlllaha waman tawallaaː famaaː ʔaarsalnaaːka ʕalajhim ħaʶfiʶjðˤaʶnaʶː waʶːsˤiʶl aːlʕml tðˤaʶːhr bʔanh laː jʕlm ʃjʔiaː fd͡ʒʕlnaːhn ʔabkaːraː wʔantm saːmdwn twqf ʔinh jqrʔa aːlʔaːn famakaθa kaðalika maaː ʃaaːʔa aːlllahu tħdθt bsrʕa faʶaʶːsˤbiʶr ʔiinna waʕda aːlllahi ħaqqun waaːstaʁfir liðanbika wasabbiħ biħamdi rabbika biaːlʕaʃijji waaːlʔiibkaaːri wmaː ʔakθr aːlnaːs wlw ħrsˤt bmʔumnjn waaːllaðijna hum min ʕaðaaːbi rabbihim muʃfiquwna aːʁsl ʔasnaːnk d͡ʒjdaː qbl aːlnwm fahuwa birijaaːʔiihi maħruwmu aːlʔaad͡ʒri aːttabiʕ maaː ʔauwħija ʔiilajka min rabbika laaː ʔiilaha ʔiillaaː huwa waʶʔaʶaʶʕriʶdˤ ʕani aːlmuʃrikijna rasuwli aːlllahi sˤaʶllaʶaʶː aːlllahu ʕalajhi wasallama fanahaaː ʕan ðalika waqaaːla miθla daʔabi qawmi nuwħin waʕaaːdin waθamuwda waaːllaðijna min baʕdihim wamaaː aːlllahu jurijdu ðˤuʶlmaʶnaʶː lilʕibaaːdi χrd͡ʒt d͡ʒjn lltswq jʃrbn aːlħljb hj waʶːlʔaʶrdˤ mddnaːhaː wʔalqjnaː fjhaː rwaːsj wʔanbtnaː fjhaː mn kl ʃjʔ mwzwn lm ʔakn ʔatχjl llħðˤaʶ ʔannj swf ʔafwz jaː ljtnaː knaː mʕkm lfznaː fwzaːan ʕðˤjmaʶːaʶn jaː bnj ʔisraːʔijl aːðkrwaː nʕmtj aːltj ʔanʕmt ʕljkm wʔawfwaː bʕhdj ʔawf bʕhdkm wʔijaːj faːrhbwn aːlʃʃamsu waaːlqamaru biħusbaaːnin wabarranaː biwaaːlidatij walam jad͡ʒʕalnij d͡ʒabbaaːranaː ʃaqijjanaː stsmħ llkmbjwtr mn ntˤq aʶːlnsˤwsˤ aːlʕrbja waqad aʶːnsˤaʶraʶfaʶt ʕujuwnuhum ʕan ħirmaaːni ʔaakθari aːlnnawkaaː waʔiidbaaːri ʔaakθari aːld͡ʒuhhaaːli ʔaalam nuhliki aːlʔaawwalijna ʔiillaaː aʶːlmuʶstaʶdˤʕaʶfiʶjnaʶ mina fijhi rabbij χajrun faʔaaʕijnuwnij biquwwaain ʔaad͡ʒʕal bajnakum wabajnahum radmanaː wajakuwna bihi ʔaaʃadda dˤaʶnnaʶnaʶː minhu binafaaːʔiisi ʔaamwaaːlihi muʶhtˤiʶʕiʶjnaʶ ʔiilaaː aːlddaaːʕi jaquwlu aːlkaaːfiruwna haðaaː jawmun ʕasirun waʶtaʶwaʶaʶːsˤaʶwaʶː biaːlħaqqi waʶtaʶwaʶaʶːsˤaʶwaʶː biʶaʶːlsˤsˤaʶbriʶ ʔafħsbtm ʔanmaː χlqnaːkm ʕbθaː wʔankm ʔiljnaː laː trd͡ʒʕwn waʶːsˤbr ʕlaː maː jqwlwn lilmuslimijna waqad qijla kullun jaʶħsˤuʶduʶ maaː jazraʕu wajud͡ʒzaaː bimaaː jaʶsˤnaʶʕuʶ jbdw sˤʁjraʶːaʶn wlkn fj aːlwaːqʕ hw fwqa aːlʔarbʕjn mtaː wuldta rabbanaaː aːʁfir lij waliwaaːlidajja aːltlfaːz wʔið jrfʕ ʔibraːhjm aːlqwaːʕd mn aːlbjt wʔismaːʕjl rbnaː tqbl mnaː ʔink ʔant aːlsmjʕ aːlʕljm wajaħsabu ʔaannahu naaːla biaːldduχuwli fijhi ʔaakθarahu wafad͡ʒd͡ʒarnaaː aʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤaʶ θwrtnaː fsˤl aʶːlχtˤaʶːb ʔinh ʔasbwʕ mnð ʔan tqaːbl twm wmaːrj ʔin hðaː maː kntm bh tmtrwn aːlʔaħd ljs jwm ʕml baːlnsba lj hl ʔanta ħzjn fajanbaʁij liman ʔaawd͡ʒadahu aːlzzamaaːnu miθlahu waqalla ʔaan aːlħlaːl bjjn waːlħraːm bjjn wbjnhmaː aːmwr mʃtbhaːt qaaːla aːlmalaʔau aːllaðijna kafaruwaː min qawmihi ʔiinnaaː lanaraaːka fij safaaːhaain waʔiinnaaː laʶnaʶðˤuʶnnuʶkaʶ mina aːlkaaːðibijna jʕrfwn nʕmt aːllh θm jnkrwnhaː wʔakθrhm aːlkaːfrwn θumma laaː jamuwtu fijhaaː walaaː jaħjaaːaː ʕlj ʔan ʔad͡ʒd ʔaħdaː lmsaːʕdtj lma lm tχbrnj bʔann aːd͡ʒtmaːʕanaː aːnʕqd aːljwm waqad jakuwnu aːld͡ʒawru taaːraaan biʶmaʶqaʶaʶːsˤiʶdiʶ aːlʔaːdamijjijna aːlχaaːrid͡ʒaai ʕan aːlʕadli wqd χaːb mn dsaːhaː ʕalaaː sˤiʶraʶaʶːtˤiʶn mustaqijmin tħb lwsj lʕb aːltns sttħsn χlaːl ʔasbwʕ ʔanaː hnaː ksˤdjq knt ʔawwla ʃχsˤiʶn traːhu ʕndmaː ftħt ʕajnjhaː ʕan naaːfiʕin ʕan aːbni ʕumara raʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːlllahu ʕanhumaaː qaaːla dfʕt llχjaʶːtˤaʶ θmn fstaːnhaː fstaːn d͡ʒmjl waʶːχfdˤ lhmaː d͡ʒnaːħ aːlðl mn aːlrħma wql rb aːrħmhmaː fajakuwnu aʶːlmuʶqaʶsˤsˤiʶruʶ fij baʶʕdˤiʶhaʶaʶː taaːrikanaː lid͡ʒamijʕihaaː falaaː juħtasabu lahu maaː ʕamila liʔiiχlaaːlihi bimaaː baqija waqul rabbi ʔaadχilnij mudχala sˤiʶdqiʶn waʔaaχrid͡ʒnij muχrad͡ʒa sˤiʶdqiʶn waaːd͡ʒʕal lij min ladunka suʶltˤaʶaʶːnaʶnaʶː naʶsˤiʶjraʶnaʶː fj aːlljla aʶːlðˤlmaʶːʔ jftqd aːlbdr waːlðj hw jtˤʕmnj wjsqjn d͡ʒʔit ʔabħθ ʕnk hajhaaːta hajhaaːta limaaː tuwʕaduwna twm maːrj mn ʕlaː aːldrd͡ʒ kamaaː ʔaanna ħirmaaːna aːlʕaaːqili lmaːðaː tʕtqd ðlk hl rddt ʕlaː tlk aːlrsaːla bʕd walaaː taqbalu ʕaaːʔiidanaː fqdt traːsj nðˤaʶːrthaʶː walaqad ʕahidnaaː ʔiilaaː ʔaːdama wakaaːlddawaaːʔi wmaː hw bqwl ʃaːʕr qljlaː maː tʔumnwn nsˤf hðh aːltfaːħaːt faːsd wabawaaːdiri aːlħumqi aʶːlmuʶdˤiʶllaʶaʶiʶ tðhb zwd͡ʒth mʕh ʔajnmaː ðhb ʕndmaː kaːn ʃaːbaːan kaːn ʕaːmlaːan mθaːbraːan ʔiinna ʃaaːniʔiaka huwa aːlʔaabtaru wamaaː tasʔaaluhum ʕalajhi min ʔaad͡ʒrin ʔiin huwa ʔiillaaː ðikrun lilʕaaːlamijna aːnhaː qbjħa ʔiinnij ðˤaʶnaʶntuʶ ʔaannij mulaaːqin ħisaaːbijah ʔauwlaaːʔiika aːllaðijna aːʃtarawuaː aʶːldˤdˤaʶlaʶaʶːlaʶaʶaʶ biaːlhudaaːaː famaaː rabiħat ttid͡ʒaaːratuhum wamaaː kaaːnuwaː muhtadijna wajurijdu aːllaðijna jattabiʕuwna aːlʃʃahawaaːti ʔaan tamijluwaː majlanaː ʕaʶðˤiʶjmaʶnaʶː maːðaː sjħsˤl lljaːbaːn ʔaahum χajrun ʔaam qawmu tubbaʕin waaːllaðijna min qablihim ʔaahlaknaaːhum ʔiinnahum kaaːnuwaː mud͡ʒrimijna likulli aːmriʔiin mminhum jawmaʔiiðin ʃaʔanun aʶːlʁdˤb fj nfsh aːlllahu aːllaðj d͡ʒaʕala lakumu aːlʔaanʕaːma litarkabwaː minhaː waminhaː taʔakulwna laː tqtˤʕ hðh aːlʔaʃd͡ʒaːr liʔaanna aːlnnafsa ʔilaaː maħbuwbihaaː ʔaaʃwaqu waʔiilaaː maaː jalijhi bijadika dˤiʶʁθaʶnaʶː faʶaʶːdˤriʶb bihi walaaː taħnaθ ʔiinnaaː wad͡ʒadnaaːhu sˤaʶaʶːbiʶraʶnaʶː niʕma aːlʕabdu ʔiinnahu ʔaawwaaːbun litaħsuna tˤaʶaʶːʕaʶtuʶhaʶaʶː wsˤl aʶːlʃrtˤaʶ ʔilaː mkaːn aːlħaːdθa ʔan tχd͡ʒl mn d͡ʒhlk lqd bdʔa bktaːba rwaːja ʔanta tʕrf bqja aʶːlqsˤaʶ ʕlaː aːlʔaraːʔik jnðˤrwn qrʔaːnaː ʕrbjaː ʁjr ðj ʕwd͡ʒ lʕlhm jtqwn hl bʔimkaːnj mqaːbltk jwm aːlʔiθnjn waʶmaʶdˤaʶrraʶaʶuʶ aːld͡ʒaaːhili lajsat biðaaːti ħaddin lstu raːʁbanaː d͡ʒdaː baːlθrwa last ʔaaχaaːfu ʕalajk ʔaan taχaaːfa aːlllaha waʔiinnamaaː ʔaaχaaːfu ʕalajk ʔaan laaː taχaaːfa aːlllaha ʔin ʔardt ʔan jħbk aːlnaːs fʔaħbbh waqaaːla aːlmaʔamuwnu aːlʔiiχwaaːnu θalaaːθu tˤaʶbaʶqaʶaʶːtiʶn tˤaʶbaʶqaʶaʶuʶn kaaːlʁiðaaːʔi laaː justaʁnaaː ʕanhu wahaðihi ħaaːlaaun laaː jumkinu ħaʶsˤruʶ ʁaaːjatihaaː walaaː aːlwuquwfu ʕinda rfdˤ msaːʕdth aːlħaðara aːlħaðara nħn d͡ʒjl aːlbðl fd͡ʒr aːlkaːdħjn ldj kutb qrʔathaː mraːraː wtkraːraː hl ʔaʶsttˤjʕ ʔan ʔaːχð hðhi mʕj ln jħtˤm ʔaħdhm aːld͡ʒdaːr aːlðj jχbʔi qlbj jmknk tʕdjl hðaː wχʃj aːlrħmn baːlʁjb fbʃrh bmʁfra wʔad͡ʒr krjm ʔaannaaː sˤaʶbaʶbnaʶaʶː aːlmaaːʔ sˤaʶbbaʶnaʶː ln tblʁ aːlmd͡ʒd ħtaː tlʕq aʶːlsˤbr waʶaʶːlmuʶðˤaʶaʶːfaʶraʶaʶuʶ biʶtaʶnaʶaʶːsˤuʶriʶ aːlfiʔiatajni ʔiillaaː waʶaʶːntaʶðˤiʶr ʔiinnahum muʶntaʶðˤiʶruʶwnaʶ kaːn jʁlj mn aʶːlʁdˤb waman aːftaqara fijhaaː ħazina faman qawijat ʔaasbaaːbuhu qawijat aːlθθiqaau bihi lqd ʔaʶsˤbħ mmθlaː mʃhwraː ʔaawaʔaːbaaːʔuunaaː bmaː kaːnwaː jkðbwn wqaːlwaː lw knaː nsmʕ ʔaw nʕql maː knaː fj ʔaʶsˤħaʶːb aːlsʕjr waʶːsˤl aːlmʃj lbʕdˤ aːlwqt ʕindahaaː d͡ʒannaau aːlmaʔawaaː wabikufrihim waqawlihim ʕalaaː marjama buhtaaːnanaː mubijnun dfʕ saːmj nqdaː mn ʁaːb χaːb hl sˤnʕt hðaː bnfsk jsˤnʕ aːlnħl aːlʕsl aːlħjwaːn kaːfħ llχrwd͡ʒ mn aʶːlqfsˤ waʔaammaaː aːlqaaːʕidaau aːlθθaaːliθaau hðaː hw aːlħaːl knt mtʕbaː d͡ʒdaː waburrizati aːld͡ʒaħijmu liman jaraaː waħaaːlu ʁuluwwin waʔiisraaːfin θm ʔamaːth fʔaqbrh ʔaʕtqd ʔanh jnbʁj ʕljk ʔan tqrʔah bnfsk aːlʁaːja tbrr aːlwsjla bal quluwbuhum fij ʁamraain min haðaaː walahum ʔaaʕmaaːlun min duwni ðalika hum lahaaː ʕaaːmiluwna kaaːna dˤaʶlaʶaʶːluʶhuʶ mustaħkimanaː waraʃaaːduhu mustaʕbadaaː qaaːla fabimaaː ʔaaʁwajtanij laʔaaqʕudanna lahum sˤiʶraʶaʶːtˤaʶkaʶ aːlmustaqijma mnnaːd ʔaʶbjdˤ ʔanaː ʔaʕrf hðaː aːlwld aːlðj ʔant laː tʕrfh qd ʔaflħ mn zkaːhaː laː aːrjd aːzʕaːd͡ʒk wljmħsˤ aːllh aːlðjn ʔaːmnwaː wjmħq aːlkaːfrjn aːdfaʕ biaːllatij hija ʔaaħsanu aːlssajiʔiaaa naħnu ʔaaʕlamu bimaaː jaʶsˤiʶfuʶwnaʶ waʔiinnaka laʕalaaː χuluqin ʕaʶðˤiʶjmiʶn ðlk aːld͡ʒbn ljs ʔaʶsˤfraʶː klbj ʔaʶbjdˤ ʔaʶðˤnk stwaːfq ʕajnanaː fijhaaː tusammaaː salsabijlanaː hl bʔimkaːnj aːlχrwd͡ʒ lʔalʕb ħjn ʔasmʕ hðh aːlʔaʁnja fʔinnj ʔafkr bk wʔaftqdk ðaːk krsjj aʶːlmfdˤl aːllaðijna juqijmuwna aʶːlsˤsˤaʶlaʶaʶːaʶaʶ wamimmaaː razaqnaaːhum junfiquwna tbluʁu aːlsiimaaːk tblʁu aːlsiimaaːk maʶwtˤiʶniʶj maʶwtˤiʶniʶj θm d͡ʒʕl nslh mn slaːla mn maːʔ mhjn waʔaammaaː aːlmunaaːsibuwna fahum min ʕadaaː aːlʔaːbaaːʔi waaːlʔaabnaaːʔi mimman jard͡ʒiʕu biʶtaʶʕsˤiʶjbiʶn ʔaaw raħimin hl trjdjn fnd͡ʒaːnaː ʔaːχr mn aːlʃaːj maː ʔamlk hw aʶːlnsˤf mqaːrna bʕdd aːlktb aːltj jmlkhaː hw θumma jakuwnu ʕalaqaaan miθla ðlika θumma jakuwnu muʶdˤʁaʶaʶaʶn miθla ðlika ʔinhu ʃaːb d͡ʒdaːan mftaːħ mnzl ljlaː aːlðj hw ʕnd saːmj ʁjr sˤaʶːlħ nħtaːd͡ʒ aːlaː mlaːjjn aːld͡ʒml aʶːlmntˤwqaʶ baːllʁa aːlʕrbja waaːlfad͡ʒri fraːʁ ʔilaː ʔahlh fd͡ʒaːʔ bʕd͡ʒl smjn wadaaːʕij aːlwad͡ʒhi aːlʔaawwali huwa aːlrraʁbaau hl ldjk aːlm fj aːsnaːnk wajastaʕd͡ʒiluwnaka biaːlʕaðaaːbi walawlaaː ʔaad͡ʒalun musammanaː lad͡ʒaaːʔahumu aːlʕaðaaːbu walajaʔatijannahum baʁtaaan wahum laaː jaʃʕuruwna wmaː jfʕlwaː mn χjr fln jkfrwh waːllh ʕljm baːlmtqjn aːlmawta ʔiillaaː aːlmawtaaa aːlʔauwlaaː wawaqaaːhum ʕaðaaːba aːld͡ʒaħijmi laqad waʶsˤaʶlwaʶː ʔilaː hadafahum wqaːl ʔinj ðaːhb ʔilaː rbj sjhdjn kaːn aːlmkaːn haːdʔiaːan ʔaqrʔa ktaːbk ʔanaː fχwra aːlrrumuwzi maʕnanaː sˤaʶħiʶjħaʶnaʶː waʕilmanaː mustafaaːdanaː laχarad͡ʒa min aːlrramzi aːlχafijji ʔilaaː aːlʕilmi aːld͡ʒalijji laː td͡ʒaːdl waːnt ʁdˤbaʶːn wlaː tʔakl waːnt ʃbʕaːn nħn mslmwn aːlkθjr wajaχʃaaː min qillaai ðihnihi wabuʕdi fiʶtˤnaʶtiʶhiʶ laː nstˤjʕuʶ msaːʕdtak ʔilaːaː aːðaː saːʕdtnaː wamina aːlnnaaːsi man jud͡ʒaaːdilu fij aːlllahi biʁajri ʕilmin wajattabiʕu kulla ʃaʶjtˤaʶaʶːniʶn marijdin wʔaʶsˤħaʶːb aːlʔajka wqwm tbʕ kl kðb aːlrsl fħq wʕjd jsttˤjʕ twm aʶːlrkdˤ bsrʕa aːbħθ ʕn qtˤj tħt aːlsrjr ʔinhaː ʁaʶːdˤbaʶ wʔan ʔaqjmwaː aʶːlsˤlaʶːaʶ waːtqwh whw aːlðj ʔiljh tħʃrwn aːsmħ lj baːlðhaːb ʔiinnamaaː ʔiilahukumu aːlllahu aːllaðij laaː ʔiilaha ʔiillaaː huwa wasiʕa kulla ʃajʔin ʕilmanaː kðbt θmwd wʕaːd baːlqaːrʕa twm jʕrf maː swf jħdθ man kaaːna jurijdu aːlħajaaːaa aːlddunjaaː wazijnatahaaː nuwaffi ʔiilajhim ʔaaʕmaaːlahum fijhaaː wahum fijhaaː laaː jubχasuwna ttbʕ ʔamj ħmjaan qalbun ʕarafa aːlllaha ʕazza wad͡ʒalla θumma ʕaʶsˤaʶaʶːhuʶ aːltrd͡ʒma mhmma sˤʕbaʶ waʶaʶːlʔiʶiʶʁdˤaʶaʶːʔuʶ ʕan taʶqsˤiʶjriʶn ʔin kaaːna ʔinhu jtħdθ ʕlaː aːltljfwn lm jʔat ʔaħd lmsaːʕdtj maː ʔaʁnaː ʕnj maːljh wlqd ʔaːtjnaː mwsaː aːlktaːb flaː tkn fj mrja mn lqaːʔih wd͡ʒʕlnaːh hdaː lbnj ʔisraːʔijl waʔaazlafnaaː θamma aːlʔaːχarijna aːrd͡ʒʕj ʔilaː rbk raʶːdˤjaʶ mrdˤjaʶ wamin aːlʕilmi taʶfdˤiʶjluʶ d͡ʒamijʕi aːlʕilmi waqaaːla aʶːlmaʶnsˤuʶwruʶ liʃarijkin waman naʶðˤaʶraʶ bihaaː baʶsˤiʶraʶthuʶ jaʕrifuwna niʕmata aːlllahi θumma junkiruwnahaaː waʔaakθaruhumu aːlkaaːfiruwna ʔaħb aːlkʕk lilkaaːfirijna lajsa lahu daaːfiʕun faʔaaraaːduwaː bihi kajdanaː fad͡ʒaʕalnaaːhumu aːlʔaasfalijna faʔiinna likulli ʕilmin fuʶsˤuʶwlaʶnaʶː muðhilaaan waʃuðuwranaː muʃʁilaaan waman kaaːna takallufuhu ʁajra maħduwdin faʔaaχliq bihi ʔaan jaʶdˤiʶllaʶ waʶjuʶdˤiʶllaʶ dmʕa tsjl wʃmʕa tntˤfj dʕjnj ʔaʕrf jʕðˤkm aːllh ʔan tʕwdwaː lmθlh ʔabdaː ʔin kntm mʔumnjn waʶlaʶfðˤaʶhaʶaʶː summun lijakun ʁaʶraʶdˤuʶk fij aːttiχaaːði aːlʔiiχwaaːni waʶaʶːsˤtˤiʶnaʶaʶːʕiʶ aʶːlnnuʶsˤaʶħaʶaʶːʔiʶ takθijra aːlʕuddaai laaː takθijra aːlʕiddaai aːms kaːn aʶːltˤqs d͡ʒmjlaː d͡ʒdaːan ʃʕwrhaː lh kaːn mtbaːdlaːan tm nsˤħhhaʶː mn qblh lltχlj ʕn aːltdχjn aːllħm md͡ʒmd aːlaːθnjn baːlnsba lj hw ʔakθr aːlʔajaːm multaʔiimaaan jtzaːjd ħd͡ʒmh baːstmraːr aːlʔid͡ʒaːbaːt aːltj qdmhaː mqraːb haːbl d͡ʒlbt mʕhaː tsaːʔulaːt ʔakθr ʔiinna aːllaðijna kafaruwaː baʕda ʔiijmaaːnihim θumma aːzdaaːduwaː kufranaː lan tuqbala tawbatuhum waʔauwlaʔiika humu aʶːldˤdˤaʶaʶːluʶwnaʶ bʕd ðˤuʶhr hðaː aːljwm sjkwn ldjnaː mqaːbla aʶːχfdˤwaʶː rʔuwskm twm wmaːrj d͡ʒaːraːn hnaːk d͡ʒzr fj aːlbħr wkðbwaː waːtbʕwaː ʔahwaːʔhm wkl ʔamr mstqr aʶːlssuʶltˤaʶaʶːnuʶ ðˤiʶlluʶ aːlllahi fij aʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤiʶ jaʔawij ʔilajhi kullu maʶðˤluʶwmiʶn ðlk jtwqf ʕlaː aːlsjaːq aːχtfaː aːlθld͡ʒ qaaːla lilmalaʔii ħawlahu ʔiinna haðaaː lasaaːħirun ʕalijmun θm fj slsla ðrʕhaː sbʕwn ðraːʕaː faːslkwh hdfj hw ʔan ʔakwn sʕjdaːan ʔin maː jdfʕnj llbkaːʔ wʔaðrf bsbbh aːldmwʕ laː tuʶsˤlħhuʶ ʔiðaː lm jkn mnksraːan χajru ʔaaʔiimmatikum aːllaðijna tuħibbuwnahum wajuħibbuwnakum qul lillaðijna ʔaːmanuwaː jaʁfiruwaː lillaðijna laaː jard͡ʒuwna ʔaajjaaːma aːlllahi lijad͡ʒzija qawmanaː bimaaː kaaːnuwaː jaksibuwna wafaʕalta faʕlataka aːllatij faʕalta waʔaanta mina aːlkaaːfirijna fʕqrwhaː fqaːl tmtʕwaː fj daːrkm θlaːθa ʔajaːm ðlk wʕd ʁjr mkðwb sʔaʕwd ʔilaː ʔastraːljaː bʕd ʁd wasamiʕa baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlzzuhaaːdi rad͡ʒulanaː jaquwlu liqawmin ʔaahlakakum aːlnnawmu rd͡ʒaːl aʶːlʔiʶtˤfaʶːʔ jχaʶːtˤrwn bħjaːthm ʔanaː qlt ʃjʔiaː wd͡ʒʕlt lh maːlaː mmdwdaː aːllh aːlðj sχr lkm aːlbħr ltd͡ʒrj aːlflk fjh bʔamrh wltbtʁwaː mn fdˤlh wlʕlkm tʃkrwn fʔaχðhm aːlʕðaːb ʔin fj ðlk dd͡ʒaːd͡ʒ mn fdˤlk falaaː tuχaaːlifhu fij mijzaaːnihi wħnaːnaː mn ldnaː wzkaːa wkaːn tqjaː numattiʕuhum qalijlanaː θumma naʶdˤtˤaʶrruʶhuʶm ʔiilaaː ʕaðaaːbin ʁaʶliʶjðˤiʶn lqd smʕt ʔan twm tzwd͡ʒ baːmrʔaa θrja wd͡ʒdth naːʔimaː fj bjth fakajfa ʔiiðaaː d͡ʒiʔinaaː min kulli ʔaummaain biʃahijdin wad͡ʒiʔinaaː bika ʕalaaː haʔuulaaːʔi ʃahijdanaː rb hb lj ħkmaː wʔalħqnj baʶːlsˤaʶːlħjn wafaaːkihaain mmimaaː jataχajjaruwna rʔasaː jʔulmnaː qljlaː waʶaʶːχfiʶdˤ lahumaaː d͡ʒanaaːħa aːlððuli mina aːlrraħmaai waqul rabbi aːrħamhumaaː kamaaː rabbajaaːnij sˤaʶʁiʶjraʶnaʶː ʔinna min ʔaʶaʶfdˤaʶliʶ aːlʔaaʕmaaːli kalimaaa ħaqqin ʕinda suʶltˤaʶaʶːniʶn d͡ʒaaːʔiirin wʔalqj aːlsħra saːd͡ʒdjn ʔalaː tbaːlj ʔin dχnt ʔiðaː mmkn ʔawd ʔan ʔastlm d͡ʒwaːb walaqad fatannaaː qablahum qawma firʕawna wad͡ʒaaːʔahum rasuwlun karijmun waʶːsˤl aːlmʃj lftra ʔaafaman kaaːna ʕalaaː bajjinaain min rabbihi kaman zujjina lahu suwʔu ʕamalihi waaːttabaʕuwaː ʔaahwaaːʔahum sʔalnj aːlsjd saːtw ʕda ʔasʔila ħwl aːlaːntχaːbaːt ʔinh wħjd lm tʕd hðh aːlklma mstʕmlaan ʔiinnaaː kafajnaaːka aːlmustahziʔiijna tklm aːn ʃftjk ħmraːʔ ʔinaː nħn nzlnaː aːlðkr wʔinaː lh lħaʶːfðˤwn maː zlt ʔaħbhaː stħbhaː qrjbaː sjkwn hnaːk bʕd ʕʃr dqaːʔiq walaaː budda lilmuktasibi min ʔaawqaaːti aːstiraaːħaain waʔaajjaaːmi ʕuʶtˤlaʶaʶiʶn waminhaaː maaː huwa ʁaʶaʶːmiʶdˤuʶn ʔafhm lʁtk ʔaχj jskn fj tˤwkjw laː ʔaʕrf maː ʔafʕluhu ʁdaːan mðaːq hðaː aːlmaːʔ tˤjb wamalbasuhu ħaraaːmun waʁuððija biaːlħaraaːma faʔaannaaː justad͡ʒaaːbu lahu ʔin jwm aʶːlfsˤl kaːn mjqaːtaː maaː dˤaʶllaʶ sˤaʶaʶːħiʶbuʶkuʶm wamaaː ʁawaaː faːtqwaː aːllh wʔaʶtˤjʕwn lm ʔakn ʔarjd ʔan ʔaħdθ ʔaja dˤd͡ʒaʶ ðalika faʶdˤluʶ aːlllahi juʔutijhi man jaʃaaːʔu waaːlllahu ðuw aʶːlfaʶdˤliʶ aʶːlʕaʶðˤiʶjmiʶ ʔalqt kaːjt nðˤraʶ ʕlaː krjs θm td͡ʒaːhlth aːlʃjʔ aːlðj d͡ʒʕlh jħzn walilfaraaːʁi zajʁun ʔaaw nadamun walaaː jumkinu fijhaaː lubθun tlk ʔiðaː qsma dˤjzaʶː waʶtaʶsˤiʶluʶ wiʶsˤaʶaʶːlaʶ aːlmaluwli ʕasaaː ʔaan jahdijani rabbij liʔaaqraba min haðaaː raʃadanaː waʔiin lam jad͡ʒib ʕalajhi aːlðj jwsws fj sˤdwr aːlnaːs maː aːlðj jubaθθu aːlʔaːn waqaaːla aʶːld͡ʒaʶaʶːħiʶðˤuʶ ʔanaː laː ʔarjd ʔan jkwn hnaːk ʔaj swʔ fhm wamina aːlnnaaːsi man jaquwlu ʔaːmannaaː biaːlllahi wabiaːljawmi aːlʔaːχiri wamaaː hum bimuʔuminijna ʔanaː ʔaʶtttˤlʕ lħfla ʕjd aːlqdjsjjn χaʶːsˤtk fʔinhm lʔaːklwn mnhaː fmaːlʔiwn mnhaː aʶːlbtˤwn dʕjnaː nqsm aːlfaːtwra bʔarbʕa tˤrq mn aʶːlmftrdˤ ʔan jkwn twm hnaː fj aːlʕaːʃra laː faːʔida mn aːlbkaːʔ fln jsmʕk ʔaħd ʔaħs baːlbrd ʔinaː lmʁrmwn ʔajn ʁrfa aʶːltˤʕaʶːm qaːl fʕlthaː ʔiðaː wʔanaː mn aʶːldˤaʶːljn aːlzud͡ʒaːd͡ʒa ʕlaː aːlrf man ʃaaːʔa ʔaan jattaχiða ʔiilaaː rabbihi sabijlanaː w lħb djnnaː waːlʕaːlm qljl fj aːld͡ʒjb χjr mn kθjr fj aːlʁjb ʔanaː aːmrʔaa biʕamalihim waʶjuʶbʁiʶdˤuʶ aʶːltˤtˤaʶaʶːliʶħiʶjnaʶ wahuwa minhum flmaː blʁaː md͡ʒmʕ bjnhmaː nsjaː ħwthmaː faːtχð sbjlh fj aːlbħr srbaː tʕjʃ aːlʔajaːʔil fj bjʔiaːt mχtlfa falaʔiin kunnaaː muqirrijna ʔinnaaː liħamqaaː walaʔiin maː zaːʁ aʶːlbsˤr wmaː tˤʁaʶː laː ʃk fj ʔan aːlʔisbraːntw mdˤjʕaʶ wqt kbjra χalaqa aːlssamaaːwaaːti waʶaʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤaʶ biaːlħaqqi taʕaaːlaaː ʕammaaː juʃrikuwna nħn daːʔimaːan knnaː ʔaʶsˤdqaʶːʔ waruwija ʕan mud͡ʒaaːhidin fij qawlh taʕaaːlaaː hl trjdjnj ħqaːan ʔan ʔafʕl hðaː qaːl djmaː bnbra χd͡ʒila ʔaħtaːd͡ʒ bʕdˤ aːlmaːl ʔaːsf lkn laː jmknnj ħdˤwr aːlʔid͡ʒtmaːʕ ʃχsˤjaʶː waʶjaʶtaʶʕaʶaʶːtˤaʶaʶː ʕilma maaː aːuχtulifa fijhi duwna maaː aːuttufiqa ʕalajhi rʔajt dˤwʔaʶː fj nhaːja aːlnfq aːlðjn kfrwaː lhm ʕðaːb ʃdjd waːlðjn ʔaːmnwaː wʕmlwaː aʶːlsˤaʶːlħaʶːt lhm mʁfra wʔad͡ʒr kbjr hðaː aːlqaːmws laː jnfʕ lʃjʔ walaqad fatannaaː aːllaðijna min qablihim falajaʕlamanna aːlllahu aːllaðijna sˤaʶdaʶquʶwaʶː walajaʕlamanna aːlkaaːðibijna hðaː ʃjʔ aːrjd aːn aːʕmlh lwħdj qaːla θumma aʶːntˤaʶlaʶqaʶ falabiθtu malijjanaːθuma qaːla lj ʔiinna rabbaka huwa ʔaaʕlamu biman dˤaʶllaʶ ʕan sabijlihi wahuwa ʔaaʕlamu biaːlmuhtadijna kun lilwuddi ħaʶaʶːfiʶðˤaʶnaʶː waʔiin lam tad͡ʒid muʶħaʶaʶːfiʶðˤaʶnaʶː smmaːh ʔaʶsˤdqaʶːʔuʶh tid aːlmrʔaa lhaː χdwd d͡ʒmjla θumma nuʶsˤħuʶhuʶ fij aːlssiri waaːlʕalaaːnijaai wamaaː ʔaanta ʔiillaaː baʃarun miθlunaaː waʔiin naʶðˤuʶnnuʶkaʶ lamina aːlkaaːðibijna fahaðaaː ʔaaʕdalu aːlʔiiχwaaːni qaːl twm ʔanh laː jħlm ʔabdaː walajsa tattafiqu ʔaaħwaaːlu d͡ʒamijʕihim ʕalaaː ħaddin waaːħidin fajasbiqa ʕalajhi aːlkitaaːbu fajaʕmala biʕamali ʔaahli aːlnnaaːri fjadχulahaaː watamahhadat ladajhi ʔaaħwaaːlu man χabarahu ʔiinnij wad͡ʒd͡ʒahtu wad͡ʒhija lillaðij faʶtˤaʶraʶ aːlssamaaːwaaːti waʶaʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤaʶ ħanijfanaː wamaaː ʔaanaaː mina aːlmuʃrikijna waqaaːluwaː jaaː ʔaajjuha aːlssaaːħiru aːdʕu lanaaː rabbaka bimaaː ʕahida ʕindaka ʔiinnanaaː lamuhtaduwna ʔajn sˤndwq aːlbrjd wʔarslnaːh ʔilaː maːʔia ʔalf ʔaw jzjdwn kaːn aʶːlmnðˤr mn qma hðaː aːlmbnaː raːʔiʕaː lmaːðaː ʔant ʁjr mħbwb hnaː jaː ʔilhj ʔinhaː fwdˤaʶː ʕaːrma χtˤth χtˤraʶ ʔaraː ʔan hðaː aːlmʕd͡ʒm mfjd llmbtdʔijn maː qtˤʕtm mn ljna ʔaw trktmwhaː qaːʔima ʕlaː ʔaʶsˤwlhaʶː fbʔiðn aːllh wljχzj aːlfaːsqjn wʔinh lðkr lk wlqwmk wswf tsʔalwn ʔinh kaːn frjq mn ʕbaːdj jqwlwn rbnaː ʔaːmnaː faːʁfr lnaː waːrħmnaː wʔant χjr aːlraːħmjn maaː lij walilwaladi walaqad ʔaʶaʶdˤaʶllaʶ minkum d͡ʒibillanaː kaθijranaː ʔaafalam takuwnuwaː taʕqiluwna laː ʔaʕlm ʔin kaːn aːlʔisbwʕ aːlqaːdm wlkn ʔanaː ħqaːan laː ʔaʶtttˤlʕ lhðaː laː jsʔam aːlʔinsaːn mn dʕaːʔ aːlχjr wʔin msh aːlʃr fjʔiws qnwtˤ ʔawfjaːʔ mn kraːmi aːlʕrb ʔam lh aːlbnaːt wlkm aːlbnwn fij samuwmin waħamijmin fʃaːrbwn ʃrb aːlhjm hl ldjk ħbjba mtaː trjd zjaːrtnaː ʔaʶʕtˤnj kl aʶːltfaʶːsˤjl lqd ʔistχdm rʔash waqaaːla ħammaaːdu ʕad͡ʒradu ʔaʶħdˤiʶr aːlmusaːʕda ʔiinnahaaː saaːʔat mustaqarranaː wamuqaaːmanaː ʕalaaː saaːlifi aːldduhuwri min ðalika mutaʕad͡ʒd͡ʒibijna wabihi muʕtabirijna ħattaaː qijla libazard͡ʒamhara ʔawd ʔan ʔaðhb ʔilaː aːlħfl jaʕlamu maaː bajna ʔaajdijhim wamaaː χalfahum waʔiilaaː ʔaʕtqd ʔanhaː stfhm hl tðkr aːlmdjna aːlðj wld bhaː hl jmknnj ʔan ʔasʔal ʔilaː ʔajn ʔanti ðaːhba ʔið qaːl lhm ʔaχwhm hwd ʔalaː ttqwn waman aːstafsada sˤaʶdiʶjqaʶhuʶ naʶqaʶsˤaʶ min ʕadadihi waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlʔaalibbaaːʔi judillu biʶaʶːltˤtˤaʶaʶːʕaʶaʶiʶ aʶːlʕaʶaʶːsˤiʶj wajansaaː ʕaʶðˤiʶjmaʶ aʶːlmaʶʕaʶaʶːsˤiʶj wʔin mn ʔahl aːlktaːb ʔilaː ljʔumnn bh qbl mwth wjwm aːlqjaːma jkwn ʕljhm ʃhjdaː
