waʶaʶːliʶaʶːχtiʶlaʶaʶːtˤuʶ wahaðaaː qawlu mud͡ʒaaːhidin hw qrʔa trd͡ʒma aːlqrʔaːn baːlʕbrja faː ʔaql mn ʔisbwʕ fqdt aːbnhaː aːlwħjd fj ħaːdθ mrwrj waʔiinnaaː lanaʕlamu ʔaanna minkum mukaððibijna hw ʔakl aːltfaːħa kl ʔinsaːn ldjhi aːlħq fj aːlħjaːa whðaː jʕnj ʔanhu ldjhi aːlħq ljsˤnʕ ħjaːa mrjħa tħtaːd͡ʒ draːd͡ʒtj ʔilaː tsˤljħ baːlfʕl wamaaː ʕamma bihi aʶːlsˤsˤaʶlaʶaʶːħuʶ ʔin wud͡ʒida wʔinh lfj zbr aːlʔawljn whl ʔataːk ħdjθ mwsaː bdʔat fj aːlʔiʃʕaːʕ bfdˤl ʕmlja ʔiʕaːda aːltrkjb ʔaawlaaː min ʔaan jakuwna bihaaː mud͡ʒaaːwizanaː ʔanta ldjka ʔanf kbjr waaːlmuʔuaddij ʔilaaː aːlqanaaːʕaai waaːlkafaaːfi fakuluwaː mimmaaː ʁanimtum ħalaaːlanaː tˤaʶjjiʶbaʶnaʶː waaːttaquwaː aːlllaha ʔiinna aːlllaha ʁafuwrun raħijmun ʔin aːlðjn aːtqwaː ʔiðaː mshm tˤaʶːʔiʶf mn aʶːlʃjtˤaʶːn tðkrwaː fʔiðaː hm mbsˤrwn qaːlt lh ʔanh kaːn mħqaː qul juħjijhaaː aːllaðij ʔaanʃaʔaahaaː ʔaawwala marraain wahuwa bikulli χalqin ʕalijmun falammaaː raʔaaaː qaʶmiʶjsˤaʶhuʶ qudda min duburin qaaːla ʔiinnahu min kajdikunna ʔiinna kajdakunna ʕaʶðˤiʶjmuʶn wakaθijrahu ʔaaʃbahu ʃajʔin bikaθijrihi hj tmdˤj wqtaː tˤwjlaʶː ttmrrn ʕlaː ʕzf aːlbjaːnw qijla ʔinna aʶːlχaʶtˤtˤaʶ aːlħasana lajazijdu aːlħaqqa wuʶdˤuʶwħaʶnaʶː walima qaaːla ʔaʶsttˤjʕ ʔan ʔaraː aːlnwr kaːn mtfwqaː fj aːlmwsjqaː ħtaː fj tˤfwlth hmaː fj aːlʁrfa tʕbt mn aːlktaːba wlw ftħnaː ʕljhm baːbaː mn aːlsmaːʔ fðˤlwaʶː fjh jʕrd͡ʒwn mzqt aʶːlsˤħjfaʶ ʔilaː qtˤʕ laː ʃjʔ baːmkaːnh zʕzʕa aʶːlsˤdaʶːqaʶːt aːlħqjqja jubaʃʃiruhum rabbuhum biraħmaain minhu waʶriʶdˤwaʶaʶːniʶn wad͡ʒannaaːtin lahum fijhaaː naʕijmun muqijmun ʔaflm jdbrwaː aːlqwl ʔam d͡ʒaːʔhm maː lm jʔat ʔaːbaːʔhm aːlʔawljn ʔamr sχjf ʔan jbðr maːlh ʕlaː hðh aːltfaːhaːt aːttaqi aːllha ħajθumaaː kunta waʔaatbiʕi aːlssajiʔiaaa aːlħasanaaa tamħuhaaː waχaaːliqi aːlnnaaːsa biχuluqin ħasanin ʔiinna lakum fijhi lamaaː taχajjaruwna kjn jrjd draːd͡ʒa maː aːlðj jʕd͡ʒbk bʃʔanj ʔanta lst fj wdˤʕ jsmħ lkj tsʔal ʕn ʔaj ʃʔi faʔaarsala firʕawnu fij aːlmadaaːʔiini ħaaːʃirijna hl ttħdθ aːlʕbrja nfðt tˤaʶːqaʶ ljlaː nhaːʔijjaː wʔið qlnaː llmlaːʔika aːsd͡ʒdwaː lʔaːdm fsd͡ʒdwaː ʔilaː ʔibljs qaːl ʔaʔasd͡ʒd lmn χlqt tˤjnaʶː ʔabwh jnaːdjh twm waʶjaʶnsˤuʶraʶkaʶ aːlllahu naʶsˤraʶnaʶː ʕazijzanaː laː ʔaʃk fj qdrth ʕlaː fʕlhaː ʔanaː ʔatʕllm aʶːlsˤsˤjnjaʶ fajanbaʁij ʔaan juzijla tilka aːlʃʃubhaaa ʕan nafsihi biaːlssuʔuaaːli waʶaʶːlnnaʶðˤaʶriʶ whw aːlðj ʔanʃʔa lkm aːlsmʕ waʶːlʔaʶbsˤaʶːr waːlʔafʔida qljlaː maː tʃkrwn mtaː ʕljnaː ʔan nðhb ʁjr msmwħ lk ʔan tħdˤr qtˤk ʔilaː aːlmdrsa walaaː lahu buddun min saddi aːlχallaai fijhaaː ʕinda ħaaːd͡ʒatihi waʶʕaʶraʶdˤnaʶaʶː d͡ʒahannama jawmaʔiiðin lilkaaːfirijna ʕaʶrdˤaʶnaʶː wnmaːrq msˤfwfaʶ waʃarawhu biθamanin baχsin daraaːhima maʕduwdaain wakaaːnuwaː fijhi mina aːlzzaaːhidijna ʔinna aːlqalba ʔiðaaː ʕaliqa kaaːlrrahni ʔiðaaː ʁuliqa tˤwm laː jʕrf kjf jrbtˤ χjwtˤ ħðaːʔih wkʔajn mn daːba laː tħml rzqhaː aːllh jrzqhaː wʔijaːkm whw aːlsmjʕ aːlʕljm ʔinna walada aːlʁajraaː laaː jund͡ʒibu χalaqa aːlllahu aːlssamaaːwaaːti waʶaʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤaʶ biaːlħaqqi ʔiinna fij ðalika laʔaːjaaan lilmuʔuminijna laː χjr fj ħsn aːld͡ʒswm wtˤwlhaʶː ʔiðaː lm jzn tˤwl aːld͡ʒswm ʕqwl swf jʔaχðk ʔilaː mħtˤaʶ aːlħaːflaːt waʔiin naʃaʔa nuʁriqhum falaaː sˤaʶriʶjχaʶ lahum walaaː hum junqaðuwna lnʔakl aːlswʃj maː hw fnk aʶːlmfdˤl waʔiin jakaaːdu aːllaðijna kafaruwaː lajuzliquwnaka biʶʔaʶaʶbsˤaʶaʶːriʶhiʶm lammaaː samiʕuwaː aːlððikra wajaquwluwna ʔiinnahu lamad͡ʒnuwnun aːlðjn ʔaːtjnaːhm aːlktaːb jʕrfwnh kmaː jʕrfwn ʔabnaːʔhm aːlðjn χsrwaː ʔanfshm fhm laː jʔumnwn wtraː kθjraː mnhm jsaːrʕwn fj aːlʔiθm waːlʕdwaːn wʔaklhm aːlsħt lbʔis maː kaːnwaː jʕmlwn hj ktbt rsaːlaan hkðaː bdʔat aʶːlʕsˤwr aːlkwnja aʶːlmðˤlmaʶ llkwn faman faʕala ðalika minkum faaːlnnaaːru maθwaaːhu aːlʕks liʔaanna aːlnnaaːsa bihim jaqtaduwna wakaθijranaː maaː judaaːχiluhum aːlʔiiʕd͡ʒaaːbu litawaħħudihim biʶfaʶdˤiʶjlaʶaʶiʶ aːlʕilmi ʔaafalaaː jarawna ʔaallaaː jard͡ʒiʕu ʔiilajhim qawlanaː walaaː jamliku lahum dˤaʶrraʶnaʶː walaaː nafʕanaː qaaːla ʔaalqihaaː jaaː muwsaaː ʕljj ʔan ʔaʶtsˤl btwm waʶaʶːlttaʶwaʶsuʶtˤiʶ fij aːlttaqdijmi whw aːlʁfwr aːlwdwd wlʔin sʔalthm mn χlq aːlsmaːwaːt waʶːlʔaʶrdˤ ljqwln χlqhn aːlʕzjz aːlʕljm lijaslubuwhu faʶdˤiʶjlaʶaʶaʶ aːlttaqadumi wajamnaʕuwhu mubaaːjinaaa aʶːlttaʶχsˤiʶjsˤiʶ ʕinaaːdanaː limaaː d͡ʒahiluwhu wamaqtanaː limaaː baaːjanuwhu watakuwnu aːld͡ʒibaaːlu kaaːlʕihni qul kuwnuwaː ħid͡ʒaaːraaan ʔaaw ħadijdanaː wʔiinna aːllha ʔaamara aːlmuʔuminijna bimaaː ʔaamara bihi aːlmursalijna faqaaːla taʕaaːlaaː walammaaː balaʁa ʔaaʃuddahu waaːstawaaː ʔaːtajnaaːhu ħukmanaː waʕilmanaː wakaðalika nad͡ʒzij aːlmuħsinijna linuħjija bihi baldaaan majtanaː wanusqijahu mimmaaː χalaqnaaː ʔaanʕaaːmanaː waʔaanaaːsijja kaθijranaː waaːlʃʃarafu fij aːlttaʁaaːfuli χaf aːlllaha biaːlnnahaaːri wanam biaːlllajli ʔawh laː qd aːχtfaː d͡ʒwaːz sfrj aːstlf bn ħmjd mn bqaːl kaːn ʕlaː baːb daːrh drhmjn wʔarbʕ ħbaːt ʃʕjr laː ʔaʶsttˤjʕ tħdθ aːlʔind͡ʒljzja bʃkl d͡ʒjd miθlihi bismi aːlllahi aːlrraħmani aːlrraħijmi wajlun likulli humazaain lumazaain hll ʔaʶtsˤlt lj bsjaːra ʔad͡ʒra hl stʕwd ʁdaː ljbjn lhm aːlðj jχtlfwn fjh wljʕlm aːlðjn kfrwaː ʔanhm kaːnwaː kaːðbjn kaːnt χtˤbaʶ twm mmtaːza ðhb aːlʔastaːð ʔitw ʔilaː aːlwlaːjaːt aːlmtħda ljdrs aːllsaːnjaːt nħn nsmʕ sˤrjr aːlfʔiraːn ʔatχðnaːhm sχrjaː ʔam zaːʁt ʕnhm aʶːlʔaʶbsˤaʶːr fʔand͡ʒjnaːh wʔaʶsˤħaʶːb aːlsfjna wd͡ʒʕlnaːhaː ʔaːja llʕaːlmjn surirtu bnd͡ʒaːħika rbmaː stʔatj kl tfaːħa ħmraːʔ aːlmaːʔ raːʔiʕ km ktaːbaːan qrʔat nħn ʔaʃrqnaː fjaː ʃms ʔaʁrbj rabbi aːrd͡ʒiʕuwni laʕallij ʔaaʕmalu sˤaʶaʶːliʶħaʶnaʶː fijmaaː taraktu laaː jaʕðilu muʔuminun muʔuminaaan ʕmrhaː θmaːnja snwaːt qul ʔiinnij lan jud͡ʒijranij mina aːlllahi ʔaaħadun walan ʔaad͡ʒida min duwnihi multaħadanaː bwrkt ʔaʶrdˤ aːlfraːtjn wtˤn waʔaadχalnaaːhum fij raħmatinaaː ʔiinnahum mina aʶːlsˤsˤaʶaʶːliʶħiʶjnaʶ wnʕma kaːnwaː fjhaː faːkhjn waaːlwaladu aːlssuwʔu jaʃijnu aːlssalafa wajahdimu aːlʃʃarafa tbdw htumj sʕjda d͡ʒdaːan mn tkwnjii wmaː jʔatjhm mn ðkr mn aːlrħmn mħdθ ʔilaː kaːnwaː ʕnh mʕrdˤjn maːðaː jrjd wqaːlwaː ʔaːmnaː bh wʔanaː lhm aːltnaːwʃ mn mkaːn bʕjd waʔiiðaaː aːlbiħaaːru sud͡ʒd͡ʒirat lqd χntjnj ðlkm bmaː kntm tfrħwn fj aʶːlʔaʶrdˤ bʁjr aːlħq wbmaː kntm tmrħwn ljs hw ʔibnj wlkn ʔanaː waːldh ðalika biʔaanna aːlllaha nazzala aːlkitaaːba biaːlħaqqi waʔiinna aːllaðijna aːχtalafuwaː fij aːlkitaaːbi lafij ʃiqaaːqin baʕijdin θm jd͡ʒzaːh aːld͡ʒzaːʔ aːlʔawfaː aːlʔinsaːn ldjh aːlqdra ʕlaː aːlklaːm ʔanti ldjki rʔuja ʔaʶfdˤl mnaː kullu ðalika kaaːna sajjiʔiuhu ʕinda rabbika makruwhanaː waʔaammaaː aʶːlqaʶaʶːsiʶtˤuʶwnaʶ fakaaːnuwaː lid͡ʒahannama ħaʶtˤaʶbaʶnaʶː hl tʕrfwn sfjna nwħ wlqd jsrnaː aːlqrʔaːn llðkr fhl mn mdkr faqaaːla ʔiinnij saqijmun waman χaffat mawaaːzijnuhu faʔauwlaʔiika aːllaðijna χasiruwaː ʔaanfusahum fij d͡ʒahannama χaaːliduwna hl ʁslt jdjk ʔaʶsqtˤt snd jlaː frda ħðaːʔhaː ql jwm aːlftħ laː jnfʕ aːlðjn kfrwaː ʔijmaːnhm wlaː hm jnðˤrwn qum faʔaanðir hw aʶːlʔaʶsˤʁr mn bjn kll ʔiχwaːnj w ʔaχwaːtj ʁslt nfsj bjt aːlsjd d͡ʒwnswn baːlqrb mn bjtj maaː ħasunat bik aːlħajaaːau waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlbulaʁaaːʔi sˤuʶħbaʶaʶuʶ aːlʔaaʃraaːri tuwriθu suwʔa aʶːlðˤðˤaʶniʶ biaːlʔaaχjaaːri nhzm aːlʃraa wnd͡ʒlj aʶːlʁaʶːsˤbjn knswrin aːld͡ʒwii ʔaw ʔausd aːlʕrjn ʔiið nad͡ʒd͡ʒajnaaːhu waʔaahlahu ʔaad͡ʒmaʕijna ʔauballiʁukum risaaːlaaːti rabbij waʔaanaaː lakum naʶaʶːsˤiʶħuʶn ʔaamijnun milk bid͡ʒdj d͡ʒwdn milkjχr χwʃi ʔaːrw sunwjmka aːik d͡ʒħaːn ldkjaː walaw kaaːnat fijhi faʶdˤiʶjlaʶaʶuʶn laʶχaʶsˤsˤaʶ aːlllahu bihi man aʶːsˤtˤaʶfaʶaʶːhuʶ lirisaaːlatihi maːðaː tbħθ hnaːk mlʔat aʶːlħwdˤ maːʔaː ʔanaː ʔatnaːwl ʁdaːʔij lm ʔaχbrh baːlħqjqa χʃja ʔan jʁdˤb qaaːla ʔaabaʃʃartumuwnij ʕalaaː ʔaan massanija aːlkibaru fabima tubaʃʃiruwna ʕzf ʕaːzf aːlbjaːnw mqaʶːtˤʕ ʔiʶdˤaʶːfjaʶ aːlðj ʔaʶtˤʕmhm mn d͡ʒwʕ wʔaːmnhm mn χwf jd͡ʒb ʔan laː tħkm ʕlaː aːlʔaːχrjn mn mðˤhrhm kaaːlrraʕijaai maʕa suʶltˤaʶaʶːniʶhaʶaʶː bdlanaː mn ðlk sʔantql ʔilaː nqaːʃ aːlmtʁjrjjan aʶːlaʶːqtsˤaʶːdjjjaʶn aːllðjn ʕrfthmaː qbl qljl ʕalajkum biaːlʔaabkaaːri faʔiinnahuna ʔaakθaru ħubbanaː waʔaaqallu χananaː tʕd͡ʒbnj ʔamθla ʃjʃjr ʔam jqwlwn tqwlh bl laː jʔumnwn jd͡ʒb ʔan tdrk bʔannaː ln nsttˤjʕ tqdjm jd aːlʕwn litunðira qawmanaː maaː ʔaunðira ʔaːbaaːʔuuhum fahum ʁaaːfiluwna laː ʔaʶðˤnnj sʔand͡ʒħ wfaːkha wʔabaː wabiaːld͡ʒazaʕi sˤaʶbraʶnaʶː hðaː hw sbb tʔaχrj fhmt kðbt qblhm qwm nwħ fkðbwaː ʕbdnaː wqaːlwaː md͡ʒnwn waːzdd͡ʒr waqaaːluwaː lawlaaː jaʔatijnaaː biʔaːjaain min rabbihi ʔaawalam taʔatihim bajjinaau maaː fij aʶːlsˤsˤuʶħuʶfiʶ aːlʔauwlaaː ʔant tkðb ʔaljs kðlk kajfa takfuruwna biaːlllahi wakuntum ʔaamwaaːtanaː faʔaaħjaaːkum θumma jumijtukum θumma juħjijkum θumma ʔiilajhi turd͡ʒaʕuwna waħurraaːsuhu fij aʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤiʶ aːllaðijna jaʶqbiʶdˤuʶwnaʶ ʔaarzaaːqahum jaðubbuwna ʕan aːlnnaaːsi walammaaː dˤuʶriʶbaʶ aːbnu marjama maθalanaː ʔiiðaaː qawmuka minhu jaʶsˤiʶdduʶwnaʶ ʔaaʔiiðaaː mitnaaː wakunnaaː turaaːbanaː waʶʕiʶðˤaʶaʶːmaʶnaʶː ʔaaʔiinnaaː lamadijnuwna walaw naʃaaːʔu laʔaarajnaaːkahum falaʕaraftahum bisijmaaːhum walataʕrifannahum fij laħni aːlqawli waaːlllahu jaʕlamu ʔaaʕmaaːlakum waaːllaðijna ʔiiðaaː ʔaʶaʶsˤaʶaʶːbaʶhuʶmuʶ aːlbaʁju hum jaʶntaʶsˤiʶruʶwnaʶ wʔiðaː aːnqlbwaː ʔilaː ʔahlhm aːnqlbwaː fkhjn jaʕnij ʔaaʕdaaːʔan fij aːld͡ʒaaːhilijjaai faʔaallafa bajna quluwbikum biaːlʔiislaaːmi ktb mʕ ʔaʶtˤjb aːltħjaːt fj ʔaːχr aːlrsaːla θm wqʕ aːsmh ʔawlʔik aːlðjn ħbtˤt ʔaʕmaːlhm fj aːldnjaː waːlʔaːχra wmaː lhm mn naʶːsˤrjn ʔanaː ʔaʶsˤʁr mnk bθlaːθa snwaːt laaː juʔuminuwna bihi waqad χalat sunnaau aːlʔaawwalijna lm ʔad͡ʒdh fj ʔaj mkaːn aʶːldˤħk mn ʁjr sbb mn qla aːlʔadb maːðaː tbħθ hnaːk ʔiinnaaː naħnu nazzalnaaː aːlððikra waʔiinnaaː lahu laʶħaʶaʶːfiʶðˤuʶwnaʶ aʶːtsˤl ʕlj ħjn trd͡ʒʕ faʶbiʶðˤuʶlmiʶn mina aːllaðijna haaːduwaː ħarramnaaː ʕalajhim tˤaʶjjiʶbaʶaʶːtiʶn ʔauħillat lahum waʶbiʶsˤaʶddiʶhiʶm ʕan sabijli aːlllahi kaθijranaː ʕud qrjbanaː faʁaʃʃaaːhaaː maaː ʁaʃʃaaː km aːntqdk ħsaːdk wbqjt ʃaːmχaːan kaːlʔahraːmaːt ʔaʶtwaʶːsˤwaʶː bh bl hm qwm tˤaʶːʁwn qul ʔaʶaʶtˤiʶjʕuʶwaʶː aːlllaha waaːlrrasuwla faʔiin tawallawaː faʔiinna aːlllaha laaː juħibbu aːlkaaːfirijna qd jkwn mrdˤhaʶː aʶːlsrtˤaʶːn kaːn mnnaːd d͡ʒmjlaː bismi aːlllahi aːlrraħmani aːlrraħijmi ʔiiðaaː aːlssamaaːʔu aʶːnfaʶtˤaʶraʶt waʶðˤiʶlliʶn mmin jaħmuwmin jaaː ʔauχta haaːruwna maaː kaaːna ʔaabuwki aːmraʔaa sawʔin wamaaː kaaːnat ʔaummuki baʁijjanaː ʔablaː fj aːlaːmtħaːn blaːʔan ħsnaː bunija aːlʔiislaːamu ʕalaaː χamsin ʃahaaːdaai ʔaan laːa ʔiilaha ʔiilaːaːa aːllhu waʔaanna muħammadanaː rasuwlu aːllhi fj ħaːl tʕtˤl brnaːmd͡ʒ mʕaːld͡ʒa aʶːlnsˤwsˤ ndˤmn lk tʕwjdˤh md͡ʒaːnaː ʔarjd maːʔaː saːχnaː ql ʔaðlk χjr ʔam d͡ʒna aːlχld aːltj wʕd aːlmtqwn kaːnt lhm d͡ʒzaːʔ wmsˤjraʶː waʔiiχlaaːlahu biaːlmasnuwni jamnaʕu min ʔikmaaːli aːlθθawaaːbi laː tnsaː ʔan tʔatj ʔilaː bjtj laχalqu aːlssamaaːwaaːti waʶaʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤiʶ ʔaakbaru min χalqi aːlnnaaːsi walakinna ʔaakθara aːlnnaaːsi laaː jaʕlamuwna hl tʕrf km ʕmr aːlsjda nkaːnw waʕaðaaːba aːlmud͡ʒtariʔii ʕalaaː maaː ʔaaqdama ʕalajhi min maʶʕaʶaʶːsˤiʶjhiʶ rqbtj tʔulmnj kθjraː hðh aːlʔajaːm fqtˤ ʔaχbrjnj maː aːlðj trjdjnhu hl ʔant mwd͡ʒwd fj aːlmnzl lqd qaːlt lh ʔanh kaːn mħqaːan wajakuwnu taaːraaan litaʕmijaain waʶmuʶwaʶaʶːdˤaʶʕaʶaʶiʶn jaʶqsˤiʶduʶ bihaaː aːlkaaːtibu ʔiχfaaːʔa ʁaʶraʶdˤiʶhiʶ fajakθuru kaaːlttaraaːd͡ʒimi mhlaː lħðˤaʶ hl bʔimkaːnk ʔan tʕtˤjhaʶː hðaː aːlkrsj aːlkθjr mn aʶːldˤʁtˤ rbmaː jʔudj ʔilaː mrdˤ ʕdˤwj aːltlaːmjð jdrswn fj aːlmdrsa ʔiinna lilmuttaqijna mafaaːzanaː ʔatħdθ ʕnk laaː mn ntˤfaʶ χlqh fqdrh twm kaːn qlbh mkswr ʕndmaː maːt klbh jaaː ʔaajjuhaaː aːlnnabiju ħasbuka aːlllahu wamani aːttabaʕaka mina aːlmuʔuminijna ʔanaː ʔaʁsl aːlʔawaːnj ʔaʶtˤlʕaʶ saːmj ljlaː rsaːla ftˤrt qlbh wlaː tmnn tstkθr wamin ʃarri aːliaːχtijaaːri sˤuʶħbaʶaʶuʶ aːlʔaaʃraaːri ʔanaː msʔuwl ʕn ħmaːjthaː fj st wʔarbʕjn sna bnj hðaː aːlhjkl wamaaː ʔaarsalnaaːka ʔiillaaː raħmaaan lilʕaaːlamijna ʕasaaː ʔaan jakuwna ħabijbak jawmanaː maaː ʔin aʶːlʔaʶtˤbaʶːq aːlχʃbja ʔaχf mn aʶːlʔaʶtˤbaʶːq aːlmʕdnja lkn aʶːlʔaʶtˤbaʶːq aːlwrqja hj aːlʔaχf waaːllaðijna jasʕawna fij ʔaːjaaːtinaaː muʕaaːd͡ʒizijna ʔauwlaʔiika fij aːlʕaðaaːbi muʶħdˤaʶruʶwnaʶ ʔaʶsˤbħ χaːlj ʁnjaː bfdˤl wraːqth laː ʔarjd aːlbkaːʔ ʔamaːmhu faʔiinna ðalika min simaaːti aʶːlfaʶdˤliʶ waʶʃuʶruʶwtˤiʶ aːlssuʔududi sʔaftqdk kθjranaː kamaaː qaaːla aːlʕabbaaːsu bnu aːlʔaaħnafi ʔaafaraʔaajtumu aːlllaaːta waaːlʕuzzaaː ql aːlħmd llh wslaːm ʕlaː ʕbaːdh aːlðjn aʶːsˤtˤfaʶː ʔaːllh χjr ʔamaː jʃrkwn ʔaktb bqlm aʶːlrsˤaʶːsˤ mn fdˤlk wlqd aːχtrnaːhm ʕlaː ʕlm ʕlaː aːlʕaːlmjn rbmaː ln nqdr ʕlaː ʃraːʔih sʔaʶχfdˤ θmnh ʔilaː aʶːlnsˤf wʔiðaː qrʔat aːlqrʔaːn d͡ʒʕlnaː bjnk wbjn aːlðjn laː jʔumnwn baːlʔaːχra ħd͡ʒaːbaː mstwraː bjtr hw rd͡ʒlaːan sˤaʶːdqaʶːaʶn ðˤlt tʕml fj aːlnhaːja ħl aːlχlaːf ʔin rbk jqdˤj bjnhm bħkmh whw aːlʕzjz aːlʕljm faʔaammaaː aːlmuksibaau lilwizri sʔaʶħdˤdˤr aːlqhwa waaːlqismu aːlθθaaːnij ʔin lm jkn mʕtˤlaʶː flaː daːʕj lʔan tsˤlħh faman taaːba min baʕdi ðˤuʶlmiʶhiʶ waʶʔaʶaʶsˤlaʶħaʶ faʔiinna aːlllaha jatuwbu ʕalajhi ʔiinna aːlllaha ʁafuwrun raħijmun faʶaʶːnðˤuʶr kajfa kaaːna ʕaaːqibaau makrihim ʔaannaaː dammarnaaːhum waqawmahum ʔaad͡ʒmaʕijna qul faʔatuwaː bikitaaːbin min ʕindi aːlllahi huwa ʔaahdaaː minhumaaː ʔaattabiʕhu ʔiin kuntum sˤaʶaʶːdiʶqiʶjnaʶ ʕmaː ttħdθn fqd rbaʶːtˤaʶ d͡ʒʔaʃh ʕnd rʔujth lbjth w hw jħtrq hl tðwqta aːlʔarz hj aːlmlħda hðaː bjt d͡ʒmjl aːlðj jsˤlaʶː aːlnaːr aːlkbraː wmn jʔath mʔumnaː qd ʕml aʶːlsˤaʶːlħaʶːt fʔawlʔik lhm aːldrd͡ʒaːt aːlʕlaː hnaːk qtˤ ʔaswd naːʔim ʕlaː aːlkrsj aʶːlʔaʶsˤfr flaː juʶwsˤiʶjkuʶm biaːlʔaaqrabi faaːlʔaaqrabi maː ʕsaːnj ʔan ʔafʕl wlnblwnkm ħtaː nʕlm aːlmd͡ʒaːhdjn mnkm waʶːlsˤaʶːbrjn wnblw ʔaχbaːrkm jaː ʔilhj ʔanaː laː ʔaʶsˤdq hðaː faʔaalqaaːhaaː faʔiiðaaː hija qarijbun min aːlmuħsinijna maaː lij ʔaaraaːkum tabnuwna maaː laaː taskunuwna lw knt ʔaχbrtak aːlħqjqa knta stufaːd͡ʒʔa nħn fj aːlnaːs d͡ʒmʕnaː wħdnaː w qlaːʕ aːlʕz jbnjhaː aːlrfaːq ramza aːlʕuruwbaa duʕjtu ʔilaː ħfla saːtʃikw faðuwquwaː ʕaðaaːbij wanuðuri kaːn saːmj raːʁbaː fj ʔind͡ʒaːb wld kj jrθ ʔismh w θrwth ðhb bdlaːan ʕn waːldh kjf kaːn aːmtħaːn aːljwm aːllaðij d͡ʒaʕala lakumu aʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤaʶ firaaːʃanaː waaːlssamaaːʔa binaaːʔan waʔaanzala mina aːlssamaaːʔi maaːʔan kjf hm aʶːltˤwaʶːrq qaaːla jaaː haaːruwnu maaː manaʕaka ʔiið raʔaajtahum dˤaʶlluʶwaʶː ʔaʶχtˤʔaʶt nfs χtˤʔiʶkaʶ aːlmra aːlsaːbqa rbnaː ʔaːmnaː bmaː ʔanzlt waːtbʕnaː aːlrswl faːktbnaː mʕ aːlʃaːhdjn ʔismh ʕzzh mnð kaːn aːld͡ʒdwd twm ljs tˤwjlaʶːaʶn d͡ʒdaːan kaððabat θamuwdu biaːlnnuðuri hðaː maː twʕdwn ljwm aːlħsaːb ʃkrʔa ʕlaː dʕwtka lj ʔilaː aːlħfla waʔaannaaː lammaaː samiʕnaaː aːlhudaaː ʔaːmannaaː bihi faman juʔumin birabbihi falaaː jaχaaːfu baχsanaː walaaː rahaqanaː klmaː bdt bʕjda ʕnaː klmaː zaːdt srʕa aːnħsaːrhaː ʔiinnahu ðˤaʶnnaʶ ʔaan lan jaħuwra swf tħðˤaʶː baːlmraːm baːtħaːdhm waːtħaːdj ʔaqltu ʃjʔianaː ʁbjjanaː wd͡ʒʕlnaː fjhaː d͡ʒnaːt mn nχjl wʔaʕnaːb wfd͡ʒrnaː fjhaː mn aːlʕjwn wabaaːkin naaːdimun ʕalaaː ðanbihi χajrun min dˤaʶaʶːħiʶkiʶn muʕtarifin bilahwihi bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm ʔalm nʃrħ lk sˤdrk ʕndmaː juqtl aːlnaːs jmwtwn wad͡ʒumiʕa aːlʃʃamsu waaːlqamaru ʔaam ħasiba aːllaðijna fij quluwbihim maʶraʶdˤuʶn ʔaan lan juχrid͡ʒa aːlllahu ʔaʶaʶdˤʁaʶaʶːnaʶhuʶm ʔiin huwa ʔiilaːaːa waħjun juwħaaː twm laː jnsaː ʔabdaː ʔan jqwl ʃkraː hw aːlðj jrjkm aːlbrq χwfaː wtˤmʕaʶː wjnʃʔi aːlsħaːb aːlθqaːl laː jʁrnk tqlb aːlðjn kfrwaː fj aːlblaːd laː nurjd laː nurjd ðulaanaaː aːlmuʔuabaadaː wʕajʃanaaː aːlmunakaadaː mn ʕrf nfsh fqd ʕrf rbh warafaʕnaaː laka ðikraka ʔaw qaːl maːt fqd kðb lqd ħdaqat bʕjnjn nsˤf muʶʁmdˤtjn waʔiinnaka latulaqqaaː aːlqurʔaːna min ladun ħakijmin ʕalijmin mn ntˤfaʶ ʔiðaː tmnaː θumma rudduwaː ʔiilaaː aːlllahi mawlaaːhumu aːlħaqqi ʔaalaaː lahu aːlħukmu wahuwa ʔaasraʕu aːlħaaːsibijna ʔanaː ʔaʶrfdˤ aːlmwaːfqa ʕlaː tlk aʶːlχtˤaʶ walam juχʃa minhu aːlnnakijru ʔaʶaʶjdˤaʶnaʶː lkn aːltlskwb aʶːlfdˤaʶːʔiʶj d͡ʒjms waːb jsftħ aːlʔabwaːb waːsʕa waʔaanʃada aːlrrijaaːʃiju liʶmuʶsˤʕaʶbiʶ bni ʕabdi aːlllahi qaaːluwaː ʔaʶaʶdˤʁaʶaʶːθuʶ ʔaaħlaaːmin wamaaː naħnu bitaʔawijli aːlʔaaħlaaːmi biʕaaːlimijna kl aːlʔawraːq aːlnqdja aːlʔamrjkja ldjhaː nfs aːllwn qaaːluwaː sanuraaːwidu ʕanhu ʔaabaaːhu waʔiinnaaː lafaaːʕiluwna lmaːðaː laː trjd ʔan tqwl lnaː aːlħqjqa law kaaːna min ʔaːbaaːʔiihi min malikin qultu rad͡ʒulun jaʶtˤluʶbuʶ mulka ʔaabijhi wmn aːlnaːs wamaaː bajnahumaaː wamaaː taħta aːlθθaraaː ktbwaː mʃrwʕ qaːnwn jχsˤ aʶːlsˤħaʶ waʔiiðaaː aːld͡ʒannaau ʔauzlifat lqd ksrt aːlbaːb lʔannj ʔaʶdˤʕt aːlmftaːħ walaaː tuʶtˤiʶʕ kulla ħallaaːfin mahijnin ln jwðˤfkm ʔaħd ʔanaː nsjt ʕnwaːn brjdj aːlʔilktrwnj θumma ðakara aːlrrad͡ʒula juʶtˤiʶjluʶ aːlssafara ʔaaʃʕaθa ʔaaʁbara mataaː jakuwnu ʕajʃu aːlddunjaaː ʔaalaðða qaaːla ʔaʕd͡ʒbnj hðaː aːlfjlm fsnjsrh aːlʔaːjaaːti lajasd͡ʒununnahu ħattaaː ħijnin ʔanaː mtʔakda ʔan twm sjkwn hnaː qrjbaːan laː jd͡ʒb ʕljk ʔan tqwl klaːmaː faːħʃaː ʕlaː aːltlfaːz qad taχallalta maslaka aːlrruwħi minnij wabihi summija aːlχalijlu χalijlanaː wnsˤrnaʶːhm fkaːnwaː hm aːlʁaːlbjn laː jmkn td͡ʒnb nʃwb aːlħrwb maːdaːm aːlʃʕb ʁjr mtʕlm kfaːja lqd ʔazʕd͡ʒtmwh ʔardtu ʔan ʔatʔakd ʔank stʔatj ʔilaː hnaː ʔaafabihaðaaː aːlħadijθi ʔaantum mudhinuwna waːlðj χlq aːlʔazwaːd͡ʒ klhaː wd͡ʒʕl lkm mn aːlflk waːlʔanʕaːm maː trkbwn qaːl rb aːlsmaːwaːt waʶːlʔaʶrdˤ wmaː bjnhmaː ʔin kntm mwqnjn wʔink ltdʕwhm ʔilaː sˤraʶːtˤ mstqjm qaaːla faʔiini aːttabaʕtanij falaaː tasʔaalnij ʕan ʃajʔin ħattaaː ʔauħdiθa laka minhu ðikranaː walaaː nukallifu nafsanaː ʔiillaaː wusʕahaaː waladajnaaː kitaaːbun jaʶntˤiʶquʶ biaːlħaqqi wahum laaː juʶðˤlaʶmuʶwnaʶ rd͡ʒaːʔan aːʁsl jdjk d͡ʒjdanaː qbl aːlʔakl naħnu laaː nurijdu ʔaan namuwta ħattaaː natuwba hl traː aːlʔab w aːlʔaum ʔanaː aːħtrmk ʔalaː tʕrf ʔaχtk aːlsbaːħa wanaħnu ʔausuwdu aːlwaʁaaː faaːʃhadij wuθuwba ʔausuwdiki jawma aʶːlsˤiʶiʶdaʶaʶːm wakaðalika nuʶfaʶsˤsˤiʶluʶ aːlʔaːjaaːti walitastabijna sabijlu aːlmud͡ʒrimijna ʔinhaː tdʕwnj bknd͡ʒj laː tnm waːlnwaːfð mftwħa ʕinda sidraai aːlmuntahaaː waaːlʔaaqlaaːma lahaaː ruʕaaːaan kl ʃjʔ fuqid lm jʔaðnj ʔaħd wmaː ʔarslwaː ʕljhm ħaʶːfðˤjn bl nħn mħrwmwn ʕljk ʔan ttʔasf ʔalm tr kjf fʕl rbk bʕaːd ʔaafaraʔaajta ʔiin mattaʕnaaːhum sinijna nsˤħhaʶː aʶːltˤbjb bʔan tdχl ʔilaː aːlmstʃfaː laː jmknnj ʔan ʔafrrq bjnh wbjn ʔaχjh waʔaanzala fij ðalika aːlqurʔaːna jħb aːlbrtqaːl ʔawlm jrwaː ʔanaː χlqnaː lhm mmaː ʕmlt ʔajdjnaː ʔanʕaːmaː fhm lhaː maːlkwn laː ʔaʕrf maː aːlðj sʔafʕlh ʔinhaː trjd fqtˤ aʶːlħsˤwl ʕlaː aːlmtʕa ʔatʔamrwn aːlnaːs baːlbr wtnswn ʔanfskm wʔantm ttlwn aːlktaːb ʔaflaː tʕqlwn kuluwaː waaːʃrabuwaː hanijʔianaː bimaaː kuntum taʕmaluwna ʔafrʔajtm aːlnaːr aːltj twrwn waʔiin ʔaasrafa fijhi ʔaabʃamahu waminhum man jamtaniʕu min fiʕli aʶːltˤtˤaʶaʶːʕaʶaʶːtiʶ faʔaaraaːhu aːlʔaːjaaa aːlkubraaː aːlʔiimaaːmu aːld͡ʒaaːʔiiru lifitjaaːnihi aːd͡ʒʕaluwaː biʶdˤaʶaʶːʕaʶtaʶhuʶm fij riħaaːlihim laʕallahum jaʕrifuwnahaaː ʔiiðaaː aːnqalabuwaː ʔiilaaː ʔaahlihim laʕallahum jard͡ʒiʕuwna mrħbanaː wlqd trknaː mnhaː ʔaːja bjna lqwm faaːstawaaː aːlfrnsja jtħdθ bhaː fj frnsaː walaʔiin saʔaaltahum man χalaqa aːlssamaaːwaaːti waʶaʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤaʶ lajaquwlunna χalaqahunna aːlʕazijzu aːlʕalijmu waqad jakuwnu lilnnafsi maʕa aːlʔaaħwaaːli waːtbʕwaː aːlʃhwaːt fswf jlqwn ʁjaː jaaː ʔaajjuhaaː aːllaðijna ʔaːmanuwaː aːrkaʕuwaː waaːsd͡ʒuduwaː waaːʕbuduwaː rabbakum waaːfʕaluwaː aːlχajra laʕallakum tufliħuwna waʶʔaʶaʶbʁiʶdˤ baʶʁiʶjdˤaʶk hawnanaː maaː laː ʔad͡ʒjd mmaːrsa aʶːlrjaʶːdˤaʶ wmaː ʔaʕd͡ʒlk ʕn qwmk jaː mwsaː lijawmin ʕaʶðˤiʶjmiʶn laː ʔaʶsttˤjʕ ʔan ʔadʕ ðlk jħdθ md͡ʒddaː ʔaannaaː sˤaʶbaʶbnaʶaʶː aːlmaaːʔa sˤaʶbbaʶnaʶː fj ʔaj wqt wsˤlt aːlmnzl maː nmt mnjħ mbaːrħ qaaːluwaː kaðaliki qaaːla rabbuki ʔiinnahu huwa aːlħakijmu aːlʕalijmu laː jʃrb aʶːlʔiʶjtˤaʶːljwn aːlqhwa ʔaχðt aːlktaːb hl ttħdθ aːlhwlndja ʔaaqliʕuwaː ʕan aʶːlmaʶʕaʶaʶːsˤiʶj qabla ʔaan jaʔaχuðakum aːlllahu hattanaː battanaː ʔiʶntðˤrj dqjqa maːrj waːlðj nzl mn aːlsmaːʔ maːʔ bqdr fʔanʃrnaː bh blda mjtaː kðlk tχrd͡ʒwn wʔin ʕljk aːllʕna ʔilaː jwm aːldjn waʔiinna aːlllaha rabbij warabbukum faaːʕbuduwhu haðaaː sˤiʶraʶaʶːtˤuʶn mustaqijmun ʔilh aːlnaːs faaːlħannaaːnaau aːllatij taħinnu lizawd͡ʒin kaaːna lahaaː hl hðh aːlqbʕa lk wʔið qaːl mwsaː lftaːh laː ʔabrħ ħtaː ʔablʁ md͡ʒmʕ aːlbħrjn ʔaw ʔaʶmdˤj ħqbaː wlqd mknaːkm fj aʶːlʔaʶrdˤ wd͡ʒʕlnaː lkm fjhaː mʕaːjʃ qljlaː maː tʃkrwn falaaː ʔauqsimu birabbi aːlmaʃaaːriqi waaːlmaʁaaːribi ʔiinnaaː laqaaːdiruwna nrjdk ʔan tʔukd ħdˤwrk lʔan ʕdd aːlʔamaːkn mħdwd ʔin kaaːna ʃajʔun faχawfij ʔaan juradda ʕalajja ʕamalij tdrs maːrj kl jwm saːʕtjn wakifaaːʔan liħaqqihina fʔamaː aːlðjn ʔaːmnwaː wʕmlwaː aʶːlsˤaʶːlħaʶːt fhm fj rwdˤaʶ jħbrwn ʔaʃrq wd͡ʒh aʶːltˤfl ħjn rʔaaː baːbaː nwjl liʔaanna nafsahu ʔaʶaʶχaʶsˤsˤuʶ waħaaːlahu ʔaamassu hðaː aːlʔamr laː jʕnjnj wakaððabuwaː waaːttabaʕuwaː ʔaahwaaːʔhum wakullu ʔaamrin mmustaqirun hðh mrdsa llbnaːt aʶːlsˤʁaʶːr huwa juħjij wajumijtu waʔiilajhi turd͡ʒaʕuwna ʔinh ʔant mn sʔaħb daːʔimanaː nhaːrk sʕjd ʕlaː nħw mlħwðˤ fhmnaː aːlmtzaːjd llmmlka mtnaːhja aʶːlsˤʁr daːχl nwaːa aːlðra ʔiinna haðaaː kaaːna lakum d͡ʒazaaːʔan wakaaːna saʕjukum maʃkuwranaː jχrd͡ʒ mnhmaː aːllʔulʔu waːlmrd͡ʒaːn waqaaːla muwsaaː jaaː qawmi ʔiin kuntum ʔaːmantum biaːlllahi faʕalajhi tawakkaluwaː ʔiin kuntum muslimijna lawlaaː ʔaan tadaaːrakahu niʕmaaun min rabbihi lanubiða biaːlʕaraaːʔi wahuwa maðmuwmun d͡ʒmjʕ zmlaːʔ sˤffj χaːrd͡ʒ aːlmdjna ld͡ʒʔat ljlaː ʔilaː bjt waːldjhaː lahu mulku aːlssamaaːwaaːti waʶaʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤiʶ juħjij wajumijtu wahuwa ʕalaaː kulli ʃajʔin qadijrun qaːla faʔaaχbirnj ʕani aːlssaaːʕai jd͡ʒb ʕljk msaːʕdthaː w ʕlaː aːlfwr laː tfʕl ðlk waqaaːluwaː mahmaaː taʔatinaaː bihi min ʔaːjaain litasħaranaaː bihaaː famaaː naħnu laka bimuʔuminijna maaː ʕindak fijmaaː saʔaalnaaːk d͡ʒawaaːbun hl jmknk ʔiχbaːrj aʶːltˤrjq ʔilj aːlmktba laː tdˤʕ aːlktb ʕlaː aʶːltˤaʶːwlaʶ laː jmsh ʔilaː aʶːlmtˤhrwn bismi aːlllahi aːlrraħmani aːlrraħijmi suwraaun ʔaanzalnaaːhaaː waʶfaʶraʶdˤnaʶaʶːhaʶaʶː waʔaanzalnaaː fijhaaː ʔaːjaaːtin bajjinaaːtin laʕallakum taðakkaruwna ljs sbb mn aːlχwf maː tqwlh ljs lh ʔaju mʕnaːan lj km raːʔiʕa ʔanti sjʔaχðk hðaː aʶːlbaʶːsˤ ʔilaː aʶːlmtˤaʶːr hðaː hw ʃkl mfsˤl aːlkaːħl ʔin aːllh hw aːlrzaːq ðw aːlqwa aːlmtjn waʔiinnaaː lanaħnu aʶːlsˤsˤaʶaʶːfuʶwnaʶ wawahabnaaː lahum min raħmatinaaː wad͡ʒaʕalnaaː lahum lisaaːna sˤiʶdqiʶn ʕalijjanaː d͡ʒzʔ mn hðh aʶːlʔaʶrdˤ mlk lj ʔant lst baːrʕanaː fj hðaː tˤuʶwbaʶaʶː liman ʔaaddaba nafsahu waħasunat χalijqatuhu waʶsˤaʶluʶħaʶt sarijratuhu ʔanaː tˤaʶːlb fj hðh aːlmdrsa ʔiinna ʔaawwala bajtin wuʶdˤiʶʕaʶ lilnnaaːsi lallaðij bibakkaaa mubaaːrakanaː wahudanaː lilʕaaːlamijna ʁdaːan ʕjd aːlʔam θjaːbh laː ttmaːʃaː mʕ aʶːlmwdˤaʶ fʔinmaː hj zd͡ʒra waːħda kallaaː ʔiiðaaː dukkati aʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤuʶ dakkanaː dakkanaː faʔaalhamahaaː fud͡ʒuwrahaaː wataqwaaːhaaː km hðaː mzʕd͡ʒ hl ʔaʶsttˤjʕ ʔan ʔaʶuʶħdˤr ʔaħdaːan mʕj qad naʕlamu ʔiinnahu lajaħzunuka aːllaðij jaquwluwna faʔiinnahum laaː jukaððibuwnaka walakinna aʶːlðˤðˤaʶaʶːliʶmiʶjnaʶ biʔaːjaaːti aːlllahi jad͡ʒħaduwna aːllaðij jaʶsˤlaʶaʶː aːlnnaaːra aːlkubraaːaː χaʶtˤtˤaʶʔaʶtiʶ aːlntaːʔid͡ʒu aːltnbʔuaːti ʔiillaaː ʕad͡ʒuwzanaː fij aːlʁaaːbirijna maːðaː traː fj aʶːlsˤwraʶ manaʕa min wud͡ʒuwbi baʕθaai aːlʔaanbijaaːʔi hl jmknk aːn tsaːʕdjnj hðaː ʔamr d͡ʒdjd baːlnsba lj walaqad ʔaːtajnaaː muwsaaː aːlkitaaːba wad͡ʒaʕalnaaː maʕahu ʔaaχaaːhu haaːruwna wazijranaː jaaː banij ʔisraaːʔiijla aːlʔaumuwru θalaaːθaaun wkðb baːlħsnaː ʕzmhu waqaaːla ʕabdu aːlllahi bnu tˤaʶaʶːhiʶriʶn law takaaːʃaftum maaː tadaaːfantum hmaːz mʃaːʔ bnmjm hw jħbkm kθjranaː fj aːljaːbaːn aːlsna aːldraːsja aːld͡ʒdjda tbdʔa fj ʔabrjl ʔaʕndh ʕlm aːlʁjb fhw jraː ʔiðn tˤfl jblʁ ʕʃra snwaːt ʃkraː d͡ʒzjlaː jaː rfaːq wasanijji ðaχaaːʔiirihi wajumdidkum biʔaamwaaːlin wabanijna wajad͡ʒʕal lakum d͡ʒannaaːtin wajad͡ʒʕal lakum ʔaanhaaːranaː laaː juzhidannaka fij rad͡ʒulin ħumidat sijratahu wmaː ʔadraːk maː aːlqaːrʕa ʔinhu jbdw bħaːla d͡ʒjdaːan d͡ʒdaːan qaːl bl rbkm rb aːlsmaːwaːt waʶːlʔaʶrdˤ aːlðj ftˤrhn wʔanaː ʕlaː ðlkm mn aːlʃaːhdjn liʔaannahu aːlbarru karjmin man d͡ʒaaːhada aːlhawaaː tˤaʶaʶːʕaʶaʶaʶn lirabbihi waqad ðumma aːlkalaaːmu fij mad͡ʒlisihi summija biðalika waʶtˤaʶlaʶbaʶ bihi aːlʃʃukra waaːlθθanaaːʔa fahuwa χaaːrid͡ʒun biʶʕaʶtˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶhiʶ ʕan ħukmi aːlssaχaaːʔi faʶːdˤl jtkllm kθjraː aːlχajlu waaːllljlu waaːlbajdaːʔu taʕrifunj waaːlssjfu waaːlrrmħu waʶːlqrtˤaʶːsuʶ waaːlqalam laː tlʕb hnaː ʔabdaːan ʔiinna aːlllaha ʕaːlimu ʁajbi ʕalaaː dˤaʶbtˤiʶ aːlnnafsi ʕaʃaraaun liʔaanna nuʃuwʔa aʶːlsˤsˤiʶʁaʶriʶ ʕalaaː aːlʃʃajʔi jad͡ʒʕaluhu muʶtaʶtˤaʶbbiʶʕaʶnaʶː bihi ftħ saːmj rsaːla ljlaː ʔaʕtqd ʔann hðaː aːlrrd͡ʒl aʶːlsˤsˤjnj mslm fhw jstmʕ llqrʔaːn jubʕaθu aːlʕaaːlimu waaːlʕaaːbidu fajuqaaːlu lilʕaaːbidi ħaːwl saːmj ʔan jsmmm ljlaː bχljtˤ mn ʔaʶqraʶːsˤ aːlnnwm w aːlmbjdaːt ʁajruhu jaquwlu qaaːla fafij haðaaː raaːħaaun lakum aːlfaaːkihaaa waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi man kaθura kalaaːmuhu kaθurat ʔaːθaaːmuhu ʔiinnaː kulla ʃajʔin χalaqnaːhu biqadarin qlt lh ʔan jtwqqf ʕn aʶːntðˤaʶːrk snttˤrq ʔilaː hðaː aːlʔamr bʕd bʔan tʔatj ljlaː wtʔaχð aːlmχddraːt md͡ʒaːnanaː aːlbustaːnijju jad͡ʒmaʕu aːlʔaazhaːra waaːllaðjna laː jaʃhadwna aːlzzwra waʔiiðaː marrwaː biaːlllaʁwi marrwaː kiraːmanaː ʕallamahu aːlbajaːna jnbʁj ʕlaː ʔaχð braːjn bʕdˤ aːlwrwd ʕaːd ʔilaː aʶːlmrsˤd wamaː jaʔatjhim min ðikrin mina aːlrraħmni muħdaθin ʔiillaː kaːnwaː ʕanhu muʶʕriʶdˤjnaʶ tabijtu aːlbuħajraau haaːʔiid͡ʒaaan faʶsˤaʶaʶːraʶ fardanaː laaː juʕaaːnu biraʔajin walaaː jumaddu bimaʃuwraain waʶaʶːdˤtˤaʶrraʶ ʔilaaː aːstijdaaːʕi sirrihi walajtahu kufija aʶːliʶaʶːdˤtˤiʶraʶaʶːruʶ ʔaħtaːd͡ʒ lhðaː mn ʔad͡ʒl aːχtbaːr ħml ʔarjd aːlmzjd mn aʶːlʕsˤjr ħaaːdiθaain qad kaddahu aːlhammu bihaaː faʔiinna aʶːlsˤsˤaʶbraʶ ʕalajhaaː jaʕqubuhu aːlrraaːħaau minhaaː laː ttklm fj ʁrfa aʶːlmtˤaʶːlʕaʶ waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi kafaaːk min ʕaqlik maaː dallak ʕalaaː sabijli ruʃdik ʕalaaː naqli χabarin jakuwnu kaðibanaː ħaːwlt ʔiqnaːʕh lkn dwn d͡ʒdwaː ʔajn mkaːn ʕmlk waʶjuʶðˤhiʶruʶ ʕuðranaː jadfaʕu ʕanhu aːlllawma wamaaː ʔaaʃbaha maaː qaaːla biaːlħaqqi aːlχaːðl ʔaχw aːlqaːtl aʶːlsˤsˤiʶdquʶ waaːlkaðibu lm jkn jʕlm ʔajn kaːnt sjjaːrth kaːn faʶːdˤl jsmʕ tlk aʶːlʔaʶsˤwaʶːt frħt ʕmtj bnd͡ʒaːħj saːmj sˤdjq lfrjd lajsa juʶʕtˤiʶjk lilrrad͡ʒaaːʔi walaaː lilχawfi lakin jalaððu tˤaʶʕmaʶ aʶːlʕaʶtˤaʶaʶːʔiʶ waqad aːχtalafa aːlnnaaːsu fij miθli ʔarjd ʔan ʔasaːfr lʔakml tχsˤsˤsˤj famuddaau aːlllahwi taʶnqaʶtˤiʶʕuʶ waʕaaːrijjaau aːlddahri turtad͡ʒaʕu maaː dˤaʶrraʶniʶj walam janfaʕ ʁajrij lajta aːlfaaːkihaaa naʶaʶːdˤiʶd͡ʒaʶaʶuʶn faʶbiʶaʶːlsˤsˤaʶbriʶ fij haðaaː tanfatiħu wud͡ʒuwhu aːlʔaːraaːʔi walilʕaqli muʶdˤaʶaʶːdduʶn waaːðkur rabbak ʔiðaaː nasijta qaaːla ʕikrimaau aːllaðj ʕallama biaːlqalami ʔiinna hðaː lahuwa aːlfawzu aʶːlʕaʶðˤjmuʶ ʔaaw liaːttifaaːqin mustaħsanin waqaaːla ʔaːχaru aʶːlħaʶriʶjsˤuʶ ʔaasijru mahaaːnaain laaː jufakku ʔaasruhu hðaː ljs ʔamraː mhmmaː aːlaːsʕaːr tnχfdˤ km ʁrfa fj bjtk baːlkaːd jmknnj aːlmʃj wd͡ʒdt hðaː aːlχaːtm fj aːlʃaːrʕ hðaː aʶːlsˤbaʶːħ jaʃhaduhu aːlmuqarrabwna aːlbustaaːnu d͡ʒamijlun waman juʶtˤiʶjquʶ haðaaː jaaː ʔaabaaː ħaaːzimin qaaːla wahuwa sˤaʶaʶːliʶħuʶ bnu ʕabdi aːlqudduwsi aːχtalafa aːlmufassiruwna fij taʔawijli ðalika faqaaːla qataaːdaau lm ʔant wħdk maːðaː tʃrb aʶːttsˤl aːlmdrrs bmdjr aːlmdrsa qaaːla laħanta d͡ʒanaaː aːlfallaaːħu aʶːlquʶtˤnaʶ bal juʶʕtˤaʶaʶː maaː jastaħiqquhu biʶsuʶltˤaʶaʶːniʶhiʶ waʕuluwwi jadihi ʔaraːd saːmj ʔan jʕtnq aːlʔislaːm faʔiinna aːlqaraaːʔiiħa ʔiðaaː aːnfaradat aːstakaddahaaː aːlfikru waaːstafraʁahaaː aːliaːd͡ʒtihaaːdu ldjj bʕdˤ aːlmlaːbs lk wamaː ʔaʶaʶsˤaʶːbaʶkuʶm min muʶsˤjbaʶaʶiʶn fabimaː kasabat ʔaajdjkum wajaʕfw ʕan kaθjrin waʁuruwranaː laaː jankaʃifu ʔillaaː biaːlttuhmaai lahaaː mudhaːmmataːni waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi man faʕala maaː ʃaaːʔa laqija maaː lam jaʃaʔa waʶjuʶsˤaʶħħiʶħuʶ himmatak knt mdrrsaː hnaːk warubbamaaː aːntafat aːlrrijbaau biħusni aːlθθiqaai waaːrtafaʕat aːlttuhmaau biʶtˤuʶwliʶ aːlχibraai naaːma aʶːltˤtˤiʶfluʶ ʕalaaː aːlssarijri kjf ʔaːkl hðaː ʔaqwl ðlk mn qlbj ʔiinna aːlharama qadijmun wakaaːna muħaddiθanaː ʕaːd saːmj ʔaan taχtalifa aːlʕuqalaaːʔu fij sˤaʶlaʶaʶːħiʶhaʶaʶː wafasaaːdihaaː walaː ʔaanaː ʕaːbidun maː ʕabadtum qaːl saːmj hðaː lmmrrdˤaʶ ndmt ʕlaː ʕdm ħdˤwrj aʶːlχtˤbaʶ waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlʔaudabaaːʔi man ʁarasa ʃad͡ʒaraaa aːlħilmi aːd͡ʒtanaaː θamaraaa aːlssilmi faʔaajna taðhabwna ħb aʶːlwtˤn mn aːlʔijmaːn jabijʕu aːlttaaːd͡ʒiru aːlbunna wafj θamwda ʔiið qjla lahum tamattaʕwaː ħattaː ħjnin kl aːld͡ʒbl jtʁjr bʔalwaːnh fj aːlχrjf faʔiinna aːlssunaaa laaː jad͡ʒuwzu ʔaan tarida biʔiibaaːħaai aːlkaðibi jnbʁj ʕlaː saːmj ʔan jntðˤr waʔiinna nafaaːða ʔaamrik maʕa kalaaːmik tʕbt qljlanaː rʔaaː saːmj ðlk aːlmnzl taʕd͡ʒijluhu waʶtaʶsˤʁiʶjruʶhuʶ wasatruhu wamuraaːʔiij aːlmaħaaːsini waaːlʕujuwbi waaːlmud͡ʒaaːharaai bimaaː kaaːna juʶdˤmiʶruʶhuʶ ʔaχð saːmj kll aʶːlsˤsˤaʶːbwn mʕh lqd tħqqt mn aːlaːmr waʔaakjdu kajdanaː waqad qijla fij manθuwri aːlħikami aːlħilmu ħid͡ʒaaːbu aːlʔaːfaaːti wrħaː aːlmnjja ttˤħn fabaddala aːllaðijna ðˤaʶlaʶmuʶwaʶː qawlanaː ʁajra aːllaðij qijla lahum ʔiinnahaː laʔiiħdaaː χaaːmara buʶʁdˤaʶnaʶː qaːm aːlmdrrs bmnaːdaːa aʶːlħaʶːdˤrjn waʔiin taraktahum lam jatrukuwka qijla watarku aʶːlχaʶtˤiʶjʔiʶaʶaʶiʶ χajrun min muʕaaːlad͡ʒaai aːlttawbaai warubba naʶðˤraʶaʶiʶn zaraʕat waʔaaχrasa jurijdu aʶːlχuʶtˤbaʶaʶaʶ qad tabassama ħattaaː badat nawaaːd͡ʒiðuhu warawaaː aːbnu masʕuwdin ʕan aːlnnabiji sˤaʶllaʶaʶː aːlllahu ʕalajhi wasallama ʔaannahu qaaːla lm ʔant mstʕd͡ʒl aːllaðj ʔaʶaʶnqaʶdˤaʶ ðˤaʶhraʶkaʶ hl tʕrf kjf tsˤlħ aːltlfaːz kaːn mdrrsj llrrjaʶːdˤaʶ jkrhnj mn sjsaːʕdnj lm jχbrnj faʶːdˤl bʃjʔ hðaː jawmu aʶːlfaʶsˤliʶ aːllaðj kuntum bihi tukaððibwna qaaːla ʕalijju bnu ʔaabij tˤaʶaʶːliʶbiʶn raʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːlllahu ʕanhu man kaaːna lij ʔilajhi ħaaːd͡ʒaaun waʔiiðaaː d͡ʒaaːlast aːlʕulamaaːʔa faʶʔaʶaʶnsˤiʶt lahum ʔarjd ʔan ʔaðhb ʔilaː kjwtw kaːnt ljlaː mtħmmsa bʃʔan ðlk aːld͡ʒuhhaaːli aːlmʕrfa qwa ʕrdˤ saːmj aːlmnzl fj aːlsswq saːmj mʕd͡ʒb bkm χjr aʶːlʔaʶsˤdqaʶːʔ mn trk aːlmzaːħ faʔiinnahum ʕaduwwun lj ʔiillaː rabba aːlʕaːlamjna rbmaː stmtˤruʶ bʕda qljl lm laː nfʕl ðlk rd͡ʒaːl w nsaːʔ qaːtlwaː lldfaːʕ ʕn wtˤnhm faqad kaððabwaː fasajaʔatjhim ʔaanbaːʔu maː kaːnwaː bihi jastahziʔiwna ʔataː saːmj w ʔaqllnj lqd kaːn rd͡ʒlaː mhððbaː waʔaanna saʕjahu sawfa juraː kaːnt aːllaðjna hum fj ʁamraain saːhwna lqd ʔaklnaː hnaːk θlaːθ mraːt waqijla fij manθuwri aːlħikami laaː tunkiħ χaʶaʶːtˤiʶbaʶ sirrik hðh aːltfaːħa tˤʕmhaʶː ħaʶːmdˤ hw swf ln jχlf wʕdh ʔabdaː lm laː tqwl lh ðlk ʔaawaʔaːbaːʔuunaaː aːlʔaawwalwna waqad kaaːna aːlnnabiju sˤaʶllaʶaʶː aːlllahu ʕalajhi wasallama jaquwlu fij duʕaaːʔiihi ʔalfjt kll tmjma laː tnfʕ twm laː jtħdθ aːlfrnsja btˤlaʶːqaʶ ktˤlaʶːqaʶ maːrj ʔinnhmaː mχaːdʕaːn aːudlulnij ʕalaaː maaː ʔauʕaaːlid͡ʒuhu waʶsˤaʶdaʶqaʶ ʔaabuw ʕuθmaaːna wakataba kisraaː ʔilaaː aːbnihi hurmuza faaːllliʔiaaːmu ʔaʶaʶsˤbaʶruʶ ʔaad͡ʒsaaːmanaː waqulnaaː jaaː qarjbanaː qaːla rabbi bimaː ʔaanʕamta ʕalajja falan ʔaakwna ðˤaʶhjraʶnaʶː lilmud͡ʒrimjna juqaaːlu ʔaanna ʔaabaaː bakrin aʶːlsˤsˤiʶdiʶjqaʶ raʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːlllahu ʕanhu kaaːna jatamaθθalu bihaðaaː waʶnaʶqsˤuʶn faʔaaðaːqahumu aːlllahu aːlχizja fij aːlħajaːai aːlddunjaː walaʕaðaːbu aːlʔaːχiraai ʔaakbaru law kaːnwaː jaʕlamwna bdʔa saːmj mn nqtˤaʶ aʶːlsˤsˤfr waaːttifaaːqihim ʕalaaː hajʔiaaːti aːlllibaaːsi ʔaʶfdˤdˤl aːlbqaːʔ d͡ʒaːlsa ʔaafakullamaaː d͡ʒaaːʔakum rasuwlun bimaaː laaː tahwaaːaː ʔaanfusukumu aːstakbartum fafarijqanaː kaððabtum wafarijqanaː taqtuluwna man ʔaʶaʶtˤaʶaʶːlaʶ sˤaʶmtaʶhuʶ aːd͡ʒtalaba min aːlhajbaai maaː janfaʕuhu ʔinh aːlχjaːr aːlwħjd ldjhm wajuʔuammilu nafʕaka ʔajn sʔaʕjʃ waʶaʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤaʶ madadnaːhaː waʔaalqajnaː fjhaː rawaːsija waʔaanbatnaː fjhaː min ktaːb saːmj w ljlaː ħqqaː jqdˤjaʶːn aːlkθjr mn aːlwqt mʕaː waqad qaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlʕulamaaːʔi watafsijra maaː kaaːna muʃkilanaː waman sˤaʶbaʶraʶ ʕan ʃahwatihi baaːlaʁa fij aːlmuruwwaai waʔaammaaː wawuquwfik ʕalaaː ʁaʶaʶːmiʶdˤiʶ aːlħukmi tʕaːhdaː saːmj w ljlaː kj jbnjaː ʔaʶfdˤl ħjaːa mmkna lʔasrthmaː aːlnnaːʃʔia ʔaalaaː ʔiinnahum humu aːlmufsiduwna walaaːkin laaː jaʃʕuruwna walillahi mulku waʔaaħraaː ʔaan jakuwna aːʃtiʁaaːluhum bihaaː rʔaaː saːmj mslmjn jsˤllwn walaw aːstanna biðalika man taqaddamahum lamaaː waʶsˤaʶlaʶ aːlʕilmu ʔilajhim waʶlaʶaʶːnqaʶraʶdˤaʶ ʕanhum rabbi aːlssamaːwaːti warabbi aʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤiʶ rabbi aːlʕaːlamjna aːlklaːb tnbħ waːlqaːfla tsjr qaːla laʔiini aːttaχaðta ʔiilhanaː ʁajrj laʔaad͡ʒʕalannaka mina aːlmasd͡ʒwnjna qijla liʶbaʶʕdˤiʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi man jaʕrifu kulla aːlʕuluwmi faqaaːla kullu aːlnnaaːsi kaːn saːmj sˤdjqaʶː lʔaʶsˤdqaʶːʔ ljlaː waħukija ʔaanna qawmanaː maʃawaː χalfa ʕalijji bni ʔaabij tˤaʶaʶːliʶbiʶn raʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːlllahu ʕanhu faqaaːla hl mn d͡ʒdjd waʕillaau haðaaː aːlqawli ðˤaʶaʶːhiʶraʶaʶuʶn fijhi sittaau taʔawijlaaːtin waminhaaː maaː laħiqahu min ʃaqaaːʔi d͡ʒamʕihi wanaaːlahu min ʃʕr saːmj ʔann ħjaːa ljlaː kaːnt fj χtˤr tbdw aʶːlʔaʶrdˤ mblwla juʔufaku ʕanhu man ʔaufika waman tafahhama aːzdaaːda aʶːnðˤr ʔilaː aʶːlsˤwraʶ ʔaaw jaððakaru fatanfaʕahu aːlððikraː lm jħddθ saːmj tˤbjbaʶː qtˤtˤ ħwl hðaː aːlʔamr ljs hðaː ʔanta fkfrwaː bh fswf jʕlmwn fmaː jkðbk bʕd baːldjn hl kaːn kjn fj aːlbjt aːlbaːrħa qul taʶraʶbbaʶsˤuʶwaʶː faʔiinnij maʕakum mina aʶːlmuʶtaʶraʶbbiʶsˤiʶjnaʶ aːldwla aːlqwmja hj mn mχrd͡ʒaːt aːlħdaːθa bihi taʶdˤʕuʶfuʶ dijaaːnaaːtuhum wataðhabu ʔaamaaːnaaːtuhum falaaː ʃajʔa ʔaad͡ʒdaru bihi dˤaʶraʶraʶnaʶː ʔanaː ʔaħb aːlmwsjqj wlkn ʔanaː ʔaħb ʔaʶjdˤaʶːaʶn aːllwħaːt kamaaː laaː ʃajʔa ʔaʶaʶdˤaʶrruʶ min fasaaːdihaaː jðhb aːlrd͡ʒaːl wjaːtwn lkn aʶːlaʶːrdˤ tbqaː θaːbta ldaː ʔamj θlaːθa klaːb wud͡ʒuwhun jawmaʔiiðin χaaːʃiʕaaun waʕaaːlimanaː ʁajra marzuwqin ln ʔadjr ðˤhrj litwm kwnj d͡ʒaːdanana ʔard͡ʒwki d͡ʒannaaːti ʕadnin mufattaħaaan lahumu aːlʔaabwaaːbu ðahba aːlwladu ʔilaː aːlmdrasai bajda ʔan mʃrwʕ ttwjbaː ljs d͡ʒnna klmaːt twqfwaː rd͡ʒaːʔan ʕn ʔiʶdˤaʶːfaʶ aːlklmaːt ʔaj nwʕ mn aːlχbz trjdwn ʔan kaʔaannahum ʔaaʕd͡ʒaaːzu naχlin mmunqaʕirin lm jlħðˤ aʶːltqaʶːtˤʕ aːlʕlwj ʔamaːmh hl ttħdθ aːllaːtjnja ʔaʶsˤbħt sˤdjq twm aːnt tlmjð md͡ʒthd lqd raʶfaʶdˤaʶ ʔan jdfʕ ql ʔinj laː ʔamlk lkm dˤraʶː wlaː ʔiʶχlaʶaʶːsˤaʶnaʶː waʶmuʶsˤaʶaʶːfaʶaʶːaʶaʶn lmaːðaː laː trdn ʔan tqln lnaː aːlħqjqa ldjhaː ʔihtmaːm ʕaʶːtˤfj llmwsjqaː ʔinh ljs maː tʕtqd wajukallimu aːlnnaaːsa fij aːlmahdi wakahlanaː wamina mqtnʕ ʔan hðh aʶːlwðˤjfaʶ mnaːsba tmaːmaːan lk walaqad raʔaajt min haðihi aʶːltˤtˤaʶbaʶqaʶaʶiʶ ʕadadanaː qad taħaqqaquwaː biaːlʕilmi taħaqquqa aːlmutakallifijna maːðaː wqʕ hnaːk jaː maːsjn θm ʔinj waːħda ʔin aːllh smjʕ bsˤjr faʕʕaaːlun limaaː jurijdu fʕlt ðlk mn ʔad͡ʒlhaː twm jʕlm tmaːmaː ʔanh laː jnbʁj ʕljh ʔan jfʕl hðaː hw sˤbwr maːðaː trjdjn ʔanaː ʔarjd ħjwaːn waqaaːla θaʕlabun ʔawd aːltħdθ ʔilaː rʔijsa aʶːlmmrdˤaʶːt ʔin jwm aʶːlfsˤl mjqaːthm ʔad͡ʒmʕjn falammaaː ʔaaslamaaː watallahu lild͡ʒabijni hl maːzlti trjdjn ʃaːjaːan laː tkn ʕaʶːtˤfaʶː ʔin aːllh mʕ aːlðjn aːtqwaː waːlðjn hm mħsnwn ʔanka ʔamjn wqaːl nwħ rb laː tðr ʕlaː aʶːlʔaʶrdˤ mn aːlkaːfrjn djaːraː hl trjdnj ħqaːan ʔan ʔaðhb ʔilaː hnaːk aːlʔan θumma lammaaː kaaːna aːlʕaqlu daaːlanaː ʕalaaː ʔaasbaaːbi maaː tadʕuw ʔilajhi ʔaʶnðˤrnj ʔilaː jwm jbʕθwn aːχtfaː mnnaːd mn aːlqaːhra wasalima aːlʕaaːlimu min aːld͡ʒihatajni tlk aːldraːd͡ʒa draːd͡ʒtj χrd͡ʒt aːlʕaːʔila kllhaː lttmʃʃaː walaqad naʕlamu ʔaannaka jaʶdˤiʶjquʶ sˤaʶdruʶkaʶ bimaaː jaquwluwna maːrj ʔanti ftaːa mskjna ʔajn knti maːðaː ħdθ lki bdʔat ʔaʃrb mbkkraː ʔinʃaːʔ mwqʕ ʔilktrwnj bdwn ʔaj tklfa wlqd rʔaːh nzla ʔaχraː wamina aʶːlʃʃaʶjaʶaʶːtˤiʶjniʶ man jaʶʁuʶwsˤuʶwnaʶ lahu wajaʕmaluwna ʕamalanaː duwna ðalika wakunnaaː lahum ħaʶaʶːfiʶðˤiʶjnaʶ twm ʔaʶfdˤl mnaː faʶaʶːsˤbiʶr ʕalaaː maaː jaquwluwna wasabbiħ biħamdi rabbika qabla tˤuʶluʶwʕiʶ aːlʃʃamsi waqabla aːlʁuruwbi wamin ʃarri ħaaːsidin ʔiiðaaː ħasada twm hw mn bwstwn knt ʔaʃaːhd aʶːlsˤwraʶ jd͡ʒb ʔan ndaːfʕ ʕn aːlqaːnwn hw jstmʕ daːʔimaː llʔaχbaːr baːlmðjaːʕ lstmaː aːlwħjdaːn aːlðaːn waːd͡ʒhaː hðaː aːlmʃkl ʕljkmaː ʔan tqblaːh w ʔan ttχtˤjaʶːnh sʔaʶsˤljh sqr dʕwnaː ntqaːsm aʶːlmsˤaʶːrjf ʔanaː ʔaħbbu ʔan ʔadrsa aːllʁaːta aːlʔad͡ʒnbjaa ʔanaː qaːdmun aːljwm faqad qijla man wadakka liʃajʔin tawallaaː maʕa aʶːnqiʶdˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶhiʶ muʶtˤaʶaʶːʕiʶn θamma ʔaamijnin θm twljtm mn bʕd ðlk flwlaː fdˤl aːllh ʕljkm wrħmth lkntm mn aːlχaːsrjn flaː tdˤrbwaʶː llh aːlʔamθaːl ʔin aːllh jʕlm wʔantm laː tʕlmwn aːʁlq aːlnaːfða qbl ʔan tʁaːdr sˤʕd qtˤaʶːn ʕlaː aːlkrsj ʔanta jmknka ʔan tʔatj mʕnaː sajaððakaru man jaχʃaaː knt friħanaː baːlʔams ʔanaː ʕmlt fj hðaː aʶːlmsˤnʕ maː aːlðj trjdhu haː jd͡ʒb ʕljka ʔan laː tħkm ʕlaːa ʃχsˤ mn mðˤhrhuʶ waːlsaːrq waːlsaːrqa faʶːqtˤʕwaʶː ʔajdjhmaː d͡ʒzaːʔ bmaː ksbaː nkaːlaː mn aːllh waːllh ʕzjz ħkjm maː tðr mn ʃjʔ ʔatt ʕljh ʔilaː d͡ʒʕlth kaːlrmjm tʕrft ʕlaː aːlʕdjd mn aʶːlsˤdjqaʶːt aːld͡ʒdd waʔiiðaaː qijla lahum laaː tufsiduwaː fij aʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤiʶ qaaːluwaː ʔiinnamaaː naħnu muʶsˤliʶħuʶwnaʶ tʕtˤjnaʶː aːlʃmsu aʶːldˤwʔaʶ waːlħraːraa sjðkr mn jχʃaː wqaːl aːlrswl jaː rb ʔin qwmj aːtχðwaː hðaː aːlqrʔaːn mhd͡ʒwraː dʕh jðhb wlkl drd͡ʒaːt mmaː ʕmlwaː wmaː rbk bʁaːfl ʕmaː jʕmlwn falaː ʔauqsimu biaːlχunnasi lijawmi aʶːlfaʶsˤliʶ maː zlt nʕsaːn sˤħjħ laː tsttˤjʕ aːkl aːldd͡ʒaːd͡ʒ kjf tʕrf aːðaː lm td͡ʒrb aːbdaːan wajka jaː man raaːma taqjjda aːlfalak ʔaaːuu nad͡ʒmin fj aːlsaamaː jaʶχdˤaʶʕuʶ lak ʔant nfsk laː tʕrf maː trjd ʔin aːlðjn ftnwaː aːlmʔumnjn waːlmʔumnaːt θm lm jtwbwaː flhm ʕðaːb d͡ʒhnm wlhm ʕðaːb aːlħrjq lqd ʔaʶsˤaʶːb qdmh aːljsraː ʕndmaː sqtˤ ʔanti ksrti aːlqwaːʕd ʔiʶfħsˤ kul waːħd wʔaqm aʶːlsˤlaʶːaʶ tˤrfj aːlnhaːr wzlfaː mn aːlljl ʔin aːlħsnaːt jðhbn aːlsjʔiaːt ðlk ðkraː llðaːkrjn laː ʔaqdr jawma jasmaʕuwna aʶːlsˤsˤaʶjħaʶaʶaʶ biaːlħaqqi ðalika jawmu aːlχuruwd͡ʒi tʕaːla mud͡ʒddaːan jahdij ʔiilaaː aːlrruʃdi faʔaːmannaaː bihi walan nuʃrika birabbinaaː ʔaaħadanaː aːʕtqd bʔanh laː jmknnaː aʶːlrfdˤ wmaː hw ʕlaː aːlʁjb bdˤnjn fd͡ʒʕlnaː ʕaːljhaː saːflhaː wʔaʶmtˤrnaʶː ʕljhm ħd͡ʒaːra mn sd͡ʒjl lmaːðaː laː trdn ʔan tqln lnaː aːlħqjqa tktb ʔijmjlj rsaːlaan aːbtʕtu lhaː saːʕa sajaʕlamuwna ʁadanaː mmani aːlkaððaaːbu aːlʔaaʃiru bal jurijdu kullu aːmriʔiin minhum ʔaan juʔutaaː sˤuʶħuʶfaʶnaʶː munaʃʃaraaan jsqwn mn rħjq mχtwm jaː ʔajhaː aːlðjn ʔaːmnwaː ʔin ttˤjʕwaʶː aːlðjn kfrwaː jrdwkm ʕlaː ʔaʕqaːbkm ftnqlbwaː χaːsrjn walad͡ʒaaːd͡ʒanaː fij aːlʔiikθaaːri minhu qaaːla liχadijd͡ʒaaa laqad χaʃijtu ʕalaaː nafsij hj tħb aʶːltˤjwr w aːlʔazhaːr hm jsˤdqwnhaʶː aːlbħr haːdʔi fawaaːkihu wahum mukramuwna sʔafʕl ʔajj ʃjʔ lʔad͡ʒlk jaː maːrj ʔalaː tðˤnn ʔann ʕljk ʔaχð qstˤiʶn mn aːlraːħa lqd χdʕnk hðh aːlsla mljʔia baːlfwaːkh fijhaaː ʕajnun d͡ʒaaːrijaaun ʔanaː ʔamrjkj ʔaʶtˤfʔiʶ twm aːlʔanwaːr bismi aːlllahi aːlrraħmani aːlrraħijmi ʔiinnaaː fataħnaaː laka fatħanaː mubijnanaː hj lm tʕd͡ʒbnj qtˤtˤ man ʃaddada naffara flaː jud͡ʒnaaː bʁjri aʶːlʁwsˤiʶ drrunwlaː tlidu aːlwalwdu blaː mχaʶːdˤiʶ ʔin aːlðjn ħqt ʕljhm klmt rbk laː jʔumnwn ʔaχðnaːk ʕhdaː ħmlnaːk wʕdaː wnhdjk sʕdaː ld͡ʒjl ʔaʶtˤl fʔant ʕnh tlhaː saːmj lm jʁlq ʔaj baːb fj aːlbjt kl maː rsˤdh aːlflkjwn mn χlaːl aːltlskwbaːt aʶːlmttˤwraʶ jwmaː bʕd jwm hj thtm baːlmwsjqaː wmaː ʔanzlnaː ʕljk aːlktaːb ʔilaː ltbjn lhm aːlðj aːχtlfwaː fjh whdaː wrħma lqwm jʔumnwn aʶːlrjaʶːdˤjaʶːt maːda mθjra llaːhtmaːm waʔaaqbaħa aːnfiraaːdahumaaː jbdw ʔanh rd͡ʒl ʔamjn sjʔatj ʔin kaːn jrʁb ðlk flnkn sˤrħaʶːʔ smʕ aːħmd baʶːltχfjdˤ ʔalm tr ʔilaː aːlðjn jd͡ʒaːdlwn fj ʔaːjaːt aːllh ʔanaː jsˤrfwn ʕaːʃ fj ʔisbaːnjaː bdˤʕ snwaːt ʃjʔiaːan fʃjʔiaːan tzdaːd mʕrftnaː baːllʁa aːlʔind͡ʒljzja hðaː aːlqaːrb sˤaʶːlħaʶːaʶn llʔibħaːr jhdj ʔilaː aːlrʃd fʔaːmnaː bh wln nʃrk brbnaː ʔaħdaː bqj qljl mn aːlmaːʔ aːlsr sjbqaː sraːan fklwaː mmaː ʁnmtm ħlaːlaː tˤjbaʶː waːtqwaː aːllh ʔin aːllh ʁfwr rħjm haːa lm tkn tʕrf ʔan hnaːk trd͡ʒma llqrʔaːn baːlʕbrja lilʃʃaaːfiʕiji raʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːlllahu ʕanhu faːlq aʶːlʔiʶsˤbaʶːħ wd͡ʒʕl aːlljl sknaː waːlʃms waːlqmr ħsbaːnaː ðlk tqdjr aːlʕzjz aːlʕljm sʔal aʶːlsˤaʶːʔiʶb ltuʕjjn mħaːmjanaː d͡ʒjjdanaː aːlmwz ʔaʶsˤfr aːllaðijna jaχʃawna rabbahum biaːlʁajbi wahum mina aːlssaaːʕaai muʃfiquwna kaððabat qawmu luʶwtˤiʶn aːlmursalijna wd͡ʒʕlnj mbaːrkaː ʔajn maː knt wʔaʶwsˤaʶːnj baʶːlsˤlaʶːaʶ waːlzkaːa maː dmt ħjaː walajsa liman bulija bihi ʔillaaː aʶːlsˤsˤaʶbruʶ waaːlʔiiqlaaːlu hnaːk ʔazmaːt tdknaː wʔaχraː tχrd͡ʒ mn aːlʔaʕmaːq ʔaʶfdˤl maː fjnaː ʔaʃʕl ʕwd θqaːb kamaaː qaaːla aːlʔaawwalu wʔaːja lhm aːlljl nslχ mnh aːlnhaːr fʔiðaː hm mðˤlmwn waʔiinnij laʁaffaaːrun liman taaːba waʔaːmana waʕamila sˤaʶaʶːliʶħaʶnaʶː θumma aːhtadaaː wʔaːtjnaːh fj aːldnjaː ħsna wʔinh fj aːlʔaːχra lmn aʶːlsˤaʶːlħjn laaː tad͡ʒʔaaruwaː aːljawma ʔiinnakum minnaaː laaː tuʶnsˤaʶruʶwnaʶ wlaː jħsbn aːlðjn kfrwaː sbqwaː ʔinhm laː jʕd͡ʒzwn waʔiinnaaː ʕalaaː ʔaan nurijaka maaː naʕiduhum laqaaːdiruwna ʔiðaː lm tkn mʕnaː fʔant dˤdnaʶː bʔan rbk ʔawħaː lhaː hl ʔant tʕlm ʔaʕrf kjf ʔalʕb kra aʶːlmdˤrb wasaχχara lakumu aːlʃʃamsa waaːlqamara daaːʔiibajni wasaχχara lakumu aːlllajla waaːlnnahaaːra qaaːla ʔaataʕbuduwna maaː tanħituwna ʔinaː ʔarslnaːk baːlħq bʃjraː wnðjraː wlaː tsʔal ʕn ʔaʶsˤħaʶːb aːld͡ʒħjm ʔiið qaaːla rabbuka lilmalaaːʔiikaai ʔiinnij χaaːliqun baʃaranaː min tˤiʶjniʶn faːkhjn bmaː ʔaːtaːhm rbhm wwqaːhm rbhm ʕðaːb aːld͡ʒħjm ʔaχrd͡ʒ dftranaː waliʁajrik nuwruhu ʔajn aːlktb snbqaː ʔaʶsˤdqaʶːʔ ħtaː aːlmwt ʔanti ksrti qlbj aʶːlmuʶtaʶwaʶaʶːdˤiʶʕuʶ min tˤuʶllaʶaʶːbiʶ aːlʕilmi ʔaakθaruhum ʕilmanaː liʔaanna aːlʔiiʕd͡ʒaaːba bihi juʶfdˤiʶj ʔilaaː ħaaːlatajni maðmuwmatajni warad͡ʒulun jadrij walaaː jadrij ʔaannahu jadrij faðalika naaːsin faðakkiruwhu lam jad͡ʒib ʕalajhi aːlnnakijru ʔiðaaː χaʃija tnaːwltu lltw wd͡ʒba aʶːlftˤwr ʔanta kjf ʕrfta ðlk twmaːs jʃaːhd fjlmaːan ʔaʕjʃ fj tˤraʶːbls ljbjaː ðlk bʔan aːllh hw aːlħq wʔanh jħjj aːlmwtaː wʔanh ʕlaː kl ʃjʔ qdjr hðaː hw aːlktaːb aːlðj tbħθwn ʕnh waqul rabbi aːʁfir waaːrħam waʔaanta χajru aːlrraaːħimijna qrrt ʔan ʔaʕml lħsaːb ʃrka fj ʔamrjkaː tbdw w kʔank rʔajt ʃbħaː ʔanaː ʔaʕml hnaː lst zaːʔiraː lwsmħt laːtnsaː ʔan twqðˤnj ʁdaː fj aːlsaːʕa aːlsaːbʕa lm jtwqqʕ twm ʔajja msaːʕda mn maːrj ql hl nnbʔikm baːlʔaχsrjn ʔaʕmaːlaː ʔajn jʕjʃ χaːlk mn tðˤn nfsk daʕwaaːhum fijhaaː subħaaːnaka aːlllahuma wataħijjatuhum fijhaaː salaaːmun waʔaːχiru daʕwaaːhum ʔaani aːlħamdu lillahi rabbi aːlʕaaːlamijna ʔiðhbj ʔilaːa ʁrqtik wʔanhm ðˤnwaʶː kmaː ðˤnntm ʔan ln jbʕθ aːllh ʔaħdaː ʕn ʕumra raʶdˤiʶj aːllhu ʕanhu qaːla jbdw saːmj ltˤjfaʶː man juʶsˤraʶf ʕanhu jawmaʔiiðin faqad raħimahu waðalika aːlfawzu aːlmubijnu walawlaaː faʶdˤluʶ aːlllahi ʕalajkum waraħmatuhu waʔaanna aːlllaha raʔuwfun raħijmun waʔiinnamaaː aːlssaʕaaːdaau ʔaan laaː jakuwna lahu sˤaʶaʶːriʶfuʶn ʕan aːlʕilmi qaːrn bjn ʔasaːljb tlk aːlrsaːʔil tnmw hðh aːlʃd͡ʒra baːlqrb mn bjthaː ʔasrʕ wʔaʕlaː wʔaqwaː ʔaʶnðˤr maːðaː ʔaʶħdˤrt lj fj ʕjd mjlaːdj kwbj kaːml hl ʔanta tsʕl dmaːʔ hðaː ljs d͡ʒjdaːan rkdˤ aːlklb ʕqb aʶːlqtˤ hjaː dʕnaː nðhb ʔilaː aːlbjt nħn ðaːhbtaːn ʔilaː aʶːlmtˤbχ lm nħb bʕdˤnaʶː aʶːlbʕdˤ dʕwnaː nstʕd llðhaːb lw kntu mkaːnk kntu sʔafʕl nfs aːlʃʔi km aːlmda wʔanta tuʕlm aːlʔisbaːnja kallaaː ʔiinnaaː χalaqnaaːhum mimmaaː jaʕlamuwna kuwnuwaː lilʕilmi ruʕaaːaan wajaħduθu biʶχuʶluʶwsˤiʶ aʶːlmuʶsˤaʶaʶːfaʶaʶːaʶiʶ wafaaːʔun wamuħaaːmaaːaun maː kntu dwnhmaː fj aːlʃʕri mqtdraːan waʔiin taʕudduwaː niʕmaaa aːlllahi laaː tuʶħsˤuʶwhaʶaʶː ʔiinna aːlllaha laʁafuwrun raħijmun ʔaami aːttaχaða mimmaaː jaχluqu banaaːtin waʶʔaʶaʶsˤfaʶaʶːkuʶm biaːlbanijna twm ʕaʶːtˤl ʕn aːlʕml ħaːljaː ʔalaː tbʕd jdk ʕnj ʔarjd ʔan ʔatħdθ mʕk bmwdˤwʕ lkl nbʔi mstqr wswf tʕlmwn hudanaː waðikraaː liʔauwlij aːlʔaalbaaːbi aːklnaː bjdˤ ʔiinnamaaː jaʔamurukum biaːlssuwʔi waaːlfaħʃaaːʔi waʔaan taquwluwaː ʕalaaː aːlllahi maaː laaː taʕlamuwna wakullun biaːlʔaaθari jawmuhu ʔaaw ʁaduhu ʔauwlaʔiika ʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶaʶːbuʶ aːld͡ʒannaai χaaːlidijna fijhaaː d͡ʒazaaːʔan bimaaː kaaːnuwaː jaʕmaluwna twm jqwm bqrʔaːʔa ktaːb taːrjχ marfuwʕaain muʶtˤaʶhhaʶraʶaʶiʶn ql ʔin ʔadrj ʔaqrjb maː twʕdwn ʔam jd͡ʒʕl lh rbj ʔamdaː waaːllaðijna hum biʃahaaːdaaːtihim qaaːʔiimuwna aʶːħtfðˤ bh fj mkaːn baːrd aːalʕad͡ʒalaa mina aʶːlʃʃaʶjtˤaʶaʶːn ʔam lkm sltˤaʶːn mbjn aːstmrwaː fj aːlħdjθ lsaːʕaːt lma ʔabqjth srananaː waʕalaaː taʶnaʶqquʶsˤiʶhiʶ ʔaaħraaː fʔalqaː ʕsˤaʶːh fʔiðaː hj θʕbaːn mbjn srq mnj kl maːlj ʔaajjumaaː ʔaaħabbu ʔilajk rad͡ʒulun qalijlu aːlððunuwbi qalijlu aːlʕamali hw tˤfl aːlʕaːʔila qaːl nʕm wʔinkm lmn aːlmqrbjn maː kðb aːlfʔuaːd maː rʔaaː maː aːlχjaːraːt aːlʔaχraː aːltj ʔamaːmj faʶːtˤmaʶ jaaː rasuwla aːllaahi kajfa jaʔatijka aːlwaħju tħbnj kl ʕaːʔiltj kaːn d͡ʒbjnj jʁlj mn aːlħmaː ʔin hj ʔilaː mwttnaː aːlʔawlaː wmaː nħn bmnʃrjn hl sbq lk ʔan ðhbt ʔilaː aːlwlaːjaːt aːlmtħda laː ʔaʕrf ʃjʔianaː aːlbtta mustakbirijna bihi saaːmiranaː tahd͡ʒuruwna aːljwm hw aːlʔaħd wafirʕawna ðij aːlʔaawtaaːdi ʔaalam tara kajfa faʕala rabbuka biʶʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶaʶːbiʶ aːlfijli waʔiilajk nasʕaaː kjf ʔaʕaːwdk w hðaː ʔaθr fʔask waminhunna mamnaʕun taʶdˤuʶrruʶ walaaː tanfaʕu tbdw rd͡ʒlanaː sˤdwqaʶnaʶː jmknk aʶːjdˤaʶː aːlmsaːhma fj aːlmsaːbqa mn χlaːl tqjjm w aʶːdˤaʶːfaʶ d͡ʒml d͡ʒdjda ʕlaː aːlmwqʕ ʔiinnij ʔiiðanaː lafij dˤaʶlaʶaʶːliʶn mubijnin hðh aʶːltˤaʶːwlaʶ mħd͡ʒwza waman lam jarʁab fij aːlssalaaːmaai bulija biaːlʃʃadaaːʔiidi waaːliaːmtihaaːni qaːl wmaː ʕlmj bmaː kaːnwaː jʕmlwn rfdˤt ʕrdˤj lmsaːʕdthaː θumma ʕabasa wabasara aːħðr waʔaammaaː aːlrrahbaau famin ʕiqaaːbi aːlllahi taʕaaːlaaː litaaːrikij ʔaawaaːmirihi wamuhmalij zawaaːd͡ʒirihi kaːn saːmj mʕrwfaː bslwkh aːlmtqllb w aːlʕdaːʔij kamn jbħθ ʕn ʔibra fj kwma qaʃʃ wajurijkum ʔaːjaaːtihi faʔaajja ʔaːjaaːti aːlllahi tunkiruwna falammaaː daχaluwaː ʕalaaː juwsufa ʔaːwaaː ʔiilajhi ʔaabawajhi waqaaːla aːdχuluwaː miʶsˤraʶ ʔiin ʃaaːʔa aːlllahu ʔaːminijna waqaaːla aːlmaʔamuwnu sʔanaːm hnaː waħaraaːmun ʕalaaː qarjaain ʔaahlaknaaːhaaː ʔaannahum laaː jard͡ʒiʕuwna waliʕadli muluwkinaaː fijnaaː hw ʔinkljzj aːlʔaːn ʕrft ʔajn hj ðhb saːmj ʔilaː hnaːk aːχrd͡ʒ mn bjtj ʔalm ʔasmʕk ttklm mʕ ʔaħdhm ʔaʶaʶːsˤjb aːj aːħd ldj ʃqjqjn sʔabqaː baːlbjt ʁdaːan waʶjaʶðˤhaʶraʶ minhu aːlʁinaaː waaːlqudraau wsˤltnaʶː ʔiχbaːrja bʔan aːlʕdw qd nsˤb lnaː kmjnaːan ʕlaː bʕd mjljn mn hnaː wabaladin waaːħidin falaaː jad͡ʒuwzu ʔid͡ʒmaaːʕanaː mnnaːd jnðˤðˤf aːlmnzl wʔaqjmwaː aːlwzn baʶːlqstˤ wlaː tχsrwaː aːlmjzaːn huwa aːllaðij juħjij wajumijtu faʔiiðaaː qaʶdˤaʶaʶː ʔaamranaː faʔiinnamaaː jaquwlu lahu kun fajakuwnu nʕm sˤħjħ qaaːla law ʔaanna lij bikum quwwaaan ʔaaw ʔaːwij ʔiilaaː ruknin ʃadijdin wamaaː ʔaahlaknaaː min qarjaain ʔiillaaː walahaaː kitaaːbun maʕluwmun waʔaammaaː aːlllahbaraau faʶaʶːltˤtˤaʶwiʶjlaʶaʶuʶ aːlmahzuwlaau tʕaːla wħdk ʔiið qaaːla liqawmihi ʔaalaaː tattaquwna ʔajħsbwn ʔanmaː nmdhm bh mn maːl wbnjn faʔiiðanaː juʶfdˤiʶj bihi aːlʔaamalu ʔilaaː aːlfawti min ʁajri darakin faʔiin tawallawaː faʔiinnamaaː ʕalajka aːlbalaaːʁu aːlmubijnu wakitaaːbin mmaʶstˤuʶwriʶn kaðalika waʔaawraθnaaːhaaː qawmanaː ʔaːχarijna qlnaː laː tχf ʔink ʔant aːlʔaʕlaː nazzala ʕalajka aːlkitaaːba biaːlħaqqi muʶsˤaʶddiʶqaʶnaʶː limaaː bajna jadajhi waʔaanzala aːlttawraaːaa waaːlʔiind͡ʒijla aːljwm hw jwm mjlaːdk qaaːluwaː ʔiinnakum kuntum taʔatuwnanaaː ʕani aːljamijni lqd ʔalqjt nðˤraʶ ʕlaː mdwntk tbdw mθjra llʔihtmaːm waaːsʔaal aːlllaha taʕaaːlaaː rizqa jawmin bijawmin ʔant ttklm aːlʔind͡ʒljzjh mn aʶːlʔaʶfdˤl ʔan tðhb maː ħdθ lhm laː jzaːl lʁzaː maː jzaːl twm jðˤnnaʶː ʔaʶsˤdqaʶːʔ qaaːla nuwħun rabbi ʔiinnahum ʕaʶsˤaʶwniʶj waaːttabaʕuwaː man lam jazidhu maaːluhu wawaladuhu ʔiillaaː χasaaːranaː ʔiiði aːlʔaaʁlaaːlu fij ʔaaʕnaaːqihim waaːlssalaaːsilu jusħabuwna flmaː ʔaslmaː wtlh lld͡ʒbjn wʔaqbl bʕdˤhm ʕlaː bʕdˤ jtsaːʔlwn ʔant lm tr qtˤ ʔalmaːsaː ħqjqjaː hðaː hw aːlwqt aːlðj jsˤl fjh ʕaːda wʔin kaːn qmjsˤh qd mn dbr fkðbt whw mn aʶːlsˤaʶːdqjn ʔajmknnj aːlqwl bʔannk ftaːa d͡ʒmjla lqd fʕlt ðlk ʕn ʕmd aːlrd͡ʒaːʔ aːblaːʁj ʕn ʔaj tʁjjr fj ħaːlth fʕaːl lmaː jrjd fj mntˤqaʶ rwhr ʕaːda maː tsbb aʶːlsˤnaʶːʕaʶ aːlmnd͡ʒmja zlaːzlaː bismi aːlllahi aːlrraħmani aːlrraħijmi tˤs tilka ʔaːjaaːtu aːlqurʔaːni wakitaaːbin mubijnin laː jzaːl klaː aːlʔaχwjn ʕlaː qjd aːlħjaːa wamarra bihi ʔaːχaru faʶʔaʶaʶʕtˤaʶaʶːhuʶ d͡ʒubbaaan waʶbuʶʁdˤiʶ man ʔaasaaːʔa ʔilajhaaː ln jsjʔ lkn ʔaħd waːðkr fj aːlktaːb mwsaː ʔinh kaːn mχlsˤaʶː wkaːn rswlaː nbjaː ʕaːdaan maː jtʁjr aʶːltˤqs fj hðaː aːlwqt mn aːlsna qad ʔaaflaħa man tazakkaaːaː wahaðaaː kitaaːbun ʔaanzalnaaːhu mubaaːrakun faaːttabiʕuwhu waaːttaquwaː laʕallakum turħamuwna waaːllaðijna d͡ʒaaːhaduwaː fijnaaː lanahdijannahum subulanaaː waʔiinna aːlllaha lamaʕa aːlmuħsinijna jaaː ʔaajjuhaaː sˤnʕaʶː hw ʔatrʕa aːlkʔasa wʔin ʔiljaːs lmn aːlmrsljn maː ln jtχlaː ʕnk twm wlqd sˤrfnaʶː llnaːs fj hðaː aːlqrʔaːn mn kl mθl fʔabaː ʔakθr aːlnaːs ʔilaː kfwraː juʕqd aːlaːd͡ʒtmaːʕ mrtjn fj aːlʃhr waʶaʶːldˤdˤaʶrbuʶ aːlθθaaːliθu laː baːrd wlaː krjm ʔaʁlb aʶːlðˤn ʔanhaː tntðˤr mnk ʔan tʕtðr ʔiljhaː sʔanzl fj aʶːlmħtˤaʶ aːlqaːdma wmn ʔaːjaːth aːld͡ʒwaːr fj aːlbħr kaːlʔaʕlaːm ʔiin haðaaː ʔiillaaː qawlu aːlbaʃari haːa md͡ʒthda wjuʕtmd ʕljhaː wkm ʔahlknaː qblhm mn qrn hm ʔaħsn ʔaθaːθaː wrʔijaː lam jaʔakul aʶːlqiʶtˤtˤuʶ qrrr saːmj ʔan jʔud͡ʒd͡ʒl ðhaːbh ʔilaː aːld͡ʒaːmʕa fad͡ʒaʕala minhu aːlzzawd͡ʒajni aːlððakara waaːlʔaunθaː walaaː jufarriqu bajna maħmuwdin wamaðmuwmin faʔaaqbalwaː ʔiilajhi jaziffwna hðh mkaːtbnaː smʕt ljlaː saːmj w sljma jtχaʶːsˤmaʶːn waqad rawaaː aːlʕalaaːʔu bnu d͡ʒarijrin ʕan ʔaabijhi ʕan saaːlimi bni masruwqin qaaːla jaχrud͡ʒu minhumaaː aːllluʔuluʔuu waaːlmard͡ʒaːnu lm lm tttsˤlwaʶː bj msbbqaː ʔaʶdˤʕt saːʕtj fʕljj aːlʔaːn ʔan ʔaʃtrj waːħda ʔaχraː kaːn saːmj jtnaːwl aːlddwaːʔ kaːn saːmj ʕlaː wʃk ʔinhaːʔ ħjaːth waʁadawaː ʕalaː ħardin qaːdirjna bajnahumaː barzaχun laː jabʁijaːni tˤlb saːmj ʔan jtrkh aːld͡ʒmjʕ w ʃʔanh wamiħanahu min ʃawaaːhidi nublihi kaːn saːmj jntðˤr fj aːlħaːna laː jwfr aʶːlsˤwm aʶːltˤwjl χbzaːan wamuqaaːranatuhu ʃaqaaː hal tuħibbu aːlssafara waʕalaaː miθli ðalika kaaːnat maraaːθij aːlʃʃuʕaraaːʔi waaːllaðjna kafarwaː biʔaːjaːtinaː hum ʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶːbuʶ aːlmaʃʔaamaai waaːðkur ʕabdanaː ʔaajjwba ʔiið naːdaː rabbahu ʔaannj massanija aʶːlʃʃaʶjtˤaʶːnuʶ biʶnuʶsˤbiʶn waʕaðaːbin faʔiin ʔaaʕwazahu ðalika ʔillaaː aːstismaaːħanaː fahuwa aːlrriqu aːlmuðillu laː jad͡ʒibu ʕaljaa fiʕlu ðlik ʔaabadaːan laː ʔarjd aːlbqaːʔ lwħdj waʶðˤuʶhuʶwruʶ maaː aːstabhama smʕtkmaː ttχaʶːsˤmaʶːn waqaaːla ʕabdu aːlmasijħi bnu nufajlaaa wsˤlnaʶː ʔilaː aːlmstʃfaː bʔamaːn wafij miθlihi qaaːla aːlllahu taʕaaːlaaː wajuzijluhu ʕanhaaː ʃjʔ ljs mntˤqjaʶː ʔabdaː jmknhaː aːn tʕd mn waːħd ʔilaː ʕʃra waʔiilzaaːmuhaaː maaː ʔaalzama min tˤaʶaʶːʕaʶtiʶhiʶ ʔatħbnj aːlʕaaːmilu mutʕibun man ħaʶsˤsˤaʶnaʶ dijnahu waʶwaʶsˤaʶlaʶ raħimahu waʔaakrama ʔiχwaaːnahu faʔiin qanaʕa waʶaʶːqtaʶsˤaʶdaʶ ʔaataaːhu rizquhu χlʕ saːmj mlaːbsh bismi aːlllahi aːlrraħmni aːlrraħjmi waaːlʕaːdijaːti dˤaʶbħaʶnaʶː kaðlika nad͡ʒzij aːlmuħsinjna waʶfuʶrsˤaʶaʶaʶ qudratihi qd jtwqaː aːlsjf whw mʁmd wd͡ʒd saːmj lljlaː mnsˤb ʃʁl fj aːlmsbħ aʶːlʔaʶrdˤ aːlmrjχ w aːlmʃtrj klhm kwaːkb ntˤqaʶː saːmj w ljlaː baːlʃʃhaːda mʕaː aʶːttsˤl bj mdrrsk wajabʕaθu ʕalaaː aʶːlqaʶtˤiʶjʕaʶaʶiʶ waaːlʕuquwqi sqtˤt aːlkθjr mn aːlʔaʃd͡ʒaːr faʔiinna aːlmuluwka tuʕaaːqibu qudraaan laː tns ʔan tqddm ʔikraːmjja llnnaːdl jmkn lltwtr ʔan jʔuθr tʔaθjraː slbjaː kbjraː ʕlaː sˤħtk mn aʶːlʔaʶfdˤl ʔan tsrʕw qaːla faaːlħaqqu waaːlħaqqa ʔaaqwlu jmknk aːlmd͡ʒjʔi mʕj kaːn saːmj jstħqq qdˤaʶːʔ wqt ʔakθr fj aːlssd͡ʒn aːħtimaaːlu aːlssafijhi χajrun min aːlttaħalij biʶsˤuʶwraʶtiʶhiʶ waʶaʶːlħiʶrsˤaʶ ʕalajhi ħaʶðˤðˤaʶnaʶː kamaaː d͡ʒaaːʔa fij aːlħadijθi aːlʔaːχari ʔiðaaː hamamt biʔaamrin fafakkir fij ʕaaːqibatihi faʔiin kaaːna ruʃdanaː faʶʔaʶaʶmdˤiʶhiʶ bdʔa saːmj jqdˤj wqtaː ʔakθr mʕ ljlaː waaːalllahi maaː manaʕahu min d͡ʒawaaːbij ʔillaaː hawaaːnij ʕalajhi waχaaːdaʕa nafsahu biʶʁaʶlaʶtˤiʶhiʶ ʔinnamaaː maaːluk lak ʔaaw lilwaaːriθi ʔaaw lild͡ʒaaːʔiiħaai falaaː takun ʔaaʃqaaː aːlθθalaaːθaai saːmj tzwwd͡ʒ mrra θaːnja bʕd wfaːa zwd͡ʒth kaːn ðlk mmtʕanaː ħattaaː sˤaʶaʶːraʶ kaðibanaː sˤuʶraʶaʶːħaʶnaʶː faʕinda ðalika jazuwlu aʶːlʁaʶdˤaʶbuʶ ʔiinna tutlifu ʃijʔianaː liʁajrika tadfaʕ θamanahu lmħthaː hl d͡ʒʔit wħdk ʔinn ʕjaːdtnaː raːʔida fj hðaː aʶːlqtˤaʶːʕ ʔiiðaː dˤaʶːqaʶ sˤaʶdruʶ aːlmarʔi ʕan sirri nafsihi ʕuθir ʕlaː ħðaːʔ saːmj fj sˤndwq nfaːjaːt ʕlaː saːmj aʶːntðˤaʶːr ljlaː waljakun d͡ʒuwduk karmanaː waraʁbaaan ʔanaː ʔaraː hðaː mʕ mn trjd ʔan ttħdθ faaːlmuqassimaːti ʔaamranaː kjf lj ʔan ʔansaː ʃjʔiaː khðaː waman kallafathu aːlnnafsu fawqa kafaaːfihaaː famaaː jaʶnqaʶdˤiʶj ħattaaː aːlmamaaːti ʕanaaːʔuuhu waminhaaː liʔaannahu qad jastaqillu biʕaaːlij himmatihi kulla kaθijrin maaː ʔaaswaʔau ħaaːli hiʃaaːmin ʔin lam jaʁfir aːlllahu lahu ʔaad͡ʒdaaː nafʕanaː waʔaaħsanu mawqiʕanaː min kaθijrihi maʕa suwʔi aːlttadbijri smʕ aːlmdrrs ðlk baʶːlsˤsˤdfaʶ aʶːnχfdˤ saːmj wajaqwlwna mataː hðaaː aːlfatħu ʔiin kuntum sˤaʶːdiʶqjnaʶ sʔantql llʕjʃ mʕki lmaːðaː trjd aːldraːsa fj aːlχaːrd͡ʒ mina aːld͡ʒinnaai waaːlnnaːsi falanuħjijannahu ħajaaːaan tˤaʶjjiʶbaʶaʶaʶn qaaːla laː bd ʔan lhðaː mʕnaː ʔaχð saːmj mʕh mfaːtjħh w haːtfh aːld͡ʒwwaːl kaːn laːʕbj kra aːlqdm mtʕbjn lknnhm sʕdaːʔ laː tns ðlk ʔabdaː wamaː ðˤaʶlaʶmnaʶːhuʶm walkin kaːnwaː humu aʶːlðˤðˤaʶːliʶmjnaʶ ʔaʶχfdˤ sˤwt aːltlfaːz saːmj tˤbjb ʔarjd ʔan ʔakwn rd͡ʒl ʔiʶtˤfaʶːʔ aːlrʔaj qbl ʃd͡ʒaːʕa aːlʃd͡ʒʕaːn smmjnaː ʔibnnaː ʕlaː ʔism d͡ʒdj flaːn brq blaː mtˤr wʃd͡ʒr blaː θmr faʶaʶːnðˤuʶr kajfa kaːna ʕaːqibaau makrihim ʔaannaː dammarnaːhum waqawmahum ʔaad͡ʒmaʕjna faqad kamulat fijhi ʔaasbaaːbu aːlχajri bdʔa saːmj jsmʕ sˤwtaʶː jsˤdr mn aːlʕllja wafijhi taʔawijlaaːni ʔaaħaduhumaaː ʕilmu maaː laaː jasaʕu d͡ʒahluhu min aːlʕibaaːdaaːti ʔanaː χd͡ʒl d͡ʒdaː mmaː fʕlt bal ʕad͡ʒibta wajasχarwna wamaː min ʁaːʔiibaain fij aːlssamaːʔi waʶaʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤiʶ ʔiillaː fj kitaːbin mubjnin ʔin aʶːstaʶtˤaʶʕt ʔaan taʕmala lillahi biʶaʶːlrriʶdˤaʶaʶː fij aːljaqijni faaːfʕal aːlθθawru jaħriθu aʶːlʔaʶrdˤaʶ ʕaːd saːmj walaaː juħmala ʕalajhi biaːlkaθijri faʶjuʶðˤlaʶmuʶ wqd trwn ʃhaːb aːlmwt qd stˤʕaʶː kallaː ʔiinnahu taðkiraaun jaaː banijja taʕallamuwaː aːlʕilma faʔiin kuntum saaːdaaan fuqtum kaːn saːmj aːlʔawwl fj qsmh ʔaalbasu θawbanaː ʔaaqij bihi nafsij ʔaaħabbu ʔilajja min θawbin ʔaaqijhi binafsij sˤfʕ saːmj ljlaː md͡ʒdddaː walajsa aːlʔaamru ʕalaaː maaː ðˤaʶnnuʶwaʶː χajru aːlmaaːli ʕajnun χarraaːraaun fij ʔaʶaʶrdˤiʶn χawwaaːraain tasharu ʔiðaaː nimta faraːʁa ʔiilaː ʔaahlihi fad͡ʒaːʔa biʕid͡ʒlin samjnin aːllaðj kaððaba watawallaː kra aːlqdm hj lʕbtj aʶːlmfdˤlaʶ qul lillahi aːlʃʃafaːʕaau d͡ʒamjʕanaː lahu mulku aːlssamaːwaːti waʶaʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤiʶ θumma ʔiilajhi turd͡ʒaʕwna waruwija ʔaanna salmaaːna qaaːla liʕalijjin raʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːlllahu ʕanhu kaːnt ljlaː tstħqq ʔan tukrh waʶsˤiʶdquʶn mustamaʕun waaːllaðj χalaqa aːlʔaazwaːd͡ʒa kullahaː wad͡ʒaʕala lakum mina aːlfulki waaːlʔaanʕaːmi maː tarkabwna aːħʃuruwaː aːllaðjna ðˤaʶlaʶmwaʶː waʔaazwaːd͡ʒahum wamaː kaːnwaː jaʕbudwna ʔawdd ʔan ʔansaː kll ʃjʔ maaːta lahum ʔinsaaːnun kaːn saːmj jħbb aʶːlrrjaʶːdˤjaʶːt nʃʔa saːmj fj md͡ʒtmʕ mslm ʕlaː aːlʔinsaːn ʔan jʕrf kl ʃjʔ ʕn ʃjʔ wjʕrf bʕdˤ aːlʃjʔ ʕn kl ʃj lm jlʕb saːmj kra aːlqdm ʔabdaː mʕ zmlaːʔih aːlmslmjn faʶʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶːbuʶ aːlmajmanaai maː ʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶːbuʶ aːlmajmanaai ʕaduwwu ʕaaːqilun χajrun min sˤaʶdiʶjqiʶn d͡ʒaaːhilin laː ttsrʕ baːlʔid͡ʒaːba ʕan majmuwni bni mihraaːna lazimahu musaaːʕidaau zamaaːnihi fij aʶːlqaʶdˤaʶaʶːʔiʶ aʶːlsˤsˤaʶbruʶ fijmaaː jatawaqqaʕuhu min raʁbaain jard͡ʒuwhaaː faʔiinna aːlkalaaːma ʔin lam jaʶnħaʶsˤiʶr biaːlħaaːd͡ʒaai twm naːma χilaːla aːlfjlm waman ðakara χilaaːfahu tˤaʶaʶːbaʶt ʁajbatuhu lm jbqaː ldaː saːmj χjaːr ʔaːχr bismi aːlllahi aːlrraħmni aːlrraħjmi ʔiiðaaː aːlssamaːʔu aːnʃaqqat kaːn saːmj jmdˤj wqth aːlmtmjjz mʕ ʔiχwth waqad rawaaː ʕabdu aːlllahi bnu burajdaaa ʕan ʔaabijhi hal tadruwna maaː jaquwlu lahaaː qaaːluwaː ʔaħtaːd͡ʒ ltwqjʕ twm wanawmu ħumqin wahuwa aːlʕaʃijju ʔiinnaː balawnaːhum kamaː balawnaː ʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶːbaʶ aːld͡ʒannaai ʔiið ʔaaqsamwaː laʶjaʶsˤriʶmuʶnnaʶhaʶː muʶsˤbiʶħjnaʶ ʔaan laaː juʕannifuwaː mutaʕallimanaː walaw ʔaamkana ðalika lakaaːna aːlʔaawwalu qad ʔaaʁnaaː aːlθθaaːnija ʕanhaaː aːstqaːl saːmj mn mnsˤbh fj aːlʕjaːda ʕnd aːlrhaːn tʕrf aːlswaːbq aːlbʕjd ʕn aːlʕjn bʕjd ʕn aːlqlb fawajlun jawmaʔiiðin lilmukaððibjna θumma qaaːla taʁajjara aːlnnaaːsu kaːnaː saːmj w ljlaː jqdˤjaʶːn fj kll jwm ʕʃrjn dqjqa mʕaː dʕaːnj aːlmdrrs baːlssmjn waʔiin ʔaud͡ʒijba faʔiilaaː maaː laaː jastaħiqqu ʕad͡ʒibt liman qijla fijhi aːlχajru walajsa fijhi kajfa jafraħu laː bd mn wd͡ʒwd tˤrjqaʶ maː man aːlkaaːmilu aːlmuruwʔaai faqaaːla kaːn saːmj msjħjjaː mtmsskaː bdjnh kaːn aːlmdrrs sjjʔiaː d͡ʒddaː taqijhim aːlħarra walam jaðkur aːlbarda lqd aʶːnfsˤlnaʶː mn rsm hðh aːllwħaːt ʔaaχrad͡ʒa aːlmarʕaː haː hj mħfðˤtj ln jnsaːhaː ʔaħd ʕlaː saːmj ʔan jʕwd haːhnaː ħaːlanaː wjsaːʕdnaː lnnhj aːlmhma ʔiilaː rabbihaː naʶːðˤiʶraʶaʶuʶn saːmj mslm kajfa nafaaː ʕanhu aːlllawma walaaː ʕaduwwin fajad͡ʒʕala lahu tˤaʶriʶjqaʶnaʶː ʔilaaː ʔiʕlaaːni aːlmasaaːwiʔii wahuwa mud͡ʒiddun waʶqaʶtˤʕaʶnaʶː liðaraaːʔiiʕi aːlʔiiʕd͡ʒaaːbi faʔaammaaː aːlmud͡ʒaaːharaau biʶaʶːlðˤðˤuʶlmiʶ faʕutuwwun faʔiinnahu faqrun ħaʶaʶːdˤiʶruʶn ʔaʕd͡ʒbtnj raːʔiħth waaːlʔaamru qarijbun waaːlħukmu lillahi taʕaaːlaaː faqad qaaːla ʕumaru bnu aʶːlχaʶtˤtˤaʶaʶːbiʶ raʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːlllahu ʕanhu aːlmuħsinu ʕalaaː χaːrd͡ʒ aːlnaːfða rkz fj draːstk laː ʕljk nħn ðaːhbwn ʔilaː bwstˤn ʔanaː lhm aːlðkraː wqd d͡ʒaːʔhm rswl mbjn waʔiinnamaaː juχaaːfu ʕalajhaaː min aːliaːʁtiraaːri biʶaʶːlttaʶsˤaʶnuʶʕiʶ lahaaː ʔinh jrjd fqtˤ aʶːlħsˤwl ʕlaː aːlmtʕa haðaaː bajaaːnun lilnnaaːsi wahudanaː waʶmaʶwʕiʶðˤaʶaʶuʶn lilmuttaqijna walaaː tad͡ʒʕal jadaka maʁluwlaaan ʔiilaaː ʕunuqika walaaː taʶbsuʶtˤhaʶaʶː kulla aʶːlbaʶstˤiʶ wʔan aːllh ʕndh ʔad͡ʒr ʕðˤjm waʶdˤaʶaʶːqaʶt maʕahumaaː aːlħaaːlu wdaːʕjaː ʔilaː aːllh bʔiðnh wsraːd͡ʒaː mnjraː wʔanh kaːn jqwl sfjhnaː ʕlaː aːllh ʃtˤtˤaʶː sjðˤhr ʔabj ʕlaː aːltlfaːz aːlljla ʔant ħsaːs waʔiikθaaːrihi hj lj jjnʁ waman ʔaaħsanu qawlanaː mimman daʕaaː ʔiilaaː aːlllahi waʕamila sˤaʶaʶːliʶħaʶnaʶː waqaaːla ʔiinnanij mina aːlmuslimijna aːntql mnnaːd ʔilaː mnzl d͡ʒdjd aʶːlsˤdq ʔaʶfdˤl sjaːsa jd͡ʒb ʔan trjnj d͡ʒwaːz sfrk ʔaðhb ʔilaː aːlmdrsa fj aːlsaːʕa aːlsaːbʕa ln ʔatmnaː hðaː lʔaħd jktb bjdh aːljsraː aːld͡ʒzaːʔir ʔawlaː ttwjbaː jsbb aːlʔidmaːn maaː jubaddalu aːlqawlu ladajja wamaaː ʔaanaaː biʶðˤaʶllaʶaʶːmiʶn lilʕabijdi hj zwd͡ʒtj bal ʔiijjaaːhu tadʕuwna fajakʃifu maaː tadʕuwna ʔiilajhi ʔiin ʃaaːʔa watansawna maaː tuʃrikuwna waqaaːla muwsaaː ʔiinnij ʕuðtu birabbij warabbikum min kulli mutakabbirin laaː juʔuminu bijawmi aːlħisaaːbi hj maːkra bqdr maː hj ltˤjfaʶ waaːlħaaːlu aːlrraaːbiʕaau aːnh jksb θlaːθa ʔaʶdˤʕaʶːf ʔakθr mmaː aːfʕl aːnaː hw mwd͡ʒwdun fj aːlmktab waliðalika lam juχli aːlllahu taʕaaːlaaː χalqahu twm mn bnj aːlbʃr waaːlwaqaaːru waʶaʶːsiʶtˤaʶaʶuʶn bajna aːlhuzʔi waaːlssaχaaːfaai aʶːχfdˤ rʔask fahaðaaː wad͡ʒhun tanzijla aːlʕazijzi aːlrraħijmi nðˤf aːsnaːnk hl jmknnj msaːʕdtk maː ʔaðnt lk ʔan tms aːlfn nʃrt aʶːltˤbʕaʶ aːlʔawlaː qbl ʕʃr snwaːt wmaː jkðb bh ʔilaː kl mʕtd ʔaθjm hjaː bnaː nðhb ʔilaː mkaːn ʔaːχr jsʔal ʔajaːn jwm aːlqjaːma waʔiinnahu lataðkiraaun lilmuttaqijna ʔant laː tʕlm baʶːlqsˤaʶ kaːmla kjf sndfʕ djwnnaː aːlʔaːn bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm ql ʔaʕwð brb aːlnaːs ʔaammaaː aːllaðijna ʔaːmanuwaː waʕamiluwaː aʶːlsˤsˤaʶaʶːliʶħaʶaʶːtiʶ falahum d͡ʒannaaːtu aːlmaʔawaaː nuzulanaː bimaaː kaaːnuwaː jaʕmaluwna ʔaanna aːlmuʕd͡ʒaba biʕamalihi mumtannun bihi waaːlmumtannu ʕalaaː aːlllahi taʕaaːlaaː d͡ʒaaːħidun liniʕamihi ʔiinna ʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶaʶːbaʶ aːld͡ʒannaai aːljawma fij ʃuʁulin faaːkihuwna faʶaʶːlʕaʶaʶːsˤiʶfaʶaʶːtiʶ ʕaʶsˤfaʶnaʶː aːllaðij ʔaaħsana kulla ʃajʔin χalaqahu wabadaʔaa χalqa aːlʔiinsaaːni min tˤiʶjniʶn jʔatj kl jwm lzjaːra sˤdjqh aʶːlmrjdˤ hl ʔanta bχjr qaːlaː rbnaː ðˤlmnaʶː ʔanfsnaː wʔin lm tʁfr lnaː wtrħmnaː lnkwnn mn aːlχaːsrjn mtˤaʶːr kndj mn fdˤlk wamaaː ʔaasʔaalukum ʕalajhi min ʔaad͡ʒrin ʔiin ʔaad͡ʒrija ʔiillaaː ʕalaaː rabbi aːlʕaaːlamijna lqd ʔanhjt waːd͡ʒbaːtj liʔaannahu qad jaχtalifu biaːχtilaaːfi aːlʔaaħwaaːli ʔinhu ʕaːmlnj bswʔ lw smħt hl tʕlm maː hj twqʕaːt aʶːltˤqs ljwm ʁd wajadraʔau ʕanhaaː aːlʕaðaaːba ʔaan taʃhada ʔaarbaʕa ʃahaaːdaaːtin biaːlllahi ʔiinnahu lamina aːlkaaːðibijna ʔanaː sˤbbnaʶː aːlmaːʔ sˤbaʶː ʔin ħsˤl hðaː lʔaj sbb fmaːðaː stfʕl rifduhh brrhu maːlʔi aʶːlqtˤbjn hl ʔanta tsʕl dmaːʔ hðaː ljs d͡ʒjdaːan aːktʃft aːljwm ʔan hnaːk fjlm aːsmh aːlrws qaːdmwn aːlrws qaːdmwn waaːllaðijna hum biʔaːjaaːti rabbihim juʔuminuwna ʔaw ʔamr baːltqwaː hl ʔant mbswtˤ hnaː twm wmaːrj fj sjaːra twm qul lillahi aːlʃʃafaaːʕaau d͡ʒamijʕanaː lahu mulku aːlssamaaːwaaːti waʶaʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤiʶ θumma ʔiilajhi turd͡ʒaʕuwna qaaːla ʔiin saʔaaltuka ʕan ʃajʔin baʕdahaaː falaaː tuʶsˤaʶaʶːħiʶbniʶj qad balaʁta min ladunnij ʕuðranaː wfj χlqkm wmaː jbθ mn daːba ʔaːjaːt lqwm jwqnwn waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlbulaʁaaːʔi aːlʔaamalu kaaːlssaraaːbi ʁarra man raʔaːhu waχaaːba man rad͡ʒaaːhu ʔanaː ʔaʃʕr baʶːlʕtˤʃ waqaaːla muħammadu bnu baʃijrin raħimahu aːlllahu raʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːlllahu ʕanhu ʔaawwaluhumaaː maaː jaʶntaʶðˤiʶmuʶ bihi ʔaumuwru d͡ʒumlathaaː waʶtˤaʶlaʶbt mink mawaddaaan lam ʔaʶuʶʕtˤaʶhaʶaʶː ʔinna aːlmuʕannaaː tˤaʶaʶːliʶbuʶn laaː jaʶðˤfaʶruʶ waqaaːla aːlʕabbaaːsu bnu aːlʔaaħnafi wabiaːlʔaasħaaːri hum jastaʁfiruwna liʔaanna aːld͡ʒamaaːla sˤiʶfaʶaʶuʶn laaːzimaaun wafij aːlʕad͡ʒzi ʕalaaː fiʶtˤaʶniʶhiʶm faħamala aːlrruqʕaaa ʔilaaː kaaːtibi aːlddijwaaːni lm ʔafhm ʃjʔiaː mmaː jqwl ʔanaː fqtˤ knt fj aːlwqt aːlmnaːsb waːlmkaːn aːlmnaːsb bl qaːlwaː ʔinaː wd͡ʒdnaː ʔaːbaːʔnaː ʕlaː ʔama wʔinaː ʕlaː ʔaːθaːrhm mhtdwn ʔawlm jr aːlʔinsaːn ʔanaː χlqnaːh mn ntˤfaʶ fʔiðaː hw χsˤjm mbjn walaaː jaʔamurakum ʔaan tattaχiðuwaː aːlmalaaːʔiikaaa waaːlnnabijijna ʔaarbaaːbanaː ʔaajaʔamurukum biaːlkufri baʕda ʔiið ʔaantum muslimuwna wud͡ʒuwhun jawmaʔiiðin mmusfiraaun laː ʔaʃrb aːlkħwljaːt hn jstħqnh waʔiinnaka latadʕuwhum ʔiilaaː sˤiʶraʶaʶːtˤiʶn mustaqijmin twm ʕbr aːlnhr wʔin jrjdwaː χjaːntk fqd χaːnwaː aːllh mn qbl fʔamkn mnhm waːllh ʕljm ħkjm ʔilaː ʕd͡ʒwzaː fj aːlʁaːbrjn aːllaðijna jaʶðˤuʶnnuʶwnaʶ ʔaannahum mulaaːquw rabbihim waʔaannahum ʔiilajhi raaːd͡ʒiʕuwna waʔiin minkum ʔiillaaː waaːriduhaaː kaaːna ʕalaaː rabbika ħatmanaː maʶqdˤiʶjjaʶnaʶː ʔinn ʃwqj ħaːʔir fj mqltjk kun ʕdjm aːlrħma waaːllaðijna hum ʕani aːlllaʁwi muʶʕriʶdˤuʶwnaʶ marad͡ʒa aːlbaħrajni jaltaqijaaːni ʔaam jaquwluwna taqawwalahu bal llaː juʔuminuwna hl ʔanti sʕjda fj mnzlk jwd͡ʒd mqhaː ʔamaːm aʶːlmħtˤaʶ jrbj twm aːlχjwl aːlʕrbja aːlnd͡ʒwm ʕbaːra ʕn kraːt ʕmlaːqa mn aːlblaːzma tqʕ ʕlaː msaːfaːt saːħqa mn md͡ʒrtnaː waʔiinnaaː lad͡ʒaaːʕiluwna maaː ʕalajhaaː sˤaʶʕiʶjdaʶnaʶː d͡ʒuruzanaː rʔajth jrkdˤ hj fʕlt kl ðlk bmfrdhaː ʔan ħr fj aːlħdjθ mʕ ʔaj kaːn lam jazdad min aːlllahi ʔillaaː buʕdanaː wlaː ttˤjʕwaʶː ʔamr aːlmsrfjn ʔanaː ʔaʶtttˤlʕ lrʔujtk fj qbʕtk wrdaːʔik bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm waːlmrslaːt ʕrfaː faːtχðt mn dwnhm ħd͡ʒaːbaː fʔarslnaː ʔiljhaː rwħnaː ftmθl lhaː bʃraː swjaː ʔafhm aːltrkja aːlħlzwnaːt bbtˤʔ mn ʃr maː χlq hj kʔaχjhaː waaːlʃʃuʕaraaːʔu jattabiʕuhumu aːlʁaaːwuwna twd͡ʒh ʔilaː mħtˤaʶ ħaːflaːt aːld͡ʒzaːʔir aʶːlʕaʶːsˤmaʶ hl ħaːwlt aːlaːstmaːʕ ʔiljhaː saːmj kaːn ʕlaː fjsbwk lqd ʔauħrd͡ʒt ħqaːan maːðaː laː ʔaʶsttˤjʕ smaːʕkm ʔajhaː aːlrfaːq mn hðh aʶːltˤflaʶ aːltj mʕk ʔanaː ʔarjd ʔan ʔaðhb ʔilj aːld͡ʒna wlkn laː ʔarjd ʔan ʔamwt llwsˤwl ʔilaː hnaːk wad͡ʒannaaːtin ʔaalfaaːfanaː jbdwaː lj ʔanh jʕlm aːlsr lijad͡ʒzija aːlllahu kulla nafsin maaː kasabat ʔiinna aːlllaha sarijʕu aːlħisaaːbi walaʔiin saʔaaltahum man χalaqahum lajaquwlunna aːlllahu faʔaannaaː juʔufakuwna waʔaanʃada ʕabdu aːlllahi bnu aːlzzubajri θalaaːθaaa ʔaabjaaːtin d͡ʒaaːmiʕaaan likulli maaː qaaːlathu aːlʕarabu aːʕtni bnfsk waʔaːχaruwna murd͡ʒawna liʔaamri aːlllahi ʔiimmaaː juʕaððibuhum waʔiimmaaː jatuwbu ʕalajhim waaːlllahu ʕalijmun ħakijmun ʔaʶuʶsˤjb saːmj baːlmaːlaːrjaː wahuwa aːllaðij juħjij wajumijtu walahu aːχtilaaːfu aːlllajli waaːlnnahaaːri ʔaafalaaː taʕqiluwna ʔaʕjdh ʔilj jħwl aːld͡ʒsm aːlsʕraːt aːlħraːrja aːlzaːʔida ʔilaː ʃħm kaːn ʕlaː aːlmdrs ʔan jqjm d͡ʒmjʕ aʶːltˤlb ʔin aːlðjn ʔad͡ʒrmwaː kaːnwaː mn aːlðjn ʔaːmnwaː jdˤħkwn ʔinhu jtħdθ aːlbrbrja mʕ mudrsahu qul ʕasaaː ʔaan jakuwna radifa lakum baʶʕdˤuʶ aːllaðij tastaʕd͡ʒiluwna wahija muʶʕaʶrraʶdˤaʶaʶuʶn liħasadi aːlʔaadaaːnij waaːlʔaaqaaːribi laː ʔarjd χsaːrtaki aːlʔab fj aːlʁrfa waʔiin lam takun radaaːʔaau aʶːlχaʶtˤtˤiʶ saʕaaːdaaan aːqraʔa warabbuka aːlʔaakramu hðaː kθjr ʔalaː tʕrf ʔin kaːnt lwsj qaːdra ʕlaː tklm aːljaːbaːnja ʔajn aːlħbl hl jmknnj ʔan ʔasʔal ʔilaː ʔajn ʔanta ðaːhb waːltft aːlsaːq baːlsaːq lmaːðaː sˤʕdt ʔilaː sqf bjthaː ʔanaː ʕlaː aːlqaːʔima ldjh sjaːra d͡ʒdjda w ʔaχraː qdjma jʕd͡ʒbh hðaː aːld͡ʒjtaːr hnaːk mn jnðˤr ʔiljk hl hðh ʔawl zjaːra lk lm tsˤl aːlħaːfla bʕd aːlbs qbbʕtk jħjaː wʔabwh zkrjaː nbjaːn mn ʕnd aːllh fijhimaaː ʕajnaaːni tad͡ʒrijaaːni wjtˤwf ʕljhm ʁlmaːn lhm kʔanhm lʔulʔu mknwn mn tkwnjii waʔaammaaː man d͡ʒaaːʔaka jasʕaaː aːbq saːktaː bjnmaː nʔakl qaːl rbj jʕlm aːlqwl fj aːlsmaːʔ waʶːlʔaʶrdˤ whw aːlsmjʕ aːlʕljm faʔiinna aːlrraʔaja aːlmaʕluwla laaː jabqaaː ʕalaaː ħaaːlihi faminhum man ʔaːmana bihi waminhum man sˤaʶddaʶ ʕanhu wakafaaː bid͡ʒahannama saʕijranaː mimmaaː χaʶtˤiʶjʔiʶaʶaʶːtiʶhiʶm ʔauʁriquwaː faʔaudχiluwaː naaːranaː falam jad͡ʒiduwaː lahum min duwni aːlllahi ʔaʶaʶnsˤaʶaʶːraʶnaʶː faʔiinna faʶdˤlaʶ aːlmaʃhadi ʕalaaː aːlmaʁijbi luʔumun walakum fijhaaː d͡ʒamaaːlun ħijna turijħuwna waħijna tasraħuwna ʔaʕtqd ʔan hðaː ʕðˤjm wʔadχlnaːh fj rħmtnaː ʔinh mn aʶːlsˤaʶːlħjn mrħbanaː baːlʕaːlm ʔink lmn aːlmrsljn jd͡ʒb ʔan jkwn aːlbaːb ʔimaː mʁlqaː ʔaw mftwħaː qul ʔiinna aːlʔaawwalijna waaːlʔaːχirijna ʔad͡ʒaːbt baːkjaan fj rq mnʃwr waʔiiðaaː qaraʔata aːlqurʔaːna d͡ʒaʕalnaaː bajnaka wabajna aːllaðijna laaː juʔuminuwna biaːlʔaːχiraai ħid͡ʒaaːbanaː mastuwranaː maːkθjn fjh ʔabdaː waaːðkur ʕabdanaaː ʔaajjuwba ʔiið naaːdaaː rabbahu ʔaannij massanija aʶːlʃʃaʶjtˤaʶaʶːnuʶ biʶnuʶsˤbiʶn waʕaðaaːbin waʶbiʶʔiʶiʶðˤhaʶaʶːriʶ maknuwnihi takuwnu aːlfaaːʔiidaau wabiaːstidaaːmaai sˤaʶbriʶhiʶ jakuwnu aːlʔiikθaaːru lqd sqtˤ twm fj ħwdˤ aːlsbaːħa ʁajra ʔaanna aːlddunjaaː ʔiðaaː sˤaʶlaʶħaʶt kaaːna ʔisʕaaːduhaaː mawfuwranaː waʶʔiʶiʶʕraʶaʶːdˤuʶhaʶaʶː majsuwranaː lm jd͡ʒd twm nðˤaʶːraʶːth jariθunij wajariθu min ʔaːli jaʕquwba waaːd͡ʒʕalhu rabbi raʶdˤiʶjjaʶnaʶː waʔiiχwaaːnuhum jamudduwnahum fij aːlʁajji θumma laaː juʶqsˤiʶruʶwnaʶ ldjhaː sbʕa sˤbjaʶːn wamina aːlnnaaːsi man jaʃrij nafsahu aːbtiʁaaːʔa maʶrdˤaʶaʶːtiʶ aːlllahi waaːlllahu raʔuwfun biaːlʕibaaːdi qaːl rb ʔinj laː ʔamlk ʔilaː nfsj wʔaχj faːfrq bjnnaː wbjn aːlqwm aːlfaːsqjn waʔiimmaaː taχaaːfanna min qawmin χijaaːnaaan faaːnbið ʔiilajhim ʕalaaː sawaaːʔin ʔiinna aːlllaha laaː juħibbu aːlχaaːʔiinijna kaːnt tlk aːltfaːħa ħqaː lðjða jwm jqwm aːlrwħ waːlmlaːʔika sˤfaʶː laː jtklmwn ʔilaː mn ʔaðn lh aːlrħmn wqaːl sˤwaʶːbaʶː aːlbndqja mdjna rwmnsja kaðalika jaʶtˤbaʶʕuʶ aːlllahu ʕalaaː quluwbi aːllaðijna laaː jaʕlamuwna rd djmaː bʔan sʔal hl jqtl aʶːlʔaʶsˤdqaʶːʔ bʕdˤaʶnaʶː bʕd aːlmʕaːʃra haːa kaːnt ʁaʶːdˤbaʶ ʕlaːa ʔibnhaː ʔanta laː tsttˤjʕ ʔan tʔaklhaː fqtˤ lʔanhaː mʁðja hðh aːlklma sˤʕbaʶ llntˤq waʔaahdijaka ʔiilaaː rabbika fataχʃaaː wʔajwb ʔið naːdaː rbh ʔanj msnj aʶːldˤr wʔant ʔarħm aːlraːħmjn qaːl aːltlmjð ʔin aːlmʕlm laː jħtrm nfsh waqaaːluwaː ʔaːmannaaː bihi waʔaannaaː lahumu aːlttanaaːwuʃu min makaaːnin baʕijdin rfdˤt ʕn ʔasbaːb ʃχsˤjaʶ aːllaðij ʔaaħallanaaː daaːra aːlmuqaaːmaai min faʶdˤliʶhiʶ laaː jamassunaaː fijhaaː naʶsˤaʶbuʶn walaaː jamassunaaː fijhaaː luʁuwbun wmaː jdrjk lʕlh jzkaː hl fhmwaː waqaaːla mahbuwdun kaːn ðaːk aːlfndq qrjbaːan d͡ʒdaːan mn aːlbħjra waʔaanna aːlmasaaːd͡ʒida lillahi falaaː tadʕuwaː maʕa aːlllahi ʔaaħadanaː kallaaː ʔiinnahu kaaːna liʔaːjaaːtinaaː ʕanijdanaː qaːl ʔaraːʁb ʔant ʕn ʔaːlhtj jaː ʔibraːhjm lʔin lm tnth lʔard͡ʒmnk waːhd͡ʒrnj mljaː θalaaːθun man kunaa fijhi wad͡ʒada ħalaaːwaaa aːlʔiijmaaːni aʶːχfdˤj rʔask faʶlaʶnaʶquʶsˤsˤaʶnaʶ ʕalajhim biʕilmin wamaaː kunnaaː ʁaaːʔiibijna hl ldjk aːlkθjr ltfʕlh aːljwm ʔið aːnbʕθ ʔaʃqaːhaː taqdijru maaː jatawallaaːhu min aːlʔaamwaaːli bisunani aːlddijni min ʁajri taħrijfin fij ʔaaχðihaaː waʶʔiʶiʶʕtˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶhaʶaʶː ʔawlʔik aːlðjn aːʃtrwaː aʶːldˤlaʶːlaʶ baːlhdaː waːlʕðaːb baːlmʁfra fmaː ʔaʶsˤbrhm ʕlaː aːlnaːr ʔiin tad͡ʒtanibuwaː kabaaːʔiira maaː tunhawna ʕanhu nukaffir ʕankum sajjiʔiaaːtikum wanudχilkum mudχalanaː karijmanaː χrd͡ʒt mʕ ʔaʶsˤdqaʶːʔiʶhaʶː ʔaʕtqd ʔannj sʔaʶʕtˤs ʔaʶʕtˤnj mndjlaːan ʔaadabu aːlmutaʕallimi faʶsˤluʶn wasaʔaaðkuru tˤaʶraʶfaʶnaʶː mimmaaː jataʔaaddabu bihi aːlmutaʕallimu wajakuwnu ʕalajhi aːlʕaaːlimu jamuddu jadajhi ʔiilaaː aːlssamaːʔi jaː rabbu jaː rabbu ʔanaː χlfh mbaːʃra watanħituwna mina aːld͡ʒibaaːli bujuwtanaː faaːrihijna waaːllaðijna jumassikuwna biaːlkitaaːbi waʔaaqaaːmuwaː aʶːlsˤsˤaʶlaʶaʶːaʶaʶ ʔiinnaaː laaː nuʶdˤiʶjʕuʶ ʔaad͡ʒra aʶːlmuʶsˤliʶħiʶjnaʶ waʔiin tadʕuwhum ʔiilaaː aːlhudaaː laaː jattabiʕuwkum sawaaːʔun ʕalajkum ʔaadaʕawtumuwhum ʔaam ʔaantum sˤaʶaʶːmiʶtuʶwnaʶ qmjsˤhuʶ kaːn mbqʕaːan baʶːlsˤlsˤaʶ bdʔa aːldm jsjl bsrʕa muʶdˤaʶχχiʶmaʶnaʶː ʔams nakkt wlaː tunkkd mn twfj aːllaðijna ʔaːmanuwaː waʶtaʶtˤmaʶʔiʶiʶnnuʶ quluwbuhum biðikri aːlllahi ʔaalaaː biðikri aːlllahi taʶtˤmaʶʔiʶiʶnnuʶ aːlquluwbu wskntm fj msaːkn aːlðjn nwʕaːan maː baːlnsba lsjaːra mstʕmla laː jhm mn tsʔal ʔanta ln tsttˤjʕ ʔan tħsˤl ʕlaː aːlʔid͡ʒaːba aʶːlmuʶrdˤjaʶ faʔiiðaaː qaraʔanaaːhu faaːttabiʕ qurʔaːnahu nsˤħnj aʶːltˤbjb bʔan ʔatrk aːlʃraːb fajaʔatijahum baʁtaaan wahum laaː jaʃʕuruwna min ʔaajna ʔaantum hðh d͡ʒhnm aːltj kntm twʕdwn tʕrft ʕljh aːlʕaːm aʶːlmaʶːdˤj fj ħfla lqd knt fj ʁfla mn hðaː fkʃfnaː ʕnk ʁtˤaʶːʔk fbsˤrk aːljwm ħdjd fj aːlħaaːli ʕan aːstibðaaːli aːlħaraaːʔiiri ʔilaaː aːlʔiimaaːʔi kaaːna ʔaakmala limuruwʔatihi qrʔat rsaːlth ʕda mraːt ʔin aʶːlmsˤdqjn waʶːlmsˤdqaʶːt wʔaʶqrdˤwaʶː aːllh qrdˤaʶː ħsnaː jdˤaʶːʕf lhm wlhm nad͡ʒzij man ʃakara maaː ʔaanta biniʕmaai rabbika bimad͡ʒnuwnin jd͡ʒb ʕlaː aːlmrʔ aːn jʕml bd͡ʒd waːn jkwn mħðˤwðˤaʶː llħsˤwl ʕlaː aːlrfaːhja hj tbqaː ʕlaː ʔiʶtsˤaʶːl mʕh qaːl ʔinmaː ʔanaː rswl rbk ʔanhu maːt kaːn lbd ʔan tχbrnj bʔaj ʃjʔ ʔinaː kðlk nd͡ʒzj aːlmħsnjn wakaθraau aːlχadami km mn sˤdjq ldjk ʕlaː aːlfjsbwk kaːnt aːlklaːb tnbħ kl ljla wʔin d͡ʒaːdlwk fql aːllh ʔaʕlm bmaː tʕmlwn falajsa aːlsmaːʔ bmaːʔ mnhmr ʔiinnamaaː suʶltˤaʶaʶːnuʶhuʶ ʕalaaː aːllaðijna jatawallawnahu waaːllaðijna hum bihi muʃrikuwna hj ʔaklt aːltfaːħa ljkfrwaː bmaː ʔaːtjnaːhm wljtmtʕwaː fswf jʕlmwn waʔiinnaaː lanaħnu aːlmusabbiħuwna aːftħ fmk ʔaʶsˤbħ ʕaːzf bjaːnw waʶsˤaʶħħaʶħaʶ maaː ðakartu twm ʔaqtrħa ðalk baːlrwħ baːld͡ʒsd walakinnahu aʶːlqaʶaʶːsˤiʶduʶ lidafʕi maaː jaridu ʕalajhi min faaːsidin ʔaaw sˤaʶħiʶjħiʶn jχaːdʕwn aːllh waːlðjn ʔaːmnwaː wmaː jχdʕwn ʔilaː ʔanfshm wmaː jʃʕrwn fj hðaː aːlbld laː jzaːl hnaːk ʔanaːs jmʃwn bdwn ʔaħðja jrjd aːllh ʔan jχff ʕnkm wχlq aːlʔinsaːn dˤʕjfaʶː wajaχdaʕa bihi aːlʕuquwla aːlwaaːhijaaa ʔiinnahum jarawnahu baʕijdanaː ʔanaː laː ʃʔi bdwnk ʔanaː bχjr jaː ʔammj kʁlj aːlħmjm ʔaʶðˤn ʔan mʃaːhda aːltlfzjwn hj mdˤjʕaʶ llwqt aːftrq aːlzwd͡ʒaːn llʔabd ʔardt fqtˤ smaːʕ sˤwtk jaː ʔajhaː aːlðjn ʔaːmnwaː ʔaʶtˤjʕwaʶː aːllh wrswlh wlaː twlwaː ʕnh wʔantm tsmʕwn θm ʔinkm bʕd ðlk lmjtwn lm jχbrnj ʔaħd bwd͡ʒwdk hnaː faʔaammaaː aʶːlʃʃuʶruʶwtˤuʶ aʶːlmaʶħsˤuʶwraʶaʶuʶ fijhi faθalaaːθaau ʃuʶruʶwtˤiʶn waqaaːlat tˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶfaʶaʶuʶn ʔauχraaː ljlaː tbdw raːʔiʕa ʔaaʔiifkanaː ʔaːlihaaan duwna aːlllahi turijduwna hl ħd͡ʒzt lj tðaːkr aʶːltˤaʶːʔiʶraʶ lmn hðh aːlbjwt aːld͡ʒdjda d͡ʒazaaːʔan min rabbika ʕaʶtˤaʶaʶːʔaʶn ħisaaːbanaː ttsaːmaː fwq haːmi aːlʃuhubi sʔalth ʔin kaːn jʕrf ʔismj lm jsttˤʕ aːlftaː ʔan jd͡ʒd tˤrjq aːlχrwd͡ʒ mn aːlmtaːha wamaaː huwa ʔiillaaː ðikrun lilʕaaːlamijna faaːdχuluwaː ʔaabwaaːba d͡ʒahannama χaaːlidijna fijhaaː falabiʔisa maθwaaː aːlmutakabbirijna muð faʶtˤaʶraʶhuʶm ʕuqalaaːʔa waʔiinnahu ʕalaaː ðalika laʃahijdun jd͡ʒb ʔan ʔaʶdˤbtˤ saːʕtj ʔinhaː btˤjʔiʶaʶ jsttˤjʕ ʔan jtklm aːljaːbaːnja ʔarjd ʔiʶdˤaʶːfaʶ bʕdˤ aʶːlmlaʶːħðˤaʶːt laː jʕdˤ aːlðʔib ðʔibanaː baʶjdˤaʶaʶːʔaʶ laððaain lilʃʃaaːribijna aːld͡ʒw baːrd d͡ʒdaː faː aːstaːnbwl ʔaħtaːd͡ʒ ʔiljk ʔaallaaː taʕbuduwaː ʔiillaaː aːlllaha ʔiinnanij lakum minhu naðijrun wabaʃijrun χdˤʕ zjd ldwra mkθfa hl swf nltqj ʁdaːan fawajlun liʶlmuʶsˤaʶlliʶjnaʶ hðh btˤjχaʶːt hl ttħdθ aːllaːtfja ʕlaː srr mtqaːbljn waman d͡ʒamaʕa bajna riʶdˤaʶaʶː aːlllahi taʕaaːlaaː waʶriʶdˤaʶaʶː aːlnnaaːsi faqad tammat saʕaaːdatuhu waʕammat niʕmatuhu jnbʁj ʔan tsˤlħ sjaːrtk qaːm twm bhðaː mʕ ʔaχjh jrħlwn w jbqaː ʔaθrhm fkʔanhm ʕaːʃwaː bʕd ʔan maːtwaː lqd tzwd͡ʒth laː ʔaʕlm ʔajn jskn jmknhaː tħdθ aːljaːbaːnjja maː zaːlt aːlkʕka fj aːlfrn wajlun lid͡ʒammaaːʕi aːlqawli wajlun liʶlmuʶsˤiʶrriʶjnaʶ aːttaχaðuwaː ʔaajmaaːnahum d͡ʒunnaaan faʶsˤaʶdduʶwaʶː ʕan sabijli aːlllahi ʔiinnahum saaːʔa maaː kaaːnuwaː jaʕmaluwna tksrt ʔanaːbjb aːlmjaːh waqaaːla ʕalijju bnu ʔaabij tˤaʶaʶːliʶbiʶn karrama ʔasaːbjʕ hnaːk fj aːlʃhr tlk aːlmrʔaa aːlʕd͡ʒwz tʕjʃ bmfrdhaː ʔinj aːlʔaːn ʔaχtaːr bʕdˤ aːlmlaːbs aːlmnaːsba kj ʔartdjhaː fj aʶːlʕtˤlaʶ ʔinna ʕubajda aːlllahi qad sˤaʶddaʶqaʶ qawlij maː lh mn daːfʕ walaaː taquwlanna liʃajʔin ʔiinnij faaːʕilun ðalika ʁadanaː aːlθwm w aʶːlbsˤl ʕlaːd͡ʒjn fʕaːljn llzkaːm aːlʕaːdj ħaːwl maːkljlaːn ʔan jtˤmʔiʶn ljnkwln ʔiin taʶħriʶsˤ ʕalaaː hudaaːhum faʔiinna aːlllaha laaː jahdij man juʶdˤiʶlluʶ wamaaː lahum min naʶaʶːsˤiʶriʶjnaʶ mn aʶːlʔaʶfdˤl ʔan nʕwd ʔilaː aːlbjt bdlaː mn aʶːlaʶːntðˤaʶːr hnaː laː ʔaħd hnaː jʕrf hjʔia twm wʔan ʕðaːbj hw aːlʕðaːb aːlʔaljm ʔaaw faʶrdˤiʶn ʔaaddaaːhu faqad tanqasimu ʔaaħwaaːlu man daχala fij ʕadadi aːlʔiiχwaaːni ʔaarbaʕaau ʔaaqsaaːmin tmt tbrʔith mn kl msʔuwlja waqaaːmat ʕalajk ħud͡ʒd͡ʒatuhu fbʃrnaːh bʁlaːm ħljm kjfmaː saːʔt ħaːlthaː fhj tʕml daːʔimaːan aːʃtrjta aʶːltˤʕaʶːm fʔin aːʃtrjtu ʔanaː aːlχmra fsnkwn mtʕaːdljn jawmaʔiiðin tuħaddiθu ʔaaχbaaːrahaaː hl trʁb bbjdˤaʶ mslwqa fj aʶːlftˤwr qbʕaːt aːlnsaːʔ ʁaːlja ʔaan fajuwaffijhim ʔaud͡ʒuwrahum waaːlllahu laaː juħibbu aʶːlðˤðˤaʶaʶːliʶmiʶjnaʶ walaaː biqawli kaaːhinin qalijlanaː maaː taðakkaruwna walaaː taʶħaʶaʶːdˤdˤuʶwnaʶ ʕalaaː tˤaʶʕaʶaʶːmiʶ aːlmiskijni faːdʕwaː qdr aʶːlmsttˤaʶːʕ aːħb aːn aːχbz maː ʃaːʔ aːllh waqad qaaːlat aːlħukamaaːʔu law d͡ʒarat aːlʔaaqsaaːmu ʕalaaː qadri aːlʕuquwli lam taʕiʃ aːlbahaaːʔiimu waʔiin kaaːna biaːlllawmi ʔaad͡ʒdara fj aːlsn quluwbihim waʕalaaː samʕihim waʕalaaː ʔaʶaʶbsˤaʶaʶːriʶhiʶm ʁiʃaaːwaaun walahum ʕaðaaːbun ʕaʶðˤiʶjmuʶn waʔaaqijmuwaː aːlwazna biʶaʶːlqiʶstˤiʶ walaaː tuχsiruwaː aːlmijzaaːna wad͡ʒamʕuhum θubuwranaː man waʶluʶwtˤaʶnaʶː ʔiið qaaːla liqawmihi ʔaataʔatuwna aːlfaaːħiʃaaa waʔaantum tuʶbsˤiʶruʶwnaʶ ʔiillaaː aːllaðijna taaːbuwaː waʶʔaʶaʶsˤlaʶħuʶwaʶː wabajjanuwaː faʔauwlaʔiika ʔaatuwbu ʕalajhim waʔaanaaː
