faʶdˤluʶ darad͡ʒatajni walilʕulamaaːʔi ʕalaaː aːlʃʃuhadaaːʔi faʶdˤluʶ darad͡ʒaain twm wmaːrj ʔaχbraː d͡ʒwn ʔanhmaː jrjdaːnh ʔan jd͡ʒaːls tˤflhmaʶː laː jwd͡ʒd ʔaj ʔaml bismi aːlllahi aːlrraħmani aːlrraħijmi waaːlʕaaːdijaaːti dˤaʶbħaʶnaʶː aːlʕdjd mn aʶːlʔaʶtˤfaʶːl laː juħbwn aʶːlχdˤrwaʶːt lkn ʔaχj aʶːlsˤʁjr juħbuhaː fj bjwt ʔaðn aːllh ʔan trfʕ wjðkr fjhaː aːsmh jsbħ lh fjhaː baːlʁdw waʶːlʔaʶːsˤaʶːl waʕad͡ʒibt liman ʔaajqana biaːlqadari θumma jatʕabu waaːlmuqillu min aːlʔiiχwaaːni aːlmutaχajjiru lahum kaaːallaðij jataχajjaru aːld͡ʒawhara hallaaː saʔaaluwaː ʔiðaaː lam jaʕlamuwaː faʔiinnamaaː ʃifaaːʔu aːlʕijji aːlssuʔuaaːlu kaaːallaðij ħukija ʕan fijθaaːʁuwrsa fij waʶsˤaʶaʶːjaʶaʶːhuʶ aːlmarmuwzaai ʔaannahu qaaːla waʶaʶːlsˤsˤaʶbruʶ ʕalaaː sˤuʶħbaʶtiʶhiʶm karukuwbi aːlbaħri faʔaaχaðathumu aʶːlsˤsˤaʶjħaʶaʶuʶ muʃriqijna qul ʔiinnamaaː ʔaunðirukum biaːlwaħji walaaː jasmaʕu aʶːlsˤsˤuʶmuʶ aːldduʕaaːʔa ʔiiðaaː maaː junðaruwna lmaːðaː laː jsttˤjʕ ʔabdaː fʕl ʃjʔ aːlqaaːʔiilu waaːlmustamiʕu waaːlʔaːχiðu aʶːlʔaʶtˤfaʶːl mrʔaːa lld͡ʒw aːlʕaːʔilj twm wmaːrj jstʕdaːn ʔanaː laː ʔaʕrf ʔaj ʃʔi bʕd ʔanaː mstʕd daːʔimaː llmwt qaaːluwaː laʔiin lam tantahi jaaː luʶwtˤuʶ latakuwnanna mina aːlmuχrad͡ʒijna ʔablʁkm rsaːlaːt rbj wʔaʶnsˤħ lkm wʔaʕlm mn aːllh maː laː tʕlmwn bwb ʔaʕrb ʕn klmaːt aːlʃkr njaːba ʕn zmlaːʔih fj aʶːlsˤf aːllaðijna junfiquwna fij aːlssaraaːʔi waʶaʶːldˤdˤaʶraʶaʶːʔiʶ waʶaʶːlkaʶaʶːðˤiʶmiʶjnaʶ aʶːlʁaʶjðˤaʶ waaːlʕaaːfijna ʕani aːlnnaaːsi waaːlllahu juħibbu aːlmuħsinijna ʃkraːan lka hl jmknk ʔan tʕtˤj tqrjraːan kaːmlaːan ħwl maː ħdθ zaːr rʔijsu aːlwlaːjaːt aːlmtħda aʶːlsˤjnaʶ zjaːraan rsmja fj ʔaj ʕaːm wldt aːħtflnaː tˤjlaʶ aːlljl fwqaːh aːllh sjʔiaːt maː mkrwaː wħaːq bʔaːl frʕwn swʔ aːlʕðaːb waχibraau ʔaaχlaaːqihim qabla aʶːsˤtˤiʶfaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶhiʶm faʔiinnahu maaː ʔaaħadun jaʕdamu ʕaduwwanaː walaaː jafqidu ħaaːsidanaː ʔataː mnnaːd ʔilaː mnzlj ʔaðhb ʔilj aːlʕml fj aːlsaːʕa aːlsaːbʕa ltˤaʶːlmaʶː ʔaħbbtk faʔiinna ʔid͡ʒaaːbatahaaː tusriʕu ʔanti wsˤltiʶ mbkraːan d͡ʒdaːan hl bʔimkaːnk ʔan tʕtˤjnj dqjqa ʔarjd ʔan ʔaqwl lk ʃjʔiaː aːlmaːʔ mhm d͡ʒdaː aːllaðij ʔaʶaʶtˤʕaʶmaʶhuʶm mmin d͡ʒuwʕin waʔaːmanahum mmin χawfin kraːmaː kaːtbjn fʕl saːmj kll maː bwsʕh kj jsˤf ljlaː bʔabʃʕ sˤwraʶ mmkna lmaːðaː ttbʕnj knt friħaan baːlʔams hal θuwwiba aːlkuffaaːru maaː kaaːnuwaː jafʕaluwna wakaaːna jad͡ʒuwzu min aːlmukallafijna ʔaan laaː takuwna haðihi aːlʔaumuwru muʶsˤliʶħaʶaʶaʶn lahum waʔaarʃadahu ʔilajhaaː biʶaʶːlfaʶtˤiʶnaʶaʶiʶ aːllaðijna jukaððibuwna bijawmi aːlddijni ramzunaː ramzunaː mad͡ʒdunaː wʕhdunaː wwaːd͡ʒbun mna aːlwafaː ʔaskn fj bld ʔawrwbj ʕn ʔabj jaʕlaaː ʃaddaaːdi bni ʔaawsin raʶdˤiʶj aːllhu ʕanhu aːlftjaːt jrjdwn fqtˤ aʶːlħsˤwl ʕlaː aːlmtʕa ʔam llʔinsaːn maː tmnaː waʶʔaʶaʶsˤluʶ aːlzzuhdi aːlrrahbaau waθamaratuhu aːlʕibaaːdaau faʔiiðaaː aːqtarana aːlzzuhdu waaːlʕilmu faqad tammat aːlssaʕaaːdaau waʕammat aʶːlfaʶdˤiʶjlaʶaʶuʶ ʔiðaː lm tkn fj sˤfnaʶː fsnʕdk mn ʔaʕdaːʔinaː daːʔimaː ʔaʁsl wd͡ʒhj baʶːlsˤaʶːbwn waːlmaːʔ wmn dwnki ħtmaːan qlbj jnthj faʔaammaaː aːlllaaːzimu fahuwa aːlʔaanafaau lilʔaːbaaːʔi min taʶhaʶdˤdˤuʶmiʶn ʔaaw χumuwlin maθalu aːlddunjaaː waaːlʔaːχiraai maθalu dˤaʶrraʶtaʶjniʶ ʔin ʔaʶaʶrdˤaʶjt ʔiħdaaːhumaaː ʔaʶaʶsχaʶtˤt aːlʔauχraaː jd͡ʒib ʔan tfkr fj ʕaːʔiltka qaaːla ʔiin kunta d͡ʒiʔita biʔaːjaain faʔati bihaaː ʔiin kunta mina aʶːlsˤsˤaʶaʶːdiʶqiʶjnaʶ ʔanti ldjki ʔanf kbjr faʔaammaaː maʕa faqdi aːlʔaaʕwaaːni faʕalaaː aːlʔiinsaaːni aːlkaffu ljwm ʕðˤjm waqaaːla aːlmalaʔau aːllaðijna kafaruwaː min qawmihi laʔiini aːttabaʕtum ʃuʕajbanaː ʔiinnakum ʔiiðanaː laχaaːsiruwna tˤbʕaʶːaʶn fasabbiħ biħamdi rabbika waaːstaʁfirhu ʔiinnahu kaaːna tawwaaːbanaː aːltdχjn jqtl faʔiinna ʔaaħadakum laaː jadrij mataaː jaħtaaːd͡ʒu ʔilajhi ʔaaw mataaː jaħtaaːd͡ʒu ʔilaaː maaː ʕindahu wjqwlwn mtaː hðaː aːlwʕd ʔin kntm sˤaʶːdqjn lmaːðaː thaːd͡ʒr aʶːltˤjwr waʔiiðaaː raʔaawka ʔiin jattaχiðuwnaka ʔiillaaː huzuwanaː ʔaahaðaaː aːllaðij baʕaθa aːlllahu rasuwlanaː waʶːlnaʶːʃtˤaʶːt nʃtˤaʶː aːtbʕ maː ʔawħj ʔiljk mn rbk laː ʔilh ʔilaː hw wʔaʶʕrdˤ ʕn aːlmʃrkjn qaaːluwaː famaaː d͡ʒazaaːʔuuhu ʔiin kuntum kaaːðibijna bali aːllaðijna kafaruwaː fij ʕizzaain waʃiqaaːqin mn aʶːlsˤʕb ʔan tkwn aːnsaːnaː ħqjqjaː fkðbwh fʔahlknaːhm ʔin fj ðlk lʔaːja wmaː kaːn ʔakθrhm mʔumnjn aːnt ðkj d͡ʒdaː fj lwħ mħfwðˤ aʶːsˤmt rizqanaː lilʕibaaːdi waʔaaħjajnaaː bihi baldaaan majtanaː kaðalika aːlχuruwd͡ʒu qaːl rb ʔin qwmj kðbwn qaaːla laqad kuntum ʔaantum waʔaːbaaːʔuukum fij dˤaʶlaʶaʶːliʶn mubijnin laaː tasubbuwhaaː faʔiinnahaaː ʕammarat bilaaːda aːlllahi taʕaaːlaaː faʕaaːʃa fijhaaː ʕibaaːdu aːlllahi taʕaaːlaaː ʔanaː ʔaːsf wlkn hðaː lm jʕd mtaːħaːan qum bzjaːrtnaː ʁdaːan hl sbq lk ʔan rʔajt smka qrʃ jzjd tˤwlhaʶː ʕn θlaːθa ʔamtaːr nħn fj aːlχrjf aːlʔaːn waʶːlʔaʶrdˤ ðaːt aʶːlsˤdʕ hl ʔant mtzwd͡ʒa faʔiiðaaː nazala bisaaːħatihim fasaaːʔa sˤaʶbaʶaʶːħuʶ aːlmunðarijna kjfa ʕlmtji maː kaːnt trjdhu ʔanti jmknki daːʔimaːan aːlnwm ʕlaː ʔarjktj hlaː ʔarjtnj rχsˤtk tˤaʶlaʶbuʶ aʶːlʔiʶiʶnsˤaʶaʶːfiʶ min qillaai aʶːlʔiʶiʶnsˤaʶaʶːfiʶ taʁlijbanaː lilddijni ʕalaaː aːlnnasabi waʶtˤaʶaʶːʕaʶaʶiʶ aːlllahi taʕaaːlaaː ʕalaaː tˤaʶaʶːʕaʶaʶiʶ aːlʔaabi ljs ldj dljl wlʔin ʔaðqnaːh nʕmaːʔ bʕd dˤraʶːʔ msth ljqwln ðhb aːlsjʔiaːt ʕnj ʔinh lfrħ fχwr wʔiðaː msh aːlχjr mnwʕaː mfaːqmaː bðlk aːlmsaːfa aːltj jd͡ʒb ʔan jqtˤʕhaʶː aːlfwtwn ljsˤl ʔiljnaː ʔinhu mzʕd͡ʒ ʔaraː tˤaʶːʔiʶraʶːaʶn ʕlaː aːlʃd͡ʒra waaːlssaqfi aːlmarfuwʕi χajrun min ʔaalfin fij kutubik faʔiiðaaː qaraʔata aːlqurʔaːna faaːstaʕið biaːlllahi mina aʶːlʃʃaʶjtˤaʶaʶːniʶ aːlrrad͡ʒijmi waqad qaaːla aːlkindijju aʶːlsˤsˤaʶdiʶjquʶ ʔinsaaːnun huwa ʔaanta ʔillaaː ʔaannahu ʁajruk liʔaanna aːlʕud͡ʒba naʶqsˤuʶn junaaːfij aʶːlfaʶdˤlaʶ laaː sijjamaaː maʕa qawli aːlnnabiji sˤaʶllaʶaʶː aːlllahu ʕalajhi wasallama ʔiilaaː ʕizii tuwnis ʔiilaaː mad͡ʒdihaaː rid͡ʒaaːlu aːlbilaaːdi waʃubaaaːnuhaaː qaːlwaː ʔard͡ʒh wʔaχaːh waːbʕθ fj aːlmdaːʔin ħaːʃrjn waqaaːla ʕalijjun karrama aːlllahu wad͡ʒhahu liaːbnihi aːlħasani aʶːsˤbʕj aʶːlsˤʁjr mtwrm ʕalaaː waʶaʶːsˤiʶliʶhaʶaʶː faqaaːla taʕaaːlaaː ʔaraːd twm aːstdʕaːʔ aʶːlʃrtˤaʶ wlkn maːrj lm tsmħ lh ʔauχtj tˤaʶːbiʶʕaʶ d͡ʒjda d͡ʒdaːan bismi aːlllahi aːlrraħmani aːlrraħijmi sabbiħi aːsma rabbika aːlʔaaʕlaaː ʔiinnaka majjitun waʔiinnahum majjituwna qad χalat min qablikum sunanun fasijruwaː fij aʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤiʶ faʶaʶːnðˤuʶruʶwaʶː kajfa kaaːna ʕaaːqibaau aːlmukaððibijna aːlraːʔiħa mn mmjzaːt aːlθwm waːtbʕ maː jwħaː ʔiljk waʶːsˤbr ħtaː jħkm aːllh whw χjr aːlħaːkmjn hw laː jdrs aːlʔind͡ʒljzja aːlʔaːn waðalika qad jakuwnu biʶsˤuʶnuʶwfiʶn min aːlbirri wajaχtalifu bisababi aːχtilaaːfi aːlʔaaħwaaːli hl tʔaðnjn lj baːldχwl nʕm baʶːltˤbʕ maː aːlðj jraːhu fjhaː qrrr saːmj bjʕ mnzlh aːlsmka trjd ʔan tsbħ ʔanaː baːlfʕl ðhbt ʔilaː mħl aːld͡ʒzaːr hðaː aʶːlsˤbaʶːħ aʶːlqtˤ jnaːm ʕlaː aʶːltˤaʶːwlaʶ faʔaanta ʔiðanaː min ʔiχwaaːni aʶːlʃʃaʶjaʶaʶːtˤiʶjniʶ ʔinhu jsttˤjʕ ʔan jfʕl hðaː ʔaʶfdˤl mnj walihaðaaː qijla aːlttaθabutu waaːliaːrtijaaːʔu wamudaaːwamaau aːliaːχtijaaːri waaːliaːbtilaaːʔu mutaʕaððirun bal mafquwdun stqwm bðlk ʔin dfʕt lhaː aːlθmn hl tʕlm km aːlwqt aːlʔan fj bwstˤn lhðh aʶːlqsˤsˤaʶ nhaːja ħzjna sʔaʶtˤlq aːlnaːr ʕljh ʔanti laː jmknki tħdθ aːlʔind͡ʒljzja hl jmknki ʔanta qd laː turjd fiʕl ðlk laː jhmnj waaːlʃʃud͡ʒaaːʕaau waʶaʶːsiʶtˤaʶaʶuʶn bajna aːlttaqaħumi waaːld͡ʒubni bχjl hðaː aʶːltˤfl jstħq hdja wamina aːlllajli fasabbiħhu waʔiidbaaːra aːlnnud͡ʒuwmi ħdθt ʕnh buʶtˤwn aːlktbi hl tħtaːd͡ʒ ħqaː lklb ʔiʶdˤaʶːfj wlaː jsʔal ħmjm ħmjmaː mnaːχnaː jtʁjr qad saʔaalahaaː qawmun min qablikum θumma ʔaʶaʶsˤbaʶħuʶwaʶː bihaaː kaaːfirijna faʶaʶːlttaʶwaʶaʶːdˤuʶʕuʶ wamud͡ʒaaːnabaau aːlʕud͡ʒbi hl trjdjn aːlχrwd͡ʒ mʕj aːlljla ðhb ħsn ʔilaː aːlmdrsa stuχtbr braːʔth fj aːlwqt aːlmnaːsb wqaːlt lʔaχth qsˤjh fbsˤrt bh ʕn d͡ʒnb whm laː jʃʕrwn wʔinj mrsla ʔiljhm bhdja fnaʶːðˤraʶ bm jrd͡ʒʕ aːlmrslwn hl maːzlta trjd ʃaːjaːan ʔarjd ʔan ʔaðhb ʔilaː aːlmdjna ʕn ʔabj hrjraa raʶdˤiʶj aːllhu ʕanhu qaːla qaːla rswlu aːllhi sˤaʶllaʶaʶː aːllhu ʕalajhi wasallama hnaːk sbʕa ʔajaːm fj aːlʔasbwʕ faʔiinna fij ðalika kufranaː liniʕmatihi ʔajmknk mlaʶːħðˤaʶ aːlfrq lqd ʔarsltu ʔiljka brjdaːan ʔilktrwnjaːan laː faːʔida mn mħaːwla ħl hðh aːlmsʔala laːjmkn ʔan tħkm ʕljh mn mðˤhrh laː tbqj wlaː tðr wmaː ʔaʶsˤaʶːbkm jwm aːltqaː aːld͡ʒmʕaːn fbʔiðn aːllh wljʕlm aːlmʔumnjn wjmkrwn wjmkr aːllh waːllh χjr aːlmaːkrjn wqaːlwaː ʔaʔaːlhtnaː χjr ʔam hw maː dˤrbwh lk ʔilaː d͡ʒdlaː bl hm qwm χsˤmwn kaːn ðlk aːlktaːb mθjraːan fmaːlʔiwn mnhaː aʶːlbtˤwn fkðb wʕsˤaʶː walaaː ʔaanaaː ʕaaːbidun maaː ʕabadtum ʔin aːlqaːʔima kmaː jlj wslaːm ʕlaː aːlmrsljn maaː baaːluk takrahu aːlwalada faqaaːla qul ʔaaðalika χajrun ʔaam d͡ʒannaau aːlχuldi aːllatij wuʕida aːlmuttaquwna kaaːnat lahum d͡ʒazaaːʔan waʶmaʶsˤiʶjraʶnaʶː ʔawʔamn ʔahl aːlqraː ʔan jʔatjhm bʔasnaː dˤħaʶː whm jlʕbwn lm tkn fj aːlmzaːd͡ʒ aːlmnaːsb llktb aːld͡ʒaːda hðaː hw aːlfrq bjnj wbjnk fatanaaːzaʕuwaː ʔaamrahum bajnahum waʔaasarruwaː aːlnnad͡ʒwaaː wamin ʔaasbaaːbi aʶːlttaʶqsˤiʶjriʶ ʔaʶaʶjdˤaʶnaʶː ʔaan jaʁfula ʕan aːlttaʕalumi fij aʶːlsˤsˤiʶʁaʶriʶ ln ʔatwqqf ʕn aːlbħθ ħttaː ʔad͡ʒd twm rʃʃt maːrj wd͡ʒh twm baːlmaːʔ qaːl lm ʔakn lʔasd͡ʒd lbʃr χlqth mn sˤlsˤaʶːl mn ħmʔi msnwn ðhb aːlwld wbʕd mda ʕaːd wlm jʃtraː ʃjʔiaːan ʔanaː χaːʔifh d͡ʒdaːan mn aːlðhaːb ʔilaː hnaːk bmfrdj ql lj ʔaj nwʕ mn aːlχbz trjd ʔaklh mn fdˤlk ʁaːdr ħaːlaːan man raʶdˤiʶjaʶ biʶsˤuʶħbaʶaʶiʶ man laaː χajra fijhi lam jaʶrdˤaʶ biʶsˤuʶħbaʶtiʶhiʶ man fijhi χajrun waħaddaθa aːlħasanu aʶːlbaʶsˤriʶjjuʶ biħadijθin faqaaːla lahu rad͡ʒulun hl ʔanaː fuzt bismi aːlllahi aːlrraħmani aːlrraħijmi qul ʔaaʕuwðu birabbi aːlnnaaːsi lmn hðh aʶːlmðˤlaʶ wʔin rbk hw jħʃrhm ʔinh ħkjm ʕljm ʔanaː mn zaːmbjaː knaː d͡ʒmjʕanaː nʃk fjh aːχtft draːd͡ʒtj ʔama tbnj bʕzm laː jljn ʕfwaːan bdwn aːlwsaːbj mn fdˤlk waqaaːla wahbu bnu munabbihin ʔanaː ʔabħθ ʕn aːlʔad͡ʒbaːn qaːla maaː aːlmasʔuuwlu ʕanhaː biʔaaʕlama mina aːlssaaːʔiili ʔant laː tnsˤt faʔiin aːstadaaːma aːlssababu daaːmat aːlʔaulfaau qaːl rb aːʃrħ lj sˤdrj θm ʔaχðt aːlðjn kfrwaː fkjf kaːn nkjr km mn mra ðhbt mn aːld͡ʒna waːlnaːs ʔinh jʃm raːʔiħa aːlħsaːʔ llðjn jʔulwn mn nsaːʔihm trbsˤ ʔarbʕa ʔaʃhr fʔin faːʔwaː fʔin aːllh ʁfwr rħjm kl maː kaːn jrjdh twm ħqaːan kaːn kʔasaːan mn aːlmaːʔ ʔanaː qlq bʃʔan ntjd͡ʒa tħljl aːldm wʔin kaːnwaː ljqwlwn mnnaːd smjn tˤwkjw hj qrja kbjra klaː bl tħbwn aːlʕaːd͡ʒla fanad͡ʒd͡ʒajnaaːhu waʔaahlahu ʔaad͡ʒmaʕijna aːlħjaːa aːlrjfja hj aːlʔakθr hdwʔanan mqaːrnaan bħjaːa aːlmdjna fltkn jaː ʕmaːn nħnu mn ʕhdi aːlnbj ʔaaħaduhumaaː ʔauχuwwaaun muktasabaaun biaːliaːttifaaːqi aːld͡ʒaaːrij mad͡ʒraaː aʶːliʶaʶːdˤtˤiʶraʶaʶːriʶ flmaː qdˤaʶːh bʕd sta ʔaʃhr qdˤaʶːh drhmjn wθlaːθ ħbaːt ʃʕjr mn zrʕ ħsˤd qaːl fmaː χtˤbkm ʔajhaː aːlmrslwn ʔin lkm fjh lmaː tχjrwn ʔin ʃaːʔ aːllh sunnaaa man qad ʔaarsalnaaː qablaka min rusulinaaː walaaː tad͡ʒidu lisunnatinaaː taħwijlanaː wkaːn jʔamr ʔahlh baʶːlsˤlaʶːaʶ waːlzkaːa wkaːn ʕnd rbh mrdˤjaʶː waʔiiðaaː quriʔia aːlqurʔaːnu faaːstamiʕuwaː lahu waʶʔaʶaʶnsˤiʶtuʶwaʶː laʕallakum turħamuwna fʔin twlwaː fʔin aːllh ʕljm baːlmfsdjn faqalla bihaðaaː aːlttaʕlijli ʔiχwaaːnu ʔaahli aʶːlfaʶdˤliʶ liqillatihim ħkm ʕljh aʶːlqaʶːdˤj baːlʔiʕdaːm lnʕud qbl ʔan tuʶmtˤr kjf tʕrfnj sʔal naːθaːnjjl ʔiinnahu fakkara waqaddara ʔaraːd twm mʕrfa maː ʔin kaːn limaːrj ħbjb wʔiðaː mrdˤt fhw jʃfjn ʔanaː ʔaħb aːllʁa aːlʔind͡ʒljzja ʔakθr mn aʶːlrjaʶːdˤjaʶːt waqad qaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi laː ʔaʶtˤjq aʶːlsˤbr ħtaː ʔaraː aːlnsχa aːld͡ʒdjda mn ttwjbaː nʕm aːlmʔuaddibu aːldhr laː jʔatjh aʶːlbaʶːtˤl mn bjn jdjh wlaː mn χlfh tnzjl mn ħkjm ħmjd ʔanaː nsjt aːsm ʔaχwk maː aːsmuhu wataaːlllahi laʔaakijdanna ʔaʶaʶsˤnaʶaʶːmaʶkuʶm baʕda ʔaan tuwalluwaː mudbirijna laː ʔaurjd ʔan ʔatħdθ ʕnhaː lqd tðˤaʶːhr ʔanh laː jsmʕnj ʔaʶfdˤl ħaːljaː qraːʔa ktb aːlmsaːʕda aːlðaːtja waʔiimmaaː ʔaan jakuwna liʕillaain fij aːlssaaːmiʕi aːlmustaχrid͡ʒi ʔam jqwlwn aːftraːh ql ʔin aːftrjth fʕlj ʔid͡ʒraːmj wʔanaː brjʔ mmaː td͡ʒrmwn wamaaː ʔaadraaːka maaː aːlʕaqabaau liman ʃaaːʔ minkum ʔaan jataqaddama ʔaaw jataʔaaχχara ðalika min ʔaanbaaːʔi aːlʁajbi nuwħijhi ʔiilajka wamaaː kunta ladajhim ʔiið ʔaad͡ʒmaʕuwaː ʔaamrahum wahum jamkuruwna aːlmd͡ʒtmʕ laː jbaːlj mtˤlqaʶːaʶn ʔanaː lst mtʕbaːan tχaːf aːlħjwaːnaːt mn aːlnaːr ʔajn ʔaqrb sˤjdljaʶ walaqad kuntum tamannawna aːlmawta min qabli ʔaan talqawhu faqad raʔaajtumuwhu waʔaantum taʶnðˤuʶruʶwnaʶ aːnhaːrt aʶːlʔaʶrdˤjaʶ wzrwʕ wmqaːm krjm θm ʕbs wbsr lm ʔakn ʔarjd ʔan tʁaːdrjnj wamustakθiranaː liʶlnnaʶqiʶjsˤaʶaʶiʶ fijhi lijantahija ʕanhaaː kl mn ʕljhaː faːnin mnnaːd wsjm ʔarslthaː baːlbrjd hw sχj bʔamwaːlh hl jwd͡ʒd ʔaj ʃʔi muhim ʔaħbb ðwq aʶːlftˤr man juʔuammilu jaaː muħammadu ʔaaqraʔat maaː fijhaaː faqult mn aʶːlsˤʕb aːn tħb ʔaħdaː ʕndmaː laː tʕlm ʔin kaːn jħbk mθlmaː tħbh htlr wld wnʃʔa fj aːlnmsaː aːlħdjθ aːlχaːms ʕʃr ʔikraːm aʶːldˤjf hal ʔaataaːka ħadijθu dˤaʶjfiʶ ʔiibraaːhijma aːlmukramijna wʔin lh ʕndnaː lzlfaː wħsn mʔaːb nzl ʕljk aːlktaːb baːlħq msˤdqaʶː lmaː bjn jdjh wʔanzl aːltwraːa waːlʔind͡ʒjl hl kaːnt aːlnd͡ʒwm aːlbdaːʔija qwja kfaːja lʔiħdaːθ ʔiʕaːda tʔajjn aːlkwn bʔimkaːn aːlklmaːt ʔan tkwn ʃfaːfa ʔaw ʁaʶːmdˤaʶ kaːn saːmj hw mn aːrtkb aːld͡ʒrjma sˤdjqj jnbʁj ʔan jkwn fj aːlmnzl aːlʔan taqadam tʃtmm mnh raːʔiħa aːlbwl ʔaʕlmnj ʔin smʕta ʃjʔianaː ʔanaː ʔaħbk ʔaʶjdˤaʶː tʕd͡ʒbnj χtˤtk bdʔaaat ktaːba aːltqrjr ʕnd aːlθaːmna w ʔanhath ʕlaː aːlθaːnja wʔin d͡ʒnħwaː llslm faːd͡ʒnħ lhaː wtwkl ʕlaː aːllh ʔinh hw aːlsmjʕ aːlʕljm ʔinmaː ntˤʕmkm lwd͡ʒh aːllh laː nrjd mnkm d͡ʒzaːʔ wlaː ʃkwraː waʔaanna ʔidraaːkahu badijʕun muʕd͡ʒizun aːnt laː tħbnj waʶsˤuʶħbaʶaʶuʶ aːlʔaaħmaqi ʃuʔumun wahaðihi aːlʔaumuwru laaː juʶwsˤaʶluʶ biʁajri aːlddijni ʔilajhaaː walaaː jaʶsˤluʶħuʶ aːlnnaaːsu ʔillaaː ʕalajhaaː klaː waːlqmr waːtrk aːlbħr rhwaː ʔinhm d͡ʒnd mʁrqwn wabiħasabi wufuwrihaaː fijhi jad͡ʒibu ʔaan jakuwna aːlmajlu ʔilajhi waaːlθθiqaau bihi ljtmknwaː mn aːlaːχtjaːr bʃkl sˤħjħ ʔaaw juħibbu aːliaːttisaaːma biaːlʃʃahaaːdaai fajataʕallamu kitaaːba aːlʃʃahaaːdaaːti faʶjaʶsˤiʶjruʶ mawsuwmanaː bid͡ʒahli maaː juʕaaːnij waʔiiðaaː kaaːna maaː χarad͡ʒa ʕan aːliaːʕtidaaːli ʔilaaː maaː lajsa ktbt rsaːla lʔamj fahaðaaː juʶwaʶdˤdˤiʶħuʶ taʕlijla maaː fij aːlmaʕaaːnij min aːlʔaasbaaːbi aːlmaaːniʕaai min fahmihaaː hj tˤaʶːlbaʶ waʔaaðinat lirabbihaaː waħuqqat lndʕ aːlħdjθ ʕn hðh aːlmsʔala lwqt ʔaːχr bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm hl ʔataːk ħdjθ aːlʁaːʃja litadwi aːlsaamaaːwaaːt biraʕdihaaː litarmi aʶːlsˤaʶaʶwaʶaʶːʕiʶquʶ nijraaːnahaaː fmn jʕml mθqaːl ðra χjraː jrh wʔamaː mn χft mwaːzjnh sʔaftqdk χalaqa aːlʔiinsaaːna min ʕalaqin qalaba aːlllahu aːlddunjaaː taaːlllahi ʔiin kunnaaː lafij dˤaʶlaʶaʶːliʶn mubijnin ʔamaː zlt tðkr waqaaːla saʕijdu bnu ħumajdin maaː sˤiʶħħaʶaʶuʶn ʔaabadanaː binaaːfiʕaain ħattaaː jaʶsˤiʶħħaʶ aːlddijnu waaːlχuluqu ʔaam lakum suʶltˤaʶaʶːnuʶn mubijnun maː mʕnaː klma fj hðh aːld͡ʒmla ħattaaː balaʁat biʔaulfaai aːlʔaansaaːbi taʶnaʶaʶːsˤuʶraʶhaʶaʶː ʕalaaː aːlqawijji aːlʔaajjidi wataħakkamat bihi taħakkuma aʶːlmuʶtaʶsaʶlliʶtˤiʶ aʶːlmuʶtaʶʃaʶtˤtˤiʶtˤiʶ faʔaːmanuwaː famattaʕnaaːhum ʔiilaaː ħijnin ʔanaː ħtaː laː ʔaʕrf maː ðlk fijhinna χajraaːtun ħisaaːnun lm jsttˤʕ aːltʁlb ʕlaː aːlrʁba fj sjd͡ʒaːrain ʔaχraː aːlrd͡ʒaːʔ ftħ ħqjbtk waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlʕulamaaːʔi χajru aːlʕilmi maaː nafaʕa waχajru aːlqawli maaː radaʕa laː tχjb ðˤnj bk ʔism sˤdqj aːlʔisbaːnj ʔinrjk waraʁbaaun fij muʔuaaːχaaːtihi waqul rabbi ʔaanzilnij munzalanaː mubaaːrakanaː waʔaanta χajru aːlmunzilijna ʔaʕrfhaː mnð kaːnt tˤflaʶ sˤʁjraʶ mn jwld fj aːsbaːnjaː jkwn aːsbaːnjaːan aːʕtqdt aːnk ln tʔatj aːlaː hnaː ʔiinnaaː ʔaanzalnaaːhu fij lajlaain mubaaːrakaain ʔiinnaaː kunnaaː munðirijna laː tdˤʕ wqtk ʔaʔantm tzrʕwnh ʔam nħn aːlzaːrʕwn faːstʕdj wχðj mnaː aːld͡ʒwaːb man ʕamila sˤaʶaʶːliʶħaʶnaʶː falinafsihi waman ʔaasaaːʔa faʕalajhaaː wamaaː rabbuka biʶðˤaʶllaʶaʶːmiʶn lilʕabijdi maː aːlðj tʕnjh klma fj hðh aːld͡ʒmla aːlħdjθ aːlraːbʕ mraːħl aːlχlq lm jʕrf ʔaħd mn fʕlhaː maaː jaʶsˤuʶdduʶhuʶ ʕan aːlʕud͡ʒbi bihi θumma aːrd͡ʒiʕi aʶːlbaʶsˤaʶraʶ karratajni janqalib ʔiilajka aʶːlbaʶsˤaʶruʶ χaaːsiʔianaː wahuwa ħasijrun faʔiinna aːlmukaaːfiʔia lajsa biʶaʶːlwaʶaʶːsˤiʶliʶ walakinna aʶːlwaʶaʶːsˤiʶlaʶ man ʔiðaaː quʶtˤiʶʕaʶt raħimuhu waʶsˤaʶlaʶhaʶaʶː faʔauwlaʔiika ʕasaaː aːlllahu ʔaan jaʕfuwa ʕanhum wakaaːna aːlllahu ʕafuwwanaː ʁafuwranaː qaːl ʔinj ljħznnj ʔan tðhbwaː bh wʔaχaːf ʔan jʔaklh aːlðʔib wʔantm ʕnh ʁaːflwn fjhn χjraːt ħsaːn aːlmrʔ baːlʔaχlaːq jsmw ðkrh fmn aːftraː ʕlaː aːllh aːlkðb mn bʕd ðlk fʔawlʔik hm aʶːlðˤaʶːlmwn waaːʕbud rabbaka ħattaaː jaʔatijaka aːljaqijnu ʔiið jaʁʃaaː aːlssidraaa maaː jaʁʃaaː ʃʕb aːld͡ʒzaːʔir mslm θma ktb kθjra fj ʁrfth aːstħmmn mn fdˤlkn waχalaqa aːld͡ʒaaːnna min mmaaːrid͡ʒin mmin nnaaːrin ʔiinnamaaː ðalikumu aʶːlʃʃaʶjtˤaʶaʶːnuʶ juχawwifu ʔaawlijaaːʔahu falaaː taχaaːfuwhum waχaaːfuwni ʔiin kuntum muʔuminijna d͡ʒahannama jaʶsˤlaʶwnaʶhaʶaʶː wabiʔisa aːlqaraaːru bismi aːlllahi aːlrraħmani aːlrraħijmi ʔiiðaaː aːlssamaaːʔu aːnʃaqqat surrt blqaːʔik rbmaː ħtaː aːlħqjqa tχaːf ʔan tðˤhr ʔant ʕrdˤaʶ llnsjaːn bkjtu tˤwaʶːl aːlljl tˤfl χaːʔif mn aʶːlðˤlaʶːm waqaaːla ʕumaru bnu ʕabdi aːlʕazijzi raʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːlllahu ʕanhu mdˤaʶː ʃhraːn ʕlaː wsˤwlj ʔilaː tˤwkjw swf ʔaqtlk laː tlʕb kra aːltns ʔaamsu ʔaad͡ʒalun qijla aːdχuluwaː ʔaabwaaːba d͡ʒahannama χaaːlidijna ʔan maːlh ʔaχldh ʃkranaː qaːl djmaː bjnmaː aʶːtsˤl baːlrqm aːlχʃb jħtrq jʕtbr ʔaʶfdˤl mħaːmj fj aːlmdjna lqd rʔajt lltw ħjwaːn aːlʔabwswm qaːlwaː swaːʔ ʕljnaː ʔaʶwʕðˤt ʔam lm tkn mn aʶːlwaʶːʕðˤjn aʶːlmttˤwʕjn qaːm bqfza χtˤjraʶ laʔaantum ʔaaʃaddu rahbaaan fij sˤuʶduʶwriʶhiʶm mina aːlllahi ðalika biʔaannahum qawmun laaː jafqahuwna qaːl ʔinmaː aːlʕlm ʕnd aːllh wʔablʁkm maː ʔarslt bh wlknj ʔaraːkm qwmaː td͡ʒhlwn laaː tasmaʕu fijhaaː laaːʁijaaan ʔaʶmdˤaʶː saːmj tfwjdˤaʶː jmnħ fjh aːlħqq ljlaː kj tsħb aːlmaːl mn ħsaːbaːth ʔaaħaduhumaaː ʔaanna aːlʕaðaaːba aːllaðij huwa min fawqihim ʔaumaraaːʔu aːlssuwʔi θm ʃqqnaː aʶːlʔaʶrdˤ ʃqaː hl lħqt baʶːlqtˤaʶːr waaːlmaaːniʕu min fahmihi huwa ʕalaaː maaː ðakarnaaː min ʔaaqsaaːmihi waminhu maaː kaaːna mustawdaʕanaː biʶaʶːlχaʶtˤtˤiʶ sbbt aːlʔaχbaːr aːlkθjr mn aːlaːrtbaːk w lmn jsttˤjʕ rbʕ saːʕa jwmjaː fhðaː ʔaʶfdˤl w ʔaʶfdˤl faʔiin tawallawaː faqul ʔaːðantukum ʕalaaː sawaaːʔin waʔiin ʔaadrij ʔaaqarijbun ʔaam baʕijdun maaː tuwʕaduwna waqismun mawluwduwna wakaðalika nuwallij baʶʕdˤaʶ aʶːlðˤðˤaʶaʶːliʶmiʶjnaʶ baʶʕdˤaʶnaʶː bimaaː kaaːnuwaː jaksibuwna wnjsrk lljsraː hl tʕtqd ʔanh qaːm baːlʕml wħdh aːtχðwaː ʔajmaːnhm d͡ʒna fsˤdwaʶː ʕn sbjl aːllh flhm ʕðaːb mhjn waːlljl ʔiðaː jʁʃaːhaː maːrj tʕzf aːlbjaːnw jaːlhaː mn d͡ʒbaːl ʃaːhqa wlaː jʔuðn lhm fjʕtðrwn waʶwaʶdˤaʶʕaʶ kaffajhi ʕlaː faχiðajhi qaːla jaː mħmmadu waaːχtalafa aːlnnaaːsu hal wad͡ʒaba ðalika biaːlʕaqli ʔaaw biaːlʃʃarʕi hl ʃaːhdt aːltlfaːz aːlljla aʶːlmaʶːdˤjaʶ ʔiiðaaː aːlʃaaʕbu jawmanaː ʔaaraaːda aːlħajaaːa falaaː budaa ʔaan jastad͡ʒijba aːlqadar aːlllahu jabdaʔau aːlχalqa θumma juʕijduhu θumma ʔiilajhi turd͡ʒaʕuwna hl ttħdθ aʶːlsˤjnjaʶ kaːn saːmj mʕtmdaː ʕlaː aʶːlʔaʶqraʶːsˤ kj jnaːm qaːlwaː lʔin ʔaklh aːlðʔib wnħn ʕsˤbaʶ ʔinaː ʔiðaː lχaːsrwn ħtaː ʔiðaː d͡ʒaːʔnaː qaːl jaː ljt bjnj wbjnk bʕd aːlmʃrqjn fbʔis aːlqrjn faʶaʶːntˤaʶlaʶquʶwaʶː wahum jataχaaːfatuwna ʔanaː d͡ʒaːhz hl jmknnaː aːlðhaːb raʁbaaun wafaaːqaaun θumma ʔiiðaaː ʃaaːʔ ʔaanʃarahu walaaː waʕajʃuhaaː qaʶsˤiʶjruʶn fd͡ʒʕlhm kʕsˤf mʔakwl aːlqmr fj aːlsmaːʔ aːlbqaːʔ llh ʔanta ldjka rʔuja ʔaʶfdˤl mnaː wmaː ʔarslnaː qblk ʔilaː rd͡ʒaːlaː nwħj ʔiljhm faːsʔalwaː ʔahl aːlðkr ʔin kntm laː tʕlmwn ʔiinna haʔuulaaːʔi mutabbarun maaː hum fijhi waʶbaʶaʶːtˤiʶluʶn maaː kaaːnuwaː jaʕmaluwna hw ldjh ʕaːda ʔan jmʃj kl sˤbaʶːħ hl ldjk ʔaj aːqtraːħ aːlħjaːa sjrk kbjr faʔiinna taqlijla aːlzzijaaːraai daaːʕijaau aːlhid͡ʒraaːni wakaθratahaaː sababu aːlmalaaːli waʕamali muʶftaʶraʶdˤaʶaʶːtiʶhaʶaʶː waballaʁanij ʔaamalij wlaː tqrbwaː aːlznaː ʔinh kaːn faːħʃa wsaːʔ sbjlaː laː tðˤhr aːnfʕaːlaːtk ljs ldj θqa kbjra fj qdraːth wamaaː ʔaakθaru aːlnnaaːsi walaw ħaʶraʶsˤtaʶ bimuʔuminijna hl hðhi hdja lj ktbn mʃrwʕ qaːnwn jχsˤ aʶːlsˤħaʶ waminhaaː maaː huwa maʁijbu ħikmaain aːstaʔaθara bihaaː rfʕt sˤdrhaʶː qarjaain hija ʔaaʃaddu quwwaaan min qarjatika aːllatij ʔaaχrad͡ʒatka ʔaahlaknaaːhum falaaː naʶaʶːsˤiʶraʶ lahum ʔant ttmtʕ bʃχsˤjaʶ ʕdjma aːlʔiħsaːs lnftnhm fjh wmn jʕrdˤ ʕn ðkr rbh jslkh ʕðaːbaː aːlʕulamaaːʔu raʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːlllahu ʕanhum lqd ʔiʶstjqðˤtuʶ mtʔaχraːan aːljwm wamaaː julaqqaaːhaaː ʔiillaaː aːllaðijna sˤaʶbaʶruʶwaʶː wamaaː julaqqaaːhaaː ʔiillaaː ðuw ħaʶðˤðˤiʶn ʕaʶðˤiʶjmiʶn ʔilaː mtaː sjkwn d͡ʒwaːz sfrk sˤaʶːlħaʶːaʶn rabbi maaː ʔaabjana aːlttabaaːjuna fijhi manzilun ʕaaːmirun waʕaqlun χaraaːbu waʔaanʃada fij baʶʕdˤiʶ ʔaahli aːlʕilmi wahum muʶχtaʶsˤsˤuʶwnaʶ maʕa salaaːmaai ʔaaħwaaːlihim biχuluqajni ʔaaħaduhumaaː laaːzimun waaːlʔaːχaru muntaqilun ʔaʶtˤlʕ aːlʁjb ʔam aːtχð ʕnd aːlrħmn ʕhdaː maː aːlfrq bjn aːlkmaːn waːlbjaːnw aːlbjaːnw jħtrq mda ʔaʶtˤwl naʶsˤuʶwħaʶnaʶː lahaaː fij mulimmaaːtihaaː ʔiillaaː ʕalaaː ʔaazwaaːd͡ʒihim ʔaaw maaː malakat ʔaajmaaːnuhum faʔiinnahum ʁajru maluwmijna km mn fʔia qljla ʁlbt fʔia kθjra bʔiðn aːllh waːllh mʕ aʶːlsˤaʶːbrjn wajawma taʃaqqaqu aːlssamaaːʔu biaːlʁamaaːmi wanuzzila aːlmalaaːʔiikaau tanzijlanaː waaːttaχaðuwaː min duwni aːlllahi ʔaːlihaaan lijakuwnuwaː lahum ʕizzanaː waʔaaħwaaːlin kunt ʔauχfij ʕanhum maaː jaʶsˤħaʶbuʶniʶj min maħbaraain wakitaaːbin liʔiallaaː ʔaakuwna ʕindahum mustaθqalanaː faʶːtˤlʕ frʔaːh fj swaːʔ aːld͡ʒħjm nafasi taʶsˤaʶwwuʶriʶhiʶ watadfaʕu ʕan ʔidraaːki ħaqijqatihi waʔiimmaaː janzaʁannaka mina aʶːlʃʃaʶjtˤaʶaʶːniʶ nazʁun faaːstaʕið biaːlllahi ʔiinnahu samijʕun ʕalijmun qaaːla walima wafij daaːrik naʃaʔaat qaaːla ʔinnahaaː tataʃarrafu naħnu d͡ʒaʕalnaaːhaaː taðkiraaan wamataaːʕanaː lilmuqwijna fʔamaː mn θqlt mwaːzjnh ʕani aːlnnabaʔii aʶːlʕaʶðˤiʶjmiʶ maaː jataʁannaaː binafsihi tˤaʶraʶbaʶnaʶː ʔiðaaː lam jasmaʕ sˤaʶwtaʶnaʶː muʶtˤriʶbaʶnaʶː walaaː ʁinaaːʔan mumtiʕanaː man laaː jaʕrifu laaː ħattaaː juqaaːla lahu laaː fahuwa ʔaaħmaqu aːstriħ waʶʔaʶaʶʕraʶdˤaʶ ʕan taʔaallufi aːlnnaaːfirijna faqad qijla liʶbaʶʕdˤiʶ aːlʕarabi mtʔakd mn nd͡ʒaːħh wajaraaː ʔaannahu qad χuʶsˤsˤaʶ min bajnihim biaːlrrazijaai baʕda ʔaan kaaːna musaaːwijanaː θumma limaaː fijhi min aːʕtijaaːdi aːlrradi waaːstishaaːli aːlmanʕi aʶːlmuʶfdˤiʶj ʔilaaː aːlʃʃuħi ʔaasraʕtu kaj ʔaudrika aʶːlqiʶtˤaʶaʶːraʶ hl ʔaʶsˤbt baːlbrd wakaaːlθθawbi ʔiðaaː χaliqa kaaːna aʶːtˤtˤiʶraʶaʶːħuʶhuʶ biaːld͡ʒadijdi lahu ʔaad͡ʒmala ʕfwaː faqaaːla lahu sˤaʶllaʶaʶː aːlllahu ʕalajhi wasallama aʶːlħsˤaʶːn d͡ʒaːhz knaʶːtˤħ sˤχraʶ jwmaː ljksrhaː flm jdˤrhaʶː wʔawhaː qrnh aːlwʕl bismi aːlllahi aːlrraħmni aːlrraħjmi waʶaʶːldˤdˤuʶħaʶː liman ʃaːʔa minkum ʔaan jastaqjma kaːn ldaː saːmj mwʕd mʕ aʶːltˤtˤbjb ðlk aːljwm waʔiinnamaaː takuwnu zijaaːdaau aʶːlfaʶdˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶliʶ aːlmaħmuwdaai naʶqsˤaʶnaʶː maðmuwmanaː faaːʕfuwaː juʕizzukum aːlllahu ʔaħb aːlqhwa saːχna waaːlθθaaːnij aːttibaaːʕu aːlʃʃahwaai ʔithmt hjʔia aːlmħlfjn aːlkbraː twm bd͡ʒrjma qtl waqaaːla sˤaʶllaʶaʶː aːlllahu ʕalajhi wasallama aːlmustadijnu taaːd͡ʒiru aːlllahi fij ʔaʶaʶrdˤiʶhiʶ ʔiinna saʕjakum laʃattaː wasaaːʔat tˤaʶraʶaʶːʔiʶiʶquʶhuʶ rabiħa aːlttaaːd͡ʒiru aːlʔaamjnu ʕljk ʔan tdrs bd͡ʒdd waaːlllajli ʔiiðaː jaʁʃaːhaː mʕ mn knti ttħddθjn mʕ ʔammj lm ʔaʕlm ʔann lʔammki sˤwt rd͡ʒl fahuwa jaqdamu ʕalaaː maaː jaʃaaːʔu wajaʔatij maaː ʕabsin kitaːbun fuʶsˤsˤiʶlaʶt ʔaːjaːtuhu qurʔaːnanaː ʕarabijjanaː liqawmin jaʕlamwna lqd ʔaʃfjnaːh ʔaʶaʶqriʶdˤhuʶm min ʕaʶrdˤiʶk lijawmi faaːqatik waliðalika qaaːla ʕalijju bnu ʔaabij tˤaʶaʶːliʶbiʶn waqaːlwaː rabbanaː ʕad͡ʒd͡ʒil lanaː qiʶtˤtˤaʶnaʶː qabla jawmi aːlħisaːbi lm jkn saːmj mslmaː ʔaan taqdira ʕalaaː aːlmaʕruwfi walaaː taʶsˤtˤaʶniʶʕuʶhuʶ ħattaaː jafuwta twd͡ʒd͡ʒh saːmj nħw aːlbaːb w qrʕ fij mad͡ʒraaː aːlhawaaːʔi taʶmraʶdˤ juħibbu aːlttanaqula fij aʶːlmaʶtˤluʶwbiʶ ʔinnahu aʶːlsˤsˤaʶbruʶ aːllaðij laaː ʃakwaaː fijhi walaaː baθθa tad͡ʒrj biʔaaʕjuninaː d͡ʒazaːʔan liman kaːna kufira hnaːk faʶtˤiʶnaʶnaʶː ðakijjanaː ʕaːmilaaun naʶːsˤiʶbaʶaʶuʶn watawahhamuwaː ʔaanna maaː tamijlu ʔilajhi nufuwsuhum min aːlʔaamwaaːli aːlmuqtanaaːai aːlʔafʕaːl ʔablʁ mn aːlʔaqwaːl walillahi d͡ʒunwdu aːlssamaːwaːti waʶaʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤiʶ wakaːna aːlllahu ʕazjzanaː ħakjmanaː saːmj hw mn tsbbb bðlk aːlħml ruwija ʕan aːlnnabiji sˤaʶllaʶaʶː aːlllahu ʕalajhi wasallama ʔaannahu qaaːla junaaːdij munaaːdin jawma aːlqijaaːmaai waħukija ʔaanna sulajmaaːna bna daaːwud ʕalajhimaaː aːlssalaaːmu fakun ʔaanta aːlmuʕtaðiru ʕanhu biʶsˤaʶfħiʶk waʶaʶːlmuʶtaʶnaʶsˤsˤiʶluʶ lahu biʶfaʶdˤliʶk waqaaːla ʕalijju bnu ʔaabij tˤaʶaʶːliʶbiʶn raʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːlllahu ʕanhu liaːbnihi aːlħasani fij waʶsˤiʶjjaʶtiʶhiʶ lahu aːlʕaːql laː jstqbl aːlnʕma bbtˤr wlaː jwdʕhaː bd͡ʒzʕ waaːlmubaððiru juʶχtˤiʶʔiʶuʶ fij aːld͡ʒahli ðˤl jrkdˤ walaaː jaʕrif tˤuʶwlaʶnaʶː walaaː ʕaʶrdˤaʶnaʶː saːmj ʕljh aʶːlaʶːntðˤaʶːr ʔakθr ʔaldjk btˤaʶːqaʶ ʔiʔitmaːn ʔaafaman jamʃj mukibbanaː ʕalaː wad͡ʒhihi ʔaahdaː ʔaamman jamʃj sawijjanaː ʕalaː ʔaahlaknaːhum falaː naʶːsˤiʶraʶ lahum ʔajmknk msaːʕdtj kaaːna ʔaawlaaː ʔaan jad͡ʒuwda bimaaː χarad͡ʒa ʕan jadihi faʶtˤaʶaʶːbaʶ nafsanaː bifiraaːqihi laː jrjd saːmj aːʕtnaːq aːlʔislaːm aʶːltˤtˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶruʶ fawqa aːlʃʃad͡ʒaraai maː hw ʔaʶfdˤl tˤʕaʶːmk aːlχfjf aːktʃf saːmj ʃjʔiaː mqlqaː aːstmʕ saːmj llttsd͡ʒjl w smʕ sˤwt rd͡ʒl fj aːlχlfjja θumma ʔiinnahum laʶsˤaʶːluʶw aːld͡ʒaħjmi aːlktaːb mktwb bʔind͡ʒljzja bsjtˤaʶ lðaː qraːʔth shla saːmj mdrrsnaː fj rqsˤ aːlhjbhwb kamaaː kataba aːlħasanu aʶːlbaʶsˤriʶjjuʶ ʔilaaː ʕumara bni ʕabdi aːlʕazijzi raʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːlllahu ʕanhumaaː waʔiin ʕadala aːlrrafijʕu ʔilaaː zijji aːlddanijʔi kaaːna mahaaːnaaan waðullanaː faʶsˤaʶaʶːraʶ kaʶdˤaʶriʶjriʶn jaruwmu taʕalluma aːlkitaaːbaai zaːd aːlttfaːhm bjnhmaː fanaʕuwðu biaːalllahi min aːlbaʁji waʶmaʶsˤaʶaʶːriʶʕiʶhiʶ waʶaʶːlʃʃaʶjtˤaʶaʶːniʶ wamakaaːʔiidihi wahuwa ħasbunaaː waʕalajhi tawakkulunaaː tlqqaː saːmj aʶːttsˤaʶːlaʶː ʁrjbaː mn ʃχsˤ lm jtʕrrf ʕljh walakum fjhaː manaːfiʕu walitabluʁwaː ʕalajhaː ħaːd͡ʒaaan fj sˤuʶdwriʶkuʶm waʕalajhaː waʕalaaː aːlfulki tuħmalwna tlqqt ljlaː ħkmaː baːlssd͡ʒn aːlmʔubbd hðaː maː twʕadwna lijawmi aːlħisaːbi aːlnnaaːsu kaʃad͡ʒaraain ðaaːti d͡ʒananaː wajuwʃiku ʔaan jaʕuwduwaː kaʃad͡ʒaraain ðaaːti ʃawkin ʔin naaːqadtahum naaːqaduwka hl ʔanti aːbna saːmj waħukija ʔaanna muʕaaːwijaaa raʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːlllahu ʕanhu saʔaala ʕumara ʕan aːlmuruwʔaai faqaaːla wamin ʔaːjaːtihi manaːmukum biaːlllajli waaːlnnahaːri waaːbtiʁaːʔuukum min faʶdˤliʶhiʶ ʔiinna fj ðlika laʔaːjaːtin liqawmin jasmaʕwna kamaaː qaaːla ʕabdu aʶːlsˤsˤaʶmaʶdiʶ bnu aːlmuʕaddali liʔaabij tammaaːmin aʶːltˤtˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶjiʶ wahaðaaː ʔaaswaʔau ħaaːlanaː min aːlnnawʕajni aːlʔaawwalijna ʔahlaːan kjf ħaːlk kʃf ʕn ħbh ln ʔaχsr kaððabat θamwdu waʕaːdun biaːlqaːriʕaai waqad qijla aːlʕad͡ʒabu laʶːsˤtˤħaʶːb saːmj mn mnzl ljlaː faʔaammaaː ʔiðaaː kaaːna aːlbaðlu waʶaʶːlʕaʶtˤaʶaʶːʔuʶ ʕan suʔuaaːlin faʶʃuʶruʶwtˤuʶhuʶ muʕtabaraaun min wad͡ʒhajni wamaʕnaaː qawlihi sˤaʶllaʶaʶː aːlllahu ʕalajhi wasallama muhraaun maʔamuwraaun ʔaaj kaθijraau aːlnnasli faʔiin ʔaaʁnathu aːliaːstiʕaaːnaau biaːld͡ʒaaːhi ʕan aːliaːstiʕaaːnaai biaːlmaaːli fasalaːmun laka min ʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶːbiʶ aːljamjni sʔalt ʕalijji bni ʔaabij tˤaʶaʶːliʶbiʶn karrama aːlllahu wad͡ʒhahu ʔaannahu qaaːla aːntqlwaː ʔilaː hnaː man kaaːna lahu bajtun waχaaːdimun fahuwa malikun aːlrʔuaː qd tdfʕnj lld͡ʒnwn rakiba ʔiibraaːhijmu aʶːlħiʶsˤaʶaʶːnaʶ kaːn saːmj fj sˤffj liʔaannahaaː qad tamnaʕu man faʕala maaː kaaːna mustakrahanaː aːlfaqri waʶbaʶtˤriʶ aːlʁanijji aːllaðij balaʁa maaː laaː jabluʁuhu sˤaʶriʶjħuʶ aːlssuʔuaaːli waman waʔiinnamaaː hija sad͡ʒijjaaun qad fuʶtˤiʶraʶ ʕalajhaaː kaːn saːmj jsbħ fj msbħh waʔaanʃadt liʔaabij aːlfatħi aːlbustijji waʔaːχiruhaaː χizjun jawma aːlqijaaːmaai waʶaʶːsˤbiʶr ʕalaaː maaː ʔilaː mstʃfaː msˤrj ʔiið qaːla lahum ʔaaχwhum lwtˤuʶn ʔaalaː tattaqwna kaːn ħbb saːmj lljlaː jkllfh kθjraː ʔaχbr saːmj aʶːltˤtˤbjb ʕn hðaː aːlʔamr wakafaaː biʶsˤaʶaʶːħiʶbiʶhaʶaʶː mawqifanaː ʔin sˤaʶħħaʶ aʶːftaʶdˤaʶħaʶ maːðaː qlti lhaː wamin badanik aʶːlχuʶdˤuʶwʕaʶ fatawallaː biruknihi waqaːla saːħirun ʔaaw mad͡ʒnwnun faʔiiðaaː faʕaluwaː ðalika rafaʕa ʕanhum jadahu θumma saʶllaʶtˤaʶ ʕalajhim d͡ʒabaaːbiratahum fasaaːmuwhum suwʔa aːlʕaðaaːbi waħakaaː aʶːlʔaʶaʶsˤmaʶʕiʶjjuʶ ʔaanna ʔaabaaː bakrin aʶːlsˤsˤiʶdiʶjqaʶ raʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːlllahu ʕanhu kaaːna ʔiðaaː madaħa qaaːla fttʃ aːlmdrrs ħqjbtj qddm saːmj mblʁaː baʶːhdˤaʶː lljlaː hw fj mwqf aːlssjaːraːt lm jqm saːmj bʔajj ʃjʔ kj jstħqq ðlk walaaː taʔanaf min aːliaːstirʃaaːdi ðˤnnt twm mjjtaː aːχtfaː saːmj θaːnjaan wajaː qawmi maː lj ʔaadʕwkum ʔiilaaː aːlnnad͡ʒaːai watadʕwnanj ʔiilaaː aːlnnaːri waʔaantad͡ʒahu fikruhu ħattaaː ʔiðaaː kaaːna fijhi qadħun ʕuʶwriʶdˤaʶ waʶjaʶtˤiʶjbuʶ bihaaː kullu sˤuʶlħiʶn jsʔal ʔasʔila sχjfa fj kl wqt laː jufattaru ʕanhum wahum fjhi mubliswna jaʕnij ħasada ʔiblijsa liʔaːdama ʕalajhi aːlssalaaːmu waʔaawwalu ðanbin ʕuʶsˤiʶjaʶ aːlllahu bihi fij aʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤiʶ qjla aːdχuli aːld͡ʒannaaa qaːla jaː lajta qawmj jaʕlamwna ʕad͡ʒibtu liman d͡ʒaraaː fij mad͡ʒraaː aːlbawli marratajni kajfa jatakabbaru ʔaam jurjdwna kajdanaː faaːllaðjna kafarwaː humu aːlmakjdwna kaːn aːlksaːd aːlkbjr aʶːlʕsˤr aːlððhbj llʕsˤaʶːbaʶːt aːlʔid͡ʒraːmjja ʃwhid saːmj w hw jbtlʕ ʔaʶqraʶːsˤaʶː lijakuwna aːχtilaaːfuhum simaaan jatamajjazuwna bihaaː bismi aːlllahi aːlrraħmni aːlrraħjmi ʔiiðaː zulzilati aʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤuʶ zilzaːlahaː waħaðaranaː min aːstiħqaaːqi aːlððami waaːlʕiqaaːbi aʶːltˤbjb ʁjr mwd͡ʒwd aːlʔaːn llʔasf walaaː liman wuʶsˤiʶmaʶ bihi χaʶtˤaʶruʶn walaaː miqdaaːrun ʔiðaː rklk mn χlfk fʔiʕlm ʔank fj aːlmqdma tarʁijbuhaaː fij aːlħalaaːli ʕiʶwaʶdˤaʶnaʶː sirruk ʔaasijruk faʔiin takallamt bihi sˤiʶrt ʔaasijrahu ʔaan juχfijahu ħattaaː laaː jantaʃira fijhi maʶtˤaʶaʶːmiʶʕuʶ aːlssufahaaːʔi faʶjaʶtaʶwaʶsˤsˤaʶluʶwnaʶ ʔilaaː aːd͡ʒtiðaaːbihi bisabbihi falaaː jad͡ʒidu sˤiʶdqaʶnaʶː juʕðabu walaaː ħadijθanaː juʶstaʶðˤraʶfuʶ wafasaaːdu rawijjatihi waʔiið qad maʶdˤaʶaʶː aːlkalaaːmu fij aːlmaʔakuwli waaːlmaʃruwbi fajanbaʁij ʔad͡ʒraː saːmj bʕdˤ aːlttħqjqaːt ʕn ljlaː waaːʕlam ʔaanna min aːlʔaasraaːri maaː laaː justaʁnaaː fijhi ʕan muʶtˤaʶaʶːlaʶʕaʶaʶiʶ sˤaʶdiʶjqiʶn musaaːhimin aːlskrtjra mtʕba mn aʶːltˤbaʶːʕaʶ wahuwa jaquwlu fħsˤ saːmj d͡ʒrħ ljlaː ʔaqwm baːltmaːrjn aʶːlrjaʶːdˤjaʶ lʔaʶħaʶːfðˤ ʕlaː sˤħtj saːmj jstħqq ʕtˤlaʶ qsˤjraʶ aʶːsˤnaʶʕ aːlχajra ʕinda ʔimkaaːnihi jabqaaː saːmj mljʔia baːlttðmr waʶaʶːldˤdˤaʶaʶːlaʶaʶaʶ laaː tutraku liðillaai waaːd͡ʒidihaaː maaː lak waʶaʶːlʁaʶdˤaʶbuʶ ʔinnamaaː ʔaanta baʃarun ʔaaqallu maaː jad͡ʒibu lilmunʕimi biħaqqi niʕmatihi ʔaan laaː aːlllahu ʕalajhi wasallama ʔaannahu qaaːla limaaː fijhi min aːrtijaaːħi aːlnnafsi binajli ʃahawaaːtihaaː ʔaχð saːmj ljlaː mn aʶːlmtˤaʶːr kaːn saːmj jχtˤtˤtˤ lʕmljja aʶːχttˤaʶːf qaːlwaː naʕbudu saʕijdun aːlkitaaːba waʶʔaʶaʶsˤʕuʶbuʶ markabanaː faʔiin ʔaaʃkala ʕalajhi ʔaamraaːni aːd͡ʒtanib ʔaaħabbahumaaː ʔilajhi fakaːna ʕaːqibatahumaː ʔaannahumaː fij aːlnnaːri χaːlidajni fjhaː waðlika biʶaʶːlsˤsˤaʶbriʶ jutawaqqaʕu aːlfard͡ʒu waman judminu qarʕa baaːbin jalid͡ʒu waʔiin lam jaʶsˤiʶħħaʶ aːumtuhina laaː jakuwnu faʶdˤiʶjlaʶaʶaʶn walaaː juʔuθira danijjanaː ʕalaaː ʃarijfin waʔaaqlaʕa ʕan saaːlifi zalalihi lijatimma lahu aʶːlsˤsˤaʶlaʶaʶːħuʶ watastadijma lahu aːlssaʕaaːdaau ʔaʁlqaː aːlʔabwaːb w aːlnnwaːfð aːntqlj ʔilaː hnaː hl ʔant d͡ʒdjd hnaː ʔarjd ʔan ʔamwt waaːlʃʃuʕaraːʔu jattabiʕuhumu aːlʁaːwwna waqad qaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi man kaθura ʃaʶtˤaʶtˤuʶhuʶ kaθura ʁaʶlaʶtˤuʶhuʶ qdˤaʶː saːmj maː tlaːhaː mn snwaːt jbnj ħjaːth aːltj kaːdt tnthj bsbb tlk aːlħaːdθa ʔinhm ljlaː dχlt ʔaχt saːmj aːlmstʃfaː ldjh aːld͡ʒnsjja aːlʔawkraːnjja warawaaː aːbnu masʕuwdin raʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːlllahu ʕanhu ʕan aːlnnabiji sˤaʶllaʶaʶː aːlllahu ʕalajhi wasallama ʔaannahu qaaːla saːmj ʔaqllaːh waːldjh wamajla aːlnnufuwsi ʔilajhi kaːn ldaː saːmj d͡ʒhaːz tnsˤsˤt tħt mlaːbsh wasamiʕa aːbnu aːlrruwmiji rad͡ʒulanaː jaʶsˤiʶfuʶ rad͡ʒulanaː wajubaaːliʁu fij madħihi faʔaanʃaʔaa jaquwlu jarbaħu aːlssaaːbiqu d͡ʒaaːʔiizaaan ʔaʶχtˤr saːmj aʶːlʃʃrtˤaʶ aːn lm jkn aːlaːn mtaː aːstmr χtˤaʶːbh lθlaːθa saːʕaːt aːllaðj ʔaaħsana kulla ʃajʔin χalaqahu wabadaʔaa χalqa aːlʔiinsaːni min tˤjniʶn faʔaaχaðahu aːlllahu nakaːla aːlʔaːχiraai waaːlʔawlaː liʔaannahaaː maħbuwbaaun tad͡ʒuwru ʔidlaaːlanaː wataʁurru makranaː θumma kallaː sajaʕlamwna faʔaammaaː ʔiðaaː kaaːna aːlwaqtu muttasaʕanaː waaːlzzamaaːnu mumtaddanaː fataʕd͡ʒijlu aːlssuʔuaaːli luʔumun waʶquʶnuʶwtˤuʶn d͡ʒmʕt fjdjwhaːt mqaːlb saːmj aːlmlaːjjn mn aːlnnqraːt ʔiinnaː ʔaanzalnaːhu fj lajlaain mubaːrakaain ʔiinnaː kunnaː munðirjna waaːlllajli ʔiiðaː sad͡ʒaː waaːllaðjna ʔiiðaː ðukkirwaː biʔaːjaːti rabbihim lam jaχirrwaː ʕalajhaː sˤuʶmmaʶnaʶː waʕumjaːnanaː faqad taʕaddaaː ʕalaaː aːlddahri biʶʃaʶtˤaʶtˤiʶhiʶ fakaaːna haðaaː taʶfaʶdˤdˤuʶlaʶnaʶː minhu wataʔaallufanaː ʔaʶħdˤr saːmj sˤdjqaʶ mʕh kaːnt ʕnd ljlaː ʕlba mχfwq ħljb bðwq aːlfrwla faʔiiðaaː aːχtaaːra waʔaard͡ʒuw ʔaan juwaffaqa liliaːχtijaaːri lndʕuhm ʔilaː aːlʕʃaːʔ waman faqada aʶːlʁaʶdˤaʶbaʶ fij aːlʔaaʃjaaːʔi aʶːlmuʶʁdˤiʶbaʶaʶiʶ ħattaaː aːstawat ħaaːlataaːhu qabla aʶːlʔiʶiʶʁdˤaʶaʶːbiʶ wabaʕdahu lahum maː jaʃaːʔwna ʕinda rabbihim ðlika d͡ʒazaːʔu aːlmuħsinjna sˤuʶħuʶfiʶ ʔiibraːhjma wamwsaː aʶːntˤaʶliʶqwaʶː ʔiilaː maː kuntum bihi tukaððibwna kaːn zmjl saːmj fj aːlzznzaːna mslmaː samiʕtu aʶːlnnaʶsˤiʶjħaʶaʶaʶ walakin juχmiduhaaː ʔaan laaː tad͡ʒida ħaʶtˤaʶbaʶnaʶː jtħrkwn mn mkaːn ʔilaː ʔaːχr lma jħdθ hðaː θaːnjaan ʔiinna aːlmuttaqjna fj maqaːmin ʔaamjnin wdˤʕ aːlktaːb ʕlaː aːlrf limaaː fijhimaaː min ʔiʶsqaʶaʶːtˤiʶ aːlʃʃukri waʔiilaaː aːlχawfi min taʶsˤdiʶjqiʶ aːlttuhami ʔaaqraba aːlħikami kaθraau maaːli aːlmajjiti tuʕazzij waraθatahu ʕanhu aːlħiðaːʔu d͡ʒadijdu nsjt kll maː jtʕllq bdraːstj w ħlmj kj ʔaʶsˤbħ tˤbjbaʶː hðaː mʃrwʕ ħkwmj waːfqthaː aːlrʔaj saːmj ljs fj aːlʕjaːda wasababu ðalika maaː ðakarnaaː min kaθraai aʶːlʔaʶaʶsˤfiʶjaʶaʶːʔiʶ aːlmusʕidijna waqillaai aːlʔaaʕdaaːʔi aːlmud͡ʒħifijna ʔithmnaː aʶːlʃχsˤ aʶːlχtˤʔaʶ bʕmlja aːlqtl wajuksibuhu aːlmaθuwbaaa ʕanhaaː waaːlllahu d͡ʒaʕala lakumu aʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤaʶ biʶsaʶːtˤaʶnaʶː hl tʕaːnj mn ʔalm fj aʶːlbtˤn ljs ðlk aʶːlqmjsˤ bl aːlʔaːχr waʔiinnamaaː aːstad͡ʒaaːza sˤuʶhaʶjbuʶn ʔaan juʶʕaʶrriʶdˤaʶ lirasuwli aːlllahi sˤaʶllaʶaʶː aːlllahu ʕalajhi wasallama biaːlmazħi fij d͡ʒawaaːbihi jħsn saːmj aːlssbaːħa mθl ljlaː tqrjbaː wajufsiduwna fij aʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤiʶ ʔauwlaaːʔiika humu aːlχaaːsiruwna ʔinna aːlnnafsa laʔaammaaːraaun biaːlssuwʔi kaːn saːmj jtmttʕ baːlħjaːa waʔiiðaaː sˤaʶʁʁaʶrtaʶhuʶ ʕaʶðˤðˤaʶmtaʶhuʶ waaːʕlam ʔaanna biħasabi faʶdˤliʶ aːlʔiinsaaːni waʶðˤuʶhuʶwriʶ aːlnniʕmaai ʕalajhi jakuwnu ħasadu aːlnnaaːsi lahu watad͡ʒannabuwaː aːlkaðiba waʔiin raʔaajtum ʔaanna fijhi aːlnnad͡ʒaaːaa faʔiinna fijhi aːlhalakaaa sttzwwd͡ʒjn w stnd͡ʒbjn aːlkθjr ðlika ʔaamru aːlllahi ʔaanzalahu ʔiilajkum waman jattaqi aːlllaha jukaffir ʕanhu sajjiʔiaaːtihi waʶjuʶʕðˤiʶm lahu ʔaad͡ʒranaː wajarawnahu kaʶaʶːlsˤsˤaʶdaʶaʶː ʔin radda sˤaʶwtaʶnaʶː lam jad͡ʒid nafʕanaː saːmj jħbb aːlqhwa faħaqqa ʕalajnaː qawlu rabbinaː ʔiinnaː laðaːʔiiqwna waʶːsˤl saːmj aʶːlaʶːntðˤaʶːr qul ʔiin kaaːnat lakumu aːlddaaːru aːlʔaːχiraau ʕinda aːlllahi χaʶaʶːliʶsˤaʶaʶaʶn ʕan ʔaabij salamaaa lm jsmʕ saːmj ʔajj sˤwt sˤdr mn tlk aːlχjma ʔaan juraaːʕija maχaaːrid͡ʒa kalaaːmihi biħasabi maʶqaʶaʶːsˤiʶdiʶhiʶ waʶʔaʶaʶʁraʶaʶːdˤiʶhiʶ faʔiin kaaːna tarʁijbanaː qaranahu biaːlllijni waʶaʶːllluʶtˤfiʶ wabadaː lahum sajjiʔiaaːtu maː kasabwaː waħaːqa bihim maː kaːnwaː bihi jastahziʔiwna ðˤnn saːmj ʔann ljlaː kaːnt sttˤlq ʕljh aːlnnaːr kaːn saːmj jħbb aːlħjaːa aːld͡ʒjjda aːstuqbl χbr ħml ljlaː brdwd ʔafʕaːl mtbaːjna maː zaːlt qdmajj tʔulmaːnnj jaʕnij sajfa nafsihi ʔaʶħdˤr saːmj aʶːlbjtˤrj tħsˤsˤl faʶːdˤl ʕlaː maː aːstħqqh tmaːmaː laː tns ʔidχaːl aːlklb kaːn ðlk aːlħml sbbaː fj tbaːʕd ljlaː w saːmj tˤaʶːlʕ saːmj ktbaː tˤbbjaʶ ħðˤ fj aːlsħaːb wʕql fj aːltraːb fajanbaʁij liðij aːlllubi aːlssawiji waaːlħazmi aːlqawijji ʔaan jatalaqqaaː quwwaaa aʶːlʁaʶdˤaʶbiʶ biħilmihi faʶjaʶsˤuʶddaʶhaʶaʶː ʔiðaaː dˤaʶħiʶkaʶ aːlʕaaːlimu minhu ʔaan jakuwna bihi ʕaaːmilanaː wʔiðaː aːld͡ʒbaːl sjrt lm ʔaʕd ʔaħbbk bʕd aːlʔaːn wlwlaː fdˤl aːllh ʕljkm wrħmth wʔan aːllh rʔwf rħjm lmaːðaː laː trjd ʔan tqwl lnaː aːlħqjqa hnaːlk aːbtlj aːlmʔumnwn wzlzlwaː zlzaːlaː ʃdjdaː qaaːla firʕawnu wamaaː rabbu aːlʕaaːlamijna laː tnsaː ʔadwaːtk hw jħbhaː w hj ʔaʶjdˤaʶː tħbh waʔaantum ħijnaʔiiðin taʶnðˤuʶruʶwnaʶ aːlssaχiju qarijbun min aːlllahi ʕazza wad͡ʒalla waliðalika ʔaːχaaː rasuwlu aːlllahi sˤaʶllaʶaʶː aːlllahu ʕalajhi wasallama bajna ʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶaʶːbiʶhiʶ fatalaqqaaː ʔaːdamu min rabbihi kalimaaːtin fataaːba ʕalajhi ʔiinnahu huwa aːlttawaaːbu aːlrraħijmu jmknk aːlbqaːʔ ʔaʶtˤwl qljlaː ʔaafatumaaːruwnahu ʕalaaː maaː jaraaː ðalika ʕaaːlimu aːlʁajbi waaːlʃʃahaaːdaai aːlʕazijzu aːlrraħijmu maːðaː tʕtqd ʔaʶfdˤl wsjla llwsˤwl ʔilaː mnzl twm mn hnaː walanuðijqannahum mina aːlʕaðaaːbi aːlʔaadnaaː duwna aːlʕaðaaːbi aːlʔaakbari laʕallahum jard͡ʒiʕuwna ʕaːd ʔilaː wʕjh bʕd aːlħaːdθa bθlaːθ saːʕaːt bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm ʔiðaː duwni aːlllahi ħaʶsˤaʶbuʶ d͡ʒahannama ʔaantum lahaaː waaːriduwna waːlljl wmaː wsq lħiq aːlklb θʕlbanaː falam juʶʕtˤiʶfhuʶ ʕalajhi raħmaaun walaaː kaffahu ʕanhu ʃafaqaaun ʔinaː knaː mn qbl ndʕwh ʔinh fakarihtumuwhu waħumilati aʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤuʶ waaːld͡ʒibaaːlu fadukkataaː dakkaaan waaːħidaaan wlrbk faʶːsˤbr ʔanaː ʔaʕml fj wkaːla safr ʔanaː lst d͡ʒaːʔiʕaː aːlʔaːn twm jsbb lj aːlkθjr mn aːlmtaːʕb mrħbaːan ʃkraːan ʕlaː aʶːltˤjraʶːn mʕnaː kjf ħaːlkm aːljwm waχajrun min aːlʕilmi ħaaːmiluhu ʔaðaː mnnaːd baːja waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi aːlfaqijhu biʁajri waraʕin kaaːlssiraaːd͡ʒi juʶdˤiʶjʔuʶ aːlbajta wajuħriqu nafsahu hðaː bsbbk ʔant mn rsm hðh aːllwħa aːlθθajibi aːlzzaaːnij waaːlnnafsi biaːlnnafsi lhm daːr aːlslaːm ʕnd rbhm whw wljhm bmaː kaːnwaː jʕmlwn jwm tqlb wd͡ʒwhhm fj aːlnaːr jqwlwn jaː ljtnaː ʔaʶtˤʕnaʶː aːllh wʔaʶtˤʕnaʶː aːlrswlaː waqaaːla ʕalijju bnu ʔaabij tˤaʶaʶːliʶbiʶn raʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːlllahu ʕanhu aʶːlsˤsˤaʶaʶːħiʶbuʶ munaaːsibun ʔanaː laː ʔaʕaːnj mn aːld͡ʒnwn ʔanaː ʔastmtʕ bh snkwn aʶːsˤdqaʶːʔ aːlaː aːlaːbd fʔaʶʕrdˤ ʕn mn twlaː ʕn ðkrnaː wlm jrd ʔilaː aːlħjaːa aːldnjaː aːllaðij juʔutij maaːlahu jatazakkaaː hl jmknnj ʔan ʔasʔal ʔilaː ʔajn ʔanti ðaːhba ʔinhm jrjdwn fqtˤ aʶːlħsˤwl ʕlaː aːlmtʕa ʔilaː qjlaː slaːmaː slaːmaː lqd qtˤʕt ʔiʃaːra ħmraːʔ wllʔaːχra χjr lk mn aːlʔawlaː lqd ʔaʶuʶsˤbt baːlχjba waħukija ʔaanna rad͡ʒulanaː qaaːla waʔaaʕraaːbijjun waaːstiraaːħaaːti aʶːlχaʶwaʶaʶːtˤiʶriʶ qul ʔiinnamaaː ʔaadʕuw rabbij walaaː ʔauʃriku bihi ʔaaħadanaː falaaː jaħzunka qawluhum ʔiinnaaː naʕlamu maaː jusirruwna wamaaː juʕlinuwna ħattaaː ʔiiðaaː fataħnaaː ʕalajhim baaːbanaː ðaaː ʕaðaaːbin ʃadijdin ʔiiðaaː hum fijhi mublisuwna jumkinak ʔan tqwl maː trjd qaaːla ʔaʶaʶnðˤiʶrniʶj ʔiilaaː jawmi jubʕaθuwna jaː lhaː mn mfaːd͡ʒʔaa hl bʔimkaːnk tfsjrh bʃkl ʔaħsn waʔaammaaː man χaaːfa maqaaːma rabbihi wanahaaː aːlnnafsa ʕani aːlhawaaː nhaːja aːlʕaːlm qrjba d͡ʒdaːan waaːlʔaːχiraau χajrun waʔaabqaaː hl hnaːk ʔaj ʃχsˤ ʔaːχr trjd aːltħdθ ʔiljh qaaːluwaː rabbunaaː jaʕlamu ʔiinnaaː ʔiilajkum lamursaluwna ʔaʶʕtˤiʶ aʶːlqtˤtˤ bʕdˤ aːlllħm ʔanaː ʔanhjt ktaːba aːltqrjr aːlħamdu lillahi aːllaðij wahaba lij ʕalaaː aːlkibari ʔiismaaːʕijla waʔiisħaaːqa ʔiinna rabbij lasamijʕu aːldduʕaaːʔi waqaaːla sulajmaaːnu bnu daaːwud ʕalajhimaaː aːlssalaaːmu waʶaʶːlʃʃaʶjaʶaʶːtˤiʶjnaʶ kulla bannaaːʔin waʶʁaʶwwaʶaʶːsˤiʶn maː rʔajhaː fj sjaːrtj aʶːlsˤwraʶ fj hðaː aːlktaːb walanabluwannakum biʃajʔin mina aːlχawfi waaːld͡ʒuwʕi waʶnaʶqsˤiʶn mina aːlʔaamwaaːli waaːlʔaanfusi waaːlθθamaraaːti wabaʃʃiri aʶːlsˤsˤaʶaʶːbiʶriʶjnaʶ bali aːlllahu mawlaaːkum wahuwa χajru aʶːlnnaʶaʶːsˤiʶriʶjnaʶ waʔiin aːftaraqaaː fajaaː wajħa muftaraqajni maaː ʔaʶaʶdˤaʶrraʶ aːftiraaːqahumaaː wakunuwzin wamaqaaːmin karijmin kallaaː ʔiinna kitaaːba aːlʔaabraaːri lafij ʕillijijna falaaː jaχluw ħaaːla taʶqsˤiʶjriʶhiʶ min ʔaarbaʕaai ʔaaħwaaːlin waʶaʶːlʔaʶaʶʕraʶaʶːdˤaʶ waaːlʔaad͡ʒsaaːma ʔaalqaaːbanaː taʶwaʶaʶːdˤaʶʕuʶwhaʶaʶː limaʕaaːnin aːttafaquwaː ʕalajhaaː ʔaalam tara ʔiilaaː aːllaðijna jud͡ʒaaːdiluwna fij ʔaːjaaːti aːlllahi ʔaannaaː juʶsˤraʶfuʶwnaʶ fwqʕ aːlħq wbtˤl maː kaːnwaː jʕmlwn waliðalika qaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlbulaʁaaːʔi ʔanaː ħqaːan lstu d͡ʒaːʔiʕaːan rbmaː sjʁjr rʔajh maː hj aːlʔabd͡ʒdjja aːltj tuktb bhaː hðh aːlllʁa bismi aːlllahi aːlrraħmani aːlrraħijmi waaːlððaaːrijaaːti ðarwanaː θm kaːn mn aːlðjn ʔaːmnwaː wtwaʶːsˤwaʶː baʶːlsˤbr wtwaʶːsˤwaʶː baːlmrħma faʶjaʶsˤiʶjruʶ aːlʔaamalu χajbaaan waaːlrrad͡ʒaaːʔu ʔijaaːsanaː ʔaħqaːan laː jmknk aːlsbaːħa kaːn saːmj qrra ʕjn ʔammh wlnsknnkm aʶːlʔaʶrdˤ mn bʕdhm ðlk lmn χaːf mqaːmj wχaːf wʕjd ʔin aːlsʔuaːl ʕn ħd͡ʒm aːlkwn mnð aːlaːnfd͡ʒaːr aːlkbjr ʔaam ʕindahum χazaaːʔiinu rabbika ʔaam humu aʶːlmuʶsˤaʶjtˤiʶruʶwnaʶ mlʔ ʕjn aːlzzmn sjfnaː waːlqlm qul law kaaːna maʕahu ʔaːlihaaun kamaaː jaquwluwna ʔiiðanaː bikitaaːbij haðaaː faʔaalqih ʔiilajhim θumma tawalla ʕanhum faʶaʶːnðˤuʶr maaːðaaː jard͡ʒiʕuwna sanasimuhu ʕalaaː aʶːlχuʶrtˤuʶwmiʶ kaːn mnnaːd jʃrb aːlsjχ jlbswn aːlʕmaːmaːt faʔiin jaʶsˤbiʶruʶwaʶː faaːlnnaaːru maθwanaː lahum waʔiin jastaʕtibuwaː famaaː hum mina aːlmuʕtabijna waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi man d͡ʒaaːda lak bimawaddatihi faqad d͡ʒaʕalak ʕadijla nafsihi hl kaːn ħqaː mmlaː maːrj min ʔaan juʶħsˤaʶaʶː faχuðuwaː min kulli ʃajʔin ʔaaħsanahu faːstd͡ʒaːb lh rbh fsˤrf ʕnh kjdhn ʔinh hw aːlsmjʕ aːlʕljm wmaː ʔasʔalkm ʕljh mn ʔad͡ʒr ʔin ʔad͡ʒrj ʔilaː ʕlaː rb aːlʕaːlmjn ʔiinna ʔaannakum ʁajru muʕd͡ʒizij aːlllahi waʔaanna aːlllaha muχzij aːlkaaːfirijna fj bdˤʕ snjn llh aːlʔamr mn qbl wmn bʕd wjwmʔið jfrħ aːlmʔumnwn ʔiið jatalaqqaaː aːlmutalaqqijaaːni ʕani aːljamijni waʕani waliðalika qijla aːlʕaaːdaau tˤaʶbʕuʶn θaaːnin mn jhd aːllh fhw aːlmhtdj wmn jdˤll fʔawlʔik hm aːlχaːsrwn rabbukumu aːllaðij juzd͡ʒij lakumu aːlfulka fij aːlbaħri litabtaʁuwaː min faʶdˤliʶhiʶ ʔiinnahu ʔaʶtˤlb mnk ʔiʶtˤaʶːʕaʶ ʔawaːmrj ʔaːsf ʕlaː aʶːlsˤsˤraʶːχ ʕallama aːlʔiinsaaːna maaː lam jaʕlam aʶːlmaʶntˤiʶquʶ waʶaʶːlnnaʶðˤaʶruʶ waʶaʶːlsˤsˤaʶmtuʶ ldaː mnzl saːmj bstaːn d͡ʒmjl ʃʕr saːmj baːltwttr χaaːlidijna fijhaaː ʔaabadanaː ʔiinna aːlllaha ʕindahu ʔaad͡ʒrun ʕaʶðˤiʶjmuʶn nħnu lsnaː aːlwħjdjn aːlðjn jʕtqdwn ʔanhu ʁjr mðnb wabarranaː biwaaːlidajhi walam jakun d͡ʒabbaaːranaː ʕaʶsˤiʶjjaʶnaʶː maːljzjaː blaːl ðw ʕlm walakin kaððaba watawallaaː fqwlaː lh qwlaː ljnaː lʕlh jtðkr ʔaw jχʃaː haðaaː jawmu aʶːlfaʶsˤliʶ aːllaðij kuntum bihi tukaððibuwna ʔaafabihaðaaː aːlħadijθi ʔaantum mmudhinuwna faaːktubnaaː maʕa aːlʃʃaaːhidijna ðhbat ʔilaː baːrjs sʔadχr aːlmzjd mn aːlmaːl ʔanta ħsˤlt ʕlaː hʔulaːʔ mn aːlħql liʔaanna aːld͡ʒaaːhila jaraaː aːlʕilma takallufanaː walawmanaː twqf ʕn mdˤaʶːjqaʶ rsˤaʶːsˤ aːlħjaːa d͡ʒmjla ʔaj nwʕ mn aːlχbz trjd ʔan tʔakl famaaː zaaːlat tilka daʕwaaːhum ħattaaː d͡ʒaʕalnaaːhum ħaʶsˤiʶjdaʶnaʶː χaaːmidijna ʔinaː ʔanzlnaː ʔiljk aːlktaːb baːlħq faːʕbd aːllh mχlsˤaʶː mlaːʔaːt aːlsrjr ttʁjr mra kl ʔasbwʕ kam lbθt waqaaːla rad͡ʒulun liaːbni ʕabbaaːsin raʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːlllahu ʕanhu ʔanaː ʔaʶfdˤl aːlmjaːh aːlmʕdnja kuff ʕn ʔizʕaːd͡ʒj ʔarjdu ʔan ʔakwna wħjdaːan qaːl nʕm ʃafaaːʕaau aːlʃʃaaːfiʕijna walajsa fij haðaaː aʶːlqaʶsˤdiʶ taʔaθijrun fij dijnin walaaː qadaħun fij muruwʔaain aːlkθjr mn aːlʔazwaːd͡ʒ jnthj bhm aːlʔamr ʔilaː aʶːltˤlaʶːq swf ʔaʕaːwd aʶːlʔiʶtsˤaʶːlaʶ baʶʕdˤiʶ aʶːlmaʶwaʶaʶːʕiʶðˤiʶ qrrt ʔan ʔatrk aːlmdrsa aːlʕaaːlimi ʁarijbun waʔiiqlaaːlahu ʕad͡ʒijbun bima nilt haðaaː aːlʕilma qaaːla waʶʕaʶwaʶaʶːriʶdˤiʶ aːlʃʃahawaaːti sʔaltnj ʔijmjlj sʔuaːlaːan hðh aːlʔaqsaːm ljst ʕaːzla llsˤwt ħqanaː wlqd zjnaː aːlsmaːʔ aːldnjaː bmsˤaʶːbjħ wd͡ʒʕlnaːhaː rd͡ʒwmaː llʃjaʶːtˤjn wʔaʕtdnaː lhm ʕðaːb aːlsʕjr hl ʔanta maːljzj jaː saːmj ʔaantum waʔaːbaaːʔuukumu aːlʔaaqdamuwna ʔiinna ʕaðaaːba rabbihim ʁajru maʔamuwnin rabbi muwsaaː wahaaːruwna lm trd ʔan jbqaː hnaːk lmda ʔaʶtˤwl rasuwlu aːlllahi sˤaʶllaʶaʶː aːlllahu ʕalajhi wasallama ʔam jħsbwn ʔanaː laː nsmʕ srhm wnd͡ʒwaːhm blaː wrslnaː ldjhm jktbwn hw jrd͡ʒʕ ʔilaː bjth waʕalaaː aʶːlfaʶdˤliʶ waʶaʶːlttaʶχsˤiʶjsˤiʶ dalijlanaː sʔabqaːa hnaː ʔilaː ʔan trd͡ʒʕ aʶːlsˤaʶːlwn aʶːlaʶːftraʶːdˤj llħaʶːsˤljn ʕlaː kaaːna maaː taʶdˤaʶmmaʶnaʶ haðajni aːlnnawʕajni bjnj wbjnk tˤrjqaʶ tfkjrh dˤħlaʶ wnaːdwaː jaː maːlk ljqdˤ ʕljnaː rbk qaːl ʔinkm maːkθwn hl ttħdθ aːlʔisbraːntw ħaːwl twm qtlj watuʕaaːnidu ʔaahlahu ʔaʶsˤbħ mʕlmaː mn aːlʁaːʔib kðbt ʕaːd fkjf kaːn ʕðaːbj wnðr aːnh ltˤjf sddt baːlnqd mn aʶːlʔaʶfdˤl ʔalaː tχbraː ʔabaːkmaː baːlħaːdθ lqd trʕrʕ bʃda hðaː aːlmwqʕ mfjd d͡ʒdaː hw jstħiq ʔan jusd͡ʒan fij aːlssamaaːwaaːti wamaaː fij aʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤiʶ wakafaaː biaːlllahi wakijlanaː faaːlssaaːbiqaaːti sabqanaː wʔiðaː aːld͡ʒħjm sʕrt faʔaaχaðahu ʔaabuw aːlʕataaːhijaai faqaaːla bħθt ʕn aːld͡ʒzaːʔir fj d͡ʒwd͡ʒl fqtˤ ʔawqf hðaː sʔaʶðˤl bʕjdaːan ʕn drbk ʔanta qd trʁb fj aːltħduθ ʔilaː twm fij quluwbihim mmaʶraʶdˤuʶn fazaaːdahumu aːlllahu maʶraʶdˤaʶnaʶː walahum ʕaðaaːbun ʔaalijmun bimaaː kaaːnuwaː jakðibuwna ʕljnaː ʔibqaːʔ hðh aːlmʕlwmaːt fj tˤj aːlktmaːn fj aːlwqt aʶːlħaʶːdˤr waʔaanʃada ʔaabuw aːlqaaːsimi aːlʔaːmidijju θm ʔin ʕljnaː bjaːnh maː hj aːllʁa aːltj jtklmwnhaː fj aːlmksjk waːħll ʕqda waaːhijaaun aʶːlmtˤrqaʶ waːlmnd͡ʒl jrmzaːn llʃjwʕja tilka ʔiiðanaː qismaaun dˤiʶjzaʶaʶː nħtaːd͡ʒ ʔilaː sjaːra ʔafmaː nħn bmjtjn waaːlssamaaːʔi ðaaːti aːlħubuki maː aːlðj traːhu fjh twd͡ʒd χtˤʔaʶ fj aːld͡ʒmla mnnaːd jħbb aːlʕhraːt sʔalathu wrdd binʕm hl ʔanta sˤdjqj waqaaːla aːlχalijlu bnu ʔaaħmada ʔan aːʕml saːbʁaːt wqdr fj aːlsrd waːʕmlwaː sˤaʶːlħaʶː ʔinj bmaː tʕmlwn bsˤjr wʔawħjnaː ʔilaː mwsaː aːlkθjr mn aːlmaːl fj aʶːlmsˤrf ʔaʃʕr baːrtbaːkin fj ħdˤwrh maːðaː fʕl llħmj ʔaːbn mn ʔant tadʕuw man ʔaadbara watawallaaː θm lnħn ʔaʕlm baːlðjn hm ʔawlaː bhaː sˤljaʶː waʔiin maaːta haddanij ʔanaː mn ʃzwkaː aːraːk jwm aːlθlaːθaːʔ maːðaː tʕrf ʕn ħjwaːnaːt aːlbaːndaː km mn aːlwqt ʔaʶmdˤjt fj aːlχaːrd͡ʒ laqad kaaːna fij juwsufa waʔiiχwatihi ʔaːjaaːtun lilssaaːʔiilijna twm qaːl ʔanh kaːn sʕjdaː ʔaajjuhum ʔaaʃaddu ʕalaaː aːlrraħmani ʕitijjanaː wʔinh fj ʔam aːlktaːb ldjnaː lʕlj ħkjm aːlrd͡ʒaːʔ ʔan tbqwaː ʕlaː aʶːtsˤaʶːl waʔiin jukaððibuwka faqad kaððaba aːllaðijna min qablihim d͡ʒaaːʔathum rusuluhum biaːlbajjinaaːti wabiaːlzzuburi wabiaːlkitaaːbi aːlmunijri qddmtu tqrjrj ltwm aːlχbz ljs tˤaʶːzd͡ʒaʶːaʶn lqd wdˤħ aːlmʃkla bmθaːl waːqʕj ʔajn ʔaʶsttˤjʕ ʔan ʔad͡ʒd sjaːra ʔad͡ʒra mʕ aːnnj knt d͡ʒaːlsaːan tħt aːlʃms wlkn knt ʔaʃʕr baːlbrd jaʶsˤlaʶwnaʶhaʶaʶː jawma aːlddijni ʔinj lkm rswl ʔamjn ʔaan tuʔumina biaːllhi wamalaːaʔiikatihi wakutubihi warusulihi waaːljawmi aːlʔaːχiri watuʔumina biaːlqadari χajrihi waʃarrihii fqaːl ʔin hðaː ʔilaː sħr jʔuθr wamaaː kaaːna lanaaː ʕalajkum min suʶltˤaʶaʶːniʶn bal kuntum qawmanaː tˤaʶaʶːʁiʶjnaʶ stntˤq aːlmħkma aːldstwrja baːlqraːr sˤbjħaʶ hðaː aːljwm famaaː wad͡ʒadnaaː fijhaaː ʁajra bajtin mina aːlmuslimijna kaːn aːlmaːʔ daːfʔiaː hl tʕtqd ʔannaː snd͡ʒd bjthaː faχarad͡ʒa ʕalaaː qawmihi mina aːlmiħraaːbi faʔaawħaaː ʔiilajhim ʔaan sabbiħuwaː bukraaan waʕaʃijjanaː wasahulat ʕalajhi zawaaːd͡ʒiruhu tˤaʶaʶːliʶbuʶ aːlʕilmi waʕaaːmilu aːlbirri kaʔaːkili aʶːltˤtˤaʶʕaʶaʶːmiʶ ʔin ʔaaχaða minhu quwtanaː ʕaʶsˤaʶmaʶhuʶ muttakiʔiijna fijhaaː jadʕuwna fijhaaː bifaaːkihaain kaθijraain waʃaraaːbin laaː d͡ʒarama ʔaanna aːlllaha jaʕlamu maaː jusirruwna wamaaː juʕlinuwna ʔiinnahu laaː juħibbu aːlmustakbirijna waʔiilaaː aːld͡ʒibaaːli kajfa nuʶsˤiʶbaʶt aːlħjaːa sjrkun jatijmanaː ðaaː maqrabaain fdˤlaʶː mn rbk ðlk hw aːlfwz aʶːlʕðˤjm jtmtʕ twm bmwhba kbjra ʕlaː twzjʕ aːlmhaːm hl traː aːlraːkwn wlh maː skn fj aːlljl waːlnhaːr whw aːlsmjʕ aːlʕljm waħaðfa aːlmaʕsuwri ʔaaslamu hl ttħdθ aːlʔalbaːnja waqad rawaaː bdʔa mnnaːd jʕml ʕndmaː ʔaχbrt twm bʔanj d͡ʒaːʔiʕ ʔaχbrnj bʔanh d͡ʒaːʔiʕ hw aːlʔaːχr lm jrfʕ aːlstaːr ħtaː aːlʔaːn km lk ʕndj ʔarbʕa jwrw lw smħt waqad qaaːlat aːlħukamaaːʔu rubba sˤiʶddiʶjqiʶn ʔaawaddu min ʃaqijqin hw laː jrjd ʔan jʕtrf baːlhzjma maʶwtˤiʶniʶj maʶwtˤiʶniʶj aːlʃbaːbu ln jkilaa hamuuhu ʔan tstaqilaa ʔaw jabjd ħfðˤ d͡ʒmjʕ mn fj aʶːlsˤf aʶːlqsˤjdaʶ ʕn ðˤhr qlb wakaʔasanaː dihaaːqanaː faaːʕlam ʔaannahu laaː ʔiilaha ʔiillaaː aːlllahu waaːstaʁfir liðanbika walilmuʔuminijna waaːlmuʔuminaaːti waaːlllahu jaʕlamu mutaqallabakum wamaθwaaːkum wqaːl qrjnh hðaː maː ldj ʕtjd ʔilaː aːlʁd ʔinh mħðˤwðˤ ʔakθr mmaː hw ðkj aʶːlsˤraʶːʕ bjn ʔisraːʔijl wswrjaː jtfaːqm waʔiinna rabbaka lajaʕlamu maaː tukinnu sˤuʶduʶwruʶhuʶm saːmj bχjr faʔaaχaða haðaaː aːlmaʕnaaː maʶnsˤuʶwruʶ bnu ʔismaaːʕijla faqaaːla waʔiinnahu laqasamun llaw taʕlamuwna ʕaʶðˤiʶjmuʶn ðalika biʔaannahum ʃaaːqquwaː aːlllaha warasuwlahu waman juʃaaːqiqi aːlllaha warasuwlahu faʔiinna aːlllaha ʃadijdu aːlʕiqaaːbi hðh ʔawl mra ʔaktb baːllʁa aːlʕrbja aːfʕl maː tħb bʕd aːlmʕaːnaːa tʔatj aːlrfaːhja jd͡ʒb ʕljk ʔan tktb rsaːlaan qul ʔiinnij laaː ʔaamliku d͡ʒhnm χaːldwn waqijla liʔaabij hurajraaa raʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːlllahu ʕanhu laːa juʔuminu ʔaaħadukum ħattaaː juħibba lʔaiaχijhi maaː juħibbu linafsihi lam jaχlu ʔaan jakuwna sˤaʶdiʶjqaʶnaʶː d͡ʒaaːhilanaː ʔaaw wamaqaaːmin karijmin fsd͡ʒd aːlmlaːʔika klhm ʔad͡ʒmʕwn ʔajħsb ʔan ln jqdr ʕljh ʔaħd tbχr aːlmaːʔ waʔiiðaaː ðabaħtum faʔaaħsinuwaː aːlððibħaaa waljuħidda ʔaaħadukum ʃafratahu waljuriħ ðabijħatahu ʔiʶntðˤr dqjqa jaː twm tbrrʕa baːlkθjr mn aːlmaːl laː ʔaʶsˤdq ʔan ʕljj ʔaχð aːχtbaːr jwm aːlʔaħd km jwd͡ʒd mn sʔuaːl ʔinh jtħdθ aːlʔan mʕhaː wajaʕmalu fijhaaː ʕamala aːlrraaːʁibijna nbhnj ʔalaː ʔaqwd bsrʕa hl hnaːk mn jtħdθ aːlaːnd͡ʒljzja qaːlwaː taːllh lqd ʕlmtm maː d͡ʒʔinaː lnfsd fj aʶːlʔaʶrdˤ wmaː knaː saːrqjn klaː sjkfrwn bʕbaːdthm wjkwnwn ʕljhm dˤdaʶː ʕdt mn aːlmdrsa ʔanti aːnzlj ʕn drraːd͡ʒtj qaːl jaː qwm ʔinj lkm nðjr mbjn laaː taʕd͡ʒizanna walaaː jadχulk muʶdˤd͡ʒiʶraʶaʶuʶn faaːlnnud͡ʒħu jahliku bajna aːlʕad͡ʒzi waʶaʶːldˤdˤaʶd͡ʒaʶriʶ ʔaːlʔaːna waqad ʕaʶsˤaʶjtaʶ qablu wakunta mina aːlmufsidijna ʔanaː fj qaːʕa aʶːlʔiʶntðˤaʶːr ʔanaː mstʕda ʔarjd ʔan ʔaðhb ʔilaː aːlmdrsa waʔaamsaka min qawlihi wawasiʕathu aːlssunaau χð maː tʃaːʔ mn aːlwqt aʶːnðˤuʶr kajfa faʶdˤdˤaʶlnaʶaʶː baʶʕdˤaʶhuʶm ʕalaaː baʶʕdˤiʶn walalʔaːχiraau ʔaakbaru darad͡ʒaaːtin waʔaakbaru taʶfdˤiʶjlaʶnaʶː ʔanaː ʔaʶtttˤlʕ lrħla aːltzld͡ʒ χaʶːsˤtnaʶː raːtbj laː jsmħ lnaː ʔan nʕjʃ brfaːhja aːlʔaːn ʔaʕrf kjf ʔatwqʕ ʔannj sʔabħθ jwmanaː maː ʕn fjaːʁraː fj wjkjbjdjaː ʕndmaː samiʕa aːlʔaχbaːr tħwla ʃaːħbaːan θm d͡ʒʕlnaːk ʕlaː ʃrjʕa mn aːlʔamr faːtbʕhaː wlaː ttbʕ ʔahwaːʔ aːlðjn laː jʕlmwn law kaaːnat aːlddunjaaː daaːra muqaaːmin laaːittaχaðnaaː lahaaː ʔaaθaaːθanaː kjf qutil twm ʔinaː χlqnaː aːlʔinsaːn mn ntˤfaʶ ʔamʃaːd͡ʒ nbtljh fd͡ʒʕlnaːh smjʕaː bsˤjraʶː wʔamaː aːlðjn kfrwaː ʔaflm tkn ʔaːjaːtj ttlaː ʕljkm faːstkbrtm wkntm qwmaː md͡ʒrmjn kitaaːbun ʔaunzila ʔiilajka falaaː jakun fij sˤaʶdriʶkaʶ ħarad͡ʒun minhu litunðira bihi waðikraaː lilmuʔuminijna qtˤk laː jrjd ʔan jnzl mn mktbj waʔiinna ʔaand͡ʒaba aːlnnisaaːʔi aːlfaruwku ʔauħibbu ʔaalaːlaː ʔaaqwma biʃajʔin χilaːla aʶːlʕuʶtˤlaʶiʶ wamaaː ʔaadraaːka maaː sid͡ʒd͡ʒijnun sajaquwluwna lillahi qul ʔaafalaaː tattaquwna aːlkθjr mn aːlnaːs jd͡ʒhlwn ʔan aʶːlmdˤaʶːdaʶːt aːlħjwja ljst ldjhaː tʔaθjr ʕlaː aʶːlʔaʶmraʶːdˤ aːlfjrwsja tdχl fjmaː knt ʔaqwm bh fkðbwh fʕqrwhaː fdmdm ʕljhm rbhm bðnbhm fswaːhaː wahuwa bikulli ʔaaħadin qabijħun wabiaːlʕulamaaːʔi ʔaaqbaħu maaː baʕaθa aːlllahu taʕaaːlaaː min baʕdihi nabijjanaː ʔillaaː fij θarwaain min qawmihi waqaaːla ʕabdu aːlllahi bnu masʕuwdin raʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːlllahu ʕanhu lijaʕlama ʔaan qad ʔaablaʁuwaː risaaːlaaːti rabbihim waʶʔaʶaʶħaʶaʶːtˤaʶ bimaaː ladajhim waʶʔaʶaʶħsˤaʶaʶː kulla ʃajʔin ʕadadanaː ʔaaraaːhum ʔiðaaː ʔaajsart lazimuwk waqaaːla firʕawnu jaaː haaːmaaːnu aːbni lij sˤaʶrħaʶnaʶː laʕallij ʔaabluʁu aːlʔaasbaaːba qaːl fʔink mn aʶːlmnðˤrjn sjdnj hj ʔakbr mdjna fj aːstraːljaː laaː tanaaːluwna maaː tuħibbuwna ʔillaaː biʶaʶːlsˤsˤaʶbriʶ ʕalaaː maaː takrahuwna laqijtu ʔaabaaː ðarinin biaːlraabaðaai waʕalajhi ħulaaaun waʕalaaː ʁulaaːmihi ħulaaaun ʔaʶðˤn ðlk ʕani aːljamijni waʕani aːlʃʃimaaːli ʕizijna ʔaʶtˤlq mnnaːd aːlnnaːr waliðalika qaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlʕulamaaːʔi aːnaː raːhb wamaaː ʔaadraaːka maaː saqaru aʶːuʶnðˤuʶr ʔilaaː qawli aːlʃʃaaːʕir ʔaj ʃjʔ ʔaːχr aːstχdm qdmjk lqd knt sˤaʶːmtaʶː lmda tˤwjlaʶ wʕlaː fkra jmknk mnaːdaːtj bitwm hj stntðˤr ħtaː tnzl ʔant mn aːlʃd͡ʒra ðlk aːlklb dˤχm waaːld͡ʒawra min nataaːʔiid͡ʒi maaː lajsa biʕadlin maːðaː ħdθ fj bjt bwlwk aːlljla waman qaaːla biwud͡ʒuwbi ðalika biaːlʃʃarʕi laː jsˤlaʶːhaʶː ʔilaː aːlʔaʃqaː kaːn mnnaːd aʶːʕtˤjnj frsˤaʶ hl tħb aːld͡ʒbna wasaʔaala ʔaanuwʃirwaaːna qul huwa aːlrraħmanu ʔaːmannaaː bihi waʕalajhi tawakkalnaaː fasataʕlamuwna man huwa fij dˤaʶlaʶaʶːliʶn mubijnin kl maː kaːn jħtaːd͡ʒh twm lfj d͡ʒħjm wad͡ʒijʔa jawmaʔiiðin bid͡ʒahannama jawmaʔiiðin jataðakkaru aːlʔiinsaaːnu waʔaannaaː lahu aːlððikraaː χajru ʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶaʶːbiʶk aːlmuʕijnu lak ʕalaaː dahrik lj sˤdjq ʔaːχr fj aʶːlsˤjn jaʕnij fij aːlʕilmi wafawqa kulli ðij ʕilmin ʕalijmun qaaːla wadaaːnijaaan ʕalajhim ðˤiʶlaʶaʶːluʶhaʶaʶː waðullilat quʶtˤuʶwfuʶhaʶaʶː taðlijlanaː wud͡ʒuwhun jawmaʔiiðin naaːʕimaaun jasʔaaluwna ʔaajjaaːna jawmu aːlddijni ʔaallaaː jasd͡ʒuduwaː lillahi aːllaðij juχrid͡ʒu aːlχabʔa fij aːlssamaaːwaaːti waʶaʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤiʶ wajaʕlamu maaː tuχfuwna wamaaː tuʕlinuwna walaqad raʔaːhu biaːlʔaufuqi aːlmubijni mn fdˤlk dʕnj ʔaðhb maaː ðakarnaaː min aːliaːstiħjaaːʔi ʔaʶstjqðˤ mtʔaχχraːan hj mʕtaːda ʕlaː aːltmrn qbl ftˤwr aʶːlsˤbaʶːħ haːnʔiaː mmd͡ʒdaː aʶːlħdˤaʶːraʶ aːlaːmaːzjʁja ʕðˤjmaʶ naːdraː maː jdˤħk bl laː wamarħuwmin min saqamin huwa ʃifaaːʔuuhu takawwna aʶːlsˤdjd fj aːld͡ʒrħ waliðalika qijla waʕumuwmuhu ʔaan jastawd͡ʒiba d͡ʒamijʕa aːlʔaaħwaaːli aːlðjn ʕaːhdt mnhm θm jnqdˤwn ʕhdhm fj kl mra whm laː aːlʔauχraaː waʔiin ʔaaqamtum ʔaaχaðakum waʔiinna min ʃijʕatihi laʔiibraaːhijma ʔiinna aːllaðijna hum min χaʃjaai rabbihim muʃfiquwna ʔanaː mmtn llʁaːja lmsaːʕdtk d͡ʒahannama jaʶsˤlaʶwnaʶhaʶaʶː fabiʔisa aːlmihaaːdu aːrd͡ʒw dʕwa kl aːlnaːd͡ʒħjn aːlaː hðaː aːlmnʃwr w mʃaːrkth ljsˤlhm lw ʔardnaː ʔan ntχð lhwaː laːtχðnaːh mn ldnaː ʔin knaː faːʕljn ʔaalam jaʔatikum nabaʔau aːllaðijna kafaruwaː min qablu faðaaːquwaː wabaaːla ʔaamrihim walahum ʕaðaaːbun ʔaalijmun waʔiin kaaːna lilttaʕmijaai waaːlrramzi lam juʕraf ʔillaaː biʶaʶːlmuʶwaʶaʶːdˤaʶʕaʶaʶiʶ sˤaʶrfuʶ aːlhawaaː ʕan ðij aːlhawaaː ʕazijzu ʔinna aːlhawaaː lajsa lahu tamjijzu waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlbulaʁaaːʔi laː traː fjhaː ʕwd͡ʒaː wlaː ʔamtaː ʔaatazawwad͡ʒat jaaː zajdu qaaːla qaːlt ʔanhaː stʔatj ʕalaaː ʔaan nnubadila χajranaː mminhum wamaaː naħnu bimasbuwqijna nʕrf ħqwqnaː tanazzalu aːlmalaaːʔiikaau waaːlrruwħu fijhaaː biʔiiðni rabbihim min kulli ʔaamrin mn dwn aːllh hl jnsˤrwnkm ʔaw jntsˤrwn faaːlʕumuru ʔaʶaʶqsˤaʶruʶ min ʔaan janfada fij ʁajri aːlmanaaːfiʕi qaːlwaː ʔaːmnaː brb aːlʕaːlmjn sˤnʕ lj bil fstaːnanaː d͡ʒmjlanaː maːt aːlʔaχaːn ʔanaː ʔaħb aːllʁa aːljaːbaːnja kθjraːan faʶːsˤbr sˤbraʶː d͡ʒmjlaː qtlth btj lnrjk mn ʔaːjaːtnaː aːlkbraː aw quli aːlħaquu min raabikum faman ʃaaːʔ faljuʔumin waman ʃaaːʔ faljakfur mn sjtħml aːlmsʔuwlja baːlnsba lhðaː aːlʔamr mtaː wkjf nʃʔat aːlnd͡ʒwm aːlbdaːʔija wmtaː ðˤhrt ʔawlaː aːlmd͡ʒraːt jaaː ʕibaaːdi laaː χawfun ʕalajkumu aːljawma walaaː ʔaantum taħzanuwna ldjh ʕjwn zrqaːʔ hnaːk aːlʕdjd mn aːlmbaːnj aːld͡ʒmjla fj aːlmdjna nðˤrt maːrj ʔilaː nfshaː fj aːlmrʔaːa maː aʶːfdˤl tˤrjqh lħl aːlmʃklh aːʕtnjt bʔaχtj aʶːlmrjdˤaʶ ʔaaraʔaajta ʔiin kaððaba watawallaaː nsjt aːsmh waʶnaʶsˤaʶrnaʶaʶːhuʶm fakaaːnuwaː humu aːlʁaaːlibijna qaːl ʔalm ʔaql lk ʔink ln tsttˤjʕ mʕj sˤbraʶː ʔaχbrthm kjf tsjr aːlʔamwr hl wd͡ʒdt kθjraː mn aːld͡ʒzaːʔirjjn fj ʔalmaːnjaː walikulli ʔaummaain rasuwlun faʔiiðaaː d͡ʒaaːʔa rasuwluhum quʶdˤiʶjaʶ bajnahum biʶaʶːlqiʶstˤiʶ wahum laaː juʶðˤlaʶmuʶwnaʶ walaqad ʔaarsalnaaː muwsaaː biʔaːjaaːtinaaː waʶsuʶltˤaʶaʶːniʶn mubijnin ldjnaː qtˤ w nħbh d͡ʒmjʕaː waːlðjn hm lʔamaːnaːthm wʕhdhm raːʕwn kjf hw hl trʁb baːldχwl waʔiiðaaː aːnqalabuwaː ʔiilaaː ʔaahlihimu aːnqalabuwaː fakihijna subħaaːna rabbika rabbi aːlʕizzaai ʕammaaː jaʶsˤiʶfuʶwnaʶ jawma jaquwmu aːlrruwħu waaːlmalaaːʔiikaau sˤaʶffaʶnaʶː laaː jatakallamuwna ʔiillaaː man ʔaaðina lahu aːlrraħmanu waqaaːla sˤaʶwaʶaʶːbaʶnaʶː aːstħmwaː mn fdˤlkm ʔinh ʔin sˤħ aːltʕbjr qaːmws mtnql hl bʔimkaːnk ʔan tsˤdq maː qaːlh aːtfqnaː ʕlaː taːrjχ aːlaːd͡ʒtmaːʕ aːlqaːdm ljs bʔimkaːnj aːlqjaːm bhðaː aːlʕml bmfrdj ttbʕhaː aːlraːdfa faʔiiðaaː ʕudima aːlttad͡ʒaaːnusu min wad͡ʒhin aːntafaaː aːlttaʃaaːkulu min wad͡ʒhin ʔiinnaaː χalaqnaaː aːlʔiinsaaːna min nuʶtˤfaʶaʶiʶn ʔaamʃaaːd͡ʒin nabtalijhi fad͡ʒaʕalnaaːhu samijʕanaː baʶsˤiʶjraʶnaʶː liʔaannahu ʔiðaaː kaaːna ðaaː χajrin ʔaaħabbahum waʔaaħabbuwhu tʕllmtu aːlʕjʃ dwnhaː nħn lsnaː ʔamrjkjjn ʔauqdm aːstqaːltj laʕallanaaː nattabiʕu aːlssaħaraaa waːltlaːʕb baːlħqaːʔiq bl ʕlaː aːlaːʁraːq fj kðbhm ʁnaː ʔaʁnja ʔillaaː ʔaan jaʶndˤaʶmmaʶ ʔilajhaaː ʔaaħadu aːlʔaasbaaːbi aːlbaaːʕiθaai ʕalajhaaː waaːlmuqarrabaai lahaaː laː twd͡ʒd ʔid͡ʒaːba lsʔuaːlk ʔinh nwʕ mhdd baʶːlaʶːnqraʶːdˤ lqd ʔaʕd͡ʒbnj aːlħfl lkn aːlqaːʕa kaːnt baːrda tʃwtaːrw hw aːsm klb aːlsjda taːnaːkaː wkl sˤʁjr wkbjr msttˤr qaːlwaː nʕbd ʔaʶsˤnaʶːmaʶː fnðˤl lhaː ʕaːkfjn ʔant mtʔaχr ʔatmnaːa ʔan aʶːlsˤjf laː jnthaːi aːbdaːan ʃkraːan lka ʕlaː ltˤfk faman ʃaaːʔa ðakarahu faʔiinna aːld͡ʒaħijma hija aːlmaʔawaaː ʔaʶmtˤrt bʁzaːra tˤwaʶːl aːljwm mannaaːʕin llilχajri muʕtadin ʔaaθijmin wfj aːlsmaːʔ rzqkm wmaː twʕdwn hl jʔumn aːlmslmwn bmwsaː wafijhaaː jaquwlu muʶχaʶaʶːlaʶtˤaʶaʶuʶ aːlʔaaʃraaːri ʕalaaː χaʶtˤaʶriʶn wahuwa biaːlʔaufuqi aːlʔaaʕlaaː hl jmknnj ʔan ʔasʔal ʔilaː ʔajn ʔanta ʔin rbj jqðf baːlħq ʕlaːm aːlʁjwb ʔaʶsˤbħ ʔaχwh ʔimaːmaː mn fdˤlk ʔismʕnj jd͡ʒb ʔan tðhb sttħdθ d͡ʒwdj ʕn aːljaːbaːn ʁdaːan haðaaː ðikrun waʔiinna lilmuttaqijna laħusna maʔaːbin qaaːluwaː ʔaad͡ʒiʔitanaaː biaːlħaqqi ʔaam ʔaanta mina aːlllaaːʕibijna fsbħaːn aːlðj bjdh mlkwt kl ʃjʔ wʔiljh trd͡ʒʕwn aʶːltˤrjq ljs lld͡ʒbaːn wlkn llbtˤl wqwmwaː daːʔimaːan ʔilaː d͡ʒaːnb aʶːldˤʕjf mn ʔabnaːʔikm mlaːbsh kj jðhb llʕml nħn nħb aːlʔaʃd͡ʒaːr ʔaftħ sˤndwqaʶːaʶn ʔanaː rd͡ʒlun hl ʔanti trjd ħqaːan aːltħdθ bʃʔan hðaː aːlʔan fatawalla ʕanhum famaaː ʔaanta bimaluwmin fʕsˤwaʶː rswl rbhm fʔaχðhm ʔaχða aːlχuluwdi ʔanaː ħqaː laː ʔaʶsttˤjʕ ʔan ʔafhm fn aːlnħt aːlħdjθ ʔanaː ʔaħsdhaː hðh aːlhdja lsˤdjqj hl knt sˤaʶːħiʶn fj ðlk aːlwqt dʕjnaː nstʕd llðhaːb ħtaː ʔataːnaː aːljqjn wkwaːʕb ʔatraːbaː ʔanta qra ʕjnj ʔaʁlq ʕjnjk aːtrknj ʔadχl lw smħt ʔinna min aːlʃʃarijʕaai ʔaan tud͡ʒilla ʔaahla aːlʃʃarijʕaai faʶnaʶðˤaʶmaʶhuʶ ʔaabuw tammaaːmin faqaaːla bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm ʔiðaː zlzlt aʶːlʔaʶrdˤ zlzaːlhaː hnaː fqtˤ aːd͡ʒʕal maaː fij aːlkutubi raʔasa aːlmaaːli mnnaːd ln jdχl ðlk aːlmnzl warafʕuhu ðahaaːbu ʔaahlihi sd͡ʒd͡ʒl maː tnfq ʔiðaː qmt btʁjjr aʶːlχtˤaʶ fjd͡ʒb ʕljk ʔan tʕlm ʔaʶʕdˤaʶːʔ aːlfrjq baːltʁjjraːt waaːld͡ʒahaaːlaaa maʁramanaː baʃijranaː wanaðijranaː faʶʔaʶaʶʕraʶdˤaʶ ʔaakθaruhum fahum laaː jasmaʕuwna ʔaχbr twm maːrj ʕn aːlħaːdθ fahaðaaː ʕalaaː θalaaːθaai ʔaaqsaaːmin waːqrʔawhaː lbnj aːld͡ʒjl ʁdaː rʔajthaː whj tqtˤʕ aːlʃaːrʕ nħn sˤdjqaʶːn hl ldjk aːj fkra ʕn mn jsttˤjʕ fʕl hðaː aʶːlqtˤaʶːr aːlqaːdm mn d͡ʒnjf sjsˤl aʶːlmħtˤaʶ qaːla faʔaaχbirnij ʕani aːlʔijmaːni qaːla ʔaːsf lkn ʕlj aːlʕwda ʔilaː aːlbjt aːlʔaːn aːlmuʃkilau muʃkilthm tʔaqlmt mʕ aːld͡ʒw aːlħaːr wttχðwn msˤaʶːnʕ lʕlkm tχldwn waqaaːla aːbnu masʕuwdin kaːn jnðˤr ʔiljhaː ʔaam jaquwluwna naħnu d͡ʒamijʕun muʶntaʶsˤiʶruʶn tðkra mn fdˤlk lm jħdˤr aːlaːd͡ʒtmaːʕ tˤlaʶːb kθr walaqad dˤaʶllaʶ qablahum ʔaakθaru aːlʔaawwalijna ʔanaː ʔaʶntðˤr mnð saːʕaːt ʔalq nðˤraʶaʶn ʕlaː hðaː aːltqrjr hl ʔinthjt waʶːsˤl mnnaːd aʶːlsˤsˤjaʶːħ twm jħb ʔan jtʕlm aːlmwsjqaː ʔaʶaʶtˤʕiʶm qiʶtˤtˤaʶkaʶ jaʕnij ʕalaaː χaʶtˤaʶriʶn wakullu maaː ʕadaaː aʶːlʔiʶiʶfdˤaʶaʶːlaʶ bihi kaaːna hajjinanaː ʔajn aːlʔaħðja ʕlaːqtj btwm ʔaʶsˤbħt mn aʶːlmaʶːdˤj kaːn saːmj jʁjjr mlaːbsh kll jwm waqaaːla aːbnu aːlrruwmiji laː tns ʔan tttsˤl bj aːllljla waqaaːla ʕabdu aːlllahi bnu aːlmuʕtazzi raħimahu aːlllahu taʕaaːlaaː km mn aːlwqt bqj llʔiʶftˤaʶːr faaːltaqamahu aːlħwtu wahuwa muljmun aːlrrad͡ʒulu sabaħa fij aːlnnahri liqillaai taħarruzihi minhaaː juʔulimunj ʔaan tuʕaððiba aːlħajawaaːna laχalqu aːlssamaːwaːti waʶaʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤiʶ ʔaakbaru min χalqi aːlnnaːsi walkinna ʔaakθara aːlnnaːsi laː jaʕlamwna naːdaːnj aːlmdrrs baːlʔaħmq waʶjaʶstaʶsˤʁiʶruʶ maʕahaaː kulla kabijrin liʔaanna limaħmuwdihaaː ʔaʶaʶdˤdaʶaʶːdaʶnaʶː muqaaːbilaaan jusʕiduhaaː hawanaː muʶtˤaʶaʶːʕuʶn waʃahwaaun ʁaaːlibaaun aʶːlmaʶriʶjdˤuʶ jard͡ʒuw aːlʃʃifaaːʔa waʔaaðhalanij aːlssuruwru ʕan ħiʶfðˤiʶhaʶaʶː wawadidt ʔaannij law ħaʶfiʶðˤthaʶaʶː fabaʃʃirhum biʕaðaːbin ʔaaljmin ʔabj mhnds mdnj ʔaan jaʶðˤhaʶraʶ min aːlmaħsuwdi faʶdˤluʶn jaʕd͡ʒizu ʕanhu fajakrahu taqaddumahu fijhi waʶaʶːχtiʶsˤaʶaʶːsˤaʶhuʶ bihi wahaðaaː jakuwnu min sˤiʶjaʶaʶːnaʶaʶiʶ aːlnnafsi wakamaaːli aːlmuruwʔaai taʕrud͡ʒu aːlmalaːʔiikaau waaːlrrwħu ʔiilajhi fj jawmin kaːna miqdaːruhu χamsjna ʔaalfa sanaain nħn hnaː jartad͡ʒijka raaːʁibun waʶsˤaʶaʶːraʶ biʶaʶːlfaʶdˤliʶ maʃhuwranaː salaːmun hija ħattaː maʶtˤlaʶʕiʶ aːlfad͡ʒri ʔiðaaː lam takun nafsu aːlʃʃarijfi ʃarijfaaan waʔiin kaaːna ðaaː qadrin falajsa lahu ʃarafu waʔaand͡ʒaħu lilmutaʕallimi wakaaːna kaʶmuʶstaʶnhiʶdˤiʶ aːlmasd͡ʒuwni walaaː jad͡ʒʕala liʶlʃʃaʶjtˤaʶaʶːniʶ suʶltˤaʶaʶːnaʶnaʶː fij naʶqdˤiʶ ʕazaaːʔiimihi waʶmuʶʕaʶaʶːraʶdˤaʶaʶiʶ χaaːliqihi θalaaːθaaun laaː jaslamu ʔaaħadun minhunna lqd tʁjjr saːmj kn ltˤjfaʶː hðh aːlmrra jðhb kjn llssbaːħa jwmaːan bʕd jwm hl ʁjjrti rʔajki km mn aːlwqt bqj ltnaːwl aʶːlʔiʶftˤaʶːr waaːllluʔuma saaːqahu ʔilaaː ʔaaχbaθi aʶːlmaʶtˤaʶaʶːʕiʶmiʶ laː tkn qaːsjaːan d͡ʒdaːan mʕj ʔaħbb ktaːba aːlktb blʁtj tʕtˤlt aːlsjaːra lqd ʁjjrt rʔajj kl wqt wlh ʔaðaːnh ʕaːdt ʔilaː aːlʁnaːʔ muttakiʔijna fjhaː ʕalaaː aːlʔaaraːʔiiki laː jarawna fjhaː ʃamsanaː walaː zamharjranaː laaː jumkinu aːstird͡ʒaaːʕu bawaaːdirihi sjdˤjjʕ aːlwqt waʶsˤaʶraʶfth fij aːlʔaːθaaːmi dʕt ljlaː saːmj ʔilaː mnzlhaː hmaː fj nfs aːlʕmr walaqad raʔaːhu biaːlʔaufuqi aːlmubjni kaːn mdrrsw saːmj jkrhwnh daːʔimaː aːlθθawbu qaʶsˤiʶjruʶn knt ʔaʕlm ʔanh ʔant maː rʔajk ʔanðhb baːlsjaːra ʔam baːltaːksj aːld͡ʒannaau laaː jadχuluhaaː dajjuwθun walaaː qallaaːʕun aːlʕzjzaːlrħjmaːlrzaːqaːlʃaːfj twsˤsˤl faʶːdˤl mn ʔiʶsˤaʶːbaʶ raːmj btˤlqaʶ fj aʶːlðˤðˤhr dʕjnj ʔaʶnðˤr ʔiljki ʔasrʕ mn shm aːlquluwbu ʔaawʕijaau aːlʔaasraaːri lqd sˤfqnaʶː ʕaːda ljs ʕndj wqt kaːf ltnaːwl wd͡ʒba ʁdaːʔ kbjra lħðˤaʶ ʔiinna aːlʔaabraːra lafj naʕjmin fij waʶsˤiʶjjaʶtiʶhiʶ fij aːlbalaaːʁaai fwwt saːmj drs aʶːlttsˤwjr ʔiin taʶdˤriʶb qiʶtˤtˤaʶnaʶː jaχmiʃka ʔilaː ðlk aːlħjn maː θmn hðh aːlqbbʕa ʔiin ʔaanta ʔiillaː naðjrun maːðaː trjd aːlʔaːn ʔanaː ʔaqwm bkl maː bwsʕj lʔansaː ʔann ðlk qd ħdθ waaːstaχʃanat dˤaʶrraʶaʶːʔuʶuʶhuʶ nʃʔa saːmj fj ʔasra mn aʶːltˤtˤbqaʶ aʶːlwstˤaʶː ljs ldj ʕlm mn ʔajn d͡ʒaːʔt ʔin ʃtmt ljlaː mrra drs saːmj mn ʔad͡ʒl ʃhaːda aːlddktwraː aːldχwl llmwðˤfjn fqtˤ jaː ʔaajjuhaaː aːlʔiinsaːnu ʔiinnaka kaːdiħun ʔiilaː rabbika kadħanaː famulaːqjhi ʔaam jaqwlwna ʃaːʕirun naʶtaʶraʶbbaʶsˤuʶ bihi rajba ʔiinnaka majjitun waʔiinnahum majjitwna ʔaaχrad͡ʒa minhaː maːʔahaː wamarʕaːhaː aːldnjaː ktaːb aːlmrʔaa ʔaannahu χarad͡ʒa jawmanaː ʔilaaː ʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶaʶːbiʶhiʶ wahuwa jaquwlu ln ʔans hðh aːlttd͡ʒrba ʔabdaː hw fj aːlmrkz aːlttd͡ʒaːrj jħdˤr saːmj aːlʔaːn ħfl zfaːf aʶːlʕaʶsˤfuʶwruʶ masd͡ʒuwnun fij aʶːlqaʶfaʶsˤiʶ ʔalnaː bʃwka lm ʔant wqħ lhðh aːldrd͡ʒa saːmj ʁjr raʶːdˤiʶn bwðˤjfth aʶːltˤqs fj aːnd͡ʒltraː ʔakθr aːʕtdaːlaːa mmaː hw ʕljh fj aːskwtlaːndaː ħarrik munaaːk ʔiðaaː aːʁtamamt faʔiinnahuna maraaːwiħu waqaaːla ʔaːχaru fawaqaːhu aːlllahu sajjiʔiaaːti maː makarwaː waħaːqa biʔaːli firʕawna swʔu aːlʕaðaːbi wataraknaː ʕalajhi fij aːlʔaːχirjna faʔiinna ðalika ʔaʶaʶʕðˤaʶmuʶ liʔaad͡ʒrihim wazaaːda ʕalaaː ħaddi aːlkifaaːjaai jbdw ʁaʶːmdˤaʶː ħwl maː ʔaraːd fʕlh ʔinhaː fj aːd͡ʒtmaːʕ aːlʔaːn ʕlaː aːlmrʔ ʔan jfʕl kll maː bwsʕh fahaðaaː ʔaaljaqu biʔaahli aːlmuruwʔaai waʔaaʕammu d͡ʒadwaaː wamanfaʕaaan waʔiin kaaːna ʕaqiba aːlttaʔaamuli salijmanaː waʔiiðaaː aːlbiħaːru fud͡ʒd͡ʒirat waʔaanʃaʔaa jaquwlu halaka ʕannj suʶltˤaʶːniʶjaʶh sjqdˤj saːmj bqjja ħjaːth fj aːlssd͡ʒn hl ðhbt ʔilaː aːlmħll aːqdaʕuwaː haðihi aːlnnufuwsa ʕan ʃahawaaːtihaaː faʔiinnahaaː tˤaʶllaʶaʶːʕaʶaʶuʶn tanziʕu ʔaalam naχluqkum min maːʔin mahjnin liʔaannahaaː mawaaːhibu qad manaħahaaː aːlllahu man ʃaaːʔa faʶjaʶsχaʶtˤuʶ ʕalaaː aːlllahi ʕazza wad͡ʒalla fij qaʶdˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶhiʶ ħdθ ðlk lj saːbqanaː fj kitaːbin maknwnin ħqdt ljlaː ʕlaː saːmj saːmj bkaː w bkaː w bkaː tʕrrf saːmj ʕlaː mslmjn mn dwl ʔislaːmjja mχtlfa waqad waʶsˤaʶfaʶ baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlʃʃuʕaraaːʔi aːlʔiinsaaːna faqaaːla ʔaalaː ʔiinnahum min ʔiifkihim msjħj maː mn sbb jdʕw twm lʔilaː jsˤdq maːrj hl ʕljk ʔan tʕml jwm aːlʔaħd ʔanaː ʔansaː ʔajn ʔaʶdˤʕ qbbʕtj aːlwaladu aːlmuhaððabu juħibbuhu ʔaabuwh smʕ saːmj sˤwt ʔammh kaːn saːmj jʕjʃ nmtˤ ħjaːa χtˤjr sjsˤbħ aʶːldˤdˤħjaʶ aːlttaːlja lm jʃfaː aʶːlħsˤaʶːn χuðuwaː zijnatakum ʔanaː ʁd͡ʒrjja ʔaan jakuwna mustawdaʕanaː fij sˤaʶniʶjʕiʶn maʃkuwrin ʕaːdaan maː ʔalʕb aːltns lqd ʔafsdt kl ʃjʔ maː ʔaʶltˤfk fasawwaaːhuna sabʕa samaaːwaaːtin wahuwa bikulli ʃajʔin ʕalijmun ʔaanaaː ʔaaʕlamu lakum ðalika ʔiðaː ðkrt aːlðʔib fχð aːlħðr jaqwlu ʔaahlaktu maːlanaː lubadanaː waman aːltamasa mawaddaaa aːlnnaaːsi jntðˤr fj aːlχaːrd͡ʒ waʔaand͡ʒajnaaː aːllaðjna ʔaːmanwaː wakaːnwaː jattaqwna ʔin aːlnfs lʔamaːra baːlswʔ maːzaːl jd͡ʒb dfʕ aːlfaːtwra aːljwm wamaː jaʶntˤiʶquʶ ʕani aːlhawaː ʔajn kntm d͡ʒmjʕkm aːlfaqijru muħtaaːd͡ʒun ʔauwlʔiika aːllaðjna laʕanahumu aːlllahu faʶʔaʶaʶsˤaʶmmaʶhuʶm waʔaaʕmaː ʔaʶaʶbsˤaʶːraʶhuʶm aːlʕaaːqilu aːlkarijmu sˤaʶdiʶjquʶ kulli ʔaaħadin ʔillaaː man dˤaʶrraʶhuʶ waʔaaħdaθa bihi min hammin waʶaʶːliʶaʶːnqiʶtˤaʶaʶːʕuʶ ʕan aːlʕamali ʔilaaː aːlʕilmi ʔiðaaː ʕamila bimuwd͡ʒibi aːlʕilmi waaːlʕafwu ʕinda aːlqudraai watilka aːlʔaamθaːlu naʶdˤriʶbuʶhaʶː lilnnaːsi wamaː jaʕqiluhaː ʔiillaaː aːlʕaːlimwna waʔiisʕaaːfuhum fij nawaaːʔiibihim walaaː fusħaaa liðij muruwʔaain maʕa ðˤuʶhuʶwriʶ aːlmuknaai ʔaan jakilahum ʔilaaː ʁajrihi ʔiið nad͡ʒd͡ʒajnaːhu waʔaahlahu ʔaad͡ʒmaʕjna laqad χalaqnaaː aːlʔiinsaːna fj kabadin ħaːwl ʔan jtqn aːlfrnsja θumma d͡ʒaʕala ʔilaaː rasuwlihi wabiʕuquwlihim muktafijna ʔimmaaː liʶsˤiʶjaʶaʶːnaʶaʶiʶ ʕiʶrdˤiʶn jad͡ʒuwdu biaːlwaʕdi walakinnahu jadhunu min qaaːruwraain faaːriʁah jaʕijʃu aːlssamaku fij aːlmaaːʔi lawwaːħaaun lilbaʃari faqutila kajfa qaddara ʔanzl saːmj naːfðth ʕaːd aːlʔamr ʔilaː nsˤaʶːbh laː bd ʔanh ʁbj ljqwm bʃjʔ khðaː ln jfwz twm waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlʔaudabaaːʔi fij ʔiʶʁdˤaʶaʶːbiʶk raaːħaau ʔaʶaʶʕsˤaʶaʶːbiʶk liʔaanna haðihi ʔaumuwrun laaː jumkinu aːlʔiinsaaːnu dafʕahaaː ʕan nafsihi taʶsˤaʶddaʶquʶwaʶː ʕalaaː ʔaaχijkum biʕilmin jurʃiduhu wajarfaʕa ħaqijranaː kaːn saːmj jdrs aːlʔislaːm srrjaː buʕiθtu liʔautammima makaaːrima aːlʔaaχlaaːqi wasuʔiila ʕalijjun karrama aːlllahu wad͡ʒhahu ʕan aːlssaχaaːʔi faqaaːla waaːlʕaaːʃiru min ʔaasbaaːbihi aːlmakru watawaqquʕu aʶːlfuʶraʶsˤiʶ aːlχalfijjaai kaːn saːmj jsmʕ lħmaːs sˤbjaʶːnj fj sˤwt ljlaː maːrʔajk bhðh aʶːlχtˤaʶ lm ʔasmʕ lhaː sˤwtaʶː tˤwaʶːl aːllljl waqaaːla mud͡ʒaaːhidun ʔaʶaʶʕtˤaʶaʶː kulla ʃajʔi zawd͡ʒaaan θumma hadaaːhu linikaaːħihaaː wamaː ʔaadraːka maaː aʶːlħuʶtˤaʶmaʶaʶuʶ aʶːlħsˤaʶːn ħjwaːn hm jntðˤrwnnj fqdt ʔaʶʕsˤaʶːbhaʶː kaj laaː jakuwna maʕa aʶːlwaʶsˤmaʶaʶiʶ laː jzaːl aʶːlħsˤaʶːn jrtd͡ʒf lam jalid walam jwlad hðh md͡ʒrrd aʶːftraʶːdˤaʶːt mnki kaːn maʶːdˤj saːmj jtˤaʶːrdh llʔabd aːχtbʔa saːmj wad͡ʒamaʕa faʔaawʕaː ʔant btˤlnaʶː faʔaammaː man ʔawtija kitaːbahu bijamjnihi waχasafa aːlqamaru waaːʕlam ʔaanna lilnnafsi ħaaːlatajni jawma hum ʕalaaː aːlnnaːri juftanwna maliki aːlnnaːsi fj raqqin manʃwrin ʔaχrd͡ʒ aːlqmaːma qdˤaʶː nħbh wajatasallaaː biʔauwlij aːlʕibari faqaaːla ʔaabuw bakri bnu muħammadin aːlʃʃaaːʃiju fij ʔaʶuʶsˤuʶwliʶ aːlfiqhi waʶʔaʶaʶʕtˤiʶfuʶ ʕalajhim jrjd saːmj ʔan jmdˤj bʕdˤ aːlwqt lwħdh bqija aːlwld haːdʔiaːan faman ʔaʶaʶsχaʶtˤaʶ suʶltˤaʶaʶːnaʶhuʶ taʶʕaʶrraʶdˤaʶ lilmanijjaai waman ʔaawħaʃa ʔiχwaaːnahu tabarraʔaa min aːlħurrijaai fawajlun lillaðijna jaktubuwna aːlkitaaːba biʔaajdijhim θumma jaquwluwna haaːðaaː min ʕindi aːlllahi hðh ʔaʕmq nqtˤaʶ fj aːlbħjra ʕaːd ʔilaː znzaːnth ʔarsl saːmj rsaːʔil ʁrjba lljlaː namaaːʔu ziraaːʕaain waʶdˤaʶʕuʶfaʶ raʔajuhu ʕan χijraai ʔaasbaaːbihi wadawaaːʕijhi falaː sˤaʶddaʶqaʶ walaː sˤaʶllaʶː dˤbtˤ saːmj mnbbhh kj jstjqðˤ lsˤlaʶːaʶ aːlfd͡ʒr ʔaaw ʔiʶiʶtˤʕaʶːmuʶn fj jawmin ðj masʁabaain waʔiiðaaː aːuʔutumina falaaː jaχuwnu jaʃtaddu aːlbardu fij aːld͡ʒibaaːli walilʔaumuwri mutaħammilanaː warawaaː hiʃaaːmu bnu ʕurwaaa ʔajn hj lwrj faqawluhu saqijmun lajsa fij χiʶsˤaʶaʶːliʶ aːlʃʃari ʔaaʕdalu min aːlħasadi hl nsjt tʃmjʕ aʶːlʔaʶrdˤjjaʶ md͡ʒdddaː waaːlnnaːʃiraːti naʃranaː ðhbt ʔamj ʔilaː aːlswq ʔaʁzl mn aːmrʔi aːlqjs kaːn saːmj jħbb ħjaːa aːlħflaːt aːlssaaːʕij bajna manzilatajni qabijħatajni waʔaajjadahum biʶnaʶsˤriʶhiʶ aːχtbʔat ljlaː χlf aːlʃʃd͡ʒra bal qaːlwaː ʔiinnaː wad͡ʒadnaː ʔaːbaːʔanaː ʕalaː ʔaummaain waʔiinnaː ʕalaː ʔaːθaːrihim muhtadwna dˤaʶaʶːʕaʶ aːlmiftaaːħu balaː qad d͡ʒaːʔatka ʔaːjaːtj fakaððabta bihaː waaːstakbarta wakunta mina aːlkaːfirjna fawajlun lillaðjna kafarwaː min jawmihimu aːllaðj jwʕadwna lnlʕb kra aːlqdm kaːn saːmj jʕjʃ ħjaːa laːʔaχlaːqjja ʔanti tbaːlʁjn baːlʃʃk mn hnaː waqad χalaqakum ʔaʶaʶtˤwaʶːraʶnaʶː aːlʕʃaːʔ d͡ʒaːhz tʕaːl ltʔakl ldjnaː mdrrs d͡ʒdjd lm ʔans klaːmk ʃabbat aːlnnaaːru lakinna aːlχasaaːʔiira qalijlaaun fajad͡ʒmaʕu bajna maʕarraai aːlkaðibi minhu aʶːdˤħk mʕhm ldjj aːbna wħjda faʔaammaaː aʶːlmaʶtˤaʶaʶːmiʶʕuʶ aːlddanijaau jaʶðˤaʶlluʶ aːlʕaaːmilu muʃtaʁilanaː faʔiiðaaː aːlnnud͡ʒwmu tˤuʶmiʶsaʶt waʶðˤiʶlliʶn min jaħmwmin hw jswq bsrʕa kaːnt ljlaː mftʕla ħraːʔiq χtˤjraʶ ʔaam lahu aːlbanaːtu walakumu aːlbanwna faʔaammaaː suwʔu aʶːlðˤðˤaʶniʶ bihaaː faqad aːχtalafa aːlnnaaːsu fijhi waʶsˤaʶːħiʶbaʶtiʶhiʶ waʔaaχjhi aːʕtnq saːmj aːlʔislaːm fj ʃhr rmdˤaʶːn aːnhaː laː tstħq tʕbk waʔaanʃadanij baʶʕdˤuʶ ʔaahli aːlnnaaːsi ʕalaaː aʶːlsˤsˤiʶdqiʶ lqd tqddmt fj aːlssn aːljawma naχtimu ʕalaː ʔaafwaːhihim watukallimunaː ʔaajdjhim wataʃhadu ʔaard͡ʒuluhum bimaː kaːnwaː jaksibwna waaːlllabijba ʁajra aːlħaquwdi laː tns aʶːlaʶːtsˤaʶːl bʔammk waʔiin χaʃuna maqatuwhu wakaaːna ʕalaaː χaʶtˤaʶriʶn minhum wasanaðkuru taʕlijla kulli ʃaʶrtˤiʶn minhaaː bimaaː junabbiʔiu ʕan luzuwmihi walaaː jaltamisuwaː ʕalajhi rizqanaː waʔiin taħallaaː biʶaʶːlsˤsˤiʶlaʶaʶiʶ waʕilaaːd͡ʒuhu ʔaan jutraka ʕalaaː malalihi fajamalla aːld͡ʒafaaːʔa kamaaː malla aːlʔiiχaaːʔa waaːlθθaaːnij fij d͡ʒinsihi waqijmatihi ʔanzl saːmj ljlaː ʔilaː tuwalluwaː faθamma wad͡ʒhu aːlllahi ʔiinna aːlllaha waaːsiʕun ʕalijmun kaʔaanna biaːbni aːlmaraaːʁaai qad had͡ʒaaːnij faqaaːla kaːn saːmj jmlk kll ʃjʔ jħtaːd͡ʒh fj ħjaːth taʶbiʶjdˤuʶ aːlddad͡ʒaːd͡ʒaaun maː sbb χwfkm d͡ʒmjʕanaː mn saːmj ʔanfq saːmj aːlmaːl fj ʃraːʔ aːlkħwl saːmj d͡ʒrraːħ td͡ʒmjlj fanaħnu kamaaː qaaːla aːlʃʃaaːʕiru smħ saːmj lljlaː kj tqjm tlk aːlʕlaːqa aːld͡ʒnsjja aʶːlχtˤjraʶ mʕh fabaaːʔuwaː biʶʁaʶdˤaʶbiʶn ʕalaaːaː ʁaʶdˤaʶbiʶn walilkaaːfirijna ʕaðaaːbun muhijnun raːsl saːmj ljlaː ʕbr aːlhaːtf md͡ʒdddaː kaðlika jwħj ʔiilajka waʔiilaaː aːllaðjna min qablika aːlllahu aːlʕazjzu aːlħakjmu waʔiin jarawaː ʔaːjaaan juʶʕriʶdˤwaʶː wajaqwlwaː siħrun mustamirrun laaː tutlif ʔaθaaːθa aːlmanzili falajsa lahu fij aːlʕilmi faraaːʁu aʶːlmuʶnqaʶtˤiʶʕiʶjnaʶ ʔilajhi walaaː sˤaʶbruʶ aːlmunfaridijna bihi kaːnt trtdj fstaːnaːan ʔaħmraːan tʕrrf saːmj ʕlaː mslmjn mn mχtlf aːlddwl aːlʔislaːmjja mn baːlbaːb aːʃkr mn ʔaanʕama ʕljk wʔaanʕim ʕlaː mn ʃkrk ʔarnj maː ldjk aːlllahi taʕaaːlaaː maʶqsˤuʶwdaʶnaʶː bihi ʁajra aːlllahi taʕaaːlaaː aːχrd͡ʒ mn ħjaːtj laː tubqj walaː taðaru wabiaːlħaaːʔi ʔiðaaː manaʕa aːlrrizqa wamad͡ʒdun mad͡ʒduwdin laaː juqaaːlu fijhimaaː faqaaːla aːlʔaaħmaqu kaaːlfaχχaaːri laaː juraqqaʕu walaaː juʃaʕʕabu ʕljnaː aːltswq ʔaʶðˤlm mn ʔafʕaː laː tʔakl χbzk ʕlaː maːʔida ʁjrk mqaːrba ljlaː aːld͡ʒdjda χtˤjraʶ bʃkl laː juʶsˤddq aːnti ftaːtj aːlʔaːn kaːnt ʕnd saːmj ħsˤsˤaʶ rjaʶːdˤaʶ waʔiiðaaː taʶtˤaʶjjaʶrtuʶm faʶaʶːmdˤuʶwaʶː waʕalaaː aːlllahi fatawakkaluwaː ðlika biʔaannahum ʃaːqquwaː aːlllaha waraswlahu waman juʃaːqqi aːlllaha faʔiinna aʶːlnnðˤr ʕbr aːlnnwaːfð maːðaː fʕlt hðaː aʶːlsˤbaʶːħ waʶaʶːlsˤsˤuʶbħiʶ ʔiiðaː tanaffasa waʶtuʶʕtˤiʶjaʶ man ħaramaka ʔaraːd saːmj ʔan jʔaχð tlk aːlddrws kaːn mdrrs aːlfnwn sˤaʶːrmaʶː waaːllaðjna fabalaʁa ðalika sulajmaaːna raʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːlllahu ʕanhu faʃaʁlahum biaːlllajli waaːlnnahaaːri hl stðhb mʕ twm lm aːlħjaːa fðˤjʕaʶ lhðh aːlddrd͡ʒa laaː taʃrab baʕda aːld͡ʒarj ʔinh jtħssn kl jwm kaːn jaʃaːʔu wajaqdiru walkinna ʔaakθara aːlnnaːsi laː jaʕlamwna waaːtlu ʕalajhim nabaʔaa ʔiibraːhjma waaːlθθaaːnij satru aːlʕawraai mn ʔant jaː ftaː ʔanaː sʕjd lrʔujtki sʔastʁll aːlwqt w ʔaʶuʶħdˤdˤr ʔaʶtˤfaʶːlj waaːlttamaluqa χadijʕaaan wamalʕabanaː waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlbulaʁaaːʔu man radda ʁaʶdˤaʶbaʶhuʶ hadda man ʔaʶaʶʁdˤaʶbaʶhuʶ kaːn mfʕmaː baːlħjaːa ʔiðaː tklmt baːlklma mlktk wʔiðaː lm ttklm bhaː mlkthaː likulli aːmriʔiin minhum jawmaʔiiðin ʃaʔanun juʁnjhi waaːlθθaaːnij ʔaannahu aːlʕamalu aʶːlsˤsˤaʶaʶːliʶħuʶ wahuwa qawlu aːbni ʕabbaaːsin raʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːlllahu ʕanhumaaː ʔawd͡ʒdt d͡ʒwaːzk wahammun laaːzimun kaːn saːmj fj ħsˤsˤaʶ draːsjja faaːʕlam ʔaanna aːlmutaʕallimijna dˤaʶrbaʶaʶːniʶ walaaː ʕan aːlmuraaːʕaaːai mustaʁnijaaan saːmj jʕjʃ ħjaːa raːʔiʕa ʔaraːdaː ljlaː w saːmj ʔan jqjmaː mwʕdaː ʁraːmjjaː raːʔiʕaː ðlk mstħjl aʶːltˤbʕ ʁlb aʶːlttˤbʕ ʕalajk biaːljaʔasi mimmaaː fij ʔaajdij aːlnnaaːsi hðh ʔawl mra ʔasmʕ hðh aʶːlqsˤaʶ wasimaau aːlʃʃari aːlqiħaau waaːlbaðaaːʔu sjkwn mn aʶːlsˤʕb lnaː fʕl ðlk ʔaalam jaʕlam biʔaanna aːlllaha jaraaː laaː jaðuwquwna fijhaaː bardanaː walaaː ʃaraaːbanaː ʔabj jtklm daːʔimaː bsˤwt mrtfʕ d͡ʒdaː fakku raqabaain famaaː qaaːla lak qaaːla hj fχwra d͡ʒdaː bmðˤhrhaʶː hðaː aːlqaːrb lm jʕd sˤaʶːlħaʶːaʶn llʔibħaːr aːlaːmtħaːn kaːn d͡ʒd sˤʕb bnsbtj lj wʔan aːlmsaːd͡ʒd llh flaː tdʕwaː mʕ aːllh ʔaħdaː ʔaχbrnj rwb baːlχbr aːlsʕjd n waaːlqalami wamaaː jaʶstˤuʶruʶwnaʶ walaqad χalaqnaaː aːlssamaaːwaaːti waʶaʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤaʶ wamaaː bajnahumaaː fij sittaai ʔaajjaaːmin wamaaː massanaaː min luʁuwbin laː ʔarjd ʔan ʔaʶdˤjʕ aːlwqt baːlħdjθ mʕ twm aːlqaaːriʕaau fʔaχðthm aʶːlsˤjħaʶ baːlħq fd͡ʒʕlnaːhm ʁθaːʔ fbʕdaː llqwm aʶːlðˤaʶːlmjn laː tns ʔiʶdˤaʶːftj laː jʔumnwn bh ħtaː jrwaː aːlʕðaːb aːlʔaljm hdaː wrħma llmħsnjn maː kaːn ʔibraːhjm jhwdjaː wlaː nsˤraʶːnjaʶː wlkn kaːn ħnjfaː mslmaː wmaː kaːn mn aːlmʃrkjn wmaː nrjd ʔan nħðˤaʶː bh ħqqanaː hw aːlkθjr mn aːld͡ʒml baːlkθjr mn aːllʁaːt ʕjwnhaː χdˤraʶːʔ hl trjd hðhi aːlbrtqaːla laː ʔanaː laː ʔarjd ʔaj brtqaːl ʕlaː aʶːlʔiʶtˤlaʶːq hðh ʁltˤtj watukθiru aːlmuwaaːsaaːaa waʶaʶːlttaʶwaʶaʶːsˤuʶlaʶ ʔink laː thdj mn ʔaħbbt wlkn aːllh jhdj mn jʃaːʔ whw ʔaʕlm baːlmhtdjn klaː ʔinh kaːn lʔaːjaːtnaː ʕnjdaː wnrjd ʔan nmn ʕlaː aːlðjn aʶːstdˤʕfwaʶː fj aʶːlʔaʶrdˤ wnd͡ʒʕlhm ʔaʔima wnd͡ʒʕlhm aːlwaːrθjn waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aʶːlfuʶsˤaʶħaʶaʶːʔiʶ hl jmknk ʔan tʕtˤj tqrjraːan kaːmlaːan ħwl maː ħdθ waχalaqa aːld͡ʒaaːnna min maaːrid͡ʒin min naaːrin kaːn mnnaːd jbjʕ aːlddraːd͡ʒaːt aːlhwaːʔijja aːʕlamuwaː ʔaanna aːlllaha ʃadijdu aːlʕiqaaːbi waʔaanna aːlllaha ʁafuwrun raħijmun ldjnaː wrqa tθbt ʔan hðaː aːlχaːtm ʔaʶsˤlj bismi aːlllahi aːlrraħmani aːlrraħijmi aʶːlmsˤ ʔiinna aːllaðijna jaχʃawna rabbahum biaːlʁajbi lahum maʁfiraaun waʔaad͡ʒrun kabijrun jwm jʁʃaːhm aːlʕðaːb mn fwqhm wmn tħt ʔard͡ʒlhm wjqwl ðwqwaː maː kntm tʕmlwn bismi aːlllahi aːlrraħmani aːlrraħijmi ʔaalam tara kajfa faʕala rabbuka biʶʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶaʶːbiʶ aːlfijli kaːn ʕljhm twqʕ ðlk falaaː jad͡ʒidu ʔilaaː aːlmuχaaːlafaai sabijlanaː ʔaaʔiiðaaː kunnaaː turaaːbanaː waʔaːbaaːʔuunaaː ʔaaʔiinnaaː lamuχrad͡ʒuwna kaːn saːmj jd͡ʒtnb aːlmd͡ʒjʔ ʔilaː aːlmdjna maːrj kaːθwljkja lkn sˤdjqhaʶː mlħd fqtˤ ʔanaːs qljlwn hnaː jʕrfwn ʔan twm wmaːrj aːlwaːd͡ʒbaːt nħnu lsnaː aːlwħjdjn aːlðjn jʕtqdwn ʔanhu brʔi jwd͡ʒd χdʃa hnaː fhl tsttˤjʕ aʶːʕtˤaʶːʔiʶj ħsm aːðhb mstqjm aːrtdt mlaːbshaː bsrʕa wmn jksb χtˤjʔiʶaʶ ʔaw ʔiθmaː θm jrm bh brjʔiaː fqd aːħtml bhtaːnaː wʔiθmaː mbjnaː aːlnnad͡ʒmu aːlθθaaːqibu fj ʔaj sn bdʔat ʕndk aːldwra aːlʃhrja ʔaʔiðaː knaː ʕðˤaʶːmaʶː nχra waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlbulaʁaaːʔi ʔaaqrabu aːlʔaaʃjaaːʔi sˤaʶrʕaʶaʶuʶ aʶːlðˤðˤaʶluʶwmiʶ waʔaanfaðu aːlssihaaːmi daʕwaau aʶːlmaʶðˤluʶwmiʶ qaːl fjhaː tħjwn wfjhaː tmwtwn wmnhaː tχrd͡ʒwn walaaː jaʶtˤluʶbuʶ litarkihi aːħtid͡ʒaaːd͡ʒanaː walaaː liʶlttaʶqsˤiʶjriʶ fijhi ʔaaʕjunin d͡ʒazaaːʔan bimaaː kaaːnuwaː jaʕmaluwna farrat min qaswaraain ʕn maːðaː jtħdθ aːlktaːb ʁulibati aːlrruwmu wazajtuwnanaː wanaχlaː hnaːk fj wstˤ ʕjnjk aːd͡ʒd aʶːltˤrjq ʕtl bʕd ðlk znjm ʔaawalam jara aːlʔiinsaaːnu ʔaannaaː χalaqnaaːhu min nuʶtˤfaʶaʶiʶn faʔiiðaaː huwa χaʶsˤiʶjmuʶn mubijnun wahija aːlmartabaau aːlθθaaːnijaau min maraaːtibi aːlʔiiχaaːʔi lan tanfaʕakum ʔaarħaaːmukum ʔiljk ʔanzlh bʕlmh waːlmlaːʔika jʃhdwn wkfaː baːllh ʃhjdaː tabaaːraka aːsmu rabbika ðij aːld͡ʒalaːli waaːlʔiikraaːmi liʔaannahu ʔin ʔaankara kaaːbara aːlmaʕquwla rabbu aːlmaʃriqi waaːlmaʁribi laaː ʔan ʔazjd ʔaχbr mnnaːd ljlaː ʔannh kaːn jqtˤn fj mnzl klwaː waːrʕwaː ʔanʕaːmkm ʔin fj ðlk lʔaːjaːt lʔawlj aːlnhaː waaːlqurʔaːni aːlħakijmi tbdw hðh aːlʁrfa kħðˤjraʶ aːlχnaːzjr tħtˤmt aʶːltˤaʶːʔiʶraʶ qwlnaː lʃjʔ ʔiðaː ʔardnaːh ʔan nqwl lh kn fjkwn taħijjatuhum jawma jalqawnahu salaaːmun waʔaaʕadda lahum ʔaad͡ʒranaː karijmanaː wahija nawʕaaːni ʔanaː maː zlt hnaː maː ʕnwaːn bjtk jsˤlħ lkm ʔaʕmaːlkm wjʁfr lkm ðnwbkm wmn jtˤʕ aːllh wrswlh fqd faːz fwzaː ʕðˤjmaʶː ʔin llmtqjn mfaːzaː hl jwd͡ʒd ʔaj ʃjʔ ʔaχr trjd ʔan tuχbrnj bh fj aːlʔaʕaːlj jsˤʕb ʕlaː aːlnaːs aːltnfs firʕawna waθamuwda ʔið tbrʔa aːlðjn aːtbʕwaː mn aːlðjn aːtbʕwaː wrʔawaː aːlʕðaːb wtqtˤʕt bhm aːlʔasbaːb waʔaammaaː aːlmuhlikaaːtu faʃuħħun muʶtˤaʶaʶːʕuʶn wahawanaː muttabaʕun waʔiiʕd͡ʒaaːbu aːlmarʔi binafsihi qaaːluwaː tilka ʔiiðanaː karraaun χaaːsiraaun aːlbirru faʶsˤluʶn waman nuʕammirhu nunakkishu fij aːlχalqi ʔaafalaaː jaʕqiluwna qaaːla kaðalika qaaːla rabbuka huwa ʕalajja hajjinun waqad χalaqtuka min qablu walam taku ʃajʔianaː ðlk bʔanhm aːtbʕwaː maː ʔaʶsχtˤ aːllh wkrhwaː rdˤwaʶːnh fʔaʶħbtˤ ʔaʕmaːlhm ʕmwmaː aːlrd͡ʒaːl ʔaʶtˤwl mn aːlnsaːʔ ʔin aːlmtqjn fj d͡ʒnaːt wnʕjm bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm n waːlqlm wmaː td͡ʒaːrbk fj bdaːja qraːʔaːtk wlhm fjhaː mnaːfʕ wmʃaːrb ʔaflaː jʃkrwn walaaː tahinuwaː walaaː taħzanuwaː waʔaantumu aːlʔaaʕlawna ʔiin kuntum muʔuminijna waːlwzn jwmʔið aːlħq fmn θqlt mwaːzjnh fʔawlʔik jrzqkm ʔin ʔamsk rzqh bl ld͡ʒwaː fj ʕtw wnfwr tnhd djmaː wqaːl fhmt ʔaːsf ʕlaː aʶːllχbtˤaʶ ʔiðn aːstmtʕ baːlfaːntaː wjwmanaː sʕjdanaː kaːn hðaː aːlktaːb kθjraː mn aʶːlsˤfħaʶːt laː jsbqwnh baːlqwl whm bʔamrh jʕmlwn qaːlwaː ʔanhm lm jblʁwaː aːlθlaːθjn bʕd ʔawlʔik aːlðjn lʕnhm aːllh wmn jlʕn aːllh fln td͡ʒd lh nsˤjraʶː ʔaafaraʔaajtum maaː taħruθuwna aːljwm nχtm ʕlaː ʔafwaːhhm wtklmnaː ʔajdjhm wtʃhd ʔard͡ʒlhm bmaː kaːnwaː jksbwn walaaː mud͡ʒaaːwazaau ħaddin waʔiin kaθura waʔaawfaaː mtkʔijn fjhaː ʕlaː aːlʔaraːʔik laː jrwn fjhaː ʃmsaː wlaː zmhrjraː waaːdiʕanaː ʁajra munkirin walaaː mustafazzin waaːllaðijna aːd͡ʒtanabuwaː aʶːltˤtˤaʶaʶːʁuʶwtaʶ ʔaan jaʕbuduwhaaː waʔaanaaːbuwaː ʔiilaaː aːlllahi lahumu aːlbuʃraaː fabaʃʃir ʕibaaːdi ʔaaw jaʔaχuðahum fij taqallubihim famaaː hum bimuʕd͡ʒizijna bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm aːlr ktaːb ʔaħkmt ʔaːjaːth θm fsˤlt mn ldn ħkjm χbjr jaː ʔajhaː aːlnbj ħsbk aːllh wmn aːtbʕk mn aːlmʔumnjn ʔaam lam junabbaʔa bimaaː fij sˤuʶħuʶfiʶ muwsaaː ʔin ʔiljnaː ʔijaːbhm fmaː kaːn dʕwaːhm ʔið d͡ʒaːʔhm bʔasnaː ʔilaː ʔan qaːlwaː ʔinaː knaː ðˤaʶːlmjn tʕlmt aːlʕzf ʕlaː aːlʁjtaːr ʕndmaː kaːn ʕmrj ʕʃr snwaːt ql sjrwaː fj aʶːlʔaʶrdˤ faʶːnðˤrwaʶː kjf kaːn ʕaːqba aːlmd͡ʒrmjn ʕaːhlaː mmd͡ʒdaː jaː taːrw rwħ wfrʃ ʔasnaːnk faʶʔaʶaʶsˤbaʶħt jalqaaːnij aːlzzamaaːnu liʔaad͡ʒlihi biʶʔiʶiʶʕðˤaʶaʶːmiʶ mawluwdin waʔiiʃfaaːqi waaːlidi faʔaammaaː aːlmuntaqilu fahuwa aːlʔiidlaaːlu ʔaalaaː ʔiinnahum humu aːlmufsiduwna walakin laaː jaʃʕuruwna ħbjbj ʔaqddm ʕmrj lka hdjja hðh aʶːlqdˤjaʶ mʕrwfa mnð wqt tˤwjl hl twd͡ʒd klma ʔaχraː jmkn aːstʕmaːlhaː bdlaː mn mraːdf waʕiʃnaaː fijhaaː ʁaaːfilijna ʕaːml aːlnaːs brʔaj rfjq waːlq mn tlqaː bwd͡ʒhin tˤljq jawmaʔiiðin laaː tanfaʕu aːlʃʃafaaːʕaau ʔiillaaː man ʔaaðina lahu aːlrraħmanu waʶraʶdˤiʶjaʶ lahu qawlanaː waqad qijla man wadakka tˤaʶmaʶʕaʶnaʶː fijk ʔaʶaʶbʁaʶdˤaʶk ʔiðaaː ʔaajisa mink ʕjnaː jʃrb bhaː aːlmqrbwn waθulmaaun jasudduhaaː fij aːlmuʔuaaːzaraai waʶaʶːlmuʶðˤaʶaʶːfaʶraʶaʶiʶ lam jaʶtˤmiʶθhuʶnnaʶ ʔiinsun qablahum walaaː d͡ʒaaːnnun wbraː bwaːldtj wlm jd͡ʒʕlnj d͡ʒbaːraː ʃqjaː wqaːl aːrkbwaː fjhaː bsm aːllh md͡ʒraːhaː wmrsaːhaː ʔin rbj lʁfwr rħjm faʔiin lam taʶstaʶtˤiʶʕ fabiqalbik kamaaː juqaaːlu fij ʔiθbaaːti aːlʃʃajʔi huwa huwa aːlʕzr lwdfjk zaːmnhwf aːlðj kaːn jʔaml fj twħjd kl aːlbʃrja smaː aːbnh ʔaːdm fj aʶːlʕsˤwr aːlqdjma aːʕtqd ʔaʁlb raʶːsˤdj aːlsmaːʔ walajsa jaʕlamu ʔaanna aʶːldˤdˤaʶd͡ʒuʶwraʶ χaaːʔiibun quli aʶːnðˤuʶruʶwaʶː maaːðaaː fij aːlssamaaːwaaːti waʶaʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤiʶ wamaaː tuʁnij aːlʔaːjaaːtu waaːlnnuðuru ʕan qawmin laaː juʔuminuwna mθl aːlfrjqjn kaːlʔaʕmaː waʶːlʔaʶsˤm waʶːlbsˤjr waːlsmjʕ hl jstwjaːn mθlaː ʔaflaː tðkrwn ʕaːd saːmj mn aːlqaːhra mawkuwlaaun ʔilaaː munaaːfasaai aʶːlsˤsˤaʶaʶːħiʶbiʶ biʶaʶːlsˤsˤaʶaʶːħiʶbiʶ waːlmʔutfka ʔahwaː laː daːʕj llqlq waaːlssakijnaau waʶaʶːsiʶtˤaʶaʶuʶn bajna aʶːlssaʶχaʶtˤiʶ waʶdˤaʶʕfiʶ aʶːlʁaʶdˤaʶbiʶ qaːlwaː taːllh tftʔa tðkr jwsf ħtaː tkwn ħrdˤaʶː ʔaw tkwn mn aːlhaːlkjn laaː tad͡ʒʕal maʕa aːlllahi ʔiilahanaː ʔaːχara fataqʕuda maðmuwmanaː maχðuwlanaː waʔaammaaː man ʔauwtija kitaaːbahu waraaːʔa ðˤaʶhriʶhiʶ qaːl km lbθtm fj aʶːlʔaʶrdˤ ʕdd snjn waʶbaʶtˤaʶntaʶ ʕaqlahu ʕajbun tuʶħiʶjtˤuʶ bihi kaθraau faʶdˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶliʶhiʶ sjstkʃf tlskwb d͡ʒjms waːb faʶjaʶqsˤiʶduʶwaʶː aːlʔaumuwra min ʔaabwaaːbihaaː nħn nbħθ ʕn bʕdˤ aːlnaːs aːlbaːrʕjn fj aːlkmbjwtr llʕml mʕnaː ðhb saːfr bħθaːan ʕn aːlmʁaːmra kjn w d͡ʒw ðhbaː ʔilaː aːlmntzh ljlʕbaː aːltns aːd͡ʒlb biaːlllaʁwi marruwaː kiraaːmanaː kjfmaː saːʔt ħaːlthaː fhj tʕml daːʔimaːan ʔanaː ʔaʶsˤdq ʔank trjd ʔan tsaːʕd juʶfdˤdˤl ʔalaː tðhb tˤlb twm mnj aːlmsaːʕda ʔaħs bʔalm fj rʔasj faman kaaːnat fatratuhu
