taaːraaan wajaʕummu hw aːlðj d͡ʒʕl lkm aʶːlʔaʶrdˤ ðlwlaː faːmʃwaː fj mnaːkbhaː wklwaː mn rzqh wʔiljh aːlnʃwr sanafruʁu lakum ʔaajjuha aːlθθaqalaaːni bl aːllh mwlaːkm whw χjr aʶːlnaʶːsˤrjn waʶjuʶtˤʕiʶmuʶwnaʶ aʶːltˤtˤaʶʕaʶaʶːmaʶ ʕalaaː ħubbihi miskijnanaː wajatijmanaː waʔaasijranaː lqd bqjt fj ʔastraːljaː θlaːθ ʃhwr kjf ʔabdw waʶsˤluʶ aːlħuruwfi aʶːlmaʶfsˤuʶwlaʶaʶiʶ waʶfaʶsˤluʶ frjqaː mn aːlmʔumnjn lkaːrhwn waaːʕlam ʔaanna aːlddunjaaː lam takun qaʶtˤtˤuʶ lid͡ʒamijʕi ʔaahlihaaː musʕidaaan waʶʔaʶaʶtˤiʶjʕuʶwaʶː aːlllaha warasuwlahu walaaː tanaaːzaʕuwaː fatafʃaluwaː wataðhaba ʔiinna haʔuulaaːʔi juħibbuwna aːlʕaaːd͡ʒilaaa wajaðaruwna waraaːʔahum jawmanaː θaqijlanaː aʶːħaʶːtˤ mħtwaː aʶːlmħaʶːdˤraʶ tˤjfaʶːaʶn waːsʕaːan mn aːlaːfkaːr lst mn aːlhnd waaːlllahu d͡ʒaʕala lakumu fasijħun lstmaː aːlwħjdtaːn aːlltaːn waːd͡ʒhtaː hðaː aːlmʃkl ʕljkmaː ʔan tqblaːnh w ʔan ttχtˤjaʶːnh qad kaaːnat ʔaːjaaːtij tutlaaː ʕalajkum fakuntum ʕalaaː ʔaaʕqaaːbikum taʶnkiʶsˤuʶwnaʶ wʔanaː ðˤnnaʶː wħznj ʔilaː aːllh wʔaʕlm mn aːllh maː laː tʕlmwn qaaːla aʶːhbiʶtˤuʶwaʶː baʶʕdˤuʶkuʶm liʶbaʶʕdˤiʶn ʕaduwwun walakum fij aʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤiʶ mustaqarrun wamataaːʕun ʔiilaaː ħijnin jwd͡ʒd wħʃ tħt srjrj faʔiin ħurisat biʶaʶːlttaʶwaʶaʶːsˤuʶliʶ waʶaʶːlttaʶlaʶaʶːtˤuʶfiʶ taʔaakkadat ʔaasbaaːbuhaaː waaːqtarana biħamijjaai aːlnnasabi muʶsˤaʶaʶːfaʶaʶːaʶuʶ aːlmawaddaai hðaː mn aːlʔaʃjaːʔ aːltj ʔaħbbhaː fj aːlʔislaːm waaːlχaaːmisaaa ʔaanna ʁaʶdˤaʶbaʶ aːlllahi ʕalajhaaː ʔiin kaaːna mina aʶːlsˤsˤaʶaʶːdiʶqiʶjnaʶ ðalikum bimaaː kuntum tafraħuwna fij aʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤiʶ biʁajri aːlħaqqi wabimaaː kuntum tamraħuwna wkaːn aːllh waːsʕaː ħkjmaː ʔiið qaaːla lahum ʔaaχuwhum huwdun ʔaalaaː tattaquwna wmn jhd aːllh fmaː lh mn mdˤl ʔaljs aːllh bʕzjz ðj aːntqaːm ʔanaː mn tˤwkjw ʔaʶsˤbħ ʔaχj qsaː walahu maaː fij aːlssamaaːwaaːti waʶaʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤiʶ walahu aːlddijnu waʶaʶːsˤiʶbaʶnaʶː ʔaafaʁajra aːlllahi tattaquwna walaððaaːtuhaaː faaːnijaaun lst ʔanaː mn ʕljh aːlʔid͡ʒaːba hðaː ħzaːm mn aːld͡ʒld hl mn ʔaħd ljsaːʕdnj ʔanaː ʔaʶtttˤlʕ lħfla aːlhaːlwwjn χaʶːsˤtk daːʔimaːan maː jrtdj nðˤaʶːraʶ swdaːʔ hðh aːlmsʔala shla ldrd͡ʒa ʔan ʔajj tˤaʶːlb jmknh ħllhaː ʔakrh aːlnsaːʔ aːlʁjwraːt ʔaaw maʶraʶdˤiʶn ʔaʶaʶdˤʕaʶfaʶhuʶ ʕan ʔaadaaːʔi maaː kullifa bihi d͡ʒannaaːti ʕadnin aːllatij waʕada aːlrraħmanu ʕibaaːdahu biaːlʁajbi ʔiinnahu kaaːna waʕduhu maʔatijjanaː ql ʔarʔajtm ʔin ʔataːkm ʕðaːbh bjaːtaː ʔaw nhaːraː maːðaː jstʕd͡ʒl mnh aːlmd͡ʒrmwn hl hj sdjqtj walaqad jassarnaaː aːlqurʔaːna lilððikri fahal min mmudakirin mn ʔanti aʶːlbtˤaʶːtˤaʶː aːlmslwqa ʔashl hdˤmaʶː bkθjr mn btˤaʶːtˤaʶː aːltraːkwtaː smʕth jnzl aːlmdrd͡ʒ waaːlmajla aːlmadχuwla laaː jaduwmu ʕalaaː daχalihi fahuwa laaː jaʕrifu qadra aːlnniʕmaai biʔaamnihi ħattaaː jaχaaːfa hðaː aːlkrsj mkswr walaaː ʔauqsimu biaːlnnafsi aːlllawaaːmaai ʔantm mħðˤwðˤwn faʶʕaʶsˤaʶwaʶː rasuwla rabbihim faʔaaχaðahum ʔaaχðaaan rraaːbijaaan bdʔ twm tʕlm aːlfrnsja aːlʕaːm aʶːlmaʶːdˤj walahu maaː sakana fij aːlllajli waaːlnnahaaːri wahuwa aːlssamijʕu aːlʕalijmu laː ʔaħd tˤlb bjtzaː hnaː laaːbiθijna fijhaaː ʔaaħqaaːbanaː baːbl fjnaː wʔaːʃwr lnaː waʔiiðaaː aːlnnufuwsu zuwwid͡ʒat qaaːla bal faʕalahu kabijruhum haðaaː faaːsʔaaluwhum ʔiin kaaːnuwaː jaʶntˤiʶquʶwnaʶ waːldj fj ʁrfth ʔanaː mʃʁwla aːlʔan aːtrknj w ʃʔanj dʕjnaː fqtˤ ntðˤaʶːhr wkʔannaː laː nʕrf bʕdˤnaʶː aʶːlbʕdˤ bismi aːlllahi aːlrraħmani aːlrraħijmi waaːlʃʃamsi waʶdˤuʶħaʶaʶːhaʶaʶː maːðaː jtʕllmn wmaː ʔanzlnaː ʕlaː qwmh mn bʕdh mn d͡ʒnd mn aːlsmaːʔ wmaː knaː mnzljn wad͡ʒaaːʔa min ʔaʶaʶqsˤaʶaʶː aːlmadijnaai rad͡ʒulun jasʕaaː qaaːla jaaː qawmi aːttabiʕuwaː aːlmursalijna waːfq mnnaːd faaːntaqamnaaː minhum waʔiinnahumaaː labiʔiimaaːmin mubijnin fʔamaː aːlðjn ʔaːmnwaː wʕmlwaː aʶːlsˤaʶːlħaʶːt fjdχlhm rbhm fj rħmth ðlk hw aːlfwz aːlmbjn laː jʕrf twm aːnnj fj hnaː klb kjn ʔaʶbjdˤ ldj bʕdˤ aʶːlsˤwr lʔarjk wlʔin ʔaðqnaː aːlʔinsaːn mnaː rħma θm nzʕnaːhaː mnh ʔinh ljʔiws kfwr wakaðalika ʔaanzalnaaːhu qurʔaːnanaː ʕarabijjanaː waʶsˤaʶrraʶfnaʶaʶː fijhi mina aːlwaʕijdi laʕallahum jattaquwna ʔaaw juħdiθu lahum ðikranaː ljs sˤħjħaʶnaʶː baʶːldˤrwraʶ ʔan kl maː jqwlh aːlmʕlm sˤħjħ daːʔimanaː maː hj sˤfaʶːth waʔiinnamaaː ðakarahu taʶʕðˤiʶjmaʶnaʶː lilʕilmi ʕan ʔaan juʶħaʶaʶːtˤaʶ bihi jd͡ʒb ʕlaː aːlmstʔad͡ʒr dfʕ aːlaːjd͡ʒaːr llmʔud͡ʒr fj nhaːja kl ʃhr ʔaħb mmaːrsa aːlʔalʕaːb aʶːlrjaʶːdˤjaʶ ʔajn tskn kaaːlnnaaːri justadfaʕu biaːlmaaːʔi ʔiħraaːquhaaː waminhum ʔaummijuwna laaː jaʕlamuwna aːlkitaaːba ʔiillaaː ʔaamaaːnijja waʔiin hum ʔiillaaː jaʶðˤuʶnnuʶwnaʶ aʶːuʶnðˤuʶr ʔilaaː haðihi aːlrraaːħaai kajfa taʕad͡ʒd͡ʒalahaaː waʔiilaaː aːlssalaaːmaai kajfa ʔakθr mn θlaːθa ʔaʃhr wariθnaaː aːlsaawaaːʕida bajna aːlʔaumam sˤuʶχuʶwraʶnaʶː sˤuʶχuʶwraʶnaʶː kahaðaaː aːlbinaaː wmnð ðlk aːlwqt ʔinh ʁjr mtfq mʕnaː bχsˤwsˤ hðaː aʶːlmwdˤwʕ hl hðaː jʔulm waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aʶːlsˤsˤuʶlaʶħaʶaʶːʔiʶ aːlʕilmu jahtifu biaːlʕamali faʔiin ʔaad͡ʒaaːbahu ʔaaqaaːma waʔiillaaː aːrtaħala aːlaːnwaːʔ aːld͡ʒwja tqwl baːnhaː stmtˤr ʁdaː bʕd aʶːlðˤhr waʔaanijbuwaː ʔiilaaː rabbikum waʔaaslimuwaː lahu min qabli ʔaan jaʔatijakumu aːlʕaðaaːbu θumma laaː tuʶnsˤaʶruʶwnaʶ wql d͡ʒaːʔ aːlħq wzhq aʶːlbaʶːtˤl ʔin aʶːlbaʶːtˤl kaːn zhwqaː wtnħtwn mn aːld͡ʒbaːl bjwtaː faːrhjn ʔajn ʔaajjuhaaː aːllaðijna ʔaːmanuwaː aːstaʕijnuwaː biʶaʶːlsˤsˤaʶbriʶ waʶaʶːlsˤsˤaʶlaʶaʶːaʶiʶ ʔiinna aːlllaha maʕa aʶːlsˤsˤaʶaʶːbiʶriʶjnaʶ aːlmnzl aːlwaːqf ʕlaː aːltla qdjm d͡ʒdaːan saːfr saːmj ʔilaː ʔaːχara ʔiinnij lakum minhu naðijrun mubijnun faaːd͡ʒʕalhaaː tˤaʶaʶːʕaʶaʶaʶn waʔaawlaaː aːlħasanaaːti biaːlʔaad͡ʒri waaːlθθawaaːbi ʔaamruhu wanahjuhu fij wud͡ʒuwhi aʶːlmaʶsˤaʶaʶːliʶħiʶ aːlʕaːʃra laː jwd͡ʒd aːstθnaːʔaːt lhðh aːlqaːʕda ʕadlu aːlʔiinsaaːni maʕa man fawqahu d͡ʒrb ħðˤk dʕwnaː nʕks aːlʕmla ʔiʶtaʶsˤaʶltuʶ ʕljhaː msaːʔ aːlʔams wlknhaː lm tud͡ʒib lj d͡ʒaːr jhwdj ʔanaː ʃχsˤ waːlnnasaːʔiiju wqaːla aːlttirmðju ħdjθun ħsanun sˤħjħuʶn muttakiʔiijna ʕalaaː sururin maʶsˤfuʶwfaʶaʶiʶn wazawwad͡ʒnaaːhum biħuwrin ʕijnin faʔaanbatnaaː fijhaaː ħabbanaː kaːn mnnaːd jswq aːlddraːd͡ʒa ʔilaː aːlqaːhra mtwd͡ʒd͡ʒhaː ʔilaː mnzlh waaːd͡ʒʕal ʔaabʕada ʔaamlika baqijjaaa jawmik lm jqsˤd twm aːldws ʕlaː qdm maːrj waqismun munaaːsibuwna mn fdˤlk tħdθ bbtˤʔ kj ʔafhmk dʕaːma llnhwdˤ baːlʔamaːzjʁja ln ʔaʶqdˤj ħjaːtj mtswlaː ʕn lʁtj fj d͡ʒmhwrja tsˤf nfshaː baːlʕrbja juqallibu aːlllahu aːlllajla waaːlnnahaaːra ʔiinna fij ðalika laʕibraaan liʔauwlij aʶːlʔaʶaʶbsˤaʶaʶːriʶ mn fdˤlk ʔaʶʕtˤnj qlmaːan w bdˤʕaʶ ʔawraːq jnbʁj ʔan trd aːldjwn aːltj ʕljk bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm khjʕsˤ ʔaaw mutadajjananaː bihi fij aːlʃʃarʕi wad͡ʒaaːʔa firʕawnu waman qablahu waaːlmuʔutafikaaːtu biʶaʶːlχaʶaʶːtˤiʶʔiʶaʶaʶiʶ waaːliaːχtilaaːfu bitadbijrihi ʔaʶaʶðˤhaʶraʶ wtlk ħd͡ʒtnaː ʔaːtjnaːhaː ʔibraːhjm ʕlaː qwmh nrfʕ drd͡ʒaːt mn nʃaːʔ ʔin rbk ħkjm ʕljm ʔaafamani aːttabaʕa riʶdˤwaʶaʶːnaʶ aːlllahi kaman baaːʔa biʶsaʶχaʶtˤiʶn mina aːlllahi wamaʔawaaːhu d͡ʒahannamu wabiʔisa aʶːlmaʶsˤiʶjruʶ bjth ʔakbr mn bjtj bθlaːθ mraːt walaaː julhijhi ʕan tˤaʶlaʶbiʶhiʶ kaθraau maaːlin wad͡ʒadahu walaaː nufuwðu ʔaamrin waʕuluwwu manzilaain ʔajn mrjm waʔiinnamaaː justakfaaː biaːlttaʔaalufi ʔiʶðˤhaʶaʶːruʶhaʶaʶː wajastanbiʔiuwnaka ʔaaħaqqun huwa qul ʔiij warabbij ʔiinnahu laħaqqun wamaaː ʔaantum bimuʕd͡ʒizijna aːlʕadli aːlmuqtarini bihaaː walaaː sˤaʶlaʶaʶːħaʶ fijhaaː ʔillaaː maʕahu aːlħilmu sjd aːlʔaχlaːq lakinnaaː huwa aːlllahu rabbij walaaː ʔauʃriku birabbij ʔaaħadanaː lamad͡ʒmuwʕuwna ʔiilaaː mijqaaːti jawmin mmaʕluwmin nħn klaːnaː ʔaʶsˤdqaʶːʔ ʔasmʕt ʔanh qd ʕaːd ʔaχjraː ʔilaː bjth ʔin kaːn ðnbj ʔann ħbbk ʃaːʁlj ʕmmn swaːk aːlħdjθ aːlθaːmn ʕʃr aːlχlq aːlħsn mdfʔatnaː aːlkhrbaːʔija wstˤ aːlħʃd stbħr aːlsfjna ʁdaː ʔilaː hwnwlwlw aːllaðijna jattaχiðuwna aːlkaaːfirijna ʔaawlijaaːʔa min duwni aːlmuʔuminijna ʔaajabtaʁuwna ʕindahumu aːlʕizzaaa faʔiinna aːlʕizzaaa lillahi d͡ʒamijʕanaː aːlʁjra laː td͡ʒʕl ʔaħd mχlsˤ jħbhaː hj ltˤjfaʶ mʕ aːld͡ʒmjʕ fij sˤuʶħuʶfiʶn mmukaramaain hðh ljst d͡ʒmlaan lqd qmt brħla ʕbr kndaː fj aːbrjl mn aːlsna aʶːlmaʶːdˤjaʶ wkðlk ʔanzlnaːh qrʔaːnaː ʕrbjaː aːlkifaaːjaai fijhaaː aːʃʕr baːlðnb lawad͡ʒaba miθluhu ʕalaaː aːlllahi taʕaaːlaaː qlt lk ʔannj laː ʔaʕrf kjf ʔafʕl ðlk ʔaan jakuwna fiʕlu aːlmunkari min d͡ʒamaaːʕaain qad taʶdˤaʶaʶːfaʶruʶwaʶː ʕalajhi aːld͡ʒamaaːli hl tsmħ lj bklma mʕk ʔin aːlðjn ʕnd rbk laː jstkbrwn ʕn ʕbaːdth wjsbħwnh wlh jsd͡ʒdwn qaaːla bal ʔaalquwaː faʔiiðaaː ħibaaːluhum waʶʕiʶsˤiʶjjuʶhuʶm juχajjalu ʔiilajhi min siħrihim ʔaannahaaː tasʕaaː wknaː nkðb bjwm aːldjn hl nðˤaʶːraʶːtk tˤbjaʶ kaːn saːmj raːʁbaː fj ʔan td͡ʒjbh ljlaː ʕn bʕdˤ aːlʔasʔila aʶːlsˤsˤʕbaʶ ħwl maʶːdˤjhaʶː lajsa liwaqʕatihaaː kaaːðibaaun kl maː ʕljk fʕlh ʔan tntbh lnfsk waaːllaðijna saʕawaː fij ʔaːjaaːtinaaː muʕaaːd͡ʒizijna ʔauwlaʔiika ʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶaʶːbuʶ aːld͡ʒaħijmi laaː jamnaʕannaka ħaðaru aːlmiraaːʔi min ħusni aʶːlmuʶnaʶaʶːðˤaʶraʶaʶiʶ aːlrd͡ʒaːʔ msaːʕdtj fj mlʔ hðaː aːlnmwðd͡ʒ wlaː tħaʶːdˤwn ʕlaː tˤʕaʶːm aːlmskjn law ʔaarsalt ʔilaaː aʶːltˤtˤaʶbiʶjbiʶ faqaaːla faʔaaχaðahu aːlllahu nakaaːla aːlʔaːχiraai waaːlʔauwlaaː kaːn mnnaːd jbjʕ aːlddraːd͡ʒaːt knt fj aːlmnzl jrjd ʔan jχrd͡ʒkm mn ʔaʶrdˤkm bsħrh fmaːðaː tʔamrwn walaʕamrij ʔinna ʔiχwaaːna aʶːlsˤsˤiʶdqiʶ min ʔaanfasi aːlððaχaaːʔiiri waʶʔaʶaʶfdˤaʶliʶ aːlʕudadi ʔanaː ʔaħb aːllʁa ʔan tʕrf ðlk fj aːlħmjm θm fj aːlnaːr jsd͡ʒrwn wfaːth χsaːra kbjra lʃrktnaː wamaaː ʔaʶaʶðˤuʶnnuʶ aːlssaaːʕaaa qaaːʔiimaaan walaʔiin rudidtu ʔiilaaː rabbij laʔaad͡ʒidanna χajranaː minhaaː munqalabanaː raħijmun hlaːaː ʔarjtnj ʔajn hw aːlħmmaːm aːχtalafa aːlmufassiruwna fij aːlħafadaai wazakarijjaaː wajaħjaaː waʕijsaaː waʔiiljaaːsa kullun mina aʶːlsˤsˤaʶaʶːliʶħiʶjnaʶ knt ʔatsaːʔl mtaː stʕwd aːnfarid bisirrik walaaː tuwdiʕhu ħaaːzimanaː fajazilla χalaqa aːlʔiinsaːna saːmj msʔuwl ʕlaː aːlʕjaːda kllhaː kaːn saːmj jrjd ʔan jkwn sˤdjqaʶː lfrjd mamħuwqaau aʶːlmaʶħsˤuʶwliʶ kaːn saːmj jntðˤr χaːrd͡ʒ aːlmħkma laː ʔaʶsttˤjʕ rʔuja ʃjʔ aːlntjd͡ʒa waːħd aːlkll wakaaːna aːlħasanu aʶːlbaʶsˤriʶjjuʶ raħimahu aːlllahu taʕaaːlaaː jaquwlu aːlʁijbaau faaːkihaau aːlnnisaaːʔi laaː juʕd͡ʒibuk rad͡ʒulun kasaba kaːnt tħbbh hj ʔaʶjdˤaʶː kaːn saːmj fj mħtˤtˤaʶ aːlħaːflaːt waʃaːhidin wamaʃhwdin waqaaːla ʃuʕajbun aːlnnabiju ʕalajhi aːlssalaaːmu ʔinnij ʔaaraaːkum biχajrin jaʕnij aːlmaaːla maːðaː jwd͡ʒd hnaːk jaaː bunajja ʔiðaaː ʔaaqlalta min aːlkalaaːmi ʔaakθarta min aʶːlsˤsˤaʶwaʶaʶːbiʶ maː sbb td͡ʒaːhl ħqq aːlʕwda llaːd͡ʒʔijn aʶːlflstˤjnjjn waʔiiðaaː aːlmawʔwdaau suʔiilat wamaaː kaaːna qabijħanaː faaːlʕaqlu maaːniʕun minhu aːðhb w aːd͡ʒls fj aːlssjaːra wamakarwaː makranaː wamakarnaː makranaː wahum laː jaʃʕurwna kjf ħaːl aːld͡ʒmjʕ waqad tuħdiθu aːlmanaaːzilu waaːlwilaaːjaaːtu liqawmin ʔaaχlaaːqanaː maðmuwmaaan juʶðˤhiʶruʶhaʶaʶː suwʔu tˤiʶbaʶaʶːʕiʶhiʶm ʔaħtaːd͡ʒ ʔilaː msaːʕdth lmn hðjn aːlħðaːʔijn lm lm tdʕh jdχl km dˤħjaʶ kaːnt hnaːk aːlmaʃuwraau ħiʶsˤnuʶn min aːlnnadaaːmaai faʶaʶːnðˤuʶr ʔilaaː bʕdˤ aːlmʕlwmaːt ʕn mkaːn twaːd͡ʒd ljlaː lijawmi aʶːlfaʶsˤliʶ aːlmazzaaːħu muʶdˤiʶrruʶn hw jwaːd͡ʒh aːlʕdjd mn aːlʕwaːʔiq waqulnaaː aʶːhbiʶtˤuʶwaʶː baʶʕdˤuʶkuʶm liʶbaʶʕdˤiʶn ʕaduwwun walakum fij aʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤiʶ mustaqarrun wamataaːʕun ʔiilaaːaː ħijnin waqijla fij manθuwri aːlħikami wajlun liʶlðˤðˤaʶaʶːliʶmiʶ min jawmi aʶːlmaʶðˤaʶaʶːliʶmiʶ tisʕaau ʔaaʕʃaaːri aːlrrizqi fij aːlttid͡ʒaaːraai waaːlħarθi waaːlbaaːqij fij aːlssaaːʔiibaaːti faʔaanʃaʔaa aːbnu ʃihaaːbin jaquwlu waqad kafarwaː bihi min qablu wajaqðifwna biaːlʁajbi min makaːnin baʕjdin waqaaːlat aːlħukamaaːʔu tˤaʶlaʶbuʶ maaː laaː judraku ʕad͡ʒzun waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi jakfijk min aːlħaaːsidi ʔaannahu jaʁtammu fij waqti suruwrik ʔin aːlmsʔala aːlʔawlaː aːltj jd͡ʒb ʔan nd͡ʒaːbhhaː hj aʶːlttˤrf aːlʕnjf bkaːfa ʔaʃkaːlh law kunnaaː naʶtˤluʶbuʶ aːlʕilma linabluʁa ʁaaːjatahu kunnaaː qad badaʔanaaː aːlʕilma biʶaʶːlnnaʶqiʶjsˤaʶaʶiʶ hl ʔant tfkkr fj ʔiχbaːrh ʕn ðlk fajaqharu nafsahu ʕalaaː aʶːlʁaʶdˤaʶbiʶ raʁbaaan fij aːld͡ʒazaaːʔi waaːlθθawaaːbi qddm saːmj llʃʃrtˤaʶ wsˤfaʶː ʕn aːlmʃtbh bh lam juʁnihi minhaaː kaθraau maaː jad͡ʒmaʕu ʔiiði aːnbaʕaθa ʔaaʃqaːhaː wamaː huwa biaːlhazli ʔaj tˤfl jʕrf ðlk mħmd rswl aːllh ʔiðaː ðˤlmt mn dwnk flaː tʔamn ʕqaːb mn fwqk falillahi aːlʔaːχiraau waaːlʔawlaː kaːnt ljlaː trjd ʔan tsˤbħ mmrrdˤaʶ waqaaːla saaːbuwru bnu ʔaardaʃijra aːlʕaqlu nawʕaaːni ʔaaħaduhumaaː maʶtˤbuʶwʕuʶn waaːlʔaːχaru masmuwʕun waʔaammaaː aʶːlmuʶʕtˤiʶj faʔiinnahu wad͡ʒada ðalika aːttifaaːqanaː warubbamaaː ʔaamala biaːliaːttifaaːqi ʔaʶaʶdˤʕaʶaʶːfaʶnaʶː munjbjna ʔiilajhi waaːttaqwhu waʔaaqjmuwaː aʶːlsˤsˤaʶlaʶːaʶaʶ walaː takwnwaː mina aːlmuʃrikjna rakkaba aːlllahu aːlmalaaːʔiikaaa min ʕaqlin bilaaː ʃahwaain mn fdˤlk wzzʕ aːlwrq faqaːla ʔaanaː rabbukumu aːlʔaaʕlaː ljtnj knt qaːdraː ʕlaː nsjaːn tlk aːlħaːdθa waʔiiðaː qjla lahumu aːsd͡ʒudwaː lilrraħmni qaːlwaː wamaaː aːlrraħmnu ʔaanasd͡ʒudu limaː taʔamurunaː wazaːdahum nufwranaː hal ʔaataːka ħadjθu mwsaː wud͡ʒwhun jawmaʔiiðin naʶːdˤiʶraʶaʶuʶn waʔiiðaaː aʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤuʶ muddat kaːn ðlk aːlmdrrs mmlaːaː d͡ʒddaː waʶwaʶdˤaʶʕnaʶː ʕanka wizraka waʔiin ʔauwħiʃa takdara tfdˤdˤl jaː d͡ʒjm lm jzrh qtˤtˤ hðaː mdrrsnaː fj aːlfn mn aʶːlwaʶːdˤħ ʔannh mðnb jaʔakulu aːlʔiinsaːnu kaj janmuwa jtʁjjr aːld͡ʒww mn jwm ʔilaː ʔaːχr aːftħ aːlbaːb tmm tʕjjn ljlaː kmraːqba d͡ʒdjda llmmrrdˤaʶːt saːmj jħbb maːdda aʶːlttsˤwjr aːʕlam ʔaanna aːlħaaːd͡ʒaaa ʁaːlbaː maː baːlssʕaːda bdaːχlh wafawaːkiha mimmaː jaʃtahwna dʕnj aːraː walaaː jadiqqu fij wahmin ljst ldjj ʔawʃaːm ʔaʶaʶtaʶsˤbiʶruʶ lilbalwaaː ʕazaaːʔan waχaʃjaaan fatuʔud͡ʒaru ʔaaw tasluw suluwwa aːlbahaaːʔiim waqaaːla ʃabijbu bnu ʃajbaaa lilmahdijji ʔajn snltqj bal mattaʕtu hʔuulaːʔi waʔaːbaːʔahum ħattaː d͡ʒaːʔahumu aːlħaqqu waraswlun mubjnun waaːlħaaːdiθu ʕan aːlħuzni aʶːlmaʶraʶdˤaʶ waaːlʔaasqaaːma likumuwnihi ħattaː ʔiiðaː d͡ʒaːʔanaː qaːla jaː lajta bajnj wabajnaka buʕda aːlmaʃriqajni fabiʔisa aːlqarjnu aːlʕaːql mn ʕql lsaːnh waːld͡ʒaːhl mn d͡ʒhl qdrh waʔaannahum jaqwlwna maː laː jafʕalwna laː χalaqakum waaːld͡ʒibillaaa aːlʔaawwaljna khra tʔakl ʔawlaːdhaː ʔaʶʁdˤbnj twm ʔiðaaː ʔaaχaðt ʕafwa aːlquluwbi zakaaː rijʕuk faraːʁa ʕalajhim dˤaʶrbaʶnaʶː biaːljamjni waqad taqaddama qawlu aːlħukamaaːʔi waaːttaquwaː aːllaðj ʔaamaddakum bimaː taʕlamwna wad͡ʒaʕalnaaː aːlllajla libaːsanaː maːrj ʁlqt aːlbaːb dwn ʔan tħdθ ʔaj sˤwt ʁdˤb saːmj ʁdˤbaʶː ʃdjdaː ʕlaː aʶːlʃʃrtˤaʶ wamaː liʔaaħadin ʕindahu min aːlllaaːzimu lilʔaabi fahuwa ʔaan jaʔaχuða waladahu bimabaaːdiʔii aːlʔaːdaaːbi lijaʔanasa bihaaː ʔaqlʕt ʕn aːltdχjn mnð sta ʔaʃhr waaːlssarafu fij aːlððami aːntiqaaːmun jaʶsˤduʶruʶ ʕan ʃarrin wafij aʶːlʕuʶsˤfuʶwruʶ faʔiinna ʁurafa dimaʃqa mabnijjaaun biʶaʶːlsˤsˤuʶχuʶwriʶ laaː jaqdiru ʔaan juskinahaaː hunaaːka jurjdu ʔaan juχrid͡ʒakum min ʔaʶaʶrdˤiʶkuʶm bisiħrihi famaːðaː taʔamurwna ʔatħb mwsjqaː ħuʶtˤaʶːm ʔinsaːn lqd χdʕt nfsk liʔaanna aʶːlfaʶdˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶlaʶ hajʔiaaːtun muʶtaʶwaʶssiʶtˤaʶaʶuʶn bajna faʶdˤiʶjlaʶtaʶjniʶ naʶaʶːqiʶsˤaʶtaʶjniʶ ʔabtsm saːmj bsχrjja tsllq saːmj ʃd͡ʒra ʕaːlja d͡ʒddaː aːlmumaaːzad͡ʒaai lahu waʶsˤaʶlaʶaʶːħuʶ kulli dunjaaː aʶːuʶnðˤuʶr ʔilajhim ħasanaaːtuhum min sajjiʔiaaːtihim walakin ʔiðaaː θaaːra bihi aʶːlʁaʶdˤaʶbuʶ ʕinda hud͡ʒuwmi maaː juʶʁdˤiʶbuʶhuʶ kaffa sawratahu biħazmihi ʔanaː ʔansaː rqm haːtfk dˤaʶːħiʶkaʶaʶuʶn mustabʃiraaun fakun ʔaaħsana ħadijθin junʃaru jakun ljlaː bʕjda ʕn aʶːlχtˤr aːlðj laː jʕrf aʶːlsˤqr jʃwjh waliʔaad͡ʒli haðaaː aːlmaħkijji ʕan ʕumara maaː qijla qadijmanaː ʔiʶfraʶaʶːtˤuʶ aːlʕaqli muʶdˤiʶrruʶn biaːld͡ʒasadi ʔaːmulu ðlk man ʕalima ʔaanna kulla naaːʔiibaain ʔilaaː aʶːnqiʶdˤaʶaʶːʔiʶn ħasuna ʕazaaːʔuuhu ʕinda nuzuwli ʔaandaaːdanaː waʔaantum taʕlamuwna ðlk raːʔiʕ ħqaːan sˤrχ tˤaʶːlbaʶːaʶn aːlnd͡ʒda kaːn mdrrsnaː aːlbdjl ʃaːbbaː ldjnaː bʕdˤ aːlwqt aːlʔaːn zjjn saːmj aːlmktb lmaːðaː ʔant fj ʕd͡ʒla mn ʔamrk hkðaː mn ʕθrt ʕlaː ʃχsˤ ʔaːχr waqaaːla ʕabdu aːlllahi bnu aːlmubaaːraki tˤaʶlaʶbnaʶaʶː aːlʕilma lilddunjaaː fadallanaaː ʕalaaː tarki aːlddunjaaː saːmj jħbbkm waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi aʶːlsˤsˤiʶdquʶ mund͡ʒijk waʔiin χifth waaːlkaðibu murdijk waʔiin ʔaaminth min ʔaajn huw waʶjaʶsˤtˤaʶniʶʕaʶ bihaaː aːlmaʕruwfa nzl aːlwld mn ʕlaː aːlʃd͡ʒra falaaː biʶaʶːlfaʶdˤliʶ ʔaaχaða walaaː ʔilaaː aːlʕafwi ʔaaχlada laaː talawwiθ jadajka biaːlmidaaːdi wdˤʕt ljlaː ħjaːthaː w maːlhaː w mstqblhaː kʔamaːna bjn jdj faʶːdˤl saːmj jħbb aːlfrwla waljaʕlam ʔaanna likulli ħijnin min ʔaajjaaːmi ʕumurihi χuluqanaː laaː tamnun biʕamalik tastakθir ʕalaaː rabbik ln ʔaʶsttˤjʕ aːlqdwm ʁdaː lm jtχaʶːsˤmaʶː saːmj w ljlaː qtˤtˤ ʔaħb dˤwʔ aːlʃmwʕ waliðalika qijla aːlʕurju aːlfaaːdiħu χajrun min aːlzziji aʶːlfaʶaʶːdˤiʶħiʶ wabiaːlʔaasħaːri hum jastaʁfirwna ħsbmaː thjʔ fraːʃk jkwn nwmk waʔiið qultum jaaː muwsaaːaː lan nuʔumina laka ħattaaːaː naraaː aːlllaha d͡ʒahraaan waman qanaʕa biʶʕaʶtˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶhiʶ lam jadχulhu ħasadun aːlʁfwraːlwdwdaːlħqaːlslaːm waʔiin kaaːna balijdanaː baʕijda aʶːlfiʶtˤnaʶaʶiʶ fajanbaʁij ʔaan laaː jumnaʕa min aːljasijri fajaħrumu hl jtħdθ twm aːlfrnsja aʶːjdˤaʶː lm ʔatlqqaː waʔaanna aːlssuruwra bihaaː ʔiðaaː ʔaaqbalat maʃuwbun biaːlħaðari min firaaːqihaaː ʔiðaaː ʔaadbarat waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlʔaudabaaːʔi maaː hajjad͡ʒa d͡ʒaʔaʃak kaʶʁaʶjðˤiʶn ʔaad͡ʒaaːʃaka waaːttifaaːqu wakumuwni aːlħuzni ʔinnij daχalt aːlbaaːriħaaa fij aːlʔaarbaʕijna waʔaanaaː ʔaastaħij min sinij ʔaʶsˤbħt aːlkra mʕh tˤmwħh ʔan jsˤbħ sfjraː qaːla hal ʔaantum muʶtˤtˤaʶliʶʕwnaʶ waʶaʶːlsˤsˤaʶbruʶ waaːlħilmu tawʔaamaaːni fijhinna tamaaːmu kulli dijnin waaːlqadaħa fij aːlmanaaːzili waaːlʔaaħwaaːli waʶnaʶsˤiʶjbaʶnaʶː min ʔaawaaːmirihi faʶaʶːdˤiʶliʶn ʔillaaː min d͡ʒihaai naʶaʶːqiʶsˤiʶn wabalwaaː ʕaaːlimin ʔillaaː ʕalaaː jadi d͡ʒaaːhilin ʔamskwaː bh maːðaː tʃbh waqaaːla aːbnu aːld͡ʒallaaːli biχilaaːfi aːlnnawʕi aːlʔaawwali waʔiin katamuwhu taʶnaʶaʶːqaʶsˤaʶ wawahija laʕalla aːlkitaaːba waqaaːla muħammadu bnu ʕalijjin raʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːlllahu ʕanhu tstħq ðlk juʶtˤiʶjʕuʶ ʔaaħamdu ʔaabaaːh ʔiið qaːla lahum ʔaaχwhum nwħun ʔaalaː tattaqwna liʶjaʶħðˤaʶaʶː biʔaad͡ʒalli aːlχibraai wajasʕada biħamijdi aːlʕaaːqibaai ʔajn wdˤʕt ðlk aːlʃʃjʔ ʔahðh hj aʶːltˤtˤrjqaʶ aːltj aːktʃfthaː mn ʔad͡ʒl mħaːrba aːlaːktʔiaːb wakaaːna min wud͡ʒuwdi buʁjatihi baʕijdanaː waʶsˤaʶaʶːraʶ biaːqtiraaːħihi fardanaː waħijdanaː ʔinh jtħssn jwmaːan bʕd jwm maθaluhum kamaθali aːllaðij aːstawqada naaːranaː kilaaː aːlmad͡ʒlisajni ʕalaaː χajrin liʔaannahu baʶʕdˤuʶ aːld͡ʒasadi aːllaðij laaː juwd͡ʒibu aːlʕaqlu satra baaːqijhi faqaaːla humaaː baʕda aːlʕuquwbaai ʔaaʕðaru fij taʶnaʶqquʶsˤiʶj waθalbij laː jmknnj ʔijd͡ʒaːd tjm saːmj jntðˤr baːbaː nwjl lm jstħqq saːmj mwta mʔasaːwjja ktlk wafij miθlihi jaquwlu aːlʃʃaaːʕiru waʶtaʶsˤliʶjaʶaʶuʶ d͡ʒaħjmin aːʁtnmt ljlaː wħda saːmj w ʔaʁwth laː tns hðh kaːn saːmj mqjjdaː lsrjrh fj aːlmstʃfaː aːntqlj ʔilaː mnzlj kaːn saːmj jstmʕ llrrsaːʔil aʶːlsˤsˤwtjaʶ aːltj bihi aːlʔaaʃiħħaaːʔu sˤiʶnaʶaʶːʕaʶaʶuʶn fikrin waʔiin kaːnwaː min qabli ʔaan junazzala ʕalajhim min qablihi lamublisjna χð wqtk jaː jwʃjdaː saːmj aːlʔaːn fj ʁjbwba lw aʶːsttˤʕt lmaː lkmt saːmj bkll ʔaʶqraʶːsˤ fj kll mkaːn waaːlχajbaaa maʕa aːlʔiiħd͡ʒaaːmi wamaː janbaʁj lahum wamaː jaʶstaʶtˤjʕwnaʶ wamiθlu ðalika qawlu baʶʕdˤiʶ aːlzzuʕamaaːʔi fij ʃiʕrihi wsˤl aːlmdrrs mtʔaχχraː faʔiinna aːlʔaamra fijhi muʕtabarun biħaaːli tˤaʶaʶːliʶbiʶhiʶ faʔiin kaaːna mimman taqaaːʕada ʕalaaː maraaːtibi aːlrruʔuasaaːʔi huwa aːllaðj juʶsˤaʶllj ʕalajkum wamalaːʔiikatuhu lijuχrid͡ʒakum mina aʶːlðˤðˤuʶluʶmaʶːtiʶ biaːljamjni lm jrd saːmj ʔan jtχaʶːsˤm mʕ ðlk aːlrrd͡ʒl hl bdʔat tʃʕr baːlχwf faʶaʶːnðˤuʶr ʔilaaː haðaaː aʶːlsˤsˤaʶbiʶjiʶ kajfa aːstaχrad͡ʒa biʶfaʶrtˤiʶ ðakaaːʔiihi faʔaammaaː man ʔaʶaʶʕraʶdˤaʶt wʔiðaː ʔaʶsˤjb ʃχsˤ waːħd baːlʔinflwnzaː fjʕrdˤ ðlk aːld͡ʒmjʕ llχtˤr tχrrd͡ʒ saːmj mn aːlθθaːnwja lqd ʔaʕd͡ʒbtmaː saːmj lima manaʕth faqaaːla jadu aːllhi maʕa aːld͡ʒamaaːʕaai ʔaaħaduhumaaː fij waʶaʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤaʶ baʕda ðlika daħaːhaː faqad qaaːla sˤaʶllaʶaʶː aːlllahu ʕalajhi wasallama liʔaanna aːlmuktasaba ʁajru maħduwdin wamaː hum ʕanhaː biʁaːʔiibjna kaːnt mʃʁwla bʔaʕmaːl aːlmnzl waʔaammaaː aːlmad͡ʒlisu aːlʔaːχaru fajataʕallamuwna aːlfiqha wajuʕallimuwna aːld͡ʒaaːhila waljakun min aːlttad͡ʒamuli ʕalaaː maaː jaʶqtaʶdˤiʶjhiʶ ħaaːlu miθlihi min ðawij aːlħaaːd͡ʒaaːti faraːʁa ʔiilaː ʔaːlihatihim faqaːla ʔaalaː taʔakulwna faʔaammaaː aʶːlħiʶrsˤuʶ fahuwa ʃiddaau aːlkadħi waaːlʔiisraaːfi fij aʶːltˤtˤaʶlaʶbiʶ θumma lahu aʶːlħaʶðˤðˤuʶ aːlʔaawfaaː fij θawaaːbi aːlχaaːliqi waθanaaːʔi aːlmaχluwqijna waaːstaʕmala muʕaaːwijaau rad͡ʒulanaː min kalbin faðukira aːlmad͡ʒuwsu jawmanaː ʕindahu faqaaːla waman kaaːnat aːlddunjaaː munaaːhu wahammuhu sabathu aːlmunaaː waaːstaʕbadathu aʶːlmaʶtˤaʶaʶːmiʶʕuʶ waħasmu haðihi aʶːlmaʶtˤaʶaʶːmiʶʕiʶ ʃajʔiaaːni ʔinh md͡ʒnwn bħbk waʔaaθbata lahu aːlħud͡ʒd͡ʒaaa falajsa lilððakaaːʔi ʁaaːjaaun hl jħb aːld͡ʒmjʕ aːlmwsjqaː lħsn aʶːlħðˤ lm jtʔað ʔaħd ʕalajhaː tisʕaaa ʕaʃara waʶaʶːlʃʃaʶrtˤuʶ aːlrraaːbiʕu ʔaan jataχajjara aʶːlllaʶfðˤaʶ aːllaðij jatakallamu bihi tħrrkt ljlaː nħw saːmj wawaʕada jaħjaaː bnu χaaːlidin rad͡ʒulanaː biħaaːd͡ʒaain saʔaalahu ʔijjaaːhaaː faqijla lahu faʶjaʶsˤiʶjruʶ aːlʔiinsaaːnu ʔaasijra ʃahawaaːtin laaː taʶnqaʶdˤiʶj faʔiin lam ʔaafʕal jakuwnu maaːðaaː faqaaːla lqd ʔaħbbnj aːlmdrrs aːttχðt hðaː aːlqraːr aʶːlltˤf waːlkrm ʔarjd mnk χdma aːχtaːraː faʶːdˤl ʔan ljlaː ʔan jmdˤjaʶː wqthmaː mʕaː kħbjbaːn man aːltamasa ʔaarbaʕanaː biʔaarbaʕin aːltamasa maaː laaː jakuwnu ʔanaː ʔaqrʔa aʶːltˤtˤaʶːlʕ waminhu ʔaanuwʃirwaaːna libazard͡ʒamhara waʶjuʶnsˤiʶfaʶ fij aːlħikami waʔiiðaaː aːlbiħaːru sud͡ʒd͡ʒirat liʔaanna ʃarafahu juθmiru ʕalaaː sˤaʶaʶːħiʶbiʶhiʶ baːlrrʁm mn ʔann ljlaː drst fj aːld͡ʒaːmʕa tħsˤsˤlt faqaaːla aːlmuhallabu ldaː bjl aːlkθjr mn aʶːlʔaʶsˤdqaʶːʔ liʔaanna aːlssaaːʔiila kamaaː aːd͡ʒtaraʔaa ʕalaaː suʔuaaːlik fasajad͡ʒtariʔiu ʕalaaː suʔuaaːli ʁajrik ʔin radadth lahu maqaːljdu aːlssamaːwaːti waʶaʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤiʶ waaːllaðjna kafarwaː biʔaːjaːti aːlllahi ʔauwlʔiika humu aːlχaːsirwna ʔin aːld͡ʒwaːd qd jʕθr ʔaraːk aːlʔasbwʕ aːlqaːdm ʔakaːd ʔansaː ʔajn ʔanaː wakafijla nad͡ʒaaːħihaaː aʶːltˤtˤaʶbiʶjbuʶ ʔinnamaaː judaaːwij aʶːlmaʶrdˤaʶaʶː ʔaʶtˤhr aːlnaːs ʔaʕraːqaːan ʔaħsnhm ʔaχlaːqaːan lkm saːmj ljlaː fj wd͡ʒhhaː mtsbbbaː fj aːntfaːχ ʕjnhaː ʔilaː ħdd aːlaːnʁlaːq kaːn saːmj fj bld ʔislaːmj waqad qaaːlat aːlħukamaaːʔu lilʔiiskandari ʔaʶtˤfʔaʶt aːlmðjaːʕ baːlkaːd ʔaʶsttˤjʕ smaːʕk maː ʔaaʁnaː ʕanhum maː kaːnwaː jumattaʕwna saːmj jʕrf ʔajn hw ʕaːqbh waaːlrraʔaju ʔiðaaː ʕaʶaʶːraʶdˤaʶhuʶ aːlhawaaː wad͡ʒaaːðabathu aʶːlʔaʶaʶʁraʶaʶːdˤuʶ fasada faʔaand͡ʒajnaːhu waman maʕahu fij aːlfulki aːlmaʃħwni jʁaːdr aʶːlqtˤaʶːr fj aːlsaːʕa aːltaːsʕa mtaː tbdʔa faːtth aːlħaːfla bθwaːn ʔillaaː man ʔaaʁnaaːhu aːlllahu biʕizzi aːlqanaaːʕaai rad͡ʒulanaː sˤaʶħiʶjħaʶnaʶː mink maː ʔaanta biniʕmaai rabbika bimad͡ʒnwnin ʔaalam jad͡ʒʕal kajdahum fj taʶdˤljliʶn ʔiinnaː saχχarnaaː aːld͡ʒibaːla maʕahu jusabbiħna biaːlʕaʃijji waaːlʔiiʃraːqi waʔaaʕqala min ʔaan juχdaʕa waaːlθθaaːnij ʃuʶruʶwtˤuʶhaʶaʶː fij ʁajrihi waman lam juħsin ʔilaaː aːlttaaːʔiibi qabuħat ʔisaaːʔatuhu ʔauwħija ʔilaaː ʔibraaːhijma ʕalajhi aːlssalaaːmu ʔaannij ʕalijmun ʔauħibbu kulla ʕalijmin maaː aːllaðij salabak milkak qaaːla waaːllaðjna ʔaːmanwaː waʕamiluwaː aʶːlsˤsˤaʶːliʶħaʶːtiʶ lanukaffirana ʕanhum sajjiʔiaaːtihim walanad͡ʒzijannahum ʔaaħsana aːllaðj kaːnwaː jaʕmalwna ʔaraːd saːmj ʃχsˤaʶː kj jʕtnj bh hðaː faljaðwqwhu ħamjmun waʁassaːqun walaː takwnwaː kaaːllaðjna nasuwaː aːlllaha faʔaansaːhum ʔaanfusahum ʔauwlʔiika humu aːlfaːsiqwna waqad qaaːla aʶːlmaʶnsˤuʶwruʶ ʔiðaaː kaaːna aːlħilmu mafsadaaan kaaːna aːlʕafwu maʕd͡ʒazaaan walaqad sˤaʶbbaʶħaʶhuʶm bukraaan ʕaðaːbun mustaqirrun maaː aːsmu aːmraʔaaai ʔiblijsa laʕanahu aːlllahu faqaaːla walilkibri ʔaasbaaːbun walaaː tanqaaːdu ʔilaaː tarki maʶtˤluʶwbiʶhaʶaʶː falaaː tuðʕinu liħaqqin walaaː tud͡ʒijbu ʔilaaː ʔiʶnsˤaʶaʶːfiʶn fanahaaː ʕan baʶstˤiʶhaʶaʶː sarafanaː falajsa kullu man kaaːna ʕalaaː aːlʔaamwaaːli ʔaamijnanaː kaaːna ʕalaaː aːlʔaasraaːri muʔutamananaː tlqqaː saːmj ħkmaː baːlħbs aːlmʔubbd bʔimkaːnk trd͡ʒma hðh aːld͡ʒml zmn θm maːðaː famaː lahum laː juʔuminwna θumma ʔaantum haaːʔuulaaːʔi taqtuluwna ʔaanfusakum watuχrid͡ʒuwna farijqanaː minkum waʔaammaaː aːllaðjna kafarwaː wakaððabwaː biʔaːjaːtinaː waliqaːʔi waaːld͡ʒiddu biaːlkasri aːliaːnkimaaːʃu fij aːlʔaumuwri ʔaaj aːliaːd͡ʒtihaaːdu fijhaaː walajsa kullu man sˤaʶaʶːraʶ ʔaasijra ħaqqik waʔaannahu χalaqa aːlzzawd͡ʒajni aːlððakara waaːlʔaunθaː walaaː faʔaad͡ʒaaːbahu ʕan aːstiχbaaːrihi bimaaː juwaaːfiquhu musaaːʕidaaan liʶʁaʶraʶdˤiʶhiʶ walaaː jufakkiru ʔillaaː fij ʕaaːqibatihi ʔaaw fij ʔaːχiratihi ʕurfu aːlʔaad͡ʒnaaːsi faʔiinna lilʔaad͡ʒnaaːdi qalatin ʔillaaː maaː waqaaː aːlllahu ʃʕjrnaː wlaː qmħ ʁjrnaː ʃfjt nfsj wlkn d͡ʒdʕt ʔanfj saːmj laː jstħqq ðlk walillaðjna kafarwaː birabbihim ʕaðaːbu d͡ʒahannama wabiʔisa aʶːlmaʶsˤjruʶ kaːn saːmj jrjd ʔan jqdˤj ʔamsjth mʕ ljlaː ʔaan jaðkura θawaaːba aːlʕafwi tˤlb mnnj aːlmsaːʕda wafaːkihaaan waʔaabbanaː tʕaːwnkm mqdr waqafa aːlrrad͡ʒulu ʔiinnamaː ʔaamruhu ʔiiðaː ʔaaraːda ʃajʔianaː ʔaan jaqwla lahu kun fajakwnu waʕaaːdaaːti waqtihi knt sʕjdaːan ʕnd ðlk ʔiðaː aːlʃʕb jwmaː ʔaraːd aːlħjaːa flaː bd ʔan jstd͡ʒjb aːlqdr qrrrt ljlaː aːrtdaːʔ aːlħd͡ʒaːb wabilaaːlun saaːbiqu aːlħabaʃi ʔaraːd saːmj ʔan jkwn mslmaː d͡ʒjjdaː ʔaan jataʔaannaaː fij taqdijri maaːddatihi watadbijri kifaaːjatihi bimaaː laaː jalħaquhu χalalun walaaː janaaːluhu zalalun ʔalm ʔaχbrk ʔannh mn aʶːlχtˤr ʔan tsrʕ fj hðh aʶːlmntˤqaʶ waman ʃarufat nafsuhu maʕa sˤiʶʁaʶriʶ himmatihi fahuwa taaːrikun limaaː jastaħiqqu waʶmuʶqaʶsˤsˤiʶruʶn ʕammaaː jad͡ʒibu lahu sˤllaʶː saːmj sˤlaʶːaʶ aʶːlðˤðˤhr mʕ faʶːdˤl walaqija ʕabdu aːlllahi bnu ʕabdi aːlmaliki aːbna ʃihaaːbin aːlzzuhrija faqaaːla lahu ʔaʶaʶsqaʶtˤaʶ aːlllahu d͡ʒanbajk ʔaʶaʶtaʶχaʶaʶːtˤaʶbuʶ ʔaamijra aːlmuʔuminijna bimiθli haðaaː aʶːlχiʶtˤaʶaʶːbiʶ fakaaːna aʶːlfaʶdˤluʶ bnu aːlrrabijʕi waliðalika qaaːla ʔaakθamu bnu sˤaʶjfiʶjjiʶn aːlssaχaaːʔu ħusnu aʶːlfaʶtˤiʶnaʶaʶiʶ waaːllluʔumu suwʔu aːlttaʁaaːfuli kaːn saːmj jʕjʃ ħjaːa raːʔiʕa ʕan ʔibraaːhijma bni ʕabdi aːlrraħmani aːlʕuðrijji qaaːla aːbtʕd mn hnaː kaːn mdrrsj mftrsaː d͡ʒnsjjaː ʔaʶaʶwsˤaʶaʶːniʶj rabbij bisabʕin wabaqija aːlkitaaːbu aːlʕarabijju ʔilaaː ʔaan χaʶsˤsˤaʶ aːlllahu taʕaaːlaaː bihi ʔismaaːʕijla faʶʔaʶaʶsˤaʶaʶːbaʶhuʶ wataʕallamahaaː mknnaː mn ʔan nlmħ ʔid͡ʒaːbaːt ʕn aːlsʔuaːl aːlqdjm laː jwd͡ʒd ʔiqbaːl kaːfin ʕlaː hðh aʶːlbdˤaʶːʕaʶ ʔiinnamaaː aːlmuʔuminuwna ʔiiχwaaun faʶʔaʶaʶsˤliʶħuʶwaʶː bajna ʔaaχawajkum waaːttaquwaː aːlllaha laʕallakum turħamuwna tsqaː mn ʕjn ʔaːnja faʔiinna ʔiʶχlaʶaʶːsˤaʶ aʶːltˤtˤaʶaʶːʕaʶaʶiʶ ʔaad͡ʒmaʕu lilʃʃamli muʕaaːtabaau aːlʔaaχi χajrun min faqdihi wln jnfʕkm aːljwm ʔið ðˤlmtm ʔankm fj aːlʕðaːb mʃtrkwn whw aːlðj d͡ʒʕl aːlljl waːlnhaːr χlfa lmn ʔaraːd ʔan jðkr ʔaw ʔaraːd ʃkwraː twfj twm jaː ljthaː kaːnt aʶːlqaʶːdˤjaʶ bfdˤlh tmknt mn aʶːlħsˤwl ʕlaː wðˤjfaʶ wamaaː ðaraʔaa lakum fij aʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤiʶ muχtalifanaː ʔaalwaaːnuhu ʔiinna fij ðalika laʔaːjaaan liqawmin jaððakaruwna kjfa sjdfʕ djwnhu lst kbjraː bmaː jkfj ltħsˤl ʕlj rχsˤaʶ qjaːda laː tbðr maːlk fj ʃraːʔ ʔaʃjaːʔ lst bħaːd͡ʒa ʔiljhaː aːnaː msrwr llðhaːb aːlaː mzrʕth χlaːl aʶːlʕtˤlaʶ aʶːlsˤjfjaʶ ʔaannaaː lak haðaaː aːlʕilmu qaaːla fqdt zwd͡ʒtj fj ħaːdθ tˤrjq qaaːla ʔiinnij aʶːlðˤðˤaʶnaʶ fij kabwaain takuwnu minhu bismi aːlllahi aːlrraħmani aːlrraħijmi aːlrraħmanu bismi aːlllahi aːlrraħmani aːlrraħijmi sˤ waaːlqurʔaːni ðij aːlððikri ʔaaw janfaʕuwnakum ʔaaw jaʶdˤuʶrruʶwnaʶ ʔahðaː klb twm faːntqmnaː mnhm faʶːnðˤr kjf kaːn ʕaːqba aːlmkðbjn ʔaːml ʔalaː tnʃb aːlħrb swf ʔaqrʔa aːlktaːb waman jahdi aːlllahu famaaː lahu min muʶdˤiʶlliʶn ʔaalajsa aːlllahu biʕazijzin ðij aːntiqaaːmin maːrjaː tmʃj buʶbtˤʔ aːlnsaːʔ aʶːltˤjbaʶːt daːʔimaː d͡ʒmjlaːt ʔamaː aːlnsaːʔ aːld͡ʒmjlaːt lsn daːʔimaː tˤjbaʶːt wanabbiʔihum ʔaanna aːlmaaːʔa qismaaun bajnahum kullu ʃirbin muʶħtaʶdˤaʶruʶn θumma jaʕuwdu ʔilaaː aːlmaʕhuwdi min ʔiχaaːʔiihi hl ʔant ħqaː bħaːd͡ʒa lklb ʔiʶdˤaʶːfj linaftinahum fijhi waman juʶʕriʶdˤ ʕan ðikri rabbihi jaslukhu ʕaðaaːbanaː sˤaʶʕaʶdaʶnaʶː wfj mwsaː ʔið ʔarslnaːh ʔilaː frʕwn bsltˤaʶːn mbjn faqadijmanaː nahaaː aːlnnaaːsu ʕanhumaaː waaːstaʕaaːðuwaː biaːalllahi minhumaaː watilka ħud͡ʒd͡ʒatunaaː ʔaːtajnaaːhaaː ʔiibraaːhijma ʕalaaː qawmihi ʔaʁnjtj aʶːlmfdˤdˤlaʶ aːlswʃj d͡ʒjd lkn aʶːlʔaʶtˤbaʶːq aːltaːjlaːndja ʔaʶfdˤl mmaː χtˤjʔiʶaʶːthm ʔaʁrqwaː fʔadχlwaː naːraː flm jd͡ʒdwaː lhm mn dwn aːllh ʔaʶnsˤaʶːraʶː mrħbaːan mʕk maːjk nsjt ʔan ʔad͡ʒwrkm wlaː jsʔalkm ʔamwaːlkm waraaːdiʕin malijjin aːllaðijna hum juraaːʔuwna walanabbaha ʕalajhi ʕan ʔabj hurjraa ʕabdi aːlrraħmni bni sˤaʶχriʶn raʶdˤiʶj aːllhu ʕanhu qaːla kjf tqwl ʃkraːan lk baːljaːbaːnja maːrj tʕlm tmaːmaːan maː aːlðj jnbʁj ʕljhaː fʕlh jaʕnij aʶːltˤtˤaʶriʶjqaʶjniʶ tˤaʶriʶjqaʶ aːlχajri waʶtˤaʶriʶjqaʶ aːlʃʃari hl jtwd͡ʒb ʕlj aːlbqaːʔ fj aːlmstʃfaː qaaːluwaː bal ʔaantum sjkwn ʕljhaː ʔan tntðˤrh waminhunna ʁajθun waqaʕa bibaladin faʔaamraʕa qaːlwaː rbnaː ʔamtnaː aːθntjn wʔaħjjtnaː aːθntjn faːʕtrfnaː bðnwbnaː fhl ʔilaː χrwd͡ʒ mn sbjl hnaːk ktaːb hnaː twqf ʕn dˤrb ʔaχwk daaːbira aːllaðijna kaððabuwaː biʔaːjaaːtinaaː wamaaː kaaːnuwaː muʔuminijna waaːllaðij ʔaʶaʶtˤmaʶʕuʶ ʔaan jaʁfira lij χaʶtˤiʶjʔiʶaʶtiʶj jawma aːlddijni ʔiinna haðaaː maaː kuntum bihi tamtaruwna bsrʕa ʕndj btˤn aːld͡ʒʕa ʔanaː aːqtrħt ltwm ʔimkaːnja aːlʕml mʕ maːrj ʔaajjumaaː ʔaʶaʶfdˤaʶluʶ waman taaːba waʕamila sˤaʶaʶːliʶħaʶnaʶː faʔiinnahu jatuwbu ʔiilaaː aːlllahi mataaːbanaː fj ʔaj qsm ʔant ʔaaslaftum fij aːlʔaajjaaːmi aːlχaaːlijaai aːltaːrjχ aːljaːbaːnj hw mwdˤwʕj aʶːlmfdˤl ʔiinnaka ʔiin taðarhum juʶdˤiʶlluʶwaʶː ʕibaaːdaka walaaː jaliduwaː ʔiillaaː faaːd͡ʒiranaː kaffaaːranaː aʶːlʃrtˤaʶuʶ tnðˤruʶ fj ʔamri qdˤjaʶiʶ aːlqtli mn aːlmmkn ʔan ʔaljs stʔatj χrd͡ʒ ʔaχj mn aːlʁrfa raʶːkdˤaʶː bdwn ʔan jqwl ʃjʔiaː bjt aːlmħsn ʕmaːr waqad ʔaʶaʶdˤaʶlluʶwaʶː kaθijranaː walaaː tazidi aʶːlðˤðˤaʶaʶːliʶmiʶjnaʶ ʔiillaaː dˤaʶlaʶaʶːlaʶnaʶː aːllaðijna tatawaffaaːhumu aːlmalaaːʔiikaau tˤaʶjjiʶbiʶjnaʶ jaquwluwna salaaːmun ʕalajkumu aːdχuluwaː aːld͡ʒannaaa bimaaː kuntum taʕmaluwna jaː ʔabt ʔinj qd d͡ʒaːʔnj mn aːlʕlm maː lm jʔatk faːtbʕnj ʔahdk sˤraʶːtˤaʶː swjaː wʕndmaː aʶːstjqðˤt knt ħzjnaː laː jkfj aːlqwl ʕn lʁa ʔanhaː ʕaːlmja ltsˤbħ kðlk ʔilaː qdr mʕlwm ħusnu aːlssuʔuaaːli niʶsˤfuʶ wakaθraau aːlwaraʕi hl lħqta baʶːlqtˤaʶːr laː tnsaː aːlqaːʕda rqm ʔiθnaːn wsbʕwn hl tsaːʕdnj ʔan ʔaħl waːd͡ʒbj waman ʔaʶaʶðˤlaʶmuʶ mimman ðukkira biʔaːjaaːti rabbihi θumma ʔaʶaʶʕraʶdˤaʶ ʕanhaaː ʔaʶsqtˤt qnbla wakaaːna lahu θamarun faqaaːla liʶsˤaʶaʶːħiʶbiʶhiʶ wahuwa juħaaːwiruhu ʔaanaaː ʔaakθaru minka maaːlanaː waʔaaʕazzu nafaranaː lkl frd ħrja aːltnql waːχtjaːr mħl ʔiqaːmth daːχl ħdwd kl dwla waʔiinna aːlmuʔumina bajna maχaaːfatajni θm lnnzʕn mn kl ʃjʕa ʔajhm ʔaʃd ʕlaː aːlrħmn ʕtjaː wanaʕmaain kaaːnuwaː fijhaaː faaːkihijna maaː ʔaantum ʕalajhi bifaaːtinijna wklaː dˤrbnaʶː lh aːlʔamθaːl wklaː tbrnaː ttbjraː thaːnjnaː aːdχuluwaː aːld͡ʒannaaa ʔaantum waʔaazwaaːd͡ʒukum tuħbaruwna lmaːðaː hw mwd͡ʒwd hnaː aʶːntðˤrnj fj aʶːlmħtˤaʶ mn fdˤlk twm laː jħb aʶːlʔaʶʃχaʶːsˤ aːlðjn ʔibraːhjm wʔisħaːq wjʕqwb ʔawlj aːlʔajdj waʶːlʔaʶbsˤaʶːr ʔanaː fj wrtˤaʶ snqwm baːsʕaːdk ʔinnj ʔaθq bk χwaːn jnaːm wʕjnaːh mftwħtaːn waaːlħamdu lillahi rabbi aːlʕaaːlamijna man juʶbʁiʶdˤuʶ aːlnnaaːsa waʶjuʶbʁiʶdˤuʶwnaʶhuʶ aːlʔaaχillaaːʔu jawmaʔiiðin baʶʕdˤuʶhuʶm liʶbaʶʕdˤiʶn ʕaduwwun ʔiillaaː aːlmuttaqijna waʔiilaaː mataaː jaħsunu bij tˤaʶlaʶbuʶ aːlʕilmi qaaːla bkaː ʕlaː swʔ ħðˤh ʔink tʃʕrnj baːlχwf ʔaħjaːnaː ʔinnamaaː summija aʶːlsˤsˤaʶdiʶjquʶ sˤaʶdiʶjqaʶnaʶː liʶsˤiʶdqiʶhiʶ fj ʔaj sn bdʔat ʕndk aːldwra aːlʃhrja walillahi maaː fij aːlssamaaːwaaːti wamaaː fij aʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤiʶ wakaaːna ʔiinnahu huwa aːlʁafuwru aːlrraħijmu ʔan laː jdχlnhaː aːljwm ʕljkm mskjn wʔaʶtˤjʕwaʶː aːllh wʔaʶtˤjʕwaʶː aːlrswl fʔin twljtm fʔinmaː ʕlaː rswlnaː aːlblaːʁ aːlmbjn sʔal twm maːrj maː ʔiðaː kaːnt twd aʶːlrqsˤ ʔanta laː jmknk tħdθ aːlʔind͡ʒljzja hl jmknk wʔiðaː bʃr ʔaħdhm baːlʔanθaː ðˤl wd͡ʒhh mswdaː whw kðˤjm ʔiinna fij ðalika laʔaːjaaːtin waʔiin kunnaaː lamubtalijna aʶːntðˤr ħtaː ʔad͡ʒls ʔaaʃiʕ aːlmwaːlj mn wraːʔij wkaːnt aːmrʔatj ʕaːqraː fhb lj mn ldnk wljaː laː tqlq bʃʔan ðlk saːtaːrw hw mn bjnnaː nħn aːlχmsa aːlʔasrʕ rkdˤaʶnaʶː ʔatðkru maː fʕlta aːld͡ʒmʕa aʶːlmaʶːdˤjaʶ durb ʕlaː jd χbjr ʔaajdijahumaaː d͡ʒazaaːʔan bimaaː kasabaaː nakaaːlanaː mina aːlllahi waaːlllahu ʕazijzun ħakijmun ʔaawaman junaʃʃaʔau fij aːlħiljaai wahuwa fij aʶːlχiʶsˤaʶaʶːmiʶ ʁajru mubijnin waħukija ʔaanna baʶʕdˤaʶ aːlzzuhaaːdi waqafa ʕalaaː d͡ʒamʕin fanaaːdaaː biʔaaʕlaaː sˤaʶwtiʶhiʶ jbdw ʃaːbanaː laː jmkn ʔan jkwn ʔakbr mnj wajuθnijhaaː maħabbaaan waʶaʶːnʕiʶtˤaʶaʶːfaʶnaʶː ʔinj ʃaːkr lk mn ʔaʕmaːq qlbj ʔant ʔakbr mnj qaːma waʔaammaaː aːlllafuwtu faðaaːtu aːlwaladi min ʁajrik wʔin jrwaː ʔaːja jʕrdˤwaʶː wjqwlwaː sħr mstmr jwsf jʕqwb ʔisħaːq ʔismaːʕjl w ʔibraːhjm hm ʔanbjaːʔ aːllh jd͡ʒb ʕlj ʔan ʔaðhb aːlʔan jwm tbdl aʶːlʔaʶrdˤ ʁjr aʶːlʔaʶrdˤ waːlsmaːwaːt wbrzwaː llh aːlwaːħd aːlqhaːr jd͡ʒʕlnj sʕjda d͡ʒdaː maːðaː tʕtqd ʔaʶfdˤl tˤrjqaʶ llwsˤwl ʔilaː bjt twm mn hnaː hj laː tħsn aːlʔind͡ʒljzja mθlk ʃχsˤ ʔanta kjf rasamt hðh aʶːlsˤwraʶ rmqnj bnðˤraʶ mrʕba twm ʃkrnj ʕlaː aːlhdja ʔinj ʔiðaː lfj dˤlaʶːl mbjn walajsa lilrraaːʁibi fijhi qanaaːʕaaun biʶbaʶʕdˤiʶhiʶ faaːstaqaaːmat lahu ħaaːluhu fsaːhm fkaːn mn aʶːlmdħdˤjn ðuq ʔiinnaka ʔaanta aːlʕazijzu aːlkarijmu d͡ʒrb mra ʔaχraː lmaːðaː knt hnaːk aːnhaː mmla mn aːld͡ʒld wʔin tʕdwaː nʕma aːllh laː tħsˤwhaʶː ʔin aːllh lʁfwr rħjm waliðalika tad͡ʒidu χuʶtˤuʶwtˤaʶ aːlʕulamaaːʔi fij aːlʔaaʁlabi radijʔiaaan laaː jaʶχuʶtˤtˤuʶ ʔillaaː man ʔaasʕadahu famaaː aʶːstˤaʶaʶːʕuʶwaʶː ʔaan jaʶðˤhaʶruʶwhuʶ wamaaː aʶːstaʶtˤaʶaʶːʕuʶwaʶː lahu naqbanaː faʔaaχaða rʔajthm dˤlwaʶː ʔinhaː blaː ʃk mħqa aːlsjd braːwn hw mʕlmnaː fj aːlʔind͡ʒljzja lm trd͡ʒʕ lj nqwdj walaqad ʔauwħija ʔiilajka waʔiilaaː aːllaðijna min qablika laʔiin ʔaaʃrakta laʶjaʶħbaʶtˤaʶnnaʶ ʕamaluka walatakuwnanna mina aːlχaaːsirijna ʔaudχul wasaaːriʕuwaː ʔiilaaː maʁfiraain min rabbikum wad͡ʒannaain ʕaʶrdˤuʶhaʶaʶː aːlssamaaːwaaːtu waʶaʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤuʶ ʔauʕiddat lilmuttaqijna ʔiinna fij χalqi aːlssamaaːwaaːti waʶaʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤiʶ waaːχtilaaːfi aːlllajli waaːlnnahaaːri laʔaːjaaːtin liʔauwlij aːlʔaalbaaːbi hal ʔaattabiʕuka ʕalaaː ʔaan tuʕallimani mimmaaː ʕullimta ruʃdanaː waqijla lilχalijli bni ʔaaħmada laː jsmʕwn ħsjshaː whm fj maː aːʃtht ʔanfshm χaːldwn laː ʕd͡ʒb ʔann aʶːlbʕdˤ jʃʕrwn baːltwtr ʕnd dχwlhm aːlmstʃfaː ʔinmaː aːlʕbra baːlnhaːja wmaː ðrʔa lkm fj aʶːlʔaʶrdˤ mχtlfaː ʔalwaːnh ʔin fj ðlk lʔaːja lqwm jðkrwn waqaaːla ʕabdu aːlllahi bnu aːlmuʕtazzi ʔaʕtqd bʔanj mħq aːlʔislaːm d͡ʒmjl fij aːlbadʔi χalaqa aːllhu aːlssamaaːwaaːti waʶaʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤaʶ lqd kðbt rʁmaː ʕnj waʔiimmaaː limaaː jaddaʕij ʔaarbaaːbuhu ʔaannahu ʕilmun muʕwizun lmaːðaː hðaː χtˤʔaʶ fajastakidduwaː χaʶwaʶaʶːtˤiʶraʶ qad muniħuwaː sˤiʶħħaʶtaʶhaʶaʶː fijmaaː laaː jud͡ʒdij nafʕanaː walaaː jufijdu ʕilmanaː hlaː ʃʁlt aːltlfaːz mn fdˤlk mud͡ʒaaːlasaau aːlʕuqalaaːʔi lqd ʕmlt fj mzrʕa aːalʕad͡ʒalaa mina aʶːlʃaʶaʶjtˤaʶaʶːn aːnaː sʕjd waːstmʕ jwm jnaːd aːlmnaːd mn mkaːn qrjb wlkm fjhaː mnaːfʕ wltblʁwaː ʕljhaː ħaːd͡ʒa fj sˤdwrkm wʕljhaː wʕlaː aːlflk tħmlwn nsttˤjʕ tʕlm kθjr mn aːlʔamwr ʕnd aːstχdaːmnaː aːld͡ʒumal wʔakθr bkθjr mn md͡ʒrd aːlklmaːt aːlʔintrnt msˤdruʶ mʕlwmaːtin laː jqdr bθmn wjwm nħʃr mn kl ʔama fwd͡ʒaː mmn jkðb bʔaːjaːtnaː fhm jwzʕwn ʔaʶaʶfaʶnaʶdˤriʶbuʶ ʕankumu aːlððikra sˤaʶfħaʶnaʶː ʔaan kuntum qawmanaː musrifijna mn fdˤlk aʶːstjqðˤ ʕlaː aːlsaːʕa aːlsaːbʕa ljs ldjnaː ʃjʔ lnχsrh wlaː td͡ʒʕlwaː mʕ aːllh ʔilhaː ʔaːχr ʔinj lkm mnh nðjr mbjn ʔanaː lm ʔaktb ʔilaː waːldj twqf ʕn ʁjðˤ ʔaχtk jaaː marjamu aːqnutij lirabbiki waaːsd͡ʒudij waaːrkaʕij maʕa aːlrraaːkiʕijna laː ʔaħtaːd͡ʒ ʔilaː ʔaħd waqad aːχtalafat maðaaːhibu aːlnnaaːsi fij aːttiχaaːði aːlʔiiχwaaːni sˤnʕ mjdlaːja mn aːlðhb ʔauwlaʔiika aːllaðijna aːʃtarawuaː aʶːldˤdˤaʶlaʶaʶːlaʶaʶaʶ biaːlhudaaː waaːlʕaðaaːba biaːlmaʁfiraai famaaː ʔaʶaʶsˤbaʶraʶhuʶm ʕalaaː aːlnnaaːri hammaaːzin maʃʃaaːʔin binamijmin liʔaanna aːlrrad͡ʒula jaʁlibuhaaː ʕalaaː aːlʃʃabaqi lizuhdihaaː fij aːlrrid͡ʒaaːli ʔaʕjʃ fj tˤraʶːbls lbnaːn njk ldjh ʃʕr qsˤjr ʔam ʕndhm χzaːʔin rbk ʔam hm aʶːlmsˤjtˤrwn ʔaan janfija ʕan nafsihi raðaaːʔiila aːld͡ʒahli biʶfaʶdˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶliʶ aːlʕilmi waʁaflaaa aːlʔiihmaaːli biʶaʶːstiʶjqaʶaʶːðˤiʶ aːlmuʕaaːnaaːai waaːllaðijna hum lifuruwd͡ʒihim ħaʶaʶːfiʶðˤuʶwnaʶ hl ʔant mstʕd lhaːlwjn ln tsttˤjʕ ʔaj mn ʔad͡ʒhza aːlħaːswb aːlaːstmraːr fj aːlʕml mʕ btˤaʶːqaʶ mħrwqa ql kfaː baːllh ʃhjdaː bjnj wbjnkm ʔinh kaːn bʕbaːdh χbjraː bsˤjraʶː laː ʔaħd jtklm mʕj jnbʁj ʔan tkwn msʔuwlanaː ʕn ʔafʕaːlk laː jmkn td͡ʒnb nʃwb aːlħrwb maːdaːm aːlʃʕb dˤʕjf aːltʕljm aːlqhwau baːrdaun hj fχwra bʔind͡ʒaːzaːthaː bal raaːna ʕalaaː quluwbihim maaː kaaːnuwaː jaksibuwna jrħmk aːllh ljla aːlqdr χjr mn ʔalf ʃhr ʔant knta mdlll tʕrd͡ʒ aːlmlaːʔika waːlrwħ ʔiljh fj jwm kaːn mqdaːrh χmsjn ʔalf sna jaʶħuʶtˤtˤuʶ rid͡ʒaaːlun bajna ʔaaʕjunihim sˤuʶlbaʶaʶː waliðalika qijla jawma laaː juʁnij mawlanaː ʕan mawlanaː ʃajʔianaː walaaː hum juʶnsˤaʶruʶwnaʶ laː ʃkraːan lk hl sbq ʔank aːħbbt ʃχsˤaʶː laː jħbk hðaː jwm aʶːlfsˤl d͡ʒmʕnaːkm waːlʔawljn kaːn ʁrdˤ aːlrsaːla hw ʔiχbaːrhaː ʔanh kaːn mrjdˤaʶː walikulli qismin minhum manzilaaun min aːlbirri waʶaʶːlsˤsˤiʶlaʶaʶiʶ aːbtsm djmaː baːltʔakjd ʔant tmzħjn ldjhaː nbd fj wd͡ʒhhaː falillahi aːlʔaːχiraau waaːlʔauwlaaː lm ʔaðhb lʔan aːld͡ʒw sjʔ laː ʔaħb aːstχdaːm trd͡ʒma ʁwʁl sħb jdh mn aʶːltˤaʶːwlaʶ wamaaː ʔaadraaːka maaː ʕillijuwna trkthaː tðhb jd͡ʒb ʕlja ħfðˤ mnnaːd fʔalqj aːlsħra saːd͡ʒdjn maː hj mwaʶːsˤfaʶːth falazima liðalika ʔaan jaʶsˤriʶfaʶ aːlʔiinsaaːnu ʔilaaː dunjaaːhu ħaʶðˤðˤaʶnaʶː min ʕinaaːjatihi sjkwn aːsrʕ aːðaː ðhbnaː baːlmtrw ʔinna aːlddunjaaː kaθijraau aːlttaʁjijri ʔiirama ðaaːti aːlʕimaaːdi jaʕnij ʕaʃijraaan maaːniʕaaan wahuwa aːlχaaːmisu min ʔaasbaaːbi aːlʔaulfaai faliʔaannahu juʶwsˤiʶluʶ ʔilaaː aːlquluwbi ʔaʶaʶltˤaʶaʶːfaʶnaʶː wanaħnu laaː natuwbu ħattaaː namuwta laː aːχaːf aːlmwt fj fsˤl aːlχrjf tʁjr aːlʔawraːq ʔalwaːnhaː w ttsaʶːqtˤ faːlntfq ʕlaː ʔan nχtlf ql hw nbʔa ʕðˤjm fahija ʔaʶaʶwsaʶtˤuʶ rabbukum faaːttaquwni fʔaθrn bh nqʕaː aːlddunjaaː jawmaaːni nʕm ʕlaː aːlʔard͡ʒħ ʔanhaː swf tʔatj ʔilaː aːlmnzl lqd aːstʕaːd mħfðˤth aːlmsrwqa watawaqqijanaː min taʶsaʶlluʶtˤiʶ aːlʁurabaaːʔi aːlʔaad͡ʒaaːnibi ʔanaː mn aːlʔikwaːdwr tˤaʶːʕaʶ wqwl mʕrwf fʔiðaː ʕzm aːlʔamr flw sˤdqwaʶː aːllh lkaːn χjraː lhm qbrh hnaːk θm tqdm mnh wqaːl χð faːstfthm ʔalrbk aːlbnaːt wlhm aːlbnwn ʔattðkr aːlmra aːlssiri waaːlʕalaaːnijaai faːljwm laː tðˤlm nfs ʃjʔiaː wlaː td͡ʒzwn ʔilaː maː kntm tʕmlwn laː jsmʕwn fjhaː lʁwaː ʔilaː slaːmaː wlhm rzqhm fjhaː bkra wʕʃjaː faquwlaaː lahu qawlanaː lajjinanaː aːlzzamaaːni ʔiðaaː ʔaaqbala maliki aːlnnaaːsi jmkn llbd͡ʒʕa ʔan tstwʕb aːlkθjr mn aːlʔasmaːk fj mnqaːrhaː qwm frʕwn ʔalaː jtqwn ʔahlaː mn d͡ʒdjd dfʕt lh χmsa dwlaːraːt maːðaː ʕljj ʔan ʔaʶħdˤr laː tud͡ʒaːdil laː ʔazaːl raːʁba fj ʔan ʔand͡ʒb ʔaʶtˤfaʶːlaʶː aːhdʔa jaː bnj ʁrdt aʶːlʕsˤaʶːfjr θm d͡ʒʕlnaːkm χlaːʔif fj aʶːlʔaʶrdˤ mn bʕdhm lnnðˤr kjf tʕmlwn hm jstmʕwn llmðjaːʕ ʔan dʕwaː llrħmn wldaː wlm ʔadr maː ħsaːbjh aːlfnd͡ʒaːn ʕlj aʶːltˤaʶːwlaʶ twm laː jdrs aːlfrnsja aːlʔaːn jħlfwn lkm ltrdˤwaʶː ʕnhm fʔin trdˤwaʶː ʕnhm fʔin aːllh laː jrdˤaʶː ʕn aːlqwm aːlfaːsqjn jaː lh mn tsˤmjmiʶn d͡ʒmjl waqaaːla aːlħukamaaːʔu ʔanaː mθaːlj ʔanaː laː ʔaʕrf ʔilj ʔajn ʔanaː ðaːhb wlknj ʕlaː aʶːltˤrjq waʔaammaaː aːllluʁzu fahuwa taħarrij ʔaahli aːlfaraaːʁi waʃuʁlu ðawij aʶːlbaʶtˤaʶaʶːlaʶaʶiʶ ʔant d͡ʒmjlun ltdrjb aːlkmbjwtr ʕlaː aʶːlntˤq θumma huwa sˤiʶddiʶjquʶn ʔaaw ʕaduwwun ʔajd͡ʒb ʔan ʔaqwm bðlk ʕlaː aːlfwr ʔanaː ldj sˤdjq fj ʔind͡ʒltraː ʔabdanaː laː jfkkr twm baːlʔaːχrjn waʔiiðaaː marruwaː bihim jataʁaaːmazuwna ʔinhaː turjd aːlʔintqaːm ʔaʕdt lj kʕka hl d͡ʒwaːr ʔaħs twm bʃjʔ jzħf ʕlaː ðraːʕh nħb mn jtd͡ʒaːhlnaː wntd͡ʒaːhlu mn jħbnaː qaːmwaː btd͡ʒrba lmʕrfa maː aːðaː kaːn aːldwaːʔ qd ħsn aːlðaːkra wʔamh wʔabjh lijakfuruwaː bimaaː ʔaːtajnaaːhum fatamattaʕuwaː fasawfa taʕlamuwna sˤdq ʔaw laː tsˤdq fhj ldjhaː θlaːθa ʔabnaːʔ hl hðaː nhr aːmlʔa aːlzd͡ʒaːd͡ʒa maːʔaː mn fdˤlk ʔardtu ʔan ʔaʶtsˤl bika wlkn lm jkun ldja rqmk ʔanaː fuzt wʔaʕtðr ʕn rχsˤiʶ aːlhdj waʔaaððin fij aːlnnaaːsi biaːlħad͡ʒd͡ʒi jaʔatuwka rid͡ʒaaːlanaː waʕalaaː kulli dˤaʶaʶːmiʶriʶn jaʔatijna min kulli fad͡ʒd͡ʒin ʕamijqin waːʕbd rbk ħtaː jʔatjk aːljqjn faʶaʶːsˤbiʶr sˤaʶbraʶnaʶː d͡ʒamijlaː man ʔaanti faqaaːlat jaː ljtnj ʕndj ʔaʶsˤdqaʶːʔ kθr waaːlqamara qaddarnaaːhu manaaːzila ħattaaː ʕaaːda kaaːlʕurd͡ʒuwni aːlqadijmi ʔaʶaʶbsˤaʶaʶːruʶhaʶaʶː χaaːʃiʕaaun ljs hnaːk ʔaj mʃaːkl ħattaaː laaː taʶtˤmaʶħaʶ lahu ʕajnun lirijbaain walaaː tunaaːziʕahu nafsun ʔilaaː fud͡ʒuwrin faʶtˤaʶaʶːfaʶ ʕalajhaaː tˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶfuʶn mmin rrabika wahum naaːʔiimuwna latarkabunna tˤaʶbaʶqaʶnaʶː ʕan tˤaʶbaʶqiʶn saʔaalathu lmaːðaː kaːn jbkj ʔaʶaʶtˤtˤaʶlaʶʕaʶ aːlʁajba ʔaami aːttaχaða ʕinda aːlrraħmani ʕahdanaː wwfjt kl nfs maː ʕmlt whw ʔaʕlm bmaː jfʕlwn lqd ʕlqt fj aːzdħaːm mrwrj faqad jarʕawij man laaː jarwij waːlʃʕraːʔ jtbʕhm aːlʁaːwwn ʔiinna ʔiibraaːhijma laħalijmun ʔaawwaaːhun munijbun ʔant tðkrnj bʔaχjk baːltaːlj swf ʔaʶdˤtˤruʶ llqaːʔi hnaː kjfa kaːnt aːlmdrsa aːljwm waʔaammaaː aːlssaaːkinu faradijʔun ʔanaː hnaː mn ʔad͡ʒlk wmaː tsʔalhm ʕljh mn ʔad͡ʒr ʔin hw ʔilaː ðkr llʕaːlmjn waʔaawfuwaː aːlkajla ʔiiðaaː kiltum wazinuwaː biʶaʶːlqiʶstˤaʶaʶːsiʶ aːlmustaqijmi ðalika χajrun waʔaaħsanu taʔawijlanaː ʔaajjumaaː ʔaʶaʶfdˤaʶluʶ aːlmaaːlu ʔaam aːlʕilmu faqaaːla fawidaaːduhu χaʶtˤaʶruʶn waʔiiχaaːʔuuhu ʁararun aːmzħ falammaaː raʔaawhaaː qaaːluwaː ʔiinnaaː laʶdˤaʶaʶːlluʶwnaʶ maaː ʔaurijdu minhum min rizqin wamaaː ʔaurijdu ʔaan juʶtˤʕiʶmuʶwniʶ hl zwd͡ʒtk tˤbaʶːχaʶ maːhra fj ʔajaːmnaː hðh bʔimkaːn ʔaj waːħd ʔan jħsˤl ʕlaː aːlktb ʔajmknnk ʔan twsˤlnj ʔilaː aʶːlmħtˤaʶ ʔanaː lbst ħðaːʔ aʶːldˤjf χamsun χuðuwhunna ʕannij falaw rakibtum aːlfulka maaː wad͡ʒadtumuwhunna ʔillaaː ʕindij fasad͡ʒada aːlmalaaːʔiikaau kulluhum ʔaad͡ʒmaʕuwna kalaːaːa ʔiinnahaaː laʶðˤaʶaʶː twm laː jħtrm maːrjjaː tˤrd saːmj ljlaː mn aːlbjt tfdˤl baːld͡ʒlws mn fdˤlk waʔaaraaːhu χaʶtˤtˤaʶ ʕubajdi aːlllahi waqaaːla lahu lmaːð hrb wsaːrʕwaː ʔilaː mʁfra mn rbkm wd͡ʒna ʕrdˤhaʶː aːlsmaːwaːt waʶːlʔaʶrdˤ ʔaʕdt llmtqjn aːlnaːs jʕjʃwn fj d͡ʒmjʕ ʔanħaːʔ aːlʕaːlm hl qblt dʕwth aʶːntðˤr lħðˤaʶ kl ʃχsˤ ldjh dˤʕf wqwa waʔiiðanaː qad lazima min haðajni aːlwad͡ʒhajni sabru aːlʔiiχwaaːni qabla ʔiχaaːʔiihim waqad qaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi qaddim liħaaːd͡ʒatik baʶʕdˤaʶ lad͡ʒaaːd͡ʒatik faħurraaːsuhu fij aːlssamaaːʔi aːlmalaaːʔiikaau waʔiinnahu laðikrun laka waliqawmika wasawfa tusʔaaluwna ʔaafasiħrun haðaaː ʔaam ʔaantum laaː tuʶbsˤiʶruʶwnaʶ biʔaajjjikumu aːlmaftuwnu fkjf ttqwn ʔin kfrtm jwmaː jd͡ʒʕl aːlwldaːn ʃjbaː maːðaː stfʕlwn bkl hðaː aːlmaːl liʔaannahu jaruwmu miθlahu aʶːlʃrtˤaʶ tbħθ ʕnnj ql lj kjf ʕlmta ʔaʶsˤbħ twm btˤlaʶː ʔaːh maːðaː ʕsaːnj ʔan ʔafʕl fj ħaːla khðh aːlħqjqa hj d͡ʒmjla bdwn ʃk wlkn ħtaː hj aːlʔakaːðjb lm ʔakn ʔarjd ʔan ʔaqwl ʃjʔiaː faʔaaχrad͡ʒnaaː man kaaːna fijhaaː mina aːlmuʔuminijna lajsa lahaaː min duwni aːlllahi kaaːʃifaaun waaːliaːntiqaaːla min aːlmaχbuwri ʔilaaː ʁajrihi χaʶtˤaʶruʶn ʔanaː lstu qlqaːan kθjraːan bʃʔan sjrtj aːlðaːtja laː d͡ʒrm ʔanhm fj aːlʔaːχra hm aːlʔaχsrwn χsr wðˤjfth wqaːlwaː ʔin hj ʔilaː ħjaːtnaː aːldnjaː wmaː nħn bmbʕwθjn wabiaːlllajli ʔaafalaaː taʕqiluwna mn ʔad͡ʒl maːðaː ʔatjta ʔilaː hnaː wamin ʃarri aːlnnafaaːθaaːti fij aːlʕuqadi faːðkrwnj ʔaðkrkm waːʃkrwaː lj wlaː tkfrwn twqf ʕn dˤrb ʔaχjk aːwraːq aːlʃd͡ʒr ttʁjr lwnhaː waaːlrraaːbiʕu aːlʃʃahwaau aːllatij jaduwmu bihaaː aʶːltˤtˤaʶlaʶbuʶ walaaː jusriʕu ʔilajhi aːlmalalu waʔaablaʁu min ðalika qawlu ʕijsaaː aːbni marjama ʕalaaː nabijjinaaː waʕalajhi aːlssalaaːmu laː jwd͡ʒd ʔaj ʃjʔ mdʕaːa llfχr waʔaaʃhada fijhi naaːsanaː minhum ʕumaru bnu aʶːlχaʶtˤtˤaʶaʶːbiʶ twm jrjd mnj ʔan ʔastqjl mn hðh aʶːlwðˤjfaʶ aːktʃf aːlflkjaːn haːbl w hjwmaːsn ʔann ʔaʁlbhaː ttħrk bʕjdaː ʕnaː waʔaammaaː man ʔaːmana waʕamila sˤaʶaʶːliʶħaʶnaʶː falahu d͡ʒazaaːʔan aːlħusnaaː wasanaquwlu lahu min ʔaamrinaaː jusranaː man d͡ʒaaːʔa biaːlħasanaai falahu χajrun minhaaː wahum min fazaʕin jawmaʔiiðin ʔaːminuwna jd͡ʒb ʕlaː aːlmstʔad͡ʒr dfʕ aːlaːjd͡ʒaːr llmaːlk fj nhaːja kl ʃhr wamaaː jaχtalifu min ʔaaħwaaːli aːlʔaːmirijna bihi waaːlnnaaːhijna ʕanhu aːlðjn jd͡ʒʕlwn mʕ aːllh ʔilhaː ʔaːχr fswf jʕlmwn kaːn twm dktwr d͡ʒaːmʕj liʔaannahu ʕalaaː aːlqalijli ʔaaqdaru ðhbt ʔamj lltbdˤʕ waaːttaquwaː aːlnnaaːra aːllatij ʔauʕiddat lilkaaːfirijna walillahi mulku aːlssamaaːwaaːti waʶaʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤiʶ wajawma taquwmu aːlssaaːʕaau jawmaʔiiðin jaχsaru aʶːlmuʶbtˤiʶluʶwnaʶ ʔið jʁʃaː aːlsdra maː jʁʃaː ʕalaaː sururin mutaqaaːbilijna fðkr ʔin nfʕt aːlðkraː ltrkbn tˤbqaʶː ʕn tˤbq ʃkraːan ldʕwtki lj ʔilaː aːlħfla d͡ʒʕlnaːh sˤħjħ maːðaː tʕtqd ʔaʶfdˤl tˤrjqaʶ ltswja hðaː aːlnzaːʕ fajanbaʁij liman bulija bihi ʔaan jastadrika taʶqsˤiʶjraʶhuʶ bikaθraai aːlddarsi waʶjuʶwqiʶðˤaʶ ʁaflatahu biʔiidaaːmaai aʶːlnnaʶðˤaʶriʶ waʔiinnamaaː kaaːna ðalika kaðalika waʔiimmaaː min balaaːdatihi waqillaai fahmihi ʔaħbk wʔarjd aːlzwaːd͡ʒ mʕk hl hðaː d͡ʒdjd wlaː tqwlwaː lmn jqtl fj sbjl aːllh ʔamwaːt bl ʔaħjaːʔ wlkn laː tʃʕrwn mnnaːd jdˤaʶːd͡ʒʕ baːja waːtqwaː aːllh wlaː tχzwn qaaːluwaː ʔiinnaaː ʔiilaaː rabbinaaː munqalibuwna bħbk jaːʕmraː aːnaː aːrjd aʶːlwsˤwl lk smsm mʁrb sˤbaʶːbaʶː ʔiʶtsˤltuʶ ʕljhaː msaːʔ ʔams wlknhaː lm tarud lm jtˤmθhn ʔins qblhm wlaː d͡ʒaːn lswʔ aʶːlħðˤ kaːn ʔilaː ħd maː btˤjʔ aːlaːstjʕaːb tħml aːlfʔiraːn aʶːltˤaʶːʕwn ljs mhmaːan tˤwaʶː twm aːlwrqa qbl ʔan jʕtˤjhaʶː lmaːrj faʔaawwalu ħuquwqihi aʶːlsˤsˤaʶħiʶjħiʶ min ħuruwfihaaː ʔiinna aːllaðijna aːttaqawaː ʔiiðaaː massahum tˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶfuʶn mina aʶːlʃʃaʶjtˤaʶaʶːniʶ taðakkaruwaː faʔiiðaaː hum muʶbsˤiʶruʶwnaʶ aːlmslmwn jʔumnwn ʔan mħmmdaː rswl mn aːllh mn fdˤlk aːinsχ hðh aʶːlsˤfħaʶ fakaaːna haðaaː aːlssuʔuaaːlu min saaːʔiilihi ʔimmaaː aːχtibaaːranaː qrrraː saːmj w ljlaː qdˤaʶːʔ bʕdˤ aːlwqt aːlmtmjjz lwħdjhmaː hl stmtˤr ʁdaːan waminhaaː maaː ħurima min manaaːfiʕi maaːlihi wasuliba min wufuwri ħaaːlihi maː jubaddalu aːlqawlu ladajja wamaː ʔaanaː biʶðˤaʶllaʶːmiʶn lilʕabjdi faʔiinna qalba aːlʔaaʕjaaːni sˤaʶʕbuʶ aːlmaraaːmi waqaaːla aʶːlʔaʶaʶsˤmaʶʕiʶjjuʶ faʔaammaaː aːlqaaːʕidaau aːlθθaaːliθaau waʔaammaaː aːlnnazaaːhaau fanawʕaaːni ʔaaħaduhumaaː aːlnnazaaːhaau ʕan aʶːlmaʶtˤaʶaʶːmiʶʕiʶ aːlddanijaai waaːstiʁnaaːʔan bimaaː jabʕaθu ʕalajhi aʶːltˤtˤaʶbʕuʶ fj ʔaajji sˤwraʶaʶiʶn maː ʃaːʔa rakkabaka waʶːsˤlt aʶːlʃʃrtˤaʶ aʶːlaʶːntðˤaʶːr jd͡ʒb ʔan ʔaltqj btwm waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlʔaudabaaːʔi ʁaʶdˤaʶbuʶ aːld͡ʒaaːhili fij qawlihi waʶʁaʶdˤaʶbuʶ aːlʕaaːqili fij fiʕlihi bkm aːlsaːʕa jd͡ʒb ʔan laː tnaːm ʔaajjuhaaː aːlʔaamijru ʔinnahu qad tabaaːʕada fij aʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤiʶ fjhaː sururun marfwʕaaun ʔiðaː nuʶsˤiʶraʶ aːlrʔaj btˤl aːlhwaː ʔiðaː habaat rjaːħk faːʁtnmhaː aːlwlaːjaːt aːlmtħda ʔaħd ʔakbr aːlmnaːhl lltqdm ʕbr taːrjχ aːlʕaːlm waaːlmawtu jaaː ʔaaʕraaːbijju mimman ʔaanta faqaaːla waʔiinna aːlddjna lawaːqiʕun ʔaraːq maːʔ wd͡ʒhh wajad͡ʒibu ʔaan jakuwna maħduwdanaː kaaːlssaχaaːʔi faʔiinnahu ʔin ʔaasrafa fijhi kaaːna maliqanaː maðmuwmanaː ʕan ʔaabij saʕijdin waaːlʔaawwalu ʔaaʃbahu aːlθθaʕlabu jaʔakulu aːlddad͡ʒaaːd͡ʒa ʔaχbrthaː ʔilaː ʔajn snðhb ħattaaː aʶːnsˤaʶraʶfaʶ ʕan ruʃdihi faʁawaaː sˤfʕ aːlmdrrs mʔuχχrtj aːlʕql ʁrjza trbjhaː aːltd͡ʒaːrb lqd ʔaʶʕtˤaʶː dmh lkaː jsaːʕd ʔaχth kaːn aːlmdrrs msˤdwmaʶ waqaaːla ʕalijju bnu ʔaabij tˤaʶaʶːliʶbiʶn karrama aːlllahu wad͡ʒhahu aːlddunjaaː kallun ʕalaaː aːlʕaaːqili waaːlrrud͡ʒuwʕi ʔilaaː aːlllahi ʕazza wad͡ʒalla fij ʔaːdaaːbihi lijakuwna ʔaawqaʕa fij aːlnnufuwsi waʔaasbaqa ʔilaaː aːlʔaafhaaːmi qad χalaʕt aːlddunjaaː fakajfa saχat nafsuk ʕanhaaː faqaaːla kaːnt ljlaː tʕtqd ʔann saːmj hw ʔaʶfdˤl ʃjʔ fj ħjaːthaː laː ʔaħd jʕlm mn ʔajn ʔataː ðlk aːlklb fanuzulun min ħamjmin wamuħaaːwaratuhu taʕarrin sˤrχt tˤaʶːlbaʶ aːlmsaːʕda kaːn θmma rd͡ʒl ʔaːχr fj ħjaːa ljlaː wakamaaː qaaːla aːlmutalammisu waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlbulaʁaaːʔi ʔaaʕdaaːʔuuk daaːʔuuk wafij aːlbuʕdi ʕanhum ʃifaaːʔuuk waaːlθθaaːnij min ʔaasbaaːbihi aːlqudraau ʕalaaː aʶːliʶaʶːntiʶsˤaʶaʶːriʶ waðalika min saʕaai aʶːlsˤsˤaʶdriʶ waħusni aːlθθiqaai ʔakrhk waʕad͡ʒibt liman qijla fijhi aːlʃʃaru wahuwa fijhi kajfa jaʶʁdˤaʶbuʶ lm ʔatχrd͡ʒ bʕd aːilʕab biaːlkuraai qaaːla faʔiin lam jakun qaaːla famaaːlun jataħabbabu bihi ʔilaaː aːlnnaaːsi ʕljk ʔan laː trkn sjaːrtk fj hðaː aːlʃaːrʕ waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi χajru aːlʕulamaaːʔi man laaː juqillu walaaː jumillu waʔaawfaaː farʕanaː laː tns aːstʕmaːl ʕbaːraːt mn fdˤlk w ʃkraː faʶljaʶħfaʶðˤ kullu aːmriʔiin miftaaːħa sirrihi ln ʔans ʔabdaː aːlttd͡ʒrba aːltj ʕʃthaː aːlbaːrħa bismi aːlllahi aːlrraħmni aːlrraħjmi ʔaalhaːkumu aːlttakaːθuru hw ʔaqrb tˤlb saːmj mn ljlaː ʔan ttrkh w ʃʔanh tmaːmaː waʔiiðaː qjla lahum taʕaːlawaː jastaʁfir lakum raswlu aːlllahi lawwawaː ruʔwsahum waraʔaajtahum jaʶsˤuʶddwnaʶ wahum mustakbirwna waʶðˤaʶnnaʶ ʔaannahu litad͡ʒaaːfij aːlnnaaːsi ʕanhu ħimanaː juttaqaaː kaːn saːmj jsbb faʔaaqbalati aːmraʔaatuhu fj sˤaʶrraʶaʶiʶn faʶsˤaʶkkaʶt wad͡ʒhahaː waqaːlat ʕad͡ʒwzun ʕaqjmun maːðaː ttwqʕ ʔan td͡ʒd hnaː ħd͡ʒ waːlnaːs raːd͡ʒʕwn waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi bqja saːmj fj mktbh tˤwaʶːl aːljwm aʶːntðˤr saːmj lsnwaːt ʔaʶqtˤʕ wʕdaː bʔanj sʔatrk aːltdχjn aːltd͡ʒaːrb ljst lhaː nhaːja waːlmrʔ mnhaː fj zjaːda laː jaʶstaʶtˤjʕwnaʶ naʶsˤraʶhuʶm wahum lahum d͡ʒundun muʶħdˤaʶrwnaʶ qaaːla sˤaʶllaʶaʶː aːlllahu ʕalajhi wasallama mnzl waːldjk bʕd d͡ʒddaː kam bajna aːlssamaaːʔi waʶaʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤiʶ qaaːla aʶːlʔiʶnfsˤaʶːljwn ln jsˤlwaʶː ʔilaː ʃjʔi warawaaː d͡ʒaʕfaru bnu muħammadin tʕqqbt aʶːlʃʃrtˤaʶ saːmj waaːlkaffu ʕanhu mutaaːrakaaan ʔaaʁnamu kallaː ʔiinna kitaːba aːlʔaabraːri lafj ʕillijjna lm tstħq ljlaː ʔan tmwt bhðh aʶːltˤtˤrjqaʶ aːlθθamaru jaʶtaʶsaʶaʶːqaʶtˤuʶ ʕalaaː aʶːlʔaʶrdˤiʶ kaːnt ldjj ʕlaːqa sˤdaʶːqaʶ d͡ʒjjda mʕ mdrrsj wahadathu aːlmaraaːʃidu ʔilaaː aːstiʕmaaːli aʶːlsˤsˤaʶwaʶaʶːbiʶ wahum liðalika manduwbuwna wamakruwhin ʕasirin ʔatlʕb aːltns rmmm saːmj mnzlh waqaaːla ʕabdu aːlllahi bnu masʕuwdin aːlmustaʁnij ʕan aːlddunjaaː biaːlddunjaaː kaʶmuʶtˤfiʶʔiʶiʶ aːlnnaaːri biaːlttibni waqad rawaaː muħammadu bnu aːlmunkadiri ʕan d͡ʒaaːbirin ʔaanna aːlnnabija sˤaʶllaʶaʶː aːlllahu ʕalajhi wasallama qaaːla qaːla laː taʶχtaʶsˤiʶmwaʶː ladajja waqad qaddamtu ʔiilajkum biaːlwaʕjdi aːntql llʕjʃ hnaː waʔaamdadnaːhum bifaːkihaain walaħmin mimmaː jaʃtahwna walikulli qawmin muʶwaʶaʶːdˤaʶʕaʶaʶuʶn stħsˤd maːrj qmħhaː fj tmwz maː kll hðaː aːlħmd llh rbb aːlʕaːlmjn wawahabnaː lidaːwwda sulajmaːna niʕma aːlʕabdu ʔiinnahu ʔaawwaːbun lm jsˤddq ʔaħd qsˤsˤth walaː jamliku aːllaðjna jadʕwna min dwnihi aːlʃʃafaːʕaaa ʔiillaː man ʃahida biaːlħaqqi wahum jaʕlamwna liquwwaai ʃahawaaːtihim ħmja aːlkjtw nðˤaʶːm ʁðaːʔija ttnaːwl fjh kmja kbjra mn aːldhwn waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlʔaudabaaːʔi man ʕarafa maʕaaːbahu falaaː jalum man ʕaaːbahu walaaː dawlaaun lak min ʔiðaaːlaain mink kullu ʃajʔin ʔiðaaː kaθura raʶχuʶsˤaʶ ʔillaaː aːlʕaqla faʔiinnahu ʔiðaaː kaθura ʁalaaː ħððrthaː mn aːlmd͡ʒjʔ ʔilaː hnaː biʃukrihaaː lillahi fij tˤaʶjjiʶ aːlmakaaːrihi kaaːminah waminhaaː jzn aʶːltˤrd ʔakθr mn baːwnd mn aːχtrʕ aːlhaːtf jasurrunij ʔaanna aːlzzuhraaa naʶaʶːdˤiʶraʶaʶuʶn maː kaðaba aːlfuʔuaːdu maː raʔaaː naʶðˤaʶrtuʶ waqad baaːnat fawallaaː aːlʔaaʕraaːbijju wahuwa jaquwlu fajastad͡ʒidda min salwaai aːlʔaasaaː waħusni aːlʕazaaː maaː juχaffifu ʃad͡ʒwahu ʔinnhaː mʕd͡ʒba bk kθjraː kaːn saːmj jfkkr fj ħjaːth lm jkn saːmj jʕlm lmaːðaː trkth ljlaː jaaː bunajja laaː taʶtˤluʶb aːlħawaaːʔiid͡ʒa min ʁajri ʔaahlihaaː mdd saːmj jdh lljlaː waraʔajuhu maʕluwlanaː aːllaðjna ʔaːmanwaː biʔaːjaːtinaː wakaːnwaː muslimjna ʔaaħsanu aːlkalaaːmi maaː laaː juħtaaːd͡ʒu fijhi ʔilaaː aːlkalaaːmi ʔaaj jaktafij biaːlfiʕli min aːlqawli laaː tasʔaal aːlmarʔa ʕan χalaaːʔiiqihi fij wad͡ʒhihi ʃaaːhidun min aːlχabari fasimaau aːlχajri aːlddaʕaau waaːlħajaaːʔu waʔaaʃbaaːhihi min aːldduhaaːai man ʔauʕd͡ʒiba biraʔajihi lam juʃaaːwir hl wd͡ʒdt maː knt tbħθ ʕnh waʔiilaaː aʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤiʶ kajfa suʶtˤiʶħaʶt aʶːltˤtˤaʶriʶjqaʶaʶuʶ dˤaʶjjiʶqaʶaʶuʶn wamaː ʔaadraːka maː lajlaau aːlqadri waðalika liaːstiħkaaːmi aːlʕadaaːwaai bajnahumaaː biaːlmubaaːjanaai waħuduwθi aːliaːntiqaaːmi liʔaad͡ʒali aːlttaqadumi ʔanaː mʕk fj hðaː qaaːla rasuwlu aːlllahi sˤaʶllaʶaʶː aːlllahu ʕalajhi wasallama ʔant hw ħjaːtj jaː bnjj hl bʔimkaːnj aːlqjaːm bʃjʔ laː laː bʔas sʔaʶnðˤðˤfh ʔanaː wajumdidkum biʔaamwaːlin wabanjna wajad͡ʒʕal lakum d͡ʒannaːtin wajad͡ʒʕal lakum ʔaanhaːranaː faʔiinna qurraaa ʕujuwni aːlkiraaːmi fij aʶːlʔiʶiʶʕtˤaʶaʶːʔiʶ wasuruwra aːllliʔiaaːmi fij aːlʔaaχði qaʶtˤaʶfaʶ muħammadun zahraaan laː jastawj ʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶːbuʶ aːlnnaːri waʶʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶːbuʶ aːld͡ʒannaai ʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶːbuʶ aːld͡ʒannaai humu aːlfaːʔiizwna aʶːlmuʶwaʶaʶːdˤaʶʕaʶaʶuʶ waʶaʶːlʔiʶiʶsˤlaʶaʶːħuʶ mtaː tzwd͡ʒt man bariʔia min θalaaːθin naaːla θalaaːθanaː walaqad zajjanaaː aːlssamaːʔa aːlddunjaː biʶmaʶsˤaʶːbjħaʶ wad͡ʒaʕalnaːhaː rud͡ʒwmanaː liʶlʃʃaʶjaʶːtˤjniʶ waʔaaʕtadnaː lahum ʕaðaːba aːlssaʕjri waminhaaː maaː jaʶðˤhaʶruʶ biaːlfiʕli wajaχfaaː biaːlttaʁaaːfuli waʶːdˤħ ʔannh mðnb wakaaːna maaː taχallala kitaaːbahu min qaʶsˤaʶsˤiʶ aːlʔaanbijaaːʔi aːlssaaːlifaai twqqf saːmj ʕn tqdjm aːlʕlaːd͡ʒ lljlaː mħaːwlaː ʔan jqtlhaː maːðaː knt tfʕl waʶlwtˤaʶnaʶː ʔiið qaːla liqawmihi ʔaataʔatwna aːlfaːħiʃaaa waʔaantum tuʶbsˤiʶrwnaʶ ʕljk ʔan tdʕh jrbħ ʔaħjaːnaː aʶːuʶnðˤuʶr man kaaːna minhum lajsa rizquhu ʕalaaː aːlllahi ʕazza wad͡ʒalla faħawwilhu ʔilaaː manzilij ʔiinnaː kaðlika nad͡ʒzij aːlmuħsinjna dχlt aːlssd͡ʒn bsbb sˤfʕj lljlaː kjf wd͡ʒdt aʶːlmnðˤr aʶːlmtˤl mn aːlfndq wad͡ʒihaaːtu aːlmakaaːsibi mutaʃaʕʕibaaun man ʔaʶaʶsˤbaʶħaʶ aʶːlðˤðˤaʶniʶ binafsihi ʔaanna kulla waaːħidin minhum jad͡ʒidu sabijlanaː ʔilaaː nafji aːlʔiiðaaːʕaai ʕan nafsihi quʶtˤiʶʕaʶt aːlħablu biaːlssakajni mtaː ʕjd mjlaːd saːmj tm aːthaːm twm aːlʃhr bihi ʔauwlaʔiika humu aːlmuttaquwna lm jkn ʕljh fʕl hðaː ʔilaː aʶːlmsˤljn faʶaʶːlllaʶfðˤuʶ kalaaːmun juʕqalu biaːlssamʕi waaːlmaʕnaaː taħta aʶːlllaʶfðˤiʶ jufhamu biaːlqalbi hnaːk ħdwd bjn ʔamrjkaː rabbika lajaquwlunna jaaː wajlanaaː ʔiinnaaː kunnaaː ðˤaʶaʶːliʶmiʶjnaʶ waʔiinna luʶwtˤaʶnaʶː lamina aːlmursalijna qlaːda mn aːlmaːs mn jtˤʕ aːlrswl fqd ʔaʶtˤaʶːʕ aːllh wmn twlaː fmaː ʔarslnaːk ʕljhm aʶːlqaʶaʶːsiʶtˤuʶwnaʶ faman ʔaaslama faʔauwlaʔiika taħarrawaː raʃadanaː aʶːlʃʃaʶjtˤaʶaʶːnuʶ jaʕidukumu aːlfaqra wajaʔamurukum biaːlfaħʃaaːʔi waaːlllahu jaʕidukum maʁfiraaan minhu waʶfaʶdˤlaʶnaʶː waaːlllahu waaːsiʕun ʕalijmun kaðalika aːlʕaðaaːbu walaʕaðaaːbu aːlʔaːχiraai ʔaakbaru law kaaːnuwaː jaʕlamuwna ʔarslwk ʔilaː hnaː lttd͡ʒss ʕljnaː waʔaammaaː man d͡ʒaaːʔaka jasʕaaː kl maː kaːn jrjdh twm ħqaːan ktn mkaːn lld͡ʒlws waːlraːħa waqad ruwija ʔaanna rad͡ʒulanaː ʔaataaː ʔilaaː aːlnnabiji sˤaʶllaʶaʶː aːlllahu ʕalajhi wasallama faqaaːla waruwija ʕan aːlnnabiji sˤaʶllaʶaʶː aːlllahu ʕalajhi wasallama ʔaannahu qaaːla liʔaabij ðarrin ʔinhu ʁaʶːdˤb mʕki waqad qaaːla fij ðalika aːlʃʃaaːʕiru ʔið dχlwaː ʕljh fqaːlwaː slaːmaː qaːl slaːm qwm mnkrwn ʕafaaː aːlllahu ʕanka lima ʔaaðinta lahum ħattaaː jatabajjana laka aːllaðijna sˤaʶdaʶquʶwaʶː wataʕlama aːlkaaːðibijna waqaaːla aːlħasanu aʶːlbaʶsˤriʶjjuʶ raħmaau aːlllahi ʕalajhi bʔimkaːnk ʔan tʔaχð kl maː trjd jaaː ʔaabaaː saʕijdin ʔin rbhm bhm jwmʔið lχbjr wd͡ʒʕlnaː fj aʶːlʔaʶrdˤ rwaːsj ʔan tmjd bhm wd͡ʒʕlnaː fjhaː fd͡ʒaːd͡ʒaː sblaː lʕlhm jhtdwn hl jʔakl twm aːllħm waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi aːld͡ʒaaːhilu jaʕtamidu ʕalaaː ʔaamalihi waaːlʕaaːqilu jaʕtamidu ʕalaaː ʕamalihi laː ʔaʃaːrk rʔajk aːllaðij d͡ʒaʕala maʕa aːlllahi ʔiilahanaː ʔaːχara faʔaalqijaaːhu fij aːlʕaðaaːbi aːlʃʃadijdi laː ʔarjd aːlbkaːʔ ʔamaːmhaː ʔaʶʕtˤnj qaːrwra mn aːlʔanmj aːlðj jrtdwnhaː jrwqwnnj wajawma nabʕaθu min kulli ʔaummaain ʃahijdanaː θumma laaː juʔuðanu lillaðijna kafaruwaː walaaː hum justaʕtabuwna wamaaː kaaːna rabbuka lijuhlika aːlquraaː biʶðˤuʶlmiʶn waʔaahluhaaː muʶsˤliʶħuʶwnaʶ laː tqlq ʔanaː ln ʔaqwl llʃrtˤaʶ hnaːk wqt lkl ʃjʔ ʁdaː swf ʔalʕb kra aːlqdm kl aːllħm waaːlmawaddaau waʶaʶːsiʶtˤaʶaʶuʶn bajna aːlχallaaːbaai waħusni aːlχuluqi wʔanh hw ʔamaːt wʔaħjaː waʶʔaʶaʶfdˤaʶluʶhuʶmaʶaʶː man kaaːna kaaːlʁiðaaːʔi liʔaanna aːlħaaːd͡ʒaaa ʔilajhi ʔaaʕammu kn nfsk qaːl ʔalm ʔaql ʔink ln tsttˤjʕ mʕj sˤbraʶː wanaraaːhu qarijbanaː waʶaʶːnsˤaʶraʶfaʶ ʕank aːlħabijbu bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm aːlrħmn aːljwm hnaːk brd tlk aːldaːr aːlʔaːχra nd͡ʒʕlhaː llðjn laː jrjdwn ʕlwaː fj aʶːlʔaʶrdˤ wlaː fsaːdaː waːlʕaːqba llmtqjn waqad rawaaː ʕumaru bnu ʕabdi aːlʕazijzi ʕan aːbni ʕabbaaːsin raʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːlllahu ʕanhumaaː qaaːla hw rd͡ʒl mdˤħk faʔaaraaːda ʔaan jastafizzahum mina aʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤiʶ faʔaaʁraqnaaːhu waman maʕahu d͡ʒamijʕanaː sjqwlwn llh ql fʔanaː tsħrwn ʔataː saːmj ʔilaː hnaː maː χtˤbkiʶ aːljwm maːrj aːlssamaaːʔu muʶnfaʶtˤiʶruʶn bihi kaaːna waʕduhu mafʕuwlanaː laaː sijjamaaː waaːlχaaːʔiifu ʕalaaː aːlʃʃajʔi muʶχtaʶsˤsˤuʶ jaʶnðˤuʶruʶwnaʶ ʔiillaaː aːlssaaːʕaaa ʔaan taʔatijahum baʁtaaan wahum laaː jaʃʕuruwna aʶːlqdˤjb hw ʔaħd ʔaʶʕdˤaʶːʔ aːld͡ʒhaːz aːltnaːslj aːlðkrj nfwsun ʔabaːaun wmaʶːdˤiʶn md͡ʒjd wrwħu aʶːlʔaʶdˤaʶːħj aːlttisʕaaa fahuwa ʔaasʕadu tˤaʶaʶːliʶbiʶn waʔaand͡ʒaħu mutaʕallimin tχrd͡ʒt fj aʶːlʔiʶqtsˤaʶːd wamafsadaaa dahrin wajantaqilu bitanaqquli aːlʔiinsaaːni waaːlʔaazmaaːni hw jħjj wjmjt wʔiljh trd͡ʒʕwn hj laː tsttˤjʕ aːlsbaːħa baʶːldˤbtˤ θullaaun mina aːlʔaawwalijna ʔaʕtqd ʔannaː jd͡ʒb ʔan nfʕl aːlmzjd ʔanaː ʔaːsf jaː mħmd lqd nsjt aːsmk wajakθuru maʕahu aːlnnaslu aːld͡ʒmjʕ kaːnwaː mtħmsjn baːlrsaːla waqaaːla ʕabdu aːlħamijdi aːlbajaaːnu fij aːlllisaaːni waʶaʶːlχaʶtˤtˤuʶ fij aːlbanaaːni ʔilaː maː ʃaːʔ aːllh ʔinh jʕlm aːld͡ʒhr wmaː jχfaː ʔimmaː ʔan tʔaχð aʶːlsˤndwq aːlkbjr ʔaw aʶːlsˤʁjr ʔiqtrbj ʔajthaː aːlnʁma qaːla sˤaʶdaʶqtaʶ qaːla faʕad͡ʒibnaː lahu jasʔaaluhu waʶjuʶsˤaʶddiʶquʶhuʶ fqaːl lh dˤjfh kaːn d͡ʒw aʶːlʕaʶːsˤfaʶ rhjbaː jwm laː jnfʕ maːl wlaː bnwn walajsa jaχluw aːlssababu waʶbiʶʔiʶiʶχlaʶaʶːsˤiʶ aːlnnijaai taqillu aːlððunuwbu tktb lj mraan kl ʃhr ʔinna aːlllaha taʕaaːlaaː laaː jaʶrdˤaʶaʶː ʕan χalqihi ʔillaaː bitaʔadijaai ħaqqihi ksr twm zd͡ʒaːd͡ʒ aːlnaːfða ʔanaː ʔaʃtrj waχajruhu hl tʕtqdjn ʔan twm sjʔatj kaaːtib aʶːlrraʶdˤiʶjiʶ qul ʔaaraʔaajtum ʔiin ʔaʶaʶsˤbaʶħaʶ maaːʔuukum ʁawranaː faman jaʔatijkum bimaaːʔin maʕijnin χð maː tħtaːd͡ʒ mn aːlwqt fahumaaː ʃajʔiaaːni biʔaːjaaːtinaaː waʔaanfusahum kaaːnuwaː jaʶðˤliʶmuʶwnaʶ waʔaanʃadanij baʶʕdˤuʶ ʃujuwχinaaː limasijħi bni ħaaːtimin liʔaanna fij aːlʕuqalaaːʔi waaːlʕulamaaːʔi qillaaan waʕalajhim min faʶdˤliʶhiʶm simaaun rb aːlsmaːwaːt waʶːlʔaʶrdˤ wmaː bjnhmaː ʔin kntm mwqnjn hm jtˤaʶːlbwn bsaːʕaːt ʕml ʔaql waʶaʶːsˤbiʶr liħukmi rabbika faʔiinnaka biʔaaʕjuninaaː wasabbiħ biħamdi rabbika ħijna taquwmu mwdˤwʕnaʶː hðaː aːlʔasbwʕ hw walaaː taʶqsˤiʶjriʶn ʕanhaaː wamaaː huwa biaːlhazli faʔaaθarna bihi naqʕanaː waqawluhu kalaaːbisi θawbaj zuwrin huwa aːllaðij jalbasu θijaaːba aʶːlsˤsˤuʶlaʶħaʶaʶːʔiʶ walaqad waʔaaχχara aːlddijnu aʶːlnnaʶsˤiʶjħaʶaʶuʶ qulnaaː liman qaːla maːðaː jqwl aːlrd͡ʒl ʔiinna rabbaka huwa ʔaaʕlamu biman dˤaʶllaʶ ʕan sabijlihi wahuwa ʔaaʕlamu biaːlmuhtadijna watabaaːraka aːllaðij lahu mulku aːlssamaaːwaaːti waʶaʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤiʶ wamaaː bajnahumaaː waʕindahu ʕilmu aːlssaaːʕaai waʔiilajhi turd͡ʒaʕuwna baʕijdun min aːlnnaaːsi jʕlm maː bjn ʔajdjhm wmaː χlfhm wlaː jħjtˤwn bh ʕlmaː ðhb mnnaːd d͡ʒwwaː ʔilaː aːlqaːhra lm ʔaʕrh aːntbaːhaː aːnh jd͡ʒnj mn aːlmaːl θlaːθa aʶːdˤʕaʶːf maː aːd͡ʒnjh aːnaː ldjhm θlaːθa qtˤtˤ ljswaː bħaːd͡ʒa lqtˤ ʔaːχr fʔaʁwjnaːkm ʔinaː knaː ʁaːwjn qmt bwaːd͡ʒbj bjdˤaʶːt baːlʔid͡ʒmaːl qaːlt ʔan ʕmrhaː ʕʃrjn sna lkn hðaː ʁjr sˤħjħ fahum ʕalaaː ʔaːθaaːrihim juhraʕuwna ʔaʃkrk ʕlaː msaːʕdtk fʔanbtnaː fjhaː ħbaː twkl ʕlaː aːllh bismi aːlllahi aːlrraħmani aːlrraħijmi waʶaʶːldˤdˤuʶħaʶaʶː qaaːluwaː lam naku mina aʶːlmuʶsˤaʶlliʶjnaʶ ʔanaː lst mtʔakdaːan ʔin kaːn hðaː sˤħjħaʶːaʶn w ʔilaː aːstqlaːlnaː baːlħrb qmnaː wamin ʔaːjaaːtihi manaaːmukum biaːlllajli waaːlnnahaaːri waaːbtiʁaaːʔuukum min faʶdˤliʶhiʶ ʔiinna fij ðalika laʔaːjaaːtin liqawmin jasmaʕuwna aːlmuðnibijna faqaaːla hum aʶːlmaʶrdˤaʶaʶː wanaħnu aʶːlʔaʶaʶtˤiʶbbaʶaʶːʔuʶ faʔiiðaaː lam nudaaːwihim biaːlʕafwi faman lahum ʔanwj ʔan ʔaʶnðˤf ʁrftj jmknh ʔan jtʕfn fj aːld͡ʒhnm ʔabʔimkaːnk ʔan tqlnj ʔilaː mħtˤaʶ aʶːlqtˤaʶːr waminhum man jaraaː ʔaanna aːlʔiiqlaaːla minhum ʔaawlaaː ʁlbt aːlrwm jaː mljk aːlʕrbi hl tfhm hl trjd ʔan tstmʕ ʔajn aʶːlmħtˤaʶ waʔaan jakuwna sˤaʶlaʶaʶːħuʶhaʶaʶː ʕaaːmmanaː ʃaaːmilanaː dʕjnaː nχrd͡ʒ mn hnaː qbl ʔan jraːnaː twm rbmaː knt ltfdˤl tˤbqaʶnaʶː frnsjaː wajubajjinu aːlllahu lakumu aːlʔaːjaaːti waaːlllahu ʕalijmun ħakijmun ʔanta laː jmknk ʔan tʔaklhaː fqtˤ lʔanhaː mʁðja kaːnt fχwra bʔibnhaː hl fj ðlk qsm lðj ħd͡ʒr flmaː d͡ʒaːʔhm bʔaːjaːtnaː ʔiðaː hm mnhaː jdˤħkwn waaːlmuħsinu ħajjun waʔiin kaaːna fij daaːri aːlʔaamwaaːti ðlk aʶːlfdˤl mn aːllh wkfaː baːllh ʕljmaː ħmdanaː llh ʔannk bχjr walikulli ʔaummaain ʔaad͡ʒalun faʔiiðaaː d͡ʒaaːʔa ʔaad͡ʒaluhum laaː jastaʔaχiruwna saaːʕaaan walaaː jastaqdimuwna fdˤlt ʔan ʔaʶnðˤr ʔilaː aːld͡ʒha aːlʔaχraː aːlðhaːb aːlmnzl wʔaːtjnaːhmaː aːlktaːb aːlmstbjn wmaː sˤaʶːħbkm bmd͡ʒnwn ʔajja nwʕ mn aːlmʕlwmaːt td͡ʒd fj lima talbisuwna aːlħaqqa biʶaʶːlbaʶaʶːtˤiʶliʶ wataktumuwna aːlħaqqa waʔaantum taʕlamuwna lʕnh aːllh wqaːl lʔatχðn mn ʕbaːdk nsˤjbaʶː mfrwdˤaʶː maːðaː trjdjn hðh hj aːlʔid͡ʒaːba aʶːlsˤħjħaʶ jaaː waʶaʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤiʶ waʕaʃijjanaː waħijna tuʶðˤhiʶruʶwnaʶ mjlaːd md͡ʒjd jbdw rd͡ʒlaː ʔamjnaː laaː jastawij ʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶaʶːbuʶ aːlnnaaːri waʶʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶaʶːbuʶ aːld͡ʒannaai ʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶaʶːbuʶ aːld͡ʒannaai humu aːlfaaːʔiizuwna waʔiiðaaː raʔaajta θamma raʔaajta naʕijmanaː wamulkanaː kabijranaː wlaː jχaːf ʕqbaːhaː ʔaχrd͡ʒ mftaːħanaː mn d͡ʒjb mʕtˤfh waːldj ʁjr mbaːlin baːlʔaːlaːm aʶːlʕaʶːtˤfjaʶ aːltj tsbb bhaː bʔimkaːnk ʔiʕaːda aːlmħaːwla bhðaː aːlrrqm ʕndj tðkra zaːʔida falaaː aːqtaħama aːlʕaqabaaa jaaː ħasraaan ʕalaaː aːlʕibaaːdi maaː jaʔatijhim min rasuwlin ʔiillaaː kaaːnuwaː bihi jastahziʔiuwna tħsnt biaːalllahi min ʔaan nuʁbana biʶfaʶdˤliʶ niʕmatihi ʕalajnaaː wjsttˤjʕ aːld͡ʒmjʕu aːlmsaːhmaa qutila aːlʔiinsaaːnu maaː ʔaakfarahu walaqad d͡ʒaʕalnaaː fij aːlssamaaːʔi buruwd͡ʒanaː wazajjanaaːhaaː muħammadu ʔinna rabbak jaʔamuruk ʔaan taʶsˤiʶlaʶ man qaʶtˤaʶʕaʶk ʔiʶsˤtˤħb ʔaχth liʔaanna aːlddawaaːʕija ʔilajhi ʁajru naaːfiʕaain ldjj d͡ʒaːra mslma wad͡ʒunwdu ʔiibljsa ʔaad͡ʒmaʕwna laaː jatimmu sittaai ʔaajjaːmin wamaː massanaː min luʁwbin ʔaaʕdaaː ʔaaʕdaaːʔiik nafsuk aːllatij bajna d͡ʒanbajk kaːn saːmj mnʃʁlaː ʔilaː ħdd ʔannh aʶːttsˤl bsjjaːra ʔisʕaːf hija aːlrraaːsiχaaːtu fij aːlwaħli faʔaaqbala baʶʕdˤuʶhuʶm ʕalaː baʶʕdˤiʶn jatasaːʔalwna qtˤtˤʕt maːrj qljlaː mn aʶːlbsˤl walaw sˤaʶdaʶraʶ ʕan rawijjaain wadaʕaaː ʔilajhi daaːʕin lasalimuwaː min ʃajnihi ħattaaː jaʶsˤiʶjraʶ saːmj w bjʕh maːðaː tfʕl lm jrd saːmj qdˤaʶːʔ jwm ʔaːχr fj msˤr maaː ʔaakθaru sˤaʶwaʶaʶːbiʶkuʶm qaaːla bal aːlʕilmu faʶaʶːsˤbiʶr ʕalaaː aːlddawaaːʔi kamaaː ʔaanna ʔaarðalahum nafsanaː mutahajjiʔi raswlanaː ʃaːhidanaː ʕalajkum kamaː ʔaarsalnaː ʔiilaː firʕawna raswlanaː ʔaanzalnaaː ʕalajkum libaaːsanaː stqlʕ aːlsfjna mn hwnʁ kwnʁ ʁdaː fj aːlθaːlθa msaːʔaː kaːn saːmj ʁdˤbaʶːnaʶː fad͡ʒaʕalahum kaʶʕaʶsˤfiʶn maʔakwlin θumma huwa liʔaawzaaːrihaaː muħtaqibun aːltamisuwaː aːlrrizqa fij χabaaːjaaː aʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤiʶ hl tðkr aːsmhaː klmaː tˤaʶːr qsˤ d͡ʒnaːħh wahuwa biaːlððami d͡ʒadijrun kabura maqtanaː ʕinda aːlllahi ʔaan taqwlwaː maː laː tafʕalwna qul maaː badaaː lak min zuwrin wamin kaðibi ħilmij ʔaʶaʶsˤaʶmmuʶ waʔauðnij ʁajru sˤaʶmmaʶaʶːʔiʶ walaaː ħaaːllaaan fij markazihaaː sqtˤ saːmj ʕn aʶːlħsˤaʶːn ʔaʶaʶdˤħaʶt aːlmadijnaau muzdaħimaaan stmtˤr aːljwm twm jʕrf ʔannj ʔawdh stnd͡ʒzh χlaːl ʔarbʕaːan w ʕʃrjn saːʕa ʔant mθl aːlklb aːlðj jrjd aʶːrdˤaʶːʔ sˤaʶːħbh aːlðj jsjʔ ʔiljh qaːla ʔaʶaʶwsaʶtˤuʶhuʶm ʔaalam ʔaaqul lakum lawlaː tusabbiħwna faqijla lahu fij ðalika faqaaːla ljst hj wasuʔiila aːlʃʃaʕbiju ʕan ʔaakli laħmi aʶːlʃʃaʶjtˤaʶaʶːniʶ faqaaːla naħnu naʶrdˤaʶaʶː minhu biaːlkafaaːfi falaː taʕlamu nafsun maː ʔauχfija lahum min qurraai ʔaaʕjunin d͡ʒazaːʔan bimaː kaːnwaː jaʕmalwna jaʶsˤiʶjduʶ aːlθθaʕlabu dad͡ʒaːd͡ʒaaan jad͡ʒibu ʕalajka ʔaanna tuʶnðˤðˤiʶfaʶ ʔasnaaːnaka kulla jawmin jawma judaʕʕwna ʔiilaː naːri d͡ʒahannama daʕʕanaː faaːlħaaːlu aːlʔauwlaaː χajrun min aːlχajru muʶʕtˤiʶjhiʶ waʃarrun min aːlʃʃari faaːʕiluhu ʃʕr saːmj ʔannh aːħtjd͡ʒ waqaaːla aːlʃʃarafu fij aːlssarafi faqijla lahu laaː χajra fij aːlssarafi χðnj mʕk jaʕtamiduwna ʕalaaː ʔaːraaːʔiihim aːlmuχtalifaai wajanqaaːduwna liʔaahwaaːʔiihim aːlmutaʃaʕʕibaai limaaː tuʔuawwalu ʔilajhi ʔaumuwruhum min aːliaːχtilaaːfi waaːlttanaaːzuʕi frr saːmj mn aːlmnzl humaaː bimanzilaai aːld͡ʒuwdi waaːlbuχli fatamassak biʔaajjihimaaː ʃiʔita lmaːðaː tkrhjnj waqad rawaaː aːlʕalaaːʔu bnu ʕabdi aːlrraħmani waqad qaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi man ʔaafʃaaː sirrahu kaθura ʕalajhi aːlmutaʔaammiruwna wahaðaaː taʶraʶbbuʶsˤuʶn waʶaʶːχtiʶsˤaʶaʶːruʶn waqad raʁiba ʕanhu ðawuw aːliaːqtidaaːri wazahida fijhi ðawuw aʶːlʔaʶaʶχtˤaʶaʶːriʶ ʔaaʃtaʁilu fij aːlħadjqaai wabadaː lahum sajjiʔiaaːtu maː ʕamilwaː waħaːqa bihim maː kaːnwaː bihi jastahziʔiwna aːlmustaʃijru waaːlmustaʃaaːru muʔutamanun wamuqaaːrabatuhu ʕamaaː aːðaːlm tstħj fʔafʕl maː tʃaːʔ kaːn saːmj jlʕb lʕba χtˤjraʶ llʁaːja faqaaːla lahu ʔaabuw juwsufa aːlʕad͡ʒabu liman jard͡ʒuw man fawqahu kajfa jaħrimu man duwnahu sʔatwd͡ʒd͡ʒh ʔilaː aːlssjrk waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi ʃaaːfiʕu aːlmuðnibi χuʶdˤuʶwʕuʶhuʶ ʔilaaː ʕuðrihi waqad qaaːla aːlʕabbaaːsu bnu ʕabdi aʶːlmuʶtˤtˤaʶliʶbiʶ ʁnaː aːlmrʔ fj aːlʁrba wtˤn wfqrh fj aʶːlwtˤn ʁrba jqwlwn ʔannhm jnswn manθuwri aːlħikami man ʔaʶaʶðˤhaʶraʶ ʕajba nafsihi faqad zakkaaːhaaː waʔiilaː rabbika faaːrʁab waʔaanʃada baʶʕdˤuʶ ʔaahli aːlʕilmi ʔaan jatad͡ʒaaːfaaː dˤaʶraʶʕaʶ aːlssaaːʔiilijna waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlmrʔa tˤbjbaʶː mn ħjn lʔaːχr waʶːsˤl saːmj sˤdaʶːqth mʕ ljlaː waʔaammaː man χaːfa maqaːma rabbihi wanahaaː aːlnnafsa ʕani aːlhawaː aʶːlʔiʶnfsˤaʶːljwn mmqwtwn ʔajnmaː ħllwaː kaːnt ljlaː tqddm drwsaː qijla fij manθuwri aːlħikami man daaːma kasaluhu χaaːba ʔaamaluhu waaːlqadra bihi χaaːmilun ljs hnaː waaːlrraaːbiʕu ʔaan tunaaːsiba ħaaːla aːlssaaːmiʕi litakuwna ʔaablaʁa taʔaθijranaː waʔaaħsana mawqiʕanaː aːlʁijbaau waaːlnnamijmaau waaːlssiʕaaːjaau waaːlssabu biqaðfin ʔaaw ʃatmin lm jʃʕr saːmj qtˤtˤ bʔannh msjħj aʶːqtaʶsˤiʶd fij mizaaːħik faʔiinna aʶːlʔiʶiʶfraʶaʶːtˤaʶ fijhi juðhibu aːlbahaaːʔa θumma huwa ʔaazjadu fij rutbatihi waʔaablaʁu fij taqaddumihi ðhb saːmj ʔilaː msˤr haː qd ʔataː aʶːlbaʶːsˤ faʶsˤaʶlliʶ lirabbika waaːnħar falaaː jafraħu aːlmarʔu biħaaːlaain d͡ʒalijlaain naaːlahaaː biʁajri ʕaqlin aːlʕql ʔaʃrf aːlʔaħbaːb aːlʕql zjna lajsa min tawakkuli aːlmarʔi ʔiʶdˤaʶaʶːʕaʶtuʶhuʶ lilħazmi ʔaan jastadfiʕa dˤaʶraʶraʶhuʶ aːstdr mn fdˤlk ʔaʶðˤlm mn aːlljl falam nabluʁ minhaaː aːlmaħduwda lm jkn ldaː saːmj ʔaħd kj jsaːʕdh walaqad waʶsˤsˤaʶlnaʶː lahumu aːlqawla laʕallahum jataðakkarwna fatatawad͡ʒd͡ʒahu ʔilajhi laaːʔiimaau aːlmutawahhimijna taθqijlun waman θaqqala ʕalaaː aːlnnaaːsi haaːna walaaː qadra ʕindahum limuhaaːnin saːmj mslm saːbq liʔaannahu ʔin tˤaʶlaʶbaʶ bihi aːlʃʃukra waaːlθθanaaːʔa ħaːwlt ʔamm saːmj ʔan tqtlh maʶqtˤuʶwʕaʶ aːlħud͡ʒd͡ʒaai wahaðaaː aːlnnawʕu ʔaaswaʔau ħaaːlanaː mimmaaː qablu wawakalahum ʔilaaː naʶðˤaʶriʶhiʶm fij tˤaʶlaʶbiʶ makaaːsibihim aʶːntˤaʶliʶqwaʶː ʔiilaː ðˤiʶlliʶn ðj θalaːθi ʃuʕabin ʔinhaː qaːdma hðaː aːlflm bbsaʶːtˤaʶ raːʔiʕ laː tlʕb hnaː lm ʔaqdr ʔan ʔafkkr ʔilaː ʔajn ʔajmknk ʔan tqtrħ fkra ʔaʶfdˤl ħðrth mn aːlðhaːb wħdh ðlikumu aːlllahu rabbukum χaːliqu kulli ʃajʔin laː ʔiilha ʔiillaː huwa faʔaannaː tuʔufakwna tzwwd͡ʒ saːmj mn aːmrʔaa mslma lm nbdʔa bʕd aːʕrf sˤaʶːħbk waːtrkh waʶdˤaʶaʶːqaʶt χalaaːʔiiquhu lm jχbr saːmj aʶːlʃʃrtˤaʶ waqijla fijhi laaː tadaʕu aːlʔaajjaaːmu d͡ʒaaːhilanaː ʔillaaː ʔaaddabathu ʔabħθ ʕn qfaːzaːtj saːmj fj mrkz aʶːlʃʃrtˤaʶ saːmj hw mn tsbbb bkll aːlmʃaːkl fj aːlʕjaːda ʔanaː hw aʶːltˤtˤbjb ʔiinna lilmuttaqjna mafaːzanaː θumma aːlssabjla jassarahu qul lakum mjʕaːdu jawmin laː tastaʔaχirwna ʕanhu saːʕaaan walaː tastaqdimwna kaːn saːmj mʕrrdˤaʶː lħkm tlqaːʔijj baːlssd͡ʒn aːlmʔubbd ʔin ʔaudjn tbwwl saːmj jaʔatwka bikulli saħħaːrin ʕaljmin faaːlwad͡ʒhu aːlʔaawwalu waaːʕlam ʔaannahu biħasabi maaː junʃaru min faʶdˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶliʶ aːlʕaaːqili waðakara aːlmawta waaːlbilaaː hl jlʕb kjn aːltns fasawfa juħaːsabu ħisaːbanaː jasjranaː wzzʕ ʕljnaː wrq aːllʕb kjf kaːn jwmk waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi aːlʕafwu jufsidu min aːlllaʔiijmi biqadri ʔiʶsˤlaʶaʶːħiʶhiʶ min aːlkarijmi lm ʔaʶsttˤʕ ʔinhaːʔihaː lm jkn ðaːk mdrrsj jʕjʃ mnħnjaːan tˤjlaʶ aːlħjaːa wanujassiruka liljusraː waʔiiʃaaːraain justadallu ʕalajhaaː bikarmihi lqd dˤaʶːd͡ʒʕt mdrrstj aʶːlʔaʶraʶːdˤj aʶːlflstˤjnjaʶ aːlmħtla baːlmnaːsba hl zrt hwkaːjdw mn qbl waqad qijla man taaːha fij wilaaːjatihi ðalla fij ʕazlihi aːlʔaummu tuʶtˤʕiʶmuʶ ʔaawlaːadahaaː waʔaːdaaːbi aːlbulaʁaaːʔi wafijhi jaquwlu aːlʃʃaaːʕiru wasuʔiila ʕalijju bnu ʔaabij tˤaʶaʶːliʶbiʶn raʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːlllahu ʕanhu ʕan aːlddunjaaː faqaaːla ʔaχwk mn sˤdqk aʶːlnsˤjħaʶ laː tns tqdjm aːlʔakl llklb ʔaataʔamuruwna aːlnnaaːsa biaːlbirri watansawna ʔaanfusakum waʔaantum tatluwna aːlkitaaːba ʔaafalaaː taʕqiluwna wanaʕmaain kaːnwaː fjhaː faːkihjna hl hðaː hw aːlħb waʔiin kaaːna ðarijʕaaan ʔilaaː kulli maðammaain fajaksibu biaːliaːnqijaaːdi liʶlʁaʶdˤaʶbiʶ min aːlrraðaaːʔiili ʔaakθara mimmaaː jaslubuhu ʕadamu aʶːlʁaʶdˤaʶbiʶ min aʶːlfaʶdˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶliʶ wajuχbiru bimaknuwnaaːti aːlssaraaːʔiiri qaːblth fj ʕda mnaːsbaːt twqqf saːmj ʕn tnaːwl dwaːʔih kaːn twm baːlʁ aːlθraːʔ walaː juʔuðanu lahum fajaʕtaðirwna wafij miθlihi qaaːla ðuw aːlnnuwni raħmaau aːlllahi ʕalajhi saːmj jħbb aʶːltˤtˤbχ waʔiiðaaː aːlssamaːʔu furid͡ʒat laː ʔaʕtqd ʔannnj sʔansaːk kll mn aːljhwd w aːlmsjħjjjn w aːlmslmjn jttfqwn ʔann aːlqds mdjna mqddsa ʕaːmlthaː kʔanhaː bntj ʔiinna aːlllaha laaː jastaħjij ʔaan jaʶdˤriʶbaʶ maθalanaː maaː baʶʕuʶwdˤaʶaʶaʶn famaaː fawqahaaː aʶːlbjaʶːdˤ nsˤf aːlħsn bjt aʶːlðˤaʶːlm χraːb tudammiru kulla ʃajʔin biʔaamri rabbihaː faʶʔaʶaʶsˤbaʶħwaʶː laː juraː ʔiillaː masaːkinuhum kaðlika nad͡ʒzij aːlqawma aːlmud͡ʒrimjna fqtˤ aːns aːlʔamr fjhinna qaʶːsˤiʶraʶːtuʶ aʶːltˤtˤaʶrfiʶ lam jaʶtˤmiʶθhuʶnnaʶ ʔiinsun qablahum walaː d͡ʒaːnnun faqaaːla lahu dˤiʶraʶaʶːruʶn waaːalllahi law qult ʕaʃranaː lam tasmaʕ waaːħidaaan waʶjaʶsˤriʶfaʶhuʶ ʕan buʁjatihi ʔinnamaaː kuntu ʔaumaaːziħuk waminhaaː aːlʁinaaː faqad tataʁajjaru bihi ʔaaχlaaːqu aːlllaʔiijmi baʶtˤaʶraʶnaʶː watasuwʔu tˤaʶraʶaʶːʔiʶiʶquʶhuʶ ʔaaʃaranaː lqd kaːn ʕjd mjlaːdj aːlθlaːθjn aːlʔasbwʕ aʶːlmaʶːdˤj kaːn saːmj jstmtʕ baːlħjaːa bʃkl kaːml waaːmraʔaatuhu ħammaːlaaa aʶːlħaʶtˤaʶbiʶ walaaː maħaaːhu bitawbatihi maːðaː laː ʔasmʕk tˤlbt aːlnd͡ʒda km θmnhaː waʔaawfaaː ʕahdahu faʔiinna raʔaja ʁajri ðij aːlħaaːd͡ʒaai ʔaaslamu sʔaqjs ħraːrtk aːlʔaːn ʃabaaːbihi fijmaaː ʔaablaaːhu d͡ʒff aːlqlm aːlʔaaklu aːlkaθijru jaʶdˤuʶrruʶ aːlmaʕidaaa saːmj jχaʶːtˤr bħjaːth ʕaːd ʔilaː aːlmħkma maaː taquwlu fij aːlʕafwi waaːlʕuquwbaai qaaːla maː aːlħb ʔilaː llħbjb aːlʔawl qaddara ʔaarzaaːqa ʔaahlihaaː sawaaːʔan lilssaaːʔiilijna aːlzzijaaːdaaa fij ʔaarzaaːqihim ljtnj knt tmθaːlaː baːsm aːllh aːlrħmaːn aːlrħjm ʔiinna ʔiilajnaː ʔiijaːbahum faʔiiðaaː aːd͡ʒtamaʕa aːlʔaamraaːni waaːqtarana biʃarafi aːlnnafsi ʕuluwwu aːlhimmaai kaaːna aʶːlfaʶdˤluʶ bihimaaː ðˤaʶaʶːhiʶraʶnaʶː ʔaʶmdˤaʶː saːmj ʕdda ʔasaːbjʕ bsˤħbaʶ mslmjn kaːn saːmj jðhb ʔilaː aːlmsd͡ʒd jwm aːld͡ʒmʕa watawakkal ʕalaaː aːlllahi wakafaː biaːlllahi wakjlanaː ʔiinna hðaː lahuwa ħaqqu aːljaqjni ʔinnamaaː zaaːla ʕanhu aːlttalbijsu ʔiðaaː qaaːlahu rasuwlu aːlllahi sˤaʶllaʶaʶː aːlllahu ʕalajhi wasallama waʔiin qalla sˤiʶdquʶhaʶaʶː aʶːlqtˤraʶːt aʶːlsˤʁjraʶ qd tsˤnʕ d͡ʒdwlaːan maː rʔajk fj χtˤaʶːb aːlrʔijs maː aːlsaːʕa aːlʔaːn waʔiinna ʕalajka laʕnatj ʔiilaː jawmi aːlddjni faaːχtalafa aːlʔaaħzaːbu min bajnihim fawajlun lillaðjna ðˤaʶlaʶmwaʶː min ʕaðaːbi jawmin ʔaaljmin ʔinna sˤaʶaʶːħiʶbaʶk maaː sˤaʶaʶːħaʶbaʶ aːlddunjaaː falaaː budda ʔaan jaraaː makruwhanaː ljs hnaːk wqt llʔasʔila ʔiillaaː aːllaðjna ʔaːmanwaː waʕamiluwaː aʶːlsˤsˤaʶːliʶħaʶːtiʶ lahum ʔaad͡ʒrun ʁajru mamnwnin laː tns nqwdk hðh hj aːlmsʔala waʔaammaaː aːlmujaaːsaraai fanawʕaaːni aːχtfaː saːmj bdwn ʔan tusmʕ mnh klma faqaaːma faʶdˤaʶraʶbaʶ bihi ʕunuqa ruwmijjin minhum fanabaaː aːlssajfu ʕanhu laː jaðwqwna fjhaː bardanaː walaː ʃaraːbanaː raʔaajt aːlllisaaːna ʕalaaː ʔaahlihi ʔiðaaː saaːsahu aːld͡ʒahlu lajθanaː muʁijraaː waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlʔaudabaaːʔi waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi aːlχarasu χajrun min aːlkaðibi waʶsˤiʶdquʶ aːlllisaaːni ʔaawwalu aːlssaʕaaːdaai ʔaʶbtˤʔaʶ mn slħfaːa waaːlfaħʃaaːʔa waaːlmunkara ʔaan takuwna ʕalaaːnijatuhu ʔaaħsana min sarijratihi ʔiinna jawma aʶːlfaʶsˤliʶ mjqaːtuhum ʔaad͡ʒmaʕjna takallam jaaː aːbna ʔaaχij mn fdˤlk laː tns maː tħddθnaː ʕnh sqtˤt aːlʃd͡ʒra mn aʶːlʔaʶfdˤl ʔan tʁaːdr ʔin aːlwqt mtʔaχr waman d͡ʒahila mawaaːqiʕa aːlħuquwqi wamaqaaːdijrahaaː bimaaːlihi waʶʔaʶaʶχtˤaʶʔaʶaʶhaʶaʶː aːirfʕ jdk aːljmnaː faqad aːstaħaaː min aːlllahi ʕazza wad͡ʒalla ħaqqa aːlħajaaːʔi walam tatakallaf aːχtijaaːra aːlkalaaːmi aːlmanθuwri ʔiinna d͡ʒahannama kaːnat miʶrsˤaʶːdaʶnaʶː sjstʁrq aːlmʃrwʕ sna ʕlaː aːlʔaql ʔiðaaː ʔaaqbalat ʔaadbarat ʔiinnahaː ʕalajhim muʶʔuʶsˤaʶdaʶaʶuʶn sʔaʶħdˤr fwtˤaʶ ʔaχraː kaːn saːmj jmdˤj aːlwqt mʕ aːmrʔaa tʔaχχrt aʶːltˤtˤaʶːʔiʶraʶ aːnzl mn aːlssjaːra mn fdˤlk walaqad ʔaarsalnaː ʔiilaː θamwda ʔaaχaːhum sˤaʶːliʶħaʶnaʶː ʔaani aːʕbuduwaː aːlllaha faʔiiðaː hum farjqaːni jaʶχtaʶsˤiʶmwnaʶ waaːllaðjna juʔuðwna aːlmuʔuminjna waaːlmuʔuminaːti biʁajri maaː aːktasabwaː faqadi aːħtamalwaː buhtaːnanaː waʔiiθmanaː mubjnanaː waqad qaaːla ʕadijju bnu ħaaːtimin faʔiinna man ʕaʶaʶːraʶdˤaʶt fikrahu ʃawaaːʔiibu aːlhumuwmi laaː jaslamu lahu raʔajun walaaː jastaqijmu lahu χaʶaʶːtˤiʶruʶn laː ʔaʶsˤdq maː ħdθ walaaː rawijjaaun fijmaaː takallamuwaː bihi jaaː ʔaabati ʔaatanaaːmu waaːlnnaaːsu biaːlbaaːbi faqaaːla kuluwaː min tˤaʶjjiʶbaʶaʶːtiʶ maaː razaqnaaːkum laaː jad͡ʒuwzu lilʔiinsaːni ʔaan jad͡ʒlisa fij mad͡ʒraː aːlhawaaːʔi waʔaammaaː aːlʔaamru aːlθθaaːliθu ʔiinna aːlʔiinsaːna lafj χusrin aʶːlsˤsˤaʶbruʶ maʶtˤiʶjjaʶaʶuʶn laaː takbuw waaːld͡ʒahlu aːlqabijħu ʔaʶðˤn ʔank tdˤjʕ wqtk maː jzaːl haːrj fj aːlʔarbʕjn mn ʕmrh aːstqaːl saːmj aːlʕql juhaaːbu maː laː juhaːbu aːlsjf dˤrb saːmj ljlaː w kssr lhaː dˤrsaʶː waaːllaðjna aːttaχaðwaː min dwnihi ʔaawlijaːʔa aːlllahu ħaʶfjðˤuʶn ʕalajhim wamaː ʔaanta ʕalajhim biwakjlin dʕaː ftaː ʔaːχr ljlaː llrrqsˤaʶ lqd ʁaːr bismi aːlllahi aːlrraħmni aːlrraħjmi qul ʔaaʕwðu birabbi aːlfalaqi hl traː twm kθjraː ʔataː aːlmdrrs χlfnaː liʔaanna aːlrraʁbaaa tabʕaθu ʕalaaː aʶːltˤtˤaʶaʶːʕaʶaʶiʶ aːlkaðibu wafuħʃu aːlqawli waqad rawaaː makħuwlun qaaːla maaː jastawd͡ʒibu bihi qubħa aːlrradi wasuwʔa aːlmanʕi fkkr fjma stʃʕr ʔin ħdθ ðlk lk aːχlʕ ħðaːʔk faaːʕtarafwaː biðanbihim fasuħqanaː liʶʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶːbiʶ aːlssaʕjri tˤlb saːmj mn aːlrrb ʔan jsaːmħh hnaːk ʃwka naʶːqsˤaʶ haðaaː laaː jaqnaʕu maʕa maaː ðˤaʶhaʶraʶ min ħaaːlihi ʔillaaː bid͡ʒawaaːbin miθlihi ʔanaː hw mdjr hðh aːlʕjaːda waʶjaʶʕtaʶsˤiʶmuʶ muʕaaːdijhi biʕadlihi aːħtrqt aːlmnaːzl waːħda tlw aːlʔaχraː watawakkal ʕalaaː aːlħajji aːllaðj laː jamwtu wasabbiħ biħamdihi wakafaː bihi biðunwbi ʕibaːdihi χabjranaː klma aːlsr hj mwrjl qfzt ljlaː ʕbr aːlnnaːfða kj tnd͡ʒw bħjaːthaː waʶjuʶbʁiʶdˤuʶ aːlfaaːħiʃa aːlbaðijʔu bʕd tˤlaʶːqh mn ljlaː aʶːsˤbħt ħjaːa saːmj fwdˤaʶː walaʔiin saʔaaltahum man χalaqa aːlssamaːwaːti waʶaʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤaʶ wasaχχara aːlʃʃamsa waaːlqamara lajaqwlunna aːlllahu faʔaannaː juʔufakwna waʔiin ʔauhmila kaθijruhu aʶːdˤmaʶħaʶllaʶ ʔanaː χd͡ʒwl qljlaːan warawaaː sˤaʶfwaʶaʶːnuʶ bnu sulajmin qaaːla kaːn saːmj d͡ʒaːlsaː ʕlaː aːlssrjr ʔiinna aːllaðjna ʔaːmanwaː waʕamiluwaː aʶːlsˤsˤaʶːliʶħaʶːtiʶ lahum d͡ʒannaːtu aːlnnaʕjmi saːmj jfkkr hkðaː daːʔimaː qaaːla ʔiinnahu jaquwlu ʔiinnahaaː baqaraaun sˤaʶfraʶaʶːʔuʶ faaːqiʕun lawnuhaaː tasurru aʶːlnnaʶaʶːðˤiʶriʶjnaʶ wabanajnaː fawqakum sabʕanaː ʃidaːdanaː srwaːlk mtsχ laqad ʔaʶaʶdˤaʶllaʶnj ʕani aːlððikri baʕda ʔiið d͡ʒaːʔanj wakaːna aʶːlʃʃaʶjtˤaʶːnuʶ lilʔiinsaːni χaðwlanaː qaːlwaː rabbanaː ʔaamattanaaː aːθnatajni waʔaaħjajtanaaː aːθnatajni faaːʕtarafnaː biðunwbinaː fahal ʔiilaː χurwd͡ʒin min sabjlin waʔaanʃadanij aːbnu lankaka liʔaabijhi faqul hal laka ʔiilaː ʔaan tazakkaː ʁajra ʔaannahu jalijnu ʕinda aːlrradi lijnanaː jaqijhi aːlððama ʔaammaaː aːllaðjna ʔaːmanwaː waʕamiluwaː aʶːlsˤsˤaʶːliʶħaʶːtiʶ falahum d͡ʒannaːtu aːlmaʔawaː nuzulanaː bimaː kaːnwaː jaʕmalwna laː ʔaqdr ʔan ʔasaːmħh ʕlaː maː fʕl kaːn saːmj jħbb ħjaːa aːlrrfaːhja ʔauʕd͡ʒb saːmj bðlk km tbʕd aːlħdjqa ʕn mnzlk aːllaðjna juqjmwna aʶːlsˤsˤaʶlaʶːaʶaʶ wajuʔutwna aːlzzakaːaa wahum biaːlʔaːχiraai hum jwqinwna θumma jattahimu nafsahu fij sˤaʶwaʶaʶːbiʶ maaː ʔaaħabbat wataħsijni maaː aːʃtahat salaːmun ʕalaː nwħin fij aːlʕaːlamjna lm jʕlm saːmj mn kaːn jtˤaʶːrdh maː jud͡ʒaːdilu fj ʔaːjaːti aːlllahi ʔiillaaː aːllaðjna kafarwaː falaː jaʁrurka taqallubuhum fij aːlbilaːdi watuħibbwna aːlmaːla ħubbanaː d͡ʒammanaː taθabbata walam jalum biaːlttawahumi fajakuwna maluwmanaː kaːn mdrrs aːlfnwn jkrhnj faʔiin tabarraʕa biʶfaʶdˤliʶ aːlkarami waʶfaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶdˤiʶ aːlmuruwʔaai faʶnaʶhaʶdˤaʶ fij ħawaaːdiθihim jawmaʔiiðin jaʶsˤduʶruʶ aːlnnaːsu ʔaaʃtaːtanaː lijurawaː ʔaaʕmaːlahum ljlaː mdrrsa fj aʶːlrrwdˤaʶ ʔaʶjdˤaʶː kaːn ʔihmaːlaː mnhaː ʔan tnsaː mn ksr hðaː naʶðˤðˤiʶf θijaːbaka aʶːlʔaʶrdˤ w aːlmrjχ w aːlmʃtrj kwaːkb twm wħjd tmaːmaː mn d͡ʒdjd kaːn aːlmdrrswn jkrhwnhaː wamin kulli ʃajʔin χalaqnaː zawd͡ʒajni laʕallakum taðakkarwna falam jabqa liwad͡ʒhihi maaːʔun ʔillaaː ʔaaraaːqahu laː ʔaħd fssr maː kaːn jqwm bh faʶːdˤl hnaːk kaððabwaː biʔaːjaːtinaː kullihaː faʔaaχaðnaːhum ʔaaχða ʕazjzin muqtadirin aːlm ðaaːlika aːlkitaaːbu laaː rajba fijhi hudanaː llilmutaqijn ħdˤr twm llmdrsa baːlsjaːra naħnu ʔaaʕlamu bimaː jaqwlwna wamaː ʔaanta ʕalajhim bid͡ʒabbaːrin faðakkir biaːlqurʔaːni man jaχaːfu waʕjdi jaaː ʔaabaaː bakrin man haðaaː fajaquwlu aːlħalaaːlu laaː jaħtamilu aːlssarafa kallaː lajunbaðanna fij aʶːlħuʶtˤaʶmaʶaʶiʶ laː jaʔatjhi aʶːlbaʶːtˤiʶluʶ min bajni jadajhi walaː min χalfihi tanzjlun min ħakjmin ħamjdin ʁaːdr saːmj rfqa ʃχsˤ jʕml fj aːlʕjaːda sˤaʶaʶːraʶ ʕiʶrdˤuʶhuʶ hadafanaː lilmaθaaːlibi aːlʕtaːb sˤaʶːbwn aːlqlb faliʔaanna aʶːltˤtˤaʶmaʶʕaʶ ðullun waaːlddanaaːʔaaa luʔumun walammaː dˤuʶriʶbaʶ aːbnu marjama maθalanaː ʔiiðaː qawmuka minhu jaʶsˤiʶddwnaʶ waaːlssalaaːmaau min aʶːlssaʶtˤaʶwaʶaʶːtiʶ walaʔiin ʔaarsalnaː rjħanaː faraʔaawhu muʶsˤfaʶrraʶnaʶː laʶðˤaʶllwaʶː min baʕdihi jakfurwna qul ʔiinnamaː ʔaadʕw rabbj walaː ʔauʃriku bihi ʔaaħadanaː faʔiinna man ħaqqara jasijrahu famanaʕa minhu ʔaaʕd͡ʒazahu kaθijruhu faaːmtanaʕa ʕanhu knt ʔastħm ʕndmaː rn aːlhaːtf faʔiiðaaː sˤaʶraʶfaʶ ħusna aʶːlðˤðˤaʶniʶ ʕanhaaː watawassamahaaː bimaaː hija ʕalajhi min aːlttaswijfi waaːlmakri faaːza biʶtˤaʶaʶːʕaʶtiʶhaʶaʶː ʔajkfj hðaː aːlmaːl laː tftħ hðh aːlrrsaːla ħttaː tʁaːdr aːlbld walan tad͡ʒida aːlʔaaχlaaːqa ʕalaaː maaː waʶsˤaʶfnaʶaʶː min ħaddi aːlmuruwʔaai muʶntˤaʶbiʶʕaʶaʶaʶn saːmj laː jħml slaːħh aːlnnaːrj mʕh kaːn saːmj jħbb aʶːlʔaʶbtˤaʶːl χaːrqjn bnaː saːmj mnzlaː qtl saːmj ljlaː θmm qtl nfsh waʔaadabu riʶjaʶaʶːdˤaʶaʶiʶn waʶaʶːstiʶsˤlaʶaʶːħiʶn sjʕtnj saːmj bkll ʃjʔ ħjn ʁjaːb ljlaː ʕljnaː tʔad͡ʒjl aːlaːd͡ʒtmaːʕ warubbamaaː daʕaaː aːlmuʁtaaːba ðalika ʔilaaː ʔiʶðˤhaʶaʶːriʶ maaː kaaːna jasturuhu aʶːntðˤr saːmj fj aːlssjaːra liʔaanna aːlddawaaːʕija ʔilajhi naaːfiʕaaun kaːnt aʶːldˤdˤd͡ʒaʶ sˤaʶːχbaʶ d͡ʒddaː waaːlθθaaːnij laaː taʔakuluwaː ħaraaːmanaː faʔiinnahu ʔisraaːfun wahaðaaː qawlu aːbni zajdin ʔinn aːlddktwr saːmj baːkr jʕml ʕlaː kjfjja aʶːlqdˤaʶːʔ ʕlaː aːlwbaːʔ tnaːwl saːmj ʔaʶqraʶːsˤ aːlnnwm haːti jdki waʔiinnamaaː jaðkuru kullu ʔinsaaːnin ʔilajhi lm tdrk χtˤʔaʶhaʶː faʶwaʶsaʶtˤnaʶ bihi d͡ʒamʕanaː kullu ʃajʔin jaħtaaːd͡ʒu ʔilaaː aːlʕaqli waaːlʕaqlu jaħtaaːd͡ʒu ʔilaaː aːlttad͡ʒaaːribi laː ʔadrj ʔin kaːn jħbbnj d͡ʒundun maː hunaːlika mahzwmun mina aːlʔaaħzaːbi lm jkn jd͡ʒdr bk ʔan td͡ʒʕlnj ʔatwsl aːðhab bikitaːbj hðaː faʔaalqih ʔiilajhim θumma tawalla ʕanhum faʶaʶːnðˤuʶr maːðaː jard͡ʒiʕwna waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlbulaʁaaːʔi χajru tattaqwna ʔaan jakuwna aːlssaaːʔiilu mustawd͡ʒibanaː waaːlmasʔiuwlu mutamakkinanaː falaaː ʕuðra lahu fij aʶːlttaʶʕaʶruʶdˤiʶ lilmaaːli bal tuʔuθirwna aːlħajaːaa aːlddunjaː ruwija ʕan rasuwli aːlllahi
