aːlwʃaːħ rafaʕa aːlllahu ʕan ʔaabijk aːlʕaðaaːba aːlʃʃadijda lisaχaaːʔiihi waqaaːla sufjaaːnu aːlθθawriju raʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːlllahu ʕanhu ʔaafataraaːhu χallafa rizqahu ʕindak waqaaːla aːbnu aːlrruwmiji raħimahu aːlllahu aːlħaaːlaai aːllatij huwa fijhaaː ʔilaaː ħaaːlaain ʁajrihaaː smʕ saːmj sˤwtaʶː bdaːχlh laː tns aːlktaːba baːlʔaħrf aːlkbjra fanad͡ʒd͡ʒajnaːhu waʔaahlahu ʔaad͡ʒmaʕjna χalaqa aːlʔiinsaːna min sˤaʶlsˤaʶːliʶn kaaːlfaχχaːri stdˤjʕ walaaː juʔuaθθiru taʔaθijrahaaː lm jtnaːwl saːmj ʔajja ʔaʶqraʶːsˤ falaaː jad͡ʒidu linafsihi fij aːlttaʔaχijri fusħaaan wahumaaː ʔaadfaʕu ʃajʔin lilmuruwʔaai ʔaχbr twm ʔanh jmknh aːlðhaːb ʕndmaː jnthj waʔiin kaaːna duwnij rafaʕt qadrij ʕanhu faʔiin ʔaʶaʶʕraʶdˤwaʶː faqul ʔaanðartukum sˤaʶːʕiʶqaʶaʶaʶn miθla sˤaʶːʕiʶqaʶaʶiʶ ʕaːdin waθamwda walaaː ʕilmin lajsa fijhi tafahhumun faʔaaθarna bihi naqʕanaː aːqtrbt ljlaː mn saːmj w qbblth ʔaħtaːd͡ʒ ʔilaː msaːʕdtk subħaːna aːlllahi ʕammaː jaʶsˤiʶfwnaʶ dχl saːmj fj ʁjbwba tˤlb saːmj mn ljlaː ʔan tsaːʕdh fj ħll aːlmʃkl qijla liʕalijji bni ʔaabij tˤaʶaʶːliʶbiʶn raʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːlllahu ʕanhu maaː kaaːnat niʕmaau aːlllahi ʕalaaː ʔaaħadin ʔillaaː wad͡ʒada lahaaː ħaaːsidanaː faʔaalhamahaaː fud͡ʒuwrahaaː wataqwaaːhaaː qaaːla aːbnu ʕabbaaːsin raʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːlllahu ʕanhu waʔiin kaaːna aːljasijru maʁfuwranaː waʶaʶːlχaʶaʶːtˤiʶʔiʶuʶ maʕðuwranaː kaːn ʁjwraː waqubħi aːlʔaaθari rd͡ʒaːʔ nffð maː ʔaqwlh sʔaʶqdˤj χmsjn sna fj aːlssd͡ʒn mn aʶːlʔaʶfdˤl ʔan ttˤllqjnj jaʃtaddu aːlħarru walaaː sˤaʶraʶfaʶ ʕanhaaː maaː takrahu ʔiðaaː kaaːna ruʃdanaː twm ldjh aːlm rʔas ħaːd faqaaːla mahlanaː ʔijjaaːki waaːlʁijbaaa sˤfʕ saːmj ljlaː mn d͡ʒdjd waʕan aːlrruʃdi zaaːd͡ʒiraaun kaːnt ljlaː tʕml fj naːd llttʕrj ʔawhn mn bjt aːlʕnkbwt qul ʕasaː ʔaan jakwna radifa lakum baʶʕdˤuʶ aːllaðj tastaʕd͡ʒilwna liʔaannahu juntid͡ʒu aːlnnamijmaaa ʕljk ʔan tbqaː sˤaʶːmtaʶː fj aːlqsm qaaːla qaaːla rasuwlu aːlllahi sˤaʶllaʶaʶː aːlllahu ʕalajhi wasallama wasaʔaala baʶʕdˤuʶ χulafaaːʔi banij aːlʕabbaaːsi d͡ʒalijsanaː lahu ʕan aːlddunjaaː faqaaːla waaːd͡ʒʕal nuʶsˤħaʶ nafsik ʁanijmaaa ʕaqlik waqaaːla ʔaaħmadu bnu juwsufa kaːn bʔimkaːn saːmj ʔan jqjm sˤdaʶːqaʶ ħttaː mʕ sˤχraʶ sjntðˤr saːmj ʃamma ʕalijun wardaaan χajru aːlmaaːli ʕajnun saaːhiraaun liʕajnin naaːʔiimaain aʶːtˤlb tðˤfr kaːnt ljlaː qwjja bmaː jkfj kj tʕbr aːlnnhr sbaːħa aːstqaːl saːmj mn aːlʕjaːda qtˤʕ faʶːdˤl tlk aːlʃʃd͡ʒra kaːn ldaː saːmj ħrs ʃχsˤj walikullin darad͡ʒaːtun mimmaː ʕamilwaː walijuwaffijahum ʔaaʕmaːlahum wahum laː juʶðˤlaʶmwnaʶ qaːl saːmj ʔann aʶːlʃʃjtˤaʶːn hw mn ʔamrh baʶːlttdˤħjaʶ bljlaː kaːn saːmj jrjd ʔan twljh aːlftjaːt aːntbaːhhnn ʔaabʕiduwaː ʕannij χafqa niʕaaːlikum faʔiinnahaaː mufsidaaun liquluwbi nawkaaː aːlrrid͡ʒaaːli lm jkn d͡ʒaːʔiʕaː aːnhaːr mnzl saːmj ʔadaːʔ hðh aːlsjaːra ʔaʶfdˤl mn tlk mn fdˤlk trd͡ʒm hðh aːld͡ʒmla ʔilaː aːljaːbaːnja ʔaʕdk ʔannj sʔatkllm mʕh ʔijmj ftaːa ħsna waʔiin lam jakun mubtadiʔianaː bihi fij ʔaawwali ħaaːlin lqd wd͡ʒdthaː ʔaχjraː saːmj mn fwd͡ʒʔi bwd͡ʒwdk hnaː falammaaː faraʁa qaaːla biʶtˤaʶaʶːʕaʶtiʶhiʶ lqd ʃfjt nuqilt ljlaː d͡ʒwwaː ʔilaː mstʃfaː mħllj lijaðilla lahu qijaaːduhaaː aːuχrud͡ʒ maʕij zid min tˤuʶwliʶ ʔaamalik fij qaʶsˤiʶjriʶ ʕamalik hj ttħdθ aːlqljl mn aːlʕrbja min hud͡ʒnaai musaaːwijhi qul juħjjhaaː aːllaðj ʔaanʃaʔaahaː ʔaawwala marraain wahuwa bikulli χalqin ʕaljmun fajawmaʔiiðin laː juʕaððibu ʕaðaːbahu ʔaaħadun bismi aːlllahi aːlrraħmni aːlrraħjmi qul jaː ʔaajjuhaaː aːlkaːfirwna hwaːʔ sjdnj ʔaʶnðˤf mn hwaːʔ tˤwkjw faʶaʶːsˤbiʶr liħukmi rabbika walaː tuʶtˤiʶʕ minhum ʔaːθimanaː ʔaaw kafwranaː ʕnd aʶːlbtˤwn tʕmaː aːlʕjwn wajabqaaː ʕalajk maaː tartakibuhu min aːlmaħaaːrimi ʔaan jastashila aːlmaʕuwnaaa masruwranaː kaððaba ʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶːbuʶ aːlʔaajkaai aːlmursaljna kaːn jʕml ljlaː nhaːraː kj jsˤbħ θrjaː walibaaːsu aːlttaqwaaː aːltqjt aːlbaːrħa btwm wawuffijat kullu nafsin maː ʕamilat wahuwa ʔaaʕlamu bimaː jafʕalwna kaːn saːmj aːlʔibn aːlwħjd lljlaː baːkr w zwd͡ʒhaː aːlʔasbq frjd sˤaʶːdq hðaː hw mdrrsj aʶːlmfdˤdˤl qaaːla d͡ʒamijʕu ʔaahli aːlttaʔawijli lntðˤaʶːhr bʔannaː mχlwqaːt fdˤaʶːʔiʶjaʶ waʔaːtajnaaː ʕijsaaː aːbna marjama aːlbajjinaaːti waʔaajjadnaaːhu biruwħi aːlqudusi qddm saːmj aːlzzkaːa lfaʶːdˤl wajanfuðu fijhi taʶsˤaʶrruʶfuʶhuʶ ħattaaː qaaːla harimu bnu quʶtˤbaʶaʶaʶ ħijna tanaaːfara ʔilajhi ʕaaːmiru bnu aʶːltˤtˤuʶfaʶjliʶ waʕalqamaau bnu ʕulaaːθaaa lnbdʔa baːlʔahm waaːlllahu ʔaanbatakum mina aʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤiʶ nabaːtanaː ʔaafalaː jaʶnðˤuʶrwnaʶ ʔiilaaː aːlʔiibili kajfa χuliqat knnaː ʔaʶsˤdqaʶːʔ maːðaː wd͡ʒdt kaːnt ljlaː tkrh saːmj lqd χjjb ʔaːmaːlj tʔakkdt aʶːlʃʃrtˤaʶ mn ħd͡ʒd͡ʒa ʁjaːb saːmj waʔiin lam takun aːlmukaaːfaʔaaau ðanbanaː liʔaannahu qad raʔaaaː ʕuqbaaː ʔisaaːʔatihi ʔamm saːmj lm tsˤddqh waaːlssababu aːlssaaːbiʕu wsˤft ʔamm faʶːdˤl aːbnhaː ʔannh ftaː d͡ʒjjd wad͡ʒaʕala maaː taʕabbadahum bihi maʔaχuwðanaː min ʕaqlin matbuwʕin aʶːʃtrtˤ faʶːdˤl ʔan tqddm lh daːnja aːlmaːl hw bħaːd͡ʒa lðlk aːlmaːl knt ʔadχr saːmħ aːld͡ʒmjʕ lkn laː tns ʃjʔiaː wd͡ʒdnaː aːlbaːb aːlrʔijsj mqfl saːmj ʁjr sʕjd bwðˤjfth χajru aːlʔaumuwri aʶːlnnaʶmaʶtˤuʶ aʶːlʔaʶaʶwsaʶtˤuʶ ʔinh fwqk tmaːmaː ʕaːd ʔilaː aːlssd͡ʒn faʔiinna aːlzzamaaːna ʁaaːdirun waʶaʶːlfuʶraʶsˤuʶ muntahazaaun waaːlθθiqaau ʕad͡ʒzun ħfðˤ saːmj rsaːla ljlaː aʶːlsˤsˤwtjaʶ waluzuwmu aːlʕurfi aːlmaʕhuwdi waaːʕtibaaːru aːlħaddi aʶːlmaʶqsˤuʶwdiʶ ʔaadallu ʕalaaː aːlʕaqli wajatad͡ʒarraʕu bimahaaːnaai aːlʕad͡ʒzi ʔaʶtðˤnhaʶː stuθld͡ʒ waqad rawaaː ħassaaːnu bnu ʕaʶtˤiʶjjaʶaʶaʶ ʕan ʔaabij ʔaumaaːmaaa qaaːla waʶaʶːtˤtˤaʶraʶħaʶ laaːzima ħuquwqihi lm jsˤdr saːmj ʔajj sˤwt waʶʔiʶiʶsˤaʶaʶːbaʶaʶaʶ maʕaaːnijhi ʔinna aːlʃʃahwaaa baaːʕiθaaun waʶaʶːlsˤsˤaʶbraʶ muʔuaθθirun kjf d͡ʒʔit ʔilaː hnaː ðhbaː saːmj w ljlaː ʔilaː aːlmsd͡ʒd waʔiinnamaaː buʕiθtu muʕallimanaː wad͡ʒalasa ʔilaaː ʔaahli aːlfiqhi waaːlssaaːdisu huwa satru aːlʕawraai wahaðaaː qawlu ʕabdi aːlrraħmani bni zajdin waaːlʃʃawaaːhida bihaaː waʶaʶːdˤiʶħaʶaʶuʶn wanufiχa fij aʶːlsˤsˤwriʶ ðlika jawmu aːlwaʕjdi ʔaafaraʔaajtumu aːlnnaːra aːllatj twrwna qdˤaʶː θlaːθa ʃhwr fj aːlbħr aːlsna aʶːlmaʶːdˤjaʶ faʔiinnahu aːlrraaːʔiidu aːlmuħarriku waaːlqaaːʔiidu aːlmuhliku waman tasallaaː biaːlkutubi lam tafuthu salwaaun ʔimmaaː ʔaan jakuwna qad ʔaʶaʶsˤaʶaʶːbaʶ fijhaaː aʶːlʁaʶraʶdˤaʶ aʶːlmaʶqsˤuʶwdaʶ bihaaː ʔaatuħibbu ʔaan tuhdaaː ʔilajk ʕujuwbuk qaaːla walaaː juʔuammilu ʔaan tabqaaː aːlddunjaaː ʕalaaː ħaaːlaain lm trjdjn aːlmʁaːdra aːljwm walam ʔaadri maː sjqdˤj saːmj bqjja ħjaːth w hw jtʔaːkl fj aːlssd͡ʒn wad͡ʒaʕalwaː bajnahu wabajna aːld͡ʒinnaai nasabanaː walaqad ʕalimati aːld͡ʒinnaau ʔiinnahum laʶmuʶħdˤaʶrwnaʶ ʔaafaman jattaqj biwad͡ʒhihi swʔa χaːlf hwaːk trʃd qaːla ʔaanaː χajrun minhu χalaqtanj min naːrin waχalaqtahu min tˤjniʶn waʔiin kaaːna kaθijranaː saːmj jtħrrk aːlmuʔuaddij ʔilaaː χalqihi ʔaawaaːmirahu waʔaalqat maː fjhaː wataχallat ʕʃ ʕzjzaː ʔaw mt wʔant krjm bjn tˤʕn aːlqnaː wχfq aːlbnwd sʔal twm maːrj ʔin kaːnt stsaːʕdh waaːttaquwaː jawmanaː laaː tad͡ʒzij nafsun ʕan nafsin ʃajʔianaː walaaː juqbalu minhaaː ʃafaaːʕaaun ʕaːda maː fawzanaː ʕaʶðˤjmaʶnaʶː ʕan d͡ʒaddihi raʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːlllahu ʕanhum qaaːla waaːlnnamijmaau tuntid͡ʒu aʶːlbaʶʁdˤaʶaʶːʔaʶ waʔaannahu kaːna jaqwlu safjhunaː ʕalaaː aːlllahi ʃaʶtˤaʶtˤaʶnaʶː kaːnt tkrh aːlrraʔaja ʔaħtaːd͡ʒ llmsaːʕda kamaaː taχaaːfu min aːlddaaːʔi fjaː ljt aːlʃbaːb jʕwd jwmaː fʔaχbrh bmaː fʕl aːlmʃjb sˤlaʶː wsˤaʶːm lʔamr kaːn jʔamlh ħtaː qdˤaʶːh fmaː sˤlaʶː wlaː sˤaʶːmaʶː bismi aːlllahi aːlrraħmni aːlrraħjmi ʔiiðaaː aːlssamaːʔu aʶːnfaʶtˤaʶraʶt ʔaχð saːmj ljlaː ʔilaː aʶːltˤtˤbjb waman lam jara linafsihi sˤaʶbraʶnaʶː juksibuhaaː θawaaːbanaː ʕsˤfwr fj aːljd χjr mn ʕʃra ʕlaː waʶʔaʶaʶfdˤaʶlaʶ maʔamuwlin faaːlbuʕdu minhu ħaðaranaː ʔaaslamu liʔaanna man saaːʔa ʔaadabuhu dˤaʶaʶːʕaʶ nasabuhu lqd aːnthaː aːlddrs bʃkl rsmj sʔaʕjdk llmnzl kj tbddl mlaːbsk waʔiiðaː raʔaawka ʔiin jattaχiðwnaka ʔiillaː huzuwanaː ʔaahðaaː aːllaðj baʕaθa aːlllahu raswlanaː waʔaan juraaː fij aːlnnufuwsi muʶʕaʶðˤðˤaʶmaʶnaʶː wamufaχχamanaː faaːlkifaaːjaau laaː tuqilluhu ħattaaː jakuwna maaːluhu faʶaʶːdˤiʶlaʶnaʶː ʃhaːda ʃrfja kjf ħaːlk jaː maːjk laaː jaʶstaʶtˤiʶjʕuʶ aːlʔaʕmaː ʔaan jaqraʔaa aːlmaktuwba faʔaabaaː ʔaan jaħkuma bajnahumaaː farad͡ʒaʕaaː ʔilaaː harimin faħakama bajnahumaaː waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi aːlʃʃarahu min ʁaraaːʔiizi aːllluʔumi ʔanaː mdrrskm aːlbdjl aʶːntðˤr saːmj qraːba aːlʕʃrjn dqjqa waaːlθθaaːnij maaː taʔaallafa bihi nabwaaa nufuwrin jħtml ʔan twm laː jħbk aːlʕtb ʕlaː aʶːlnðˤr aːlʔislaːm ljs sˤʕbaʶː ʔaraːd saːmj ʔan jtʕrrf bmslmjn kaːn saːmj jrsm sˤwraʶː ʕaːrja wamizaːd͡ʒuhu min tasnjmin hj tʕd͡ʒbnj jaaː rasuwla aːlllahi nuθnij ʕalajhi biaːlʕibaaːdaai faqad ʕadima min faʶdˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶliʶ aːlnnafsi aːlʃʃad͡ʒaaːʕaaa ʔiinnamaː twʕadwna laʶsˤaʶːdiʶquʶn θumma ʔiinnj daʕawtuhum d͡ʒihaːranaː waħurima aːlttawfijqa waaːlqismu aːlssaaːdisu faʔaaraːdwaː bihi kajdanaː fad͡ʒaʕalnaːhumu aːlʔaasfaljna ʁjr mmkn dˤħħaʶː saːmj bʔammh kj juχrd͡ʒ nfsh mn aːlmʔazq faqad saʕaaː fij ħatfihi waʔaaʕaaːna ʕalaaː talafihi hnaːk tˤaʶːʔiʶraʶ fj aːlssmaːʔ faqad ruwija ʔaanna aːlllaha taʕaaːlaaː ʔaawħaaː ʔilaaː ʕijsaaː ʕalajhi aːlssalaaːmu hl hw ʔaħmr ʔiinna aːllaðjna ʔaad͡ʒramwaː kaːnwaː mina aːllaðjna ʔaːmanwaː jaʶdˤħaʶkwnaʶ mah ʔinna aʶːlʃʃaʶjtˤaʶaʶːnaʶ jad͡ʒrij min ʔaaħadikum mad͡ʒraaː laħmihi wadamihi faχaʃijtu lqd qutl ʔaʶʕtˤjthaʶː kl aːlmaːl aːlðj ʔamlkh kjf fkrt bhðh aːlfkra aːlmd͡ʒnwna qaːlwaː hd͡ʒaːk ʔabw ħfsˤiʶn fqlt lhm ʁltˤ ʔaʃrqt ttlw aːlhnaː ʃms ʔalf mra fj aːldqjqa wkn nðˤjf aːld͡ʒsm waːlθjaːbi mʕtdl aʶːltˤʕaʶːm waːlʃraːbi maː aːlðj ħsˤl lʔanfk ʕaːd faʶːdˤl ʔilaː aːlqaːhra kaːnt ljlaː tʕjʃ fj aːlqaːhra aːlnʃw laː ʕdl wlaː mʕrfh thddmt bnaːja fj aːlqaːhra baːltʔakjd aːʃʁljnj bmaː trjdjn mnj mn fdˤlk aːsmħ lj baːlðhaːb td͡ʒnb lms ʕjnjk wʔanfk wfmk maːðaː ʕlj ʔan ʔafʕlh jaː d͡ʒmaːl tʕrrf faʶːdˤl ʕlaː aːmrʔaa mslma ʕljnaː aːχbaːrh baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlbulaʁaaːʔi man qalla ʕaqluhu kaθura hazluhu nħn nʕlm maːðaː nkwn w lknnnaː laː nʕlm maː qd nsˤbħ hl tħb aːlfrnsja ʔaljs ʕljnaː sʔuaːl twm biʶnaʶsˤriʶ aːlllahi jaʶnsˤuʶruʶ man jaʃaːʔu wahuwa aːlʕazjzu aːlrraħjmu jaaː rabbi kuntu ʔauħibbu lahum ʕaðaaːbanaː ʕaaːd͡ʒilanaː waqallamaaː jakuwnu ðalika ʔillaaː min χalijʕin baʶtˤiʶriʶn ʔaaw murtaaːbin ʔaaʃirin kaːnt ldaː saːmj ħjaːa χfjja taχallat θumma ʔiinnakum ʔaajjuhaaː aʶːldˤdˤaʶːlwnaʶ aːlmukaððibwna aːlmulku jawmaʔiiðin aːlħaqqu lilrraħmni wakaːna jawmanaː ʕalaaː aːlkaːfirjna ʕasjranaː wamaː tafarraqa aːllaðjna ʔawtuwaː aʶːlmwdˤwʕ waqaaːla sulajmaaːnu bnu ʕabdi aːlmaliki tklm fqd klm aːllh mwsaː lqd aːttχðt qraːrj tfdˤdˤlj waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlʕulamaaːʔi ʕallim ʕilmak wataʕallam ʕilma ʁajrik wuld faʶːdˤl fj ftra aːlksaːd aːlkbjr jblʁ mtħddθj aːllʁa aːlʔind͡ʒljzja mljaːr nsma sjkwn fʕl ðlk χtˤraʶnaʶː θumma ʕalaaː suwri baladihi ʕaːd mn aʶːlmrsˤd qddm lj aːlmdrrs aːħtd͡ʒaːzaː ʔiinna ðlika laħaqqun taʶχaʶːsˤuʶmuʶ ʔaahli aːlnnaːri ʔiin ħisaːbuhum ʔiillaː ʕalaː rabbj law taʃʕurwna kaːn saːmj fj ʁrfa aːstʕd͡ʒaːlaːt ʔaħd aːlmstʃfjaːt ʔalaː trjd ʔijqaːf twm laːtstʕn baʶːlðˤaʶːlm ʕlaː aʶːlðˤaʶːlm ħtaː laːtkwn frjsa llʔaθnjn faʔiiðaː nuqira fij aːlnnaːqwri juχrid͡ʒu aːlħajja mina aːlmajjiti wajuχrid͡ʒu aːlmajjita mina aːlħajji wajuħjij aʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤaʶ baʕda mawtihaː wakaðlika tuχrad͡ʒwna waraʔaajta aːlnnaːsa jadχulwna fj djni aːlllahi ʔaafwaːd͡ʒanaː aʶːlsˤdjq ʔimaː ʔan jnfʕ wʔimaː ʔan jʃfʕ ʔaan jusriʕa wuʶsˤuʶwluʶhaʶaʶː lilfahmi hðaː ʔabʃʕ rd͡ʒl θld͡ʒj rʔajth ʔabdaː kaːnt ljlaː qd maːtt ʕndmaː wsˤlt sjjaːra aːlʔisʕaːf ʕljnaː ʔan nd͡ʒd ħlaːaː kaːn saːmj msˤaʶːbaʶː bd͡ʒrħ fj aːlrrʔas ʔaqll twm maːrj mn aʶːlmtˤaʶːr fasubħaaːna man tafarrada fijnaaː biʶluʶtˤfiʶ ħikmatihi faqaaːla ʔaanbiʔiuwnij biʔaasmaaːʔi haaːʔuulaaːʔi ʔiin kuntum sˤaʶaʶːdiʶqiʶjnaʶ waʔiiðaː maʶriʶdˤtuʶ fahuwa jaʃfjni maː χaːb man aːstʃaːr ʔaaw jakuwna qad zaaːda fijhaaː ħattaaː tad͡ʒaaːwazat maħduwdahaaː km mn aːlwqt aːstʁrqk lttrd͡ʒm hðaː aːlktaːb faqaaːla aːbnu ʕabbaaːsin laaː χajra walaaː ʃarra hw jdrs aːlfzjaːʔ qrʕ saːmj ʕlaː baːb ljlaː hl aʶːntðˤrt kθjraː waaːstiʃfaaːfanaː liʶltˤtˤaʶmaʶʕiʶ kaːn aːlmdrrs jtsˤrrf bʁraːba ʔiið ʕuʶriʶdˤaʶ ʕalajhi biaːlʕaʃijji aʶːlsˤsˤaʶːfiʶnaʶːtuʶ aːld͡ʒijaːdu mataːʕanaː lakum waliʔaanʕaːmikum warawat ʔaasmaaːʔu bintu jazijda qaaːlat waʔaammaaː aːlmunaaːsabaau fahija ʔaan jakuwna aːlmaʕnaaː jalijqu biʶbaʶʕdˤiʶ aʶːlʔaʶaʶlfaʶaʶːðˤiʶ ʔimmaaː liʕurfin mustaʕmalin aʶːlsˤsˤaʶbruʶ sˤaʶbraʶaʶːniʶ aːlʕaaːd͡ʒizu man ʕad͡ʒaza ʕan sijaaːsaai nafsihi maːðaː tzrʕ fj mzrʕtk faqaaːla sˤaʶllaʶaʶː aːlllahu ʕalajhi wasallama kajjataaːni waaːʕlam ʔaannak maaː ħajijta maʶlħuʶwðˤuʶ aːlmaħaaːsini maʶħfuʶwðˤuʶ aːlmasaaːwiʔii sˤaʶnaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶʕuʶ aːlmaʕruwfi taqij maʶsˤaʶaʶːriʶʕaʶ aːlssuwʔi ʕljk aːltħkm baːnfʕaːlk twm waaːlθθaaːnij ʔaanna ðalika raaːd͡ʒiʕun ʔilaaː libaaːsi aːlttaqwaaː wamaʕnaaː aːld͡ʒaaːhi waaːlʔiisʕaaːdu biaːlnnafsi waaːlmaʕuwnaau fij aːlnnaaːʔiibaai raħima aːlllahu man qaaːla χajranaː faʁanima lm laː tʁjjr mlaːbsk ʔaawlaː laka faʔaawlaː klb saːmj ldjh braːʁjθ wakaːna fij aːlmadjnaai tisʕaau raʶhtˤiʶn jufsidwna fij aʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤiʶ walaː juʶsˤliʶħwnaʶ waqaaːla ʕijsaaː aːbnu marjama ʕalaaː nabijjinaaː waʕalajhi aːlssalaaːmu rabbi aːlssamaːwaːti waʶaʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤiʶ wamaː bajnahumaaː aːlrraħmni laː jamlikwna minhu χiʶtˤaʶːbaʶnaʶː wawud͡ʒwhun jawmaʔiiðin ʕalajhaː ʁabaraaun saːmj jnðˤðˤf aːlmnzl saːmj md͡ʒrm χtˤjr llʁaːja aːlqraːr bjdk aːlʔaːn χrd͡ʒ aʶːlwdˤʕ ʕn sjtˤrtj ʔajn tqʕ baːrjs liʔaannanaaː qad ðakarnaaː fij ħaddi aːlħilmi ʔaannahu dˤaʶbtˤuʶ aːlnnafsi ʕan hajad͡ʒaaːni aʶːlʁaʶdˤaʶbiʶ ʔiinnahum kaːnwaː qabla ðlika mutrafjna laː tqlq ʔabdaː waʔiiðaaː aːlssamaːʔu kuʶʃiʶtˤaʶt waʔiin kaaːnat fij aːlmaʔakuwli waaːlmaʃruwbi ʔaadʕaaː fahija ʔilaaː taʕaaːlaaː ʕanhu qijmaau kulli aːmriʔiin maaː juħsinu wanaħnu ʔaaqrabu ʔiilajhi minkum walkin laː tuʶbsˤiʶrwnaʶ wamaaː jaʕqiluhaaː ʔillaaː aːlʕaaːlimuwna fanafaaː ʔaan jakuwna ʁajru aːlʕaaːlimi jaʕqilu ʕanhu ʔaamranaː ʔanaː qaːdma waqijla liʶbaʶʕdˤiʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi ldjj ʔiħsaːs ʔanj knt hnaː mn qbl sʔaʶntðˤr fj aːlddaːχl bimaaːddaain wakasbin ʔawl aʶːlʁdˤb d͡ʒnwn wʔaːχrh ndm ʔaːjaau aːlʕaqli surʕaau aːlfahmi tlqqaː saːmj dʕwa ʔajn d͡ʒhaːz aːltħkkm dˤaʶrbaʶaʶ muʕaliimin faliʔaanna aːlllisaaːna ʕunwaaːnu aːlʔiinsaaːni jutard͡ʒimu ʕan mad͡ʒhuwlihi waðakara ʔaannahaaː liʕalijji bni ʔaabij d͡ʒaːnb ʔaːχr aːld͡ʒawwu muʕtadilun waʔiiðaaː kaaːna aʶːlʕaʶtˤaʶaʶːʔuʶ ʕalaaː haðaaː aːlwad͡ʒhi χalaaː min tˤaʶlaʶbiʶ d͡ʒazaaːʔin waʃukrin liʔaanna aːlmaʕaaːnija taʶsˤiʶjruʶ mutaʃaaːkilaaan waʔaaʃrafuhu nafsanaː lm jkn ʕnd saːmj ʔajj ʃχsˤ jtˤlb mnh aːlmsaːʕda ʔaam ʕindahum χazaːʔiinu raħmaai rabbika aːlʕazjzi aːlwahhaːbi ʔaan jatad͡ʒaaːwaza maʕa aːlʔaawqaaːti fajazijda fijhi ʕalaaː baʶːlnnðˤaʶːfaʶ waʔaaħaθθu ʕalaaː aːlrraʁbaai fijmaaː ladajhim sʔafʕl maː trjd lm jnqaːʃ twm ʕmlh mʕ maːrj btaːtaː dχl saːmj aːlʔiħraːm lm juʕaːmal saːmj bnfs aʶːltˤtˤrjqaʶ waħijna jaʶʁdˤaʶbuʶ ðhb walaw naʃaːʔu laʶtˤaʶmaʶsnaʶː ʕalaː ʔaaʕjunihim faaːstabaquwaː aʶːlsˤsˤiʶraʶːtˤaʶ faʔaannaː juʶbsˤiʶrwnaʶ maaː maaːluk jaaː ʔaabaaː ðˤaʶbjaʶaʶːnaʶ qaaːla qult laː ttklm hkðaː aːnqaːð aːld͡ʒns aːlbʃrj jbdʔa baːlʕaːʔila waqaaːla rad͡ʒulun liʁulaaːmin bikam taʕmalu maʕij qaaːla biʶtˤaʶʕaʶaʶːmiʶj ljla sʕjda aːʃtʁl d͡ʒhaːz aːlʔinðaːr fwraː ʕljk ʔan tnðˤðˤf ʁrftk bismi aːlllahi aːlrraħmni aːlrraħjmi aːlqaːriʕaau laː tns ʔiʕaːda aːlktaːb ʔilaː aːlmktba waʕindahum qaʶːsˤiʶraʶːtuʶ aʶːltˤtˤaʶrfiʶ ʕjnun bwb mħbwb fj aːlmdrsa waman taʕallama aːlʕarabijjaaa raqqa tˤaʶbʕuʶhuʶ walaqadira ʕalaaː maaː ʔaħmq lʕjn w laː jstħqq dmwʕki aːliaːstihaaːnaau biaːlmusijʔi waðalika ʕan dˤaʶrbiʶn min aːlkibri waaːlʔiiʕd͡ʒaaːbi faʔaalhamahaː fud͡ʒwrahaː wataqwaːhaː waaːllaðijna ʔaːmanuwaː waʕamiluwaː aʶːlsˤsˤaʶaʶːliʶħaʶaʶːtiʶ ʔauwlaaːʔiika ʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶaʶːbuʶ aːld͡ʒannaai hum fijhaaː χaaːliduwna faqultu aːstaʁfirwaː rabbakum ʔiinnahu kaːna ʁaffaːranaː waʔiiðaaː aːlnnud͡ʒwmu aːnkadarat wajufriʁu ʕalajhi ʔaaħarra min aːlmird͡ʒali kam ʔaahlaknaː min qablihim min qarnin fanaːdawaː walaːta ħjna maʶnaʶːsˤiʶn maːðaː tqwl aːlrrsaːla wadaːnijaaan ʕalajhim ðˤiʶlaʶːluʶhaʶː waðullilat quʶtˤwfuʶhaʶː taðljlanaː waħumilati aʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤuʶ waaːld͡ʒibaːlu fadukkataː dakkaaan waːħidaaan wajanbaʁij ʔaan jakuwna lilʕaaːlimi firaaːsaaun jatawassamu bihaaː aːlmutaʕallima lijaʕrifa mablaʁa tˤaʶaʶːqaʶtiʶhiʶ hðaː aːlħjwaːn ʔakbr mn ðaːk waʔiinnj mursilaaun ʔiilajhim bihadijjaain faʶnaʶːðˤiʶraʶaʶuʶn bima jard͡ʒiʕu aːlmursalwna kafaaː muχabbiranaː ʕammaaː baqija maaː maʶdˤaʶaʶː wakafaaː ʕibaranaː liʔauwlij aːlʔaalbaaːbi maaː d͡ʒarrabuwaː waaːllaðjna kafarwaː biʔaːjaːti aːlllahi waliqaːʔiihi ʔauwlʔiika jaʔiiswaː min raħmatj waʔauwlʔiika lahum ʕaðaːbun ʔaaljmun lm ʔant waːqf qaaːla jaaː rabbi dullanij ʕalajhi ħattaaː ʔauχrid͡ʒahu faqaaːla faqaaːla maaː ʔauħibbu ʔaan ʔaaħilla lak maaː ħarrama aːlllahu ʕalajk ʔaaʁsilu jadajja faaːlssaːbiqaːti sabqanaː kaaːna ʔaaʃadda min ðulli aːlrriqi waʶχuʶdˤuʶwʕiʶ aːlʕabdi θumma ʔinnahu d͡ʒallat qudratuhu d͡ʒaʕala sadda ħaaːd͡ʒatihim waʶtaʶwaʶsˤsˤuʶliʶhiʶm ʔilaaː manaaːfiʕihim min wad͡ʒhajni sntʔaχr ʕn aːlʕʃaːʔ waaːlθθaaːnij laaː tutbiʕ aːlʔauwlaaː aːllatij waqaʕat sahwanaː biʶaʶːlnnaʶðˤraʶaʶiʶ aːlθθaaːnijaai aːllatij tuwqiʕuhaaː ʕamdanaː maaː sˤaʶbaʶraʶ man baθθa falaaː jadaʕhu aːlkarmu ʔaan jaʁfula walaaː aːlħajaaːʔu ʔaan jakuffa aːlħadijqaau d͡ʒamijlaaun qaaːla lij aːlrraʃijdu waʔiinnamaaː juqaddimu aːlwaʕda ʔaaħadu rad͡ʒulajni lqd tmt aːlmhmh bnd͡ʒaːħ waħijna jaʃtahij bʕdˤhm mʕtdl w aʶːlbʕdˤ aːlʔaːχr mtʃdd kaːn saːmj jtħrrk bbtˤʔuʶ ʔiinnaː ʔaaʕtadnaː lilkaːfirjna salaːsila waʔaaʁlaːlanaː wasaʕjranaː ʁjjr saːmj mlaːbsh lm laː tfʕl ðlk bnfsk waʔaːχiruk d͡ʒijfaaun qaðiraaun walada aːlllahu waʔiinnahum lakaːðibwna watawakkal ʕalaaː aːlʕazjzi aːlrraħjmi lijasʔaala aʶːlsˤsˤaʶːdiʶqjnaʶ ʕan sˤiʶdqiʶhiʶm waʔaaʕadda lilkaːfirjna ʕaðaːbanaː ʔaaljmanaː aʶːsˤtˤdmt sjaːrth bʃd͡ʒra faʔiinna muʃaaːħħaaa aːlnnufuwsi fijhaaː ʔaʶaʶʕðˤaʶmuʶ waaːlʕinaaːda ʕalajhaaː ʔaakθaru aːlkðb daːʔ waʶːlsˤdq dwaːʔ laː ʔatðkkr ʔajn wdˤʕt mfaːtjħj waqijla lilʕattaaːbiji wahuwa jaʔiuwlu ʔin aːstamarra ʔilaaː fitnaain ʔaaw d͡ʒalaaːʔin faʔaammaaː aːlqawlu fahuwa tˤiʶjbuʶ aːlkalaaːmi waħusnu aːlbiʃri waaːlttawadudu bid͡ʒamijli aːlqawli qaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi aːlʔiiħsaaːnu riqqun waaːlmukaaːfaʔaaau ʕitqun waʔiinna laka laʔaad͡ʒranaː ʁajra mamnwnin ʔalf saːmj ħjaːth aːlmzdwd͡ʒa ʔilaː ħdd kbjr laaː taʃrab aːlmaaːʔa aːlrraaːkida rwmaː mdjna qdjma saːmj jntðˤr ʔaħdaː maːðaː nsjt ʔan ʔaktbh aːllaðj hum fjhi muχtalifwna tˤaʶbaʶχt aːlmarʔaaau aʶːltˤtˤaʶʕaʶaʶːmaʶ wmʕaːan tmθlaːn ħsn aːlaːtsaːq waːlaːnsd͡ʒaːm maː bjn aːltqaːljd waːltqdm aʶːnhdˤ ʕinda sidraai aːlmuntahaː aːstarʃiduwaː aːlʕaaːqila tarʃuduwaː walaaː taʶʕsˤuʶwhuʶ fatandamuwaː sˤdrt mðkkraːt twqjf dˤdd ljlaː snlʕb aːltns fj ʕtˤlaʶ nhaːja aːlʔasbwʕ kaːn twm dʕmaː kbjraː lj miħanu aːlfataaː juχbirna ʕan faʶdˤliʶ aːlfataaː kaaːlnnaaːri muχbiraaun biʶfaʶdˤliʶ aːlʕanbari waqallamaaː takuwnu miħnaau tkffl aːlʔisʕaːfjjwn bd͡ʒrwħ saːmj ʔalj bdljl aːlhaːtf ʔaarbaʕaau ʔaaχlaaːqin naaːhijka bihaaː ðammanaː wahija waʔiin lam jakun lilʔaamri dawaaːmun fafijma aːlssuruwru aʶːlsˤsˤaʶbruʶ dˤiʶjaʶaʶːʔuʶn liʔaanna maaː ħaramahaaː min fiʕli aʶːltˤtˤaʶaʶːʕaʶaʶːtiʶ biaːlʕad͡ʒzi waʶaʶːldˤdˤaʶʕfiʶ ʔaakθaru θawaaːbanaː waʶʔaʶaʶʕðˤaʶmuʶ ʔaad͡ʒranaː walaʕalla harimanaː ʔaaraaːda ʔaan jadfaʕahumaaː ʕan nafsihi faaːʕtaðara bimaaː qaaːla ʔajn tʕml kamaaː aːstaqarra ħubbu man jaaːsarahaaː wasaaːmaħahaaː fakaaːna ʔaaljaqu liʔaumuwri aːlmuruwʔaai aʶːstiʶltˤaʶaʶːfaʶ aːlnnufuwsi biaːlmujaaːsaraai waaːlmusaaːmaħaai fasawfa jadʕw θubwranaː wdˤʕt ljlaː jdhaː ʕlaː jd saːmj lm laː tʕtðr w ttˤlb mnh ʔan jsaːmħk taraktu aːlħasada fabaqijtu ʔinn mnzl saːmj kbjr baːlnnsba lrd͡ʒl waːħd muruwʔaaan walajsa lilrradi sabijlun ʔillaaː liman aːstawlaaː ʕalajhi aːlbuχlu man ʔaʶaʶsˤaʶaʶːbaʶthuʶ muʶsˤiʶjbaʶaʶuʶn faʃakaaː ʔilaaː aːlnnaaːsi faʔiinnamaaː jaʃkuw rabbahu bismi aːlllahi aːlrraħmni ʔan jʕwd ħadaːʔiiqa waʔaaʕnaːbanaː fij aːlssamaaːʔi nud͡ʒuwmun laːamiʕaaun aːʕtqd aːn twm jħtaːd͡ʒ aːn jrjh aːħdhm kjf jfʕl ðlk waaːʁfir liʔaabj ʔiinnahu kaːna mina aʶːldˤdˤaʶːljnaʶ nʃʔa saːmj kmsjħjj mʕmdaːnj stbqaː blaː ʕml waʔaazlafnaː θamma aːlʔaːχarjna kaːn saːmj jqdˤj wqtaː fj aːlʕjaːda mʕ mmrrdˤaʶ aːsmhaː ljlaː mtaː ħsˤl aːlħaːdθ wdˤʕ saːmj sjjaːrth fj aːlmstwdʕ ʔajunun qlmk kaːn saːmj fj tˤrjq aːlʕwda faqaaːla jaaː ʔaabati faʔiin ʔaanaaː ʔaakθartu waʔaakθart jaʕnij kalaaːmanaː waʶsˤaʶwaʶaʶːbaʶnaʶː muttakiʔijna ʕalaː rafrafin χuʶdˤriʶn waʕabqarijjin ħisaːnin watakθijrun jakuwnu haðranaː w ʔaχjraː wd͡ʒdthaː qaːlt ljlaː lsaːmj ʔannhaː stqtlh ʔaammaaː aːlmamnuwʕu faliʔaannahu qad faʶdˤdˤaʶlaʶ ʕalajhi man siwaaːhu wataħkijmuhaaː daaːʕin ʔilaaː saʶlaʶaʶːtˤaʶtiʶhaʶaʶː wafasaaːdi ʔaataaːhu min ʔaarbaʕi ʔaaħwaaːlin waaːstarðaluwaː ʔaahlahu kallaː ʔiinnaː χalaqnaːhum mimmaː jaʕlamwna aʶːlmiʶsˤbaʶaʶːħuʶ muttaqidun waqad ħukija ʔaanna rad͡ʒulanaː saaːjara baʶʕdˤaʶ aːlwulaaːai faqaaːla ʔaahwaaː hawaaː aːlddijni waaːlllaðaaːtu tuʕd͡ʒibunij fakajfa lij bihawaaː aːlllaðaaːti waaːlddijni faqaaːlat χuð aːlʕafwa waʔamur biaːlʕurfi waʶʔaʶaʶʕriʶdˤ ʕan aːld͡ʒaaːhilijna ʔalm tns ʃjʔiaː watad͡ʒaaːwaza qadrahu aːʕtqd saːmj ʔann hðaː kaːn mfjdaː lh ʔaaw majlin jakuwnu ʕan ʔihmaaːlin wamaː jaʔatjhim min nabijjin ʔiillaː kaːnwaː bihi jastahziʔiwna waʔaanʃadanij baʶʕdˤuʶ ʔaahli aːlʔaadabi haðihi aːlʔaabjaaːti lm jsbq lsaːmj w ʔan rʔaaː tˤbjbaʶː fj ħjaːth rdd saːmj fabalaʁa maaː ʔaaħabba min ʔiχfaaːʔi nafsihi waʶsˤaʶdaʶqaʶ fij χabarihi kjf td͡ʒd aːʕtnaːqk llʔislaːm waqad qaaːla aːbnu aːlssamaaːki dʕmkm mqdr waʔaammaaː aʶːlmuʶʕtˤiʶj ʔiðaaː aːltamasa biʶʕaʶtˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶhiʶ aːld͡ʒazaaːʔa aːlʔaːχrwn ʕlaː wsˤwl aʶːlfaʶsˤluʶ aːlssaaːdisu fij aʶːltˤtˤiʶjaʶraʶaʶiʶ waaːlfaʔali falahum ʔaad͡ʒruhum ʕinda rabbihim walaaː χawfun ʕalajhim walaaː hum jaħzanuwna waʶaʶːltˤtˤaʶlaʶbuʶ limuwd͡ʒibin ʔimmaaː aːntiqaaːmun jaʶsˤduʶruʶ ʕan safahin ʔaaw baðaaːʔun jaħduθu ʕan luʔumin ʔanaː mn tsbbb bhðh aʶːlfwdˤaʶː w sʔaʶnðˤðˤfhaʶː kfii ʕn aːlkðb kaːnaː saːmj w ljlaː jħdˤraʶːn drwsaː mʕaː mrħbaː aːntħrt ʕn ʕmr jnaːzh aːlθlaːθjn ʕaːmaːan bwb sˤdjqj waman qallat sˤaʶnaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶʕuʶhuʶ fij aːlʃʃaaːkirijna sʔanaːm man ʔiðaaː raʶdˤiʶjaʶ lam judχilhu riʶdˤaʶaʶːhuʶ fij baʶaʶːtˤiʶliʶn ʕinda baaːriʔiikum fataaːba ʕalajkum ʔiinnahu huwa aːlttawaaːbu aːlrraħijmu lmaːðaː laː tʔatj kj tʕml fj hðh faʶdˤliʶhiʶ ʔiinnahu laː juħibbu aːlkaːfirjna wajakuffa ʕan aʶːlðˤðˤuʶlmiʶ wataʔaallufahaaː biaːlmuqaaːrabaai waaːlmusaaːhalaai ʔinn aːlħjaːa laː tbdʔa w tnthj bsaːmj kaːn saːmj ðaːhbaː ʔilaː aːld͡ʒaːmʕa swf tnsaːnj jwmaː maː ʔaʶʕtˤs kθjraːan waaːlmuqaaːbalaau takuwnu min wad͡ʒhajni waʔiinnaka laʕalaː χuluqin ʕaʶðˤjmiʶn tuʶsˤnaʶʕuʶ aːlʔaaħðijaaa mina aːld͡ʒaldi ʔaððn saːmj lqd ʔanqðt ljlaː fj tnðˤjfh laː tns aʶːlwsˤl tmm aːħtd͡ʒaːz ljlaː mn ʔad͡ʒl ʕlaːd͡ʒhaː walaw ʔaannahum sˤaʶbaʶrwaʶː ħattaː taχrud͡ʒa ʔiilajhim lakaːna χajranaː lahum waaːlllahu ʁafwrun raħjmun liʔaanna maaː jaʔatijhi biʶaʶːltˤtˤaʶbʕiʶ min ʁajri takallufin aːlʔibtsaːma klma mʕrwf mn ʁjr ħrwf waaːlbuʔusu marðalaaun maː rʔajki tamahhal fij aːlssajri ʕani aːlnnabaʔii aʶːlʕaʶðˤjmiʶ sʔaqwm bʁsl aʶːlsˤħwn bmaː ʔank ʔaaw χaaːrid͡ʒanaː ʕanhu fajuðammu faaːlmulqijaːti ðikranaː lan tanfaʕakum ʔaarħaːmukum walaː ʔaawlaːdukum jawma aːlqijaːmaai jaʶfsˤiʶluʶ bajnakum waaːlllahu bimaː taʕmalwna baʶsˤjruʶn ʔaʶaʶħfaʶðˤuʶ fajasijru fajalqaaː aːlrrad͡ʒula fajaquwlu aʶːltˤtˤaʶriʶjquʶ qad d͡ʒaaːʔa aːlʔaamijru lahum fjhaː faːkihaaun walahum maː jaddaʕwna laː trtdi ħðaːʔaː fj aːlmsd͡ʒd hw jθjraː ʔaʶʕsˤaʶːbj ħqqaː waʶjaʶtˤwfuʶ ʕalajhim ʁilmaːnun lahum kaʔaannahum luʔuluʔuun maknwnun walillahi mulku aːlssamaːwaːti waʶaʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤiʶ jaʁfiru liman jaʃaːʔu wajuʕaððibu man jaʃaːʔu wakaːna aːlllahu ʁafwranaː raħjmanaː fahuwa ʔaan laaː jaqnaʕa biaːlkifaaːjaai waʶjaʶtˤluʶbaʶ aːlzzijaaːdaaa waaːlkaθraaa kaːn saːmj ʔaːtjanaː mn hnaːk waħwrun ʕjnun kaːn saːmj jlkm ljlaː ħttaː ʕndmaː kaːnt ħaːmlaː bʕdda ʔaʃhr warubbamaaː tawahhama baʶʕdˤuʶ man χalaaː min faʶdˤliʶn kaːn saːmj jʕlm ʔann ljlaː lm tkn fj χtˤr faʶsˤaʶaʶːraʶ bihaðihi aːlnnisbaai min aːlmaʕluwmaaːti aːlfikrijjaai hðh aːlsjaːra tħtaːd͡ʒ fj aːljwm aːlðj aːχtfaː fjh ʕrrdˤ saːmj nfsh lχtˤr aːlkʃf jasbaħu aːlʁulaːamu fij aːlnnahri laː jmkn ʔan jkwn ðlk sˤħjħaʶːaʶn mn aːlmstħjl ʔan jtʕllm aːlmrʔa aːlssbaːħa bdrws mraːsla aːlllʁa biaːlħaqqi ʔiinna fj ðlika laʔaːjaaan lilmuʔuminjna ʔaʶnðˤr ʔilaː aːlwld w hw jqfz kaːn ldjh mdrrs msˤrj ljs hnaːk maː hw ʔaswʔa mn aːlħrb ʕðˤmaʶ aːllh fj aːlkwn waqad ðahaba baʶʕdˤuʶhuʶm ʔilaaː ʔaanna aːlkalaaːma ʔiðaaː kaθura ʕan qadri aːlħaaːd͡ʒaai ʔahdaːnj saːmj hðh fj ʕjd mjlaːdj saːmj fj aːlssd͡ʒn mdaː aːlħjaːa kl wld ʕndh draːd͡ʒa hðh aːlmra td͡ʒaːwzt aːlħdwd waʶʔaʶaʶdˤaʶllaʶhuʶ aːlħirmaaːnu ʕan maʶqaʶaʶːsˤiʶdiʶhiʶ mtaː jnthj aːldwaːm aːlmdrsjj qrʔa saːmj d͡ʒzʔaː mn aːlqrʔaːn aːlkrjm tʕrrdˤt ljlaː llmdˤaʶːjqaʶ fj qsmhaː ln nfwz qalijla aːlnnufuwri wsˤl saːmj lqd aːtbʕwk waʔaakwaːbun maʶwdˤwʕaʶaʶuʶn χurid͡ʒti kaj ʔaatanazzaha waqad ʔaanʃadanij baʶʕdˤuʶ ʔaahli hðaː aːlqaːmws ʔaʶfdˤl mn ðaːk wd͡ʒdt lh ʕmlaː jatanaqqalu kaθijranaː fij daaːrihi min makaaːn ʔilaaː makaaːn wajunʃidu qawla ʔaabij aːlʕataaːhijaai waman lam jatanaaːha tˤaʶlaʶbuʶhuʶ aːstadaaːma kadduhu wataʕabuhu waʶsˤuʶhaʶjbuʶn kaaːna ʔaʶaʶtˤaʶwʕaʶ lillahi subħaaːnahu wataʕaaːlaaː min ʔaan jakuwna bihaðihi aːlmanzilaai aːllaðjna hum ʕan sˤaʶlaʶːtiʶhiʶm saːhwna lqd ħssn aːld͡ʒhaːz kaːn saːmj jħbb ʔaflaːm aːlʔakʃn lqd kaːd ʔan jfqd saːmj ħjaːth mn jtʔalm ʔakθr sjʕrf ʔakθr ʔaʶsˤʕd saːmj naːfðth lw tzwwd͡ʒt bʔammhaː lmaː dχlt mstʃfaː llʔaʶmraʶːdˤ aːlʕqljja faliʔaanna aːlmuħtaaːd͡ʒa ʔilaaː aːlnnaaːsi kullu muʶhtaʶdˤaʶmiʶn waðalijlin mustaθqalin aːldnjaː sd͡ʒn aːlmʔumn wd͡ʒna aːlkaːfr wamaː ʔaadraːka maː sid͡ʒd͡ʒjnun fabiħasabi maaː hum ʕalajhi takuwnu ʔaamθaaːluhum ʔillaaː ðˤaʶaʶːfiʶraʶnaʶː laː jhmmnj ʔamr aːlħb qddm saːmj aːlmzjd mn aːlddwaːʔ lljlaː ʃq ʕsˤaʶː aʶːltˤaʶːʕaʶ ʃkrt d͡ʒmjl sˤnʕkm bdmʕj wdmʕ aːlʕjn mqjaːs aːlʃʕwr aːlʃkwaː slaːħ aʶːldˤʕfaʶːʔ bal huwa qurʔaːnun mad͡ʒjdun ʔiinnamaː ʔaamwaːlukum waʔaawlaːdukum fitnaaun waaːlllahu ʕindahu ʔaad͡ʒrun ʕaʶðˤjmuʶn waʶsˤuʶnʕaʶ tˤaʶʕaʶaʶːmiʶhiʶ qaaːluwaː kullunaaː jaaː rasuwla aːlllahi sˤaʶaʶːraʶ aːlθθawbu qaʶsˤiʶjraʶnaʶː aːlbardu qaaːrisun walaw nazzalnaːhu ʕalaː baʶʕdˤiʶ aːlʔaaʕd͡ʒamjna ljlaː mmrrdˤaʶ saːmj aʶːlχaʶːsˤsˤaʶ ʔaaw d͡ʒahlin qabijħin jakfihi ʕanhu wajamnaʕuhu minhu waʔiin katamahu faqad kafarahu stuʁlq aːlʕjaːda aːdχli ʕzjztj maʕa wuʶdˤuʶwħiʶ qubħihaaː fij aːlʕaqli aːlmaqhuwri bihaaː aːstmr aʶːlmtˤr baʶːlhtˤwl lmda ʔarbʕa waχalaqa aːlllahu aːlssamaːwaːti waʶaʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤaʶ biaːlħaqqi walitud͡ʒzaː kullu nafsin bimaː kasabat wahum laː juʶðˤlaʶmwnaʶ aʶːsˤtˤħb saːmj ljlaː ʔilaː ʕjaːda ʔiʕaːda tʔahjl waʔaanʃada ʔaan jakuwna ʃarranaː juttaqaaː maːhj χtˤtˤk ljwm aːlʔaħd ʔinna aːlbalaaːʔa muwakkalun biʶaʶːlmaʶntˤiʶqiʶ twqf ʕn mħaːwla ʔibhaːd͡ʒj lqd aːknʃf aːlʔad͡ʒwba bnfsh waaːlħalijmu ʔillaaː fij ʕaaːbidin lim ʔaʕlam kam saʶjaʶtˤwluʶ aːlʔid͡ʒtimaːʕ hl ðhbt ʔilaː aːlmtd͡ʒr waʶsˤaʶaʶːraʶ aːlħilmu mudabbiranaː lilʔaumuwri aʶːlmuʶʁdˤiʶbaʶaʶiʶ biqadrin laaː jaʕtarijhi naʶqsˤuʶn biʕadami aʶːlʁaʶdˤaʶbiʶ ʔaʕd͡ʒbt tlk aʶːlqsˤsˤaʶ saːmj ʔinh mwd͡ʒwd fj aːlbjt aːlʔaːn jaaː rasuwla aːlllahi ʔaadʕu lij biaːlmaʁfiraai faʔaaðina lahu aːlʕaaːlimu waaːd͡ʒtinaaːʔi aːlʔaawzaaːri fij muχaaːlafatihi sʔaqaːtl ħtaː aːlnfs aːlʔaχjr θumma ʕafawnaaː ʕankum min baʕdi ðaaːlika laʕallakum taʃkuruwna rʔaaː saːmj ljlaː fj aːlʕjaːda biʔaanna rabbaka ʔaawħaː lahaː tuqallabu fij aʶːlħaʶdˤaʶriʶ min ʁajri qillaain walaaː safarin waʶʔaʶaʶbsˤiʶr fasawfa juʶbsˤiʶrwnaʶ kaːnt d͡ʒθθa saːmj aːlhaːmda ttˤfw fj aːlmsbħ aʶːlχaʶtˤaʶʔaʶuʶ fij ʔiʶʕtˤaʶaʶːʔiʶ maaː laaː janbaʁij wamanʕu maaː janbaʁij waaːħidun tfaːd͡ʒʔat zwd͡ʒtj qaːla rabbu aːlmaʃriqi waaːlmaʁribi wamaː bajnahumaː ʔiin kuntum taʕqilwna sʔaːχðk ʔilaː mkaːn ʔaːmn ʕaːml aːlnaːs bmaː tħb ʔan jʕaːmlwk bh ðˤuʶlmaʶ aʶːlʁaʶdˤaʶbiʶ waqaaːla d͡ʒaʕfaru bnu muħammadin aːlfitnaau ħaʶsˤaʶaʶːduʶn liʶlðˤðˤaʶaʶːliʶmaʶjniʶ muttakiʔijna ʕalajhaː mutaqaːbiljna aːllaðj χalaqaka fasawwaːka faʕadalaka liʔaannahu kaaːna d͡ʒaaːhilanaː ʔaːkj hw klbj kaːn saːmj jħbb ʔan jtbaːhaː faaːltamasahaaː aːlnnaaːsu fawad͡ʒaduwhaaː faqaaːluwaː lahu qad radda aːlllahu raaːħilatak faʶsˤaʶlliʶ waqaaːla d͡ʒaʕfaru bnu muħammadin ʔiin jwħaː ʔiilajja ʔiillaː ʔaannamaː ʔaanaː naðjrun mubjnun waqaaːluwaː quluwbunaaː ʁulfun bal laʕanahumu aːlllahu bikufrihim faqalijlanaː maaː juʔuminuwna aːsmʕi lj jaː ljlaː sˤaʶfwaʶaʶːnaʶ ʔinnij laʔaafraħu biʔiifaaːdatij aːlmutaʕallima ʔaakθara min faraħij biaːstifaaːdatij min aːlmuʕallimi waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi χajru aːlmizaaːħi laaː junaaːlu waʃarruhu laaː juqaaːlu liʔaanna aːlʕaaːdaaa tˤaʶbʕuʶn θaaːnin ʁdˤb aːld͡ʒaːhl fj qwlh wʁdˤb aːlʕaːql fj fʕlh aːlʔamjn laː tχwnh waːlχaːʔin laː tʔamnh snqtlk srqt ljlaː saːmj ʕlaː saːmj ʔan jhtmm bʃʔuwnh qul lillaðjna ʔaːmanwaː jaʁfirwaː lillaðjna laː jard͡ʒwna ʔaajjaːma aːlllahi lijad͡ʒzija qawmanaː bimaː kaːnwaː jaksibwna saːmj laː jrjd aʶːlχsˤaʶːm walaaː juhmiluhu θiqaaan biqudratihi ʕalajhi ʔiʕzf lj mqtˤwʕaʶ lʃwbaːn naːdaː saːmj kll aːlqsm bʕbaːra ʔaʁbjaːʔ kaːn saːmj tˤbjbaʶː jtqaʶːdˤaʶː raːtbaː mʕtbraː w jtmttʕ bsmʕa d͡ʒjjda wamaː jastawij aːlʔaaʕmaː waʶaʶːlbaʶsˤjruʶ ʔið lajsa jaraaː qaʶdˤaʶaʶːʔaʶ aːlllahi ʕadlanaː waʔaaʕqabahu aːlttawakulu nadama aːlχaaːʔiibijna ʔajj nwʕ mn aːlrrd͡ʒaːl ʔant ʔaan jaʶtˤluʶbaʶ minhaaː qadra kifaaːjatihi qul huwa aːllaðj ʔaanʃaʔaakum wad͡ʒaʕala lakumu aːlssamʕa waʶaʶːlʔaʶaʶbsˤaʶːraʶ waaːlʔaafʔiidaaa qaljlanaː maː taʃkurwna faqaaːla lahu ʕumaru raʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːlllahu ʕanhu wakaaːna baʶʕdˤuʶ muluwki aʶːltˤtˤaʶwaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶfiʶ ʔiðaaː ʁaʶdˤiʶbaʶ ʔaulqija ʕindahu mafaaːtijħu turabi aːlmuluwki fajazuwlu ʁaʶdˤaʶbuʶhuʶ waqaaːla mud͡ʒaaːhidun knt mhddaː qaaːla min ʔaajji ʕaqijlin qaaːla min banij χafaaːd͡ʒaaa waʔiiðaaː aːld͡ʒaħjmu suʕʕirat waqallamaaː tad͡ʒidu miθlahu maʶlħuʶwðˤaʶnaʶː ʔaaw mumawwalanaː maʶħðˤuʶwðˤaʶnaʶː aʶːlsˤjn dwla kbjra d͡ʒdaːan qaːl saʶnaʶnðˤuʶruʶ ʔaʶsˤdqt ʔam knt mn aːlkaːðbjn wanafsuhu ʔilajhi munqaaːdaaun saːmj ʔaːmn mn aʶːlχtˤr waman d͡ʒaːʔa biaːlssajiʔiaai fakubbat wud͡ʒwhuhum fij aːlnnaːri hal tud͡ʒzawna ʔiillaː maː kuntum taʕmalwna ʔiinnahu kaːna laː juʔuminu biaːlllahi aʶːlʕaʶðˤjmiʶ ʔiinna aːlssaːʕaaa laʔaːtijaaun laː rajba fjhaː walkinna ʔaakθara aːlnnaːsi hðaː maː maːðaː tʕllmtm kuluwaː watamattaʕuwaː qalijlanaː ʔiinnakum mud͡ʒrimuwna ħqaː ʔant lst ʁbjaː wklhm ʔaːtjh jwm aːlqjaːma frdaː faðakkir ʔiin nnafaʕati aːlððikraaːaː mn fdˤlk ʔabq aːlʔamr sraːan ʕljk ʔan tʕtnj baʶːltˤfl lm trktnj waaːnʃaqqati aːlssamaaːʔu fahija jawmaʔiiðin waaːhijaaun btlaːtun tttˤaʶːjr fj aːlhwaːʔ aːlhd͡ʒwm ʃnh aːntħaːrj bsjaːra mfχχa ʕndmaː ttχtˤaʶː mrħlaan sˤʕbaʶ mn mnnaːd jbkj walaqad raʔaːhu nazlaaan ʔauχraaː hl aːnt mtzwd͡ʒ ʕmr ʔabj χmsaa ʕʃr ʕaːmanaː fqtˤ hl jmknk mʕaːld͡ʒa hðaː aːlaːmr ʔajn tħs baːlwd͡ʒʕ lqd ʔalħ ʕlaː ʔahmja aːlslm wlm nk ntˤʕm aːlmskjn wmaː ʔin aːqtrb ʔakθr ħtaː sʔal aːlʁraːbjn maː baːlkmaː ʔajhaː aːlʁraːbjn ʔinaː kðlk nfʕl baːlmd͡ʒrmjn ʔanaː ʁjr mtfaːd͡ʒʔia saːmj lm jstwʕb fʕljaː χtˤwraʶ maː fʕlh takallamuwaː fiaː aːlʕilmi ʔaaqdaːrukum aːlllahu taʕaaːlaaː narfaʕu darad͡ʒaaːtin man naʃaaːʔu ʔaħtaːd͡ʒ ʔilaː tˤbjb ʔanaː mtʔakd ʔanh sjstqjl mn mnsˤbh ldaː twm sˤdjq jʕjʃ fj bwstˤn min aːlʕilmi ʔaan laaː taħtaqira ʃajʔianaː min aːlʕilmi θumma latusʔaalunna jawmaʔiiðin ʕani aːlnnaʕijmi bl aːlðjn kfrwaː jkðbwn lqd mrrat baːlkθjr mn aʶːlsˤʕwbaʶːt jaː ʔajhaː aːlðjn ʔaːmnwaː ʔiðaː lqjtm aːlðjn kfrwaː zħfaː flaː twlwhm aːlʔadbaːr jd͡ʒhl twm aːlfrq bjn aːlħqjqa w aːlχjaːl aʶːnðˤr kjf kðbwaː ʕlaː ʔanfshm wdˤl ʕnhm maː kaːnwaː jftrwn ʔanaː mwaːfq mʕ aːqtraːħh walaʔaan jakuwna ʃajχanaː mutaʕallimanaː ʔaawlaaː min ʔaan jakuwna ʃajχanaː bsbb maː jqwlwnh bdlaː maː jfʕlwnh aːnhaː mʔulm lʔamjrkaː ʔan tχsr ʃbaːbhaː wʃaːbaːthaː jbdw kʔanhm ln jʁaːdrwaː sʔaʶtsˤl bhm ʁdaːan ʕndmaː ʔaʕwd wʔiðaː aːlbħaːr fd͡ʒrt wlwtˤaʶː ʔið qaːl lqwmh ʔinkm baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi kjf nimti aːlljla aʶːlmaʶːdˤjaʶ kaːn ʕlj ʔan ʔaχbr ʔaħdaː ʔilaː mn jhmh aːlʔamr ʔanaː d͡ʒaːʔiʕ llʁaːja aːlʔaːn ðhbt ʔilaː aːlʕdjd mn aːlmtaːd͡ʒr llbħθ ʕn aːlktaːb wjdʕ tuʕd͡ʒbnj rbtˤaʶuʶ ʕnqka hðhi laː qdr aːllh kaʔaannahuna baʶjdˤuʶn maknuwnun qutila saːmj mn tˤrf sˤdjq frjd aːlmqrrb raːmj aːħb aːlmnaːfsh mʕk jrkdˤ twm bsrʕa kbjra rʔaaː twm ʃχsˤaʶː jnzzl wʔinaː ʕlaː ðhaːb bh lqaːdrwn wad͡ʒaʕaluwaː aːlmalaaːʔiikaaa aːllaðijna hum ʕibaaːdu aːlrraħmani ʔiinaaːθanaː ʔaaʃahiduwaː χalqahum satuktabu ʃahaaːdatuhum wajusʔaaluwna mtaː jħjn dwrj wnqlb ʔafʔidthm wʔaʶbsˤaʶːrhm kmaː lm jʔumnwaː bh ʔawl mra wnðrhm fj tˤʁjaʶːnhm jʕmhwn aːlllahu ʕalajhi wasallama ʕan aːlzzubajri ʔimsaaːkun fad͡ʒaðaba ʕimaaːmatahu ʔilajhi waqaaːla qaːl lj ʔalaː ʔaqwd bsrʕa aːlllahi taħta ðˤiʶlaʶaʶːliʶhiʶ faʔaaħabbuhum tˤuʶrraʶnaʶː ʔilajhi ʔaabarruhum liʕijaaːlihi waaːlbirru nawʕaaːni hl mn ʔaħd jʕlm kjfja aːlqjaːm bhðaː fdˤlaʶːaʶn hdʔi mn srʕtk ʕnd aːqtraːbk mn tqaʶːtˤʕ aʶːltˤrq dʕnaː nnqsm fʔiðaː nfχ fj aʶːlsˤwr flaː ʔansaːb bjnhm jwmʔið wlaː jtsaːʔlwn hl trjdjn mʃaːhda mqaːbla kra aːlqaːʕda ʕlaː aːltlfaːz ʔink ʕdaːʔij ʔaaw nurijannaka aːllaðij waʕadnaaːhum faʔiinnaaː ʕalajhim muqtadiruwna waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi ʃafijʕu aːlmuðnibi ʔiqraaːruhu watawbatuhu aːʕtiðaaːruhu ʔanti mnfʕla jaː wajlataː lajtanj lam ʔaattaχið fulaːnanaː χaljlanaː w ʔaχjraːan wsˤlnaʶː ʔilaː aːlqrja waʔiinnahu liħubbi aːlχajri laʃadjdun faʶaʶːsˤfaʶħ ʕanhum waqul salaːmun fasawfa jaʕlamwna faʶdˤluʶ aːlʕilmi χajrun min faʶdˤliʶ aːlʕibaaːdaai bismi aːlllahi aːlrraħmni aːlrraħjmi waaːlfad͡ʒri waʔiin kaaːna kullun minhu kaθijranaː ʕaːda maː jsˤllj saːmj sˤlaʶːaʶ aːlʕʃaːʔ qbjl ðhaːbh ʔilaː aːlnnwm ʔafrʁ d͡ʒjbk laː ʔaħd jnsaː bldj km ʕmrh ʕaːd ʔilaː aːlrrsm aːlχajri ʔaʶaʶfdˤaʶluʶ min tarkihi aːlbrtqaːl jħtwj ʕlaː fjtaːmjn sj lqd ʔatʕbtnj hðh aːlrħla rʁm qsˤr mdthaː ʔinna haðaaː aːlħaqqa θaqijlun marijjun aʶːlsˤbr ʕnd aʶːlsˤdmaʶ aːlʔawlaː ʔaðl aːlbχl ʔaʕnaːq aːlrd͡ʒaːl walaaː tuʔuaaːχiðnij bimaaː jaquwluwna warutbaaan turtaqaaː faman kamulat fijhi fahuwa ʕanqaaːʔu muʁribin saːmj laː jħml msddsh mʕh ldjhaː aːbn jħbh aːld͡ʒmjʕ laaː juʕrafu aːld͡ʒawaaːdu ʔillaaː fij aːlʕusraai ʔinnhaː aːntkaːsa mrjra fij ʁaʶdˤaʶbiʶk liʔaanna aːlmazħa hazlun lqd qaːblnaː mdrrsnaː aːntʃr χbr ðlk hd͡ʒwm wabiʔiirʁaaːbihi ʔin danaaː ðj quwwaain ʕinda ðij aːlʕarʃi makjnin waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlʔaudabaaːʔi maʃuwraau aːlmuʃfiqi aːlħaaːzimi ðˤaʶfaʶruʶn wamaʃuwraau ʁajri aːlħaaːzimi χaʶtˤaʶruʶn ʔiinnaː ʔaarsalnaː ʕalajhim ħaʶːsˤiʶbaʶnaʶː ʔiillaː ʔaːla lwtˤiʶn nad͡ʒd͡ʒajnaːhum bisaħarin ʔaʶðˤn ʔan ʔaʕjaːd aːlmjlaːd mhma hl bʔimkaːnk aːlttklm baːlbrtʁaːljja waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi laaː tamnaʕuwaː aːlʕilma ʔaaħadanaː faʔiinna aːlʕilma ʔaamnaʕu lid͡ʒaaːnibihi wamanaʕa ħusna ħaaːlihi waʶːsˤl saːmj smaːʕ tlk aʶːlʔaʶsˤwaʶːt waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aʶːlfuʶsˤaʶħaʶaʶːʔiʶ quwwaau aːlminani min dˤaʶʕfiʶ aːlmunani ʕaːda maː jðkr mqwlaːt lʃjksbjr aːlmutaʕammiqu fij aːlʕilmi kaaːlssaaːbiħi fij aːlbaħri lajsa jaraaː ʔaʶaʶrdˤaʶnaʶː χajru aːlrrizqi maaː jakfij waχajru aːlððikri aːlχafijju walaaː ʔaan juʶʕaʶaʶːriʶdˤaʶhuʶ fij ʔaamrihi fajuraddu maħruwmanaː masluwbanaː waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi ʃarru aːlmaaːli maaː lazimak ʔiθmu maksabihi waħurimta ʔaad͡ʒra ʔinfaaːqihi aːlħaaːsidu muʶʁtaʶaʶːðˤuʶn ʕalaaː man laaː ðanba lahu hl jumknnj aːstʕaːra sjaːrtk lhðh aːlljla kullun jaraaː ʔaanna aːlʃʃabaaːba lahu fij kulli mablaʁi laððaain ʕuðraaː waliðalika qaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi bʕdˤ aːlθʕaːbjn saːma kaːn saːmj jtħddθ mʕ ljlaː tˤwl aːlbaːl jhdm aːld͡ʒbaːl waʃaaːwirhum fij aːlʔaamri laaː tukθir mina aʶːldˤdˤaʶħiʶkiʶ kullu ʃajʔin jaħtaaːd͡ʒu ʔilaaː aːlʕaqli hl hðh sˤwrk wataaːbiʕanaː maħquwranaː wamaː huwa biqawli ʃaːʕirin qaljlanaː maː tuʔuminwna wabaʃʃiri aːlmuʔuminjna biʔaanna lahum mina aːlllahi faʶdˤlaʶnaʶː kabjranaː ʔaʶmdˤaʶː saːmj aːllljla fj aːlʕjaːda aːlħud͡ʒraau muʶðˤliʶmaʶaʶuʶn wataʁajjuru zamaaːnihimaaː ðhb saːmj ʔilaː aːlqsm ʔiinnahu laqurʔaːnun karjmun ʔiʶsχaʶaʶːtˤuʶ aːlllahi taʕaaːlaaː fij muʶʕaʶaʶːraʶdˤaʶtiʶhiʶ baːlnsba lj fʔin klb saːmj jbdw bχjr ʕaːʃ saːmj ħjaːa nzjha mn ktb hðh aʶːlqsˤjdaʶ aʶːltˤtˤiʶjaʶraʶaʶuʶ wasuwʔu aʶːlðˤðˤaʶniʶ waʶʔaʶaʶfdˤaʶluʶhaʶaʶː ʕilmu aːlddijni ntfaːʔil bh ʔaaʔiiðaː kunnaː ʕiʶðˤaʶːmaʶnaʶː naχiraaan ðˤlm aːlʔaqaːrb ʔaʃd wqʕaː mn aːlsjf waljaʕlam ʔaannahu min fuʶraʶsˤiʶ zamaaːnihi mʕlwm ʔann ljlaː lm tstħqq ʔan tmwt bhðh aʶːltˤtˤrjqaʶ aʶːlfðˤjʕaʶ lm jstħqq saːmj ʔan jmwt bhðh aʶːltˤtˤrjqaʶ aʶːlfðˤjʕaʶ jawma naqwlu lid͡ʒahannama hali aːmtalaʔati wataqwlu hal min mazjdin waʔiiðaaː aːustuʃirta falaaː tuʕad͡ʒd͡ʒil ħattaaː taʶnðˤuʶraʶ kaːnt ljlaː fj wdˤʕ χtˤjr wakaaːda aːlħasadu ʔaan jaʁliba aːlqadara aʶːttsˤl saːmj bsˤdjq kj jqllh laaː taħmilanna ʕalaaː jawmik hamma ʁadik wawaʕada bihi min taʔajijdihi tlʕb aːltns kl jwm lm ʔaʕrf kjf ʔad͡ʒjb ʕlaː sʔuaːlh man ʔaakθara min ðikri aːlmawti raʶdˤiʶjaʶ min aːlddunjaaː biaːljasijri maː aːlðj d͡ʒaːʔ bk ʔilaː hnaː waʔiinna aːlfud͡ʒd͡ʒaːra lafj d͡ʒaħjmin waqaaːla ʕabdu aːlllahi bnu aːlħasani liaːbnihi muħammadin jaː lk mn wʁd waʔaaχlaaːqin mursalaain aːbqa mkaːnk ʔanaː ʔaʶttsˤl bsjjaːra ʔisʕaːf jbdw saːmj mθlki fad͡ʒaʕalnaːhum salafanaː wamaθalanaː lilʔaːχirjna hl stlʕb mʕj fatabassama rasuwlu aːlllahi sˤaʶllaʶaʶː aːlllahu ʕalajhi wasallama waqaaːla ħukija ʔaanna aːlmuʔuabbaðu samiʕa dˤaʶħiʶkaʶ aːlχaddaaːmi fij qaːla rabbj ʔaaʕlamu bimaː taʕmalwna ln jmssnj ʔaħd ʔaʶʕtˤaʶː saːmj ljlaː ħqna ʔaraːd twm ʔan tʕrf aːlmuʔuminu jaʶʁbiʶtˤuʶ waaːlmunaaːfiqu jaħsudu waqaaːla ʕijsaaː aːbnu kaaːallaðij ħukija ʕan aʶːlʔaʶaʶsˤmaʶʕiʶjjiʶ ʔaanna aːlrraʃijda saʔaalahu jawmanaː ʕan ʔaansaaːbi baʶʕdˤiʶ aːlʕarabi faqaaːla walilʔiiʕd͡ʒaaːbi mubaaːjinanaː waaːljasijri aːlttaaːfihi min sˤiʶjaʶaʶːnaʶaʶiʶ aːlssaaːʔiilijna tħjaː aːlmlka lqd bdʔa saːmj ħjaːth llttw liʶltˤtˤaʶaʶːwuʶwsiʶ rijʃun d͡ʒamijlun lqd aːntht ħjaːa saːmj ʔaaw χaaːmarahu fijhaaː wahmun lm ʔanaː mwd͡ʒwd waʶʔaʶaʶʕðˤaʶmuʶ ʁararanaː tʕrrf saːmj ʕlaː ðlk aːlsslaːħ jmkn ltwm ʔan jqwl ʃjʔiaː mn ʔajn aːbtkr hðaː aːlħasadu jaʔakulu aːlħasanaaːti kamaaː taʔakulu aːlnnaaːru aʶːlħaʶtˤaʶbaʶ saːmj mdrrsnaː fj aʶːlrrjaʶːdˤaʶ knt ʔatsaːʔil sjtχrd͡ʒ twm fj ʔaktwbr mn jrjd ʔijðaːʔ saːmj jχtˤtˤtˤ saːmj ʔan jtzwwd͡ʒ fwr maː jtχrrd͡ʒ mn aːlθθaːnwja ʃʁʁl saːmj d͡ʒhaːz aːlʔinðaːr waqillaau muʶχaʶaʶːlaʶtˤaʶaʶiʶ aːlʔaakfaaːʔi waʶʔaʶaʶmtˤaʶrnaʶː ʕalajhim maʶtˤaʶraʶnaʶː fasaːʔa maʶtˤaʶruʶ aːlmunðarjna ʔiinnahum kaːnwaː laː jard͡ʒwna ħisaːbanaː faʔiin kaaːna lahu takallama waʔiin kaaːna qabbaħahu aːlllahu ʔaatarawnahu law zaaːduwhu faʕala waʕazalahu kaːn faʶːdˤl fj ħfl tbdw hðh aːlllʕba χtˤjraʶ nwʕaː maː ʔinna lillahi taʕaaːlaaː fij ʔaaθnaaːʔi kulli miħnaain minħaaun ʔinnamaaː ʔauθijbu kulla ʔinsaaːnin ʕalaaː qadri ʕaqlihi lima tuħibbu aːlddaraaːhima wahija tudijnuk min aːlddunjaaː faqaaːla mawʕiduk aːld͡ʒannaau zħf saːmj ʕbr naːfðth lm jkn ʕnd saːmj ʔaħd jnaːqʃ mʕh mʃaːklh hðaː ktaːb qdjm waʕarija ʕan tamjijzin ʔaanna ðalika huwa aːlmuruwʔaau aːlkaaːmilaau ħattaaː ʔaannahu lajunaaːfisu fij aːlħaqijri faʶdˤlaʶnaʶː min rabbika ðlika huwa aːlfawzu aʶːlʕaʶðˤjmuʶ hunaːlika aːbtulija aːlmuʔuminwna wazulzilwaː zilzaːlanaː ʃadjdanaː wakaðalika qaaːla aːlnnabiju walajsa ʔilaaː maaː juksibuhu aːlkibru min aːlmaqti ħaddun lqd qddm tstqaːlth qbl ʔakθr mn ʃhr sˤaʶħiʶjħaʶnaʶː lak waaːlθθaaːnij kaffu aːlllisaaːni ʕan aʶːlʔaʶaʶʕraʶaʶːdˤiʶ waðarijʕaaun ʔilaaː ʔinkaaːrihi ʔajn snʔakl falaː ʔauqsimu biaːlʃʃafaqi mn aʶːlsˤʕb bmkaːn ʔan jsˤddq aːlnaːs sbb qtl bʕdˤ aːlʔamhaːt ʔaʶtˤfaʶːlhn ʔilaː ʔanhaː aːlħqjqa ʔaknt mʕ ʔaħd qddm saːmj ljlaː ltˤaʶːlb mslm maː sbb ʁdˤbhn ʔinħnt ʔinna aːlllaha juħibbu aːlħalijma aːlħajijja samiʕtuhu jaquwlu aːnaː aːʕml ħtaː fj ʔajaːm aːlʔaħd wataraknaː fjhaː ʔaːjaaan lillaðjna waʔaantum muʶʕriʶdˤuʶwnaʶ mdrrsj jkrhnaː ʔatʕlmjn ʔilaː ʔajn aːntql faʃaːribwna ʃurba aːlhjmi kaːn saːmj jstmʕ lmwsjqaː aːlrrwk aːlmsjħjja lm hðaː mhm waʔauzlifati aːld͡ʒannaau lilmuttaqjna waʕalaaː qadri aːlʕinaaːjaai bihi jakuwnu aːd͡ʒtinaaːʔu θamaratihi llsˤdq wd͡ʒh waːħd wllkðb ʔalf wd͡ʒh waʔaːχira maaː nazala min aːlttawraaːai ʔiðaaː lam tastaħi faʶaʶːsˤnaʶʕ maaː ʃiʔit waʔiin kaaːna naʶðˤiʶjriʶj taʶfaʶdˤdˤaʶlt ʕalajhi waaːlnnifaaːqu luʔumun ðhb saːmj lħdˤwr aːlddrs waaːlllahu χalaqakum wamaː taʕmalwna waaːlnnaaːsu minhu fij salaaːmaain ʔaqnʕth ʔanh kaːn mχtˤʔiʶaʶː faʔaabdaaː tzwwd͡ʒti twm mn ʔad͡ʒl maːlh fqtˤ qaːm mdjr mdrstj btˤrd ðlk aːlmdrrs mn aːlmdrsa waʶtaʶdˤħaʶkwnaʶ walaː tabkwna kaːn saːmj jntðˤr fqtˤ wafamu aːld͡ʒaaːhili muʶtˤlaʶquʶn kullamaaː ʃaaːʔa ʔaʶaʶtˤlaʶqaʶ biʔisamaaː aːʃtarawaː bihi ʔaanfusahum ʔaan jakfuruwaː bimaaː ʔaanzala aːlllahu baʁjanaː kaːn aːld͡ʒmjʕ jʕlm ʔann saːmj kaːn fj aːlʕjaːda waʔiinnamaaː jaʶχtaʶsˤsˤuʶ biħasadi min ʕalaaː ʔaħbk ʔaktb rsaːla bali aːlssaːʕaau mawʕiduhum waaːlssaːʕaau ʔaadhaː waʔaamarru ħasaraaːtu aːlħasadi wasaqaaːmu aːld͡ʒasadi θumma aʶːnsˤaʶraʶfaʶ masruwranaː liʔaannahaaː χiʶsˤaʶaʶːluʶn murakkabaaun min aʶːlʁaʶdˤaʶbiʶ falaaː jaħmilannaka ðalika ʕalaaː aːlrraʁbaai fij aːld͡ʒahli qddm saːmj qrsˤaʶː lljlaː lijakuwna lahu maʕa tablijʁi aːlrrisaaːlaai ðˤuʶhuʶwruʶ aʶːliʶaʶːχtiʶsˤaʶaʶːsˤiʶ bihi wamanzilaau aʶːlttaʶfwiʶjdˤiʶ ʔilajhi laː ʔaʶðˤn ʔan twm bmzaːd͡ʒ aːlʕml ħaːljaː jbjn aʶːlwdˤʕ fj ʔafʁaːnstaːn ʔahdaːf ʔamrjkaː wħaːd͡ʒtnaː ʔilaː aːlʕml aːlmʃtrk fawarabbi aːlssamaːʔi waʶaʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤiʶ ʔiinnahu laħaqqun miθla maː ʔaannakum taʶntˤiʶqwnaʶ ʔaqbħ mn χnzjr ʔalħħ saːmj ʕlaː aːlʔamr wahuwa min nafsihi fij ʕanaaːʔin ʔijjaaːkum wataħkijma aːlʃʃahawaaːti ʕalaaː ʔaanfusikum faʔiinna ʕaaːd͡ʒilahaaː ðamijmun ʔarsl ħkjmaː wlaː twsˤh lmaːðaː tχllaː saːmj ʕnnj ʔarfʕ mn aːlsmaːʔ waðalika faʶdˤiʶjlaʶaʶuʶn hw fj aːlχdma ʔaʶfdˤdˤl ʔan ʔamwt bdlaː mn ʔan ʔaʶmdˤj ħjaːtj kllhaː mʕk ʃjʔ mn hðaː ħdθ ðawaːtaː ʔaafnaːnin lmaːðaː laː jdʕwnh saːmj bkll bsaʶːtˤaʶ wamaaː laaː sababa lahu had͡ʒrun wahaðaaː farqu maaː bajna aʶːlħiʶrsˤiʶ waaːlʃʃarahi waʔiiðaaː aːnqalabwaː ʔiilaː ʔaahlihimu aːnqalabwaː fakihjna hnaːk ʔiħtmaːl ʔan tndlʕ aːlħrb kaːld͡ʒraːd laː jbqaː wlaː jðr kll aːlmdrrsjn kaːnwaː hnaː waliðalika warada aːlʃʃarʕu biaːlnnahji ʕan aʶːlwiʶsˤaʶaʶːliʶ bajna sˤaʶwmiʶ aːljawmajni ʕaːda mn aːlʕjaːda hnaːk χmswn mqaʶːtˤʕaʶ fj aːlʔitħaːd aːlfdraːlj faaːlʔaawlaaː biaːlʔiinsaaːni taqdijru ħaaːlajhi kaːn aːlmdrrs jsχr mn d͡ʒsmj fʕljjaː wasukuwtanaː min nufuwrihi qaaːla aːlʃʃaaːʕiru duʕaaːbaaun kaːn saːmj mdrrs rqsˤ ʔarjd ʔan ʔastʕjd θqa maːrj bj ʔaʕrf tlk aʶːlsˤbjaʶ kaːnt ħjaːa saːmj mʕrrdˤaʶ llχtˤr lst smjnaː wabiaːlʃʃubhaai min ʔaafʕaaːlihaaː raʶaʶːdˤiʶjaʶnaʶː laqad ħaqqa aːlqawlu ʕalaː ʔaakθarihim fahum laː juʔuminwna wadaʕaaː ʔilaaː aːliaːstiθqaaːli waaːlmalaaːli aːljaːbaːn bld sˤnaʶːʕj kun lihawaaːk musawwifanaː tanaaːfasuwaː fij aːlʕamali aʶːlsˤsˤaʶaʶːliʶħiʶ kaːnaː saːmj w ljlaː jqdˤjaʶːn aːlkθjr mn aːlwqt mʕaː fj ʁrfthaː ʔatsaːʔl ʕmmaː ħdθ lh w ld͡ʒmaːl qaːla rabbukum warabbu ʔaːbaːʔiikumu aːlʔaawwaljna bdʔa dwaːʔ saːmj jʔuθθr fjh ħðˤaʶːaʶn mwffqaːan ʔanaː mrtbtˤ baːlʕml kmaː jsbb aːstmraːr hðaː aːlnzaːʕ tkaːljf baʶːhðˤaʶ wmsˤaʶːʕb sjaːsja d͡ʒma fahija aːlmaaːddaau aːlkaaːfijaau waqaaːla χaaːlidu bnu sˤaʶfwaʶaʶːnaʶ liʔiijaaːsi bni muʕaaːwijaaa ʔajn aːlmʃkla ðalika χajrun fijhi taʔawijlaaːni ʔaafaraʔaajta aːllaðj tawallaː aːnhaː ljst ʁltˤtj ʔinna fij aʶːlmaʶʕaʶaʶːriʶjdˤiʶ lamanduwħaaan ʕan aːlkaðibi ʔaqaːm saːmj sˤdaʶːqaʶ mʕ zmjlh fj aːlʁrfa ʔaaʔiinnakum lataʔatwna aːlrrid͡ʒaːla ʃahwaaan min dwni aːlnnisaːʔi bal ʔaantum qawmun tad͡ʒhalwna ʔad͡ʒrt ljlaː aʶːttsˤaʶːlaʶː tˤaʶːlbaʶ sjjaːra ʔisʕaːf waqijla fij manθuwri aːlħikami aːlχajru fij tarki aʶːltˤtˤiʶjaʶraʶaʶiʶ ʔanaː fj aʶːntðˤaʶːr aːbniki lnlʕb aːlwrq lm jkn saːmj d͡ʒzʔaː mn ħjaːtj ʔaχð saːmj ljlaː ʔilaː aːlmrkz aʶːlsˤsˤħj kaaːna ħatfuhu fij ʔaaʁlabi χiʶsˤaʶaʶːliʶ aːlχajri ʕalajhi rawaaː ʃarijku bnu ʔaabij namirin waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi aːliaːstiʃaaːraau ʕajnu aːlhidaaːjaai waqad χaʶaʶːtˤaʶraʶ man aːstaʁnaaː biraʔajihi saːmj jmʃj ʔintħrt aːlfaʔaru jaχaaːfu mina aːlhirri jbaːlʁ twm daːʔimaː maaː aːlħaːqqaau d͡ʒaaːda lakum hiʃaaːmun biaːlddunjaaː wad͡ʒudtum ʕalajhi biaːlbukaaːʔi liʔaannahu jaʔatij aːlrrad͡ʒula aːlmutamakkina ʕinda aːlʔaamijri falaaː jazaaːlu jaqaʕu fijhi ħattaaː jaqlaʕahu rmaː saːmj aʶːlʔaʶqraʶːsˤ fj aːlqmaːma lmaːðaː ʔanaː liʔaannahumaaː jaslubaaːni aʶːlfaʶdˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶlaʶ hj mħðˤwðˤaʶ maaː huwa faʔiinna haðajni liʶʕiʶðˤaʶmiʶ ʃaʔanihimaaː juʶχtˤiʶʔiʶuʶ fij aːlzzijaaːdaai saːmj muʕħb bhðaː aːlmkaːn ʔaʶtˤlq aʶːlʃrtˤj rsˤaʶːsˤaʶ tħðjrja twm sjsˤbħ mʕlm d͡ʒjd km jwmaːan tħtaːd͡ʒ ʕaːdaan llwsˤwl ʔilaː hnaːk faʶsˤaʶbbaʶ ʕalajhim rabbuka saʶwtˤaʶ ʕaðaːbin liʔaannahu jastaqillu fij aːlnnaqlaai binafsihi fjma ʔaanta min ðikraːhaː lam jaʶħdˤuʶr ʕalijjun aːlbaaːriħaaa walaaː tad͡ʒbun ʕan aːlkaθijri faʔiinnak ʔaakθaru minhu tʃaːd͡ʒr mʕ aːlmdrrs wamin aːlssaraaːʔiiri maχzuwnahaaː kaːn saːmj ʕlaː aːlʕks mn ðlk tmaːmanaː wamina aːlnnaaːsi man jaquwlu ʔaːmannaaː biaːlllahi wabiaːljawmi aːlʔaːχiri wamaaː hum bimuʔuminijna ʔaafabihðaaː aːlħadjθi ʔaantum mudhinwna naʶðˤaʶrtuʶ fij kitaaːbin mufijdin liʔaanna aːlwaʕda tˤuʶʕmuʶn waaːlʔiind͡ʒaaːza tˤaʶʕaʶaʶːmuʶn laː jsttˤjʕwn aːldraːsa lʔanhm mtʕbwn d͡ʒdaː waʔiinnamaaː aːlqurabu maaː kulli jawmin min aːlʕilmi waʶjaʶħfaʶðˤaʶk ʕinda aːlmaʁijbi wafaqada min ʃuʶruʶwtˤiʶ aːlmuruwʔaai sinaaːdahaaː ʔaawalajsa aːllaðj χalaqa aːlssamaːwaːti waʶaʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤaʶ biqaːdirin ʕalaː ʔaan jaχluqa miθlahum balaː wahuwa aːlχallaːqu aːlʕaljmu saːmj ljs md͡ʒrrd tˤbjb fqtˤ bl hw d͡ʒrraːħ waʔaaħraaːhum biʶaʶːlðˤðˤaʶfaʶriʶ fij mud͡ʒaaːhadatihi qaaːla faʶʔaʶaʶsˤbaʶħaʶt kaʶaʶːlsˤsˤaʶrjmiʶ man ʕaaːʃara waʶðˤuʶlmuʶn waaːlmanʕu minhu ħasadun waʔiiθmun kaːn saːmj mrtdjaː d͡ʒwaːrbh lknnh lm jkn mrtdjaː ħðaːʔh jaðhabu aːlʕummaaːlu ʔiilaaː aʶːlmaʶsˤnaʶʕiʶ ʔiðaaː aʶːnsˤaʶraʶfaʶt ʕanhu tabiʕaaːtu ʔilajhi waqad qaaːla bazard͡ʒamharu fajawmaʔiiðin laː jusʔaalu ʕan ðanbihi ʔiinsun walaː d͡ʒaːnnun fatuðʕinu liruʃdihaaː waʔaaðinat lirabbihaː waħuqqat aʶːlmaʶtˤaʶruʶ kaθijrun waʶaʶːdˤriʶb fij waʶtˤuʶwlaʶ aːlʔaamali jbdw saːmj kraːmbw ʔaan jaʶqtaʶsˤiʶraʶ fij aːlssuʔuaaːli ʕalaaː maaː daʕathu ʔilajhi aʶːldˤdˤaʶruʶwraʶaʶuʶ fawajlun liʶlmuʶsˤaʶlljnaʶ waaːlhaðra jutlifu aːlmaħad͡ʒd͡ʒaaa ʔiið nusawwjkum birabbi aːlʕaːlamjna kaːn ʕljk qbwl nsˤjħth waʔaawlaaː aːlʕuluwmi aːld͡ʒhl dˤlaʶːm aːstrd͡ʒʕt ljlaː sˤħħthaʶː kaːn ʕlaː wʃk ʔan jfqd ʕjnh saːmj jħbbk wajatad͡ʒannabuhaaː aːlʔaaʃqaaː hðaː aːlssaaːʔiili baʕda aːlwaʕdi walaaː sabijla ʔilaaː muraaːd͡ʒaʕaai nafsihi fij aːlrradi kaːn ðlk ʔamlh aːlwħjd w aːlʔaχjr jwsf ʔaʶʕrdˤ ʕn hðaː ʔinn aːlllʁa aːlʔalbaːnjja d͡ʒmjla d͡ʒddaː lm jʕd jθq bh ʔaħd bʕd aːlʔaːn qaːm baːʕtqaːl aːlmd͡ʒrmjn ʔirfʕ sˤwt aːlmwsjqaː laː ʔaħd mn ʔarqaːm saːmj jʕml ʔakrh ðwq aːlkħwl faʔaaχaða ðalika baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlʃʃuʕaraaːʔi faqaaːla aːlbχjl laː tabuluu ʔiħdaː jdjh aːlʔaχraː bdn faːd͡ʒr wqlb kaːfr bðaːt fmh jftdˤħ aːlkðwb taðbulu aːlwardaau faʔiinna aːlnnafsa ʕan aːlħaqqi ʔaanfaru walilhawaaː ʔaːθaru waqaaːla ʔaawsu bnu ħad͡ʒarin ʔajn tʕllm aːlktaːba kaːn ldjhm klb llbħθ ʕn aːld͡ʒθθ hnaːk waqad rawaaː ʕabdu aːlllahi bnu masʕuwdin ʕan aːlnnabiji sˤaʶllaʶaʶː aːlllahu ʕalajhi wasallama ʔaannahu qaaːla bdʔaː saːmj w ljlaː jmdˤjaʶːn kll jwm mʕaː mn hnaːk aʶːlʕaʶsˤfuʶwruʶ juʁarridu ʕalaaː aːlʃʃad͡ʒaraai ʔaðaːhb ʔant mʕnaː waʶnaʶsˤaʶrnaʶːhuʶm fakaːnwaː humu aːlʁaːlibjna saːmj mʕd͡ʒb bkmaː hl trjd ʔan tʕlm kaːn saːmj tˤbjbaʶː mʃʕwðaː fajad͡ʒrij ʕalajk safahu aʶːltˤtˤaʶʕaʶaʶːmiʶ waqaaːla aʶːldˤdˤaʶħaʶaʶːkuʶ ʔaamarahu bimuʃaaːwiratihim limaaː ʕalima fijhaaː min aʶːlfaʶdˤliʶ saːmj jʕml fj ʕjaːda mħllja ʔarjd ʔan tqf bd͡ʒaːnbj aːlʔiiħsaaːnu ʔilaaː aːlnnaaːsi maːðaː qaːl aʶːltˤtˤbjb hw ʔaʶħdˤrhaʶː ʔilaː hnaː frjd rkl aːlkra mina aːlllahi ðij aːlmaʕaːrid͡ʒi famaːli aːllaðjna kafarwaː qibalaka muʶhtˤiʶʕjnaʶ ʔaafahimt qaaːla tabbanaː lilððahabi tabbanaː liʶlfiʶdˤdˤaʶaʶiʶ ʔaamsaaː aːlzzahru ðaːbilanaː waʶdˤaʶʕtuʶ aʶːlsˤsˤuʶwraʶaʶaʶ fij ʔiʶiʶtˤaʶːriʶn bdjʕin ln ʔadʕ twmaː jðhb walam jakun aʶːltˤtˤaʶriʶjquʶ dˤaʶjjiʶqaʶnaʶː faʔauwassiʕu wamina aːlllajli fasabbiħhu waʔaadbaːra aːlssud͡ʒwdi ʔasrʕ mn aʶːltˤrf ʔiʃfaaːqanaː ʕalajhim min kadħi aʶːltˤtˤaʶlaʶbiʶ falammaː raʔaawhaː qaːlwaː ʔiinnaː laʶdˤaʶːllwnaʶ lm ttdχχl daːʔimaː ʔaʶuʶsˤjb aːlmdrrs bsˤdmaʶ aʶːʕtˤnj ħðˤaʶːaʶn waːrmnj fj aːlbħr hl tʕrf ʔaχaːhm wakaaːda aːlfaqru ʔaan jakuwna kufranaː maqtu aːlnnaaːsi lahu ħattaaː laaː jad͡ʒida fijhim muħibbanaː aːllh sbħaːnh w tʕaːlaː hl lʕbt aːltns ʔaannahu qaaːla jawmanaː liʶʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶaʶːbiʶhiʶ niʕmaaan min ʕindinaː kaðlika nad͡ʒzj man ʃakara malʕuwnun ðuw aːlllisaaːnajni malʕuwnun kullu ʃaffaaːrin waaːljawmi aːlmawʕwdi ʔalm ʔaql lk mn qbl ʔaaraaːk laaː tubaaːlij maaː labist faqaaːla faljaʕbudwaː rabba hðaaː aːlbajti saːmj hw aːlmslm aːlwħjd fj aːlmdjna km jʕd͡ʒbnj aːlddktwr baːkr wajaʔamulu waaːlχawfu ʔilajhi ʔaaqrabu wataddʕj ħubb sajfi aːlddwlai aːlʔaumam u waʔaaħwaaːlanaː dˤaʶχmaʶaʶaʶn waburrizati aːld͡ʒaħjmu lilʁaːwjna qaːmt aʶːlʃʃrtˤaʶ bʕmljja mraːqba srrja hðh ʔakbr qtˤaʶ rʔajthaː fj ħjaːtj aːlfaːʃj aːld͡ʒjd aːlwħjd hw aːlfaːʃj aːlmjt waqad qaaːla aːlmaʔamuwnu raħimahu aːlllahu aʶːlfaʶsˤluʶ aːlssaaːdisu fij aːlħasadi waaːlmunaaːfasaai wawalijjuhu muʕaaːdijanaː ʔaalam tara kajfa faʕala rabbuka biʕaːdin waʶliʶdˤiʶddiʶhiʶ aːlmulaaːʔiimi ʔaːθara faʶnaʶdˤdˤaʶraʶ aːlllahu wad͡ʒha aːmriʔiin ʔaawd͡ʒaza fij kalaaːmihi faʶaʶːqtaʶsˤaʶraʶ ʕalaaː ħaaːd͡ʒatihi waqad ħukija ʕan sufjaaːna aːlθθawriji ʔaannahu qaaːla ʔarjd rʔuja twm qbl mʁaːdrtj kfaːka mbaːlʁa kallaː bal laː jaχaːfwna aːlʔaːχiraaa waʶðˤiʶlliʶn mamdwdin waʔiinnahu latanzjlu rabbi aːlʕaːlamjna kaːn saːmj jʕlm ʔann ljlaː kaːnt tbħθ ʕnh kjfmaː ħsbthaː snsˤl qblhm kaːnt tktb rwaːja wahaðaaː jakuwnu min aːlħazmi wamin dwnihimaː d͡ʒannataːni watashijlu aːlssabijli ʕalajhim wabaðlu aːlmad͡ʒhuwdi fij rifdihim wanawmu aːlʕaʃijji ħumqun ħaːwlt ʔan ʔansaː ʔannhaː qd bkjt kamaaː qaaːla fij muħkimi aːlkitaaːbi laː jmknki tfwjt hðh aːlʔamsja kaaːna aːlzziħaːmu ʃadijdanaː ʃʕr maːrjaː tˤwjl wafij qawlihi laaː tutbiʕ aʶːlnnaʶðˤraʶaʶaʶ aʶːlnnaʶðˤraʶaʶaʶ taʔawijlaaːni aʶːtsˤl bj ʁdaːan ʔanaː ʔadrs ʕdda lʁaːt wajuqaaːlu lilʕaaːlimi hðaː ljs mnzl md͡ʒaːnjn bl ʕjaːda llmsˤaʶːbjn baʶːlʔaʶmraʶːdˤ aːlʕqljja ljth kaːn hnaː jntðˤrnj ʔaakrahu aːlssajra fij aʶːltˤuʶrqiʶ aːlmuzdaħimaai ʔajmknk ʔijd͡ʒaːdhaː waʶʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶːbuʶ aːljamjni maː ʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶːbuʶ aːljamjni χuðhaaː faʔiinnahaaː mafaaːtijħu χazaaːʔiini aʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤiʶ aʶːntðˤr saːmj ħttaː aːljwm aːlttaːlj aʶːttsˤlt aʶːlʃʃrtˤaʶ bsaːmj samiʕatnij aːmraʔaaaun biʶaʶːltˤtˤaʶwaʶaʶːfiʶ maː aːlðj knt tfʕlh waaːlttad͡ʒaaːwuzu ʕanhum waʶaʶːlttaʶʕaʶruʶdˤiʶ liaːktisaaːbi aːlttabiʕaaːti kjf kaːnt ʔad͡ʒwaːʔ aːlmdrsa ʔiʃtrjtu mzhrjaan zd͡ʒaːd͡ʒjaan raːħt aːlskra wd͡ʒaːʔt aːlfkra ʔajn twnj ʔaaw qubħa hid͡ʒaaːʔin muʶmdˤiʶn hw fχwr baːbnh saːmj jbħθ ʕn aːlssʕaːda waʕan θawaaːbihi jarʁabuwna waqaaːla aːlʃʃaaːʕiru waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ ʃuʕaraaːʔi huðajlin χaːn faʶːdˤl ħbjbth ʔaalaː jaʕlamu man χalaqa wahuwa aʶːlllaʶtˤjfuʶ aːlχabjru walaaː jastankifu mimmaaː muniʕa ʔajmknnj aːldfʕ ʕn tˤrjq btˤaʶːqaʶ aːlʔiʔitmaːn ʔaqll tˤʕaʶːmk td͡ʒd mnaːmk waman ʔaafʃaaːhu kaaːna aːlχijaaːru ʕalajhi laː maʶqtˤwʕaʶaʶiʶn walaː mamnwʕaain hlaː ʔamskt bhðaː mn fdˤlk faqad jadʕuw ʔilaaː ðalika ʔaarbaʕaau ʔaasbaaːbin jasbaħu aːlʔaawlaːadu fij aːlbiħaːri kaːn saːmj jsˤaʶːħb ʔaʶʃχaʶːsˤaʶː χtˤjrjn waʶaʶːlmaʶwdˤuʶwʕiʶ min aʶːsˤtˤiʶlaʶaʶːħiʶ ʕaʶsˤriʶhiʶ kaððabat qawmu nwħin aːlmursaljna klaːm kaːlʕsl wwʁzun kaːlʔasl ʕlaː saːmj tnðˤjf hðh aʶːlfwdˤaʶː waraħimak biħusni ðˤaʶfaʶriʶhiʶ ʕljj ʔan ʔaʶdˤmmd d͡ʒrħ aʶːlħsˤaʶːn ħdθ aːlʔamr ðaːth jwm aːlʔiθnjn litatimma aːlssaʕaaːdaau wataʕumma aʶːlmaʶsˤlaʶħaʶaʶuʶ aːlθθijaaːba aːllatij tasturu ʕawraaːtikum kaːn saːmj jntðˤr aːstdʕaːʔh tχrrd͡ʒ saːmj mn aːlmʕhd w kaːn aːlʔawwl fj qsmh mʕ mn tðˤn ʔanhaː tskn ʔaaw niʕmaain taðkuruhaaː wakajfa jakuwnu ʕaaːranaː maaː ʔaaddaaː ʔilaaː sˤaʶwaʶaʶːbiʶn waʶsˤaʶddaʶ ʕan χaʶtˤaʶʔaʶiʶn faʔiiðaaː tawaaːtara aʶːlfaʶdˤluʶ ʕalajhi sˤaʶaʶːraʶ aʶːlnnaʶqsˤuʶ fijmaaː siwaaːhu waaːlrraaːbiʕu huwa χaʃjaau aːlllahi taʕaaːlaaː wahuwa qawlu ʕurwaaa bni aːlzzubajri ʔaalam jaʕlam biʔaanna aːlllaha jaraː liʔaanna aːlkibra jakuwnu biaːlmanzilaai ħukija ʕan θaʕlabin qaaːla aːlaː mtaː snqf mktwfaː aːlaːjdaː mn aːlʔard͡ʒħ ʔan jnswaː wʕwdhm waliðalika dˤaʶraʶbaʶ aːlllahu taʕaaːlaaː bihi aːlmaθala faqaaːla waaːlʔiiħsaaːna ʔaan takuwna sarijratuhu ʔaaħsana min ʕalaaːnijatihi aːntbh waqad aːχtalafa ʔaahlu aːlttaʔawijli fij qawlh taʕaaːlaaː walaaː jakmulu ʔillaaː maʕahaaː jaː lh mn klb kbjr walikulli ʕilmin minhaaː faʶdˤiʶjlaʶaʶuʶn ttklm maːrjkw aːlʔind͡ʒljzja btˤlaʶːqaʶ aːlħaaːd͡ʒaau ʔilaaː aːlʕaqli ʔaaqbaħu min aːlħaaːd͡ʒaai ʔilaaː aːlmaaːli jasurrunij ʔaan taʶħdˤuʶraʶ ʕlaː rʔash rjʃa lmaːðaː aːbtlʕt tlk aʶːlʔaʶqraʶːsˤ jbdw saːmj mθlk dχl aːlʁrfa bʕd χrwd͡ʒk ttraːwħ drd͡ʒa aːlħraːra fj aʶːlsˤjf mn θlaːθjn ʔilaː ʔarbʕjn drd͡ʒa ʕaːd ʔilaː mwqf aːlssjaːraːt ʕaːd mn mwqf aːlssjaːraːt ttklm w kʔank rʔijs ʕmlnaː ʔaʶðˤn ʔannaː tħaːdθnaː ʕbr aːlhaːtf ʔiinnaː sanulqj ʕalajka qawlanaː θaqjlanaː laː tql ðlk kaːn saːmj jʕtqd ʔann md͡ʒjdaː kaːn thdjdaː χtˤjraʶː lħjaːth rabbi nad͡ʒd͡ʒinj waʔaahlj mimmaː jaʕmalwna bdʔa saːmj jmdˤj wqtaː ʔakθr mʕ ljlaː km ʔasrrtnj rʔuja twm ʔid͡ʒlsj jaː kjt jawma jafirru aːlmarʔu min ʔaaχjhi ʕnd d͡ʒuhajnaaa aːlχbr aːljqjn kl maː ʔaʶsttˤjʕ fʕlh hw aʶːlʔiʶntðˤaʶːr ʔarsl saːmj rsaːla lljlaː wmaː ʔabrʔi nfsj hl sjkwn hnaːk ʔaħd baʶːntðˤaʶːrj laː tns ʔan tʔaχð ʔaʶʁraʶːdˤk mʕk hw dˤdd hðh aːlmbaːdra qul ʔiinnamaː ʔaanaː munðirun wamaː min ʔiilhin ʔiillaaː aːlllahu aːlwaːħidu aːlqahhaːru ðhb saːmj laʶːsˤtˤħaʶːb ʔaχth mn aːlmdrsa lj sˤdjq ʔabaːh mmθl mʃhwr waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi min kamaaːli ʕaqlik aʶːstiʶðˤhaʶaʶːruʶk ʕalaaː ʕaqlik dʕaː saːmj ljlaː lqdˤaʶːʔ aːllljl mʕh man taraaː ʔaan nuwallijahu ħiʶmsˤaʶ faqaaːla maaː aːlqaːriʕaau maː lakum kajfa taħkumwna ʔaħb aːlmfaːd͡ʒʔiaːt wataraka zijnaaa aːlddunjaaː mlʔa saːmj kʔasaː bmdˤaʶːd aːlttd͡ʒmd saːmj jħbb aːlddraːsa ʕlm saːmj ʔann ljlaː lm tkn tħbbh walalkaffu ʕan ʃatmi aːlllaʔiijmi takarrumanaː ʔaʶaʶdˤaʶrruʶ lahu min ʃatmihi ħijna jaʃtumu lqd kðb saːmj aːʕtðr saːmj bʔimkaːnk hdm d͡ʒbl wlkn ljs bʔimkaːnk ʔiχfaːʔ aʶːlħtˤaʶːm aʶːiʶqtˤʕ aːlkʕka baːlskjn walaaː liʶriʶdˤaʶaʶːhuʶ ʁaaːjaaun liʔaannahum lammaaː lam tastaqirra bihim daaːrun ʔaːkl mn ħwt waðahaba ʔaːχaruwna ʔilaaː wud͡ʒuwbi ðalika biaːlʃʃarʕi duwna aːlʕaqli smn ʕlaː ʕsl χalaqa aːlʔiinsaːna min ʕalaqin fjhaː faːkihaaun waaːlnnaχlu ðaːtu aːlʔaakmaːmi saːmj ftaː mn aːlrrjf aːdχl ʔilaː ðlk aːld͡ʒħr saːmj jħbb aːlθθld͡ʒ ʕalimt maaː raʔaajt ðhb ʔilaː aːlmħl aːltd͡ʒaːrj aːlktaːb jqrʔa mn ʕnwaːnh fajamnaʕahum min taslijmi aʶːlsˤsˤaʶwaʶaʶːbiʶ liʶsˤaʶaʶːħiʶbiʶhiʶ waʔaand͡ʒajnaː mwsaː waman maʕahu ʔaad͡ʒmaʕjna waħukija ʕan ʔaabij sˤaʶaʶːliʶħiʶ bni ħassaaːna ʔaqnʕ saːmj ljlaː kj tħdˤr lh slaːħaː naːrjjaː waʔiitjaaːna aːlqurabi faʔiinna aʶːtˤtˤiʶraʶaʶːħaʶ muraaːʕaaːtihaaː watarka tafaqqudihaaː mahaaːnaaun waðullun sjtzwd͡ʒ twm ʔaχjraː jusrid͡ʒu aːlχaaːdimu aʶːlħiʶsˤaʶaʶːnaʶ lʔad͡ʒl aːld͡ʒħjm aːbq bʕjdaː ʕnj fahaðihi aːlħaaːlaau ʔaʶaʶtˤaʶmmuʶ aːlʕujuwnu maʶsˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶduʶ aʶːlʃʃaʶjtˤaʶaʶːniʶ bʔimkaːnh aːlaːstraːħa tilka aːlddaːru aːlʔaːχiraau nad͡ʒʕaluhaː lillaðjna laː jurjdwna ʕuluwwanaː fij aʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤiʶ walaː fasaːdanaː waaːlʕaːqibaau lilmuttaqjna ʕndmaː tkwn fj rwmaː tsˤrf kmaː jtsˤrf aːlrwmaːn lqd lʕb saːmj waʶaʶːlnnaʶːʃiʶtˤaʶːtiʶ naʶʃtˤaʶnaʶː kaːnt ljlaː tstħqq ʔan tkwn sʕjda fajakuwnu taaːraaan kasalanaː aːstʁll d͡ʒwn dˤʕf bjl lima lam tʔakl ħlwaːk waʔaanna aːlʕaqla fij aːlddijni ʔaʶaʶsˤluʶn qaːl saːmj ʔannh lm jkn jʕjʃ hnaːk ʔaħd hw ʔamjn sˤndwq d͡ʒmʕjtnaː ʕan ʔaaʕmaaːmihi waʔaad͡ʒdaaːdihi ʔanaː ʔaʶjdˤaʶː knt mdrrsaː waaːliaːstimdaaːdu bihaaː ʔaaʕammu nafʕanaː walikulli binaaːʔin ʔaussun kaːn saːmj jtlffðˤ ʔanfaːsh ʔaʶaʶbsˤaʶraʶ aːlrrad͡ʒulu aːlhilaːala famaː tanfaʕuhum ʃafaːʕaau aːlʃʃaːfiʕjna waaːntiqaaːmu ʔaahli aːlʁawʁaaːʔi kullu maʕruwfin sˤaʶdaʶqaʶaʶuʶn lm tkn tʕlm ʔajn kaːnt ʔiin tubdwaː ʃajʔianaː ʔaaw tuχfwhu faʔiinna aːlllaha kaːna bikulli ʃajʔin ʕaljmanaː laː td͡ʒlb lj zhwraː bʕd aːlʔaːn mtaː tlʕb aːltns θumma radadnaːhu ʔaasfala saːfiljna sˤfʕt ljlaː wd͡ʒh saːmj bqwwa aːlʕql sˤdq aːlħkm ʕlaː aːlʔamwr saʔaaʕtaaːdu aːlttabkijra fij aːlnnawmi ʔiiðan jaʶsˤiʶħħaʶ badanuka ʁjjr saːmj rʔajh bχsˤwsˤ aːlmslmjn aʶːldˤmjr sˤwt haːdaːʔ jχbrk bʔan ʔaħdaːan jnðˤr ʔiljk aːlʕtaːb hdja aːlʔaħbaːb laː tns trk ʔikraːmjja lm ʔaʕrf ʔannki hnaː aʶːlχsˤaʶːl aʶːltˤtˤjbaʶ fatawalla ʕanhum ħattaː ħjnin laː ttdχl liʔaanna ʁuruwra aːlhawaaː wanaaːziʕa aːlʃʃahwaai jaʶsˤriʶfaʶaʶːniʶ aːlnnafsa ʔaan tarkaba aʶːlʔaʶaʶfdˤaʶlaʶ min χalaaːʔiiqihaaː ʔaan jaχtabira ʔaumuwra zamaaːnihi ʕljk ʔan tʕml bd͡ʒdd aʶːħtfðˤ saːmj brsaːla ljlaː aʶːlsˤsˤwtjaʶ kaːn saːmj jtsˤrrf hkðaː qzm waːqf χjr mn ʕmlaːq raːkʕ wahadajnaːhu aːlnnad͡ʒdajni aːlʕiffaau fij waʔaawlaaːhaaː wajabʕaθu ʕalaaː aʶːlttaʶwaʶruʶtˤiʶ fij aːlʃʃubuhaaːti waʶsˤaʶniʶjʕuʶk ʕindahum zaaːkijanaː aːlklaːm jʃbh aːlnħl fjh aːlʕsl waːlʔibr qutila aːlʔiinsaːnu maː ʔaakfarahu tˤfħ aːlkjl fawaaːd͡ʒibun biaːlʕaqli aʶːltˤjwr ʕlaː ʔaʃkaːlhaː tqʕ kaːnaː saːmj w ljlaː jtχaʶːsˤmaʶːn ʔaħjaːnaː jatʕabu aːlʔiinsaːnu fij sˤiʶʁaʶriʶhiʶ kaj jartaaːħa fij kibarihi waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi biðakaaːʔiihi liʔiallaaː jaʶsˤiʶjraʶ bihi mudillanaː baʶtˤiʶraʶnaʶː waʶmuʶstaʶtˤiʶjlaʶnaʶː ʔaaʃiranaː tqwm aːld͡ʒrjda btzwjdnaː baːlʔaχbaːr saːmj jʕrf kjf jrbtˤ ħðaːʔh bilisaːnin ʕarabijjin mubjnin aːlmadrasaai km ʕmrk laː ʔaʕrf ʔillaː hðaː faʔiiðaaː taqarrara lahu aːlrraʔaju ʔaʶaʶmdˤaʶaʶːhuʶ falam waʶʔaʶaʶʕtˤaʶthuʶ qijaaːdahaaː waqaːla ʔiinnj ðaːhibun ʔiilaː rabbj sajahdjni waʔaammaaː mkaːn jmkn ʃraːʔ aːlllħm mnh bikam taʃtarija aːlburtuqaːlaaa man ħaaːðara lam jahlaʕ ʔinhaː ttnaːwl aːlʕʃaːʔ wamin sunani rasuwli aːlllahi sˤaʶlaʶwaʶaʶːtuʶ aːlllahi ʕalajhi bimaaː juʶdˤaʶaʶːhiʶjhiʶ ʔaannaː sˤaʶbaʶbnaʶaʶː aːlmaːʔa sˤaʶbbaʶnaʶː walaw naʃaːʔu lamasaχnaːhum ʕalaː makaːnatihim famaaː aʶːstaʶtˤaʶːʕwaʶː muʶdˤiʶjjaʶnaʶː walaː jard͡ʒiʕwna balaaː jaaː rasuwla aːlllahi waʔaabaaːħahu waʶħaʶðˤaʶraʶhuʶ waqalbanaː ʃaaːkiranaː jaħtariqu aʶːlħaʶtˤaʶbuʶ waaːlqudraau ʔaʶaʶfdˤaʶluʶ min aːlʕad͡ʒzi ʔiinnaː hadajnaːhu aːlssabjla ʔiimmaː ʃaːkiranaː waʔiimmaː kafwranaː ʔiðaaː ðˤaʶnaʶntuʶm falaaː tuħaqqiquwaː ʔaammaː mani aːstaʁnaː wabiqawlihi wasaraaːbijla taqijkum baʔasakum aːldduruwʕa aːllatij taqij aːlbaʔasa wahuwa aːlħarbu θumma qaraʔaa aːntql saːmj llʕjʃ fj wlaːja ʔaːχraː ʔaʕndk krjm lʔaʃʕa aːlʃms faʔiiðaː d͡ʒaːʔati aʶːltˤtˤaʶːmaʶaʶuʶ aːlkubraː ʔaʶaʶfdˤaʶluʶ aːld͡ʒihaaːdi d͡ʒihaaːdu aːlhawaaː hðaː ljs ʃjʔiaː jnsaːh aːlmrʔa maaː fijk ʕajbun ʔillaaː kaθraau aːlkalaaːmi ʔiinnaː naːqd mʃhwr waħaʃwuk fijmaaː bajna ðalika bawlun waʕaðiraaun faʶsˤaʶaʶːraʶt aʶːltˤtˤiʶjaʶraʶaʶuʶ min simaaːti aːlʔiidbaaːri waʶaʶːtˤtˤiʶraʶaʶːħuʶhaʶaʶː min ʔimaaːraaːti aːlʔiiqbaaːli waqaaːla bazard͡ʒamharu walaw ʔaalqaː maʕaːðjrahu nʃʔa saːmj w hw jraː waːldjh jtχaʶːsˤmaʶːn d͡ʒiʔiti kaj ʔaataʕallama ʔaħdhm ʕlaː aːlbaːb baːrk aːllh fjk ʔarsl saːmj aːlʕdjd mn aːlrrsaːʔil lljlaː ʔaʃd͡ʒʕ mn waʔiin ʔaamsakahu fahuwa zaaːduhu ʔilaaː aːlnnaaːri faʔiiðaaː takallamta faʕalajk ʔaaw lak mtaː nsˤl ʔiinaahum ʕlaː ʕlm wʔaχjranaː wd͡ʒdt mfaːtjħhaː aːlmfqwda rmaː aːlkra waaːlttaklijfu jad͡ʒmaʕu muħammadu bnu ħaaːzimin walajsa maʕa aːlʕadaaːwaai ʔaamnun walaaː raaːħaaun lqd aʶːttsˤl bj aːlmħaːmj kamaaː qaaːlat aːlħukamaaːʔu ʃarafu aːlnnafsi ʔaan taħmila aːlmakaaːriha kamaaː taħmilu aːlmakaaːrima saːmj mn tˤbqaʶ ʔadnaː wabiaːlnnafsi maqhuwranaː aːhlaː wshlaː bk aːsmj haːd͡ʒr maː aːlðj qaːlh ʔahwa ʕlaː maː jraːm aːlbqr jʕtˤjnaʶː aːlħljb ʕan d͡ʒaddihi nmrr daːʔimanaː bd͡ʒaːnb mktb aːlbrjd fj tˤrjqnaʶː ʔilaː aːlʕml waqubħi ðikrihi fij dahrihi lmaːðaː ʃrbt tlk aʶːlʔaʶqraʶːsˤ ʔaanaaːʕimaaun hij ʔaam χaʃinaaun bjn wʕdh wʔind͡ʒaːzh ftra nbj bjnhm daːʔ aʶːldˤraʶːʔiʶr t waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlʕulamaaːʔi ʔiðaaː tˤaʶlaʶbaʶ rad͡ʒulaaːni ʔaamranaː ðˤaʶfiʶraʶ bihi ʔaʶaʶʕðˤaʶmuʶhuʶmaʶaʶː muruwʔaaan χajrun manʃuwrun waʃarrun mastuwrun rkn saːmj sjjaːrth rtb ʁrftk watawalla ʕanhum ħattaː ħjnin kaːn jdˤaʶːd͡ʒʕ mdrrsth jmknk ʔan tbdʔa waʶaʶːdˤriʶb lahum maθalanaː ʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶːbaʶ aːlqarjaai ʔiið d͡ʒaːʔahaaː aːlmursalwna faʶʕaʶsˤaʶwaʶː raswla rabbihim faʔaaχaðahum ʔaaχðaaan raːbijaaan waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlbulaʁaaːʔi likulli θawbin laaːbisun walikulli ʕilmin qaaːbisun maaː wad͡ʒadt ʔilaaː waqtij haðaaː man jaʕrifu mawlida haðajni min naʶaʶːsˤiʶħiʶn waðarnj waaːlmukaððibjna ʔauwlij aːlnnaʕmaai wamahhilhum qaljlanaː laː tns waʔiiðaaː dˤaʶaʶːqaʶ labisa ʔaaħsanahaaː kaːn saːmj msjħjjaː ʔind͡ʒjljjaː mχlsˤaʶː waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ ʔaahli aːlttaʔawijli fij qawlh taʕaaːlaaː laaː tuʔuaaːχiðnij bimaaː nasijtu maːðaː tqwljn waaːttabiʕ maː jwħaː ʔiilajka min rabbika ʔiinna aːlllaha kaːna bimaː taʕmalwna χabjranaː ʔad͡ʒml aːlʕjwn wʔakðbhaː ʕjwn aːlnsaːʔ kaːn aːld͡ʒw baːrdaːan aːlbaːrħa ʔaʶχtˤʔaʶ saːmj fj ktaːba bʕdˤ aːlklmaːt klbj χaːʔif mn aːlmaːʔ fij aːlħamjmi θumma fij aːlnnaːri jusd͡ʒarwna fjhimaː ʕajnaːni naʶdˤdˤaʶːχaʶtaʶːniʶ waaːlssuʔuaaːlu mabðalaaun nħn dˤd aːlħrb laː tns ʔannh twd͡ʒd ħaːlaːt aːstθnaːʔijja tˤlb faʶːdˤl mn daːnja ʔan tʔatj mʕh wasaʔaala aːlmuʁijraaa faqaaːla qaːla fabiʕizzatika laʔauʁwijannahum ʔaad͡ʒmaʕjna kaːn saːmj ʔaaħwaaːli riʶjaʶaʶːdˤaʶtiʶk lahaaː ʔaan tuʶsˤaʶddiʶqaʶ nafsak fijmaaː manaħatk min raʁaaːʔiibihaaː kaːn saːmj jntðˤr fj aːlχaːrd͡ʒ wafij manʕihaaː ʕan aʶːlbaʶʕdˤiʶ kaffun lahaaː ʕan muwd͡ʒibun liʶʔaʶuʶsˤuʶwliʶhiʶ ʕaːd saːmj ʔilaː mħllh llbjtzaː faaːlkaffu ʔiħdaaː aːlttawbatajni wafij haðajni min aːlððami maaː junaaːfij aːlssaχaaːʔa faaːd͡ʒtabaːhu rabbuhu fad͡ʒaʕalahu mina aʶːlsˤsˤaʶːliʶħjnaʶ waman taʕallama aːlfiqha nabula miqdaaːruhu mn ʔajn ħsˤl ʕlaː hðaː fad͡ʒaʕalnaːhunna ʔaabkaːranaː wamaː nurjhim min ʔaːjaain ʔiillaː hija ʔaakbaru min ʔauχtihaː waʔaaχaðnaːhum biaːlʕaðaːbi laʕallahum jard͡ʒiʕwna qaːla faʔati bihi ʔiin kunta mina aʶːlsˤsˤaʶːdiʶqjnaʶ fahuwa laaː jastaqbiħu aːlʃʃara walaaː jakuffa ʕan aːlmakruwhi kaːn ldaː saːmj mʃkl ʔidmaːn ʕlaː aːlkħwl fj d͡ʒannaain ʕaːlijaain mn ʔajn aːʃtrjt ðlk aʶːlmʕtˤf wajakfijka maʔiuwnaaa aːliaːʕtiðaaːri lild͡ʒamali ʕunuqun tˤaʶwiʶjluʶn hl ʔant ʕdˤw fj frjq aːlbjsbwl qaːla ʔaafaraʔaajtum maː kuntum taʕbudwna swf ʔasaːfr fj maːrsʔaːðaːr waliðalika qaaːla aːlnnabiju sˤaʶllaʶaʶː aːlllahu ʕalajhi wasallama qillaau aːlħajaaːʔi kufrun aːlʔinaːra d͡ʒjjda jawmaʔiiðin tuʶʕraʶdˤwnaʶ laː taχfaː minkum χaːfijaaun kaːn saːmj jħbb msaːʕda aːlnnaːs ʔinn hðaː aːlddwaːʔ jdmmr ħjaːtj ʕaːdt ʔilaː wrʃa aːlʕml aːħbis lisaaːnak qabla ʔaan juʶtˤiʶjlaʶ ħabsak ʔaaw jutlifa nafsak hðaː aʶːltˤaʶːʔiʶr laː jmknh aːltħljq falawlaː ʔaannahu kaːna mina aːlmusabbiħjna hl hðh aːlʔaʃjaːʔ lk taʔakulu aːlʃʃaaːau fuwlanaː waʃaʕijranaː faqaaːla maaː baaːlu ʔaaħadihimaaː faqijrun waaːlʔaːχari ʁanijjun waaːlllahu ʔaaʕlamu bimaː jwʕwna aːlʔawlaː wamaː naħnu bimunʃarjna jaaː ʕabda aːlllahi kajfa aʶːltˤtˤaʶriʶjquʶ ʔilaaː maʶwdˤiʶʕiʶ kaðaaː faqaaːla waðalika ʔaarbaʕaau ʔaaʃjaaːʔa hðaː waʔiinna liʶltˤtˤaʶːʁjnaʶ laʃarra maʔaːbin wafij aːlddaaːri maħd͡ʒuwbun ʔillaaː ʕan ʔiðnihi waʔaammaː ʔiin kaːna mina aːlmukaððibjna aʶːldˤdˤaʶːljnaʶ χtˤr lh fkra d͡ʒjda lm tðˤn ʔannj ʔaχbrthaː bðlk ʔaafaraʔaajtum maː tumnwna ʔaan jakuwna waqijla fij manθuwri kaːnt ljlaː msllħa w χtˤjraʶ kaːd aːlfqr ʔan jkwn kfraːan kaːlʔibra tksj ʁjrhaː whj ʕrjaːna baaːta aʶːlmaʶriʶjdˤuʶ mutaʔaallimanaː waqad qaaːla ʕalijju bnu ʔaabij tˤaʶaʶːliʶbiʶn sʔaħtaːd͡ʒ ʔilaː aːlmzjd mn aːlmaːl twdˤdˤʔaʶ saːmj mrra ʔaχraː laʔauʕaððibanahu ʕaðaːbanaː ʃadjdanaː ʔaaw laʔaaðbaħannahu ʔaaw lajaʔatijannj biʶsuʶltˤaʶːniʶn mubjnin wajanqalibu ʔiilaː ʔaahlihi masrwranaː numattiʕuhum qaljlanaː θumma naʶdˤtˤaʶrruʶhuʶm ʔiilaː ʕaðaːbin ʁaʶljðˤiʶn lm jθq faʶːdˤl bðlk aːlddwaːʔ dmrt kl aːlʔadla waðukira ʔaanna fij aːlttawraaːai maktuwbanaː jaaː aːbna ʔaːdama aʶːlmuʶʕtˤiʶj laː jd͡ʒb ʔan tnsaː ʔannhaː jaːfʕa mθlk ʃuʶruʶwtˤuʶ aːlmuruwʔaai fij nafsihi aːlʔaʕmaːl ʔaʕlaː sˤwtaʶːaʶn mn aːlklmaːt naːdjnj saːmj hw jʃrb aːlnnbjð aːlʔaħmr bʔimkaːn saːmj ʔiʶsˤlaʶːħ aːlktaːb ʕn mlk fqd taːd͡ʒh ʔiinna fj ðlika laðikraː liman kaːna lahu qalbun ʔaaw ʔaalqaaː aːlssamʕa wahuwa ʃahjdun qaaːluwaː aːdʕu lanaaː rabbaka jubajjin lanaaː maaː hija waħaddaθahum falam jakðibhum smʕ saːmj aːnfd͡ʒaːraː mdwwjaː mn hw jwsf aʶːlsˤdjq ʔaħmd aːlblaːʁa aʶːlsˤmt ħjn laː jaħsunu aːlklaːm aʶːntðˤr bʔimkaːnj ħðfh hw ʁjwr kullu nafsin bimaː kasabat rahjnaaun ðhb saːmj ʔilaː faʶaʶːnðˤuʶr maaː taħʃuw fij wiʕaaːʔiik waʔiin kaffa taʃaaːʁulanaː bimaaː lazima falaaː lawma maaː lam jald͡ʒaʔa ʔilajhi muʶdˤtˤaʶrruʶn waʔiin kaaːna aːlħilmu kulluhu faʶdˤlaʶnaʶː waʃatama rad͡ʒulun aːlʃʃaʕbija faqaaːla kaːn fj mktb saːmj ʔarjka waʕalaaː ʔaːlihi waʶʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶaʶːbiʶhiʶ aːlʔaatqijaaːʔi maaː ʔaaddabanij ʔaaħadun walakinnij raʔaajtu d͡ʒahla aːld͡ʒaaːhili fad͡ʒaaːnabtuhu kaːn ʕmrj θmaːnj ʕʃra sna ħjnhaː ʕaːd ʔilaː ʃqqth ʔarjd ʔan ʔansaːhaː waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi aːlhimmaau raaːjaau aːld͡ʒiddi fj ʔaj d͡ʒaːmʕa tdrs knt ʔafkr fj aːtχaːð klb waqaːlwaː ʔaːmannaː bihi waʔaannaː lahumu aːlttanaːwuʃu min makaːnin baʕjdin waħukija ʔaanna ʕalijja bna ʔaabij tˤaʶaʶːliʶbiʶn karrama aːlllahu wad͡ʒhahu qaaːla liʕaaːmiri bni murraaa aːlzzuhriji ʔiinna rabbaka huwa ʔaaʕlamu biman dˤaʶllaʶ ʕan sabjlihi wahuwa ʔaaʕlamu biaːlmuhtadjna waaːlqajluwlaai χalaqun wawaːlidin wamaː walada fataħtu nwaːfða aːld͡ʒuħraai kaj jatad͡ʒaddada hawaaːʔuuhaaː aːstmʕ aːlmdrrs lj waħukija wazawwad͡ʒnaːhum biħwrin ʕjnin wajamnaʕahaaː min taʶsˤdiʶjqiʶ aːlmadħi lahaaː hw jʕlm ʔannj ʔaħbbh waqaaːla ʔibraaːhijmu aːlnnaχaʕiju aːlmizaaːħu min suχfin ʔaaw baʶtˤaʶriʶn waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ faʔaammaaː aːlʕiffaau ʕan aːlmaħaaːrimi fanawʕaaːni qaːl saːmj ʔannh wuld fj hðh aːlʕjaːda kallaː bal tuħibbwna aːlʕaːd͡ʒilaaa aːlllahuma ʔaanta ʔaaʕlamu bij min nafsij walaaː jatimmu lahu qaʶsˤduʶn aːlrraħjmi waaːlssamaːʔi ðaːti aːlburwd͡ʒi ðhbt ʔilaː hnaːk ʔaʶjdˤaʶːaʶn lm jzrhaː qtˤtˤ ʕaːd saːmj llʕjʃ fj aːlmkaːn aːlðj kaːn jʕjʃ fjh saːbqaː waaːllaðj huwa juʶtˤʕiʶmuʶnj wajasqjni laː aːʕrf kjf ʔastχdm aːlʃwka d͡ʒjdaːan ʃaʁalanij tawaqquʕu balaaːʔiihaaː ʕan aːlfaraħi biraχaaːʔiihaaː wqʕwaː waːħdaːan tlw aːlʔaːχr waaːlʔaaʁnijaaːʔu sukaaːraaː ʔillaaː man ʕaʶsˤaʶmaʶhuʶ aːlllahu taʕaaːlaaː bitawaqquʕi aːlʁijari ʕaːʃ saːmj ħjaːa raːʔiʕa waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi hajhaaːta mink aːlʁinaaː ʔin lam juqniʕk maaː ħawajt aːllaðj juwaswisu fj sˤuʶdwriʶ aːlnnaːsi ʔaj ktaːb sjfj baʶːlʁrdˤ falaaː ʃajʔa ʔaawlaaː biʶtˤuʶwliʶ ħabsin min lisaaːnin jaʶqsˤuʶruʶ ʕan aʶːlsˤsˤaʶwaʶaʶːbiʶ waqaːla aːlrraswlu jaː rabbi ʔiinna qawmij aːttaχaðwaː hðaaː aːlqurʔaːna mahd͡ʒwranaː ʔinnahu jaʶχtˤuʶbuʶhaʶaʶː linafsihi wajaquwlu lahaaː zawwid͡ʒijnij nafsak ʔauskinuki ʔaajja ʁurafi dimaʃqa ʃiʔiti ʔaχðt aʶːlʃʃrtˤaʶ saːmj ðukira ʕinda aːlnnabiji sˤaʶllaʶaʶː aːlllahu ʕalajhi wasallama rad͡ʒulun faðakara fijhi χajranaː swf aːsʔal twm w maːrj kjf fʕlaː ðlk huwa aːllaðj jurjkum ʔaːjaːtihi wajunazzilu lakum mina aːlssamaːʔi rizqanaː wamaː jataðakkaru ʔiillaː man junjbu wakaθraai aːlʔiid͡ʒraaːmi ʔajn tqtˤn baʶːldˤdˤbtˤ ħaːwl ʔan tbtlʕ rjqk jakaaːdu aːlbarqu jaʶχtˤaʶfuʶ ʔaʶaʶbsˤaʶaʶːraʶhuʶm bismi aːlllahi aːlrraħmni aːlrraħjmi waaːlssamaːʔi waʶaʶːltˤtˤaʶːriʶqiʶ aːlʔinsaːn jwld fj ʃkl aːlwaːw wħjn juqawwimu nfsh jðˤn ʔanh ʔalf aːlʁamaaːmu kaθijfun walaaː jalzamu ʃukranaː ʕalaaː nuʕmaaː waaːstinkaaːranaː limahaaːnaai aʶːlnnaʶqsˤiʶ waʶmaʶdˤaʶrraʶaʶiʶ aːlkaðibi ʕalajhi trjd kʔasaːan ʔaːχr mn aːlʃaːj ʔaʕddt lk kʔasaːan mnð lħðˤaʶːt qljla ljs ldaː saːmj drws hðaː aʶːlsˤsˤbaʶːħ baːltʔakjd laː ʔarjd ʔan ʔafʕl maː qaːm bfʕlh twm qbl qljl waʔiin taʶwaʶssaʶtˤaʶ waʶaʶːqtaʶsˤaʶdaʶ fijhi kaaːna maʕruwfanaː wabirranaː maħmuwdanaː ʕml saːmj fj wzaːra aʶːlsˤsˤħaʶ waliðalika qaaːla rasuwlu aːlllahi sˤaʶllaʶaʶː aːlllahu ʕalajhi wasallama laː jmknnj tħml tkaːljf aːlsfr llʕtˤlaʶ waʶaʶːlsˤsˤaʶbruʶ ʕalaaː aːlnnawaaːʔiibi wahaðaaː ʔaaʕlaaː manaaːzili aːlqanaaːʕaai twm lm jkn jtsˤwr ʔanh baːmkaːn maːrj aːlqjaːm bʔamr khðaː wamanzilaain rafijʕaain ħallahaaː biʁajri faʶdˤliʶn jabijtu aːlbaħru haaːʔiid͡ʒanaː qaaːla ʔaalam ʔaaqul lakum ʔiinnij ʔaaʕlamu ʁajba aːlssamaaːwaaːti waʶaʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤiʶ aːstmʕ saːmj llrrsaːla aʶːlsˤsˤwtjaʶ ljlaː tħbb aːlqjl w aːlqaːl ʔaʶdˤʕt rqm haːtfk aʶːlrjaʶːdˤaʶ mfjda llsˤħaʶ aːudχul aːlbustaːna wamattiʕ nafsaka biʶmaʶnðˤaʶriʶhiʶ walaaː taʕbaθ biʔaazhaːrihi waθimaːrihi θumma ʔaahluk waqijla liʕijsaaː aːbni marjama ʕalaaː nabijjinaaː waʕalajhi aːlssalaaːmu faqad rawaaː ʔaabuw hurajraaa qaaːla ʔinhm jraːqbwn maː jħdθ ʕn kθb faʔaaχaðatkumu aʶːlsˤsˤaʶaʶːʕiʶqaʶaʶuʶ waʔaantum taʶnðˤuʶruʶwnaʶ wakaaːna aːlfarad͡ʒu minhu qarijbanaː waʶdˤaʶʕuʶfaʶ ʔiχaaːʔuuhu kaːn faʶːdˤl hw ʃrjk raːmj aːld͡ʒdjd kallaː bal raːna ʕalaː qulwbihim maː kaːnwaː jaksibwna ðhb twm ʔilaː bwstˤn mʕ sˤdjq maː taðaru min ʃajʔin ʔaatat ʕalajhi ʔiillaː aʶːlʁaʶdˤaʶbiʶ hud͡ʒuwmu maaː takrahuhu aːlnnafsu mimman duwnahaaː ʔaħtaːd͡ʒ lmzjd mn aːlwqt lʔanhj waːd͡ʒbj ʔaaħsin ʔilj aːlnaːs tstʕbd qlwbhm waħijna jarhabu fad͡ʒumiʕa aːlssaħaraau limjqaːti jawmin maʕlwmin hl aːistmtʕt bwqtk mʕ aʶːlʔaʶsˤdqaʶːʔ mn jrjd aːlħrb ʔaʶsˤbħ faʶːdˤl ʃχsˤaʶː χtˤjraʶː lm jsbq lljlaː w ʔan rʔat d͡ʒmlaː fj ħjaːthaː ʕθrt ʕl twm jdχn aːlnrd͡ʒjla aːlllahi sˤaʶllaʶaʶː aːlllahu zbdaːan kʔanh aːldbs wahadajnaaːhu aːlnnad͡ʒdajni ʔaaw ðanbun sˤaʶʁiʶjruʶn tastaʁfiru lahu quwwaau wasaaːʔiilihi bismi aːlllahi aːlrraħmani aːlrraħijmi waaːlssamaaːʔi waʶaʶːltˤtˤaʶaʶːriʶqiʶ wasabbiħuwhu bukraaan waʶʔaʶaʶsˤiʶjlaʶnaʶː bqj aːlbaːb mʁlqanaː tˤwaʶːl aːljwm ʔaʶuʶʕtˤjk χams dqaːʔiq lħl hðh aːlmʃkla sttzwwd͡ʒ brd͡ʒl θrjj qaːl std͡ʒdnj ʔin ʃaːʔ aːllh sˤaʶːbraʶː wlaː ʔaʶʕsˤj lk ʔamraː aːnthaː kl ʃjʔ d͡ʒahlu aʶːlsˤsˤaʶʁiʶjriʶ maʕðuwrun wakulluhum ʔaːtijhi jawma aːlqijaaːmaai fardanaː ʔinhu mumtʕ wsˤħj ql mn bjdh mlkwt kl ʃjʔ whw jd͡ʒjr wlaː jd͡ʒaːr ʕljh ʔin kntm tʕlmwn fafahhamnaaːhaaː sulajmaaːna wakullanaː ʔaːtajnaaː ħukmanaː waʕilmanaː wasaχχarnaaː maʕa daaːwuwda aːld͡ʒibaaːla jusabbiħna waʶaʶːltˤtˤaʶjraʶ wakunnaaː faaːʕilijna kaːn mnnaːd jbqj qtˤtˤh daːχl biʶaʶːlðˤðˤaʶaʶːliʶmiʶjnaʶ faʔiiðaaː lam jakun ʔaːlifanaː maʔaluwfanaː taʶχaʶtˤtˤaʶfaʶthuʶ ʔaajdij ħaaːsidijhi ttʁðaː aːlħjtaːn ʕlaː aːlʔasmaːk aʶːlsˤʁjraʶ aːldnjaː ʕbrt ʕn aːjaːm w sjnjn w aːlaːnsaːn ʔaħjaːnaːan wʔaħjaːnaːan ʔauχraː laː ʔaðhb jd͡ʒb aːn tltzm bnðˤaʶːmk aːlʁðaːʔij ʔanaː fʕlaː ʔaqdr sˤħbtk ʔaʕtqd ʔank ðhbt bʕjdaː twm ʔataːa jwm aːlʔiθnjn wʕaːd ʔilaːa aːlbjt fj aːljwm aːltaːlj waːlðjn aʶːlmrdˤaʶː wahaðihi aʶːlmuʶwaʶaʶːdˤaʶʕaʶaʶuʶ aːlʕaaːmmaau tusammaaː ʕurfanaː waʶjuʶʕaʶtˤtˤiʶfuʶhuʶm ʕalaaː aːlrraʕijaai waminhum man jaquwlu rabbanaaː ʔaːtinaaː fij aːlddunjaaː ħasanaaan wafij aːlʔaːχiraai ħasanaaan waqinaaː ʕaðaaːba aːlnnaaːri hw fj mʃkla d͡ʒrħ jdh aːljsraː bskjn ʔinh mn ħsn aʶːlħðˤ ʔan tkwn rd͡ʒlaːan bihaðihi aːlmanzilaai min aːlʔaulfaai faqad taʶʕriʶdˤuʶ lahu ʕaʶwaʶaʶːriʶdˤuʶ tamnaʕu minhaaː θm ʔadbr waːstkbr min ħusni ʔiislaːami aːlmarʔi tarkuhu maaː laːa jaʕnijhi kaːn mnnaːd mhmmaː walaqad χalaqnaaː fawqakum sabʕa tˤaʶraʶaʶːʔiʶiʶqaʶ wamaaː kunnaaː ʕani aːlχalqi ʁaaːfilijna rfʕ twm aʶːlsˤndwq bħðr ʔiinnamaaː nuʶtˤʕiʶmuʶkuʶm liwad͡ʒhi aːlllahi laaː nurijdu minkum d͡ʒazaaːʔan walaaː ʃukuwranaː qaːl jaː qwm ljs bj dˤlaʶːlaʶ wlknj rswl mn rb aːlʕaːlmjn wkntm ʔazwaːd͡ʒaː θlaːθa bajnaaː ʔaanaaː naaːʔiimun raʔaajtu aːlnaaaːsa juʶʕraʶdˤuʶwnaʶ ʕalajaa waaːbtiʁaaːʔa aːlħaqqi ʔaabʕaθu ʕalaaː aʶːlnnuʶsˤraʶaʶiʶ wanazzalnaaː mina aːlssamaaːʔi maaːʔan mubaaːrakanaː faʔaanbatnaaː bihi d͡ʒannaaːtin waħabba aʶːlħaʶsˤiʶjdiʶ ʕalimat nafsun mmaaː ʔaʶaʶħdˤaʶraʶt sʔal djmaː hl tʕrfjn kwd aʶːlaʶːtsˤaʶːl llbnaːn farawħun warajħaaːnun wad͡ʒannaau naʕijmin kjf ħaːlk aːnaː bχjr ʃkraː klmaːt klmaːt lknhaː mstχdmaː aːltlskwb aːld͡ʒdjd aʶːldˤχm hwwkr faʔaammaaː aːlqaaːʕidaau aːlʔauwlaaː faʔaaχaðathumu aʶːlsˤsˤaʶjħaʶaʶuʶ biaːlħaqqi fad͡ʒaʕalnaaːhum ʁuθaaːʔan fabuʕdanaː lilqawmi aʶːlðˤðˤaʶaʶːliʶmiʶjnaʶ ʔiinna aːlmuttaqijna fij d͡ʒannaaːtin waʕujuwnin aːlħrb thmnaː d͡ʒmjʕaːan kaːn ʔabwh ʃrtˤjaʶː ʔawlʔik aːlðjn aːʃtrwaː aʶːldˤlaʶːlaʶ baːlhdaː fmaː rbħt td͡ʒaːrthm wmaː kaːnwaː mhtdjn kl aʶːlqtˤtˤ d͡ʒmjlwn warabbuka jaʕlamu maaː tukinnu sˤuʶduʶwruʶhuʶm wamaaː juʕlinuwna ʕnd sdra aːlmnthaː ʔiillaaː mani aʶːrtaʶdˤaʶaʶː min rasuwlin faʔiinnahu jasluku min bajni jadajhi wamin χalfihi raʶsˤaʶdaʶnaʶː hl kaːn kjn fj aːlbjt baːlʔams mlʔ kl d͡ʒnaːn ðkr kl lsaːn aʶːsˤlwhaʶː faʶːsˤbrwaʶː ʔaw laː tsˤbrwaʶː swaːʔ ʕljkm ʔinmaː td͡ʒzwn maː kntm tʕmlwn sjurfʕ aːlraːtb bdaːja mn ʔabrjl aːlnnaaːsu tˤaʶaʶːliʶbaʶaʶːniʶ jaʶtˤluʶbaʶaʶːniʶ wmθl klma χbjθa kʃd͡ʒra χbjθa aːd͡ʒtθt mn fwq aʶːlʔaʶrdˤ maː lhaː mn qraːr lqd kaːn mn aʶːlwaʶːdˤħ ʔanhu fj ʔalm walahu aːlkibrijaaːʔu fij aːlssamaaːwaaːti waʶaʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤiʶ wahuwa aːlʕazijzu aːlħakijmu falajsa kullu man ʔaʶaʶðˤhaʶraʶ aːlχajra kaaːna min ʔaahlihi ʔanaː laː ʔaʕml lʔaj ʔaħd fawarabbi aːlssamaaːʔi waʶaʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤiʶ ʔiinnahu laħaqqun miθla maaː ʔaannakum taʶntˤiʶquʶwnaʶ ʔinhaː trjd ʔan tntðˤr ħtaː ttzwd͡ʒ ʕn ʔabj ðrrin d͡ʒundubi bni d͡ʒunaaːdaaa wʔabj ʕbdi aːlrraħmni muʕaːði bni d͡ʒblin ʔanaː nðˤaʶːrthaʶː maːrj tˤwjlaʶ wqwjja raħima aːlllahu luʶwtˤaʶnaʶː aːuʁdu ʕaaːlimanaː ʔaaw mutaʕallimanaː ʔaaw mustamiʕanaː ʔaaw muħibbanaː walaaː takun aːlχaaːmisa fatahlika walaaː takuwnuwaː krh aːlqdm faʶʔaʶaʶsqiʶtˤ ʕalajnaaː kisafanaː mina aːlssamaaːʔi ʔiin kunta mina aʶːlsˤsˤaʶaʶːdiʶqiʶjnaʶ faʶʕaʶsˤaʶwaʶː rasuwla rabbihim faʔaaχaðahum ʔaaχðaaan raaːbijaaan fahaðaaː ʔaaʃrafu laʕallahum jard͡ʒiʕuwna laː ʔaʕtqd ʔannaː snsttˤjʕ ʔan nħl hðh aːlmʃkla bʔanfsnaː wlw d͡ʒaːʔthm kl ʔaːja ħtaː jrwaː aːlʕðaːb aːlʔaljm nħn kndjwn sʔal djmaː aːltlfaːz aːldwlj maː aːlðj ttħdθ ʕnh jaː faʶdˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶliʶhiʶ biʶaʶːltˤtˤaʶbʕiʶ wʔanaː knaː nqʕd mnhaː mqaːʕd llsmʕ fmn jstmʕ aːlʔaːn jd͡ʒd lh ʃhaːbaː rsˤdaʶː wajad͡ʒʕaluwna limaaː laaː jaʕlamuwna naʶsˤiʶjbaʶnaʶː mimmaaː razaqnaaːhum taaːlllahi latusʔaalunna ʕammaaː kuntum taftaruwna watataʔaallafu aːlʔaaʕdaaːʔa biʶaʶːlmuʶsˤaʶaʶːhaʶraʶaʶiʶ ħattaaː jard͡ʒiʕa aːlmunaaːfiru muʔuaaːnisanaː qd kaːnt ʔaːjaːtj ttlaː ʕljkm fkntm ʕlaː ʔaʕqaːbkm tnksˤwn ʔam lhm ʔaːlha tmnʕhm mn dwnnaː laː jsttˤjʕwn nsˤr ʔanfshm wlaː hm mnaː jsˤħbwn walaaː nafʕa biaːlʕadwi qabla aːlqudraai wad͡ʒaaːʔa aːlssaħaraau firʕawna qaaːluwaː ʔiinna lanaaː laʔaad͡ʒranaː ʔiin kunnaaː naħnu aːlʁaaːlibijna ʔanaː ʕaːʃq kbjr ld͡ʒjtr jaːnj wamanzilaau aːlssafijhi min aːlfaqijhi kamanzilaai aːlfaqijhi min lqd ʃaːrk fj aːlsbaːq walajsa fij haðaaː aːlqawli naʶqdˤuʶn limaaː ðakarnaaː qablu min tarki fuʶdˤuʶwliʶhaʶaʶː aːnhm mʃʁwlwn d͡ʒdaː faːstd͡ʒbnaː lh wnd͡ʒjnaːh mn aːlʁm wkðlk nnd͡ʒj aːlmʔumnjn waʔaanʃada aːlmubarridu ʕan ʔaabij sulajmaaːna aːlʁanawijji waːldj jħbnaː juʕrafu aːlmud͡ʒrimuwna bisijmaaːhum fajuʔuχaðu biʶaʶːlnnaʶwaʶaʶːsˤiʶj waaːlʔaaqdaaːmi ðaːk sjrkun fʔahlknaː ʔaʃd mnhm btˤʃaʶː wmdˤaʶː mθl aːlʔawljn kaːn ʕljh ʔan jbħθ ʕn ʁrfth bnfsh ʔanaː ʁnjtu ʔaʁnjaan qaːl djmaː mχrd͡ʒanaː haːtfh aʶːntðˤrj ʔaʕrf mn jsttˤjʕ ʔan jslfnj bʕdˤ aːlmaːl maħabbaaun fij aːlʔaahli faʶtˤaʶaʶːʕaʶtuʶhaʶaʶː tamnaʕu aʶːlttaʶqsˤiʶjraʶ waʃafaqatuhaaː taruddu ʕan aːlssarafi waaːlttabðijri ʔiinna ðalika laħaqqun taʶχaʶaʶːsˤuʶmuʶ ʔaahli aːlnnaaːri tʕd͡ʒbnj wðˤjftkiʶ tʔakl aːlbwma aːllħm kaːn mnnaːd jqtˤn mʕ waːldjh fj hðaː aːlmnzl aʶːlsˤsˤʁjr hwa ʔaʶħdˤr aʶːltˤʕaʶːm ldˤjfhuʶ wqdm lhu aːlmʔawaːa lm tkn ʔaljs mwd͡ʒwda fj aːlaːd͡ʒtmaːʕ ʔaljs kðlk bismi aːlllahi aːlrraħmani aːlrraħijmi ʔiiðaaː d͡ʒaaːʔa naʶsˤruʶ aːlllahi waaːlfatħu wahaðaaː min χidaʕi aːld͡ʒahli waʁuruwri aːlkasali ʔiillaaː mawtatanaaː aːlʔauwlaaː wamaaː naħnu bimuʕaððabijna waːlðjn jbjtwn lrbhm sd͡ʒdaː wqjaːmaː ʔaχbrnj maː aːlðj jmknnj fʕlh lmsaːʕdtk rbmaː twm ʔiinnahu ħakijmun ʕalijmun qaaːluwaː bal wad͡ʒadnaaː ʔaːbaaːʔanaaː kaðalika jafʕaluwna lhm fjhaː maː jʃaːʔwn χaːldjn kaːn ʕlaː rbk wʕdaː msʔiwlaː θumma ʔaawħajnaaː ʔiilajka ʔaani aːttabiʕ millaaa ʔiibraaːhijma ħanijfanaː wamaaː kaaːna mina aːlmuʃrikijna ljd͡ʒzj aːlðjn ʔaːmnwaː wʕmlwaː aʶːlsˤaʶːlħaʶːt mn fdˤlh ʔinh laː jħb aːlkaːfrjn waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi ʔijjaaːkum waaːlχalawaaːti faʔiinnahaaː tufsidu aːlʕuquwla watuʕaqqidu aːlmaħluwla ql sjrwaː fj aʶːlʔaʶrdˤ θm aʶːnðˤrwaʶː kjf kaːn ʕaːqba aːlmkðbjn walaqad sˤaʶbbaʶħaʶhuʶm bukraaan ʕaðaaːbun mustaqirrun kaːnt d͡ʒdtj tqwl daːʔimaːan laː ttnfs wtʃrb fj nfs aːlwqt wanaʕuwðu bik min ʃarri aʶːlssaʶlaʶaʶːtˤaʶaʶiʶ waaːlhaðri walaqad ʔaarajnaaːhu ʔaːjaaːtinaaː kullahaaː fakaððaba waʔaabaaː waaːtruki aːlbaħra rahwanaː ʔiinnahum d͡ʒundun muʁraquwna aːlħqjqa juʶsˤliʶħ lakum ʔaaʕmaaːlakum wajaʁfir lakum ðunuwbakum waman juʶtˤiʶʕiʶ aːlllaha warasuwlahu faqad faaːza fawzanaː ʕaʶðˤiʶjmaʶnaʶː aːllaðijna laaː juʔutuwna aːlzzakaaːaa wahum biaːlʔaːχiraai hum kaaːfiruwna faʔaammaaː man ʔauwtija kitaaːbahu bijamijnihi fajaquwlu haaːʔuumu aːqraʔuwaː kitaaːbijah ħaːwl twm ʔijqaːf maːrj mn ʃrb ʔaːχr zd͡ʒaːd͡ʒa mn aːlnbjð tkwn ʔahm bkθjr mmaː tmlk waʔaanʃadt liʶbaʶʕdˤiʶ ʔaahli aːlʔaadabi watarfaʕu aːlʕabda aːlmamluwka ħattaaː tud͡ʒlisahu mad͡ʒaaːlisa aːlmuluwki hl ttħdθ aːllaːtfja qaːmwaː btd͡ʒrba lmʕrfa maː aːðaː kaːn jwsf ʔaʶʕrdˤ ʕn hðaː waːstʁfrj lðnbk ʔink knt mn aʶːlχaʶːtˤʔiʶjn ʔauwlaʔiika aːlmuqarrabuwna ʔaːmul ʔalaː ʔaʶdˤtˤr ʔilaː aːstχdaːm hðaː aːlmsds liʔaanna maʕquwlahu ʔin ʔaaħassa wamaʕquwla kulli ðij baʕdi ðalika faʔauwlaʔiika humu aʶːlðˤðˤaʶaʶːliʶmuʶwnaʶ twqfj ʕn ʁjðˤ ʔaχjki hðaː ʔaχj faʔaammaaː aːllaðijna kafaruwaː faʔauʕaððibuhum ʕaðaaːbanaː ʃadijdanaː fij aːlddunjaaː waaːlʔaːχiraai wamaaː ʃʕrk aːljwm jaaː ʔaajjuhaaː aːllaðijna ʔaːmanuwaː aːttaquwaː aːlllaha waðaruwaː maaː baqija mina aːlrribaaː ʔiin kuntum muʔuminijna bl kðbwaː baːlsaːʕa wʔaʕtdnaː lmn kðb baːlsaːʕa sʕjraː fabiʔaajji ʔaːlaːʔ rabbikumaaː tukaððibaaːni ðalika biʔaannahum kaaːnat taʔatijhim rusuluhum biaːlbajjinaaːti fakafaruwaː faʔaaχaðahumu aːlllahu ʔiinnahu qawijjun ʃadijdu aːlʕiqaaːbi hl aːlʔawz jraːa aːllh qaːlt ʔinj ʔaʕwð baːlrħmn mnk ʔin knt tqjaː fʔin lm tʔatwnj bh flaː kjl lkm ʕndj wlaː tqrbwn aːqdr hnaː twm ldjh mnaːʕa mn ðlk aʶːlmrdˤ hw ktb aːlktaːb wanaħnu ʔaaqrabu ʔiilajhi minkum walakin laaː tuʶbsˤiʶruʶwnaʶ waliman χaaːfa maqaaːma rabbihi d͡ʒannataaːni lmaːðaː fqtˤ laː tχbrnaː bmaː tfkr bh jaaː ʔaabati ʔiinnij qad d͡ʒaaːʔanij mina aːlʕilmi maaː lam jaʔatika faaːttabiʕnij ʔaahdika ʔaʕlm bʔaʕdaːʔikm wkfaː baːllh wljaː wkfaː baːllh nsˤjraʶː lqd rssχ saːmj aːħtraːm aːlʔaːχrjn fj ðhn ʔabnaːʔih ħaːwl twm ʔijqaːf maːrj ʕn aːltħdθ mʕ d͡ʒwn ʔiinna ʃarra aːlddawaaːbi ʕinda aːlllahi aːllaðijna kafaruwaː fahum laaː juʔuminuwna lknaː hw aːllh rbj wlaː ʔaʃrk brbj ʔaħdaː falammaaː d͡ʒaaːʔa ʔaːla luʶwtˤiʶn aːlmursaluwna ʕuðranaː ʔaaw nuðranaː qaːl rb ʔinj whn aʶːlʕðˤm mnj waːʃtʕl aːlrʔas ʃjbaː wlm ʔakn bdʕaːʔik rb ʃqjaː ʔiʶʕtˤnj hðh aːlqnjna hðaː aːlbraːndj tˤʕmhuʶ tˤjb mn ʔajn ʔataː tm aːlaːnthaːʔ mn aːltħqq mn kl aːld͡ʒml aʶːlmntˤwqaʶ aːlmwd͡ʒwda walaaː tud͡ʒijbuhu ʔilaaː aːllaðij d͡ʒaʕala lakumu aʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤaʶ ðaluwlanaː faaːmʃuwaː fij manaaːkibihaaː wakuluwaː min rizqihi waʔiilajhi aːlnnuʃuwru hl ʔaʶsˤbt baʶːlrsˤaʶːsˤ aːlmidaaːdu binaaː ʔaaħsanu min aːlzzaʕfaraaːni waʔaawraθakum ʔaʶaʶrdˤaʶhuʶm wadijaaːrahum waʔaamwaaːlahum waʶʔaʶaʶrdˤaʶnaʶː lam taʶtˤaʶʔiʶuʶwhaʶaʶː wakaaːna aːlllahu ʕalaaː kulli ʃajʔin qadijranaː wamaʕðuwrun fij aːstiʕaaːnatihi hw laː jqwl ʔabdaːan ʃkraːan ʕlaː aːlrʁm mn kl maː fʕlth mn ʔad͡ʒlh ldjh ʕjwn bnja sawaaːʕidu jahtazuu fawqahaaː aːlʕalam nubaaːhij bihi wajubaaːhij binaaː jd͡ʒb ʔan ʔaðhb ʔilaː aːlbjt aːlʔaːn wmn jʕml mn aʶːlsˤaʶːlħaʶːt whw mʔumn flaː jχaːf ðˤlmaʶː wlaː hdˤmaʶː klmaːtklmaːtlknhaː warubbamaaː aːʕtamada ʕalaaː ħiʶfðˤiʶhiʶ waʶtaʶsˤaʶwwuʶriʶhiʶ faːsd͡ʒdwaː llh waːʕbdwaː mrħbaːan ʔiðaː lm ʔakun muʶχtˤiʶʔiʶaʶːaʶn ʔanti d͡ʒaːrtnunaː aːld͡ʒdjda aːljs kðlk jaː lhaː mn fkra ħlwa faaːkihijna bimaaː ʔaːtaaːhum rabbuhum wawaqaaːhum rabbuhum ʕaðaaːba aːld͡ʒaħijmi ʔiinna aːlmunaaːfiqijna fij aːlddarki aːlʔaasfali mina aːlnnaaːri walan tad͡ʒida lahum naʶsˤiʶjraʶnaʶː wlqd raːwdwh ʕn dˤjfh ftˤmsnaʶː ʔaʕjnhm fðwqwaː ʕðaːbj wnðr nðhb ʔanaː wbjtr kθjranaː ʔilaː aːlsjnmaː nħn bħaːd͡ʒa lhðaː aːltqrjr llʁd ʔaaʔaantum taχluquwnahu ʔaam naħnu aːlχaaːliquwna ʔarjnj d͡ʒwaːz sfrk lw smħt wjʕlm aːlðjn jd͡ʒaːdlwn fj ʔaːjaːtnaː maː lhm mn mħjsˤ nðˤmt ʃjzwkw qsˤjdaʶ ʕn tʁjjr aʶːlfsˤwl lm jsˤb ʔaħd bd͡ʒrwħ wakam ʔaahlaknaaː qablahum min qarnin hum ʔaaħsanu ʔaaθaaːθanaː wariʔijanaː aːnh d͡ʒaːd aːlnaːr jʕrdˤwn ʕljhaː ʁdwaː wʕʃjaː wjwm tqwm aːlsaːʕa ʔadχlwaː ʔaːl frʕwn ʔaʃd aːlʕðaːb ħqaː aːlʃbaːb jħbwn ʕn aːlmdrsa kaːn hnaːk θlaːθa jntðˤrwn ʔamaːmj ʔant ʕuʶnsˤrj wamaaː jaʶntˤiʶquʶ ʕani aːlhawaaː kuluunaaː nafdijki biaːldiimaaːʔ narwijki laː ʔaʶsttˤjʕ aːltnfs fasaaːhama fakaaːna mina aʶːlmuʶdħaʶdˤiʶjnaʶ ʔatdʕwn bʕlaː wtðrwn ʔaħsn aːlχaːlqjn wql aːlħq mn rbkm fmn ʃaːʔ fljʔumn wmn ʃaːʔ fljkfr laː ʔaʕrf ʃjʔiaːan bʕd lawlaaː maaː ʕaqadathu aːlkutubu min tad͡ʒaaːribi aːlʔaawwalijna ʕhdnaː aːlmwt mwtaː w aːlħjaːa ħjaːa fltʕd͡ʒbn lqwm jmʃwn ʔamwaːtaː ʔaawalam jarawaː kajfa jubdiʔiu aːlllahu aːlχalqa θumma juʕijduhu ʔiinna ðalika ʕalaaː aːlllahi jasijrun jaː lh mn md͡ʒtmʕ ʔin knt
