ʔaafalaaː taðakkaruwna aːltqjt bhaː ðaːt ʃtaːʔ qbl ʕda snwaːt aʶːlʃjtˤaʶːn jʕdkm aːlfqr wjʔamrkm baːlfħʃaːʔ waːllh jʕdkm mʁfra mnh wfdˤlaʶː waːllh waːsʕ ʕljm hl ʔant mʃʁwl aːlʔaːn jnbʔa aːlʔinsaːn jwmʔið bmaː qdm wʔaχr ʔiinna ʔaaħadakum jud͡ʒmaʕu χalquhu fij baʶtˤniʶ ʔaummihi ʔaarbaʕijna jawmanaː nuʶtˤfaʶaʶaʶn wlmn aʶːntsˤr bʕd ðˤlmh fʔawlʔik maː ʕljhm mn sbjl wmn ʃr aːlnfaːθaːt fj aːlʕqd wafij ʔaanfusikum ʔaafalaaː tuʶbsˤiʶruʶwnaʶ nħn aːlqmrjwn mn dm in waːħd ʕbdaː ʔiðaː sˤlaʶː wataraknaaː ʕalajhimaaː fij aːlʔaːχirijna qaaːla ʕabdu aːlllahi bnu aːlmuʕtazzi aːlmulku biaːlddijni jabqaaː waaːlddijnu biaːlmulki jaqwaaː maːðaː jwd͡ʒd χlf dˤbaʶːb hðaː aːlwd͡ʒwd tħb ʔaχtj aːlħlwaː ðkraː wmaː knaː ðˤaʶːlmjn hl ʔant sˤħj ʔaʶaʶjaʶtˤmaʶʕuʶ kullu aːmriʔiin minhum ʔaan judχala d͡ʒannaaa naʕijmin huwa aːllaðij ʔaarsala rasuwlahu biaːlhudaaː wadijni aːlħaqqi liʶjuʶðˤhiʶraʶhuʶ ʕalaaː aːlddijni kullihi walaw kariha aːlmuʃrikuwna faʔaaχbara ʔaanna aːlħaðara ʕalajhi juksibu haðihi aʶːlʔaʶaʶwsˤaʶaʶːfaʶ wajuħdiθu haðihi aːlʔaaχlaaːqa ʔinnij ʔaaʕlamu ʔaannij musaaːfirun waʔaannahaaː daaːru bulʁaain waʔiinna aʶːlʕaʶsˤaʶaʶː min ʔaːlaai aːlssafari ʔinnj wraːʔh χðnj ʔilaː aːlbjt ʕaːʃ fʔin aːllh laː jħb aːlkaːfrjn ðlkm fðwqwh wʔan llkaːfrjn ʕðaːb aːlnaːr qaaːla ʔiinna haʔuulaaːʔi dˤaʶjfiʶj falaaː taʶfdˤaʶħuʶwniʶ waʶfaʶsˤiʶjlaʶtiʶhiʶ aːllatij tuʔuwjhi ldjhaː aːlkθjr mn aːlklaːb hw wasallama liʔaabij hurajraaa raʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːlllahu ʕanhu ʔahw ʔamrjkj balaaː qaaːdirijna ʕalaaː ʔaan nnusawija banaaːnahu aːljaːbaːn bld jħjtˤ bh aːlbħr w ljdh mnaːχ mʕtdl jaː lhaː mn qsˤsˤaʶiʶn ħzjna wamarra muħammadu bnu waaːsiʕin raħmaau aːlllahi ʕalajhi biqawmin faqijla wanazaʕnaaː maaː fij sˤuʶduʶwriʶhiʶm min ʁillin ʔiiχwaaːnanaː ʕalaaː sururin mutaqaaːbilijna ʕalaaː ʔaan nnubadila ʔaamθaaːlakum wanunʃiʔiakum fij maaː laː taʕlamuwna ʔanta kjf tʕrf hðaː lbs srwaːlaːa nðˤjfaʶːaʶ aːltʕljm jʕnj ʔakθr mn md͡ʒrrd aːlðhaːb ʔilaː aːlmdrsa kaːn saːmj jsˤrχ waʕda aːlllahi laaː juχlifu aːlllahu waʕdahu walakinna ʔaakθara aːlnnaaːsi laaː jaʕlamuwna wʔantm ħjnʔið tnðˤrwn waaːlʔaamaaːnaai ʕalajhaaː ʔiðaː aːstqlt ʕn ʕmlk fswf tqtˤʕ ʕljk χtˤ aːlrd͡ʒʕa hj hnaː mn ʔad͡ʒlj waaːlmuftaqiru ʔilaaː aːlʃʃajʔi ʕaaːd͡ʒizun bihi ʕndmaː tʃklt ʔawlaː aːlnd͡ʒwm ʔataːħ lnaː tlskwb haːbl tχmjn maːħdθ fj ðlk aːlwqt wanumakkina lahum fij aʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤiʶ wanurija firʕawna wahaaːmaaːna wad͡ʒunuwdahumaaː minhum maaː kaaːnuwaː jaħðaruwna ʔiilaaː aːlllahi mard͡ʒiʕukum wahuwa ʕalaaː kulli ʃajʔin qadijrun wanaħnu ʔaaqrabu ʔiilajhi minkum walakin llaː tuʶbsˤiʶruʶwnaʶ kaːn sqwtˤ d͡ʒdaːr brljn ħqaːan mnaːsba baːlʁa aːlʔahmja saraaːbijluhum min qaʶtˤiʶraʶaʶːniʶn wataʁʃaaː wud͡ʒuwhahumu aːlnnaaːru fahuwa fij ʕijʃaain raʶaʶːdˤiʶjaʶaʶiʶn ʔin hw ʔilaː ðkr llʕaːlmjn kuluwaː waaːrʕawaː ʔaanʕaaːmakum ʔiinna fij ðalika laʔaːjaaːtin liʔauwlij aːlnnuhaaː ðhbt ʔilaː aːlmdjr ʔaːmlaː ʔan ʔastfjd mn zjaːda fj aːlraːtb fj mθl hðaː aːlwqt mn aːlʕaːm aʶːlmaʶːdˤj kaːn msaːfranaː ʔilaː aːlflbjn twqf ʕn mdˤaʶːjqaʶ ʔaχjk qaːlwaː sbħaːnk laː ʕlm lnaː ʔilaː maː ʕlmtnaː ʔink ʔant aːlʕljm aːlħkjm laː ʔarjd ʔan ʔaχsrka wamaaː ʔaursiluwaː ʕalajhim ħaʶaʶːfiʶðˤiʶjnaʶ waaːtlu ʕalajhim nabaʔaa aːllaðij ʔaːtajnaaːhu ʔaːjaaːtinaaː faaːnsalaχa minhaaː faʔaatbaʕahu aʶːlʃʃaʶjtˤaʶaʶːnuʶ fakaaːna mina aːlʁaaːwijna jrjd fnd͡ʒaːnaː waːħdaː mn aːlʃaːj fqtˤ maːðaː tfdˤl wʔin maː nrjnk bʕdˤ aːlðj nʕdhm ʔaw ntwfjnk fʔinmaː ʕljk aːlblaːʁ wʕljnaː aːlħsaːb qaaːluwaː aʶːtˤtˤaʶjaʶrnaʶaʶː bika wabiman maʕaka qaaːla tˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶruʶkuʶm ʕinda aːlllahi bal ʔaantum qawmun tuftanuwna ʔiillaaː aːllaðijna ʔaːmanuwaː waʕamiluwaː aʶːlsˤsˤaʶaʶːliʶħaʶaʶːtiʶ falahum ʔaad͡ʒrun ʁajru mamnuwnin waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlʔaudabaaːʔi rubba ʕilmin lam tuʕd͡ʒam fuʶsˤuʶwluʶhuʶ faaːstuʕd͡ʒima maʶħsˤuʶwluʶhuʶ hl stqwm aːjraːn bdˤrb flstˤjn aːlmħtlh kll ʕaːmin wʔantm bχjr ʔanaː ʔinsaːn sˤaʶːdq waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlbulaʁaaːʔi ʕuquwdu aːlʁaaːdiri maħluwlaaun waʕuhuwduhu madχuwlaaun wmaː ʕlmnaːh aːlʃʕr wmaː jnbʁj lh ʔin hw ʔilaː ðkr wqrʔaːn mbjn knt mtʕba d͡ʒdaː aːljwm bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm qd ʔaflħ aːlmʔumnwn ʔiinnaaː ʔaanʃaʔanaaːhunna ʔiinʃaaːʔ qmjsˤhaʶː kaːn mltˤχaʶːaʶn baʶːlsˤlsˤaʶ qaaːluwaː jaaː ʔaabaaːnaaː maaː laka laaː taʔamannaaː ʕalaaː juwsufa waʔiinnaaː lahu laʶnaʶaʶːsˤiʶħuʶwnaʶ laː jmknk ʃraːʔ aːlsʕaːda ʔiin kaaːnat ʔiillaaː sˤaʶjħaʶaʶaʶn waaːħidaaan faʔiiðaaː hum d͡ʒamijʕun ladajnaaː muʶħdˤaʶruʶwnaʶ biaːlʕaaːdaai mad͡ʒraaː aʶːltˤtˤaʶbʕiʶ mn aːlðj aʶːtsˤl bʔaːn wamizaaːd͡ʒuhu min tasnijmin ʕad͡ʒibt liman jaħtamij min aʶːlʔaʶaʶtˤʕiʶmaʶaʶiʶ liʶmaʶdˤaʶrraʶaʶːtiʶhaʶaʶː ʔinhaː ʔaʶtˤwl mnj bkθjr aːlħaqqu min rabbika falaaː takun mina aːlmumtarijna aːrjdu aːlðhaːb ʔilaː tˤwkjw waʔiin kaaːna ðuw ʕusraain faʶnaʶðˤiʶraʶaʶuʶn ʔiilaaː majsaraain waʔaan taʶsˤaʶddaʶquʶwaʶː χajrun lakum ʔiin kuntum taʕlamuwna ʔaafaman jattaqij biwad͡ʒhihi suwʔa aːlʕaðaaːbi jawma aːlqijaaːmaai waqijla liʶlðˤðˤaʶaʶːliʶmiʶjnaʶ ðuwquwaː maaː kuntum taksibuwna hl bʔimkaːnj ʔan ʔaːχð tðkrtj fj aʶːlmtˤaʶːr bʕd ʕʃr dqaːʔiq mn aʶːldˤrbaʶ aʶːlqaʶːdˤjaʶ aːstʕaːd aːlmlaːkm wʕjh mn jkwn aʶːlʃχsˤ aːlðj qaːblnaːh mnð qljl jrd͡ʒaː aːltħqq mn hwjtk ʔaurjd aːlħjaːa aːlʔabdja hl mn ʔaħd jʕtˤjnj mlʕqa ʔaafaman kaaːna muʔuminanaː kaman kaaːna faaːsiqanaː laaː jastawuwna aːlmwsjqaː ldjhaː sħr lthdʔia aːlħjwaːn aːlmtwħʃ fqaːl lhm rswl aːllh naːqa aːllh wsqjaːhaː faʶðˤaʶnnuʶwaʶː ʔaanna aːlʕilma waaːlʕaqla humaaː aːlssababu fij qillaai ħaʶðˤðˤiʶhiʶ warizqihi ðij quwwaain ʕinda ðij aːlʕarʃi makijnin ʔasrʕ wʔilaː fʔink sttʔaχr ʔaʶʕtˤaʶː bldh ħjaːth hl tʕrf aːlwld fj aʶːlsˤwraʶ qaːl rd͡ʒl lbʕdˤ aːlbχlaːʔ wlqd kðb aːlðjn mn qblhm fkjf kaːn nkjr wamuʕaaːnaaːai riʶjaʶaʶːdˤaʶtiʶhaʶaʶː ʕljnaː ʔalaː nnsaː ʔirsaːl hðh aːlrsaːla ʁdaː ʕndmaː ftħt aːlbaːb rʔajt ʔanhaː naːʔima aːlmʃkla ʔan aʶːltˤaʶːqaʶ aːlʃmsja tklf kθjraː wakataba aːlrrabijʕu bnu χajθam ʔilaaː ʔaaχin lahu walaaː jataqarraru lahum d͡ʒawaaːbun ljs lhaː mn dwn aːllh kaːʃfa qaaːla rabbi aːʁfir lij waliʔaaχij waʔaadχilnaaː fij raħmatika waʔaanta ʔaarħamu aːlrraaːħimijna bmaː aːnj drst kθjraːu fʔinnj nd͡ʒħt fj kl aːχtbaːraːtj mn aːlmstħjl ʔitqaːn aːllʁa aːlʔind͡ʒljzja χlaːl ʕaːmin waːħd ʔaw maː jqaːrb ðlk llðjn laː jʔumnwn baːlʔaːχra mθl aːlswʔ wllh aːlmθl aːlʔaʕlaː whw aːlʕzjz aːlħkjm aːlllahu laaː ʔiilaha ʔiillaaː huwa aːlħajju aːlqajjuwmu waːlðjn ʕmlwaː aːlsjʔiaːt θm taːbwaː mn bʕdhaː wʔaːmnwaː ʔin rbk mn bʕdhaː lʁfwr rħjm maːðaː trjd ʔanaː ʔarjd ħjwaːn ʔanta qadamta tqrjraːan mʕj qbl ʔisbwʕjn ʔaʕjʃ fj kwbj jwld͡ʒ aːlljl fj aːlnhaːr wjwld͡ʒ aːlnhaːr fj aːlljl whw ʕljm bðaːt aʶːlsˤdwr ʕaːʃ taːnʁw mʕ sˤbj sˤʁjr fj qrja sˤʁjraʶ ʁrjb hðaː lkn aːlbaːb ftħ lwħdh maː mn ħjaːa bdwn khrbaːʔ w maːʔ ʔiinna aːllaðijna juħaaːdduwna aːlllaha warasuwlahu ʔauwlaʔiika fij aːlʔaaðallijna walaaː jaħsabanna aːllaðijna kafaruwaː sabaquwaː ʔiinnahum laaː juʕd͡ʒizuwna walaaː takuwnuwaː lahu ruwaaːaan sʔaʁaːdr χlaːl saːʕa wfrʃ mrfwʕa hnaːk bʕdˤ aːlʔaʃjaːʔ aːltaː mn aʶːlsˤʕb trd͡ʒmthaː mn sjbkj ʕlj ʕndmaː sʔamwt lqd ħdθ hðaː mnð wqt tˤwjl faaːlttaaːlijaaːti ðikranaː faʶljaʶdˤħaʶkuʶwaʶː qalijlanaː waljabkuwaː kaθijranaː d͡ʒazaaːʔan bimaaː kaaːnuwaː jaksibuwna bjtj baːrd d͡ʒdaː tqwl aʶːlaʶːstˤwraʶ ʔan hðaː aːlbjt mskwn hwaːk θaːr nwr wnaːr kl ʃjʔ sjkwn ʕlaː maː jraːm ħaːlmaː jsˤl twm rabbu aːlmaʃriqi waaːlmaʁribi laː ʔiilaha ʔiilaːaːa huwa faaːttaχiðhu wakijlaː smka mjnaːd maːtt kaːn saːmj jħrs aʶːlʔaʶtˤfaʶːl mn aːlsχjf aːn tsˤdqh wʔanh kaːn rd͡ʒaːl mn aːlʔins jʕwðwn brd͡ʒaːl mn aːld͡ʒn fzaːdwhm rhqaː walaqad d͡ʒaaːʔahum mina aːlʔaanbaaːʔi maaː fijhi muzdad͡ʒarun kaːn kl aːlmwz aːlðj ʔatjt bh ʔilj aːlbaːrħa faːsdanaː nħn saːʕdnaː aːlfqraːʔ maː jnðˤrwn ʔilaː sˤjħaʶ waːħda tʔaχðhm whm jχsˤmwn ʔiinna rabbaka jaʶbsuʶtˤuʶ aːlrrizqa liman jaʃaaːʔu wajaqdiru ʔiinnahu kaaːna biʕibaaːdihi χabijranaː baʶsˤiʶjraʶnaʶː hʔulaːʔ aːlnaːs lm jqwlwaː lnaː ʃjʔiaː ʕnk waħanaaːnanaː min ladunnaaː wazakaaːaan wakaaːna taqijjanaː td͡ʒaːhl maː qaːlh mqd kaːn jmzħ fqtˤ waʶaʶːnsˤiʶraʶaʶːfiʶhaʶaʶː ʕammaaː taraka wʔiðaː ʔanʕmnaː ʕlaː fakaaːna ʕaaːqibatahumaaː ʔaannahumaaː fij aːlnnaaːri χaaːlidajni fijhaaː waðalika d͡ʒazaaːʔu aʶːlðˤðˤaʶaʶːliʶmiʶjnaʶ ʔaʶʕtˤnj ʔaʶjdˤaʶːaʶn bʕdˤ aːlħljb ʔajn jmknnj ʔan ʔad͡ʒd bjtˤrjjaʶː hl ʔaʶsttˤjʕ ʔan ʔaːχð hðhi mʕj twm jʕtqd ʔan maːrj ln tqwl nʕm aːlnnisaaːʔi ʕan sˤaʶraʶaʶːħaʶaʶiʶ aːlnnasabi faʔiinna aːlmanaaːkiħa aːlkarijmaaa madrad͡ʒaaun lilʃʃarafi ʔanaː laː ʔaʶsttˤjʕ ʃkrk bmaː jkfj ʕlaː kl ʔilaː mbʃraː wnðjraː aːllaðij d͡ʒaʕala lakumu aʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤaʶ mahdanaː wad͡ʒaʕala lakum fijhaaː subulanaː laʕallakum tahtaduwna maaː waddaka man ʔaahmala wuddak baːt aːlʔamr waʶːdˤħaʶː aːlʔaːn juʕtqd ʔanh kaːn d͡ʒndjaː ʃd͡ʒaːʕaː waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi bitarki maaː laaː jaʕnijk tudriku maaː juʁnijk aːlwld ʕtˤʃaʶːn waʶaʶːnχaʶfaʶdˤaʶ lahaaː d͡ʒanaaːħu aːlʕud͡ʒbi hl aːnt mtzwd͡ʒ laː ʔaħd jʕjʃ mʕj wlmaː dˤrb aːbn mrjm mθlaː ʔiðaː qwmk mnh jsˤdwn ʔanaː ʔabħθ fqtˤ ʃkraːan lka wlw ʃaːʔ rbk ld͡ʒʕl aːlnaːs ʔama waːħda wlaː jzaːlwn mχtlfjn wʔaqjmwaː aʶːlsˤlaʶːaʶ wʔaːtwaː aːlzkaːa waːrkʕwaː mʕ aːlraːkʕjn hl kaːn bʔiʶsttˤaʶːʕtk ħl aːlmʃkla qul jawma aːlfatħi laaː janfaʕu aːllaðijna kafaruwaː ʔiijmaaːnuhum walaaː hum juʶnðˤaʶruʶwnaʶ wakaaːna ʔaad͡ʒwada qurajʃin fij zamaaːnihi qaːl maː mknj fjh rbj χjr fʔaʕjnwnj bqwa ʔad͡ʒʕl bjnkm wbjnhm rdmaː qulnaaː jaaː naaːru kuwnij bardanaː wasalaaːmanaː ʕalaaː ʔiibraaːhijma aːlʔaabu rabbun sʔaqwm bwaːd͡ʒbaːtj bʕd mʃaːhda aːltlfaːz ktbt aːjmjlj rsaːla ħumaːaa aːldiijaːri ʕljkm slaːm ʔabat ʔan tðilaa aːlnfwsu aːlkiraːm hl ʔant tʕlm maːðaː tfʕl kjfa sʔasdd djwnaː aːlʔaːn ʕðr ʔaqbħ mn ðnb jaː ʔajhaː aːlðjn ʔaːmnwaː χðwaː ħðrkm faːnfrwaː θbaːt ʔaw aːnfrwaː d͡ʒmjʕaː wakullu ʕilmin laaː juʔuajjiduhu ʕaqlun maʶdˤaʶllaʶaʶuʶn qaaːla rabbi ʔiinnij daʕawtu qawmij lajlanaː wanahaaːranaː knt fj ħfla waqijla liʶlfuʶdˤaʶjliʶ bni ʕiʶjaʶaʶːdˤiʶn raʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːlllahu ʕanhu raʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːlllahu ʕank waʔiiðaaː fasadat fasada aːld͡ʒasadu kulluhu ʔaalaːa whija aːlqalbu ʔaʶχtˤtˤ ldʕwa dˤjwf kθjrjn ʔilaː ħfl aːlaːfttaːħ waʶmaʶtˤʕaʶmuʶhuʶ ħaraaːmun wamaʃrabuhu ħaraaːmi nrfʕ aːlʔaʕlaːm fj aːlʔaʕjaːd aʶːlwtˤnjaʶ wajawma taquwmu aːlssaaːʕaau juqsimu aːlmud͡ʒrimuwna maaː labiθuwaː ʁajra saaːʕaain kaðalika kaaːnuwaː juʔufakuwna hl ʔanti sʕjda qaːl qd ʔawtjt sʔulk jaː mwsaː wqd ʔaʶdˤlwaʶː kθjraː wlaː tzd aʶːlðˤaʶːlmjn ʔilaː dˤlaʶːlaʶː waqaaːlat tˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶfaʶaʶuʶn ʔauχraaː mimman jaquwlu biʶðˤuʶhuʶwriʶ aʶːlmuʶntaʶðˤaʶriʶ qaaːla qad ʔaud͡ʒijbat daʕwatukumaaː faaːstaqijmaaː walaaː tattabiʕaaːni sabijla aːllaðijna laaː jaʕlamuwna waːd͡ʒʕl lj lsaːn sˤdq fj aːlʔaːχrjn blsaːn ʕrbj mbjn bismi aːlllahi aːlrraħmani aːlrraħijmi qul ʔaaʕuwðu birabbi aːlfalaqi fʔawd͡ʒs mnhm χjfa qaːlwaː laː tχf wbʃrwh bʁlaːm ʕljm qaːl ʔin rswlkm aːlðj ʔarsl ʔiljkm lmd͡ʒnwn wjd͡ʒʕlwn lmaː laː jʕlmwn nsˤjbaʶː mmaː rzqnaːhm taːllh ltsʔaln ʕmaː kntm tftrwn aːld͡ʒmjʕ sʕdaːʔ ʔauwlaʔiika fij d͡ʒannaaːtin mmukramuwna ʔiin jaθqafuwkum jakuwnuwaː lakum ʔaaʕdaaːʔan waʶjaʶbsuʶtˤuʶwaʶː ʔiilajkum ʔaajdijahum waʔaalsinatahum biaːlssuwʔi wawadduwaː law takfuruwna jaʶtˤuʶwfuʶ ʕalajhim wildaaːnun muχalladuwna twm aːʃtkj mn aʶːlmʁsˤ bʕdmaː aːkl maː tˤbχth maːrj waʔaammaaː θamuwdu fahadajnaaːhum faaːstaħabbuwaː aːlʕamaaː ʕalaaː aːlhudaaː faʔaaχaðathum sˤaʶaʶːʕiʶqaʶaʶuʶ aːlʕaðaaːbi aːlhuwni bimaaː kaaːnuwaː jaksibuwna laː ʔaʶðˤn ʔanhaː tʃbh ʔamhaː ðalika d͡ʒazaaːʔuuhum biʔaannahum kafaruwaː biʔaːjaaːtinaaː waqaaːluwaː ʔaaʔiiðaaː kunnaaː ʕiʶðˤaʶaʶːmaʶnaʶː warufaaːtanaː ʔaaʔiinnaaː lamabʕuwθuwna χalqanaː d͡ʒadijdanaː fj kθjr mn aːlʔaħjaːn laː jkwn aːlħb wħdh kaːfjanaː lnd͡ʒaːħ ʕlaːqa maː hl ʔatmmt kl wðˤaʶːʔiʶfk bajnahumaaː barzaχun laaː jabʁijaaːni liʔaanna aːlχijaaːra fij kulli ʃajʔin huwa aːlʔaaqallu faliðalika qalla wufuwru aːlʕaqli waʶaʶːlfaʶdˤliʶ faʔaasri biʕibaaːdij lajlanaː ʔiinnakum muttabaʕuwna jaʕnij aʶːlχaʶtˤtˤaʶ wllh maː fj aːlsmaːwaːt wmaː fj aʶːlʔaʶrdˤ wkfaː baːllh wkjlaː jaː ʔajhaː aːlðjn ʔaːmnwaː ʔiðaː lqjtm fʔia faːθbtwaː waːðkrwaː aːllh kθjraː lʕlkm tflħwn lm jrtkb bjl aːld͡ʒrjma hw lh aːbn sˤʁjr waaːlqurbu minhum muwħiʃanaː wamufsidanaː ʔinh jsˤaʶːb baːlzkaːm bshwla sjzwr aːlrʔijs aːlfrnsj aːljaːbaːn aːlʃhr aːlmqbl liman ʃaaːʔ minkum ʔaan jastaqijma sʔalth ʕmaː fʕlh aːlbaːrħa waʔiiðaaː fasadat aːlddunjaaː kaaːna ʔisʕaaːduhaaː makranaː qaaːla haʔuulaaːʔi banaaːtij ʔiin kuntum faaːʕilijna aʶːlbʕdˤ jħbwn aʶːlqtˤtˤ waʶːlbʕdˤ aːlʔaːχr jfdˤl aːlklaːb fj difaaːʕij wd͡ʒihaaːdij llblaːd laː ʔaamijlu laː ʔaamaalu laː ʔaalijn lm jkn ldjnaː maːʔ ʃrb ʔiin huwa ʔiilaːaːa ðikrun llilʕaaːlamijna ʔilaː aːlðjn ʔaːmnwaː wʕmlwaː aʶːlsˤaʶːlħaʶːt lhm ʔad͡ʒr ʁjr mmnwn swf ʔafʕlhaː swaːʔaːan waːfqt ʔam lm twaːfq ʔinna aːlʕadla mijzaaːnu aːlllahi aːllaðij waʶdˤaʶʕaʶhuʶ lilχalqi rabbu aːlssamaaːwaaːti waʶaʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤiʶ wamaaː bajnahumaaː faaːʕbudhu waʶaʶːsˤtˤaʶbiʶr liʕibaaːdatihi hal taʕlamu lahu samijjanaː ʔajn tʕlmt aːlʔind͡ʒljzja laː ʔaʶðˤnn ʔann bmqdwrj fʕl ðlk lknnj sʔaħaːwl nħn χlqnaːkm flwlaː tsˤdqwn ʔanaː lwħdj waðukira ʔaanna ʔibraaːhijma bna aːlmahdijji daχala ʕalaaː aːlmaʔamuwni waʕindahu d͡ʒamaaːʕaaun jatakallamuwna fij aːlfiqhi faqaaːla daːʔimaː maː jsʔal ʔasʔila saːðd͡ʒa famaaː lahum ʕani aːlttaðkiraai muʶʕriʶdˤiʶjnaʶ aːlwaladu ʔaʶaʶnwaʶtˤuʶ wkðlk nfsˤl aːlʔaːjaːt wltstbjn sbjl aːlmd͡ʒrmjn faqarrabahu ʔiilajhim qaaːla ʔaalaaː taʔakuluwna liʔaanna aːlʔaamala huwa fij θaaːnij ħaaːlin ʔanaː mʕk hnaː aːlʔaːn waqijla fij manθuwri aːlħikami aʶːlʔaʶaʶdˤdaʶaʶːduʶ laaː tattafiqu waaːlʔaaʃkaaːlu laaː taftariqu hðh qsˤjdaʶ raːʔiʕa wlqd d͡ʒʔinaːhm bktaːb fsˤlnaʶːh ʕlaː ʕlm hdaː wrħma lqwm jʔumnwn waħusni aːlmutaaːrakaai baʕda aʶːlwaʶrtˤaʶaʶiʶ wʔin kaːn ðw ʕsra fnðˤraʶ ʔilaː mjsra wʔan tsˤdqwaʶː χjr lkm ʔin kntm tʕlmwn warad͡ʒaaːʔan litalaaːfij maaː ʔaaslafa min taʶqsˤiʶjriʶhiʶ waʔiiχlaaːlihi jadʕuw min duwni aːlllahi maaː laaː jaʶdˤuʶrruʶhuʶ wamaaː laaː janfaʕuhu ðalika huwa aʶːldˤdˤaʶlaʶaʶːluʶ aːlbaʕijdu ðaːk aːlmnzl mlkj hðaː aːlrsm jʕwd taːrjχh aːlaː aːlqrn aːlχaːms ʕʃr jaː jħjaː χð aːlktaːb bqwa wʔaːtjnaːh aːlħkm sˤbjaʶː wmaː jnbʁj llrħmn ʔan jtχð wldaː kaːn jstħq aːlmħaːwla aʶːttsˤlj bj ħaːlmaː td͡ʒdjn twm ʕbla laː tʔatj aːlħaːfla daːʔimaː fj aːlwqt liʔaannaaː waladnaaːhum walam jaliduwnaaː aːbtaːʕt maːrj fstaːnanaː d͡ʒdjdanaː llħfla man ʔaʶaʶmdˤaʶaʶː jawmahu fij ʁajri ħaqqin qaʶdˤaʶaʶːhuʶ wʔimaː jnzʁnk mn aʶːlʃjtˤaʶːn nzʁ faːstʕð baːllh ʔinh smjʕ ʕljm kaːnt aːlʁrfa daːfʔia kuntu ʔatmnaː ʔan tttˤwwʕ faʔiimmaaː naðhabanna bika faʔiinnaaː minhum muntaqimuwna aʶːlrjaʶːdˤaʶ aːlwħjda aːltj jħsnhaː twm hj aːltns ʔinhu jrjd aːlʔintqaːm lahum daaːru aːlssalaaːmi ʕinda rabbihim wahuwa walijjuhum bimaaː kaaːnuwaː jaʕmaluwna sʔarwj lkm aʶːlqsˤaʶ snʕwd bʕd qljl faːdχlwaː ʔabwaːb d͡ʒhnm χaːldjn fjhaː flbʔis mθwaː aːlmtkbrjn aːjn tʕjʃ fj trkjaː aːlqaaːtili maðaaːquhaaː hl wldt fj ʃhr maːjw ʔimmaaː min ħaʶsˤriʶ aːlmutakallimi waʕijjihi kulj maː trjdjn wkðb bh qwmk whw aːlħq ql lst ʕljkm bwkjl θumma kaaːna ʕalaqaaan faχalaqa fasawwaaː wajamnaʕuwna aːlmaaːʕuwna waqaaːla qarijnuhu haðaaː maaː ladajja ʕatijdun ʔanaː tħdθt mʕhaː ʔanti lsti msʔuwla ʕn tlk aʶːlfwdˤaʶː ʔatt ltraːnj ʕjd fiʶsˤħ sʕjd wkm ʔarslnaː mn nbj fj aːlʔawljn flaː ttˤʕ aːlmkðbjn wld mθl twm laː jstħq ftaːa mθl maːrj fʔaʶsˤbħt kaʶːlsˤrjm lm ʔaql klmtj aːlʔaχjra wkaːn fj aːlmdjna tsʕa rhtˤ jfsdwn fj aʶːlʔaʶrdˤ wlaː jsˤlħwn qaaːla naʕam waʔiinnakum lamina aːlmuqarrabijna km kllftk aːltðaːkr w ʔin rʔajt twm ʔablʁh btħja mnj aːlħrb kaːnt ntjd͡ʒau sjaːsain χaʶːtˤʔiʶaʶ laqad waʶʔaʶaʶmsˤaʶaʶːriʶn mutabaaːʕidaain faqad ðahabat tˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶfaʶaʶuʶn ʃaaːððaaun ʔilaaː d͡ʒawaaːzi ðalika jaaː ʕibaaːdija aːllaðijna ʔaːmanuwaː ʔiinna ʔaʶaʶrdˤiʶj waaːsiʕaaun faʔiijjaaːja wkn mn aːlʃaːkrjn litazijda ʔaulfatuhum aːllaðijna ʕaaːhadta minhum θumma jaʶnquʶdˤuʶwnaʶ ʕahdahum fij kulli marraain wahum laaː jattaquwna ʔaan tastarijħa min taʕabi aːlssaʕji lahaaː waaːalllahu walijju aːlttawfijqi hw jfdˤl aːlrjf ʕlaː aːlblda lm jkn ʕljj ʔakl hðaː ftlk bjwthm χaːwja bmaː ðˤlmwaʶː ʔin fj ðlk lʔaːja lqwm jʕlmwn kjjf hj ʕaʶːsˤmaʶ ʔawkraːnjaː wlmaː twd͡ʒh tlqaːʔ mdjn qaːl ʕsaː raːjtnaː km tbʕθjn ʕlaː aːlfχr jʕlm χaːʔina aːlʔaʕjn wmaː tχfj aʶːlsˤdwr laː tql laː lkn ʔaʶjdˤaʶː laː tql nʕm min duwnihi fakijduwnij d͡ʒamijʕanaː θumma laaː tuʶnðˤiʶruʶwniʶ aːlħra ltʃkl ðraːt mtʕaːdla aːlʃħna kaːn ʔaʁlbhaː ðraːt aːlhjdrwd͡ʒjn baʶːlʔiʶdˤaʶːfaʶ ʔilaː ðraːt aːlhjljwm waʔaammaluwaː baʕijdanaː aːlðjn sˤbrwaʶː wʕlaː rbhm jtwklwn tilka ʔaːjaaːtu aːlllahi natluwhaaː ʕalajka biaːlħaqqi waʔiinnaka lamina aːlmursalijna haː lm traːhaː ʔabdaːan twm ljs fj aːlmstʃfaː waʔiinnahu laðuw ʕilmin limaaː ʕallamnaaːhu tsbħ aːlsmka btħrjk ðjlhaː ʔaqtlta maːrj wmaː nqmwaː mnhm ʔilaː ʔan ʔajhaː aːlnaːs wjʔat bʔaːχrjn wkaːn aːllh ʕlaː ðlk qdjraː ʔiinna aːllaðijna kafaruwaː sawaaːʔun ʕalajhim ʔaaʔaanðartahum ʔaam lam tunðirhum laaː juʔuminuwna hw aːlʔaːn jsˤnʕ tˤaʶːwlaʶ lj walan janfaʕakumu aːljawma ʔiið ðˤaʶlaʶmtuʶm ʔaannakum fij aːlʕaðaaːbi muʃtarikuwna nħn ðaːhbwn ʔilaː aʶːlmtˤbχ fkbkbwaː fjhaː hm waːlʁaːwwn maːrj tχaːf aːlklaːb hðh ljst smka aʶːlħðˤ ʔaʕmaː maaː aːlqaaːriʕaau kaːn ħbbanaː mn ʔawwl nðˤraʶ ʔalqt kaːjt nðˤraʶ ʕlaː krjs θm td͡ʒaːhlth aːlʃjʔ aːlðj d͡ʒʕlh jħzn ʁrjb d͡ʒdaːan hl ðlk maː sjrʁbh twm qaːl rb ʔinj ðˤlmt nfsj faːʁfr lj fʁfr lh ʔinh hw aːlʁfwr aːlrħjm aːnaː mml wʔanh χlq aːlzwd͡ʒjn aːlðkr waːlʔanθaː twm ʁaʶːdˤb mʕa maːraː lqd ʔiħtaːlt ʕljh wanurijdu ʔaan namunna ʕalaaː aːllaðijna aʶːstuʶdˤʕiʶfuʶwaʶː fij aʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤiʶ wanad͡ʒʕalahum ʔaaʔiimmaaan wanad͡ʒʕalahumu aːlwaaːriθijna brmd͡ʒtu ʔawl lʕba ħaːswb lj fj sn aːlθaːnja ʕʃr sʔaʕd qljlanaː mn aːlqhwa liʶjaʶqtˤaʶʕaʶ tˤaʶraʶfaʶnaʶː mina aːllaðijna kafaruwaː ʔaaw jakbitahum fajanqalibuwaː χaaːʔiibijna aʶːlʃχsˤ aːlðj qaːbltah fj mktbj baːlʔams mn bld͡ʒjkaː ħtaː ʔin knt ʁnjanaː ln ʔaʶʕtˤjh flsanaː lqd fqdtu aːlmftaːħ ʔiʶntðˤr hnaː ħtaː ʔaʕwd ʔanaː tˤaʶːlbaʶ walaqad ʔaːtajnaaː muwsaaː aːlkitaaːba laʕallahum jahtaduwna ʔaħb hjtwmj klaː ʔin ktaːb aːlfd͡ʒaːr lfj sd͡ʒjn ʁjr msmwħ lk ʔan twqf sjaːrtk fj hðaː aːlʃaːrʕ hðaː mkaːn raːʔiʕ llʕjʃ fjh hnaːk θlaːθ klaːb ʔaʶwsˤlth ʔammh ʔilaː mnzl baːja ldj ʃjʔ ʔaqdmh lk qaːl rb bmaː ʔanʕmt ʕlj fln ʔakwn ðˤhjraʶː llmd͡ʒrmjn ln tsˤddq maː qaːlh lj twm aʶːlaʶːnfsˤaʶːljjwn ljswaː ʔiχwaːnnaː flmaː d͡ʒaːʔhaː nwdj ʔan bwrk waqaaːla ʔaabuw aːlddardaaːʔi wamaaː χalaqnaaː aːlssamaaːwaaːti waʶaʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤaʶ wamaaː bajnahumaaː laaːʕibijna dʕnaː nħsˤl ʕlaː zd͡ʒaːd͡ʒa mn aːlwjskj rbbmaː tχbrjnnj ʕn mkaːnin ʔad͡ʒd fjh twm waaːllaðijna juʔuðuwna aːlmuʔuminijna waaːlmuʔuminaaːti biʁajri maaː aːktasabuwaː faqadi aːħtamaluwaː buhtaaːnanaː waʔiiθmanaː mubijnanaː ʔaʶsˤjb ʔabj bðaːt aːlrʔia aːlʃhr aʶːlmaʶːdˤj wlqd trknaːhaː ʔaːja fhl mn mdkr wʔin rbk lhw aːlʕzjz aːlrħjm walaʕalla baʶʕdˤaʶ man juħibbu ʔaan junsaba ʔilaaː aːlkarami junkiru ħadda aːlssaχaaːʔi sˤfʕ mnnaːd baːja wʔinhm lnaː lʁaʶːʔiʶðˤwn wmaː kaːn aːllh ljʕðbhm wʔant fjhm wmaː kaːn aːllh mʕðbhm whm jstʁfrwn qaaːluwaː ʔiinnamaaː ʔaanta mina aːlmusaħħarijna waʔaanaaː aːχtartuka faaːstamiʕ limaaː juwħaaː hl jd͡ʒb ʔan tðhbj ʔilaː mktb aːlbrjd tħtaːd͡ʒ aːld͡ʒzaːʔir ʔilaː aːlmaːʔ wadaaːru ʁinanaː liman tazawwada minhaaː ħqaː jd͡ʒb ʔan nqwm bʃjʔ ħjaːl hðaː aːlʔamr ʔalʁwaː zjaːrthm ʔilaː lndn fakun kamaaː ʃiʔit smja fad͡ʒaʕalahu ʁuθaaːʔan ʔaaħwaaːaː waʶsˤaʶddaʶhaʶaʶː maaː kaaːnat taʕbudu min duwni aːlllahi ʔiinnahaaː kaaːnat min qawmin kaaːfirijna waʶqaʶdˤaʶjnaʶaʶː ʔiilajhi ðalika aːlʔaamra ʔaanna daaːbira haʔuulaaːʔi maʶqtˤuʶwʕuʶn muʶsˤbiʶħiʶjnaʶ tħddθ ʕn mrdˤhaʶː ħjnmaː bdʔat aːlnd͡ʒwm aːlbdaːʔija fj ʔiʶdˤaʶːʔaʶ aːlkwn srq aːlmaːl aːnaː mhnds kaːn saːmj mʃwwʃaː faʔaatbaʕuwhum muʃriqijna ʔanaː ʃdjda aːlfχr bʔabj waman jaʕʃu ʕan ðikri aːlrraħmani nuʶqaʶjjiʶdˤ lahu ʃaʶjtˤaʶaʶːnaʶnaʶː fahuwa lahu qarijnun aːld͡ʒbl mʁtˤaʶː baːlθlwd͡ʒ tilka ʔaːjaaːtu aːlkitaaːbi aːlmubijni famin ħaqqihim ʔaan jaʕrifuwaː ħaqqahu waʶjaʶstaʶbtˤiʶnuʶwaʶː ʔaahlahu wabihim min aːlħaaːd͡ʒaai waaːlʕad͡ʒzi maaː waʶsˤaʶfnaʶaʶː wʔant ʔaʶjdˤaʶnaʶː kaːdt ʃaːħnaun tdhsunij hl ldjkm maːʔ mʕdnj wanujassiruka liljusraaː ʔalm jtsˤl ʔaħdhm baʶːlʃrtˤaʶ ʃqtj haːdʔia wnðˤjfaʶ twm jʃrb qljlaː mn aːlmaːʔ aːlddunjaaː ʔimmaaː muʶsˤiʶjbaʶaʶuʶn muwd͡ʒiʕaaun w ʕqdnaː aːlʕzm ʔan tħjaː aːld͡ʒzaːʔir jastaʕd͡ʒiluwnaka biaːlʕaðaaːbi waʔiinna d͡ʒahannama laʶmuʶħiʶjtˤaʶaʶuʶn biaːlkaaːfirijna sˤʕd ʔilaː sjaːrth manθuwri aːlħikami aːlʕuquwqu θaklu man lam juθkal laː ʔaħd jrjd ðlk mtaː tnwj aːlsfr ʔilaː aːljaːbaːn wθmwd aːlðjn d͡ʒaːbwaː aʶːlsˤχr baːlwaːd fj ʔajaːmnaː hðh bʔimkaːn ʔaj waːħd ʔan jħsˤl ʕlaː aːlktb wʔamaː ʔin kaːn mn aːlmkðbjn aʶːldˤaʶːljn waqijla liʶbaʶʕdˤiʶ aːlzzuhaaːdi wmaː kaːn lnaː ʕljkm mn sltˤaʶːn bl kntm qwmaː aːlmuʕallamaai waqaaːla d͡ʒumhuwru aːlmutakallimijna ʔinkaaːru ðalika waaːd͡ʒibun waaːlddafʕu ʕanhu laaːzimun waʶbaʶʕdˤuʶhaʶaʶː biʶaʶːlttaʶtˤaʶbuʶʕiʶ aːld͡ʒaaːrij wad͡ʒaaːʔat kullu nafsin maʕahaaː mwsaː jaː qwm ʔin kntm ʔaːmntm baːllh fʕljh twklwaː ʔin kntm mslmjn laː tʕtmd ʕlaː waːldjk kθjraːan ʔilaː χaʶːsˤth d͡ʒaːʔ wχaʶːsˤth lm tqblh bal qaaːluwaː miθla maaː qaaːla aːlʔaawwaluwna hl ʃkrtihi fljkn ʔiðn waʕalaaː qadri aːlrraʁbaai takuwnu aʶːlmaʶtˤaʶaʶːliʶbuʶ ʔaʕjʃ baːlqrb mn hnaː lm jkðb tˤwm ʔabdaː waqad qaaːla aːlʔiiskandaru talafanaː ʔaaw dˤaʶraʶraʶnaʶː wʔiðaː qjl lh aːtq aːllh ʔaχðth aːlʕza baːlʔiθm fħsbh d͡ʒhnm wlbʔis aːlmhaːd kaːn ðlk bʕd ðˤhr jwm aːlaːħd wkaːnt aːlblda tʕd͡ʒ baːlnaːs ʔaħb ʔan ʔaqrʔa aːlktb waman lam jaðubba ʕanhum lam jaðubba ʕank hj aːltj aːʕtnt bd͡ʒrħh min θamarihi wamaaː ʕamilathu ʔaajdijhim ʔaafalaaː jaʃkuruwna wjwm jqwl naːdwaː ʃrkaːʔij aːlðjn zʕmtm fdʕwhm flm jstd͡ʒjbwaː lhm wd͡ʒʕlnaː bjnhm mwbqaː lmaːðaː tbkj hl bʔimkaːnj aːstʕaːra hðaː wamaaː kaaːna bihi sˤaʶlaʶaʶːħuʶ aːlddunjaaː wqaːl aːlmlʔa aːlðjn kfrwaː mn qwmh lʔin aːtbʕtm ʃʕjbaː ʔinkm ʔiðaː lχaːsrwn waʔaasbaaːbu aːlʔaulfaai χamsaaun wahija aːlddijnu waaːlnnasabu waʶaʶːlmuʶsˤaʶaʶːhaʶraʶaʶuʶ waaːlmawaddaau waaːlbirru wʔin d͡ʒhnm lmwʕdhm ʔad͡ʒmʕjn hw ħrdˤ ʕlaː aːlʃʁb ʔaʶðˤnnhuʶ jχfj ʃjʔianaː fajatabahrad͡ʒa biʶaʶːlsˤsˤuʶlaʶħaʶaʶːʔiʶ walajsa minhum jħb tnaːwl aʶːlsltˤaʶ baːllħm ðlk bʔan aːllh nzl aːlktaːb baːlħq wʔin aːlðjn aːχtlfwaː fj aːlktaːb lfj ʃqaːq bʕjd tħwjl aʶːlʔaʶsˤwaʶːt aːlaː nsˤwsˤ bjdˤaʶ aːljwm χjr mn dd͡ʒaːd͡ʒa aːlʁd aːlʃrka ʕaːnt mn χsaːra lajlanaː tˤaʶwjlaʶnaʶː liʔaanna aːlʕaaːlima biaːstidʕaaːʔiihi mutawaffirun rabbu aːlmaʃriqajni warabbu aːlmaʁribajni lm jftħ saːmj rsaːla ljlaː ħttaː waʔaammaaː ʔaːdaaːbu aʶːlmuʶwaʶaʶːdˤaʶʕaʶaʶiʶ waʶaʶːliʶaʶːsˤtˤiʶlaʶaʶːħiʶ faʶdˤaʶrbaʶaʶːniʶ ʔakl wħmd χjr mn ʔakl wsˤmt aːddʕaː saːmj ʔannh tˤbjb ʔaʶrχsˤ mn aːltmr fj aʶːlbsˤraʶ man ʔaʶuʶʕtˤiʶjaʶ faʃakara waʶʔiʶiʶħbaʶaʶːtˤiʶ aːlʔaad͡ʒri laː jsttˤjʕ ʔaħdun msaːʕdtj tħsˤsˤlt ljlaː ʕlaː ʃhaːda mmrrdˤaʶ waribħu tid͡ʒaaːraain nħn mn nfs aːld͡ʒaːmʕa maːðaː trjd ʔan tʔakl saːmj laː jħbb aːlmslmjn waħukija ʔaanna aːlrraʃijda ħabasa rad͡ʒulanaː θumma saʔaala ʕanhu baʕda zamaaːnin min ʃarri maː χalaqa faljadʕu naːdijahu liʔaanna aːlmukaaːfiʔia ʔaaʕaðru wamadχala aːlʃʃari masluwkanaː daʕwaaun mustad͡ʒaaːbaaun ʔaan laaː jarfaʕa bikalaaːmihi tsmʕnaː saːmj ðaːhb ʔilaː aːld͡ʒaːmʕa tħrrk aːlʔaːn aːstmrrt ljlaː fj aːlħrka ʔaantum waʔaːbaːʔuukumu aːlʔaaqdamwna tχaʶːsˤmaʶː saːmj w ljlaː ħwl mʃkl ʔidmaːnhaː ʕlaː aːlkħwl ʔiinnaː χalaqnaaː fj aːlmsbħ minhaaː suwʔu ðˤaʶnniʶhiʶ biχaaːliqihi ʔaannahu laaː jarzuquhum ʔillaaː min d͡ʒihatihi lmaːðaː trjnj hðh aʶːlsˤsˤwraʶ fawarraaː ʕan aːlʔiiχbaaːri binasabihi biʔaamrin jaħtamilu ðˤaʶllaʶt ʔaʶaʶntˤiʶqaʶ biʶaʶːlsˤsˤiʶdqiʶ mrħbaː jaː twm ʔiħdaː ħqaːʔibj mfqwda maʕa maaː juθijruhu min ħanaqin wajuksibuhu min ħiqdin faʔiin sˤaʶaʶːdaʶfaʶ bihimmatihi ħaʶðˤðˤaʶnaʶː naaːla bihi ʔaamalanaː waaːstiʃaaːraai naʶaʶːsˤiʶħiʶn musaaːlimin kaffaaːraau aʶːltˤtˤiʶjaʶraʶaʶiʶ aːlttawakulu ʕalaaː aːlllahi taʕaaːlaaː waqad qaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlʔaudabaaːʔi biaːlʔiiħsaaːni jaʶrtaʶbiʶtˤuʶ aːlʔiinsaaːnu faʔiin lam tafʕaluwaː walan tafʕaluwaː faaːttaquwaː aːlnnaaːra aːllatij waquwduhaaː aːlnnaaːsu waaːlħid͡ʒaaːraau ʔauʕiddat lilkaaːfirijna waqad qijla man ʁalabathu aːlħidaau falaaː taʁtarra bimawaddatihi aːlttufaaːħaau ħlwaaun ʔaljst tˤbjbaʶ fajaðilla biʶaʶːldˤdˤaʶraʶʕiʶ wajuħrama biaːlʔaubbahaai lkl ʃʕaːʕ mnħaː wtˤwjlaʶ w ʔitd͡ʒaːh ʔaaχbara ʔaanna aʶːltˤtˤaʶriʶjqaʶ ʔilaaː aːld͡ʒannaai aːħtimaaːlu aːlmakaaːrihi waʶaʶːltˤtˤaʶriʶjqaʶ ʔilaaː aːlnnaaːri aːttibaaːʕu aːlʃʃahawaaːti hl bʔimkaːnj zjaːrtk ʁdaː walaaː muʃijra kaðij nuʶsˤħiʶn wamaqdiraain fij muʃkili aːlʔaamri faaːχtar ðaaːka muʶntaʶsˤiʶħaʶnaʶː waʶaʶːlχaʶsˤlaʶaʶuʶ aːlχaaːmisaau faʔiinna haðihi aːlʔaumuwra tamnaʕu min aːlʔiiðaaːʕaai saaːra aʶːlqiʶtˤaʶaʶːruʶ ʔanaː msrwra lʕdm wd͡ʒwdj hnaːk kaːn saːmj mhtmmaː bʃʔuwnh fqtˤ ʔijlaːfihim riħlaaa aːlʃʃitaːʔi waʶaʶːlsˤsˤaʶjfiʶ ʔad͡ʒbr saːmj ljlaː ʕlaː aːlððhaːb mʕh haː qd wsˤlt aːlħaːfla hm jnaːqʃwn aːlmʃkla smʕ saːmj dˤd͡ʒd͡ʒaʶ qwjja faʕalaaːma aːlttahaaːfutu fij aːlnnaaːri lam jusaaːfir muħammadun qtˤʕ saːmj aʶːlaʶːttsˤaʶːl qd jdrk aːlmtʔanj bʕdˤ ħaːd͡ʒth wqd jkwn mʕ aːlmstʕd͡ʒl aːlzll jʃʕr twm baːlmsʔuwlja ʕmaː ħdθ biʔaajdj safaraain ʔaaʔaulqija aːlððikru ʕalajhi min bajninaː bal huwa kaððaːbun ʔaaʃirun wajastaʁnij ʕan aːlʕuluwfaai biraʕjihi ʔaaʔaantum ʔaanʃaʔatum ʃad͡ʒaratahaː ʔaam naħnu aːlmunʃiʔiwna waðalika biaːstinzaaːlihi ʕanhu ʔin ʕalaaː ʔaan jastawlija ʕalajhi ħubbu aːlmaaːli wabuʕdu aːlʔaamali fajabʕaθuhu ħubbu aːlmaaːli ʕalaaː aʶːlħiʶrsˤiʶ fij tˤaʶlaʶbiʶhiʶ waʃahwaai saaːʕaain ʔaawraθat ħuznanaː tˤaʶwiʶjlaʶnaʶː aːttibaaːʕu aːlddijni fij aːd͡ʒtinaaːbihi waʕaːdun wafirʕawnu waʔiiχwaːnu lwtˤiʶn ʔanaː aːlmsʔuwl ʕn hðh aːlʕjaːda ʔauwlʔiika lahum rizqun maʕlwmun jmθθl traːmb maː jstħqqh aːlʔamrjkjjwn waqijla fij manθuwri aːlħikami ʕuquwbaau aːlħaaːsidi min nafsihi qaaːla ʔaabuw tammaaːmin aʶːltˤtˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶjuʶ ʔin qaaːla qawlanaː ħaqqaqahu bifiʕlihi waʔaanʃada θaʕlabun waħukija ʔaanna ʔaaʕraaːbijjanaː ʔaataaː aːbna ʔaabij ðiʔibin fasaʔaalahu ʕan masʔaalaai tˤaʶlaʶaʶːqiʶn faʔaaftaaːhu biʶtˤaʶlaʶaʶːqiʶ aːmraʔaatihi ʔaʶaʶfdˤaʶluʶ aːlʕuddaai aʶːlsˤsˤaʶbruʶ ʕalaaː aːlʃʃidaai nħn ħqqaː nħbb hðaː aːlmdrrs dˤħħaʶː saːmj bljlaː faʶdˤlaʶ maaːlihi fahuwa χajrun lahu ʔaani aːʕmal saːbiʁaːtin waqaddir fij aːlssardi waaːʕmalwaː sˤaʶːliʶħaʶnaʶː ʔiinnj bimaː taʕmalwna baʶsˤjruʶn waminhaaː ʔaan jantaqila ʕan faʕatawaː ʕan ʔaamri rabbihim faʔaaχaðathumu aʶːlsˤsˤaʶːʕiʶqaʶaʶuʶ wahum jaʶnðˤuʶrwnaʶ ʕaːd ʔilaː ðlk aːlmtd͡ʒr d͡ʒnt ʕlaː nfshaː braːqʃ aːld͡ʒhl ʃr aʶːlʔaʶsˤħaʶːb waaːlθθaaːnij ʔaannahu ʔaaraaːda aʶːltˤtˤaʶriʶjqaʶ waliðalika qijla laaː muruwʔaaa limuqillin θumma ʔaaʁraqnaː baʕdu aːlbaːqjna haː hw aːlʕnwaːn aːʕlam ʔaanna aːlkalaaːma tard͡ʒumaaːnun juʕabbiru ʕan mustawdaʕaaːti aʶːldˤdˤaʶmaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶriʶ fj hðh aʶːlðˤrwf laː jmknnaː aːlnd͡ʒaːħ ʔaaraʔaajta aːllaðj janhaː ʕalijjun saaːfara ʔiilaaː faransaː wasabbiħwhu bukraaan waʶʔaʶaʶsˤjlaʶnaʶː qaːlat ʔiiħdaːhumaː jaː ʔaabati aːstaʔad͡ʒirhu ʔiinna χajra mani ʔaaʕiduk aːljawma waʔaaħbuwk ʁadanaː biaːlʔiind͡ʒaaːzi litaðuwqa ħalaaːwaaa aːlʔaamali waʔaatazajjanu biθubuwti aːlwafaaːʔi man ʔaaddabak qaaːla wakam ʔaarsalnaː min nabijjin fij aːlʔaawwaljna ʔawqf aʶːlʃʃrtˤj sjjaːra ljlaː wamiθlu haðaaː aːld͡ʒawaaːbi laaː justaʁrabu min ʔaanbijaaːʔi aːlllahi taʕaaːlaaː aːllaðijna ʔaamaddahum biwaħjihi srq saːmj sˤfħaʶ mn dftr wsˤfaʶːt aʶːltˤtˤbjb θumma tawallajtum min baʕdi ðaaːlika falawlaaː faʶdˤluʶ aːlllahi ʕalajkum waraħmatuhu lakuntum mina aːlχaaːsirijna waqijla lisufjaaːna maaː aːlzzuhdu fij aːlddunjaaː qaaːla aːlzzuhdu fij aːlnnaaːsi aːʕlam saːmj ʃrħ aːlʔamr lld͡ʒmjʕ wakaaːna fijhim sˤaʶdiʶjquʶn lahu faʔaamara biqatlihim ʔillaaː ðalika aʶːlsˤsˤaʶdiʶjquʶ faʔiinnahu ʕafaaː ʕanhu waʶʔaʶaʶtˤlaʶqaʶhuʶ waʶwaʶsˤaʶlaʶhuʶ fahaðaaː ħukmu watuʕad͡ʒd͡ʒilu biaːlʔiiqdaaːmi ʕalajhi wakafaaː biaːlqiħaai waaːlbaðaaːʔi ʃarranaː ʔaan jakuwnaaː ʔilaaː aːlʃʃari sabijlanaː waʔiinna aʶːlbaʶaʶːtˤiʶlaʶ χafijfun wabijjun fasawwifhaaː biaːlttaʔamijli waaːlʔiirʁaaːbi jaaː nafsu muwtij karijmaaan faqad kaaːnat aːlddunjaaː lanaaː θumma wallat ʕaːʃ saːmj ħjaːa rfjʕa aːlmstwaː ʕlaː aːlmrʔ ʔan jstħmm aːrtdaː saːmj bʕdˤ aːlmlaːbs w χrd͡ʒ ʕljnaː ʔiʶjsˤaʶːl saːmj bsrʕa ʔilaː aːlʕjaːda wamaaː halaka ʔaaħadun ʕan maʃuwraain qaːla ʔiinnamaaː aːlʕilmu ʕinda aːlllahi waʔauballiʁukum maː ʔaursiltu bihi walkinnj ʔaaraːkum qawmanaː tad͡ʒhalwna ʔanti tad͡ʒallaː wajawma juħʃaru ʔaaʕdaːʔu aːlllahi ʔiilaaː aːlnnaːri fahum jwzaʕwna laː jmknnj ʔan ʔaχbrk km ʔaħbbk zurtu dˤaʶaʶːħiʶjaʶaʶaʶn badijʕaaan aːlʔaʃd͡ʒaːr χdˤraʶːʔ faʔaammaaː farqu maaː bajna maaː ʔaamara aːlllahu bihi ʔaan juʶwsˤaʶlaʶ ʔiillaː man ðˤaʶlaʶmaʶ θumma baddala ħusnanaː baʕda swʔin faʔiinnj ʁafwrun raħjmun aːnhaːr saːmj saʶːqtˤaʶː hl ʔant mtʔakkd mn ʔannaː lm ntqaːbl mn qbl waaːstirðaaːlanaː limaaː d͡ʒaaːʔa bihi aːlʃʃarʕu min aːlttaʕabudi waaːlttawqijfi waʔaaʕwaza najluhu min masarraain maʔamuwlaain faʔiinna aʶːlsˤsˤaʶbraʶ ʕanhaaː juʕqibu aːlssalwa minhaaː tʃbbθ saːmj baːlħjaːa bsˤwraʶ tkaːd laː tuʶsˤddq sˤwaʶːb aːld͡ʒaːhl kzla aːlʕaːql kaːn saːmj jtˤwwr ʕaːda ʔaʶχtˤr waliðalika kariha ʔaahlu aʶːlfaʶdˤliʶ ʔaan juʶtˤliʶquʶwaʶː ʔaalsinatahum biaːlθθanaaːʔi waaːlmadħi taħarruzanaː min aːlttad͡ʒaaːwuzi fijhi tʔaχrnaː bsbb aʶːlʕaʶːsˤfaʶ waʔiillaaː faʔaːχiru aːlddaaːʔi aːlʕajaaːʔi aːlkajju wad͡ʒaba ʕalaaː aːlmustawdaʕi lahu ʔaadaaːʔu walaaː jafʕala maaː juqabbiħu aːlððikra waaːliaːsma ttsˤl ʕljh kl ljla wtħaːdθh lsaːʕa ʕlaː aːlʔaql waqijla fij manθuwri aːlħikami man aːstaʁnaaː karuma ʕalaaː ʔaahlihi kitaːbun marqwmun ʔalaː tʃʕr baːlbrd waʶðˤuʶlmaʶ aːlhafwaai waʔiinnahu lataðkiraaun lilmuttaqjna walaaː budda ʔiðaaː kaθuruwaː min ʔaan jakuwna fijhim man ʔaaχalla biʶbaʶʕdˤiʶhaʶaʶː wahaðaaː jakuwnu min dˤaʶʕfiʶ aːlnnafsi warubbamaaː ʔaawd͡ʒabahu aːlrraʔaju waʶaʶːqtaʶdˤaʶaʶːhuʶ aːlħazmu waʔaahnaʔaa lilqaaːbili aʶːtsˤl bj mra ʔaχraː χlaːl jwmjn kaːn saːmj waːqfaː χaːrd͡ʒ ʁrfa aːlmstʃfaː waʔiin naʃaʔa nuʁriqhum falaː sˤaʶrjχaʶ lahum walaː hum junqaðwna man ʔaʶaʶsˤlaʶħaʶ nafsahu ʔaarʁama ʔaanfa ʔaaʕaaːdijhi wahuwa aːllaðj d͡ʒaʕala aːlllajla waaːlnnahaːra χilfaaan liman ʔaaraːda ʔaan jaððakara ʔaaw ʔaaraːda ʃukwranaː ʔauwlʔiika humu aːlkafaraau aːlfad͡ʒaraau aʶːntðˤr saːmj aʶːlllħðˤaʶ aːlmnaːsba aʶːlʔiʶnfsˤaʶːljwn jkrhhm kl aːlnaːs qaːlwaː bal ʔaantum laː marħabanaː bikum ʔaantum qaddamtumwhu lanaː fabiʔisa aːlqaraːru ʕan ʕumara bni aʶːlχaʶtˤtˤaʶaʶːbiʶ raʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːlllahu ʕanhu ʔaanna ʔaaʕraaːbijjanaː ʔaataaːhu faqaaːla waqad rawaaː ʔaabuw salamaaa ʕan ʔaabij hurajraaa ʔaanna aːlnnabija sˤaʶllaʶaʶː aːlllahu ʕalajhi wasallama qaaːla kaːn saːmj jqsˤrnj fj aʶːltˤwl jumsij aːlnnaaːd͡ʒiħu masruwranaː aːlqʃa aːltj qsˤmt ðˤhr aːlbʕjr kaːn saːmj jʕtqd ʔannh jstħqq ʔakθr mmmaː mnħth aːlħjaːa ʔarjd aʶːltχllsˤ mnhaː waʔiin kaaːna aʶːlχaʶtˤaʶʔaʶuʶ min aːld͡ʒamaaːʕaai baʕijdanaː ʔaafaman kaːna ʕalaː bajjinaain min rabbihi kaman zujjina lahu swʔu ʕamalihi waaːttabaʕwaː ʔaahwaːʔahum walirabbika faʶaʶːsˤbiʶr hðaː aːlʃbl mn ðaːk aːlʔasd nsˤħh tˤbjbh baːlʔiqlaːʕ ʕn aːltdχjn ʔanaː ʕdˤw fj naːdj aːldraːmaː lmaːðaː ʔant mtʔaχr tsbħ bmhaːra ʔaljs kðlk jbdw lj ʔannj laː ʔaʶsttˤjʕ td͡ʒaːwz aːlʔamr jwd͡ʒd aːlkθjr lʔatʕlmh tfnn fj aːlbχl wajadun ʕinda fahuwa jaʶðˤuʶnnuʶ ʔaan laaː χawfa lahu ʔillaaː ʔijjaaːhu aʶːχltˤ aːlħsaːʔ wnħn ʔaqrb ʔiljh mnkm wlkn laː tbsˤrwn ʔiillaaː raħmaaan min rabbika ʔiinna faʶdˤlaʶhuʶ kaaːna ʕalajka aʶːltˤwaʶːbʕ mð kaːn sˤʁjraʶnaʶː qul ʔiinna rabbij jaʶbsuʶtˤuʶ aːlrrizqa liman jaʃaaːʔu wajaqdiru walakinna ʔaakθara aːlnnaaːsi laaː jaʕlamuwna jaaː ʔaahla aːlʃʃaaːmi aːsmaʕuwaː qawla ʔaaχin ħzjna aːmʃi waraaːʔa aːlʔaasadi walaaː tamʃi waraaːʔa aːlmarʔaaai duʕjtu ʔilaː ʕrshmaː ʔanaː ʔaʶtttˤlʕ llʕml mʕk aːʃdd bh ʔazrj mn tlk aːlftaːa aʶːlltˤjfaʶ ʔaj qaːmws tʕnjh ʔaatafraħu biaːlmawti faqaaːla aʶːnðˤr ħjθ aːaːʃr lqd kaːn fj jwsf wʔiχwth ʔaːjaːt llsaːʔiljn fj ʔaj fndq ʔant mqjm ʔilʁj tˤlbnaʶː mn fdˤlk ʔataːnaː zwwaːrun ʁjru mtwqʕjn hl tʕaːnj mn aːlm aːlaːsnaːn ʔin hʔulaːʔ lʃrðma ʔanaː tˤwjlaʶ d͡ʒdaː hw ʔanqð aʶːltˤfl mχaʶːtˤraʶːaʶn bħjaːth nhaːja aːlʔisbwʕ aʶːlmaʶːdˤjaʶ kaːnt mmla lj sbħaːn aːllh lqd aːstslmt ljlaː tˤwʕaʶː ðaːk qlm tˤwjl θm ʔarslnaː mwsaː wʔaχaːh haːrwn hðaː aːlʔan nħn nbjʕ ʕsˤjr aːlbrtqaːl dˤħk ʕljj ʔaʕrf d͡ʒjm mnð knt tˤflaʶːaʶn waθijaaːbaka faʶtˤaʶhhiʶr ʔanaː sʕjd d͡ʒdaːan lqd tsll mn χlfj lnʕml ħflaa ʃaːj bʕd ʁd naʶaʶːsˤiʶjaʶaʶiʶn kaaːðibaain χalaqaka fasawwaaːka faʕadalaka ʔaaħaduhumaaː min ðaaːtihi falaaː jantahij bihi aːlʔaamalu ʔilaaː ʁaaːjaain md͡ʒddaːan waːldnaː jðhb aːlj aːlʕml baːlsjaːra ʔauwlaʔiika humu aːlkafaraau aːlfad͡ʒaraau ʔaʶʕtˤnj ʔid͡ʒaːbaan ʔakjdaan fʔaːmnwaː fmtʕnaːhm ʔilaː ħjn aːbq mkaːnk ʕaːlm aːlʁjb waːlʃhaːda aːlʕzjz aːlħkjm maːðaː knti stfʕljna lw kunti ʔaʶsˤʁr bʕʃr snjn ʔant wħdk ʔamlj mnzlk raːʔiʕ hl ʔanbʔikm d͡ʒdjd ʕalaaː sururin mmaʶwdˤuʶwnaʶaʶiʶn dχl mnnaːd aːlmnzl aʶːlsˤwraʶ mʕlqa ʕlaː aʶːlħaʶːʔiʶtˤ ʔamdkm bʔanʕaːm wbnjn aːlllahu laaː ʔiilaha ʔiillaaː huwa rabbu aːlʕarʃi aʶːlʕaʶðˤiʶjmiʶ ʔajn nðhb bʕd ʔaawlaaː laka faʔaawlaaː ʔaːχðjn maː ʔaːtaːhm rbhm ʔinhm kaːnwaː qbl ðlk mħsnjn jd͡ʒb ʔan nqrʔa hðaː aːlktaːb tkraːraː w mraːraː kðbwaː bʔaːjaːtnaː klhaː fʔaχðnaːhm ʔaχð ʕzjz mqtdr ln jsjʔ lkmaː ʔaħd aʶːlʔiʶjtˤaʶːljaʶ hðh ʔamwr mhma χrd͡ʒt mn ʁrfthaː msrʕa fjhmaː faːkha wnχl wrmaːn ʔaalaːaːa taziru waaːziraaun wizra ʔauχraaː wud͡ʒuwhun jawmaʔiiðin musfiraaun qud bħðr aːfʕlh kmaː jqwl lk tlqj subħaaːna rabbinaaː ʔiinnaaː kunnaaː ðˤaʶaʶːliʶmiʶjnaʶ ʔajn ðhbt wd͡ʒaːʔ rbk waːlmlk sˤfaʶː sˤfaʶː aːllʁa aːljdjʃja tuktab baːlʔabd͡ʒdjja aːlʕbrjja maːrj qd fqdt aːlkθjr mn aːlwzn ʔaljs kðlk tqbblt maːrj kl ʃjʔ bdwn ʃkwaː ʔinhaː ʔaʶðˤhrthaʶː lj warawaaː ʔaabuw salamaaa ʕan ʔaabij hurajraaa ʔaanna rasuwla aːlllahi sˤaʶllaʶaʶː aːlllahu ʕalajhi wasallama qaaːla ʕaaːmilaaun naʶaʶːsˤiʶbaʶaʶuʶn swf aːlʕb kra aːltns ʁdaː haː hðaː aːlmaːʔ sˤaʶːlħ llʃrb hl ʔabwhaː tˤbjb waʶħiʶfðˤiʶ aːlʔaawzaaːni min aʶːlsˤsˤaʶdaʶaʶː ħiʶfðˤaʶ aːlʕaqli min aːlhawaaː ʔiinaamaaː aːlʔaaʕmaaːlu biaːlniijaaːti waʔiinaamaaː likulii aːmriʔiin maaː nawaaː mn qaːl ħaːd ʕn aʶːsˤlh laː aʶːsttˤjʕ ʔijd͡ʒaːd mfaːtjħj hl jd͡ʒb ʔan tðhb ʔilaː mktb aːlbrjd fij kitaaːbin mmaknuwnin wajaskunu ʔilajhi aːlbarijʔu hl tʕrf ʔajn saːʕtj faʔaajna taðhabuwna aːlnʕaːm laː jmknh aʶːltˤjraʶːn faʶːlʕaʶːsˤfaʶːt ʕsˤfaʶː wd͡ʒʕl aːlqmr fjhn nwraː wd͡ʒʕl aːlʃms sraːd͡ʒaː wafutiħati aːlssamaaːʔu fakaaːnat ʔaabwaaːbanaː liʔaanna aʶːltˤtˤuʶʁjaʶaʶːnaʶ markuwzun fij tˤaʶbʕiʶhiʶ ʔiðaaː aːstaʁnaaː ʔaχjraːan wd͡ʒdt wðˤjfaʶ bdʔa saːmj jʃkk ʔann ljlaː kaːnt twaːʕd rd͡ʒaːlaː ʔaːχrjn laː tʔatj aʶːlmsˤaʶːʔiʶb furaaːdaaː ʕasaaː ʔaan aːlʔaːn kaːnt ljlaː td͡ʒaːls aʶːlsˤsˤbjaʶːn aːlhdf mnhaː ʔinʃaːʔ nmwðd͡ʒ ðkaːʔ aʶːsˤtˤnaʶːʕj hl ʔantj maːrj hj tħtaːd͡ʒh ʔakθr mmmaː jħtaːd͡ʒhaː wʔanbtnaː ʕljh ʃd͡ʒra mn jqtˤjn aːlsrjr aːlðj d͡ʒlst ʕljh ltwk hw srjr d͡ʒdtj qul ʔaaʕuwðu birabbi aːlfalaqi ʔanaː mslm ʔanaː maːzlt ʔaħaːwl aːn ʔaʕzf ʕlaː aːld͡ʒjtaːr mθl ʔirjk klaːbtwn qurʔaːnanaː ʕarabijjanaː ʁajra ðij ʕiwad͡ʒin laʕallahum jattaquwna ʔard͡ʒw aʶːjdˤaʶː mn aːld͡ʒmjʕ mʃaːrka aːlmnʃwr ljsˤl aːlaː ʔakbr ʕdd mmkn wsjd͡ʒnbhaː aːlʔatqaː kunt ʔiðaaː laqijtu ʕaaːlimanaː ʔaaχaðt minhu hl bʔimkaːnk ħd͡ʒz hðaː aːlmqʕd lj tmtʕ bʔadnbra waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ ħukamaaːʔi aːlfursi hum darad͡ʒaaːtun ʕinda aːlllahi waaːlllahu baʶsˤiʶjruʶn bimaaː jaʕmaluwna walajsa huwa min ʔaaqsaaːmi maaː juʃkilu ʕalaaː man taʶsˤaʶwwaʶraʶhuʶ laː ʔaħd jʕbr nhraː dwn ʔan jbtl fʔaχð aʶːlqaʶːdˤj jdh wʔamsk bjd d͡ʒħaː wnd͡ʒaː aʶːlðˤlm ðˤlmaʶːt jwm aːlqjaːma waʕalaaː ʔaːχara man ʔaammala aːlbaqaaːʔa waqad raʔaaaː maʶsˤaʶaʶːriʶʕaʶnaʶaʶː fahuwa maʁruwrun ʔaħb qtˤk sjkwn ʁrjbanaː ʔaħtaːd͡ʒ aːltħdθ mʕk ʕn ʔamr tˤaʶːrʔiʶ laaː sijjamaaː ʔiðaaː qalla kl maː ʔaʕrfh hw ʔanh mn aʶːlsˤjn maːðaː fʕlti qaːl zjd hðaː nhaːr d͡ʒmjl ʔaħb hðaː aːlktaːb ʔakθr mn ʁjrh hnaː ntklm baːlʔisbaːnja ʔaːtt ʕndj ftaːa tʕrf km hj d͡ʒmjla ʕljnaː ʔan nʔad͡ʒl aːlqraːr aːlnhaːʔij ħtaː aːlʔasbwʕ aːlqaːdm laː jħb d͡ʒim aːltfaːħ ʔaljs kðlk hj laː tʕlm ʔajn tbħθ ʕnh ðhbt lʔatmʃaː fj aːlmtnzh fj aːlʔid͡ʒaːza aʶːlmaʶːdˤjaʶ kaːn brws ʁdˤbaʶːnaʶnaʶː ħjn trkth χljlth lknh srʕaːn maː nsj aːlʔamr ʔinmaː jstd͡ʒjb aːlðjn jsmʕwn waːlmwtaː jbʕθhm aːllh θm ʔiljh jrd͡ʒʕwn ʕalaaː sururin baːlnaːzlaːt aːlmaːħqaːt ħnaːn jwm laː jʁnj mwlaː ʕn mwlaː ʃjʔiaː wlaː hm jnsˤrwn waqaaːla aːbnu aːlmuqaffaʕi sˤaʶħiʶħ aʶːlʔaʶχtˤaʶːʔ ʔiðaː kaːn hnaːk ʔaj mnhaː km sʕr hðaː aːlfstaːn ʔaχj mdrs laː ʕn aʶːlmwdˤwʕ ʃrbt aːlmaːʔ wqaːlwaː rbnaː ʕd͡ʒl lnaː qtˤnaʶː qbl jwm aːlħsaːb ldjhm θlaːθa qtˤtˤ ljswaː bħaːd͡ʒa lqtˤ ʔaːχr kff ʕn aʶːltsˤfjq ʔanaː lstu ðaːhbaːan bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm js ʔinh laː aːnt bl aːnaː aʶːjdˤaʶː knt aːlmʕnj wjklm aːlnaːs fj aːlmhd wkhlaː wmn aʶːlsˤaʶːlħjn ʔinhaː rqjqa hðaː aːlʕlm d͡ʒmjl d͡ʒdaː fajaqillu fij aːlnnaaːsi aːlħasadu waaːlmuraaːʔiija bihi maħquwrun laaː nχʃaː aʶːlχtˤwb kaːn saːmj jrkn sjjaːrth bd͡ʒaːnb mnzl baːja ʕad͡ʒibt liman jaħtamij min aʶːltˤtˤaʶjiʶbaʶaʶːtiʶ maχaaːfaaa aːlddaaːʔi maaː salakakum fij saqara laː tsttˤjʕ ʃrb maːʔ aːlbħr lʔanh maːlħ aːlʔind͡ʒljzja qaaːla haðaaː sˤiʶraʶaʶːtˤuʶn ʕalajja mustaqijmun mtaː ʔaqflt hðh aːlbaːb ʔaːχr mra fnzl mn ħmjm lqd mdˤt θlaːθa snwaːt mnð wfaːth hðaː aːlktaːb ljs bd͡ʒdjdin wfd͡ʒrnaː aʶːlʔaʶrdˤ ʕjwnaː faːltqaː aːlmaːʔ ʕlaː ʔamr qd qdr aːlʕilmu χajrun min aːlmaaːli ʔanaː mn aːljwnaːn aːlktaːbu shlun wʔinaː lnʕlm ʔan mnkm mkðbjn tʕaːzjj waʕarafta faʶdˤlaʶhuʶ wtˤlħ mndˤwd qsˤft tˤaʶːʔiʶraʶːt aːlʕdww aːlmdjna aːhlaː wshlaː mn aʶːlʔaʶfdˤl ʔan tðhb ʔant ʃχsˤjaʶː km hw waʶːdˤħ ʔanhaː kðba ʔarʔajt ʔin kðb wtwlaː χrd͡ʒ mnnaːd χfja mn mnzl waːldjh ʔiʶʕtˤjnj fuʶrsˤaʶ waaːlmannaaːnaau aːllatij tamunnu ʕalaaː zawd͡ʒihaaː bimaaːlihaaː kaːn tˤwlh θmaːnja ʔamtaːr maːðaː ʕsaːnj ʔan ʔafʕl bdwnk lqd zrtu baːrjs mra ʔilaː aːlðjn ʔaːmnwaː wʕmlwaː aʶːlsˤaʶːlħaʶːt flhm ʔad͡ʒr ʁjr mmnwn haðaaː maaː tuwʕaduwna lijawmi aːlħisaaːbi ʔanaː fj dbj wfaːkha mmaː jtχjrwn ʔismʕ hl tmaːnʕ ʔin ʔaχðt hðaː mʕj aːnaː bχjr waːnt waʶːlʔaʶrdˤ wmaː tˤħaʶːhaʶː waːld͡ʒbaːl ʔawtaːdaː waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ ʕulamaaːʔi aːlssalafi θumma ʔiinnakum jawma aːlqijaaːmaai tubʕaθuwna kjjf hj ʕaʶːsˤmaʶ aːwkraːnjaː ʔanaː sʕjda ʔaʶħdˤr aʶːltˤʕaʶːm ʔiinnamaaː tuwʕaduwna laʶsˤaʶaʶːdiʶquʶn fʔinhm jwmʔið fj aːlʕðaːb mʃtrkwn maː ʔinkm mnaː laː tnsˤrwn man ʁafara zalalij laːbθjn fjhaː ʔaħqaːbaː twm jfkr fj nfsh fqtˤ qaːlwaː tzwwad͡ʒ qltu jaː ʔaʶsˤħaʶːbj ʔaħtaːd͡ʒ ʔilaː tʁjjr aːlmlaːbs rʔasj swf janfad͡ʒir fðkr ʔinmaː ʔant mðkr wahuwa biaːlħamdi ʔaad͡ʒdaru wabiaːlθθanaaːʔi ʔaaħaqqu wlqd ftnaː sljmaːn wʔalqjnaː ʕlaː krsjh d͡ʒsdaː θm ʔanaːb θumma maaː ʔaadraaːka maaː jawmu aːlddijni laː ʔaʶsˤdq maː ʔaraːh ħattaaː kaʔaannahu qad ʔaahmala ʔanaː mslm aːnh jʕlmnaː aːllʁa aːlfrnsja waqad qaaːlat aːlħukamaaːʔu rnn aːlhaːtf lkn lm jd͡ʒb ʔaħd ʔanaː ʔaʁnj bʔimkaːnj qraːʔthaː klhaː kjf nimti aːlljla aʶːlmaʶːdˤjaʶ ʔanaː ʔatʕlm aːljaːbaːnja wajatrukuwnanaaː fij ħaaːli aʶːldˤdˤaʶʕfiʶ binaaː ʕanhum walaaː taʶħaʶaʶːdˤdˤuʶwnaʶ ʕalaaːaː tˤaʶʕaʶaʶːmiʶ aːlmiskijni waaːlʔaannaaːnaau aːllatij taʔiinnu kasalanaː waʶtaʶmaʶaʶːruʶdˤaʶnaʶː jʕml zjd mħaːsbanaː fj aːlʃrka faʔaammaaː aːlmund͡ʒijaaːtu laː jd͡ʒb ʕlj ʔan ʔaːtj hnaː haː qd ʔataː aʶːlbaʶːsˤ ʔanaː ʔadrs aʶːlrjaʶːdˤjaʶːt jd͡ʒb ʔan ʔasaːʕdhaː d͡ʒnd maː hnaːlk mhzwm mn aːlʔaħzaːb aːlklaːb nbħt aːlljl klh lm juħl ʔabdaː lʁz wfaːthaː liʔaanna aːlttamaluqa lilʕaaːlimi juʶðˤhiʶruʶ maknuwna ʕamalihi ʔilajhaaː biramzin mustaħlin waʶlaʶfðˤiʶn mustaʁrabin ħjθ hnaːk ʔiraːda hnaːk tˤrjqaʶ jmkn aːstχdaːmh kskjn maːðaː tqwl aːlʔimrʔaa waqijla liʕijsaaː aːbni marjama ʕalajhimaaː aːlssalaaːmu waħukija ʔaanna aːlʔiiskandara qaaːla liħukamaaːʔi aːlhindi waːðkr fj aːlktaːb ʔibraːhjm ʔinh kaːn sˤdjqaʶː nbjaː aːlħdjθ aːlsaːbʕ ʕʃr aːlrfq baːlħjwaːn ʔiinnahaaː ʕalajhim mmuʶʔuʶsˤaʶdaʶaʶuʶn mʃaːhda aːlsbaːq mmtʕa waaːʕlam ʔaanna maaː lak ʕinda aːlllahi miθlu maaː sljmaːn wʔabwh daːwd nbjaːn mn ʕnd aːllh aʶːltˤaʶːʔiʶraʶ aːlmqaːtla ʔalqt qnbla hl ʔanta sʕjd fakaaːna qaaːba qawsajni ʔaaw ʔaadnaaː qaːl ʕmaː qljl ljsˤbħn naːdmjn mtaː tχrrd͡ʒt mn aːlkljja bismi aːlllahi aːlrraħmani aːlrraħijmi ħm faʔiinnahu marʕanaː ʔaanijqun ʔaam χalaqnaaː aːlmalaaːʔiikaaa ʔiinaaːθanaː wahum ʃaaːhiduwna fj aːlmra aːlmqbla sʔafʕl ðlk bnfsj kwnaː mtsaːmħaːn ħjaːa aʶːlflstˤjnjjn mhma kaːn bjth mðˤlmaʶːaʶn hl ʔanti sʕjda fj mnzlk aːnaː aːħb aːlaːstmaːʕ aːlaː aːlqraːn aːlkrjm aːlrħmn aːlrħjm waʔiiðaaː aʶːlsˤsˤuʶħuʶfuʶ nuʃirat ʔanaː mʁnja ʔamrjkja lqd tħrk twm ʔiʶntðˤr dqjqa mn fdˤlk aːnthaː aːlʕaːlm aːlbaːrħa bjnmaː knt naːʔimaː aːnt nwr ʕjwnj wtaːd͡ʒ raːsj mn ʔajna tʕrf hðaː hl ʔanaː sˤdjqtk saːmj laː jkðb ʔabdaː nʕm ʔinhaː ʁaʶːdˤbaʶ waːlʕmr bdwnk jχtfj waʶbaʶsaʶtˤaʶ fijhi aːlrrahbaaa laː ʔaʶðˤn ʔanhaː stmtˤr bʕd aʶːlðˤhr sqtˤ twm mn ʕlaː draːd͡ʒth waʶːdˤħ ʔanh mðnb bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm sˤ waːlqrʔaːn ðj aːlðkr kaːn jsmjnj aːtʃjrw laː tstjqðˤ ʕnd kl nbaːħ klb d͡ʒbha aːltħrjr ʔaʶʕtˤjnaʶːk ʕhdaː laː jwd͡ʒd sbb lʔilaː ʔafʕlh ʁaːlbaː maː tʕd͡ʒbnj ʔaħaːdjθk bdʔat mħaʶːdˤrth fj mwʕdhaː ʔaalam naχluqkum min maaːʔin mahijnin faʔaalqaaː ʕaʶsˤaʶaʶːhuʶ tlk aːlʃd͡ʒra waaːlħaaːlaau aːlθθaaːliθaau aːʃtqt ʔiljk ħqaː ʔanaː qtˤ wljs ʕndj aːsm bʕd hðh hj aːld͡ʒmla aːltj laː ʔaʶsttˤjʕ trd͡ʒmthaː mtaː stqlʕ ʕn aːltdχjn wmaː kaːn lnfs ʔan tʔumn ʔilaː bʔiðn aːllh wjd͡ʒʕl aːlrd͡ʒs ʕlaː aːlðjn laː jʕqlwn lqd χrd͡ʒt fj nzha bilisaaːnin saʔiuwlin waqalbin ʕuquwlin jbdw ʔan aʶːlʕsˤaʶːfaʶ hdʔat laː aːðhb ʕlaː aːlmdrsa aːljwm tntd͡ʒ aːld͡ʒzaːʔir aːlmrkbaːt ʔaamθaaːlihaaː maːðaː jrjdwn ʔanaː ldj d͡ʒaːr msˤrj ʕnd twm ʕlba ʔarbʕa ltr mn aːlχmr aʶːlrχjsˤ fj θlaːd͡ʒth ʔadχl djmaː jdh fj d͡ʒjbh wʔaχrd͡ʒ ħqjbaan dˤχmaʶaʶn dʕnaː ntqaːsm aːlnfqaːt aːlbjt aːlʔaħmr hw aːlðj bnaːh d͡ʒaːk ʔiinnaaː d͡ʒaʕalnaaːhu qurʔaːnanaː ʕarabijjanaː laʕallakum taʕqiluwna aʶːlttˤwraʶːt aːlħdjθa fj aʶːltˤb mðhla km ʕmrk wðˤf fj aːlbnk ʔanta tbdw mθl aːlwld bdʔat waːħdaː wjl jwmʔið llmkðbjn lqd aʶːχtˤʔaʶt bʕnwaːn aːlmqaːla ʕan ʕurwaaa bni aːlzzubajri ql lhaː ʔalaː tbħθ ʕnj jaː lh mn sʔuaːl ʔakjd ʔanaː ʔaħbh maː aːlwqt aːlʔaːn ʔinhaː aːlsaːʕa aːlʕaːʃra ħjθ ʔanh jtm aʶːdˤaʶːfaʶ d͡ʒml d͡ʒdjda jwmjaː jd͡ʒb ʔan ʔaðhb ʔilaː aːlbnk aːljwm nazala bihi aːlrruwħu aːlʔaamijnu ʔaʕjʃ fj qtˤr sʔaðhb mʕk wamaθalanaː fij aːlʔaːχarijna mhmtk ʔan td͡ʒmʕ aːlʔawraːq aːlmjta fj aːlħdjqa kaːnt ʁrfa kbjra lm jwaːfq saːmj bal d͡ʒahiltu ʔahm ʃjʔ ʔan tkn sˤbwraʶːaʶn ʔaam χalaquwaː aːlssamaːwaːti waʶaʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤaʶ bal laː jwqinwna kaːn saːmj hnaː fj aːlʕjaːda hðaː aʶːlsˤsˤbaʶːħ waqaaːluwaː lan tamassanaaː aːlnnaaːru ʔiillaaː ʔaajjaaːmanaː maʕduwdaaan ljlaː mraːqba mmrrdˤaʶːt fj aːlʕjaːda maːðaː lm ʔasmʕk ʔinn maː rʔajth sjtħqqq ħtmaː tħtaːd͡ʒ ʔilaː ʔan tʕwd ʔilaː aːlmnzl ljs hðaː mhmaːan ʔanaː wtwm hnaː lmsaːʕdtk rbbmaː kaːn mrjdˤaʶː ʔiinna rabbaka jaʶqdˤj bajnahum biħukmihi wahuwa aːlʕazjzu aːlʕaljmu watud͡ʒijbu ʔilaaː sˤaʶlaʶaʶːħiʶhaʶaʶː ʔaʶðˤnn ʔan hðaː maː ħdθ ʕndmaː tkwn aʶːlbdˤaʶːʕaʶ mrʁwbaː fjhaː fʔin aːlmʃtraː ʔaʕmaː ʃjʔ maː ħdθ muħammadun lan jataʔaaχχara fij aʶːlsˤsˤaʶbaʶaʶːħiʶ ʔaχbrnj bnfs aːlʃʃjʔ w ʔaχjraːan aːstslm kaːn saːmj χaːʔifaː mn ʔan tdˤħk ʕljh ljlaː dχl aːlmdrrs aːlqlwb ʕnd bʕdˤhaʶː kaːn ldaː saːmj sˤwt ʁrjb ħqqaː maː lwnh zaːr saːmj aːlmstʃfaː laː tns ʔan tbʕθ aːlrrsaːʔil mn mrkz aːlbrjd ʔaʶmdˤaʶː saːmj rmdˤaʶːnh aːlʔawwl fj msˤr ʔard͡ʒd͡ʒħ ʔannj sʔansaː ðlk kn lajiinanaː fj ʁjr dˤʕf wʃdjdaːan fj ʁjr ʕnf man ʔaawʁart sˤaʶdraʶhuʶ aːstadʕajt ʃarrahu jkrh saːmj aːlttnql mn mnzl lʔaːχr liʔaanna aːlnnaaːsa bimaʕrifatihi jarʃuduwna jawmaʔiiðin tuħaddiθu ʔaaχbaːrahaː aʶːlsˤdq jħsn baːlftaː waːlkðb jħsb mn ʕjwbh lukm saːmj fj fmh drs saːmj aːlmsrħ wamuʁrisanaː naaːmijanaː ʔaʶtˤwl mn jwm aːlfraːq ʔaam ʔaabramwaː ʔaamranaː faʔiinnaː mubrimwna laː tqlq ʔanaː hnaː aːlʔaːn litaʃaaːʁulihi ʕanhaaː faʔiinnamaː jassarnaːhu bilisaːnika laʕallahum jataðakkarwna ʃχsˤ aːsmh aːjtwh jrjd mqaːbltk laaː taʔaχuð maaː lajsa laka saːmj jntðˤr fj aʶːlsˤsˤf zaːr saːmj aːlʕdjd mn aːlddwl aːlʔislaːmjja jaː lk mn saːfl ʔaħmq qaːl saːmj ʔann ljlaː kaːn ldjhaː taːrjχ mʕ aːlaːktʔiaːb mtaː tkwn mʃʁwlaːan ʔant daːʔimaː maː tnsaː ʔismj ʔawdd ʔan ʔaʶmdˤj bqjja ħjaːtj mʕk mdrrs aʶːlrrjaʶːdˤjaʶːt mðhl bismi aːlllahi aːlrraħmni aːlrraħjmi saʔaala saːʔiilun biʕaðaːbin waːqiʕin watustadfaʕu makaaːʔiidu aːlʔaaʕdaaːʔi ʔajn jʕjʃ aʶːlʃʃjtˤaʶːn kaːnaː faʶːdˤl w daːnja jtχaʶːsˤmaʶːn bsˤwt mrtfʕ kaːnaː ljlaː w saːmj jqrʕaːn ʕlaː ʔabwaːb aːlnnaːs lnʃr aːlklaːm aʶːltˤtˤjb walaaː liʶmaʶdˤaʶaʶːrriʶ aːlħumqi nihaaːjaaun ʔanaː laː ʔafhm hðh aːlklma waqad qijla fij manθuwri aːlħikami aːlhammu qajdu aːlħawaaːssi qul ʔaafaʁajra aːlllahi taʔamuruwnnij ʔaaʕbudu ʔaajjuhaaː aːld͡ʒaaːhiluwna qaːlwaː ʔinaː ttˤjrnaʶː bkm lʔin lm tnthwaː lnrd͡ʒmnkm wljmsnkm mnaː ʕðaːb ʔaljm ʃrqnaː qlbh ʔabdaːan lbnaːn aːld͡ʒmjʕ jtħdθ lʁaan waːħdaan kjf ʕlmti ðlk wmaː jʔumn ʔakθrhm baːllh ʔilaː whm mʃrkwn ljs sjʔiaːan hl nsttˤjʕ ʔan nðhb wlqd ʔarslnaː mn qblk fj ʃjʕ aːlʔawljn lajsa aːlʁabijju bisajjidin fij qawmihi lakinna sajjida qawmihi aːlmutaʁaaːbij waqaaːla ʔaabuw aːlʕataaːhijaai lsʕjhaː raʶːdˤjaʶ nrjd d͡ʒmlaː mktmla wnwħaː ʔið naːdaː mn qbl faːstd͡ʒbnaː lh fnd͡ʒjnaːh wʔahlh mn aːlkrb aʶːlʕðˤjm waʶjaʶftˤiʶnuʶ liljasijri min maaːlihi ʔin wahaaː waaːχtalla mn ðaː aːlðj jqrdˤ aːllh qrdˤaʶː ħsnaː fjdˤaʶːʕfh lh wlh ʔad͡ʒr krjm aːlχbz d͡ʒaːf waːlmaːʔ baːrd waqaaːruwna wafirʕawna wahaaːmaaːna walaqad d͡ʒaaːʔahum muwsaaː biaːlbajjinaaːti faaːstakbaruwaː fij aʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤiʶ wamaaː kaaːnuwaː saaːbiqijna haʔuulaaːʔi zuhhaaːdun aːstʕml hðaː aʶːlsˤndwq aːlχʃbj kkrsj mn fdˤlk namuwtu wanaħjaaː ʕalaaː ʕahdihaaː ħajaaːaa aːlkiraaːmi wamawta aʶːlʕiʶðˤaʶaʶːm qaaːla jaaː qawmi lajsa bij dˤaʶlaʶaʶːlaʶaʶuʶn walakinnij rasuwlun min rabbi aːlʕaaːlamijna wakaðalika ħaqqat kalimatu rabbika ʕalaaː aːllaðijna kafaruwaː ʔaannahum ʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶaʶːbuʶ aːlnnaaːri waʶsˤaʶaʶːħiʶbaʶtiʶhiʶ wabanijhi hl tʕrf maː aːðaː kaːn jmkn ʔan jʔatj aːljnaː ʁdaːan lwlaː jnhaːhm aːlrbaːnjwn waːlʔaħbaːr ʕn qwlhm aːlʔiθm wʔaklhm aːlsħt lbʔis maː kaːnwaː jsˤnʕwn bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm tbt jdaː ʔabj lhb wtb aʶːlsˤwraʶ tuʁnij ʕn ʔalf klma ʔabj laː jqrʔa ktaːbaːan aːlʔaːn hl tʕrf sfjna nwħ aːllh jsˤtˤfj mn aːlmlaːʔika rslaː wmn aːlnaːs ʔin aːllh smjʕ bsˤjr hl ʃkrthu hl qlt ʃkraːan lk tʕaːlj bʕd ʁd fajakuffu ʕan aːliaːzdijaaːdi fjhmaː mn kl faːkha zwd͡ʒaːn waqad ʔaaʕðara nabijju aːlllahi luʶwtˤuʶn ʕalajhi aːlssalaaːmu nafsahu ħijna ʕadima ʕaʃijraaan taʶnsˤuʶruʶhuʶ wtðrwn maː χlq lkm rbkm mn ʔazwaːd͡ʒkm bl ʔantm qwm ʕaːdwn liʔaanna aʶːlttaʶwaʶaʶːdˤuʶʕaʶ ʕaʶtˤuʶwfuʶn waaːlʕud͡ʒba munaffirun mrd͡ʒ aːlbħrjn jltqjaːn qd jkwn hðaː ʔalð ʕsˤjr ʃrbth fj ħjaːtj qaːlwaː ʔard͡ʒh wʔaχaːh wʔarsl fj aːlmdaːʔin ħaːʃrjn ʁajra muqallilin walaaː sanafruʁu lakum ʔaajjuhaaː aːlθθaqalaːni qaaːla faaːχrud͡ʒ minhaaː faʔiinnaka rad͡ʒijmun waʔiið jaquwlu aːlmunaaːfiquwna waaːllaðijna fij quluwbihim maʶraʶdˤuʶn maaː waʕadanaaː aːlllahu warasuwluhu ʔiillaaː ʁuruwranaː ʔin sʕjkm lʃtaː ʔanaː sʕjd flstˤjn daːrj wdrb aʶːntsˤaʶːrj flstˤjn θaːrj wʔaʶrdˤ aʶːlsˤmwd snʕrf kjf nsˤlħ hðaː btˤrjqaʶ ʔaw bʔaχraː waθamuwdu waqawmu luʶwtˤiʶn waʶʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶaʶːbuʶ aːlʔaajkaai ʔauwlaʔiika aːlʔaaħzaaːbu wlmaː faqul ʔaanðartukum sˤaʶaʶːʕiʶqaʶaʶaʶn miθla sˤaʶaʶːʕiʶqaʶaʶiʶ ʕaaːdin waθamuwda ðwaːtaː ʔafnaːn fkðbwh fʔaχðthm aːlrd͡ʒfa fʔaʶsˤbħwaʶː fj daːrhm d͡ʒaːθmjn walaqad nad͡ʒd͡ʒajnaaː banij ʔiisraaːʔiijla mmina aːlʔaːχirijna wamarra baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlzzuhaaːdi bibaaːbi malikin faqaaːla waːlðjn kðbwaː bʔaːjaːtnaː jmshm aːlʕðaːb bmaː kaːnwaː jfsqwn aːnh lmn aːlmhm d͡ʒdaːan aʶːlħsˤwl ʕlaː kfaːja mn aːlraːħa fmaːl aːlðjn kfrwaː qblk mhtˤʕjn waqamaʕa ʃarrahu laː jʕjrwnnj aːntbaːhanaː waʔiin jurijduwaː χijaaːnataka faqad χaaːnuwaː aːlllaha min qablu faʔaamkana minhum waaːlllahu ʕalijmun ħakijmun aːʕlmwaː ʔan aːllh jħjj aʶːlʔaʶrdˤ bʕd mwthaː qd bjnaː lkm aːlʔaːjaːt lʕlkm tʕqlwn ʔaʕml fj msˤnʕ ʔanaː ʔajsr lqd χdʕthu jbdw mslmaː aːllaðijna ʔaːmanuwaː waʕamiluwaː aʶːlsˤsˤaʶaʶːliʶħaʶaʶːtiʶ tˤuʶwbaʶaʶː lahum waħusnu maʔaːbin bismi aːlllahi aːlrraħmani aːlrraħijmi waʶaʶːltˤtˤuʶwriʶ waʔaajsaru tabaððulanaː hl tʕlm ʔaj ktaːb trjd ʔan tqrʔah waqaaːla labijdun wd͡ʒʕlwaː llh ʔandaːdaː ljdˤlwaʶː ʕn sbjlh aːlrrusula ʔaaʁraqnaaːhum wad͡ʒaʕalnaaːhum lilnnaaːsi ʔaːjaaan waʔaaʕtadnaaː liʶlðˤðˤaʶaʶːliʶmiʶjnaʶ ʕaðaaːbanaː ʔaalijmanaː fʔarslnaː ʕljhm aʶːltˤwfaʶːn waːld͡ʒraːd waːlqml waʶːldˤfaʶːdʕ waːldm ʔaːjaːt mfsˤlaʶːt faːstkbrwaː wkaːnwaː qwmaː md͡ʒrmjn qul maaː ʔaasʔaalukum ʕalajhi min ʔaad͡ʒrin wamaaː ʔaanaaː mina aːlmutakallifijna waaːllaðijna saʕawaː fij ʔaːjaaːtinaaː muʕaaːd͡ʒizijna ʔauwlaʔiika lahum ʕaðaaːbun min rid͡ʒzin ʔaalijmun jaː ʔabt laː tʕbd aʶːlʃjtˤaʶːn ʔin aʶːlʃjtˤaʶːn kaːn llrħmn ʕsˤjaʶː kbr mqtaː ʕnd aːllh ʔan tqwlwaː maː laː tfʕlwn ʔaħtaːd͡ʒ ʔilaː aːltrkjz wahuwa maʃkuwrun fij maʕuwnatihi aːlkðb ħblh qsˤjr dmd͡ʒ fkrtjn fj fkra waʔiiðaaː buʃʃira ʔaaħaduhum bimaaː dˤaʶraʶbaʶ lilrraħmani maθalanaː ðˤaʶllaʶ wad͡ʒhuhu muswaddanaː wahuwa kaʶðˤiʶjmuʶn aːnhaː raːʔiħa sjʔia qbl ʔan tktb ʃjʔianaː jnbʁj ʔan ttʔakd mn aːlħqaːʔiq faʔiinna man nafaða ʔaamruhu fahuwa ʔilaaː aːlʕilmi ʔaaħwad͡ʒu faaːd͡ʒtabaaːhu rabbuhu fad͡ʒaʕalahu mina aʶːlsˤsˤaʶaʶːliʶħiʶjnaʶ aːllaðijna juqijmuwna aʶːlsˤsˤaʶlaʶaʶːaʶaʶ wajuʔutuwna aːlzzakaaːaa wahum biaːlʔaːχiraai hum juwqinuwna aːljawma naχtimu ʕalaaː ʔaafwaaːhihim watukallimunaaː ʔaajdijhim wataʃhadu ʔaard͡ʒuluhum bimaaː kaaːnuwaː jaksibuwna wamaaː ʔaːtajnaaːhum min kutubin jadrusuwnahaaː wamaaː ʔaarsalnaaː ʔiilajhim qablaka min naðijrin wmn aʶːlʃjaʶːtˤjn mn jʁwsˤwn lh wjʕmlwn ʕmlaː dwn ðlk wknaː lhm ħaʶːfðˤjn ʔaajuʃrikuwna maaː laaː jaχluqu ʃajʔianaː wahum juχlaquwna ðalika lijaʕlama ʔaannij lam ʔaaχunhu biaːlʁajbi waʔaanna aːlllaha laaː jahdij kajda aːlχaaːʔiinijna waʶaʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤiʶ ðaaːti aʶːlsˤsˤaʶdʕiʶ walaaː janbaʁij ʔaan jad͡ʒhala min nafsihi mablaʁa ʕilmihaaː waʔaanzalnaaː mina aʶːlmuʶʕsˤiʶraʶaʶːtiʶ maaːʔan θad͡ʒd͡ʒaaːd͡ʒanaː qaaːlat ʔaannaaː jakuwnu lij ʁulaaːmun walam jamsasnij baʃarun walam ʔaaku baʁijjanaː wʔimaː jnzʁnk mn aʶːlʃjtˤaʶːn nzʁ faːstʕð baːllh ʔinh hw aːlsmjʕ aːlʕljm faqulnaaː aʶːdˤriʶbuʶwhuʶ biʶbaʶʕdˤiʶhaʶaʶː kaðalika juħjij aːlllahu aːlmawtaaː wajurijkum ʔaːjaaːtihi laʕallakum taʕqiluwna aːlʃbaːb aːlʔamd͡ʒdu falammaaː aːʕtazalahum wamaaː jaʕbuduwna min duwni aːlllahi wahabnaaː lahu ʔiisħaaːqa wajaʕquwba wakullanaː d͡ʒaʕalnaaː nabijjanaː ʔaj hðh aʶːlqtˤtˤ qtˤk lqd ʔiʶstjqðˤtuʶ mtʔaχraan aːljwm ʔinna aːlʕud͡ʒba lajaʔakulu aːlħasanaaːti kamaaː taʔakulu aːlnnaaːru aʶːlħaʶtˤaʶbaʶ qaaːla faman rabbukumaaː jaaː muwsaaː lʔantm ʔaʃd rhba fj sˤdwrhm mn aːllh ðlk bʔanhm qwm laː jfqhwn waqaaːla ʕabdu aːlllahi bnu aːlmuʕtazzi ʔiχwaaːnu aːlʃʃari kaʃad͡ʒari aːlnnaaːrind͡ʒi juħriqu baʶʕdˤuʶhaʶaʶː baʶʕdˤaʶnaʶː laqad d͡ʒaaːʔakum rasuwlun min ʔaanfusikum ʕazijzun ʕalajhi maaː ʕanittum ħaʶriʶjsˤuʶn ʕalajkum biaːlmuʔuminijna raʔuwfun raħijmun mtaː aʶːstjqðˤt hðaː aʶːlsˤbaʶːħ qaaːluwaː waʔaaqbaluwaː ʕalajhim maaːðaaː tafqiduwna ðlk bʔanhm ʃaːqwaː aːllh wrswlh wmn jʃaːqq aːllh wrswlh fʔin aːllh ʃdjd aːlʕqaːb lijad͡ʒzija aːllaðijna ʔaːmanuwaː waʕamiluwaː aʶːlsˤsˤaʶaʶːliʶħaʶaʶːtiʶ ʔauwlaʔiika lahum maʁfiraaun warizqun karijmun ħqqt ħlm aːlʔama ʔam lhm ʔilh ʁjr aːllh sbħaːn aːllh ʕmaː jʃrkwn hl jmknnj ʔan ʔaːkl hðaː d͡ʒaːʔt aːʔilaː aːljaːbaːn ʕndmaː kaːnt sˤʁjraʶ wʔiðaː ʕlm mn ʔaːjaːtnaː ʃjʔiaː aːtχðhaː hzwaː ʔawlʔik lhm ʕðaːb mhjn kaːn saːmj jlʕb kra aːlqdm lmaːðaː jsˤʕd hʔulaːʔ aːlnaːs ʕlaː aːlsqf ʔiin juwħaaː ʔiilajja ʔiillaaː ʔaannamaaː ʔaanaaː naðijrun mubijnun hw trknj ʔaðhb lqd ʔiltqjnaː ʕlaː aːlmmr qaːl twm ʔinh kaːn skraːn ħjwaːnaːt aːlbaːndaː aʶːldˤχmaʶ tʕjʃ fj aʶːlsˤjn fqtˤ waaːllaðijna jaʶsˤiʶluʶwnaʶ maaː ʔaamara aːlllahu bihi ʔaan juʶwsˤaʶlaʶ wajaχʃawna rabbahum wajaχaaːfuwna suwʔa aːlħisaaːbi ʔaʕrf aːlħq tʕrf ʔahlh waʔaanfaqa min faʶdˤliʶn wadduwaː law tudhinu fajudhinuwna waːlðjn hm ʕn aːllʁw mʕrdˤwn mlk aːlnaːs maː tsbq mn ʔama ʔad͡ʒlhaː wmaː jstʔaχrwn waʶaʶːχfiʶdˤ d͡ʒanaaːħaka limani aːttabaʕaka mina aːlmuʔuminijna laaː jakun ħubbuk kalafanaː sjkwn qaːdraː ʕlaː ʔimdaːdnaː bmʕlwmaːt ʔakθr ʕn nʃʔaa aːlkwn wʔakjd kjdaː wʔiðaː ʔalqwaː mnhaː mkaːnaː dˤjqaʶː mqrnjn dʕwaː hnaːlk θbwraː ʔiin kullu nafsin lammaaː ʕalajhaaː ħaʶaʶːfiʶðˤuʶn hðaː hw aːlmkaːn aːlðj tʕjʃ fjh ʔiðaaː qaʕadt bismi aːlllahi aːlrraħmani aːlrraħijmi ʔaaraʔaajta aːllaðij jukaððibu biaːlddijni jamħuw aːlllahu maaː jaʃaaːʔu wajuθbitu waʕindahu ʔaummu aːlkitaaːbi aːllʁa aːlʕrbjja lʁaun d͡ʒmjlaaun ʔajhmaː d͡ʒaːʔ ʔawlaːan aːldd͡ʒaːd͡ʒa ʔam aʶːlbjdˤaʶ bdaː aːltʕb ʕlaː naːnsj kl maː ʕljk fʕlh hw ʔiχbaːr twm bʔan jʁaːdr sajaððakaru man jaχʃaaːaː ʔiinna aːlllaha judaaːfiʕu ʕani aːllaðijna ʔaːmanuwaː ʔiinna aːlllaha laaː juħibbu kulla χawwaaːnin kafuwrin aːllh ʔakbr waaːlrraʔiijsi maʕa sˤaʶħaʶaʶːbaʶtiʶhiʶ ql mn jklʔukm baːlljl waːlnhaːr mn aːlrħmn bl hm ʕn ðkr rbhm mʕrdˤwn lm ʔard aːstʕmaːl aːlhaːtf ʔaalam ʔaaʕhad ʔiilajkum jaaː banij ʔaːdama ʔaan laaː taʕbuduwaː aʶːlʃʃaʶjtˤaʶaʶːnaʶ ʔiinnahu lakum ʕaduwwun mubijnun raːʔiħa hðaː aːllħm fðˤjʕaʶ quʶtˤuʶwfuʶhaʶaʶː daaːnijaaun sˤdjqtj hnaː aːsmj ljs fj aːlqaːʔima tuks hw tˤaʶːʔiʶr mn ʔantaːrktjkaː lm jkn twm d͡ʒaːʔiʕaː ħqaː aːlʃtj aːktr fsˤl bħbh mn tntðˤr waʔiin tadʕuwhum ʔiilaaː aːlhudaaː laaː jasmaʕuwaː wataraaːhum jaʶnðˤuʶruʶwnaʶ ʔiilajka wahum laaː juʶbsˤiʶruʶwnaʶ jasmaʕu ʔaːjaaːti aːlllahi tutlaaː ʕalajhi θumma juʶsˤiʶrruʶ mustakbiranaː kaʔaan lam jasmaʕhaaː fabaʃʃirhu biʕaðaaːbin ʔaalijmin maaː lakum laaː tard͡ʒuwna lillahi waqaaːranaː ʔaalam tara ʔiilaaː aːllaðijna ʔauwtuwaː naʶsˤiʶjbaʶnaʶː mina aːlkitaaːbi jaʃtaruwna aʶːldˤdˤaʶlaʶaʶːlaʶaʶaʶ wajurijduwna ʔaan taʶdˤiʶlluʶwaʶː aːlssabijla nħn mtˤjʕwn lhm ʕðaːb fj aːlħjaːa aːldnjaː wlʕðaːb aːlʔaːχra ʔaʃq wmaː lhm mn aːllh mn waːq hl ʔanaː fuzt θumma ʔiinnakum jawma aːlqijaaːmaai ʕinda rabbikum taʶχtaʶsˤiʶmuʶwnaʶ hl aːld͡ʒw ħaːr fj aːlχaːrd͡ʒ kaːn waʶːdˤħaʶː ʔan twm rd͡ʒl ʁnj trjd aːlmʃaːrka fj ttˤwjr tqnjaːt ðkaːʔ aʶːsˤtˤnaʶːʕj llʁa aːlʕrbja w aːn lm tkn mχtsˤaʶː fj blaːd aːltwaːrq jʃrb aːlnaːs ħljb aːlnaːqa ʃʕrt baːlʔasf td͡ʒaːh ðlk aʶːltˤfl ʔaftmaːrwnh ʕlaː maː jraː faraaːʁa ʔiilaaː ʔaahlihi fad͡ʒaaːʔa biʕid͡ʒlin samijnin aːlhattu aːlkasru waaːlbattu aʶːlqaʶtˤʕuʶ fswf jdʕw θbwraː ln jsˤbkm ʔaħd baːlʔaðaː aːljammi faʶaʶːnðˤuʶr kajfa kaaːna ʕaaːqibaau aʶːlðˤðˤaʶaʶːliʶmiʶjnaʶ waqaaːla baʃʃaaːru bnu burdin aːrtdaː aʶːlʔaʶtˤbaʶːʔ ʔaqnʕa bjdˤaʶːʔ tʁtˤj ʔafwaːhhm w ʔanwfhm ʔanaː mtħkm fj nfsj kj laː ʔafqd sˤwaʶːbj jmjl aʶːlʔaʶʃχaʶːsˤ aːlʔanaːnjjjn ʔilaː aːttχaːð ʔaːraːʔ θaːba ħttaː w ʔin lm tkn sˤħjħaʶ jʃhdh aːlmqrbwn fʔamaː mn tˤʁaʶː ltrwn aːld͡ʒħjm ʔanaː mn ʔisbaːnjaː qaaːluwaː tˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶruʶkuʶm maʕakum ʔaaʔiin ðukkirtum bal ʔaantum qawmun musrifuwna fʔaːtaːhm aːllh θwaːb aːldnjaː wħsn θwaːb aːlʔaːχra waːllh jħb aːlmħsnjn faʶaʶːsˤbiʶr ʔiinna waʕda aːlllahi ħaqqun faʔiimmaaː nurijannaka baʶʕdˤaʶ aːllaðij naʕiduhum ʔaaw natawaffajanaka faʔiilajnaaː jurd͡ʒaʕuwna laː ʔaħd ʔaʕrfhu jktb χiʶtˤaʶːbaʶːt bʕd aːlʔaːn θumma ʔiinna lahum ʕalajhaaː laʃawbanaː min ħamijmin maaː χalqukum walaaː baʕθukum ʔiillaaː kanafsin waaːħidaain ʔiinna aːlllaha samijʕun baʶsˤiʶjruʶn tmjl mʃklaːt jwmnaː aːlaːd͡ʒtmaːʕja ʔilaː aːltʕqjd ʔakθr fʔakθr waːlχjl waːlbʁaːl waːlħmjr ltrkbwhaː wzjna wjχlq maː laː tʕlmwn hal ʔaunabbiʔiukum ʕalaaː man tanazzalu aʶːlʃʃaʶjaʶaʶːtˤiʶjnuʶ ʕwjl aːlðʔiaːb kaaːlmuhli jaʁlij fij aʶːlbuʶtˤuʶwniʶ ðrhm jʔaklwaː wjtmtʕwaː wjlhhm aːlʔaml fswf jʕlmwn laː tʃʁlnj ʕn ʕmlj mn fdˤlk kun χlaːqaːan hl ʔanti bχjr aːlʔaːn waʔaanʃada aːlrrijaaːʃiju ʔanaː ʔaʶʕaʶːrdˤ ðlk bʃda wʔanaː lmsnaː aːlsmaːʔ fwd͡ʒdnaːhaː mlʔit ħrsaː ʃdjdaː wʃhbaː tuwfjt ʔaχtj aːlʕaːm aʶːlmaʶːdˤj ʕaːm d͡ʒdjd sʕjd ʕan ʔammi aːlmuʔuminjna ʔammi ʕbdi aːllhi ʕaːʔiʃaa raʶdˤiʶj aːllhu ʕanhaaː qaːlat lqd kaːn jstħq aːlʕnaːʔ jawma tublaaː aːlssaraaːʔiiru jmnj aːlsʕjda mnjtj aːllħm mtˤbwχ waqaaːla ʃajχun min banij sulajmin liaːbnihi jaaː bunajja ʔijjaaːka waaːlrraquwba aʶːlʁaʶdˤuʶwbaʶ aʶːlqaʶtˤuʶwbaʶ aʶːldˤħk blaː sbb mn qla aːlʔadb fj aːlbraːjaː sjdaː ʕmr aːlsjda ʔarbʕwn ʕaːmanaː ʕlaː aːlʔard͡ʒħ aʶːltˤrjq nħw aːlħrja mzaːl tˤwjl fqtˤ ʔaʶdˤf aːlmaːʔ fʔinmaː hj zd͡ʒra waːħda fʔiðaː hm jnðˤrwn fʔarsl frʕwn fj aːlmdaːʔin ħaːʃrjn wdaːnja ʕljhm ðˤlaʶːlhaʶː wðllt qtˤwfhaʶː tðljlaː maaː taʶsˤiʶjruʶ bihi aːlnniʕmaau ʁaraaːmanaː waaːlzzaʕaaːmaau malaaːmanaː ʔataː aːlsjd braːwn ljraːk fwd͡ʒd ʔank ʁjr mwd͡ʒwd faʶsˤaʶaʶːraʶt aʶːlwaʶsˤlaʶaʶuʶ furqaaan waaːlʔaulfaau ʕadaaːwaaan waaːlbaħri aːlmasd͡ʒuwri sna aːllh aːltj qd χlt mn qbl wln td͡ʒd lsna aːllh tbdjlaː maːðaː jnbʁj ʔan jfʕlh fj rʔajkn ðalika bimaaː qaddamat ʔaajdijkum waʔaanna aːlllaha lajsa biʶðˤaʶllaʶaʶːmiʶn lilʕabijdi waʔaammaaː aʶːltˤtˤaʶwaʶaʶːriʶʔiʶuʶ fanawʕaaːni ʔaaħaduhumaaː ʃubhaaun taʶʕtaʶriʶdˤuʶ aːlmaʕnaaː fatamnaʕu ʕan faʔiiðaaː kaaːna ʔaːlifanaː maʔaluwfanaː aʶːntaʶsˤaʶraʶ biaːlʔaulfaai ʕalaaː ʔaaʕaaːdijhi maː rʔajk baːlðhaːb lmʃaːhda flm wamaaː taʃaaːʔuuwna ʔiilaːaːa ʔaan jaʃaaːʔ aːlllahu rabbu aːlʕaaːlamijna ldju ʔibna mtzwd͡ʒh mn rd͡ʒl frnsj ʔasʕd χtˤaʶːbuʶ aːlrʔijs aːlðj ʔalqaːh ʔams ʔaʶnsˤaʶːrh waʔaannaaː jabχaluwna wajaʔamuruwna aːlnnaaːsa biaːlbuχli waman jatawalla faʔiinna aːlllaha huwa aːlʁanijju aːlħamijdu jaː ʔajhaː aːlnaːs qd d͡ʒaːʔkm brhaːn mn rbkm wʔanzlnaː ʔiljkm nwraː mbjnaː aːlʃʃaaːrida wajaqbal aːlʕaaːʔiida waʶjaʶħfaʶðˤ aːlmustawdaʕa faqada aːlmawd͡ʒuwda walam jad͡ʒid aːlmafquwda fʔamaː aːlðjn ʃqwaː ffj aːlnaːr lhm fjhaː zfjr wʃhjq wʔin jrwaː ksfaː mn aːlsmaːʔ saʶːqtˤaʶː jqwlwaː sħaːb mrkwm bʁja aːlaːχtbaːʔ mn aʶːlʃrtˤaʶ qdˤaʶː djmaː aːlljla fj sla qmaːma naħnu χalaqnaaːhum waʃadadnaaː ʔaasrahum waʔiiðaaː ʃiʔinaaː baddalnaaː ʔaamθaaːlahum tabdijlanaː falajsa limiθlihi fij aːlʔiiχaaːʔi ħaʶðˤðˤuʶn walaaː fij aːlwidaaːdi naʶsˤiʶjbuʶn maːðaː jrjd ʔan jfʕl faaːʕrif manzilatak min aːlllahi taʕaaːlaaː bimanzilatik min aːlnnaaːsi θm jʔatj mn bʕd ðlk ʕaːm fjh jʁaːθ aːlnaːs wfjh jʕsˤrwn waʔiinna kullanaː lammaaː lajuwaffijanahum rabbuka ʔaaʕmaaːlahum ʔiinnahu bimaaː jaʕmaluwna χabijrun jawma taʃaqqaqu aʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤuʶ ʕanhum siraaːʕanaː ðalika ħaʃrun ʕalajnaaː jasijrun ʔiinnaaː kaðalika nad͡ʒzij aːlmuħsinijna ljs mʔuχraː tslm ʔijdk walaʔiin muttum ʔaaw qutiltum laʔiilaaː aːlllahi tuħʃaruwna ʔard͡ʒwk dʕnj ʔaːχð ʔaχtk mn aʶːlmħtˤaʶ maaː samiʕnaaː bihaðaaː fij aːlmillaai aːlʔaːχiraai ʔiin haðaaː ʔiillaaː aːχtilaaːqun wdˤʕt aːlsmaːʕa qrjbaː mn ʔaðnj mtʃrf bmʕrftk laː ʔaħd ʔaʕrfhu jrtdj rbtˤaʶ aːlʕunuq bʕd aːlʔaːn wjwm jʕdˤ aʶːlðˤaʶːlm ʕlaː jdjh jqwl jaː ljtnj aːtχðt mʕ aːlrswl sbjlaː hw ʔaχj wlaː tˤʕaʶːm ʔilaː mn ʁsljn ʔanaː laː ʔaʶsˤdqk ʔant tkðb daːʔimaːan laː jftr ʕnhm whm fjh mblswn wʔaːt ðaː aːlqrbaː ħqh waːlmskjn waːbn aːlsbjl wlaː tbðr tbðjraː waʔiiðaaː aːlbiħaaːru fud͡ʒd͡ʒirat ʔaaqimi aʶːlsˤsˤaʶlaʶaʶːaʶaʶ liduluwki aːlʃʃamsi ʔiilaaː ʁasaqi aːlllajli waqurʔaːna aːlfad͡ʒri ʔiinna qurʔaːna aːlfad͡ʒri kaaːna maʃhuwdanaː ʔawlʔik mʔawaːhm aːlnaːr bmaː qaaːluwaː taaːlllahi laqad ʕalimtum maaː d͡ʒiʔinaaː linufsida fij aʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤiʶ wamaaː kunnaaː saaːriqijna aːlʔaːn bʔimkaːn aːlʃrka ʔan tbrr hðh aʶːlmsˤaʶːrjf wtlk aːlqraː ʔahlknaːhm lmaː ðˤlmwaʶː wd͡ʒʕlnaː lmhlkhm mwʕdaː qaːm aʶːlmtðˤaʶːhrwn bdˤrb aːlʕdjd mn rd͡ʒaːl aʶːlʃrtˤaʶ ħtaː aːlmwt tħqq md͡ʒddaːan hl ldjk ʔaj mʃkla fj ðlk famaaː lahum laaː juʔuminuwna trjd ljlaː ʔan tʕjʃ mʕ saːmj kzwd͡ʒth twm fj aːd͡ʒtmaːʕ mʕ zbwn qaːla rswlu aːllhi sˤaʶllaʶaʶː aːllhu ʕalajhi wasallama walaaː jatad͡ʒaaːwaza bihaaː qadra ħaqqihaaː hðaː jʕd͡ʒbnj kθjraː walajsa haðaaː aːlqawlu minhu tarʁijbanaː linabijjihi sˤaʶllaʶaʶː aːlllahu ʕalajhi wasallama fijhaaː kl maː ʕljk fʕlh hw ʔan tsmʕ bʕnaːja waːldtj laː ttħdθ aːlʔind͡ʒljzja bʃkl d͡ʒjd d͡ʒdaːan kn ljnaːan mn ʁjr dˤʕf wʃdjdaːan mn ʁjr ʕnf ʔant twaːʕdjn tˤaʶːlbaʶnaʶː mn kjʔiw ʔalst kðlk hðh tbdw kaːljwnaːnja lj lkn w baːlnsba llnaʶːtˤqjn blʁa aːlʔisbraːntw fhðh tbdw klʁa aːlfwlaːbwk lajsa min aːlrraʁbaai fij aːlddunjaaː aːktisaaːbu maaː jaʶsˤuʶwnaʶ aʶːlʕiʶrdˤaʶ fijhaaː wlʔin msthm nfħa mn ʕðaːb rbk ljqwln jaː wjlnaː ʔinaː knaː ðˤaʶːlmjn ʔinh lqwl fsˤl walaqad sˤaʶrraʶfnaʶaʶː fij haðaaː aːlqurʔaːni lijaððakaruwaː wamaaː jazijduhum ʔiillaaː nufuwranaː tsttˤjʕ aːlbħθ ʕn aːld͡ʒml aːltj tħtwj ʕlaː klma mʕjna waʶːlħsˤwl ʕlaː trd͡ʒmaːt ltlk aːld͡ʒml faʔaarsalnaaː ʕalajhimu aʶːltˤtˤuʶwfaʶaʶːnaʶ waaːld͡ʒaraaːda waaːlqummala waʶaʶːldˤdˤaʶfaʶaʶːdiʶʕaʶ waaːlddama ʔaːjaaːtin muʶfaʶsˤsˤaʶlaʶaʶːtiʶn faaːstakbaruwaː wakaaːnuwaː qawmanaː mud͡ʒrimijna hðaː aːlqraːr nhaːʔij hl tqsˤdjnj ʃarru aːlkitaaːbaai aːlʃʃabaqu kamaaː ʔaanna ʃarra aːlqiraaːʔaai aːlhaðramaau ʔin aːllh jʕlm ʁjb aːlsmaːwaːt waʶːlʔaʶrdˤ waːllh bsˤjr bmaː tʕmlwn ðaːk aːlkrsj aʶːlmfdˤl ldj laː ʃjʔ jʃtʁl ʔaʶʕtˤjhaʶː frsˤaʶ ʔaχraː ʕn ʔamjri aːlmʔumnjna ʔabj ħfsˤiʶn ʕmra bni aʶːlχtˤtˤaʶaʶːbiʶ raʶdˤiʶj aːllhu ʕanhu qaːl waʔiin jarawaː ʔaːjaaan juʶʕriʶdˤuʶwaʶː wajaquwluwaː siħrun mmustamirun ʔilaː frʕwn wmlʔih faːtbʕwaː ʔamr frʕwn wmaː ʔamr frʕwn brʃjd waːlðjn d͡ʒaːhdwaː fjnaː lnhdjnhm sblnaː wʔin aːllh lmʕ aːlmħsnjn hw laː jsttˤjʕ ʔan jtklm ħtaː aːlʔind͡ʒljzja naːhjk ʕn aːlʔalmaːnja kðb ʕljnaː kwnwaː mtsaːmħjn liʶʔiʶiʶʕtˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶnaʶaʶː aːlħaqqa min ʔaanfusinaaː aʶːntˤlqaʶ mn tˤwkjw ʔilaː ʔawzaːkaː ʕaːdaan ʔaj mntdjaːt aːlnqaːʃ aːltj jstχdmhaː aːlfrnsjwn llħdjθ ʕn aːlsjaːsa waːlʔaumwr aːlmmaːθla wd͡ʒwh jwmʔið naːʕma ʕnd aːlʔiʃaːra tkwn aːlsaːʕa aːlwaːħda sˤbaʶːħaʶːaʶn wθmaːnin wχmsjn dqjqja wʔarbʕjn θaːnja ʔanaː msrwr lwd͡ʒwdk hnaː mʕj waraʔaaaː aːlmud͡ʒrimuwna aːlnnaaːra faʶðˤaʶnnuʶwaʶː ʔaannahum muwaaːqiʕuwhaaː walam jad͡ʒiduwaː ʕanhaaː maʶsˤriʶfaʶnaʶː waːlðjn laː jʃhdwn aːlzwr wʔiðaː mrwaː baːllʁw mrwaː kraːmaː wamaaː bikum min niʕmaain famina aːlllahi θumma ʔiiðaaː massakumu aʶːldˤdˤuʶruʶ faʔiilajhi tad͡ʒʔaaruwna wjaː qwm aʶːlʃjtˤaʶːn fkaːn mn aːlʁaːwjn wmaː wd͡ʒdnaː lʔakθrhm mn ʕhd wʔin wd͡ʒdnaː ʔakθrhm lfaːsqjn hl jwd͡ʒd ʃjʔ juzʕid͡ʒak wajawma naħʃuru min kulli ʔaummaain fawd͡ʒanaː mimman jukaððibu biʔaːjaaːtinaaː fahum juwzaʕuwna d͡ʒjd ʔan tkwn hnaː bismi aːlllahi aːlrraħmani aːlrraħijmi waʶaʶːlʕaʶsˤriʶ ðlk ʔamr aːllh ʔanzlh ʔiljkm wmn jtq aːllh jkfr ʕnh sjʔiaːth wjʕðˤm lh ʔad͡ʒraː wbdmʕai aːlʁjmai ʔaħbbtk ʕsaː ʔan jhdjnj rbj lʔaqrb mn hðaː rʃdanaː waqijla liχaaːlidi bni sˤaʶfwaʶaʶːnaʶ waaːlθθaaːliθu aːlððakaaːʔu aːllaðij jastaqirru bihi ħiʶfðˤuʶ maaː taʶsˤaʶwwaʶraʶhuʶ wafahmu maaː ʕalimahu waaːliaːstikθaaːra minhu taχallufanaː rbwʕu aːlʃʃʔaːmi brwd͡ʒu aːlʕalaː tuħaːkj aːlssmaːʔa bʕaːlj aːlsaanaː lahu maqaaːlijdu aːlssamaaːwaaːti waʶaʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤiʶ waaːllaðijna kafaruwaː biʔaːjaaːti ʕnq d͡ʒdjda qbl aːlwljma fmaː bkt ʕljhm aːlsmaːʔ waʶːlʔaʶrdˤ wmaː kaːnwaː mnðˤrjn waʶnaʶsˤaʶrnaʶaʶːhuʶ mina aːlqawmi aːllaðijna kaððabuwaː biʔaːjaaːtinaaː ʔiinnahum kaaːnuwaː qawma sawʔin faʔaaʁraqnaaːhum ʔaad͡ʒmaʕijna aːlknjsa bunjt fj aːlqrn aːlχaːms ʕʃr waaːstakbara huwa wad͡ʒunuwduhu fij aʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤiʶ biʁajri aːlħaqqi waʶðˤaʶnnuʶwaʶː ʔaannahum ʔiilajnaaː laaː jurd͡ʒaʕuwna laː td͡ʒʕl mʕ aːllh ʔilhaː ʔaːχr ftqʕd mðmwmaː mχðwlaː wʕlmnaːh sˤnʕaʶ lbws lkm ltħsˤnkm mn bʔaskm fhl ʔantm ʃaːkrwn kaðalika juʔufaku aːllaðijna kaaːnuwaː biʔaːjaaːti aːlllahi jad͡ʒħaduwna hl ʔistlmta aːlrsaːla aːltj ʔarslthaː lka baːlʔams ʔaħb ʕjd aːlhaːlwjn ʔanaː ʔaqrʔa d͡ʒrjdtjn jwmjaːan ħtaː zrtm aːlmqaːbr kaðalika aːlʕaðaaːbu walaʕaðaaːbu aːlʔaːχiraai ʔaakbaru law kaaːnuwaː jaʕlamuwna aːnhi kalimatu rabbika ʕalaaː aːllaðijna fasaquwaː ʔaannahum laaː juʔuminuwna jaaː wajlataaː lajtanij lam ʔaattaχið fulaaːnanaː χalijlanaː lm ʔar ʔaħdaː mθlhaː qblaː hlaːaː naːwltnj aːlmaːʔ mn fdˤlk ʔanta mminhum ʔaan judχala d͡ʒannaaa naʕijmin laː jhmnj ʔajhm aːχtrt ldj ʔaχwaːn maaː kaaːna ʔiibraaːhijmu jahuwdijjanaː walaaː naʶsˤraʶaʶːniʶjjaʶnaʶː walakin kaaːna ħanijfanaː muslimanaː wamaaː kaaːna mina aːlmuʃrikijna hl jʕjʃ mʕk lqd aːʕtaːd ʕlaː aʶːltˤqs aːlbaːrd bsrʕa ʔinhaː ʁaʶːdˤbaʶ mʕj qaaːluwaː ʔaawalam nanhaka ʕani aːlʕaaːlamijna fasawfa juħaaːsabu ħisaaːbanaː jasijranaː trd͡ʒmt hðh aːld͡ʒmla mrtjn aːdχlwhaː bslaːm ðlk jwm aːlχlwd wʔiðaː rʔajt θm rʔajt nʕjmaː wmlkaː kbjraː aːlʕlm jrfrf qaaːla qaaːʔiilun minhum ʔiinnij kaaːna lij qarijnun waʔiiðaaː buʃʃira ʔaaħaduhum biaːlʔaunθaaː ðˤaʶllaʶ wad͡ʒhuhu muswaddanaː wahuwa kaʶðˤiʶjmuʶn twm aːstqaːl nmtu d͡ʒjdaː aːlljla aʶːlmaʶːdˤjaʶ aʶːħfaʶðˤiʶ aːllha tad͡ʒidhu ʔaamaaːmaka taʕarraf ʔiilaaː aːllhi fij aːlrraχaaːʔi jaʕrifka fij aːlʃʃidaai ʔaχʃj ʔanhu ln jkwn shlaːan ʕlm aːlχjaːr aʶːlsˤħjħ ʕlm aːlħjwaːn wʕlm aːlʔinsaːn jtfq mʕ draːsa aːlħjaːa maːðaː knta stfʕlu lw knt ʔaʶsˤʁr bʕʃr snjn aːttħdθ aːlaːnd͡ʒljzja ttwjbaː mftwħ aʶːlmsˤdr sumjjtu ʕlaː ʕmj ʔinh ujtħdθ aːlbrbrja lmudrsahu traːd͡ʒʕ saːmj waʶtˤaʶaʶːʕaʶtuʶhuʶ fij χalqihi tabʕaθu ʕalaaː maħabbatihi hl tħbaːn bʕdˤkmaʶː kθjranaː flaː ʔaqsm baːlʃfq ʔahdtnj χaːltj ktaːbanaː fj ʕjd mjlaːd aːlmsjħ waʔaanna ʔiilaaː rabbika aːlmuntahaaː waʶːlʔaʶrdˤ mddnaːhaː wʔalqjnaː fjhaː rwaːsj wʔanbtnaː fjhaː mn kl zwd͡ʒ bhjd͡ʒ ʔanaː lw knt ʁnjaːan knt ʔawd ʔan ʔaʶʕtˤjkaʶ maːl waħasbuk ʔaan aːlllahu ʕalaaː quluwbihim wasamʕihim waʶʔaʶaʶbsˤaʶaʶːriʶhiʶm waʔauwlaʔiika humu aːlʁaaːfiluwna flnʁlq aːltlfaːz ʔiðaː kaːn ʔaħd jsttˤjʕ ʔan jsaːʕdnaː fhwa twm ʔanaː ʔaʕml fj blda baːlqrb mn rwmaː maaː laaː taʕlamuwna aːlʔaːn wbʕd ʔan tqaːʕdt ʔaʶsttˤjʕ aːlsfr klmaː ʃʔit qaːl twm aːnh aʶːsˤjb bmʁsˤ bʕd aːkl maː tˤbχth maːrj ʔaʃʕr bχjba ʔaml qfwnaː aːlrswl bnhd͡ʒ smaː ʔilaː sdra aːlmd͡ʒd fwq aːlsmaː ʔanaː aːlʕb aːlʔan kra aːlqdm wʔant maːðaː tfʕl fqaːl aːld͡ʒzaːr sʔaʶʕtˤjk lħmaːan kʔanh aːlzbd jd͡ʒb ʔan ʔaʶtˤjr linurijaka min ʔaːjaaːtinaaː aːlkubraaː bilisaaːnin ʕarabijjin mubijnin flst ʕnh btaːʔib ʔiinnaaː qad ʔauwħija ʔiilajnaaː ʔaanna aːlʕaðaaːba ʕalaaː man kaððaba watawallaaː ʔanaː ʔaʶtttˤlʕ lqdˤaʶːʔ wqt mʕ ʔausrtj tˤmʕ aːlʔinsaːn jhdd ħjaːa kθjr mn aːlʔanwaːʕ aːlħja wlh aːlħmd fj aːlsmaːwaːt waʶːlʔaʶrdˤ wʕʃjaː wħjn tðˤhrwn watudbiru ʔidbaaːra aːlhaaːribi snħmj ħmaːk wnħn fdaːk wnksw rbaːk blwn aːlʔaml faʔaammaaː aːlqaaːʕidaau aːlʔauwlaaː aːllatij hija nafsun muʶtˤiʶjʕaʶaʶuʶn tbdw maːrj d͡ʒmjla flwlaː ʔalqj ʕljh ʔaswra mn ðhb ʔaw d͡ʒaːʔ mʕh aːlmlaːʔika mqtrnjn aːlnhr wʔasʕ jblʁ mnnaːd sta ʕʃr sna χðwh faːʕtlwh ʔilaː swaːʔ aːld͡ʒħjm ʔiillaaː ʔiiblijsa ʔaabaaː ʔaan jakuwna maʕa aːlssaaːd͡ʒidijna wʔand͡ʒjnaː aːlðjn ʔaːmnwaː wkaːnwaː jtqwn aːlmuʔuminu ʔaːlifun maʔaluwfun ʔin lm jħsˤl aːlmrʔ ʕlaː maː jħb jħb aːlmrʔ maː ħsˤl ʕljh ʔaʶsˤbħnaʶː sˤdjqjn ʕlaː aːlfwr hl ldjk mwʕd θm qjl llðjn ðˤlmwaʶː ðwqwaː ʕðaːb aːlχld hl td͡ʒzwn ʔilaː bmaː kntm tksbwn ʔanta kjf ʕlmta ðlk haðaaː baʶsˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶruʶ lilnnaaːsi wahudanaː waraħmaaun liqawmin juwqinuwna wakaðalika nurij ʔiibraaːhijma malakuwta aːlssamaaːwaaːti waʶaʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤiʶ walijakuwna mina aːlmuwqinijna kaːn lh aːlwld aːsmh ʃjaːn waaːlllahu χalaqakum wamaaː taʕmaluwna ql ʔin kaːn llrħmn wld fʔanaː ʔawl aːlʕaːbdjn muttakiʔiijna fijhaaː ʕalaaː aːlʔaaraaːʔiiki laaː jarawna fijhaaː ʃamsanaː walaaː zamharijranaː aːd͡ʒls hnaːk maaː ʔaanta ʔiillaaː baʃarun miθlunaaː faʔati biʔaːjaain ʔiin kunta mina aʶːlsˤsˤaʶaʶːdiʶqiʶjnaʶ hl ʕndk ħsaːb fj ʔaj mwqʕ tʃbjk aːd͡ʒtmaːʕj fajaħtamilu taʕaba aːlddarsi lijudrika raaːħaaa aːlʕilmi wajanfij ʕanhu maʕarraaa aːld͡ʒahli hj laː tħb aːlθʕaːbjn w aʶːlrjaʶːdˤjaʶːt taraaː aːlʕaqla bihaðihi aːlmaθaaːbaai watanfiru min aːlʕuqalaaːʔi haðaaː aːlnnufuwra waqaaːluwaː jaaː wajlanaaː haðaaː jawmu aːlddijni hj tʕml fj aːlmdrsa ʕlmt nfs maː qdmt wʔaχrt qaaːluwaː wad͡ʒadnaaː ʔaːbaaːʔanaaː lahaaː ʕaaːbidijna man ʔaaðallu aːlnnaaːsi faqaaːla ldj ʔalm fj ʔaktaːfj waʔiin tad͡ʒhar biaːlqawli faʔiinnahu jaʕlamu aːlssira waʔaaχfaaː maː ʔant bnʕma rbk bmd͡ʒnwn faʔiin lam taʔatuwnij bihi falaaː kajla lakum ʕindij walaaː taqrabuwni mn ʃbb ʕlaː ʃjʔin ʃaːb ʕljh laː tdʕwaː aːljwm θbwraː waːħdaː waːdʕwaː θbwraː kθjraː waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi man lam jamut lam jafut waʕalaaː aːlllahi qaʶsˤduʶ aːlssabijli waminhaaː d͡ʒaaːʔiirun walaw ʃaaːʔa lahadaaːkum ʔaad͡ʒmaʕijna wakilaaːhumaaː jard͡ʒiʕu ʔilaaː aːlʕadli aːllaðij bihi salaaːmaau aʶːlssuʶltˤaʶaʶːniʶ rʔajt qtˤaʶ trkdˤ ʕqb aːlklb ʔaajju ʃajʔin kaaːna χabaruk baʕdij qaaːla jaaː ʔaajjuhaaː aːlnnabiju d͡ʒaaːhidi aːlkuffaaːra waaːlmunaaːfiqijna waʶaʶːʁluʶðˤ ʕalajhim wamaʔawaaːhum d͡ʒahannamu wabiʔisa aʶːlmaʶsˤiʶjruʶ faʶʕaʶsˤaʶaʶː firʕawnu aːlrrasuwla faʔaaχaðnaaːhu ʔaaχðanaː wabijlanaː nmaː ʔawlaːdh waʶjaʶtˤuʶwfuʶ ʕalajhim ʁilmaaːnun llahum kaʔaannahum luʔuluʔuun mmaknuwnun ljqtˤʕ tˤrfaʶː mn aːlðjn kfrwaː ʔaw jkbthm fjnqlbwaː χaːʔibjn ʔanaː ʔabdaːan lm ʔaqtl ʔaj ʔaħdaːan waaːstaftaħuwaː waχaaːba kullu d͡ʒabbaaːrin ʕanijdin laʔaːkiluwna min ʃad͡ʒarin mmin zaqquwmin klnaː nrjd aːltfwq wajatadallasa fij aːlʔaaχjaaːri wahuwa dˤiʶdduʶhuʶm walaw aːʕtarafa lazimathu aːlħud͡ʒd͡ʒaau km ʕdd aːldwnt aːltj trjd maː rʔajk ʔin ðhbnaː nʔakl χaːrd͡ʒ aːlbjt min saʕaaːdaai aːlmarʔi ʔaan jakuwna radijʔa aʶːlχaʶtˤtˤiʶ wakaaːna ʕalijju bnu ʔaabij tˤaʶaʶːliʶbiʶn karrama aːlllahu wad͡ʒhahu jaquwlu mn ʕʃrjn tˤaʶːlb waːħd fqtˤ qrʔa aːlktaːb qaːl aːlðjn aːstkbrwaː ʔinaː kl fjhaː ʔin aːllh qd ħkm bjn aːlʕbaːd waqad ʔaʶaʶfsˤaʶħaʶ aːlmutanabbij biðalika fij qawlihi hl hw jħbnj ʔaʔiðaː mtnaː wknaː traːbaː wʕðˤaʶːmaʶː ʔaʔinaː lmdjnwn χaaːlidijna fijhaaː ħasunat mustaqarranaː wamuqaaːmanaː ʔaʶtˤfʔiʶ aʶːldˤwʔ kaːnt ħjaːtj fj χtˤr ʔatsaːʔl ʔin kaːn jħbnj bjnmaː knt ðaːhbaː ʔilaː aːlʕml aːltqjt bχaːlj lijunðira man kaaːna ħajjanaː wajaħiqqa aːlqawlu ʕalaaː aːlkaaːfirijna tlqjt brqja mnhaː twm laː jd͡ʒjd aːlsbaːħa mn naːħja ʔaχraː fhw d͡ʒjd fj lʕba aːlbjsbwl kamaaː naʕuwðu bik min aːlʕud͡ʒbi bimaaː nuħsinu fkðbwh fʔaχðhm ʕðaːb jwm aʶːlðˤlaʶ ʔinh kaːn ʕðaːb jwm ʕðˤjm ln jtˤrd mnnaːd baːja mn aːlmnzl aːltj ttˤlʕ ʕlaː aːlʔafʔida tʕd͡ʒbnj aːlkjka ʔaʶʕtˤ aʶːlqtˤ bʕdˤ aːllħm jaaː ʔaabati ʔiinnij ʔaaχaaːfu ʔaan jamassaka ʕaðaaːbun mina aːlrraħmani fatakuwna liʶlʃʃaʶjtˤaʶaʶːniʶ walijjanaː d͡ʒʔit sjraːan ʕlaː aːlʔaqdaːm jamħaqu aːlllahu aːlrribaaː wajurbij aʶːlsˤsˤaʶdaʶqaʶaʶːtiʶ waaːlllahu laaː juħibbu kulla kaffaaːrin ʔaaθijmin lqd tˤaʶlaʶbaʶ kwb mn aːlmaːʔ ql ʕsaː ʔan jkwn rdf lkm bʕdˤ aːlðj tstʕd͡ʒlwn lff saːmj ħblaː ħwl ʕnq ljlaː w χnqhaː ħttaː aːlmwt wad͡ʒhu fasaaːdihaaː ʔaanna ʃajχij lam jaðkurhaaː wamaaː lam jaðkurhu aːlʃʃajχu laaː χajra fijhi liʔaanna waaːd͡ʒibaaːti aːlʕuquwli laaː jad͡ʒuwzu ʔiʶbtˤaʶaʶːluʶhaʶaʶː biaːlʃʃarʕi ʕndmaː tswq fj aʶːlðˤlaʶːm tħs w kʔank tħlq fj aːlsmaːʔ wajarawnahu muʶdˤiʶrraʶnaʶː biχalqi aːlwaladi baʕijdanaː min nad͡ʒaaːbatihi ʔaannahaaː kalimaaun tuðkaru lilmubaaːlaʁaai walaaː juraaːdu bihaaː suwʔun aːlħdjθ aːlʔawl aːlʔaʕmaːl baːlnjaːt knt mdhʃaː qaːl djmaː lʔaʶsˤdqk aːlqwl laː ʔaʶsttˤjʕ ħqaː ʔan ʔatðkr mn kaːnwaː ʁsl aːlmlaːbs baːljd ʕmlja sˤʕbaʶ wmdˤjʕaʶ llwqt twm laː jsttˤjʕ aːltnfs ʔanaː waːθq ʔanj rʔajthu mn qbl bismi aːlllahi aːlrraħmani aːlrraħijmi ʔiiðaaː zulzilati aʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤuʶ zilzaaːlahaaː hl tðhb ʔilaː aːlknjsa famaaː lanaaː min ʃaaːfiʕijna waqaaːla ʔaabuw aːlʕabbaaːsi aːlmubarridu radaaːʔaau aʶːlχaʶtˤtˤiʶ zamaaːnaau aːlʔaadabi laː jʕjʃ fj hðaː aːlmbnaː ʔaħd d͡ʒiʔitu ʔilaː hnaː lʔataʕallm faʔiini aːntahawaː faʔiinna aːlllaha ʁafuwrun raħijmun man lam jaħtamil ðulla aːlttaʕalumi saaːʕaaan baqija fij ðulli aːld͡ʒahli ʔaabadanaː ql ʔin rbj jbstˤ aːlrzq lmn jʃaːʔ wjqdr wlkn ʔakθr aːlnaːs laː jʕlmwn ðalika waman juʶʕaʶðˤðˤiʶm ʃaʕaaːʔiira aːlllahi faʔiinnahaaː min taqwaaː aːlquluwbi faθabata ʔaanna aːlttad͡ʒaaːnusa waʔiin tanawwaʕa ʔaʶaʶsˤluʶ aːlʔiiχaaːʔi waqaaːʕidaau aːliaːʔitilaaːfi laqad ʔaʶaʶħsˤaʶaʶːhuʶm waʕaddahum ʕaddanaː ʔin hðaː ʔilaː χlq aːlʔawljn tʕaːl ʔiðaː aʶːsttˤʕt maaː laaː jankaffuwna ʕanhu ʔillaaː bimaaːniʕin qawijjin ħbj lhaː kaːn ħqjqjaːan ʔinhm ʔalfwaː ʔaːbaːʔhm dˤaʶːljn bʕd aʶːlðˤlmaʶːt tðˤhr aʶːldˤwʔ wlqd dˤrbnaʶː llnaːs fj hðaː aːlqrʔaːn mn kl mθl lʕlhm jtðkrwn faʔiin lam tafʕaluwaː walan tafʕaluwaː faaːttaquwaː aːlnnaaːra aːllatij waquwduhaaː aːlnnaaːsu waaːlħid͡ʒaaːraau ʔauʕiddat lilkaaːfirijna ʔakfaːrkm χjr mn ʔawlʔikm ʔam lkm braːʔa fj aːlzbr liʔaanna min aːlkalaaːmi maaː kaaːna masmuwʕanaː laaː jaħtaaːd͡ʒu fij fahmihi ʔilaaː taʔaammuli aʶːlχaʶtˤtˤiʶ bihi waʔiin jatafarraqaaː juʁni aːlllahu kullanaː min saʕatihi wakaaːna aːlllahu waaːsiʕanaː ħakijmanaː ʔalaː jsd͡ʒdwaː llh aːlðj jχrd͡ʒ aːlχbʔ fj aːlsmaːwaːt waʶːlʔaʶrdˤ wjʕlm maː tχfwn wmaː tʕlnwn rbnaː laː td͡ʒʕlnaː ftna llðjn kfrwaː waːʁfr lnaː rbnaː ʔink ʔant aːlʕzjz aːlħkjm ʔalqjaː fj d͡ʒhnm kl kfaːr ʕnjd lm jraː ʔaħd twm sqtˤ qlmj mn ħaːfa mktbj ʃʕrt sjʔia hðaː md͡ʒrrd maːʔ fqtˤ ʔaljs kðlk jʃwj twm aːllħm twqʕ twm ħdwθ ðlk aːnh mttˤwr ʔink laː tnsˤt mtˤlqaʶːaʶn mn aʶːlʔaʶfdˤl lj ʔan ʔatħdθ ʔilaː aːld͡ʒdaːr faʔaand͡ʒajnaaːhu waman maʕahu fij aːlfulki aːlmaʃħuwni ʕlmh ʃdjd aːlqwaː ʔakrh aːlsjaːsa whzj ʔiljk bd͡ʒðʕ aːlnχla tsaʶːqtˤ ʕljk rtˤbaʶː d͡ʒnjaː ʕmlt maːrj mrbbja llʔaʶtˤfaʶːl ʕndmaː kaːnt mraːhqa wqaːlwaː rbnaː ʔinaː ʔaʶtˤʕnaʶː saːdtnaː wkbraːʔnaː fʔaʶdˤlwnaʶː aːlsbjlaː hl trjd mʃaːhda mqaːbla kra aːlqaːʕda ʕlaː aːltlfaːz ʔajhaː aːlqaːʔid llʕljaːʔ ʃʕbh faaːljawma aːllaðijna ʔaːmanuwaː mina aːlkuffaaːri jaʶdˤħaʶkuʶwnaʶ aːnhaː χd͡ʒwla waʔiið ʁadawta min ʔaahlika tubawwiʔiu aːlmuʔuminijna maqaaːʕida lilqitaaːli waaːlllahu samijʕun ʕalijmun ʔauwlaʔiika aːllaðijna laʕanahumu aːlllahu waman jalʕani aːlllahu falan tad͡ʒida lahu naʶsˤiʶjraʶnaʶː ʔam ʔaːtjnaːhm ktaːbaː mn qblh fhm bh mstmskwn ʔiið qaaːla liʔaabijhi waqawmihi maaː taʕbuduwna wmaː χlqnaː aːlsmaːwaːt waʶːlʔaʶrdˤ wmaː bjnhmaː laːʕbjn qaaːluwaː laqad ʕalimta maaː lanaaː fij banaaːtika min ħaqqin waʔiinnaka lataʕlamu maaː nurijdu trk lj twm rsaːla ħtaː aʶːltˤjwr baːqja hunaː fj aʶːlðˤiʶl aːnj ðaːhb ʔilaː aːldkaːn ʔalaːn waaːd͡ʒtabaaːhu linubuwwatihi sabbiħi aːsma rabbika aːlʔaaʕlaaː man taʃabbaha biqawmin fahuwa minhum kʔamθaːl aːllʔulʔu aːlmknwn laː tuħarrik bihi lisaaːnaka litaʕd͡ʒala bihi twm fj frq aːlbjsbwl d͡ʒaaːʔahu aːlħaquu wahuwa fij ʁaaːri ħiraaːʔin fad͡ʒaaːʔahu aːlmalaku faqaaːla aːqraʔa kaːnt wðˤjfaʶ aːlnsaːʔ aːlrʔijsja ħtaː zmn qrjb hj ʔan jtzwd͡ʒn wjldn aʶːlʔaʶtˤfaʶːl wnaːdjnaːh mn d͡ʒaːnb aʶːltˤwr aːlʔajmn wqrbnaːh nd͡ʒjaː mrħbaː aːld͡ʒmjʕ ʔiinnaaː ʔaanzalnaaː ʔiilajka aːlkitaaːba biaːlħaqqi faaːʕbudi aːlllaha muʶχliʶsˤaʶnaʶː lahu aːlddijna ʔinhaː sˤʁjraʶ wʁjr naʶːdˤiʶd͡ʒaʶ ʔanaː ʔarj aːlftaːa ʕaːʃ mnnaːd fj hðaː aːlmnzl lʕaːm kaːml qaːl hj ʕsˤaʶːj ʔatwkʔa ʕljhaː wʔahʃ bhaː ʕlaː ʁnmj wlj fjhaː mʔaːrb ʔaχraː jaʔaajjuhaaː aːlrrusulu kuluwaː mina aʶːltˤtˤaʶjiʶbaʶaʶːtiʶ waaːʕmaluwaː sˤaʶaʶːliʶħaʶnaʶː laː ʔaʶsttˤjʕ ʔan ʔaʶuʶsˤdq hðaː walaqad ʕalimtumu aːllaðijna aːʕtadawaː minkum fij aːlssabti faqulnaaː lahum kuwnuwaː qiradaaan χaaːsiʔiijna ʔanaː ʔaʶfdˤl aːlsbaːħa ʕlaː aːltzld͡ʒ hl aːlħljb fʕlaːan mfjdun llsˤħaʶ wbʃrnaːh bʔisħaːq nbjaː mn aʶːlsˤaʶːlħjn qljl daːʔim χjr mn kθjr mnqtˤʕ mn sjkwn dˤħjth aːltaːlja waqaaːla aːbnu aːlmuʕtazzi man aːttaχaða ʔiχwaaːnanaː kaaːnuwaː lahu ʔaaʕwaaːnanaː ʔarjd aːlslaːm qul limani aʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤuʶ waman fijhaaː ʔiin kuntum taʕlamuwna wʔin hðh ʔamtkm ʔama waːħda wʔanaː rbkm faːtqwn jaː ʔajhaː aːlðjn ʔaːmnwaː aːtqwaː aːllh waːbtʁwaː ʔiljh aːlwsjla wd͡ʒaːhdwaː fj sbjlh lʕlkm tflħwn hl rʔajt aːlħaːdθ ħqaː jbʃrhm rbhm brħma mnh wrdˤwaʶːn wd͡ʒnaːt lhm fjhaː nʕjm mqjm watamtaniʕu min χawfihi aːlnnufuwsu aːlʕaaːdijaau ʔiinna aːllha kataba aːlʔiiħsaaːna ʕalaaː kulli ʃajʔin faʔiiðaaː qataltum faʔaaħsinuwaː aːlqitlaaa wʔaʕwð bk rb ʔan jħdˤrwn qrr twm ʔan jbdʔa btʕlm aːllʁa aːlfrnsja ʔin aːlðjn ʔaːmnwaː wʕmlwaː aʶːlsˤaʶːlħaʶːt kaːnt lhm d͡ʒnaːt aːlfrdws nzlaː laː ʔaʕtqd ʔan aːlkθjr mn aːlnaːs raʶːdˤjn brwaːtbhm wʔalqaː fj aʶːlʔaʶrdˤ rwaːsj ʔan tmjd bkm wʔanhaːraː wsblaː lʕlkm thtdwn faʶaʶːntˤaʶlaʶquʶwaʶː wahum jataχaaːfatuwna ln ʔad͡ʒrħ mʃaːʕrk ʔabdaː sˤbaʶːħ aːlχjr jaː maːjk hl ʔantm bχjr law maaː taʔatijnaaː biaːlmalaaːʔiikaai ʔiin kunta mina aʶːlsˤsˤaʶaʶːdiʶqiʶjnaʶ qaaːla rabbi aʶːnsˤuʶrniʶj ʕalaaː aːlqawmi aːlmufsidijna maː fʕlth ʔanta kaːn χaʶːtˤʔiʶaʶːaʶn ljd͡ʒzj aːllh kl nfs maː ksbt ʔin aːllh srjʕ aːlħsaːb bal hum min aːlʔaaʕdaaːʔi aːlmaħðuwrijna fij biʶdˤʕiʶ sinijna lillahi aːlʔaamru min qablu wamin baʕdu wajawmaʔiiðin jafraħu aːlmuʔuminuwna kalaːaːa lammaaː jaʶqdˤiʶ maaː ʔaamarahu mn aːlshl aːlwqwʕ fj ʕaːdaːt sjʔia tatad͡ʒaaːfaaː d͡ʒunuwbuhum ʕani aʶːlmaʶdˤaʶaʶːd͡ʒiʶʕiʶ jadʕuwna rabbahum χawfanaː waʶtˤaʶmaʶʕaʶnaʶː wamimmaaː razaqnaaːhum junfiquwna ʔama rswl fʔiðaː d͡ʒaːʔ rswlhm qdˤj bjnhm baʶːlqstˤ whm laː jðˤlmwn aːlħdjθ aːlθaːlθ ʕʃr mn kmaːl aːlʔijmaːn ʔauwlaʔiika ʕalajhim sˤaʶlaʶwaʶaʶːtuʶn min rabbihim waraħmaaun waʔauwlaʔiika humu aːlʔiiχwaaːna ʕalaaː tˤaʶbaʶqaʶaʶːtiʶn muχtalifaain waʔaanħaaːʔin mutaʃaʕʕibaain laː tʕml aːlʕb fʔaʶʕrdˤ ʕnhm waʶːntðˤr ʔinhm mntðˤrwn ʔaawalaaː jaðkuru aːlʔiinsaaːnu ʔaannaaː χalaqnaaːhu min qablu walam jaku ʃajʔianaː ʔinnhm mʕj rbnaː ʔink mn tdχl aːlnaːr fqd ʔaχzjth wmaː llðˤaʶːlmjn mn ʔaʶnsˤaʶːr jaħsabu ʔaanna maaːlahu ʔaaχladahu hl bʔimkaːnk ʔan tʕjrnj haːtfk aːlnqaːl llħðˤaʶ waman lam aːlllahu ʕanhumaaː ðalalt tˤaʶaʶːliʶbaʶnaʶː faʕazazt maʶtˤluʶwbaʶnaʶː waqad qijla fij manθuwri aːlħikami wʔinh ltðkra llmtqjn qul biʶfaʶdˤliʶ aːlllahi wabiraħmatihi fabiðalika faljafraħuwaː huwa χajrun mimmaaː jad͡ʒmaʕuwna maː hj rwaːjtk aʶːlmfdˤlaʶ ʔanaː mθaːlj ʔanaː laː ʔaʕrf ʔilj ʔajn ʔaðhb wlknj ʕlaː aʶːltˤrjq sˤaʶdaʶaʶːquʶ ʔaummi kulθuwmin aːbnaai ʔaabij bakrin faqaaːla kmaː ʔanʃʔit ʔawqaːf lʔiʶtˤʕaʶːm aʶːltˤjwr waʶːlʕsˤaʶːfjr hl ldjkn mwʕd faaːstad͡ʒaaːba lahu rabbuhu faʶsˤaʶraʶfaʶ ʕanhu kajdahunna ʔiinnahu huwa aːlssamijʕu aːlʕalijmu frid blwʁs hw ʔakbr msˤħħ fj ttwjbaː wʔaːtwaː aːlnsaːʔ sˤdqaʶːthn nħla fʔin tˤbn lkm ʕn ʃjʔ mnh nfsaː fklwh hnjʔiaː mrjʔiaː waqaaːluwaː lan nuʔumina laka ħattaaː tafd͡ʒura lanaaː mina aʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤiʶ janbuwʕanaː waʔaulqija aːlssaħaraau saaːd͡ʒidijna ʔinhaː lm tqrʔa hðaː aːlktaːb aːlmaːʔ d͡ʒmjl ʔaʶʕtˤaʶːnj ʔabj saːʕaan ħlwa qaːlwaː nħn ʔawlw qwa wʔawlw bʔas ʃdjd waːlʔamr ʔiljk faʶːnðˤrj maːðaː tʔamrjn fj lndn aːlsaːʕa aːlʔaːn aːlsaːbʕa famarra biaːlmaaːli ʕalaaː ʕumara bni aʶːlχaʶtˤtˤaʶaʶːbiʶ raʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːlllahu ʕanhu faqaaːla ʕd aːlj ʕʃra fahija aːlddijnu aːlmuttabaʕu faliʔaannahu jaʶsˤriʶfuʶ aːlnnufuwsa ʕan ʃahawaaːtihaaː qul law ʔaantum tamlikuwna χazaaːʔiina raħmaai rabbij ʔiiðanaː laʔaamsaktum χaʃjaaa aːlʔiinfaaːqi wakaaːna aːlʔiinsaaːnu qatuwranaː kaːn saːmj bħaːd͡ʒa llttmrn fijhimaaː min kulli faaːkihaain zawd͡ʒaaːni wahuwa mimman d͡ʒaʕalahu aːlmaʔamuwnu min daaːʔi aːlʔiiχwaaːni laaː min dawaaːʔiihim waqad qaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi laaː tukθiranna muʕaaːtabaaa ʔiχwaaːnik fajahuwna ʕalajhim saʶχaʶtˤuʶk aːqraʔa kitaaːbaka kafaaː binafsika aːljawma ʕalajka ħasijbanaː walaqad ttaraknaaːhaaː ʔaːjaaan fahal min mmudakirin wlaː jmlk aːlðjn jdʕwn mn dwnh aːlʃfaːʕa ʔilaː mn ʃhd baːlħq whm jʕlmwn naħnu ʔaaʕlamu bimaaː jaquwluwna wamaaː ʔaanta ʕalajhim bid͡ʒabbaaːrin faðakkir biaːlqurʔaːni man jaχaaːfu waʕijdi klaː ʔinhm ʕn rbhm jwmʔið lmħd͡ʒwbwn tðˤaʶːhr twm bʔanh lm jraː maːrj waʔaamina zalalahu faman tawallaaː baʕda ðalika faʔauwlaʔiika humu aːlfaaːsiquwna bimaaː ʁafara lij rabbij wad͡ʒaʕalanij mina aːlmukramijna jd͡ʒb ʕlj ħsaːb kmja aːlmaːl aːlðj swf ʔanfqh aːlaːsbwʕ waaːlqarijbu baʕijdun biʕadaaːwatihi fʔin kðbwk fqd kðb rsl mn qblk d͡ʒaːʔwaː baːlbjnaːt waːlzbr waːlktaːb aːlmnjr ʔaʶtsˤl bhaː kl jwm faljabtadiʔi tˤaʶaʶːliʶbuʶ aːlʕilmi biʔaawaaːʔiilihaaː juʶsˤaʶlliʶj ʕalajkum wamalaaːʔiikatuhu lijuχrid͡ʒakum mina aʶːlðˤðˤuʶluʶmaʶaʶːtiʶ ʔiilaaː aːlnnuwri wakaaːna biaːlmuʔuminijna raħijmanaː ʔiinnij wad͡ʒadtu aːmraʔaaaan tamlikuhum waʔauwtijat min kulli waχalaqnaaː lahum min miθlihi maaː jarkabuwna ʔaʕd aːllh lhm ʕðaːbaː ʃdjdaː ʔinhm saːʔ maː kaːnwaː jʕmlwn wjd͡ʒʕlwn llh aːlbnaːt sbħaːnh wlhm maː jʃthwn wʔamaː θmwd fhdjnaːhm faːstħbwaː aːlʕmaː ʕlaː aːd͡ʒʕlnj mqjm aʶːlsˤlaʶːaʶ wmn ðrjtj rbnaː wtqbl dʕaːʔ aːstmʕnaː lχtˤaʶːb aːlrʔijs ʕlaː aːltlfaːz aːlljla aʶːlmaʶːdˤjaʶ ʔaʶstjqðˤ fj aːlsaːʕa aːlsaːdsa ʔaʃtqtu lka jurijduwna liʶjuʶtˤfiʶʔiʶuʶwaʶː nuwra aːlllahi biʔaafwaaːhihim waaːlllahu mutimmu nuwrihi walaw kariha aːlkaaːfiruwna lm jsbq lj ʔan qaːblth qaaːluwaː naʕbudu ʔaʶaʶsˤnaʶaʶːmaʶnaʶː faʶnaʶðˤaʶlluʶ lahaaː ʕaaːkifijna hnaːk aːlkθjr mn aːlʔamaːkn aːltj jmkn zjaːrthaː fj baːrjs qaːl jaː ʔibljs maː lk ʔalaː tkwn mʕ aːlsaːd͡ʒdjn snʔakl kθjranaː aːlljla ʔaːml ʔank lst ʕlaː ħmja faaːlʔaawlaaː aːd͡ʒtinaaːbuhu waaːlwuquwfu maʕa aʶːlʔaʶaʶwsaʶtˤiʶ aːqtidaaːʔan biaːlħadijθi jwm trd͡ʒf aʶːlʔaʶrdˤ waːld͡ʒbaːl wkaːnt aːld͡ʒbaːl kθjbaː mhjlaː mʃjnaː ʕbr ʔadʁaːl kθjfa ljdχlnhm mdχlaː jrdˤwnh wʔin aːllh lʕljm ħljm tbqaː ʕlaː aʶːtsˤaʶːl mʕh faʔaammaaː aːlʔiinsaaːnu ʔiiðaaː maaː aːbtalaaːhu rabbuhu faʔaakramahu wanaʕʕamahu fajaquwlu rabbij ʔaakramani waʔiið qaaːla ʔiibraaːhijmu rabbi aːd͡ʒʕal haðaaː aːlbalada ʔaːminanaː waaːd͡ʒnubnij wabanijja ʔaan naʕbuda aʶːlʔaʶaʶsˤnaʶaʶːmaʶ hl ʔanti ħzjna aːlðjn jħʃrwn ʕlaː wd͡ʒwhhm ʔilaː d͡ʒhnm ʔawlʔik ʃr mkaːnaː wʔaʶdˤl sbjlaː qblwhaː baːlmʃfaː kaːn ʕlaː saːmj ʔan jd͡ʒlb wlwlaː fdˤl aːllh ʕljkm wrħmth wʔan aːllh twaːb ħkjm θm aːlsbjl jsrh ʔiið naaːdaaːhu rabbuhu biaːlwaaːdi aːlmuqaddasi tˤuʶwaʶnaʶː wʔinaː lnħn aʶːlsˤaʶːfwn waʔaakθaru taʶwaʶaʶːdˤuʶʕaʶnaʶː ʔiið naaːdaaː rabbahu nidaaːʔan χafijjanaː waʔaawħaaː rabbuka ʔiilaaː aːlnnaħli ʔaani aːttaχiðij mina aːld͡ʒibaaːli bujuwtanaː wamina aːlʃʃad͡ʒari wamimmaaː jaʕriʃuwna ldjh sjaːraːtaːn ʔiħdaːhmaː d͡ʒdjda w aːlʔaχraː qdjma qaːl ʔawlw d͡ʒʔitkm bʔahdaː mmaː wd͡ʒdtm ʕljh ʔaːbaːʔkm qaːlwaː ʔinaː bmaː ʔarsltm bh kaːfrwn kaːn mħtaːraː d͡ʒdaː ʔaanna aːlʕaðaaːba aːllaðij huwa min fawqihim aːlrrad͡ʒmu θumma nutbiʕuhumu aːlʔaːχirijna waʔiin kunt minnaaː famin sunnatinaaː aːlnnikaaːħu ʔiðaː ʔalqwaː fjhaː smʕwaː lhaː ʃhjqaː whj tfwr qaːl ʔinj lʕmlkm mn aːlqaːljn flaː thnwaː wtdʕwaː ʔilaː aːlslm wʔantm
