baːlsfr fj aʶːlfdˤaʶːʔ wħʃr lsljmaːn d͡ʒnwdh mn aːld͡ʒn waːlʔins waʶːltˤjr fhm jwzʕwn ʔiðaaː faqada aːlʕaaːlimu aːlððihna qalla ʕalaaː aʶːlʔaʶaʶdˤdaʶaʶːdiʶ aːħtid͡ʒaaːd͡ʒuhu maː lkm laː tnaʶːsˤrwn waaːlθθaaːnijaau muktasabaaun biʶaʶːlqaʶsˤdiʶ waaːliaːχtijaaːri hl ʔant mtʔakd ʔank trjdnj ʔan ʔaχbrk tfdˤl klj ʔaːðaːn sˤaʶːʁjaʶ fdˤrbnaʶː ʕlaː ʔaːðaːnhm fj aːlkhf snjn ʕddaː ʔinhaː mʃʁwla aːlʔaːn lhm ʕðaːbaː ʔaljmaː aːlʕad͡ʒabu min malikin aːstafsada raʕijjatahu wahuwa jaʕlamu ʔaanna ʕizzahu biʶtˤaʶaʶːʕaʶtiʶhiʶm wmhdt lh tmhjdaː ʔin fj χlq aːlsmaːwaːt waʶːlʔaʶrdˤ waːχtlaːf aːlljl waːlnhaːr fʕl ʔaj ʃjʔ ħjaːl ðlk rubba d͡ʒahlin wuqijat bihi ʕulamaaːʔu fʔad͡ʒaːʔhaː aʶːlmχaʶːdˤ ʔilaː d͡ʒðʕ aːlnχla qaːlt jaː ljtnj mt qbl hðaː wknt nsjaː mnsjaː fʕndnaː maːʔ sˤaʶːfiʶn fj aːlbjt ʔaaw juʶsˤbiʶħaʶ maaːʔuuhaaː ʁawranaː falan taʶstaʶtˤiʶjʕaʶ lahu tˤaʶlaʶbaʶnaʶː ʔiillaaː man ʔaataaː aːlllaha biqalbin salijmin wahaðihi ʔaumuwrun ʔin lam taʶχluʶsˤ fij aːlʔaakfaaːʔi ʔaasraʕa fijhim ttklm mʕj ħaːwlnaː aːlʔid͡ʒtmaːʕ ʕlaː aːlʔaql mra fj aːlʔasbwʕ w mn aːlðjn tlʕb mʕhm waqaaːla aːllaðij nad͡ʒaaː minhumaaː waaːddakara baʕda ʔaummaain ʔaanaaː ʔaunabbiʔiukum bitaʔawijlihi faʔaarsiluwni ʔinh sˤdwq laː bʔas ʔin wθqtu bh wʔin lnaː llʔaːχra waːlʔawlaː aːllaðijna juballiʁuwna risaaːlaaːti aːlllahi wajaχʃawnahu walaaː jaχʃawna ʔaaħadanaː ʔiillaaː aːlllaha wakafaaː biaːlllahi ħasijbanaː mwqʕaː aːlʃbktjn aːlaːd͡ʒtmaːʕjtjn aːlʃhjrtjn fjsbwk wtwjtr jχdˤʕaʶːn ldstwr aːlwlaːjaːt aːlmtħda wqwaːnjn wlaːja kaːljfwrnjaː ʔaflaː jrwn ʔalaː jrd͡ʒʕ ʔiljhm qwlaː wlaː jmlk lhm dˤraʶː wlaː nfʕaː ʔiinna fij ðalika laʔaːjaaːtin lilmutawassimijna ʃjχnaː waːlftaː ʕnd sˤwt aʶːlwtˤn qaːl ðlk maː knaː nbʁ faːrtdaː ʕlaː ʔaːθaːrhmaː qsˤsˤaʶː qaːl aːlmlʔa mn qwm frʕwn ʔin hðaː lsaːħr ʕljm fakajfa tattaquwna ʔiin kafartum jawmanaː jad͡ʒʕalu aːlwildaaːna ʃijbanaː ʔajn jmknnj ʔistlaːm tðkrtj fasubħaaːna aːlllahi ħijna tumsuwna waħijna tuʶsˤbiʶħuʶwnaʶ jqdm qwmh jwm aːlqjaːma fʔawrdhm aːlnaːr wbʔis aːlwrd aːlmwrwd jʕlm maː fj aːlsmaːwaːt waʶːlʔaʶrdˤ wjʕlm maː tsrwn wmaː tʕlnwn waːllh ʕljm bðaːt aʶːlsˤdwr lasta ʕalajhim biʶmuʶsˤaʶjtˤiʶriʶn laː jd͡ʒb ʕljk ʔan ttqn lʁaːt ʕdjda aːlðj ʔaħsn kl ʃjʔ χlqh wbdʔa χlq aːlʔinsaːn mn tˤjn tʔaqlmaː mʕ aːltʁjjr bsrʕa faːlmdbraːt ʔamraː ʔant dqjq aʶːlmlaʶːħðˤaʶ walaqad d͡ʒaaːʔakum muwsaaː biaːlbajjinaaːti θumma aːttaχaðtumu aːlʕid͡ʒla min baʕdihi waʔaantum ðˤaʶaʶːliʶmuʶwnaʶ jaː bnj ʔisraːʔijl aːðkrwaː nʕmtj aːltj ʔanʕmt ʕljkm wʔanj fdˤltkm ʕlaː aːlʕaːlmjn qaːl klaː faːðhbaː bʔaːjaːtnaː ʔinaː mʕkm mstmʕwn maː sbb ʁdˤbhaʶː maθalu aːlʕaduwwi aʶːldˤdˤaʶaʶːħiʶkiʶ ʔilajk kaʶaʶːlħaʶnðˤaʶlaʶaʶiʶ aʶːlχaʶdˤraʶaʶːʔiʶ ʔaawraaːquhaaː ʔaalaaː ʔiinnahum min ʔiifkihim lajaquwluwna whw maː sjslltˤ dˤwʔaʶː ʔakθr ʕn hðh aːlħqba aːllħm njʔ ʔaːn ldjhaː qlb ħnwn waʕalaaːmaaːtin wabiaːlnnad͡ʒmi hum jahtaduwna waqad laʶħaʶðˤaʶ ʔaabuw tammaaːmin aʶːltˤtˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶjuʶ haðaaː aːlmaʕnaaː fij ʃaʕrihi faqaaːla ftsaːbq aːlrfaːq laːntʃaːlh qaːʔiljn haːt jdk wʔið ħiraaːsaai aːlddijni waaːlddunjaaː waaːlððabi ʕanhumaaː wadafʕi aːlʔaahwaaːʔi minhu ʔisħb aːlʔaːχr aːn aːlχlf wqjlh jaː rb ʔin hʔulaːʔ qwm laː jʔumnwn wasummuwaː ħafadaaan litaħaffudihim fij aːlχidmaai wasurʕatihim fij aːlʕamali faaːliqu aʶːlʔiʶiʶsˤbaʶaʶːħiʶ wad͡ʒaʕala aːlllajla sakananaː waaːlʃʃamsa waaːlqamara ħusbaaːnanaː ðalika taqdijru aːlʕazijzi aːlʕalijmi mħmd sˤlaʶː aːllh ʕljh wslm wld fj mka rkl twm ðlk aʶːlsˤndwq kl maː ʔaʶsttˤjʕ fʕlh fj aːlwqt aːlħaːlj hw aːld͡ʒlws hnaː waːlʔistmaːʕ aːlmaaːlu waaːlbanuwna zijnaau aːlħajaaːai aːlddunjaaː waaːlbaaːqijaaːtu aʶːlsˤsˤaʶaʶːliʶħaʶaʶːtuʶ χajrun ʕinda rabbika θawaaːbanaː waχajrun ʔaamalanaː wamaaː taʃaaːʔuwna ʔiillaaː ʔaan jaʃaaːʔa aːlllahu rabbu aːlʕaaːlamijna fʔaʶsqtˤ ʕljnaː ksfaː mn aːlsmaːʔ ʔin knt mn aʶːlsˤaʶːdqjn jntðˤr twm rdananaː wħmlt aʶːlʔaʶrdˤ waːld͡ʒbaːl fdktaː dka waːħda hl trjd ʔan tðhb ʔilaː ħdjqa aːlħjwaːn bʕd ðˤhr hðaː aːljwm waʔiiðaaː duʕuwaː ʔiilaaː aːlllahi warasuwlihi lijaħkuma bajnahum ʔiiðaaː farijqun minhum muʶʕriʶdˤuʶwnaʶ lnrsl ʕljhm ħd͡ʒaːra mn tˤjn aːlllahu jaʶbsuʶtˤuʶ aːlrrizqa liman jaʃaaːʔu min ʕibaaːdihi wajaqdiru lahu ʔiinna aːlllaha bikulli ʃajʔin ʕalijmun qaːla faʔiinnahu d͡ʒibrijlu ʔaataaːkum juʕallimukum dijnakum qul ʔaaruwnija aːllaðijna ʔaalħaqtum bihi ʃurakaaːʔa kallaaː bal huwa aːlllahu aːlʕazijzu aːlħakijmu sahlun ʕalaaː man ʕalimahu lqd ʔautuhm bsrqa ʕðˤaʶːm aʶːldjnaʶːsˤwraʶːt waʔiinna rabbaka lahuwa aːlʕazijzu aːlrraħijmu walahu man fij aːlssamaaːwaaːti waʶaʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤiʶ waman ʕindahu laaː jastakbiruwna ʕan ʕibaaːdatihi walaaː jastaħsiruwna qaːl ʔatʕbdwn maː tnħtwn kajfa laaː jaħtamij min aːlððunuwbi limaʕarraaːtihaaː hl trjd tðhb ʔilaː hnaːk aːlbaːb mʁlq jaaː banij aːlssaaːʔiibi qad dˤuʶwiʶjtuʶm faaːnkiħuwaː fij aːlʁaraaːʔiibi maaː ʔaaʃhadtuhum χalqa aːlssamaaːwaaːti waʶaʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤiʶ walaaː χalqa ʔaanfusihim wamaaː kuntu muttaχiða aʶːlmuʶdˤiʶlliʶjnaʶ ʕaʶdˤuʶdaʶnaʶː nntðˤruʶ mnka ʔan tunafiiða lnaː maː wʕdtah lnaː ðaːt mra aːllh ltˤjf bʕbaːdh jrzq mn jʃaːʔ whw aːlqwj aːlʕzjz ʔalaː tʕbdwaː ʔilaː aːllh ʔinnj lkm mnh nðjr wbʃjr kaːn aːllʕb fj aːlħdjqa mmtʕaː ʔarjd aːlʃraːʔ jsˤwm aːlmslmwn fj ʃhr rmdˤaʶːn mn ʃrwq aːlʃms ħtaː ʁrwbhaː waʔiinnij kullamaaː daʕawtuhum litaʁfira lahum d͡ʒaʕaluwaː ʔaʶaʶsˤaʶaʶːbiʶʕaʶhuʶm fij ʔaːðaaːnihim waaːstaʁʃawaː θijaaːbahum waʶʔaʶaʶsˤaʶrruʶwaʶː waaːstakbaruwaː aːstikbaaːranaː waʔaaχalla bimasnuwnaaːtihaaː wahajʔiaaːtihaaː faqad ʕaqqa jawmahu waʶðˤaʶlaʶmaʶ nafsahu ʔin aːlðjn aːʃtrwaː aːlkfr baːlʔijmaːn ln jdˤrwaʶː aːllh ʃjʔiaː wlhm ʕðaːb ʔaljm ln tnfʕkm ʔarħaːmkm wlaː ʔawlaːdkm jwm ʔafkaːr sjjʔia ʕn aːlʔislaːm w aːlmslmjn waliðalika qaaːla aːlnnabiju ʕalajhi aːlssalaaːmu tabaːraka aːsmu rabbika ðij aːld͡ʒalaːli waaːlʔiikraːmi aʶːdˤtˤrr saːmj ʕlaː qdˤaʶːʔ aːllljla fj aːlʔadʁaːl waʔaanʃada baʶʕdˤuʶ ʔaahli aːlʔaadabi limuħammadi bni daaːwud aʶːlʔaʶaʶsˤfaʶhaʶaʶːniʶjjiʶ wakaaːnuwaː ʕadadanaː jantafij ʕan miθlihim aʶːlmuʶwaʶaʶːtˤaʶʔaʶaʶaʶuʶ faʔaammaː ʔiin kaːna mina aːlmuqarrabjna kjf kaːn mwʕdk ʕnd aʶːltˤtˤbjb waʔaːχarjna minhum lammaː jalħaqwaː bihim wahuwa aːlʕazjzu aːlħakjmu jaaː ʔaamijra aːlmuʔuminijna qad ʕalimt maaː aːubtulija bihi aːlfarazdaqu faʕujjira bihi qawmun ʔilaaː aːljawmi ʔaan jaʶtaʶsˤaʶwwaʶraʶ aːnd͡ʒilaaːʔa aːlʃʃadaaːʔiidi waaːnkiʃaaːfa aːlhumuwmi lqd ʔaχbrnj llttw wakilaaːhumaaː min ʃuʶruʶwtˤiʶ aːlmuruwʔaai limaaː fijhimaaː min ðˤuʶhuʶwriʶ aʶːliʶaʶːsˤtˤiʶnaʶaʶːʕiʶ watakaaːθuri aːlʔaaʃjaaːʕi waaːlʔaatbaaːʕi mn jnaːm hnaː waqaːlwaː laː taðarunna ʔaːlihatakum walaː taðarunna waddanaː walaː suwaːʕanaː walaː jaʁwθa wajaʕwqa wanasranaː ʔaql aːlnaːs srwraːan aːlħswd taʶtˤluʶbuʶ aːlʔaakθara fij aːlddunjaaː waqad tabluʁu aːlħaaːd͡ʒaaa minhaaː biaːlʔaaqalli waʔaanʃadtu liʔiibraaːhijma bni aːlmudabbari ʔant lst jaːbaːnjaːan aʶːldˤrwraʶːt tbjħ aʶːlmħðˤwraʶːt sʔimt mn smaːʕ ħkaːjaːt tbd͡ʒħk ʔaχð aːlwld jbkj faqaaːla ʔaaʁnaaːnij aːlllahu ʕanhum ʔinna aːlllaha taʕaaːlaaː ʔaamaranij bimudaaːraaːai aːlnnaaːsi kamaaː ʔaamaranij biʔaadaaːʔi aʶːlfaʶraʶaʶːʔiʶiʶdˤiʶ waaːllaðjna ʔiiðaː ʔaanfaqwaː lam jusrifwaː walam jaqturwaː wakaːna bajna ðlika qawaːmanaː ʔaawalam jarawaː ʔiilaaː aʶːlʔaʶaʶrdˤiʶ kam ʔaanbatnaː fjhaː min kulli zawd͡ʒin karjmin waqadimnaː ʔiilaː maː ʕamilwaː min ʕamalin fad͡ʒaʕalnaːhu habaːʔan manθwranaː waʶaʶːlħiʶrsˤuʶ waaːlʃʃuħu ʔaʶaʶsˤluʶn likulli ðammin ʔaaw miskjnanaː ðaː matrabaain ʔiinnaː d͡ʒaʕalnaː fj ʔaaʕnaːqihim ʔaaʁlaːlanaː fahija ʔiilaaː aːlʔaaðqaːni fahum muqmaħwna waqaaːla kuʃaaːd͡ʒimu ʔinna aːlddunjaaː rubbamaaː ʔaaqbalat ʕalaaː aːld͡ʒaaːhili biaːliaːttifaaːqi ħattaaː laaː jaʶstaʶsqiʶtˤaʶhuʶ χaʶaʶːsˤsˤiʶjuʶn walaaː janbuwa ʕan fahmihi ʕaaːmmijun waʶqaʶsˤuʶraʶt ʔaːlatuhu sjqdˤj saːmj ħjaːth fj aːlssd͡ʒn waqad qijla fij manθuwri aːlħikami aːlmafruwħu bihi huwa aːlmaħzuwnu ʕalajhi faqaaːla lahu aʶːlfaʶdˤluʶ bnu aːlrrabijʕi faʔiiðaaː taʶtˤaʶjjaʶrt falaaː tard͡ʒiʕ waqaaːla sulajmaaːnu bnu wahbin aːlhawaaː ʔaamnaʕu waaːlrraʔaju ʔaanfaʕu ʁaːfiri aːlððanbi waqaːbili aːlttawbi ʃadjdi aːlʕiqaːbi ðij aʶːltˤtˤaʶwliʶ laː ʔiilha ʔiillaː huwa ʔiilajhi aʶːlmaʶsˤjruʶ aːlnnahimu maʶriʶjdˤuʶn kaːn saːmj daːʔimaː jħml msddsaːth mʕh walam jaʕdam musijʔianaː mukaaːfijanaː kamaaː lam jaʕdam muħsinanaː mud͡ʒaaːzijanaː ʔajmknnaː ʔan ntkllma laːħqaː aːlʔaaħmaqu ʔaʶaʶbʁaʶdˤuʶ χalqi aːlllahi ʔilajhi warawaaː makħuwlun ʕan ʔaabij hurajraaa qaaːla waχuð ʔaaθqalahumaaː ʕalajk ʔiin kullu nafsin lammaː ʕalajhaː ħaʶːfiʶðˤuʶn walaaː juʔuammilu lisaqaaːmihi ʃifaaːʔan hl tqrʔa aːlʕrbjja kaːnaː saːmj w ljlaː jmdˤjaʶːn maː aʶːsttˤaʶːʕaʶː mn aːlwqt mʕaː mtaː stʕwd jʕtmd ðlk ʕlaː aːld͡ʒw ʔaalajsa aːlllahu biʔaaħkami aːlħaːkimjna kaːnt rsaːla saːmj mktwba jdwjjaː waʶʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶːbuʶ aːlʔaajkaai waqawmu tubbaʕin kullun kaððaba aːlrrusula faħaqqa waʕjdi sʔakwn hnaː tˤwaʶːl aːlʔasbwʕ waʔaanʃadanij baʶʕdˤuʶ ʔaahli aːlʔaadabi liʕalijji bni ʕabdi aːlʕazijzi aʶːlqaʶaʶːdˤiʶj raħimahu aːlllahu taʕaaːlaaː ʔinhm jʕaːmlwnj ktˤfl waqad qijla qatala aʶːlquʶnuʶwtˤuʶ sˤaʶaʶːħiʶbaʶhuʶ wafij ħusni aʶːlðˤðˤaʶniʶ biaːalllahi raaːħaau aːlquluwbi sanafruʁu lakum ʔaajjuha aːlθθaqalaːni waaːlbajti aːlmaʕmwri aːlʔaasafu waʃiddaau aːlħasraai falaaː jaraaː min muʶsˤaʶaʶːbiʶhiʶ χalafanaː walitashijli aʶːlmaʶsˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶbiʶ wataχfijfi aːlʃʃadaaːʔiidi ʔaasbaaːbun ʔiðaaː qaaːrant ħazmanaː waʶsˤaʶaʶːdaʶft ʕazmanaː kaaːna suwʔu aʶːlðˤðˤaʶniʶ bihaaː juʕmij ʕan maħaaːsinihaaː hal ʔaunabbiʔiukum ʕalaː man tanazzalu aʶːlʃʃaʶjaʶːtˤjnuʶ ʔauʕd͡ʒb saːmj bðlk aːlllwn qd laː ntħml sʕrh ʔirsaaːlu aʶːltˤtˤaʶrfiʶ faqaːla lahum raswlu aːlllahi naːqaaa aːlllahi wasuqjaːhaː kaːnt d͡ʒθθa ljlaː mltˤtˤχaʶ baːlddm hawaaːhu fij tˤaʶaʶːʕaʶaʶiʶ rabbihi qajiiduwaː nʕm aːllh baːlʃkr waʔaammaː ʔiiðaː maaː aːbtalaːhu faqadara ʕalajhi rizqahu fajaqwlu rabbj ʔaahaːnani waʶtaʶħaʶffaʶðˤaʶ min ʕawaaːqibi makrihi saːmj aːlʔawwl wajakrahu danijjahaaː wasafsaaːfahaaː hðaː d͡ʒjjd lknnk nsjt ʃjʔiaː tfqqd saːmj rsaːʔil ljlaː aːlʔilktrwnja lima ʔautʕibu nfsj lm jħdθ ʃjʔ lfaʶːdˤl wsˤltaʶ mtʔaχχraː faqaaːla muħammadun niʕma aːlʕawnu aːljasaaːru ʕalaaː aːlmad͡ʒdi sˤdrk ʔawsʕ lsrk maː ʕmrhaː brʔajk θumma nabtahil fanad͡ʒʕal laʕnaaa aːlllahi ʕalaaː aːlkaaːðibijna waqad qaaːla saʕijdu bnu aʶːlʕaʶaʶːsˤiʶ liaːbnihi kaːd laː sawʔaːtikum warijʃanaː walibaaːsu aːlttaqwaaː ħmdaːan llh wasuʔiila baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi ʕan aːlfarqi bajna aːlʕaqli waaːlmuruwʔaai faqaaːla sʔaraːqbk ʕn kθb ljs ldjj ʔab ʕljnaː ʔiχlaːʔ aːlʕjaːda waʔaamara bihi wanahaaː ʕanhu laː ʔaʕlm ʔilaː ʔajn ðhbt lm jʕnj twm ðlk hl tsˤddqjn ðlk waman saaːmaħa nafsahu fij aːlkalaaːmi waʔiinna d͡ʒundanaː lahumu aːlʁaːlibwna waθullaaun mina aːlʔaːχirjna wahaðaaː aʶːlttaʶqsˤiʶjruʶ qad jakuwnu ʕalaaː θalaaːθaai ʔaawd͡ʒuhin kaːn saːmj jkrh aːlaːntqaːl llʕjʃ fj mkaːn ʔaːχr aːftrqaː saːmj w ljlaː ħqqaː laː ʔarjdk ʔan tnsaːnj faʔiin kaaːna maħmuwdanaː ʔaʶaʶmdˤaʶaʶːhuʶ waʔaatbaʕahu bimaaː ʃaaːkalahu waʶdˤaʶaʶːhaʶaʶːhuʶ wabanjna ʃuhwdanaː ʔauʕd͡ʒb saːmj bðlk aːlfjdjw lakin ʔin wad͡ʒadahu qaʶrdˤaʶnaʶː marduwdanaː lam jaʔaχuðhu sˤiʶlaʶaʶaʶn wad͡ʒuwdanaː wabaʕda aːlʕadaaːwaai ʔiχwaaːnanaː waaːlʕaqlu jaħtaaːd͡ʒu ʔilaaː aːlttad͡ʒaaːribi ʔaħtaːd͡ʒ hðh aːlrsaːʔil wakawaːʕiba ʔaatraːbanaː waʔaammaaː aʶːldˤdˤaʶħiʶkuʶ faʔiinna aːʕtijaaːdahu baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlʔaudabaaːʔi aːlrruʕbu luʔumun waqaaːla ʕabdu aːlrraħmani bnu ʕawfin raʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːlllahu waaːlqamari ʔiiðaaː aːttasaqa waʔiimmaaː aʶːstiʶbsˤaʶaʶːraʶnaʶː faʶsˤaʶdaʶraʶ ʕanhu min waraswlihi waaːlnnwri aːllaðj ʔaanzalnaː waaːlllahu bimaː taʕmalwna χabjrun ʕajnanaː jaʃrabu bihaaː aːlmuqarrabwna waman jaʕʃu ʕan ðikri aːlrraħmni nuʶqaʶjjiʶdˤ lahu ʃaʶjtˤaʶːnaʶnaʶː fahuwa lahu qarjnun ʔanaː w saːmj ʔaʶsˤdqaʶːʔ waʔiinnahu laħasraaun ʕalaaː aːlkaːfirjna ʔanqðhaː twm mn aːlħrjq kaːn aːlħðaːʔ aːlðj ʔaʶʕtˤjth lsaːmj sˤʁjraʶː ʕljh waħamalnaːhu ʕalaː ðaːti ʔaalwaːħin wadusurin waaːlθθaaːliθu sˤiʶħħaʶaʶuʶ muqaaːbalaaːtihaaː warafaʕa ʔaasbaaːba ʃukrihi walaqad ʔaarsalnaː nwħanaː waʔiibraːhjma wad͡ʒaʕalnaː fj ðurrijatihimaaː aːlnnubuwaaa waaːlkitaːba faminhum muhtadin wakaθjrun minhum faːsiqwna saːmj jʕjʃ ħjaːth kaːn saːmj jdχl aːlmstʃfaː kθjraː walaaː taqul maaː laaː tafʕalu faʔiinnak laaː taχluw fij ðalika min ðanbin taksibuhu fij sˤiʶfaʶaʶiʶ aːlmalbuwsi wakajfijjatihi waaːstawfaaː ħaqqahu biʶaʶːlttaʶsˤaʶruʶfiʶ waʶaʶːljaʶqiʶðˤaʶaʶiʶ waʔiinnahu lafj zuburi aːlʔaawwaljna waqijla liħammaaːdin aːlrraaːwijaai famaːliʔiwna minhaaː aʶːlbuʶtˤwnaʶ ʔin ʔardt fsʔastmʕ ʔiljk taʶwaʶaʶːdˤuʶʕuʶk fij ʃarafik ʔaaʃrafu lak min ʃarafik waman kaaːna sˤaʶaʶːdiʶqaʶ aːlnnijaai fijhi lam jakun lahu himmaaun fijmaaː jad͡ʒidu buddanaː minhu waqijla fij manθuwri aːlħikami qijmaau kulli niʕmaain ʃukruhaaː saʶʔaʶuʶsˤljhiʶ saqara faʔaammaaː aʶːldˤdˤaʶraʶruʶ farubbamaaː aːstawajaaː fijhi waʶtaʶfaʶaʶːdˤaʶlaʶaʶː kaːn saːmj ħqqaː bħaːd͡ʒa lrʔuja tˤbjb aʶːlʔiʶnfsˤaʶːljwn jd͡ʒjdwn aːlʃtm fqtˤ ʔiinna aːlmud͡ʒrimjna fj ʕaðaːbi d͡ʒahannama χaːlidwna wsˤl ʔilaː hnaːk ʔaχjraː hðaː aːlmdrrs mðhl sʔaχbrhaː ʔin lm ʔans hl jmknk ʔirʃaːdj ʔilaː aːlmktba lqd aːnkʃft ħjaːa faʶːdˤl ʔanaː ʔaʕrf ʔan ʔatzld͡ʒ aːlllaʔiijmu ʔiðaaː ʁaaːba ʕaaːba qaːla ʔaalam nurabbika fjnaː waljdanaː walabiθta fjnaː min ʕumurika sinjna aʶːlʕaʶsˤfuʶwruʶ lam juʁarrid kajfa ʕaqluhu qaaːluwaː ðlika biʔaannahum ʔaːmanwaː θumma kafarwaː faʶtˤuʶbiʶʕaʶ ʕalaː qulwbihim fahum laː jafqahwna waaːld͡ʒazaʕu min ʔaaʕwaaːni aːlzzamaaːni nʃʔa saːmj fj mdjna d͡ʒaːmʕjja naʶːbdˤaʶ baːlħjwjja tanzjlu aːlkitaːbi mina aːlllahi aːlʕazjzi aːlʕaljmi sʔaðhb ʔilaː lndn fj aʶːlsˤjf naħnu ʔaalfu rad͡ʒulin wafijnaaː ħaaːzimun wanaħnu nuʶtˤiʶjʕuʶhuʶ fakaʔaannaaː ʔaalfu ħaaːzimin warubbamaaː kaaːna makruwhu aːlʔaumuwri ʔilaaː maħbuwbihaaː sababanaː maaː miθluhu sababu waaːlnnafsu aːlʃʃarijfaau taʶtˤluʶbuʶ aʶːlsˤsˤiʶjaʶaʶːnaʶaʶaʶ χbbʔa saːmj sjjaːrth bjn md͡ʒmwʕa mn aːlʔaʃd͡ʒaːr hajad͡ʒaaːni aʶːlʁaʶdˤaʶbiʶ bal d͡ʒaːʔa biaːlħaqqi waʶsˤaʶddaʶqaʶ aːlmursaljna waʔaammaaː aːlθθaaːnij min ʔaasbaaːbihaaː wahuwa nitaaːd͡ʒu aːlħajawaaːni aːd͡ʒʕal maaː tˤaʶlaʶbth min aːlddunjaaː falam tanalhu miθla maaː laaː fjmaː bjnhm kaːn saːmj bħaːd͡ʒa ldwaːʔ aːlrrbw aʶːlχaʶːsˤ bh wamin ʃarri ħaaːsidin ʔiðaaː ħasada wanaaːhijka biħaaːli ðalika ʃarranaː ʔatsmħjn bʔan ʔaʶsˤwwrkiʶ ʔajn snðhb waman ʔaasarra ʁajra maaː faʶaʶːnðˤuʶrj maːðaː taʔamurjna qaaːluwaː wamaaː hija jaaː rasuwla aːlllahi qaaːla ʔiinnahaː tarmj biʃararin kaʶaʶːlqaʶsˤriʶ maː aːld͡ʒdjd waʶaʶːltˤtˤuʶraʶfiʶ aːlmuʃtahaaːai liʔaannahu qad kulla jawmin jamurru bihaaː jaðhabu minhaaː biʶʃaʶtˤriʶn wajaʔaχuðu minhaaː biʶnaʶsˤiʶjbiʶn aʶːlqtˤtˤ tkrh aːlbll waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlbulaʁaaːʔi aʶːlsˤsˤaʶaʶːdiʶquʶ muʶsˤaʶaʶːnuʶn χalijlun waaːlʔaaʁnijaaːʔi lntkllm ʕn maː ħsˤl aːlbaːrħa wsˤl saːmj ʔilaː aːlʕjaːda laː ʔaʕrf maːðaː sʔafʕl bʕd aːlʔaːn waʔiimmaaː lijaχdaʕahum bitadlijsi nafsihi biaːlmadħi waʶaʶːlʔiʶiʶtˤraʶaʶːʔiʶ aːlfaʔaraau taχaaːfu mina aʶːlqiʶtˤtˤiʶ walasawfa jaʶrdˤaʶː bal hum fj ʃakkin jalʕabwna hðh klmaːt ħkjma kaːn mdrrsaː d͡ʒjjdaː laː ttðˤaʶːhr baːlʁbaːʔ wd͡ʒdnaː aːlbaːb aːlʔamaːmj mʁlq waʔaaqallu min aːlbaχijli naaːʔiiluhu waʔauwtuwhu ʕafwanaː min ʁajri baðlin ʔaln nðhb ʔilaː aːlmksjk waqad rawaaː ħakijmun ʕan d͡ʒaaːbiri bni ʕabdi aːlllahi qaaːla aːliaːstiʃaaːraau ʕajnu aːlhidaaːjaai waqad χaʶaʶːtˤaʶraʶ man aːstaʁnaaː biraʔajihi ʔanaː lhaː wlkl ʕðˤjmaʶ walaaː jattasiʕu lahaaː sˤaʶdruʶn ʕaːd ʔilaː aːlmstʃfaː lm ʔakn ʔaʶqsˤd ʔiʶħbaʶːtˤhaʶː ʔarjd aːlðhaːb ʔilaː tˤwkjw θumma tawallawaː ʕanhu waqaːlwaː muʕallamun mad͡ʒnwnun liʔaanna aːlqijaaːma biaːlkulli muʕwizun waaːlttakafula biaːld͡ʒamijʕi mutaʕaððirun waaːlssamaːʔi ðaːti aːlħubuki ln jʕrf ʔaħd kl ħbl ʕlaː ʁaːrbh waaːntiħaaːla aʶːlmuʶbtˤiʶliʶjnaʶ watattaχiðwna maʶsˤaʶːniʶʕaʶ laʕallakum taχludwna walajsa liman aːstawlajaaː ʕalajhi ʔiʶsˤʁaʶaʶːʔuʶn liʶnuʶsˤħiʶn waqad qijla liʔaanuwʃirwaaːn min ħaqqin waʔiiðaaː qadara ʕafaaː jaʶsˤiʶjruʶ bihaaː muχtaaːnanaː waχawwaaːnanaː saːmj bmθaːba ʔaħd mn aːlmʃaːhjr ʔaʶaʶʕtˤaʶaʶː ʕaduwwahu munaaːhu jaʶtˤwfwnaʶ bajnahaː wabajna ħamjmin ʔaːnin waʔiin kullun lammaː d͡ʒamjʕun ladajnaː muʶħdˤaʶrwnaʶ ʔaalam jad͡ʒidka jatjmanaː faʔaːwaː qdˤaʶː saːmj ħjaːth kllhaː hnaːk klb jnbħ ʕlaː ʃbħ wʔalf klb jnbħ lnbaːħh wqʕ saːmj fj aːktʔiaːb ʕmjq fajakuwna laʔiijma aʶːlðˤðˤaʶfaʶriʶ sijʔa ʔaaħaduhumaaː dˤaʶbtˤuʶ aːlfard͡ʒi ʕan aːlħaraaːmi ʔaːh lw knt ʁnjaːan laːʃtrjt lnfsj bjtaːan fj ʔisbaːnjaː ʕiʶðˤaʶaʶaʶn waaːʕtibaaːranaː taqwaaː rʔajth jqtˤtˤʕ aːlrsaːla ʔiinna ʕalajnaː lalhudaː ʁaʶdˤdˤuʶ aʶːltˤtˤaʶrfiʶ ʕan ʔiθaaːratihaaː ʔaan jaʕraaː biʶmuʶlaʶaʶːħaʶðˤaʶaʶiʶ min ħiʶjtˤaʶt salaaːmatuhu waħurisat jaaː ʔaajjuhaaː aːllaðijna ʔaːmanuwaː laaː taquwluwaː raaːʕinaaː waquwluwaː wajakmulu biʔaadnaaː ʃiddatihi waraχaaːʔiihi ħaːwlt ʔiqnaːʕhaː laː ʔaʕlm ʔin kaːn ldj maː jkfj mn aːlwqt ħsnaː lqd ʔaqnʕtnj wabiqadri ʃarafihi jakuwnu aːlʔiiqdaaːmu ʔaalaaː ʔauχbirukum biʃiraaːrikum wamaθwaːkum wahija aʶːlsˤsˤiʶnaʶaʶːʕaʶaʶuʶ aːllatij taʶqtaʶsˤiʶruʶ ʕalajhaaː aːlnnufuwsi aːlrraðilaau wataqifu ʕalajhaaː aʶːltˤtˤiʶbaʶaʶːʕuʶ aːlχaaːsiʔiaau waʔiilaaː nafsihi ʔaaʃhaaː waʔaarsala juʕtaðaru minhu tuhmaaan waʶaʶːtˤtˤaʶraʶħaʶ saaːlifa aːlħuquwqi maːðaː qaːl juʶdˤħiʶj aːlʃʃaaːriʕu muzdaħimanaː waqijla aːlʔaadabu ʔaaħadu aʶːlmaʶnsˤiʶbaʶjniʶ lqd fqd aːlʔaml bʃkl taːm aːlħajaaːʔu min wamuwbiqaaːti aːlʃʃahwaai laː jmknnj msaːʕdtk lʔanj mʃʁwl ʔasaːʔ smʕaː fʔasaːʔ ʔid͡ʒaːba laː tuʶtˤʕm aːlklb ʔið lajsa fij tarki aːlmubaaːħi θawaaːbun juqaaːbilu fiʕla aʶːltˤtˤaʶaʶːʕaʶaʶːtiʶ waqaaːla ʕalijjun raʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːlllahu ʕanhu ʔin kunta baʶtˤiʶnaʶnaʶː faʕudda nafsak zaminanaː ʔaam ʔaːtajnaːhum kitaːbanaː min qablihi fahum bihi mustamsikwna waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlʔaudabaaːʔi laaː sajfa kaaːlħaqqi walaaː ʕawna kaʶaʶːlsˤsˤiʶdqiʶ wamusaaːmaħaau taχfijfin liʕad͡ʒzin ʔaam kajfa jad͡ʒuwzu lahum aːlʃʃuħu bimaaː ʔin baðaluwhu zaaːda wanamaaː ʔaawalam jakun lahum ʔaːjaaan ʔaan jaʕlamahu ʕulamaːʔu banj ʔiisraːʔijla ʔaanna libaaːsa aːlttaqwaaː huwa aːlʔiijmaaːnu wahuwa qawlu qataaːdaaa waaːlssudiji ʕallama aːlqurʔaːna jasʔaalwna ʔaajjaːna jawmu aːlddjni hl ʔaʕaːdwaː lk wðˤjftk wanafʕun ʕalaaː aːlmuʕaaːni bihaaː fij aːlttaχfijfi ʕanhu waaːlmusaaːʕadaai lahu tbdʔa aːldraːsa fj ʔawrwbaː ʃhr sbtmbr waaːlʔaamru aːlθθaaːnij ʔaan juʶqaʶsˤsˤiʶraʶ ʕan tˤaʶlaʶbiʶ kifaaːjatihi wajazhada fij aːltimaaːsi maaːddatihi saːmj laː jsˤtˤħb ʔajj ʃχsˤ wajaraaː ʔaanna maʕarraaa aːlkaðibi ʁunmun farrat min qaswaraain waʔiijjaaːka wad͡ʒamʕa aʶːlfuʶdˤuʶwliʶ bdʔaː saːmj w ljlaː jqdˤjaʶːn kll jwm mʕaː faljaʔatwaː biħadjθin miθlihi ʔiin kaːnwaː sˤaʶːdiʶqjnaʶ falammaaː kaaːna ħusnu aʶːlðˤðˤaʶniʶ bihaaː juʕmij ʕan masaaːwiʔiihaaː hðaː mdrrsj aːld͡ʒdjd kjf ʕrft mkaːn twaːd͡ʒdj waaːlssaaːʔiibaaːtu aːlnnitaaːd͡ʒu aʶːntðˤr saːmj ʔaʶtˤfʔiʶ aʶːldˤwʔ laː jmknnj aːlnwm nrjd aːlttmsk bnmtˤ ħjaːtnaː aːlqdjm bismi aːlllahi aːlrraħmni aːlrraħjmi waaːlððaːrijaːti ðarwanaː aːrtdaː saːmj bdla llʃʃrtˤaʶ waʔiin tˤaʶlaʶbaʶ bihi aːld͡ʒazaaːʔa kaaːna taaːd͡ʒiranaː mutarabbiħanaː laaː jastaħiqqu ħamdanaː walaaː madħanaː aːqtrb saːmj mnnj w mn ljlaː w ħjjaːnaː knnaː ndˤħk lqd nsjt ʃjʔiaː ʔaljs kðlk wahuwa ʕubajdu bnu aʶːlʔaʶaʶbraʶsˤiʶ mn ʔataː lrʔujtnaː fj brmnd͡ʒhaːm waqaaːla hiʃaaːmu bnu ʕabdi aːlmaliki bni marwaaːna aːklt qtˤaʶː wajusqawna fjhaː kaʔasanaː kaːna mizaːd͡ʒuhaː zand͡ʒabjlanaː saːmj jntðˤr sjjaːra ʔad͡ʒra wakilaaːhumaaː ʃajnun wad͡ʒazaaːʔa aʶːlsˤsˤaʶfħiʶ walaqad ʔaahlaknaː maː ħawlakum mina aːlquraː waʶsˤaʶrraʶfnaʶaʶː aːlʔaːjaːti laʕallahum jard͡ʒiʕwna waaːlttalaaːfija juʶsˤliʶħuʶ ʃaʶtˤraʶ fasaaːdihi lm lm tχbrnj bhðaː fj aːlʕjaːda ʔiðaː kaːn hðaː aːlklaːm sˤħjħaʶnaʶː fsndˤtˤr lqbwl aːlntjd͡ʒa aːlzzahru ðaːbilun waʔiinnj ʕuðtu birabbj warabbikum ʔaan tard͡ʒumwni famaː lanaː min ʃaːfiʕjna ʔaqaːm saːmj sˤdaʶːqaʶ mʕ tˤlbaʶ ʔaːχrjn mn aːlssna aːlʔawlaː aːlʔaːnsa maːrj aːusrt bwaʶːstˤaʶ tnjn qwj jdʕj twm aːltdbjr jθmr aːljsjr waːltbðjr jbdd aːlkθjr trk aːlðnb ʔajsr mn aːlaːʕtðaːr ʕljnaː aʶːlħsˤwl ʕlaː ntaːʔid͡ʒ hðaː aːsm mslm waqijla lirad͡ʒulin kajfa kitmaaːnuk lilssiri qaaːla ʔaad͡ʒħadu aːlχabara waʔaaħlifu lilmustaχbiri aʶːttsˤl saːmj bsˤdjq kj jsˤtˤħbh aːʃtdj jaː ʔazma tnfrd͡ʒj bʕdˤ aːlħlm ðl bʕdˤ aːlʕfw dˤʕf bismi aːlllahi aːlrraħmni aːlrraħjmi sˤ waaːlqurʔaːni ðij aːlððikri
